question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Lemon Grilled Salmon
Ingredients:
2 tsp. snipped fresh dill or 1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 salmon fillet (1 1/2 lb.)
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
3 Tbsp. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. chopped green onions (can substitute regular)
1 small lemon, thinly sliced
2 onion slices, separated into rings
Directions:
In a small bowl, mix together dill, lemon-pepper, salt and garlic powder.
Sprinkle on salmon.
Place in a large resealable plastic bag or shallow glass container.
Combine brown sugar, broth, oil, soy sauce and green onions.
Pour over the salmon. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Turn once.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Easy Herbed Grilled Salmon
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. salmon filet
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 lemon
2 Tbsp. white wine
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. parsley flakes
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat grill. Make a tray out of heavy-duty foil by folding a long piece in half and folding up all 4 sides with the dull side up. Spray the bottom of the foil tray with cooking spray. Place fish filet in the tray, skin side down. Smear a thin line of butter on filet. Squeeze lemon juice liberally over filet and then a splash of white wine. Sprinkle remaining seasonings lightly over filet and transfer the foil tray to the hot grill. Cover. Cook for 10 minutes per inch of thickness of filet. DO NOT overcook or it will be dry and unpalatable. Turning is not necessary. Salmon is done when it turns a light pink color throughout.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Grilled Lemon Salmon
Ingredients:
2 tsp. fresh dill
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 lb. salmon filet
1/4 c. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. oil
1 cube chicken bouillon, mixed with 3 Tbsp. water
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. green onions
1 lemon, thinly sliced
2 slices onions, separated into rings
Directions:
Sprinkle dill, salt, pepper and garlic powder over salmon and place in shallow pan. Mix sugar, bouillon, oil, soy sauce and green onions. Pour over salmon. Cover and chill for 1 hour; turn once. Drain and discard marinade. Put on grill over medium heat; place lemon and onion on top. Cover and cook for 15 minutes or until fish is done.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Herbed Salmon Steaks
Ingredients:
3 (12 oz. each) pkg. frozen salmon steaks
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. marjoram leaves
2 tsp. onion salt
Directions:
Place frozen fish in greased casserole.
Mix lemon juice, marjoram leaves and onion salt.
Spoon on fish and bake at 450° for 45 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Pan Braised Salmon With Green Sauce
Ingredients:
3 c. regular chicken broth
3 garlic cloves
3 scallions
2 c. fresh spinach
1/4 c. dill sprigs
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
4 small salmon steaks
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 1/2 tsp. lemon zest
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
In a large skillet, bring chicken broth and garlic cloves to a boil over medium heat.
Wash and trim the scallions, spinach and fresh dill.
Add the whole scallions, spinach, dill, lemon juice and salmon steaks to a boiling broth temperature.
Reduce the heat to low, cover and simmer until the salmon just flakes when tested with a fork, 5 to 7 minutes.
Carefully remove the salmon to a plate and cover loose to keep warm.
Remove the garlic, scallions, spinach and dill.
Puree the cooked vegetables.
Add butter, mustard, lemon zest, salt and pepper.
Add sour cream.
Serve.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
3 c. chickpeas (dried)
chickpea water
1 c. tahini
1/2 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. salt
3 Tbsp. minced fresh garlic
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to keep covered.
Cook for approximately 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
Taste peas from time to time until done.
Save water when done.
In a food processor, add the ingredients in "batches."
Add chickpea water to keep it smooth (a thicker than pudding look).
Mix batches in a bowl with a wooden spoon.
Serve on a plate with olive oil drizzled on it, also with pita wedges and veggies.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus(Chickpea Spread)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
2 c. cooked, drained chickpeas or canned
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
3 to 5 Tbsp. tahini sauce*
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Start your food processor and then put in garlic.
As soon as garlic is minced, put in chickpeas, lemon juice, salt, tahini and cold water.
Blend until smooth.
Add more cold water if you want it thinner.
Empty contents into a shallow 6-inch wide bowl. Smooth contents.
Sprinkle with paprika and cumin, then drizzle oil over it.
Best served at room temperature.
Dip with pita bread.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 (19 oz.) can chickpeas (garbanzos), drained (reserve 1/3 c. liquid)
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. sliced fresh garlic
1/2 tsp. Oriental sesame oil
1/8 tsp. each salt and pepper
Directions:
Process all ingredients (including reserved liquid) in blender until smooth.
Makes 2 cups.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. (15 oz. can) cooked chickpeas, drained, reserve liquid
1/4 c. tahini (sesame paste)
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 large cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
water if needed
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 c. scallions
dash of cayenne
Directions:
In blender (in batches) or in food processor, process chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice until mixture reaches consistency of coarse paste; use as much of reserved pea liquid or water as needed.
Add garlic, coriander, cumin, paprika and cayenne and process again.
Transfer to a bowl and add scallions. Cover and chill one hour before serving the dip.
Add parsley as garnish.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus(Mashed Chickpeas With Sesame)
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. chickpeas
1 garlic clove, crushed
4 Tbsp. sesame paste (tahini)
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
dash of salt
1/4 tsp. olive oil
1/2 c. water
parsley (to decorate)
Directions:
Rinse chickpeas under cold water; mash in a bowl.
Add garlic, sesame and lemon juice and stir until smooth.
Chill.
Serve on flat plate with Syrian bread.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Baked Polenta
Ingredients:
1 1/2 to 2 lb. chopped tomatoes
1 Tbsp. olive oil
bay leaf
2 basil leaves
2 branches fresh parsley
1/2 small onion, diced
1 clove garlic, chopped
salt and pepper
1 1/2 c. coarse cornmeal
8 oz. Fontina cheese, thinly sliced
5 oz. Gorgonzola cheese
Directions:
Tomato Sauce:
Combine the olive oil, bay leaf, basil, parsley, onion and garlic.
Cook slowly for 3 to 4 minutes.
Add tomatoes. Raise heat to medium-high and cook until tomatoes are heated through.
Remove the bay leaf and blend the mixture.
Put the sauce back in pan with bay leaf and simmer until thick.
Add salt and pepper.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Business
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
8 slices white bread
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
2 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 c. grated yellow cheese
butter
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Clean and slice mushrooms.
Saute in butter until slightly cooked.
Butter 3 slices of bread.
Trim crusts and cut into 1-inch squares.
Put in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Creamed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. minced onion
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. celery salt
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Slice or half washed mushrooms lengthwise.
In butter, in large skillet over low heat, saute onion until tender; add mushrooms.
Saute over medium heat, covered, stirring occasionally 8 to 10 minutes.
Stir in flour, salt, pepper, lemon juice, celery salt, then milk.
Cook over low heat, stirring until thickened.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Polenta(Microwave)
Ingredients:
1 c. cornmeal
1 c. cold water
1 tsp. salt
3 c. boiling water (or more)
Directions:
Mix together until smooth in a large microwave-safe bowl.
Add 3 cups boiling water; stir well.
Cover with Saran wrap and microwave on High for 7 to 10 minutes.
Remove; stir well.
If too thick, more water may be added.
Put back into microwave for 7 to 10 more minutes on High.
This is done in 15 to 20 minutes. Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Hors D'Oeuvres
Ingredients:
36 medium sized mushrooms
1/4 c. minced green pepper
2 Tbsp. pimento
1/4 c. minced green onions
1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs (3 slices)
3/4 c. Monterey Jack cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. turmeric
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Remove stems from mushrooms and chop.
Saute stems, green pepper, pimento and onions in 3 tablespoons butter or margarine; remove from heat and add bread crumbs, cheese and spices.
Mix well.
Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Stuff mushrooms and bake in a 350° oven for 15 minutes.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Stove Top Chicken Stew
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts
2 c. quartered potatoes
1 c. sliced carrots
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/4 can water
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
Wash chicken and place in heavy fryer; cover with vegetables. Mix soup with water and pour over vegetables.
Add seasoning. Cover and simmer until chicken and vegetables are tender, approximately 35 to 45 minutes.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Chicken In A Sack
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. catsup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
4 Tbsp. water
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 tsp. red pepper
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. chili powder
2 frying size chickens, cut up into pieces
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except chicken and heat.
Salt and flour chicken pieces.
Then dip in sauce that has been heated.
When saturated, place in a well-greased paper grocery bag.
Twist bag closed.
Place on broiler pan.
Cook 15 minutes at 450°, then lower to 250° for 1 hour or until tender.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Gentlemen Prefer Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. Chicken, cut up
Salt and Pepper to taste
1/4 c. Oil
1 can Lemonade Concentrate, thawed
3/4 c. crushed Pineapple, drained
3/4 c. chunk Pineapple, drained
2 Green Bell Pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. Brown Sugar
1/4 c. A-1 Steak Sauce
1/2 c. Slivered Almonds
Directions:
Brown chicken in skillet with oil, salt and pepper with a little butter.
When brown place in baking dish.
Put remaining ingredients over chicken in the order given.
Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 45 minutes.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Chicken Dish
Ingredients:
2 boxes Stove Top stuffing mix
chicken, cut into small pieces
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 can water
Directions:
Put all together.
Mix well.
Bake 1/2 hour at 350°.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Deep South Ovenly Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 pkg. biscuit mix
1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. paprika (optional)
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/2 c. margarine or butter, melted
6 legs and thighs or 6 breasts, pat dry (with or without skin)
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients in paper bag.
Dip chicken into milk, then place into bag.
Shake to coat well.
Place in 13 x 9-inch shallow baking dish.
Pour magarine or butter over chicken.
Bake, uncovered, 1 hour at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No-Knead Bread
Ingredients:
3 pkg. dry yeast
2 eggs
10 c. flour
4 tsp. salt
3 3/4 c. warm water
6 Tbsp. soft margarine
6 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Dissolve dry yeast in warm water; add remaining ingredients one by one.
Mix by hand until moist.
Seal in Tupperware fix-n-mix bowl until seal pops off.
Divide into 4 loaves.
Cover with towel and let rise 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° for 1/2 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No Knead Bread
Ingredients:
2 pkg. dry yeast
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. milk
1 c. water
1 egg
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients in large mixer bowl.
Set aside.
In saucepan, over low heat, combine oil, milk and water.
Heat until temperature reaches 120° to 130°.
Combine dry ingredients with the liquids, add egg.
Blend at low mixer speed until moistened.
Beat three minutes at medium speed.
By hand, stir in another 2 or 2 1/2 cups of flour to form a stiff batter.
(Batter will follow spoon.) Cover batter with damp cloth; let rise in warm place (80° to 85°) until light and doubled, about 50 minutes.
Stir down batter, spoon into greased two 8 x 4-inch loaf pans, batter does not rise a second time before baking.
Immediately place in oven.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes.
Cool on rack.
Brush with melted butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: Easy "No Knead" Yeast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. oil
4 1/2 c. flour
1 c. warm water
2 pkg. yeast
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in cup of warm water; set aside.
Scald milk, sugar, salt and oil.
Let cool.
Mix yeast mixture and cooled milk mixture.
Stir in flour until well mixed.
Cover, let rise double in bowl, about 45 minutes.
After rising, stir dough a half minute.
Place dough in greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover, let rise double in size, 1 hour.
Bake at 400° for 25 to 30 minutes. Brush with oleo.
Makes 1 loaf.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: Easy No-Knead Bread(Very Good)
Ingredients:
2 c. unbleached or all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
2 pkg. active dry yeast
1 egg
1 c. water
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. milk
Directions:
(Generously use cooking spray at the bottom of your baking pan.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No Knead White Bread
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
1/4 c. lukewarm water
3 Tbsp. butter, cut into 3 pieces
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 c. boiling water
3 c. white flour (plus a little more at the end)
Directions:
Stir the yeast into the lukewarm water.
Set aside.
Put butter, sugar and salt in a medium bowl.
Add boiling water and stir.
When this is lukewarm, stir in the yeast mixture.
Now add the liquid mixture slowly to the flour by hand or mixer.
When everything is combined and mixture is smooth, cover and leave in warm place to rise until double in bulk, about 1 hour.
Stir the dough until it deflates.
Spoon into a regular size loaf pan that has been buttered.
The dough will be soft and spongy.
Pat the top of the log with a floured hand to smooth it out.
Let it rise again, lightly covered, just until edges of loaf reach top of pan, 30 minutes.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 stick butter
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 pkg. grated parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a microwavable bowl.
Microwave on high, stirring frequently, until mixture is smooth.
Serve with raw vegetables, bread or chips.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. (8 oz.) sharp Cheddar cheese spread (room temperature)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
1/2 c. sour cream
1 1/2 tsp. dill weed
1 tsp. onion, finely chopped
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and mix well.
Serve with assortment of crackers, raw vegetables or pumpernickel bread loaf.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 to 3 chopped garlic pieces
6 c. chicken broth (or bouillon)
8 oz. egg noodles
salt
paprika
croutons
6 c. milk
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, chopped, thawed and drained
1/2 lb. Fontina cheese, shredded
1/2 lb. Provolone cheese, shredded
Directions:
Heat oil in large saucepan.
Add onions and garlic.
Saute 5 minutes.
Add chicken broth.
Heat to boil.
Add noodles and salt. Cook 6 minutes.
Stir in milk, spinach and cheese.
Cook until cheese melts.
Do not boil.
Sprinkle with croutons and paprika. (Can substitute broccoli or/add American, Cheddar cheeses.)

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Potato Bake
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes
2 pkg. chopped spinach
1 1/2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
2 medium onions, chopped
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. thyme
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into thin strips (julienne).
Place layer of potatoes in greased baking dish.
Saute chopped onion until tender (not browned).
Layer onion over potatoes.
Drain spinach and press out most of liquid.
Layer spinach over onions. Layer half of cheese.
Add layer of potatoes.
Add remaining cheese.
Pour cream with thyme and nutmeg mixed in.
Drizzle over casserole and bake in 350° oven for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Cheese Dip
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
8 oz. calorie reduced cream cheese, cubed
1 tomato, seeded and chopped
4 green onions, finely chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced
1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese
1/3 c. milk
salt and pepper
Directions:
Place spinach in a 1-quart microwavable casserole dish and microwave on High for 7 to 9 minutes, until defrosted and cooked. Let cool slightly and then place clean dry towel in dish to remove excess water.
In a 2-quart bowl, combine spinach, cream cheese, tomato, onions, garlic and jalapenos.
Microwave on High for 3 to 4 minutes, until mixture is smooth.
Stir in cheese and milk. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve piping hot with tortilla chips.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ganoush(From "Wings Of Life" Cookbook)
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
4 or 5 cloves garlic, mashed
1 tsp. sea salt
1/2 c. tahini
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. finely minced fresh parsley
sprinkle cayenne pepper
Directions:
Prick the whole unpeeled eggplant in a few places with a fork, place it on a baking sheet and broil it about 4 inches from the heat in the oven.
Turn it to cook on all sides, until the eggplant is completely collapsed.
This takes about 20 minutes. When the eggplant is cool enough to handle, peel off the charred skin.
Beat the pulp with a fork until it is smooth or puree in blender.
In a separate bowl, mix garlic and salt.
Stir in the tahini.
With a wooden spoon, beat in the lemon juice.
Beat the tahini mixture into the eggplant a little at a time.
The mixture should whip up nicely and turn a lighter color.
Add the fresh parsley and cayenne pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Puree(Baba Ghanouge)
Ingredients:
2 large eggplants
1/2 c. tahini (sesame paste)
3 garlic cloves, crushed
3 lemons
salt to taste
olive oil
Directions:
Pierce eggplants at different points.
Broil for 30 minutes, turning occasionally (the surface should be burned and cracked). Remove skin, drain pulp.
Combine all ingredients in blender; puree until smooth.
Garnish with chopped parsley and olive oil. Eat with fresh pita bread.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ghamouj(Eggplant Dip)
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
3 Tbsp. tahini (sesame extract; can be purchased from health food stores)
juice of 2 lemons
2 cloves garlic, minced
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. red bell pepper, chopped fine
Directions:
Broil eggplant with skin on, turning it frequently.
Or, you may cook eggplant in microwave for 6 minutes.
(Ensure the use of fork to make small holes in eggplant before it is placed in microwave.)
When cool, remove skin and mash like a potato.
Mix other ingredients; add to eggplant and blend well. Garnish with parsley and olive oil.
Serve with pita bread.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ghanouj(Eggplant Puree)
Ingredients:
2 unpeeled eggplant (medium size)
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. Tahini
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of paprika
Directions:
Place eggplant in a baking pan and bake in oven at 375° for about 30 minutes.
Remove eggplant and let cool; split open and scoop out pulp; set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Appetizer(Baba Ghannuj)
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. water
1/4 c. sesame seed paste (tahini)
olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. lemon juice
parsley (for decoration)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Wash and remove stem of eggplant. Pierce with a fork about 5 times.
Place in a baking dish.
Bake for 45 minutes or until tender.
Remove from oven and run under cold water.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
4 flat anchovies, mashed
2 to 3 cloves garlic, minced
6 to 8 Tbsp. olive oil
4 Tbsp. good vinegar
1/4 tsp. fresh pepper
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
juice from 2 lemons
coddled egg
Parmesan cheese (to be sprinkled over the top)
1 head lettuce, torn
croutons
Directions:
Mix all dressing ingredients and pour over lettuce.
Add croutons and stir once more.
Use Parmesan cheese before serving, if desired.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 can flat anchovies
1 Tbsp. coarse black pepper
1 Tbsp. Accent
1/2 tsp. dry mustard powder
1 medium onion
3 celery stalks
3 eggs
1 1/2 pods garlic
2 c. salad oil
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a blender.
Sprinkle salad with Parmesan cheese and lemon juice.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. garlic
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
4 eggs
2 oz. anchovy paste
4 oz. Dijon mustard
2 oz. lemon and pepper seasoning
5 oz. lemon juice
24 oz. olive oil
8 oz. salad oil
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Chill for 30 minutes and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Dressing
Ingredients:
1/3 c. fresh lemon juice, strained
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1 egg
1 egg white
4 anchovy fillets, chopped
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1 medium garlic clove
1 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine first nine ingredients
in
processor and blend until smooth, about one
minute.
With
machine
running,
add both oils through feed tube
in
slow
steady stream and blend until thick. Makes about 3 cups.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 cup salad oil
1 egg
1/2 cup Parmesan cheese
1/4 cup lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix in blender, pour over greens, toss.
Add anchovies and croutons.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
2 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh grated Parmesan
Directions:
Puree lemon juice and garlic in food processor.
With machine running, gradually add olive oil and blend until smooth.
Add Parmesan cheese, blend until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. half and half
1 egg, lightly beaten
1 clove garlic, minced
5 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. sugar
juice of 1 1/2 lemons
Directions:
Whisk together and refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette For Salad And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. diced capers
1 tsp. diced tarragon leaves or 1/2 tsp. dry
1/2 medium onion, diced
1/2 medium red onion, diced
1 large dill pickle, diced
1 1/2 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. red wine vinegar
1 c. salad oil
2 dashes Tabasco
2 dashes Worcestershire
salt and fresh ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
This recipe has been used at LeBistro for 20 years.
Spoon over any fresh salad mixture. Also excellent over tomatoes and asparagus with fresh red onion.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Hot Vinaigrette Vegetable
Ingredients:
2 c. each: broccoli and cauliflower florets
1 c. thinly sliced onions
6 cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. red bell pepper strips
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 tsp. each; lemon juice and raspberry vinegar
1 tsp. Chinese sesame oil
1/2 tsp. each: granulated sugar and salt
1 small garlic clove, mashed
1/4 tsp. oregano leaves
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. chopped fresh basil
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, bring 1 quart water to a boil.
Add broccoli and cauliflower and cook, stirring once for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Drain vegetables and transfer to serving platter.
Add onions, tomatoes and bell peppers and set aside.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Potatoes With Rosemary
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. light olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 lb. new potatoes, scrubbed and cut in 1-inch pieces
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 1/4 tsp. fresh rosemary, crumbled
Directions:
Heat olive oil and minced garlic in 10-inch heavy skillet over low heat until garlic starts to sizzle, about 10 minutes. Add potatoes.
Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper and tiny pinch rosemary; toss to coat.
Increase heat to medium and cook, covered, until potatoes are tender when pierced, about 15 minutes.
Uncover skillet.
Increase heat to high and cook, stirring frequently, until well browned, 3 to 4 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining rosemary and additional salt and pepper. Any leftovers make ideal additions to beef or turkey hash.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Potatoes Rosemary
Ingredients:
1 med onion, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. grated lemon rind
1/4 cup bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 cups potatoes, peeled and diced
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (4 ozs.)
2 tsp. fresh or 1 tsp. dried Rosemary
Directions:
Saute onions and garlic until tender.
Stir in potatoes, seasoned salt, pepper and lemon rind.
Spoon half of mixture in lightly greased 1-1/2 qt.
baking dish.
Sprinkle half of the cheese.
Repeat with remaining potato mixture and cheese.
Stir together bread crumbs, butter and Rosemary.
Sprinkle over top. Bake covered at 400 degrees for 40 minutes.
Uncover and bake another 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes (about 2 lb.)
6 unpeeled garlic cloves
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. chopped fresh or 1/4 tsp. dried rosemary leaves
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 to 1/2 c. low-fat milk
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Scrub the potatoes; pierce with fork to allow steam to escape. Wrap garlic cloves in aluminum foil.
Bake potatoes and garlic 1 hour or until potatoes are soft.
Heat oil and rosemary over medium heat 2 to 3 minutes or until rosemary is fragrant.
Cut potatoes in half; carefully spoon potatoes into large bowl. Save skins for another use or discard.
Slip skins off cloves of garlic; discard skins.
Add garlic, oil mixture and salt to potatoes.
Mash until fluffy, adding milk until desired consistency.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Rosemary Potato Soup
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled
1 small onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, chopped
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
milk
2 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Cube and boil potatoes until tender.
Drain water.
Mash potatoes and add onion and butter.
Add rosemary and gradually pour in milk until desired thickness.
Stir together well and place on low heat.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 whole garlic heads
1 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
6 medium baking potatoes, peeled and cubed
1 cup plus 2 tablespoons milk
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crushed
1 tsp. salt
1-1/2 cubes of unsalted butter
1 pinch cayenne pepper (to taste)
1/2 tsp black pepper
1/4 tsp liquid smoke
Fresh squeezed juice of one lime
1 bunch fresh tarragon leaves, cleaned, stems removed
1/4 cup half and half, cream or cream fraiche
Directions:
Set corn out to thaw for at least 2 hours.
Melt butter under medium heat (do not brown) in large skillet or frying pan.
Add cayenne, black pepper and liquid smoke.
Add corn and grill on high heat until corn is sweet and slightly tender (it is important for the corn to taste young, not overcooked like cream corn).
Add lime juice, tarragon and cream.
Stir for an additional 2 minutes.
Turn off heat and serve.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
4 pkg. Ramen noodles (chicken flavor)
1 onion, chopped
1 carrot, grated
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
black olives, sliced (optional)
other veggies (optional)
Directions:
Cook noodles.
Drain.
Run cold water until noodles are cool. Add seasoning packages and mix well.
Add onion, carrot, olives and other veggies.
Mix well.
Spoon noodle mixture into rectangular serving dish.
Spread mayonnaise on top; just enough to coat.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
2 pkg. Ramen noodles (chicken)
1 c. sunflower hearts, roasted
1 c. almonds (slivered)
4 c. cabbage, shredded
1/2 c. celery (fine)
3/4 c. carrots, sliced thin
1 small onion, diced
Directions:
Combine the ingredients.
Crush Ramen noodles (do not cook). Mix all.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
1 head shredded cabbage
1 bell pepper (red or green), chopped
8 small green onions, chopped
1 pkg. slivered almonds, sauteed in 1 Tbsp. butter, then cooled
Directions:
Mix together in large bowl.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Stew
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) bag cole slaw
1 pkg. Ramen noodles (chicken flavored)
1/2 c. slivered almonds, toasted
1/2 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. Accent
seasoning packet (from noodles)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients together, then mix next 7 ingredients together and pour over slaw mixture.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. Ramen noodles (Oriental flavor)
2 Tbsp. green onion, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/2 head cabbage, chopped
1 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Break noodles in small pieces. Mix with cabbage and onion. Combine salt, pepper, oil, sugar, vinegar and flavor package. Pour mixture over noodles and cabbage. Stir and refrigerate overnight.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
8 lb. meat (stew or chuck), cut into 1-1/2-inch cubes
Flour
Butter
Olive Oil
Salt and pepper
3 oz. warm Brandy
3/4 lb. bacon
4 cloves garlic
3 carrots, diced
3 leeks, diced
6 onions, finely chopped
3 Bay leaves
1-1/2 tsp. thyme
2 bottles Burgundy
Water to cover
2 lb. small boiling onions
3 cans small carrots
3 lb. mushrooms
Directions:
Cut meat and roll in flour.
Brown on all sides in half butter and olive oil.
Add salt and pepper.
Pour in 3 ounces warm Brandy and light.
Put in casserole dish.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 lb. lean stew beef, cut in 1-inch cubes
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. flour
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. red wine (boil 5 minutes before using)
1 can beef bouillon
2 tsp. tomato paste
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Brown beef and onion in oil. Sprinkle with flour and brown. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms. Cover and simmer slowly for 2 1/2 hours. Add mushrooms in last 15 minutes. Serve over plain or wild rice.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
2 lb. lean beef chuck round, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes
2 Tbsp. butter or fat
2 Tbsp. sherry (heated optional)
24 small white onions
12 large mushrooms, quartered
1 tsp. tomato paste
1 tsp. browning gravy (gravy starter)
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. beef consomme
1 c. red wine
salt and pepper to taste
bouquet garni (1 small bay leaf, 2 sprigs thyme, marjoram and 2 Tbsp. parsley)
Directions:
Brown meat fast in hot fat in heavy skillet.
Pour sherry over and transfer to medium casserole.
Salt lightly.
In remaining fat, saute onions and mushrooms lightly; stir in tomato paste, meat glaze and flour.
Add slowly, consomme and 1/4 cup wine.
Stir until boils.
Season to taste and pour over beef in casserole.
Add bouquet garni.
Cover and cook in slow oven (250°) about 3 hours until meat is tender and cuts with a fork.
Add remaining wine at intervals.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
1/4 c. shortening
3 lb. lean beef, cut into cubes
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. canned beef broth, undiluted
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 c. dry red wine
12 small white pearl onions
Directions:
In large skillet saute beef cubes until brown, stir in flour, salt, pepper and thyme, scraping skillet well.
Turn all into 2-quart casserole.
Pour on beef broth and wine.
Cover casserole and bake two hours at 350°.
Add onions and mushrooms.
If too dry, add equal parts broth and wine.
Continue baking until meat is fork-tender.
Remove from oven and skim excess fat from gravy. Serve from casserole with hot mashed potatoes, rice or cooked egg noodles.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Never-Fail Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
3 lb. lean beef, cubed
2 medium onions, sliced
2 Tbsp. flour
6 Tbsp. butter
4 bay leaves
1 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
2 cloves garlic, crushed
20 small onions, peeled
3 to 4 (12 oz.) bottles red cooking wine
1 tsp. thyme
salt and pepper
1 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Roll beef cubes in flour.
Brown beef, sliced onions and garlic in butter.
Transfer all to a large Dutch oven.
Add bay leaves, thyme, parsley, salt and pepper.
Pour enough wine over meat to cover.
Simmer 2 1/2 hours.
Add whole onions and cook to tender.
Add mushrooms the last 15 minutes.
If sauce needs thickening, add flour and water to mixture.
Serve over rice or noodles.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Rotisserie Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (4 1/2 to 5 1/2 lb.) grilled or roasted chicken
1 3/4 tsp. dried rosemary
2 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Prepare chicken by loosening the breast skin from the meat. Place 3/4 teaspoon rosemary and 1 tablespoon of butter on each side of the breast under the skin.
Take the remaining 1/2 teaspoon of rosemary and place inside the cavity.
Truss the bird. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to your taste.
Rotisserie for 2 hours, or until meat pulls from the bones easily.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Don'S Rotisserie Chicken
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
1 small green pepper, chunked
salt and pepper
1 small onion, quartered
3 or 4 Tbsp. margarine
3 strips bacon
Directions:
Put green pepper, salt, pepper, margarine and onion inside chicken.
Lay bacon over breast area and tie chicken well.
Put on spit and rub a little margarine over chicken.
Put on rotisserie and cook on medium or low until well done.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Hunter-Style Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
4 chicken breasts, split lengthwise, skinned and boned (2 lb. boneless)
1 c. sliced onions
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. dry white wine
1 c. chicken broth
1 c. diced tomatoes
1/4 c. snipped parsley
hot cooked rice or noodles
Directions:
In a large skillet, heat together butter and oil.
Cook chicken pieces over medium heat about 25 minutes, turning to brown.
Remove chicken to a 12 x 7 1/2 x 2-inch baking dish and keep warm.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Rotisseri Kumbak Sauce
Ingredients:
2 garlic cloves, chopped fine
1 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. chili sauce
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. black pepper
dash of paprika and red pepper
juice of grated onion
2 Tbsp. grated onion
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a quart jar and shake. Keep in the refrigerator. Delicious salad dressing. Very good for boiled shrimp.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rotel
Ingredients:
2 c. Cheddar cheese
6 chicken breasts or equivalent
1 onion (1 c.)
1/4 c. bell pepper
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes and green chilies
1 pkg. large Doritos
chicken broth
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
salt and pepper
Directions:
Boil chicken and debone.
Save about 1 pint of broth (skimmed). Saute onion and bell pepper in 1 tablespoon butter for 3 to 5 minutes in a large skillet or heavy pan.
Add soups, Ro-Tel and enough of the broth to make a medium sauce.
Add the chicken and seasonings (salt, pepper and garlic).
Boil 2 minutes.
Crumble enough Doritos to cover the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan about 1/2-inch thick.
Pour chicken mixture over the Doritos and sprinkle cheese on top.
Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes, until cheese is melted and mixture is bubbling.
Good with Mexican potatoes and beans.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Best Breakfast Smoothie
Ingredients:
1 orange, peeled and torn into fourths
1 medium banana
1/2 c. chunked pineapple (fresh or frozen)
1/2 c. berries (raspberries, strawberries, blueberries or a combination)
1 heaping Tbsp. soy powder
3/4 c. milk (either soy or 1% coconut or combination)
Directions:
Put all ingredients into a Vita Mix machine (or a good blender, but it's not quite the same). Turn on slow, then increase to high speed and blend for 1/2 minute or longer until it's smooth. Serves 2 to 4 people, depending on how much each person wants.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Fruit Smoothie
Ingredients:
1 c. fresh or frozen fruit (bananas, pineapple, plums, strawberries, peaches, pears, berries, etc.)
milk, water or juice
1/2 c. plain or flavored yogurt
1 Tbsp. honey (optional)
Directions:
Blend 1 cup fruit and yogurt with enough milk, water or juice to make a milkshake consistency.
Drink and enjoy!

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Fruit And Veggie Smoothie
Ingredients:
2 bananas
handful berries
2 c. water
2 c. apple juice
1/2 c. yogurt
5-6 leaves of spinach or other greens, or handful of sprouts
3 Tbsp. raw oats
Directions:
Mix all in blender until creamy.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Green Salad
Ingredients:
1 envelope gelatine
1/2 c. cold water
1/2 c. hot water
1/4 c. mild vinegar
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. blanched almonds or nuts
1/2 c. stuffed olives, sliced
1/2 c. canned pineapple, sliced
1/2 c. small sweet cucumber pickles, sliced
1/4 tsp. salt
green coloring (as desired)
Directions:
Pour cold water in bowl.
Sprinkle gelatine on top of water. Add sugar, salt and hot water and stir until dissolved.
Add vinegar and green coloring; cool.
When mixture begins to stiffen, add remaining ingredients. Pickles should be sliced thin, almonds chopped or cut in small pieces and pineapple cut in small pieces. Use molds that have been rinsed in cold water.
Serve on lettuce with mayonnaise.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Orange Freeze Smoothie
Ingredients:
2 medium oranges
1/2 c. strawberries
1/2 banana
Directions:
Wash strawberries; remove and discard greens.
Peel banana. Freeze strawberries and banana.
Juice oranges; blend orange juice with frozen fruits on medium speed for 1 minute.
Serve.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. uncooked whole wheat shells or spirals (1 1/2 c. cooked)
1/2 c. plain nonfat yogurt
1 1/2 tsp. honey
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. balsamic vinegar
1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1/4 tsp. paprika
pinch of white pepper (optional)
1 (6 1/2 oz.) can light tuna (packed in water), drained and flaked
1/3 c. frozen peas, do not thaw
1/3 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped red pepper
2 Tbsp. chopped green onion
Directions:
Cook pasta in boiling water 10 to 12 minutes to taste.
Drain and rinse with cold water.
In a large bowl, combine yogurt, honey, lemon juice, vinegar, dill, celery seed, paprika and white pepper.
Stir in pasta, tuna, peas, celery and red pepper.
Mix gently, but thoroughly, until evenly coated with dressing. Sprinkle green onion on top.
Serve at room temperature.
If salad needs to be held for more than 2 hours, cover and refrigerate.
If chilled, let sit at room temperature a minimum of 15 minutes before serving.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
4 slices sweet onion (thin)
4 slices red onion (thin)
1/2 lb. tuna, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 small tomatoes, sliced
1/4 c. black olives, sliced
2 Tbsp. basil (fresh), minced
2 tsp. garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 lb. linguine
2 Tbsp. capers, drained
Italian parsley sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Add onions and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Add tuna, tomatoes, olives, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; cook until fish is opaque, stirring often, about 9 minutes.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta-Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
8 oz. (2 c.) macaroni shells, cooked and drained
2 cans (6 1/2 oz.) tuna, drained and chunked
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. milk
3 c. loosely packed parsley (1 bunch), thick stems removed
2/3 c. coarsely chopped green onions
Directions:
In greased 2-quart baking dish toss shells, tuna and celery. In blender mix mayonnaise, milk, parsley and green onions until smooth.
Pour over tuna mixture; toss to coat.
Bake in preheated 400° oven 15 minutes or until bubbly.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta-Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
4 c. vegetable pasta (spiral)
2 cans white tuna (6 oz. each), drained
4 Tbsp. light mayonnaise
2 c. mixed vegetables
2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. olive oil or butter
1 1/2 Tbsp. oregano
1/2 c. sliced black olives or green (optional)
Directions:
Put the pasta in boiling water for 13 to 15 minutes; drain and set aside.
Put the oil (or butter) in a pan with the mixed vegetables over low heat.
Cover and let it simmer for 15 minutes (after 3 minutes add 3 tablespoons water and cover again).
In a salad bowl, mix mayonnaise, salt and oregano with the tuna.
Add the cooked pasta and vegetables.
Sprinkle the sliced olives on top (if desired).

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Garden Tuna Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can (12 1/2 oz.) tuna, drained and flaked
1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen green beans, thawed
8 oz. elbow macaroni, cooked, rinsed and drained
1 c. cherry tomatoes, quartered
1/2 c. thinly sliced red onion
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives (optional)
Directions:
In a large bowl combine the first 6 ingredients.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cover; chill.
Makes 8 cups.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. Mozzarella cheese, sliced
1 egg, lightly beaten
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 c. cracker crumbs
1 garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. olive oil
2 c. canned tomato sauce
2 Tbsp. minced parsley
1/4 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. oregano
1 bay leaf, crumbled
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Pare eggplant and cut crosswise 1/4-inch slices.
Beat egg with wine.
Dip eggplant in that and then in cracker crumbs.
Saute garlic 5 minutes.
Add eggplant and saute 10 minutes or until golden brown.
Remove eggplant and keep hot.
Add tomato sauce, parsley, basil, oregano, bay leaf and salt to oil remaining in skillet and simmer 15 minutes.
Stirring frequently.
Arrange alternating layers of eggplant, Parmesan and Mozzarella cheese and sauce in casserole.
Top with Mozzarella.
Bake in 350° oven for 30 minutes.
Serve.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sliced onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. can stewed tomatoes (2 c.)
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. basil
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute onion and garlic until yellow.
Add tomatoes and seasonings.
With 2 knives, cut up and blend ingredients.
Simmer sauce, uncovered, about 20 minutes until slightly thick.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. garlic, minced
4 c. tomatoes
1 Tbsp. basil
1 (6 oz.) tomato paste
1 Tbsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Cook onion in oil. Add remainder and cook 1 hour. Take out bay leaf.
For a smoother sauce, puree.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 medium size eggplant
1 c. bread crumbs
2/3 c. oil
1 medium can tomato sauce
2 c. Mozzarella cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. oregano
2 cloves garlic, minced
Directions:
Slice eggplant.
Dip in beaten egg, then in bread crumbs.
Fry in oil.
Take eggplant slices out when brown and put a layer in a baking dish.
Top with sauce that has been mixed with garlic, oregano, thyme and sugar. Add cheese and continue eggplant layer, sauce and cheese until finished.
Top with Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 350° for about 30 minutes until cheese browns.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
2 eggs, beaten
1 to 2 c. bread crumbs (plain or seasoned)
3/4 c. olive or salad oil
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. oregano (optional)
1 1/2 c. tomato sauce
1 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Cut eggplant into slices (not too thick).
Dip each slice, first in egg, then into crumbs.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
3 c. chopped canned tomatoes with juice
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, grated
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed to drain
1 c. cooked kidney beans
6 uncooked lasagna noodles, broken into thirds
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
In a quart-size glass measuring cup or bowl, place oil, onions and garlic.
Cook, uncovered, at Medium power (50%) for 1 minute. Add tomatoes, oregano and basil and cook, uncovered, at High power (100%) for 10 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese, cottage cheese, spinach and beans.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1 c. chopped green pepper
2 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
2 tsp. salt
salt and pepper
1 lb. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 (1 lb. 13 oz.) can tomato puree
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 c. freshly chopped tomatoes
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. Ricotta cheese
2 beaten eggs
1/2 lb. raw chopped spinach
dash of nutmeg
2 Tbsp. wheat germ
lasagna noodles
Directions:
In olive oil saute onion, garlic, green pepper, basil, oregano, bay leaves and salt.
When onions are soft, add tomato puree, tomato paste, chopped tomatoes and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add mushrooms, parsley, salt and pepper.
Mix Ricotta cheese, eggs, salt, pepper, spinach, nutmeg and wheat germ to make the filling.
You don't have to cook the noodles.
Spread a little of the sauce in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Place a layer of noodles next and then 1/2 of the filling.
Next add in a layer 1/2 of the rest of the sauce.
Layer the remaining ingredients in this order:
1/2 of the Mozzarella cheese, noodles, remaining filling, a little sauce, the rest of the Mozzarella cheese, another layer of noodles and the last bit of sauce. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
6 lasagna noodles (4 oz.)
2 qt. water
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. (1/8-inch) bias-cut carrots (about 4 medium)
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 3/4 c. spaghetti sauce (one 15 oz. jar)
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 eggs
2 c. low-fat cottage cheese (about 16 oz.)
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 (10 oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. quartered and sliced zucchini
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (4 oz.)
Directions:
Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water about 12 minutes. Drain, rinse and cover with cold water.
Heat vegetable oil in saucepan.
Add onion, carrots and garlic.
Saute until carrots are tender, about 10 minutes.
Add spaghetti sauce, water and spices. Bring to a simmer.
Beat eggs and blend in cottage cheese, Parmesan cheese and vegetables.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna(Makes 8 Servings)
Ingredients:
8 oz. lasagna noodles, cooked tender
2 medium onions, chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce, canned tomatoes or thinned paste
2 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. dried basil
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 lb. sliced mushrooms, sauteed in olive oil
3/4 c. dry, small, red beans, cooked tender
3/4 lb. Mozzarella cheese (low-fat), thinly sliced
2 c. Ricotta cheese (low-fat)
1/2 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Rinse the cooked noodles in cold water.
Set them aside. Saute the onions and garlic in the olive oil until soft and transparent, but not browned.
Stir in the tomato, oregano, basil, parsley and salt.
Cook sauce about 1/2 hour, simmering it and stirring often until it has thickened.
Stir in the sauteed mushrooms and cooked beans.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lasagna noodles, cooked according to pkg. directions
1 medium onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. fresh parsley, minced
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 lb. fresh spinach
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 egg
3/4 c. Romano, grated
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 lb. Mozzarella, grated
Directions:
Cook noodles and drain.
In large skillet, saute onion, garlic and pepper in oil until golden, 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste, tomatoes, parsley, oregano, bay leaf and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Simmer, uncovered, for 20 minutes.
In medium size bowl, combine spinach, Ricotta, egg, 1/4 cup Romano, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper. Spoon 1/3 tomato sauce in bottom of 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Cover with layer of lasagna, half of the spinach and cheese filling, half of the Mozzarella and 1/4 cup Romano.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining sauce and Romano.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1 egg, well beaten
1 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/2 c. finely chopped onions
2 tsp. mustard
6 medium potatoes, cooked, drained and mashed
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. milk
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Mash potatoes with salt, milk and butter.
Combine tomato juice, salt, peppers, egg, bread crumbs, onions and mustard.
Add ground beef or turkey and mix well.
Put mixture into a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Press in well.
Bake at 400° for 35 minutes.
Drain off grease.
Cover with mashed potatoes.
Bake additional 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherds Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 tsp. vegetable oil
1 large onion, chopped
1 small red pepper, finely chopped
1 garlic clove, crushed
1 lb. lean ground lamb
1 1/4 cup chicken stock or beef stock
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce
1 1/4 cup mushrooms, sliced
Directions:
Heat oil in pan. Add the onion, red pepper and garlic. Saute until softened. Add the meat and saute
until browned. If desired, transfer the cooked mixture to a food processor and chop for a few seconds on the pulse setting. Transfer the meat
to a saucepan and add the stock, parsley, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce. Add mushrooms. Cook over medium heat for about 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
8 slices day-old bread
2 c. diced chicken
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2/3 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. mayo
1 1/2 c. milk
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cut and cube 4 bread slices in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Mix chicken, pepper, celery, mayo, onion, salt and pepper and spread over bread cubes.
Lay other bread cubes or slices on top.
Beat egg and milk together and pour over mixture.
Chill overnight in fridge.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium clove garlic
1 medium onion, chopped
3 c. (about) diced leftover cooked beef, trimmed of fat
1/4 c. tomato sauce
1/4 c. beef bouillon
1/4 c. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. ground oregano
salt and pepper to taste
3 to 4 c. mashed potatoes, seasoned to taste with salt and pepper
grated Parmesan cheese
butter or margarine
Directions:
Heat oil; add onion and garlic.
Saute over moderately low heat until onion is transparent.
Add beef, tomato sauce, bouillon parsley, oregano , salt and pepper.
Mix well.
Cook mixture over moderately low heat until heated through.
Put meat mixture in greased 2-quart casserole.
Spoon potatoes evenly on top. Sprinkle potatoes with Parmesan cheese and dot them generously with butter.
Bake, uncovered, in oven preheated to 375° just until dish is heated through and potatoes are tinged with brown. Yields approximately 6 servings.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat
1 onion, finely chopped
1 large carrot, finely chopped
1 beef stock cube
1/2 tsp. mixed herbs
seasoning to taste
2 sticks celery, finely chopped
2 green onions (shallots), chopped
1 1/2 lb. potatoes, cooked and drained
1 oz. butter or margarine
1/4 c. milk
1 egg
Directions:
Heat oil in a large pan and saut meat, onions and carrot over a high heat until golden brown.
Add crumbled stock cube, mixed herbs, seasoning, celery and green onions (shallots).
Simmer for 5 minutes.
Spoon into greased ovenproof casserole.
Mash potatoes with butter and milk and spoon onto meat.
Brush with lightly beaten egg and bake at 400° for 30 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Plus
Ingredients:
5 large eggs, hard-boiled
1 onion slice, chopped
2 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 large dill pickle, diced or sweet pickle relish
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. salt
1 tsp. mustard
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Coarsely chop the 5 eggs and put into a medium size bowl.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well.
The mayonnaise can be increased up to 3 1/2 tablespoons if a thinner egg salad is preferred.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad
Ingredients:
8 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped bell pepper
1/4 c. chopped celery
2 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
1 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese, softened
1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 Tbsp. bottled chili sauce (Heinz)
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Blend together cream cheese, mayonnaise, chili sauce, salt and pepper.
Add to egg mixture. Mix well.
Makes 4 cups.
Serve as sandwich filling or mound on lettuce cups for luncheon salad.
Delicious!

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 eggs, hard-boiled
3 Tbsp. chopped stuffed olives
1/4 c. mayonnaise
1/3 c. chopped celery
1/8 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients.
Mix well and chill until serving time.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad
Ingredients:
3 to 4 eggs
salt
water
pepper
onions
Directions:
Boil eggs in salt water.
After boiled, add a little salt and pepper.
Add onions.
Mix good.
Eat with bread or eat plain.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 eggs, hard-boiled
salt and pepper
mayonnaise
1 to 2 scallions
Directions:
Slice eggs in half.
Smash egg yolks until smooth and spreadable.
Add remaining ingredients.
Re-fill egg whites.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Poultry Main Dishes
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Italian-seasoned fine dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
6 whole large chicken breasts, skinned, split lengthwise and boned
1/2 c. sliced green onion
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 c. milk
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
1 (4 oz.) pkg. boiled ham slices, diced
boneless chicken breast
8 oz. sour cream
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 soup can sherry
1 jar sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Place chicken breast in bottom of casserole dish.
Mix soup, sour cream and sherry.
Pour over chicken.
Spread mushrooms on top.
Cook, covered, in 325° oven for 45 minutes.
Uncover and cook for 15 minutes at 350°.
Serve with egg noodles.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Chicken, Farmer Style(Pollo Contadino, Italian)
Ingredients:
4 large chicken breasts, boneless and skinless
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. olive oil
2 medium carrots, peeled and diced
1 large red bell pepper, cored and julienned
1 large green bell pepper, cored and julienned
1 large yellow onion, peeled and julienned
6 large mushrooms, sliced
12 medium black olives, pitted
1 tsp. capers
6 ripe plum tomatoes, chopped
1 tsp. fresh rosemary
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Season the chicken lightly with salt and pepper.
Place the chicken in a large bowl and add the flour.
Toss together and pat off excess flour.
Heat a large frying pan and add half the olive oil.
Brown the chicken on both sides and remove to a roasting pan, leaving the oil in the frying pan.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Chicken Feed
Ingredients:
1 small onion, sliced
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, divided
1 Tbsp. margarine
4 c. cubed leftover chicken or turkey
4 c. leftover gravy
1 chicken bouillon cube, crushed
dash of pepper
3 c. mashed potatoes
Directions:
In skillet, saute onion, mushrooms, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon thyme in the margarine.
Stir in the chicken, gravy, bouillon and pepper; spoon into a greased casserole and remaining thyme.
Spoon over mixture.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes.
Yield:
6 to 8 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: A Meal In Minutes
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef
3/4 c. Minute rice
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
1 c. diced celery
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 onion, diced
1 c. tomato juice
1 small can mushrooms
Directions:
Brown meat and add remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook in electric skillet for 20 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick Dinner Rolls
Ingredients:
3/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. dry milk
2 1/4 to 3 c. flour
1 egg
1/4 c. shortening or oleo
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water in a mixing bowl.
Add sugar and salt; stir.
Then add dry milk and half of the flour.
Beat 2 minutes. Add egg and shortening.
Then mix in, gradually, remaining flour until consistency of dough.
Place in a greased bowl until it is doubled in bulk.
Heat oven to 425°.
Bake 10 minutes.
Makes 1 dozen.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick Dinner Fix
Ingredients:
1 can Veg-All, drained
1 can corn soup
1/2 can tomato soup or 1/2 can mushroom soup
1 lb. ground chuck, browned and drained
1/2 onion
2 c. shredded cheese of choice
1 can biscuits
Directions:
Brown ground beef and onion, then drain.
Mix Veg-All, corn soup, mushroom soup or tomato soup, beef and onion all together. Combine in round cake pan.
Cover with cheese, then cut biscuits into fourths and put on top.
Bake in a 300° oven for 30 to 45 minutes, or until golden brown.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick Dinner Rolls("A Favorite From The '76 Cookbook.")
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
2 Tbsp. shortening
2 1/4 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast, sugar and salt in water.
Beat well.
Add egg, flour and shortening.
Let rise until doubled in bulk.
Stir down raised dough.
Spoon into 12 greased muffin tins.
Let rise again. Bake 15 to 20 more minutes in 400° oven.
(Raisins may be added, plus 2 more tablespoons sugar.)

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick Supper Casserole
Ingredients:
5 pork chops or 5 chicken breasts
2 c. instant rice
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
1 pkg. frozen mixed vegetables or canned
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray a large baking dish with Pam.
Place pork chops or chicken in pan.
Cover with mushroom soup.
Cook at 325° for about 25 minutes.
Prepare instant rice.
Remove meat from oven and add rice and frozen vegetables (that have been cooked in water and drained).
Return to oven for about 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with salad and bread.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 eggs, separated
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
5 Tbsp. cold water
pinch of salt
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and lemon-colored.
Melt the chocolate with the water in a baking dish in a 350° oven for a few minutes.
Do not stir until chocolate is creamy.
Add egg yolks and sugar while chocolate is still warm.
Beat egg whites with pinch of salt until stiff.
Fold chocolate mixture into egg whites until there are no streaks.
Whip cream and add vanilla. Fold into chocolate mixture.
Spoon into serving bowl or individual cups.
Chill for 4 hours.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
5 (1 oz. each) sq. semi-sweet chocolate
2 (1 oz. each) sq. unsweetened chocolate
3 Tbsp. strong coffee
6 eggs
3 egg yolks
1 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. light rum
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/4 c. water
2 c. heavy or whipping cream
Directions:
In small saucepan, combine chocolates and coffee.
Heat over low heat until chocolates are melted.
Cool.
In a large mixer bowl, beat eggs and yolks on high speed 10 minutes.
Add sugar and beat until shiny, 5 minutes.
Add melted chocolates, rum and vanilla.
Beat just until thoroughly blended.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 large egg yolks
3 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sugar
2 oz. semisweet chocolate
4 oz. milk chocolate
Directions:
Beat egg yolks in small bowl with electric mixer on high speed until thick and lemon colored, about 3 minutes. Gradually add sugar and beat on high speed. Heat 1 cup whipping cream in 2-qt. saucepan over medium heat just until hot (do not boil). Gradually stir half of the hot cream into egg yolk mixture; stir back into hot cream in saucepan. Cook over low heat about 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens (do not boil). Let cool for about 10 minutes. Add chocolate to egg yolk mixture and stir until mixture thickens and chocolate is well blended, about 5 minutes. Cover and refrigerate for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally, just until chilled. Beat 1 1/2 c. whipping cream in chilled medium bowl with electric mixer on high speed until stiff. Mix 3/4 c. of whipped cream into chocolate mixture until blended. Fold remaining whipped cream gradually into chocolate mixture until well blended. Pipe or spoon mixture into cups or small dessert bowls. Refrigerate any remaining dessert.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 pkg. semi-sweet chocolate pieces
1 Tbsp. flour
3 eggs, separated
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. vanilla or rum
1 Tbsp. grated orange rind
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour and egg yolks; stir in milk; heav over low heat, stirring with whisk until mixture reaches consistency of mustard sauce.
Add butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat.
Add chocolate; stir until melted. Stir in vanilla or rum, and orange rind.
Cool slightly.
Add stiffly beaten egg whites and 1 cup of the cream, whipped stiff. Pour into sherbert dishes.
Chill about 5 hours, until firm.
Whip remaining cream as topping.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
8 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
4 Tbsp. water
1/2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
4 egg yolks
4 egg whites
Directions:
Melt the chocolate and water together in a small pan.
Stir in the vanilla flavoring and butter, then the egg yolks, 1 at a time. Beat the egg whites until stiff.
Fold the chocolate mixture into the egg whites, using a rubber spatula or a metal spoon.
When thoroughly mixed, pour into a glass bowl.
Cover and chill overnight.
Serve with whipped cream on top.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa Recipe
Ingredients:
about 6 to 8 finely chopped tomatoes (Roma tomatoes work best)
1 large finely chopped onion
green and red onions (if you have them)
1 jalapeno, minced (1/2 jalapeno with seeds removed if you prefer it mild)
1 garlic clove, minced
1/3 c. finely chopped fresh cilantro
juice squeezed from 1 to 2 limes
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix everything together and use with Tostitos chips or garnish on your favorite Mexican dish.
It's also very delicious on white chili.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
1 large onion, chopped
1 large green bell pepper, chopped
3 jalapeno chiles to taste (fresh or canned)
1 large can stewed tomatoes
5 cloves minced garlic
1 medium bunch cilantro (Chinese parsley), chopped
2 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. oregano
2 cans tomato paste
juice from 1 lime
1 Tbsp. vinegar
water (as needed combined with jalapeno juice, if any)
salt
pepper
Tabasco
Directions:
Chop all ingredients and mix in herbs in a large bowl.
Add water, stewed tomatoes, tomato paste, lime juice, vinegar and jalapeno juice (if any) until desired consistency is achieved. Taste and adjust seasonings (salt, pepper and Tabasco) to taste. Let sit 24 hours in plastic or glass container with lid.
Keep refrigerated.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa
Ingredients:
2 large cans whole tomatoes
1 bunch green onions
2 or more jalapenos
juice of 1 lemon
juice of 1 lime
handful of fresh cilantro
3 Tbsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. Accent
1 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp. garlic powder
Directions:
In a food processor, process onions, jalapenos, lemon juice, lime juice and cilantro.
Add drained tomatoes and pulse.
Add seasonings; mix by hand.
A good gift idea.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
4 c. tomatoes
3 c. peppers (2 sweet and 1 hot)
1 c. onion
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. vinegar
3 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Mix all together.
Boil to desired thickness.
Put in jars. Seal.
Pressure or cold pack for 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa
Ingredients:
12 large tomatoes, diced
2 large onions, diced
6 green peppers, chopped
6 to 8 jalapenos, chopped
2 to 4 hot peppers, chopped
2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. vinegar
6 to 8 cloves garlic, diced
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. chili pepper
Directions:
Clean your vegetables and chop up. Bring all ingredients to a boil in saucepot.
Reduce to medium heat for 10 minutes.
In a water bath kettle, process for 30 minutes.
Take out to cool.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Corn Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. black beans (drained)
16 oz. (1 can) corn (drained)
1 lime, juiced
5 Tbsp. vegetable or olive oil
1/4 c. red onion, minced
1/4 c. scallions, minced
1/8 c. parsley or cilantro, minced
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
salt (to taste)
pepper (to taste)
1/2 c. tomatoes, chopped
Directions:
Mix together all ingredients, except tomatoes.
Cover and chill.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Corn And Black Bean Salad
Ingredients:
1 can black pinto or kidney beans
1 (8 oz.) can corn
1 c. chopped green or red pepper
1 onion, chopped
1/4 c. cider vinegar
2 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
Drain and rinse beans.
Drain corn.
Mix together with pepper and onion in a refrigerator bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients with wire whisk; pour over veggies and stir to coat.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Corn Salsa
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. frozen whole corn
1 c. canned black beans, rinsed
1 sweet red pepper, chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
1 clove garlic, pressed
2 Tbsp. lime juice
2 tsp. chopped fresh cilantro
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook corn and drain. Combine corn and remaining ingredients. Makes 4 cups.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. black beans (canned), rinsed and drained
1 small can niblets canned corn (fat regular can), drained
1 tsp. Italian herbs
1 tsp. salt
1 c. fresh tomatoes, chopped
1 c. diced avocado
1/3 c. thinly sliced green onions
1/3 c. finely chopped cilantro or parsley
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. cumin
Directions:
Mix dressing of oil, vinegar and spices.
Add black bean mixture (first 8 ingredients).
Correct for more herbs or cumin if needed. Chill.
Really delicious; you might want more vinegar too.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean Salad
Ingredients:
2 cans (15 oz.) black beans, drained and rinsed
1 (11 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1/2 c. green pepper strips
1/2 c. sliced red onion
2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro
2 Tbsp. lime juice
1 clove garlic, minced
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients; refrigerate.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon (fried then crumbled)
2 1/2 c. cauliflower
3/4 c. sour cream (low fat version works just as well)
1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 sm. yellow onion, finely chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook the cauliflower until firm, yet tender. Coarsely mash cauliflower with potato masher.
Add the sour cream, onion, cheese, salt and pepper.
Mix well.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Medley
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower
1 (10 oz.) pkg. Brussels sprouts
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen creamed onions
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 c. shredded Cheddar
1 (2 oz.) jar pimento
1/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
Directions:
Wash cauliflower.
Break into flowerets.
Cook covered in small amount of boiling salted water, about 10 minutes.
Cook Brussels sprouts and onions according to directions.
Combine all vegetables in lightly greased 9 x 13 dish.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Yummy Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower, separated
5 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. flour
2 c. milk
1 1/2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
3 large firm tomatoes
1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook cauliflowerets in 1-inch of boiling salted water for 5 minutes; drain.
Saute, in margarine, celery, green pepper and onion.
Blend in salt, pepper and flour.
Add milk and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Add cheese.
Stir until melted.
Remove from heat.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creole Cauliflower
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked chopped cauliflower
2 c. mashed cooked tomatoes
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. shredded cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan; add onion and green pepper and brown lightly.
Blend in flour, stirring, then add tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling point and cook three minutes, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and heat through. Place mixture in casserole, top with cheese and bake at 350° until cheese melts and is lightly browned.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Patties
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen cauliflower
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. flour
1 c. water
2 eggs
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cook cauliflower; drain and mash.
Add other ingredients; mix well.
Let stand about 1 hour before cooking.
Drop by tablespoons into hot oil and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Can be frozen and then reheated as you need them.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 c. bean sprouts
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 c. slantedly sliced carrots
1 c. slantedly sliced celery
1 small sliced onion
1 small sliced zucchini
1/2 small cabbage, shredded coarsely
3 or 4 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cooking wine
1 1/2 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 1/2 c. cold water
1/2 tsp. fresh ginger, minced
3 or 4 pieces garlic, minced
Directions:
In wok at high heat, sprayed well, add celery, carrots, onions and water chestnuts and stir-fry about 2 minutes, then add bean sprouts, cabbage and zucchini, stirring an additional 2 minutes or until cabbage begins to wilt.
Add spices, soy sauce and cooking wine to blend well.
Then dissolve water and cornstarch and then pour over vegetables.
Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens.
Serve over rice or noodles.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 c. bean sprouts
2 c. sliced celery
6 mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. carrots, sliced thin
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. oil
1/4 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. green peppers, sliced in strips
1/2 tsp. m.s.g. (optional)
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Mix salt, cornstarch, chicken broth, soy sauce and m.s.g.
Set aside.
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in wok.
Add carrots and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add mushrooms and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add remaining vegetables and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Add liquid mixture and stir-fry for another minute.
Remove from heat.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Medley Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1/2 cup orange juice, chicken stock or low-sodium chicken stock
