1 teaspoon cornstarch
2 teaspoons honey
2 teaspoons reduced-sodium soy sauce
2 teaspoons rice vinegar or white wine vinegar
1/4 teaspoon hot red pepper sauce
1 teaspoon each olive and dark sesame oil
4 small carrots, peeled and thinly sliced diagonally (2 cups)
1 large sweet red pepper (8 ounces), cut into strips 1/4 inch wide
1 medium-size yellow onion, halved and thinly sliced (2 cups)
4 ounces snow peas or sugar snap peas, trimmed
1 teaspoon toasted sesame seeds (optional)
Directions:
In a small bowl, stir together the orange juice and cornstarch until well blended. Add the honey, soy sauce, vinegar, and red pepper sauce, stirring to combine. In a large wok or 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat the olive oil and sesame oil over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking. Add the carrots, sweet red pepper, and onion and stir-fry for 8 minutes. Stir in the orange juice mixture and cook for 1 minute or until the sauce boils and thickens. Stir in the sesame seeds if desired. Serve with grilled poultry or beef and brown rice.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Alpine Breakfast Cereal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. whole oats (raw)
1 c. water
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. yogurt (plain)
6 apples with skins, shredded
1/4 c. honey
1/4 c. finely chopped nuts
Directions:
Soak oats overnight in water.
Mix with all other ingredients.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Apple And Oat Breakfast Mix
Ingredients:
2 c. quick cooking oatmeal
1 1/2 c. chopped, dried apples
2/3 c. chopped pecans
1/4 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
To dry apples:
Select any tart, firm-textured apple (Granny Smith, Jonathan or McIntosh).
Wash, peel, core and cut into 1/4 to 1/2-inch slices or rings.
Pretreat by dipping in ascorbic acid mixture.
Dry at 130° to 135° until pliable, preferably in a food dehydrator.
I use the oven; it works well.
I place fruit on a cookie sheet.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Apple-Oat Muffins("A Healthy Breakfast Start")
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. rolled oats
1 c. skim milk
1 c. low-fat yogurt
1/4 c. light corn syrup
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 large egg white or Egg Beater equivalent
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 1/4 c. finely chopped tart apples (Granny Smith)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Lightly oil or spray 12 muffin cups with nonstick cooking spray.
In a bowl, whisk together oats, milk, sugar, corn syrup, oil and egg white.
In another bowl, mix flours, baking powder, cinnamon, baking soda, salt and nutmeg. Stir apples into flour mixture until evenly distributed.
Stir milk mixture into flour mixture, just until moistened.
Spoon batter into muffin cups.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes or
until golden brown.
Makes 12 muffins.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. boiling water
1 c. quick oats
1 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. chopped dates
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Combine first 2 ingredients and set aside.
Sift together next 5 ingredients.
Cream shortening, eggs and brown sugar.
Add nuts and dates to creamed mixture.
Combine all ingredients and mix well by hand.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Hearty Oats 'N Wheat Loaves(Winning Recipe; A Wholesome Bread For Toast, Sandwich Or Dinner)
Ingredients:
2 to 2 1/2 c. Pillsbury's Best bread flour
1 c. rolled oats
2 tsp. salt
3 pkg. active dry yeast
1 3/4 c. water
1/2 c. corn syrup
1/2 c. margarine or butter
2 eggs (reserve 1 white)
2 c. Pillsbury's Best whole wheat flour
1 c. Pillsbury's Best medium rye flour
1 Tbsp. water
4 tsp. sesame seed
Directions:
Generously grease two 8 x 4-inch or 9 x 5-inch loaf pans. Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup; level off.
In a large bowl, combine 1 1/2 cups bread flour, oats, salt and yeast.
Blend well.
In medium saucepan, heat water, corn syrup and margarine until very warm (120° to 130°).
Add warm liquid and eggs to flour mixture.
Blend at low speed until moistened.
Beat 3 minutes at medium speed.
By hand, stir in whole wheat flour and rye flour to form a soft dough.
On floured surface, knead in up to 1 cup bread flour until dough is smooth and elastic, about 10 minutes.
Place dough in greased bowl.
Cover loosely with plastic wrap and cloth towel.
Let rise in warm place (80° to 85°) until light and doubled in size, about 1 hour.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Orange Salmon
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. fresh orange juice
finely grated zest of 1 orange
2 tsp. minced garlic
2 tsp. dried tarragon
salt and coarsely ground black pepper to taste
4 salmon fillets (about 8 oz. with skin on)
2 tsp. freshly snipped chives
Directions:
In a bowl or Ziploc bag, mix marinade. Combine the olive oil, orange juice, orange zest, garlic, tarragon, salt and pepper.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Delight
Ingredients:
1 c. light cream
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
3 chopped hard-boiled eggs
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
dash of cayenne pepper
1 1/4 c. canned salmon, flaked
4 slices buttered toast or patty shells
Directions:
Place top chafing pan in water jacket.
When heated, put in cream, eggs, butter, cayenne and parsley.
While it's steaming, add drained salmon.
Heat through well.
Do not let it boil. Serve on toast or patties.
A dash of sherry is optional.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Pacific Salmon With Roasted Garlic
Ingredients:
4 (6 oz.) salmon fillets
1 medium head garlic
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
1 fresh lemon
fresh rosemary, chopped
Directions:
Separate garlic into cloves and peel. Place in small ramekin and cover with olive oil. Wrap with foil. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Place garlic and 1 tablespoon of oil from baked garlic in food processor. Add butter and puree; season with salt and fresh ground pepper.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Braised Salmon With Roasted Almonds(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. whole roasted almonds
3 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil (plus more for drizzling)
1/4 c. minced onion
1/4 c. minced cilantro
2 large garlic cloves, minced
2 anchovy fillets, drained and mashed
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
salt and freshly ground pepper
4 (6 oz.) skinless salmon fillets
3/4 lb. linguine
Directions:
In a mini processor, finely grind the almonds. In a large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil. Stir in the almonds, the onion, cilantro, garlic, anchovies and cayenne and season with salt and pepper. Add the salmon to the skillet and spoon some of the almond mixture on top. Season the salmon with salt and pepper and drizzle with a little olive oil. Cover the salmon and cook over moderate heat for 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to moderately low and cook until the salmon is just opaque throughout, 8 to 10 minutes longer.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac 'N' Cheese
Ingredients:
1 can condensed Cheddar cheese soup
1/2 can milk
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. hot cooked elbow macaroni
2 tsp. margarine, melted
1 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
Directions:
In a 1-quart casserole, combine soup, milk, mustard and pepper.
Stir in macaroni.
In a cup, combine margarine and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle over casserole and bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Yield:
4 side dish servings.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. elbow macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar, grated
1/3 bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook
macaroni	as
directed
and drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly,
until	mixture thickens. Add seasonings and
cheese, stirring
until
cheese
melts. Add macaroni and transfer to a buttered 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle over macaroni. Bake in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese For 30 People
Ingredients:
1 lb. elbow macaroni
2 1/2 lb. New York State cheese
6 eggs
1 qt. milk
2 tsp. dry mustard
1 stick margarine
2 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Boil macaroni according to directions on package; drain. While hot add grated cheese, saving some to put on top.
Add margarine and eggs which have been beaten into the milk.
Mix dry mustard with a little of the milk.
Place all in a large greased casserole. Spread cheese and bread crumbs on top.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until golden.
Delicious for large picnics or parties.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac 'N Cheese
Ingredients:
1 bag shell noodles, cooked
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 pkg. Cheddar cheese
1/4 brick Velveeta cheese
1 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Place cooked noodles into deep baking dish; add mushroom soup and both cheeses.
Mix thoroughly.
Top with a thin layer of bread crumbs.
Bake at 375° until a layer of crust forms on top, about 30 to 35 minutes.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Mac & Cheese
Ingredients:
1 box elbow macaroni, (cooked & drained)
4 eggs
1 stick butter
3 c. mild shredded cheddar cheese
2 cans evaporated milk
salt & pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Make very soupy.
Cover with tin foil. Bake in 350 degree oven for 35-40 minutes.
If too much liquid, remove foil and bake until liquid is absorbed.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. dried basil
3/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
2 1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
Directions:
In a shallow bowl, combine the first 6 ingredients. Place melted butter in another. Dip chicken in butter and roll in crumbs. Place on a greased baking sheet and bake uncovered at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until juices run clear. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 tsp. sesame seed
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 c. water
1 lb. chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
cooking oil
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Roll chicken in batter.
Fry in hot cooking oil until golden brown.
Drain.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skinned, boned and cut into bite size
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 c. plain flour
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. milk
corn oil or peanut oil
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients, mixing well.
Dip chicken in milk and dredge in flour mixture.
Heat one inch of oil in electric skillet to 325°.
Add chicken and fry 5 minutes on each side.
Drain on paper towels.
Makes 2 dozen nuggets.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
2 whole chicken breasts, skinned and boned
1 1/2 c. fine dry bread crumbs
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil or oregano (optional)
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Cut chicken breasts into about 1 1/2-inch squares.
Combine dry ingredients in small bowl.
Dip chicken pieces in melted butter, then in crumb mixture.
Pat crumbs on to coat.
Place on greased baking sheet and bake at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned.
Makes about 36.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
3 boneless chicken breast, cut into 1-inch cubes
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
4 Tbsp. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
2 tsp. monosodium glutamate
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. basil
1/2 c. melted butter
dash of pepper
Directions:
Combine Parmesan cheese, Cheddar cheese, crumbs, monosodium glutamate, thyme, salt, basil and pepper.
Blend well.
Dip chicken pieces into melted butter.
Roll in crumb mixture. Arrange chicken in single layer in ovenware dish.
Cover with plastic wrap, poking several holes in the plastic wrap.
Cook chicken for 10 minutes.
Serve hot or cold.
May be garnished with parsley.
Total cooking time 10 minutes.
Recipe yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Hearty Vegetable Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lean ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 can (14 1/2 oz.) unsalted whole tomatoes undrained, cut into pieces
3/4 c. quick pearl barley or rice
5 1/2 c. water
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. sliced carrots
2 Beef Bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. crushed basil
1 bay leaf
1 pkg. (9 oz.) frozen mixed vegetables
Directions:
Brown meat in Dutch oven.
Add onion & garlic till onion is tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients except frozen vegetables.
Cover, bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Add frozen vegetables.
Cook for 10 minutes until vegetables are done.
Additional water may be added if it becomes too thick upon standing.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Beef Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/4 lb. ground meat
3 medium, chopped onions
3 medium, sliced potatoes
3 celery stalks, diced
3 medium carrots, diced
2 (16 oz.) cans whole tomatoes
16 oz. can whole corn
16 oz. can peas
16 oz. can French-cut string beans
2/3 c. pearl barley
6 c. water
3 Tbsp. beef bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. sweet basil
2 bay leaves
Directions:
Brown meat with onions.
In large pan, put in browned meat with onions, water, potatoes, celery, carrots, tomatoes, barley and spices.
Simmer 45 to 60 minutes.
Add corn, peas and string beans; simmer 10 more minutes.
Add all liquids from the cans of vegetables.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Hearty Vegetable Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
7 c. water
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes (undrained), cut into pieces
1/2 c. pearled barley
1/2 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. sliced carrots
4 beef bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. crushed basil leaves
1 bay leaf
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen green beans or 16 oz. can undrained
Directions:
In 4-quart saucepan, brown meat in oil.
Add onion and garlic and continue cooking until onion is tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients except green beans.
Cover, bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 50 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add green beans and continue cooking 10 minutes or until meat and barley are tender.
Additional water may be added if soup becomes too thick.
Makes twelve 1-cup servings.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef And Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean beef for stew
5 c. water
1/3 c. barley
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 to 5 medium carrots, sliced
1 c. celery, sliced
2 Tbsp. fat
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. instant beef bouillon
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1 bay leaf
1/2 lb. fresh green beans or 1 can
Directions:
Brown meat in fat.
Pour off drippings.
Add water, onion, barley, bouillon, thyme, marjoram, pepper and bay leaf.
Cover tightly and cook slowly for 1 1/2 hours.
Stir in carrots, celery and green beans (if canned, add at the end and heat).
Cook, covered, for 45 minutes or until all are cooked through.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef Barley Soup
Ingredients:
3 meaty beef soup bones (beef shanks or short ribs)
2 1/2 qt. water
1 medium onion, chopped
5 tsp. beef bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 bay leaves
1 1/2 c. chopped carrots
1 1/2 c. chopped celery
2 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed
1/2 c. medium pearl barley
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/4 tsp. dill weed
Directions:
In a Dutch oven or soup kettle, place soup bones, water, onion, bouillon, vinegar, salt, pepper and bay leaves.
Slowly bring to boil; skim foam with slotted spoon.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 3 to 4 hours.
Discard bay leaves.
Set bones aside to cool; remove meat from bones and dice.
Skim fat from the broth surface. Add meat, carrots, celery, potatoes, barley, thyme and dill.
Cover and cook for 1 hour or until barley and vegetables are tender. Serves 9.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. large fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 c. butter, melted
1/4 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
3/4 tsp. dried whole basil
1/2 tsp. dried whole oregano
Directions:
Place shrimp in a single layer in a 15 x 10 x 1-inch jelly roll pan.
Set aside.
Combine next 8 ingredients.
Pour over shrimp.
Bake at 450° for 5 minutes or until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
1 lb. raw shrimp with shells
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter/margarine
1/4 tsp. garlic powder or 2 cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. fresh or 1 Tbsp. dried parsley
2 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional)
2 c. instant rice
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. seafood seasoning
Directions:
Combine water, parsley, pepper and seasoning in covered saucepan.
Bring to a boil.
Combine oil, butter, garlic and parsley in 10-inch skillet and bring to frying temperature.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2-1/2 lb. shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 c. butter (not margarine), melted
1/4 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
3/4 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
Pour butter, oil and spice mixture over shrimp. Bake at 450° for 5 minutes. Broil 5 minutes until shrimp are white.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp (raw)
2 cloves garlic, crushed
3 Tbsp. wine
oregano (dash)
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. parsley
6 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. olive oil
linguine or rice
Directions:
Whisk together all ingredients except shrimp.
Pour mixture over shrimp; cover and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours.
Place shrimp and liquid in shallow pan and bake at 500° until shrimp are pink. Do not overbake, this does not take very long to cook.
Serve over linguine or rice.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter
3 to 6 cloves garlic, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 lb. shrimp, shelled
Directions:
In shallow baking dish, combine all ingredients except shrimp. Microwave, uncovered, at High level for 4 to 5 minutes or until hot, stirring twice.
Stir shrimp into butter sauce.
Cover. Microwave at High for 5 to 7 1/2 minutes or until shrimp curl and turn pink.
Let stand, covered, 3 to 5 minutes before serving. Yield:
4 servings.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, diced
1 clove garlic, diced
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 bay leaf
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 (16 oz.) container Ricotta cheese
2 eggs, beaten
Parmesan cheese
Romano cheese
Mozzarella cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown meat with onion and garlic; drain fat.
Add salt, oregano, marjoram, pepper, bay leaf, tomato paste, water and Worcestershire sauce.
Simmer at least 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. whole basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. can tomatoes
1 (12 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
8 oz. egg noodles
3 c. creamed cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan and Romano cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 beaten eggs
1/2 Tbsp. + 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Brown beef; spoon off fat.
Add next 7 ingredients.
Simmer approximately 30 minutes.
Cook noodles; rinse and combine remaining ingredients in bowl except Mozzarella cheese.
Layer noodles, cottage cheese, Mozzarella, then meat sauce.
Repeat. Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before cutting into squares.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Real Italian Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
2 or 3 onions, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can whole tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. sage
1/4 tsp. parsley flakes
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. marjoram
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
salt and pepper to taste
6 to 8 lasagna noodles, cooked
8 oz. cottage cheese or Ricotta cheese
10 oz. Cheddar cheese, shredded
10 oz. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown the ground beef in a skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain.
Add the onions, tomatoes, tomato sauce and seasonings. Simmer for 30 minutes or longer, adding water gradually as needed. Layer the lasagna noodles, sauce, cottage cheese, Cheddar, Mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses 1/2 at a time in a greased 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
Yields 8 servings.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna(Good)
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. rosemary
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. sweet basil
1 tsp. sugar
2 to 3 Tbsp. dried onions
24 oz. cottage cheese
salt and pepper (good)
1/2 lb. lasagna noodles
1 jar Ragu
Directions:
Put ground beef, chili powder, rosemary, garlic salt, parsley, salt, pepper, oregano, sweet basil, sugar and dried onions together and cook for 30 minutes.
Drain.
While hamburger is cooking, cook lasagna noodles (1/2 pound).
Add 1 large jar Ragu spaghetti sauce to hamburger mixture.
Spread some sauce in bottom of oblong pan, then noodles, sauce, cottage cheese, Parmesan cheese and Mozzarella cheese.
Repeat.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Remove from oven and let set about 15 minutes before eating.
Serve with salad and bread stick.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef, cooked
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. basil
2 c. tomatoes
12 oz. tomato paste
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Cook first 6 ingredients together to make meat sauce.
Mix remaining ingredients together except for the Mozzarella cheese to make the cheese mixture.
Lightly grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Put thin layer of tomato sauce mixture in bottom of pan.
Next, layer uncooked lasagna noodles, next 1/2 of cottage cheese mixture and then 1/2 of Mozzarella cheese.
Repeat layering, saving some tomato mixture for top.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 350° for 60 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Low Calorie Dessert
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar-free drink mix
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
Directions:
Mix sugar-free drink mix with water as directed on package. Mix well and bring to boil.
Cool.
Add unflavored gelatin and mix until dissolved.
Pour into mold and chill in refrigerator until firm.
Makes 4 servings.
One serving equals negligible calories and free exchange.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free One Layer Yellow Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. self-rising flour
1/2 c. fructose sweetener
1/3 c. shortening
1 egg
3/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding
3 c. milk
3 bananas, sliced
1 regular size can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)
Cool Whip
nuts
1 box vanilla sugar-free pudding
Chocolate Sauce
sliced almonds
Directions:
Mix sugar-free pudding according to directions.
Let set. Spoon all of pudding between the 2 layers of cake.
Top with Chocolate Sauce and sliced almonds.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Low Sugar Dessert
Ingredients:
1 large pkg. sugarless red gelatin
angel food cake
Cool Whip
red cinnamon drops
Directions:
Prepare gelatin by quick-soft method on package and place in refrigerator for 20 to 30 minutes, removing when partly set.
Tear cake into chunks.
Place into Bundt pan loosely.
Pour partly set gelatin over cake chunks.
Place in refrigerator until well set. Turn out onto platter.
Ice with Cool Whip and add red cinnamon drops for garnish.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free Fruit Cake
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. candied fruit
1 c. dark raisins
1/2 c. golden raisins
1/2 c. dried apricots, chopped
1/4 c. dark rum
1/2 c. almonds, chopped
1 1/4 c. plain flour
1 1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 c. soft margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. Sweet 'N Low (3 pkg.)
3 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
In large bowl, mix the first 5 ingredients; set aside for 30 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Set oven at 300°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger Patties
Ingredients:
3 c. water
2/3 c. pearl barley
2/3 c. lentils
2/3 c. long grain brown rice
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 c. grated carrots
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. shelled sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil
2 tsp. chopped fresh thyme
2 tsp. chopped fresh oregano
salt and pepper to taste
4 beaten eggs
7 Tbsp. flour
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
Dried herbs can be substituted, use smaller amounts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked lentils
1 c. plain bread crumbs
3 egg whites
1 c. cooked spinach
1/2 c. chopped carrots, cooked
1/2 c. chopped green onions
1 c. shredded Cheddar
1 Tbsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
salt to taste
8 wheat buns
Directions:
Combine lentils, bread crumbs, egg whites, spinach, carrots, onions, Cheddar cheese, salt and pepper in a bowl.
Shape into 6 equal patties.
Place on baking sheet.
Refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 medium red bell pepper
1 medium green bell pepper
1 onion
1/2 to 1 small garlic clove
1 large carrot
1/2 c. mushrooms
1 c. couscous (Moroccan pasta)
1 egg
Directions:
Ground bell pepper, onion, garlic, carrot and mushrooms.
(May chop fine in food processor for best results).
Cook 1 cup of couscous as directed on box of pasta.
Add to ground ingredients, then add 1 scrambled egg.
Mix well.
Roll out to patties.
Bake or fry as desired.
Serve on hamburger buns (cheese optional).
May use rice instead of couscous.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Student Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 can beans (your choice)
pasta sauce
1 green pepper
1 onion
bread crumbs or crackers
vegetable oil
lettuce
cheese (optional)
hamburger condiments (ketchup, mustard, pickles, etc.)
bread
Directions:
Drain juice from beans and crush in mixing bowl.
When beans are mashed into a paste, add sauce, diced green pepper and diced onion.
Add bread crumbs or crushed crackers until mixture can be formed into patties.
Heat 1/8 cup oil in pan; grill patties. Sandwich patty with desired toppings and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: City Bakery'S Burgers(Veggie Burgers)
Ingredients:
1 C chopped onion
1 tsp minced garlic
2 Tbsp butter or margarine
1/2 tsp each ground cumin and ground ginger
1 C each coarsely chopped mushrooms and cooked thin-skinned potatoes
1 C carrots diced in 1/4 inch pieces
2 Tbsp chopped, fresh cilantro (coriander)
1/3 C all-purpose flour
2 large eggs, lightly beaten
1 C soft whole wheat bread crumbs
Salt and pepper
1-2 tsp salad oil for frying
Toasted buns or bread
Lettuce, tomato slices, onion slices
Directions:
In a 10-12 inch nonstick frying pan over medium heat, cook onion and garlic in butter, stirring often, until onion is golden; about 8 minutes.
Add cumin and ginger; stir for 1 minute.
Add mushrooms, potatoes, carrots and chopped cilantro.
Stir often until carrots are tender to bite, about 7 minutes.
Add flour and stir for 3 minutes.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly.
Then mix in eggs and bread crumbs.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Baked Seasoned Salmon
Ingredients:
1 lb. fish filets or steaks, thawed
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. melted margarine
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Arrange a single layer of fish in a shallow baking dish.
Combine remaining ingredients.
Pour half of the sauce mixture over the fish.
Bake for 20 minutes, basting with remaining sauce.
Sprinkle with paprika and chopped parsley, if desired.
Yield: 4 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Baked Salmon Loaf
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) can salmon
2 c. soft bread crumbs
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. milk
1 onion, minced
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. shortening
1 Tbsp. cornmeal
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Mix all ingredients; press into loaf shape.
Place in open baking pan lined with heavily greased aluminum foil.
Bake 40 minutes at 370°.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Bake
Ingredients:
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can pink or red salmon
1 egg
1/3 c. mayonnaise
1 can celery soup
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 c. cracker crumbs
1/4 c. onion (optional)
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a large bowl.
Put in a covered casserole.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Goes well with potatoes and peas.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Baked Salmon Loaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. salmon, boned and flaked
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
16 sections Sunshine wafers, crushed*
1/2 c. hot milk
2 eggs, well beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. grated onion
1/2 tsp. mustard
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well and press into buttered loaf pan. Bake in moderate oven at 375° for 30 minutes.
Serve plain or with tomato sauce.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
3 ripe mangos, peeled, seeded and chopped
1/2 sweet onion, chopped
1 tomato, chopped
3 Tbsp. cilantro
3 Tbsp. lime juice
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients; cover and chill. Serve as a relish for grilled fish or as a dip for chips.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. chopped mango
1 1/2 c. chopped tomato
2 Tbsp. minced fresh cilantro
2 Tbsp. lime juice
1 Tbsp. jalapeno, finely chopped and seeded
1 tsp. fresh ginger, peeled and minced
Directions:
Combine and chill.
Can use this with grilled meats and fish.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Salsa(Great With Salmon Or Beef Tenderloin.)
Ingredients:
1 mango, chopped
1/2 red bell pepper, chopped
1/3 c red onion, chopped
1/4 fresh cilantro, chopped
3 Tbsp fresh lime juice
1/3 c jalapeno jelly
1/3 c jalapeno chile, or part of it
Directions:
Whisk jelly and lime juice in large bowl.
Mix with remaining ingredients.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Can be made 3 hours ahead.
Marshall Fields has a mild red pepper jelly that is nice to use.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Papaya Or Mango Salsa
Ingredients:
6 sprigs cilantro, stemmed and chopped
1 large mango, peeled and diced
2 jalapenos, seeded and finely diced
1/2 small red onion, peeled and diced
1 to 2 limes, juiced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well and allow to sit, refrigerated, for at least 1 hour.
You may make salsa ahead of serving time but only by 24 hours or less.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
12 ripe tomatoes
4 mangos
6 peppers
4 onions
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. vinegar
Directions:
Put tomatoes, mangos, peppers and onions through food processor, then mix in sugar, salt and vinegar.
Adjust peppers to suit your taste.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apple Dessert
Ingredients:
4 to 6 apples, sliced
2/3 c. light brown sugar
dash of cinnamon
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. cold water
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. flour
1/2 c. butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Slice
apples
in deep baking dish.
Cover with 2/3 cup brown sugar,
cinnamon
and butter.
Sprinkle cold water over all. Combine
1/2
cup brown sugar, flour, 1/2 cup butter and salt to form
a crumbly mixture.
Put on top of apples.
Bake for 30
to 40
minutes or until apples are tender and crust a golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apples
Ingredients:
6 tart apples
1/4 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
4 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. hot water
Directions:
Quarter apples and place in buttered pan.
Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, butter and water.
Pour over apples and bake at 350°. Can be served hot or cold or with milk.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose white flour
4 to 6 c. cooking apples (1 1/2 to 2 lb.), peeled, cored and thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 ounce flour in mixing bowl. Squeeze lemon juice over apple slices.
Toss apples with sugar mixture.
Put
in
ovenproof
baking
dish.
Thoroughly
mix butter,
remaining
flour
and
cinnamon.
Add
lemon rind and remaining
1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake
in
oven
at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 c. sifted flour
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/3 c. chopped peanuts
6 medium apples
Directions:
Sift flour with sugar, salt and nutmeg.
Cut in peanut butter and butter until mixture is crumbly; add peanuts.
Peel apples; slice thin and place in well-greased baking dish (10 x 7 x 2-inch).
Sprinkle peanut butter mixture evenly over top of apples.
Bake 40 minutes at 350°, then increase temperature to 425° and bake 10 minutes longer or until browned.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Best-Ever Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted enriched flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 slightly beaten egg yolk
1/4 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar and lemon peel. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Add egg yolk and vanilla; blend well. Pat 1/3 of dough on bottom of 9-inch spring-form pan (sides removed). Bake at 400° about 6 minutes or until golden; cool. Butter sides of pan; attach to bottom. Pat remaining dough evenly on sides to a height of 2-inches.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: The Ultimate Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 egg yolk
1/4 c. butter, softened
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Grease inside of 9-inch spring-form pan. Remove side.
Make crust:
In medium bowl combine flour, sugar, lemon peel and vanilla.
Make well in center; with fork blend in yolk and butter.
Mix with fingertips until smooth.
On bottom of pan, form half of dough into ball.
Roll pastry to edge of pan. Bake 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown.
Meanwhile, roll rest of dough into 3 strips 2 1/4-inches wide and 9-inches long. Assemble spring-form pan.
Line inside of pan with pastry strips, overlapping ends.
Preheat oven to 450°.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: No-Bake Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 box Jell-O cheesecake mix
1 small container Cool Whip
1 small container sour cream
1 can blueberry, cherry or strawberry pie filling
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Use a rectangular (8 x 13-inch) pan or glass dish for crust. Mix cheesecake according to directions.
Mix in softened cream cheese, Eagle Brand milk and lemon juice.
Fold in other ingredients until well blended.
Pour in crust; chill for at least an hour.
Top with your favorite pie filling.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Special Individual Cheesecakes
Ingredients:
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 c. sugar
5 eggs
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla or lemon flavoring
1 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sugar
red currant jelly or prepared pie topping
Directions:
Cream 1 cup sugar and cream cheese.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well, about
10
to
15 minutes.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla.
Pour
mixture
into
foil
lined
baking cups which have paper
separators.
Fill
about 3/4 full.
Bake for 40 minutes at 300°
.
Cheesecakes
will
rise,
but
will not brown.
Take out of oven
and cool for 5 minutes.
A hole will form in center
of cheesecakes.
Combine
sour cream, 1/2 cup sugar and 1/4 teaspoon vanilla;
put
about
one
or two teaspoons of mixture into the hole that forms in each cheesecake. Add 1 teaspoon jelly
or
pie filling on top.
Return to oven and bake for 5 minutes.
Makes 24 cheesecakes.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: No-Bake Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 can evaporated milk
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. melted margarine
1 small pkg. Jell-O (any flavor)
1 c. hot water
8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Take evaporated milk and put in bowl.
Then put in freezer until mushy.
Whip until thick.
Line 9 x 13-inch pan with graham cracker crumbs, vanilla, 1/2 cup sugar and melted margarine, mixed together.
(Save out 3/4 cup mixture for topping.)

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. butter/margarine (room temperature)
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/3 c. Parmesan, grated
1/4 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
2/3 c. boiling water
Directions:
Blend parsley and basil into butter.
Blend this with cream cheese.
Add Parmesan, olive oil, garlic and pepper.
When pasta is ready, drain.
Add 2/3 cup boiling water to cheese mixture. Stir and toss with pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Herb Butter
Ingredients:
2/3 c. oleo
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. dry oregano
Directions:
Soften oleo and stir in remaining ingredients.
Use to make garlic bread; put on chicken.
Cook 1 cup spiral pasta according to package directions and drain well.
Put into serving bowl or dish.
Add 2 tablespoons or more to taste and toss well to coat pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Herb Buttered Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/3 c. parsley
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. oregano leaves
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Parmesan cheese
1 box linguine
Directions:
Cook linguine in 3-quart saucepan according to package directions.
Drain.
Melt butter in the same pan.
Stir in linguine and remaining ingredients.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until heated, about 2 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Makes about 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Mustard Butter Pasta With Broccoli
Ingredients:
5/8 c. butter (may be part olive oil or soy oil)
4 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
2 Tbsp. well minced parsley
2 Tbsp. finely sliced chives or green onion, sliced and minced
3/4 lb. fettucine or linguini
2 c. broccoli, cut in small flowerets
2 cloves garlic
1 Tbsp. oil
salt and pepper
Directions:
Set out butter to soften, when soft blend in mustard.
Slice garlic and pound in a mortar with a health pinch of salt.
When pulpy, add parsley and chives and continue pounding a short while. Blend this mixture into butter with a little black pepper.
In a large pot, boil a generous amount of water with a teaspoon salt and tablespoon oil.
Fan the pasta into boiling water.
If using fresh pasta, add broccoli at the same time, if using dried pasta, add broccoli for last couple of minutes of cooking.
When done, scoop out pasta and broccoli and drain.
Put the pasta and broccoli into a large skillet, allowing some water to dribble in.
Add the prepared butter and over moderate heat, toss the pasta until it is evenly coated.
Keep heat low enough that butter does not bubble or fry.
Check seasonings and add salt and pepper if necessary.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter(3 Pound Recipe)
Ingredients:
3 (1 lb.) containers whipped soft butter
1/2 tsp. onion salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. wet garlic
1/3 c. dry crushed basil
1/3 c. crushed oregano
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in mixing bowl.
Mix thoroughly until whipped smooth.
Put into container and refrigerate.
Use as needed.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
8 small new potatoes
3 large carrots
2 to 3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, chopped
1 stalk celery, chopped
1 small head broccoli, chopped
2 small zucchini, sliced
1 to 2 c. water
1 c. frozen lima beans (optional)
1/3 c. frozen sweet peas (optional)
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1/4 tsp. dried sage
1/4 tsp. dried marjoram
1/2 tsp. sea salt or 1 vegetable bouillon cube or 2 tsp. vegetable broth
Directions:
Place whole potatoes and carrots in a vegetable steamer, covered, over boiling water for 15 minutes.
Cut carrots into 1/2-inch slices.
Peel potatoes and cut into 1-inch cubes; set aside.
Heat oil in a 4-quart pot.
Add potatoes, carrots, onion, celery, broccoli, salt, bouillon and water.
Bring to a boil, then simmer, covered, for 5 minutes.
Add zucchini, lima beans and peas.
Return to boil, cover and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serves 2.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
1 small potato, peeled & cubed into eighths
3/4 cup green beans, cut into 2-inch pieces
3/4 cup small-sized okras
1/2 cup green pepper, cut into strips
3-4 finger-hot peppers, whole
1/4 squash, peeled and cubed
1/4 eggplant, cubed
1/2 cup cauliflower florets
1/2 cup baby carrots, halved lengthwise
1/2 cup frozen peas
Directions:
Sprinkle vegetables with salt and a pinch of turmeric and stir-fry each vegetable group individually (except peas) in 1 Tbsp. vegetable oil, adding more oil as needed between vegetables. Transfer all the veggies to a big bowl and mix in the peas.
Set aside.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (32 oz.) can plum tomatoes or 2 c. fresh tomatoes
1/4 tsp. black or cayenne pepper
2 c. potatoes, cut into 1-inch square pieces
2 c. fresh or frozen green beans, sliced into 2-inch pieces
4 Tbsp. water
3/4 tsp. ground cumin
2 c. carrots, cut in large chunks
2 to 3 tsp. oil
Directions:
Simmer onion in oil and water until transparent.
Add potatoes and carrots; simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add chopped tomatoes (save juice) and cumin.
Cover; simmer for about 1 hour, checking to see if stew needs more liquid.
If so, add the juice from can of tomatoes.
If more liquid is still needed, you can add up to 3/4 cup of tomato juice.
Add green beans; cook for 15 minutes more.
Check seasoning.
Add 1/4 teaspoon or more of pepper and more cumin, if desired.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
3 cloves crushed garlic
2 medium potatoes, in small chunks
3 carrots, sliced
2 stalks celery, sliced
1 eggplant, diced
2 medium-small zucchini, in chunks
1 stalk fresh broccoli, sliced
3 fresh tomatoes, diced
1/4 lb. sliced mushrooms
3 Tbsp. tomato paste
3 Tbsp. molasses
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 c. Burgundy
salt and pepper
butter (to saute)
Directions:
In a stew pot, begin sauteing onions, garlic, potatoes and eggplant in butter.
Salt and pepper lightly.
When potatoes begin to get tender, add celery, broccoli, carrots
and Burgundy. Steam until all vegetables begin to be tender, then add zucchini, tomato paste, mushrooms, molasses and dill. Cover and simmer over low heat about 20 minutes. Correct seasoning. Serve piping hot, topped with sour cream and freshly chopped parsley.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Basque Vegetable Stew(Serves 8)
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion, sliced thin
2 large garlic cloves, minced
8 to 10 red new potatoes, unpeeled and sliced in 1/4-inch slices
3 large firm tomatoes, chopped
4 large carrots, sliced in 1/8-inch slices
1 1/2 c. sliced celery
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. parsley
1/3 to 1/2 c. chicken broth
Directions:
Melt butter in a Dutch oven and saute onions and garlic until onions
are
translucent
and soft.
Add potato slices; cover
and simmer,
stirring	often until potatoes are almost tender, about 20 minutes.
If necessary, add more butter.
Add tomatoes, carrots, celery, salt and pepper; cover and continue cooking
on low
heat until carrots are tender, about 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thai(Stir-Fry Thai Noodles)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. dried rice flour noodles (noodles can be found in Asian grocery store)
8 medium shrimp
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 large eggs
2 Tbsp. distilled vinegar
2 Tbsp. fish sauce
3 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. paprika
2 scallions, cut in 2-inch pieces
1 c. bean sprouts
1 garlic clove
1/2 c. roast unsalted peanuts, crushed
coriander sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Soak noodles in warm water for 30 minutes or until softened. Do not let noodles become mushy.
Drain and discard water.
Set noodles aside.
Heat oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 20 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Set shrimp aside.
Add eggs, stirring constantly and breaking it into pieces.
Push eggs aside.
Add noodles, vinegar, fish sauce, sugar and paprika and toss gently over medium heat for about 1 to 2 minutes.
Add scallions, bean sprouts and shrimp.
Mix all together for about 2 minutes.
Place noodles on a large platter.
Sprinkle crushed peanuts over noodles and garnish with the coriander sprigs and bean sprouts.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thaismall Width Noodles
Ingredients:
1 bag (16 oz.) Pad Thai Noodles
1 Clove Garlic
4 Tbsp. Peanut Oil
1 Egg
16 to 24 Shrimp (1 1/4 lbs.)
2 Tbsp. White Vinegar
1 1/2 Tbsp. Fish Sauce
1 Tbsp. Sugar
1/4 c. Ground Peanuts
1 tsp. Pepper
1 tsp. Ground Dried Shrimp
1 Scallion
1 c. Fresh Cilantro
Directions:
Soak the noodles in cold water overnight or 15 minutes in hot water.
Shell and devein shrimp.
Chop scallion and cilantro. Grind or crush the peanuts.
Preheat the oil in the WOK on medium-high, then add garlic and shrimp then stir until the shrimp turns white, add the egg and stir till cooked, add the noodles and all of the seasonings, stir or toss well.
Turn heat off, add bean sprouts and scallions.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. finely chopped green onions
2 crushed garlic cloves
3 Tbsp. hoisin sauce
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
8 skinned chicken thighs
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients.
Mix well.
Arrange chicken in shallow baking dish, single layer.
Spread sauce on top. Marinate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. bite-sized cooked chicken pieces
1/3 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
4 tsp. soy sauce
4 tsp. cider vinegar
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
3 green onions, chopped
Directions:
In bowl, whisk salad oil, next five ingredients and 1 tablespoon of water.
Stir in green onions.
Add chicken pieces and toss to coat with dressing.
Serve on lettuce leaves.
Makes 4 servings.
Contains 350 calories and 27 g fat per serving.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Fruited Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
cold, cooked rice (6 c. or so)
1/2 red bell pepper, finely diced
2 or 3 green onions, slivered
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 small can mandarin oranges
1 mango, diced
1 Tbsp. toasted sesame seed (optional)
Directions:
Stir-fry in 2 tablespoons of oil.
Toss in wok while cooking. Can keep warm in low oven.
Good served with chicken, pork or fish.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Tomato Pudding To Eat With Beans
Ingredients:
1 pt. canned tomatoes
3 slices bread, crumbled
1/2 c. sugar
5 small slices butter
Directions:
Cook
in
small pan in microwave on High for 8 minutes, stirring in between, until bubbly through.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Fried Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 tomatoes, firm or unripened
2 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Dress up veggies by adding simple ingredients to canned or frozen English peas:
pearl onions, sliced mushrooms, sliced almonds or lemon pepper, singly or in combination.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Green Beans And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 cans cut-style green beans, drained
1 can stewed tomatoes
1 medium onion, minced
1/2 stick oleo
Directions:
Saute the onion until limp and mix in the rest of the ingredients.
Simmer 30 minutes and put into casserole.
Cover and reheat leftovers.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: "Quick, Hot, Green Beans"
Ingredients:
1 can green beans
10 oz. can Ro-Tel diced tomatoes and chile peppers
Directions:
Partially drain green beans. Add tomatoes and heat.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Company Green Beans
Ingredients:
2 cans green beans
1 can diced tomatoes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 medium green pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Saute onion and green pepper in margarine. Add to green beans and tomatoes. Add salt, garlic powder and black pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked chicken meat, diced
1/2 c. onion
1/2 c. cabbage
1/2 c. cauliflower
1/4 c. sunflower seeds
1/2 c. zucchini
1/2 c. broccoli
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1/4 c. carrots
Directions:
Stir-fry all vegetables until tender-crisp in small amount of oil.
Add chicken, sunflower seeds and water chestnuts, sliced. Season with soy sauce. Serve over rice or Chinese noodles.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Heart Healthy Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean round steak
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 lb. broccoli, sliced
1/2 lb. carrots, cut in 1/8-inch slices
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Rub fish with Puritan oil.
Roll fish in corn flake crumbs. Season fish with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
6 chicken breast halves, skinned and boned
vegetable cooking spray
1/4 c. + 1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, undrained
1 onion (large), coarsely chopped
2 green peppers (small), cut into 1-inch strips
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, sliced and drained
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. red pepper
3 c. hot cooked rice
Directions:
Cut chicken into 1 1/2-inch pieces; set aside.
Coat wok or skillet well with cooking spray.
Allow to heat at medium high for 1 to 2 minutes.
Add chicken and soy sauce; stir-fry 3 to 4 minutes or until lightly browned.
Remove chicken, reserving the pan drippings.
Drain mushrooms, reserving liquid.
Add onions and green pepper to wok; stir-fry 4 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Return chicken to wok.
Stir in water chestnuts and mushrooms.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 tsp. vegetable oil
2 lb. boneless chicken breast, cut into bite-size chunks
1 c. broccoli florets
1 c. cauliflower florets
1 c. sliced celery, cut 1-inch long and 1/4-inch wide
10 to 12 snow peas
1/2 Bermuda onion, sliced into 1/4-inch wide rings
1/4 c. sugar
juice of 1 lemon
2 garlic cloves, chopped
1/3 c. dry white wine
1 c. sliced carrots, 1 inch long and 1/4 inch wide
1/2 c. each: sliced green, red and yellow bell pepper, cut 1 inch long and 1/4 inch wide
6 large mushrooms, quartered
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. dried tarragon
1/2 c. soy sauce
hot cooked rice
Directions:
In a large 4-quart skillet, wok or stock pot, heat the oil over medium-high heat.
Add the garlic and cook until lightly brown.
Immediately add the chicken and stir-fry, turning constantly, until nearly cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Add the wine and bring to a vigorous simmer.
Add carrots, cover and steam for 1 to 2 minutes.
Then in succession, add the broccoli and cauliflower together.
Stir, cover and steam for 1 to 2 minutes; then the peppers.
Stir, cover and steam.
Add the snow peas; stir, cover and steam.
Add the celery; stir, cover and steam.
If extra liquid is needed, you can add a bit more wine or water.
Be conservative, as the vegetables will begin adding their own liquid.
Add sugar, basil, tarragon and soy sauce sauce; stir. Stir in lemon juice just before serving.
Serve over hot rice with soy sauce on the side.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 oz. boneless skinless chicken, cubed or cut in slices
1/2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 c. onion, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. pea pods
1/2 medium green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 to 3/4 c. chicken broth (Healthy Request)
3 to 4 mushrooms (fresh)
pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray frying pan or wok with butter flavor Pam.
Quickly saute over medium-high heat the cubed chicken meat; add some water (1/4 cup) to bring up flavor.
After chicken is just about done, remove and set aside in covered dish.
Re-spray pan.
Over medium heat, add onion and green pepper; when onion is partially cooked, add broccoli.
Cover, heat and add 1/4 to 1/2 cup of chicken broth and season to taste.
When those vegetables are tender-crisp, add pea pods and sliced mushrooms, continue sauteing.
Stir 1 teaspoon cornstarch and remaining broth (water can be used or added for more juices); set aside.
Add chicken; saute some more to heat and mix thoroughly.
Add cornstarch mix.
Turn off heat and serve over 2/3 cup rice.
Each serving:
325 calories (including rice), 2 gm. fat.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
7 eggs, separated
2 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3 Tbsp. lemon rind and extract
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Separate eggs.
In egg whites, add 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar and beat well until very stiff.
In yolks, add flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oil, extract, rind and water.
Beat well until creamy.
Fold into egg whites, do not beat.
Pour into 10 inch tube pan.
Do not grease.
Bake at 325° for 50 minutes and 375° for 10 minutes more.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. salad oil
7 egg yolks
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 c. egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 c. sifted powdered sugar
1/2 c. drained crushed pineapple
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and 1 teaspoon salt into bowl.
Make well in center.
Add oil, egg yolks, 3/4 cup cold water, vanilla and lemon rind.
Beat until smooth.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form (do not underbeat).
Pour egg yolk mixture gradually over egg whites; fold gently until blended.
Do not overmix.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. cake flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon flavoring
7 eggs, separated
1 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, oil, water, lemon flavoring and egg yolks until smooth.
Beat egg whites with cream of tartar until very stiff and dry (about 5 minutes).
Fold into flour mixture and pour into ungreased tube pan.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated 300° oven.
Remove from oven and invert pan over a bottle to cool for at least 1 hour.
May be glazed.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
7 egg yolks
3/4 c. cold water
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
7 egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Blend flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in bowl.
Make a well and add in order: oil, egg yolks, water, vanilla and rind.
Beat with spoon until smooth.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar in a large mixing bowl until the whites form very stiff peaks.*
Pour egg yolk mixture over egg whites, gently folding with a rubber spatula just until blended.
Pour into ungreased tube pan.
Bake at 325° for 55 minutes, then at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes more.
Let it hang until cold.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Congratulations Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. oil
7 egg yolks
3/4 c. cold water
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 c. egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Sift into the first bowl the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
Make a well and add oil, egg yolks, water, vanilla and lemon rind.
Mix well.
In a large bowl, beat egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form.
Pour yolk mix slowly over whites, blending carefully with a spatula.
Pour into ungreased tube pan and bake 55 minutes.
Increase to 350° for 10 to 15 minutes more.
Cool over bottle upside down.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
8 oz. spaghetti
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. parsley, chopped
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook spaghetti in salted water to desired doneness; drain. Mince garlic.
In pan, heat oil and butter.
Add garlic.
Cook for 1 minute.
Add to other ingredients.
Toss well.
Test for seasoning.
Add pepper and salt for taste.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemon Basil Pasta
Ingredients:
8 oz. linguine (cooked without salt), drained
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a small bowl, combine butter, lemon juice and spices.
Toss with pasta.
Sprinkle with cheese and serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Lemon Basil Pasta
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. linguine or other favorite pasta
2 Tbsp. melted butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook pasta and drain.
Return to pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic, mashed
1/4 c. oil
juice of 1 lemon
2 mashed potatoes
Directions:
Blend ingredients.
Use a pasta sauce or basting sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. butter/margarine (room temperature)
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/3 c. Parmesan, grated
1/4 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
2/3 c. boiling water
Directions:
Blend parsley and basil into butter.
Blend this with cream cheese.
Add Parmesan, olive oil, garlic and pepper.
When pasta is ready, drain.
Add 2/3 cup boiling water to cheese mixture. Stir and toss with pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 cube oleo
4 medium onions, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
9 garlic cloves, chopped
handful of celery leaves, chopped
10 dried chili peppers, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin seed, crushed
4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
2/3 can tomato sauce
Directions:
Fry on medium-high heat the oil, all spices and celery leaves until absorbed by oil and not powder.
Add tomato sauce and cook until thick.
Skin and cup up chicken and put in large pot. Add sauce to chicken and simmer 20 to 25 minutes.
Add water to not quite halfway to the top of chicken.
Cover and simmer until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken, skinned and cut into small pieces
salt to taste
2 tsp. black pepper
1/3 c. oil
1 1/2 large onions, chopped
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
2 whole cardamom pods, crushed
4 whole cloves
1 1/2 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. chili powder or to taste
3 tsp. ground coriander
2 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
2 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
2 bay leaves
2 Tbsp. ketchup
1 c. water
Directions:
Wash the chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in a Dutch oven.
Add chicken and brown over medium heat.
Remove and reserve chicken.
Add onions, cinnamon stick, cardamom and cloves to pan.
Saute until onions are lightly browned.
Add more oil if needed.
Add turmeric, chili powder, coriander, ginger, garlic, cumin and bay leaves.
Fry spices 4 to 5 minutes, sprinkling with water if they become too dry.
Stir in ketchup and return chicken to pan.
Pour in water and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer over low heat until chicken is tender and sauce is thickened, about 30 minutes.
Serve with rice or bread.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. prepared mustard
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. water
1 clove garlic, minced
2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer chicken or one 4 to 5-lb. domestic duck or wild goose
cooking oil or melted butter
2 large potatoes, peeled and quartered or 8 new potatoes
6 medium carrots, bias-sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
2 medium apples, cored and cut into wedges
Directions:
Set oven to 375°.
In a small saucepan combine first 10 ingredients.
Bring to boiling, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat; set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken pieces, skinned
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2-inch pieces ginger, chopped
2 tsp. cumin seed, ground
3 Tbsp. natural yogurt
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. turmeric
pinch of chili powder
1 tsp. pepper
2 onions, chopped
salt
Directions:
Place the garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, chili pepper, coriander and yogurt in a large bowl with salt to taste.
Mix well.
Add chicken and leave for 4 hours; turn occasionally. Heat the oil in the pan; add the onion and fry until golden. Add the chicken and marinade.
Bring to simmering point; cover and cook for about 30 minutes, until the chicken is tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. flour
1 Tbsp. salt
4 c. cooked chicken
1 c. chicken stock
2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
3 Tbsp. curry powder
Directions:
Fry onions in butter.
Add flour, salt, curry powder and chicken stock.
Stir constantly until mixture is thick.
Add milk, lemon juice and chicken.
Heat well.
(May be made in advance and reheated.)
Serve over rice with chopped bacon or chutney, diced pineapple and coconut.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. 1% cottage cheese
1/2 c. skim milk
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt (optional)
8 oz. corkscrew noodles, cooked and drained
1 large tomato, seeded and chopped
Directions:
In a blender or food processor, process cottage cheese, milk and garlic until smooth.
Add flour, lemon juice, basil, mustard, pepper and salt, if desired; process until well blended.
Pour into a saucepan.
Cook over medium heat until thickened.
Do not boil.
Serve over noodles; sprinkle with chopped tomatoes.
Yield: 4 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skimmed milk
1/4 c. grated fresh Parmesan cheese
1/8 c. grated fresh Romano cheese
1/2 tsp. dried whole thyme
1/2 tsp. dried whole basil
1/4 tsp. dried dill weed
6 c. hot cooked medium seashell macaroni
Directions:
Melt margarine in saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and garlic; saute 2 minutes. Add flour and stir well.
Gradually add milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook 3 minutes or until thickened, stirring constantly. Remove from heat.
Stir in cheeses and herbs. Serve over macaroni. Garnish with extra onions, if desired.
Contains 244 calories and 4.3 grams fat per serving.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Classic Alfredo Pasta
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. uncooked fettuccine
1/2 c. butter or oleo
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. heavy or whipping cream
4 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Cook fettuccine according to your taste of doneness; drain. Meanwhile, in small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat; gradually stir in cheese, then cream until well blended.
Continue heating sauce, stirring constantly, just to boiling point.
Remove from heat; stir in parsley.
Add sauce to hot fettuccine; toss lightly.
Serves 6.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Alfredo
Ingredients:
Pasta of Choice
3/4 c. Unsalted Butter
4 medium Cloves Garlic, pressed
1 3/4 c. Grated Parmesan Cheese
1 1/2 c. Evaporated Milk (unsweetened)
1 Tbsp. Fresh Ground Pepper
Directions:
Start the pasta first.
In 1/2 quart sauce pan, heat the butter, garlic and milk over a medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the butter melts and the milk is hot.
Do not boil.
Stir in the parmesan Cheese and pepper, continue heating until all is melted.
Pour sauce over the noodles, serve with additional parmesan and pepper as desired.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. reduced calorie margarine
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. flour
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skim milk
1/4 c. grated fresh Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. grated fresh Romano cheese
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. dill weed
6 c. cooked medium seashell macaroni (without salt or fat)
green onion strips
Directions:
Melt margarine in a saucepan over medium heat; add green onions and garlic.
Saute for 2 minutes.
Add flour and stir well. Gradually add milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and cook until thickened, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat and stir in cheeses and herbs.
Serve over macaroni. Garnish with green onion strips.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 garlic clove, minced
2 Tbsp. lime juice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 tsp. Italian parsley, minced
2 fresh thyme, minced
2 chicken breast halves, skinned and boned
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
pinch of cayenne pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. jalapeno, minced
1 large onion, sliced thin and cut into strips
1 red pepper, seeded
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. oil
Directions:
In a small glass bowl, combine garlic, lime juice, olive oil, herbs and seasonings.
Add chicken breasts; toss to coat with mixture and marinate until ready to cook.
Over medium heat, preheat stir-fry pan.
Add olive oil, garlic and jalapeno.
Cook briefly.
Add onion slices and bell pepper strips.
Toss to coat with oil and cook until onion becomes translucent.
Vegetables will still be slightly crisp.
Remove from heat and reserve. Preheat grill or broiler. Remove chicken breasts from marinade and place on grill or under broiler.
Grill until just done, turning once.
Baste with marinade.
Slice into thin strips.
Season with salt.
Preheat fajita pan under broiler or on top of stove until very hot.
Remove and coat with oil.
Place onion-pepper mixture on one side of pan and chicken slices on the other.
The ingredients will begin to sizzle.
Serve immediately with tortillas, guacamole, sour cream and salsa.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. Vegetable Oil, divided
4 Tbsp. Lemon Juice, divided
1-1/2 tsp. Seasoned Salt
1-1/2 tsp. Oregano
1-1/2 tsp. Cumin
1 tsp. Garlic Powder
1/2 tsp Chili Powder
1/2 tsp. Paprika
1/2 tsp crushed Red Pepper Flakes
1-1/2 lbs. boneless skinless Chicken Breasts, cut in thin strips
1 medium Red Pepper, juliened
1 medium Green Pepper, juliened
4 Green Onions, sliced
1/2 c. Onions, slivered
Directions:
In large resealable plastic bag, combine 2 Tbsp. Oil, 2 Tbsp. Lemon Juice, and Seasonings. Add Chicken. Seal and turn to coat; refrigerate overnight.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. fresh lemon or lime juice
1 1/4 lb. boneless chicken breasts, skinned
1 large onion
1 large green pepper
2 tsp. vegetable oil
8 corn tortillas
1/2 tsp. oregano (can also be added)
1/4 tsp. cumin (can also be added)
Directions:
Preheat broiler.
To make marinade, combine garlic, oil, lemon or lime juice, Worcestershire sauce and pepper in a bowl.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken
1/2 onion, sliced
1 green pepper, sliced
2 cloves garlic, sliced
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. oregano
pinch of salt
2 Tbsp. sherry
8 flour tortillas
salsa or chopped tomatoes (for garnish, optional)
small amount oil (2 Tbsp.)
Directions:
Cut up chicken into thin slices.
Saute chicken in oil with garlic until no longer pink.
Add onion and pepper and continue to stir-fry.
Add cumin, oregano and salt.
Just before removing from heat, add sherry.
Warm tortillas one at a time in ungreased frying pan.
Assemble fajitas at the table by placing a large spoonful of the chicken mixture plus any desired garnish in the center of a tortilla; fold up bottom and sides to make fajita.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
2 Tbsp. fresh lime juice
1 small onion, finely chopped
1 garlic clove, crushed through a press
1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 boneless chicken breast halves without skin
16 flour tortillas, warmed
salsa
sour cream
shredded lettuce
shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine oil, vinegar, lime juice, onion, garlic, pepper sauce, salt and pepper.
Add chicken and marinade at least 1 hour at room temperature or overnight in refrigerator. Light charcoal grill or preheat broiler.
Remove chicken from marinade; reserve marinade.
Grill over medium-hot coals or broil, turning and basting with marinade several times, for 10 minutes or until chicken is opaque throughout, but still juicy.
Cut chicken into strips.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creamy Cauliflower Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
6 to 8 scallions, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 stalks celery, chopped
2 medium cauliflower, chopped
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried marjoram
6 c. water
2 Tbsp. white miso
1/8 tsp. nutmeg (optional)
1 tsp. dried basil
Directions:
In heavy soup kettle, melt butter.
Add oil.
Add onion, scallions and garlic.
Add celery and cauliflower.
Add seasonings.
Mix well and cook, uncovered, over medium heat for several minutes, stirring frequently.
Add water and miso.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer, covered, over medium heat for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is tender.
Remove cover and slightly cool.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon (fried then crumbled)
2 1/2 c. cauliflower
3/4 c. sour cream (low fat version works just as well)
1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 sm. yellow onion, finely chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook the cauliflower until firm, yet tender. Coarsely mash cauliflower with potato masher.
Add the sour cream, onion, cheese, salt and pepper.
Mix well.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creamy Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower, broken into pieces
1 bunch green onions, sliced
1 c. sliced radishes
1 c. mayo
1 pkg. garlic cheese dressing
2 tsp. caraway seed
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients.
Combine remaining ingredients and pour over vegetables.
Toss lightly to coat.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Perfect Creamy Cauliflower Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, coarsely chopped
6 to 8 scallions, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 stalks celery, chopped
2 medium cauliflower, cored and coarsely chopped
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder (optional)
1/8 tsp. fresh ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. dried savory or marjoram
6 c. water
2 Tbsp. white miso
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
In heavy soup kettle, melt butter.
Add oil.
Add onion, scallions and garlic.
Add celery and cauliflower.
Add seasonings.
Mix well and cook, uncovered, over medium heat for several minutes, stirring frequently.
Add water and miso.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer, covered, over medium heat for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is tender.
Remove cover and cool slightly. Puree in small increments in blender until smooth and creamy. Reheat, adding fresh ground nutmeg, if desired.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Slaw
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower
1/4 c. minced onion
1 c. minced celery
1/4 c. French dressing
2 Tbsp. caraway seed
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Slice raw cauliflower thin.
Combine with other ingredients. Serve in salad bowl.
Salt to taste.
Chill overnight.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry-Orange Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. onion
5 cloves garlic
1/8 c. raspberry puree
1/2 c. orange juice
1 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. balsamic vinegar
1 1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Dice onion and garlic.
Pour in raspberry puree, orange juice, ginger, soy sauce and balsamic vinegar.
Whisk in olive oil slowly.
Let sit for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
