Increase heat and bring to a rapid boil.
Reduce to glaze consistency.
Add carrots and coat evenly with glaze.
One 1 cup serving contains 95 calories and 0 gm fat.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. carrots (about 8 medium), pared and cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. stock or broth
2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
6 Tbsp. butter
pinch of freshly ground black pepper
freshly grated nutmeg to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine carrots, stock and brown sugar in a heavy saucepan with lid; bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and cover tightly.
Cook the carrots until they are about half done, 10 to 15 minutes; then remove the lid from the pot.
Return the heat to medium-low and reduce the cooking liquid to a thick syrup.
As the syrup thickens, shake the pan frequently to keep the carrots from sticking.
When the syrup is thick, add the butter, pepper, nutmeg and salt.
When the butter is melted, shake the pan again, rolling the carrots gently in the glaze so each piece is covered.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Apple Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced, hot cooked carrots
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. applesauce
Directions:
Combine carrots, butter, brown sugar and applesauce; heat and serve.
Season cold cooked carrots as suggested in the recipe; place in baking dish.
Cover; bake in oven at 350° for 15 minutes. Yields 6 servings.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
2 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh grated Parmesan
Directions:
Puree lemon juice and garlic in food processor.
With machine running, gradually add olive oil and blend until smooth.
Add Parmesan cheese, blend until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. half and half
1 egg, lightly beaten
1 clove garlic, minced
5 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. sugar
juice of 1 1/2 lemons
Directions:
Whisk together and refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/3 c. ReaLemon lemon juice from concentrate
1/4 c. sliced green onions
1 Tbsp. Dijon style mustard
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 1-pint jar with tight fitting lid or cruet, combine all ingredients; shake well.
Chill to blend flavors.
Use as a salad dressing or as a marinade for asparagus, broccoli, poultry or fish.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Hot Vinaigrette Vegetable
Ingredients:
2 c. each: broccoli and cauliflower florets
1 c. thinly sliced onions
6 cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. red bell pepper strips
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 tsp. each; lemon juice and raspberry vinegar
1 tsp. Chinese sesame oil
1/2 tsp. each: granulated sugar and salt
1 small garlic clove, mashed
1/4 tsp. oregano leaves
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. chopped fresh basil
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, bring 1 quart water to a boil.
Add broccoli and cauliflower and cook, stirring once for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Drain vegetables and transfer to serving platter.
Add onions, tomatoes and bell peppers and set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Beef Pot Roast
Ingredients:
3 lb. beef, boned
1 tsp. oil
2 medium onions, chopped
1 c. water
2 whole cloves
2 bouillon cubes
2 small bay leaves
1 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
sprig of parsley
pinch of thyme
pinch of rosemary
2 1/2 c. canned tomatoes
Directions:
Trim excess fat from meat; brown on all sides in oil in heavy pan.
Pour off fat.
Add remaining ingredients to meat.
Cover pan tightly and simmer for 2 to 3 hours or until meat is very tender. Stir and turn meat every 30 minutes.
Yields 12 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pot Roast
Ingredients:
1 (3 1/2 lb.) boneless bottom round roast
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water
1/3 c. dry sherry
1/4 c. reduced calorie catsup
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. dried whole rosemary
1/4 tsp. dried whole thyme
2 medium onions, sliced
1 bay leaf
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, undrained
Directions:
Trim all visible fat from meat.
Coat a Dutch oven with vegetable cooking spray; place over medium heat until hot.
Place roast in Dutch oven and brown on all sides.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Combine next 7 ingredients.
Pour over roast.
Add onion and bay leaf.
Cover and simmer 2 1/2 to 3 hours or until roast is tender.
Add mushrooms.
Cook until mushrooms are thoroughly heated.
Discard bay leaf.
Remove roast from cooking liquid.
Skim fat from liquid.
Yields 12 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Walnut Roast
Ingredients:
3 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
1 1/2 c. walnuts, chopped
3 c. cooked brown rice
1 onion, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1/4 c. water
1 tsp. sage
1/3 c. whole wheat flour
3/4 c. sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 c. water
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Saute chopped vegetables with sage, salt and soy sauce in 1/4 cup water.
Blend flour and sunflower seeds with 2 cups water. Add to sauteed vegetables and simmer a few minutes.
Place in bowl bread crumbs, walnuts and brown rice.
Add sauteed vegetables and sunflower mixture.
Mix well.
Pour into casserole dish and bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes, until well browned.
Serve with Chicken-like or Cashew Gravy.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Beer Roast(Just Delicious)
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. roast (chuck or sirloin)
1 pkg. Lipton onion soup mix
1 can beer
2 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. white pepper (preferred)
1 whole chicken (3 1/2 to 4 lb.)
1 (12 oz.) can beer
Directions:
In small cup, combine chili powder, cumin, salt, sugar, cayenne and pepper. Rub evenly over outside and in cavities of chicken. If desired, rub some under skin over breasts and legs. Cover and refrigerate up to 24 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pot Roast
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. beef rump, chuck or shoulder
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 sliced large onion
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 Tbsp. chives
1/8 tsp. thyme
1 minced clove garlic
1 bay leaf
1 chopped stalk celery
1 c. canned tomatoes
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Heat frying pan.
Add meat and brown on all sides.
Season with salt and pepper.
Put onion slices on top of meat; add wine and rest of ingredients.
If desired, add peeled halved potatoes, small peeled whole onions and carrots cut diagonally in 2-inch pieces during last hour of cooking.
Make gravy, using 1/2 cup dry wine to replace 1/2 cup of liquid.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
4 to 5 c. rice
4 eggs
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. scallions, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
dash of pepper
1/4 c. chicken broth or stock
Directions:
Cook rice.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in frying pan or wok on high heat.
Scramble eggs quickly and remove.
Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in same pan.
Add cooked eggs, salt, sugar, soy sauce, chopped scallions and broth.
Stir-fry over medium to high heat for 3 to 4 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Homemade Fried Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. rice
1 c. meat (pork, ham, beef or shrimp)
1/2 c. green peppers
1/2 c. onions
1/2 c. celery
1/2 to 1 c. bean sprouts
2 or 3 eggs
salt
pepper
butter or oil
soy sauce
Directions:
Boil rice according to instructions on box.
Use less water for flaky rice.
Boil or cook meat or shrimp until done.
Add a little salt and pepper.
When meat is done, dice into small pieces.
Scramble eggs; add green peppers, onions, celery and bean sprouts.
Cook together until vegetables are soft.
Cook in butter or oil.
Add rice.
Stir for about 10 minutes.
Add soy sauce, salt and pepper.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. corn oil
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1 c. chicken, cooked and chopped
2 eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 c. cooked brown rice
3 Tbsp. lite soy sauce
2/3 c. scallions, sliced
Directions:
In wok or skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add carrots and chicken. Stir fry for 1 minute.
Add eggs and pepper.
Stir fry for 1 minute.
Add rice and soy sauce.
Stir fry for 5 minutes. Garnish with scallions.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast
3/4 c. pepper (red and green)
1/4 c. onion
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1 to 1 1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Cut pepper and onion before cooking.
Can use ham, pork or beef, even lobster and shrimp combined together if you like.
Cook 1 cup steam rice.
Heat the frypan.
Pour a little oil on it.
Put rice and chicken, pepper and onion in the frypan and stir it.
Add sugar, salt and soy sauce.
Stir until it is done.
Makes 1 to 2 servings.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice Sticks With Pork
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. boneless pork
boiling water
4 oz. dried rice sticks
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 small clove garlic, minced
1/3 c. sliced green onion
1 c. fresh pea pods, halved lengthwise
1 (4 oz.) can chopped mushrooms, drained
1/4 c. homemade chicken broth
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Partially freeze pork; thinly slice pork and then cut into shreds.
Pour enough boiling water over rice sticks to cover.
Let stand 5 minutes; drain.
Rinse in cold water.
Drain well.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
6 c. peeled, sliced apples
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. plain flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
2 pie shells
2 Tbsp. butter
small amount of milk
cinnamon-sugar
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour, spices and dash of salt.
Mix with peeled, sliced apple.
Fill pie shell with apple mixture.
Dot with butter.
Cover pie with another pie shell and crimp edges together.
Cut slits in top.
Brush pie top with milk.
Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar.
Place pie on inverted iron skillet in a 400° oven and bake for 50 minutes.
(This will make a crisp bottom crust.)

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Fried Apple Pies
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. Crisco
1 tsp. vinegar (stirred into water)
water (enough to make dough stick together)
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Cut in shortening.
Moisten dough with enough water to give it the right consistency for rolling.
Roll dough out on lightly floured surface.
Cut into 6-inch saucer size circles.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie(Crust And Filling)
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. and 1 Tbsp. shortening
2 or 3 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Measure flour and salt into bowl.
Cut in shortening thoroughly.
Sprinkle with water, 1 tablespoon at a time, mixing until all flour is moistened and dough almost cleans side of bowl (1 or 2 more tablespoons of water can be added if needed.)
Gather dough into ball; shape into flattened round on lightly floured cloth-covered board.
With flour covered rolling pin, roll dough 2-inches larger than inverted pie pan.
Fold pastry into quarters; unfold and ease into pan.
Trim overhang edge of pastry 1-inch from rim of the pan.
Fold and roll pastry edges under, even with pan; flute.
Fill and bake as directed in recipe.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. lemon juice
5 c. thinly sliced apples
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour, spices, salt and lemon juice.
Add apples; toss to mix.
Roll out pastry dough for crust and top.
Cut vents in top piece.
Line pie pan with pastry and cut off overhang. Fill with half the apples and dot with butter.
Add remaining apples.
Moisten rim with water.
Adjust top crust.
Leave about 1/2-inch pastry beyond edge.
Fold in under lower pastry.
Seal rim by pressing together and flute it.
Brush with milk.
Bake at 400° for 50 to 60 minutes or until apples test done with fork.
For a single crust, use a 425° oven.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 stick cold unsalted butter, cut into bits
2 Tbsp. cold vegetable shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. ice water (plus additional, if necessary)
Directions:
In large bowl, blend flour, butter, vegetable shortening and salt until mixture resembles meal.
Add 2 tablespoons ice water; toss mixture until water is incorporated, adding the additional ice water if necessary to form a dough.
Form dough into a ball. Dust the dough with flour and chill it, wrapped in wax paper, for 1 hour.
Make 2 of these for one pie.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
4 large onions
3 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
fresh pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. parsley
1/8 tsp. thyme
2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans beef consomme
1 c. dry white wine
cognac
seasoned croutons
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese, shredded or sliced Provolone
Directions:
Slice and chop onions.
Saute in butter until limp.
Sprinkle with flour, pepper, garlic powder, sugar, parsley and thyme.
Cook until golden brown.
Add enough water to consomme to make 1 quart. Combine with onion mixture and add wine; simmer 45 minutes.
At the last minute, stir in cognac (no more than 2 tablespoons).

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
2 lb. thinly sliced onions (the more onions, the better)
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. sage
1/2 c. red wine
salt and pepper to taste
3 cans beef broth
3 Tbsp. cognac (optional)
1 to 2 c. grated Swiss or Parmesan cheese
toasted sliced French bread
Directions:
In heavy bottomed, 4-quart covered pot, melt butter and oil. Add onions.
Cover and cook over low heat for 15 minutes.
Stir in salt and sugar.
Cook over moderate heat for 30 to 40 minutes, stirring frequently, until onions are deep golden brown.
Sprinkle in flour and stir over low heat for several minutes to cook flour. In a separate pot, bring broth to a boil.
Remove soup pot from heat and add boiling liquid, wine and seasonings.
Simmer, partially covered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Just before serving, stir in cognac.
Pour in soup tureen or individual ovenproof bowls. Stir in some cheese and top with toasted French bread.
Sprinkle lightly with paprika.
Place bowls on cookie sheet and cover with the rest of the cheese.
Bake 15 minutes in a 325° oven and serve immediately.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: The World'S Best French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 lb. onions, thinly sliced
4 (14 1/2 oz.) cans beef broth, divided
1 bay leaf
1 sprig fresh parsley
1 large sprig fresh thyme
2 Tbsp. Madeira or sherry
salt and freshly ground pepper
8 (3/4-inch thick) slices French bread
2 c. grated Gruyere cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°. On stove top, heat butter in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and stir often until softened and golden brown, about 35 minutes. Increase heat to high and pour in 1/2 broth, stirring until most of the broth has evaporated and onions are browning again. Continue until you have used up 2 cups of the broth. Wrap bay leaf, parsley and thyme in cheesecloth. Add to soup; reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, 15 minutes. Season with Madeira and salt and pepper to taste. Toast bread in oven on a cookie sheet 5 minutes. Divide the soup among 8 ovenproof bowls. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of cheese over each, then top with bread and 2 tablespoons more cheese. Place bowls on cookie sheet and bake until the cheese bubbles, 10 minutes. Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
3 medium onions, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. flour
2 c. consomme
4 c. water
1/2 c. boiled milk
1/4 lb. grated Swiss cheese
6 dried slices French bread
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
In heavy skillet, cook onions in heated butter until slightly browned.
Sprinkle with flour and cook over low flame until golden, never allowing them to become dark brown.
Add consomme and water. Bring to boil, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, then simmer gently for 20 minutes.
Spoon into casserole or individual bowls. Place slices of bread on top.
Sprinkle generously with cheese. Add pepper.
Sprinkle with melted butter.
Brown quickly under broiler flame.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. yellow onions
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 tsp. black pepper (coarse)
1 Tbsp. flour (regular)
3 cans beef broth
3 c. water
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper
French bread (8 slices)
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. Swiss cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel onions, slice thinly (about 5 cups).
Put butter in a 4-quart saucepan; heat over moderately high heat until butter melts.
Add onions and pepper to butter.
Saute onion mixture, stirring often
until onions are a light golden brown.
Sprinkle onions with flour; stir until all traces of flour disappear.
Cook 1 minute longer, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat. Gradually add beef broth, stirring onion mixture all the time; stir in water and bay leaf.
Return to moderately high heat. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring constantly.
Reduce heat to low. Cook onion soup, uncovered, for 30 to 40 minutes.
Discard bay leaf; add salt and pepper to taste.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
2 egg whites
1/3 c. soft bread crumbs
1/3 c. finely chopped onions
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
2 cloves minced garlic
1 Tbsp. crushed basil
1/4 tsp. crushed dried tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 lb. ground turkey
Directions:
Beat egg whites until frothy.
Stir in crumbs, onions, parsley, garlic, tarragon, salt and pepper.
Mix into ground turkey.
Broil until cooked through.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
8 oz. ground turkey
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. margarine, softened
1 1/2 tsp. water
1 1/2 c. thinly sliced onions
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. ketchup
2 hamburger rolls, toasted
1 packet instant chicken broth and seasoning mix
Directions:
In bowl, combine turkey, margarine, water and broth mix.
Form into 2 patties.
Spray skillet with Pam and heat over medium-high heat.
Add patties and brown on both sides.
Reduce heat to low and add onions.
Cover pan and cook until patties are no longer pink inside, 5 to 8 minutes.
Serve each burger topped with 2 teaspoons ketchup and half the cooked onion slices on toasted rolls.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
1lb. Ground Skinless Turkey
1 Medium Onion Chopped
1 Large Egg Beaten
2 Tbsp. Chopped Parsley
1 Clove Garlic Minced
1/2 tsp. Tarragon
1/2 tsp. Salt
1/4 tsp. Pepper
Directions:
Preheat broiler.
Spray the broiler with non-stick spray. Lightly combine turkey, onion, egg and parsley and garlic tarragon plus salt and pepper in a bowl.
Form into 4 burgers.
Broil 4-inch from heat until brown, about 5 minutes on each side. 1 Burger = 4 Points.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground turkey
1/2 tsp. garlic
1 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. Cajun seasoning
1 tsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. Country Bob's steak sauce
2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1 tsp. hickory smoke seasoning
1/2 stick crackers
1 egg
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well and pat into burgers. Grill, pan-fry or bake until done. Garnish as you wish.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1/4 c. dried breadcrumbs
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onions
2 Tbsp. ketchup
1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. black ground pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together in a bowl.
Form into 4 ounce patties.
Lay on a broiler pan and broil for 3 to 4 minutes per side, or grill until done.
Makes 4 (4 ounce) patties.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
6 ripe avocados, halved and seeded
1 small tomato, diced
1/4 c. mild diced green chilies
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
With a large spoon, scoop pulp from skin of avocados into a bowl.
Mash avocados with potato masher, leaving slightly chunky; set aside.
Combine remaining ingredients and mix well.
Fold into avocados gently, not to mush.
Chill until ready to serve.
Serve as dip with tortilla chips.
Yields 4 cups.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe avocados
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 to 2 Tbsp. finely chopped green chilli pepper
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. worcestershire sauce
4 drops Tabasco sauce
1 clove garlic, minced
1 large ripe tomato peeled, seeded and chopped
Directions:
Cook tomato pieces in a dry skillet until all water is absorbed and lightly brown.
Cool to room temperature.
Mix all ingredients well.
Keep refrigerated.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
juice of 1/2 lemon
2 medium size ripe avocados
1 Tbsp. grated yellow onion
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 to 1 small hot green pepper, seeded and minced
1 tomato, peeled, seeded and then minced
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mash avocados and then add all other ingredients.
Place plastic wrap directly on food and let stand at room temperature for 1 hour.
Stir well and serve with chips.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
2 medium avocados, chopped fine or mashed
1 medium onion, chopped
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. vinegar or lime juice
Directions:
Mix all together and serve as a dip.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 medium avocados, peeled and mashed
1 medium tomato, chopped
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. Tabasco or hot sauce
1/4 c. mayonnaise or sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in bowl.
Mix together well.
Serve with corn chips or as a salad dressing.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. asparagus
1 to 3 cloves garlic, minced
2 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 to 2 tsp. vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Break and discard bottom 1/8 of each stalk.
Break remaining part into halves. Wash by soaking and rinsing.
Boil or steam until tender.
Do not overcook.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Fresh Asparagus Pasta
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
3/4 lb. fresh asparagus
4 large green onions, chopped using white part only
4 cloves garlic, chopped
1/4 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
2 medium pear tomatoes
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 c. dry white wine
3/4 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. pitted black olives, cut in wedges
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 lb. pasta, cooked
Parmesan cheese (optional)
Directions:
Cut asparagus and onions into 1-inch diagonal pieces.
Cut tomatoes lengthwise in eighths.
Mix 1/2 cup of the chicken broth and the wine together; set aside.
Mix cornstarch and 1/4 cup chicken broth together; set aside.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Herbed Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh asparagus, tough ends removed
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter, room temperature
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped chives
1 Tbsp. chopped dill
1 Tbsp. chopped rosemary
1 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 lb. wedge Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Blanch asparagus in boiling water for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Remove to paper towels.
Pat dry.
In small bowl combine butter with herbs and spices.
Melt herb-butter over medium heat in large skillet.
Add asparagus.
Toss gently.
Place on serving platter. Top with shaved Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Provencale
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter
2 lb. asparagus
1/4 tsp. plus 1/8 tsp. salt, divided
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. finely minced parsley
1 Tbsp. minced shallots
2 garlic cloves, peeled and minced
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 tomatoes, sliced into 1/4-inch slices
Directions:
Melt butter in a small saucepan; spoon off the white foam that rises to the surface to clarify the butter.
Cook slowly to a deep golden brown.
Snap the asparagus and peel the lower part of each spear with a vegetable peeler or small sharp knife.
Place the asparagus in a 10 to 12-inch skillet or saute pan.
Add water to barely cover it and sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Gently boil the asparagus, uncovered, until it is tender-crisp when pierced with the tip of a small sharp knife, about 5 minutes.
Drain and refresh the asparagus under cold water.
Drain the spears on paper towels and dry them thoroughly.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Marinated Asparagus
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
2 garlic cloves, crushed
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. salt and pepper
1 hard-boiled eggs
Directions:
Blanch asparagus until tender. Put in cold water to stop cooking action and drain. Mix the remaining items together except egg yolk. Pour over asparagus. Add chopped egg yolk over top and serve.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 graham cracker crust (recipe included)
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 c. sugar
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 (16 oz.) sour cream
3 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Press graham cracker crust mixture into a 10-inch spring-form pan; set aside.
Beat cream cheese at high speed of electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Gradually add 1 cup sugar, beating well. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Stir in 1/2 teaspoon vanilla.
Pour into prepared pan.
Bake at 375° for 35 minutes or until set.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: A Perfect Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1/2 c. melted butter
2 T. sugar
2 lbs. cream cheese, softened
1 c. minus 2 T. sugar
1 t. vanilla
2 eggs, lightly beaten
2 T. cornstarch
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Crust: Combine graham cracker crumbs and 2 tablespoons sugar. Add melted butter. Mix well. Pat into spring form pan.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Perfect No Bake Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 envelope Knox gelatine
1/4 c. cold milk
1 c. milk, heated
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla, almond extract or lemon juice
1 pkg. chocolate chips, caramel or peanut butter chips
1 large prepared 9-inch graham cracker crust
Directions:
In blender, sprinkle gelatine over cold milk; let stand 2 minutes.
Add hot milk; blend all until well mixed.
Add cream cheese that has been softened; beat until smooth.
Add sugar and vanilla; mix well.
In microwave, melt chocolate chips; spread over crust.
Pour filling over.
Chill at least 2 hours.
Decorate top with grated nuts, chips or whipped topping.
Serves 10.
Light and delicious!

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham crackers, crushed
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. melted butter
1/3 c. sugar
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
4 eggs
1 pt. sour cream
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix together the graham cracker crumbs, melted butter and 1/3 cup sugar.
Grease a spring-form pan.
Line the sides and the bottom with the graham cracker crust mixture, then refrigerate.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. graham cracker crumbs
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/4 c. sugar
5 pkg. (8-oz. each) cream cheese, softened
1 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
3 large eggs
1 container (8-oz.) sour cream
Directions:
Stir together first 3 ingredients.
Press crumb mixture into bottom and 1 1/2 inches up sides of a lightly greased 9-inch spring form pan.
Bake crust at 350° for 10 minutes.
Cool on a wire rack.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. bite-size asparagus or broccoli pieces
1 medium tomato, seeded and diced
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1 c. shredded Muenster cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
3 Tbsp. fresh basil
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook mushrooms, onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is tender, but not brown.
Stir in rice.
Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
In another saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer.
Slowly add 1 cup of broth to rice mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook and stir until liquid is absorbed.
Add 1 cup more broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed.
It should take 15 minutes.
Stir in tomato, carrot and remaining half cup broth. Cook until rice is slightly creamy and just tender, stirring constantly.
Stir in cheeses and basil.
If desired, garnish with tomato slices.
Serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients:
5 1/2 c. chicken stock or canned low-sodium broth
6 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, minced
1 1/2 c. Uncle Ben's rice (not Minute rice)
1/2 c. minced Italian parsley
2 oz. Asiago or Parmesan cheese, finely grated
salt and freshly ground pepper
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, bring the stock to a simmer over moderate heat.
Reduce the heat to very low and cover until ready to use.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 lb. boneless chicken breast, cut in 1 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. rice
1 medium carrot, chopped (1/3 c.)
1 small onion, chopped (1/4 c.)
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. frozen peas
Directions:
In large skillet, brown chicken pieces in butter; remove chicken.
In same skillet, brown rice, onion and carrot until rice is brown, stirring constantly.
Stir in broth, soup and pepper; bring to boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add peas and chicken; cover and simmer 5 more minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive oil
thyme to taste (optional)
rosemary to taste (optional)
soy sauce or Tabasco to taste
onions
potatoes
use your favorite veggies: turnips, broccoli, cauliflower, garlic, peppers, zucchini, summer squash, mushrooms)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Melt oil and butter in roasting pan large enough so that vegetables rest on bottom of pan.
Adjust oil and butter to amount of vegetables.
Using tongs, turn cut sides of longest cooking vegetables down to seal in juices (potatoes, onions, turnips).
Roast 15 minutes.
Toss once or twice.
Add medium cooking vegetables (broccoli, summer squash) and pour soy sauce (or other favorite sauce) to coat.
Roast 15 minutes.
Add mushrooms and any seasonings.
Toss lightly.
Roast 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with cornbread.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Homemade Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
leftover roast and gravy
2 cans mixed vegetables
1 large can tomato juice
1 small chopped onion
salt and pepper to taste
dash of Italian spices
Directions:
Cut leftover roast into bite sizes.
Place on top of stove in a large pan.
Add leftover gravy and other ingredients.
Bring to a boil, then turn burner to simmer and continue cooking for about 1 hour.
Serve hot!

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Mixed Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 large red skin potatoes, wedged (about 2 lb.)
3 large carrots, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
3 large parsnips, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
2 lb. onions, cut into wedges (large)
1 Tbsp. dried rosemary leaves
2 tsp. garlic powder
3 Tbsp. Fleischmann's margarine, melted
Directions:
In a large bowl, toss potatoes, carrots, parsnips and onions with rosemary and garlic.
Drizzle with margarine.
Arrange in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake at 450° for 40 to 45 minutes or until fork-tender, stirring constantly.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Leftover Roast Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. roast, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. onions, sliced thin
2 Tbsp. butter
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 c. milk
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
dash of pepper
3 c. cooked potatoes
Directions:
Brown beef and onion in butter.
Blend soup, milk, 3/4 cup cheese and pepper.
In 1 1/2-quart casserole alternate layers (starting with potatoes).
Sprinkle top with remaining 1/4 cup cheese.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes, uncovered.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
10 c. mixed vegetables, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces (try onions, carrots, potatoes, eggplant, mushrooms and zucchini)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. melted butter
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried or fresh rosemary
1 1/2 tsp. dried or 1 Tbsp. fresh marjoram
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Arrange the vegetables in a large oiled baking dish and toss in the oil, butter, garlic and herbs. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes.
Uncover and turn the vegetables with a large spoon.
Add salt and pepper and roast at 425° for approximately 30 minutes or until the carrots and potatoes are thoroughly cooked and the edges of the vegetables have browned.
Serves 5.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
2 large cucumbers
2 Tbsp. salad oil
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. diced tomatoes
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 chopped green onions
Directions:
Peel cucumbers, wash and slice very thin.
In a small container with lid combine salad oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Shake well.
Add tomatoes, sugar and onions.
Pour dressing over vegetables.
Toss well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. lime gelatin
3/4 c. hot water
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. prepared horseradish
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. cucumbers, drained and shredded (unpared)
1/4 c. finely sliced green onions
Directions:
Dissolve gelatin in hot water.
Add softened cheese, mayonnaise, horseradish and salt.
Beat with beater until smooth. Add lemon juice.
Chill until partially set.
Stir in cucumbers and onions.
Turn into a ring mold.
Chill until set.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. lime jello
3/4 c. boiling water
4 tsp. lemon juice (about 2 lemons)
1 tsp. finely chopped onion
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. chopped cucumber (not peeled)
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. finely chopped celery
Directions:
Dissolve gelatin in boiling water.
Add lemon juice and onion. Cool until almost set.
Blend in the sour cream, mayonnaise, cucumber, celery and salt.
Pour into mold; chill until set.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
2 medium cucumbers, quartered and sliced
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 c. chopped green peppers
1/2 c. chopped sweet onions
4 Tbsp. lime juice
4 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 tsp. dill weed
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, green peppers and onions. In a small bowl, mix together the lime juice, vinegar, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over cucumbers; toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for awhile before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. non-fat plain yogurt or reduced-fat sour cream
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh or 2 tsp. dried dill
1 clove garlic, crushed
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
2 small cucumbers, sliced 1/4-inch thick
dill sprig for garnish
Directions:
In large bowl, whisk together yogurt, dill, garlic, lemon juice and salt.
Add sliced cucumbers.
Toss gently to coat well. Cover and chill at least 30 minutes until ready to serve.
Toss gently just before serving.
Garnish with dill sprig.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Drops
Ingredients:
2 1/2 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. granulated sugar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1 egg
3/4 c. cooked sieved pumpkin or 5 oz. canned
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
3/4 c. whole wheat flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
In mixing bowl, cream shortening with sugars.
Beat in eggs, pumpkin and vanilla.
Sift the flour, baking soda and spices into a bowl; pour any bran remaining in sifter.
Add the flour mixture to the pumpkin batter and stir in raisins.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased baking sheets.
Bake in 375° oven 12 to 15 minutes. Cool and serve.
Each of the 36 cookies has 1 gram of fat and 37 calories.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Almond Scones Cafe Latte
Ingredients:
4 large eggs
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
2 tsp. almond extract
4 c. all-purpose flour
4 tsp. double-acting baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. + 2 Tbsp. sugar
2 sticks (1 c.) cold unsalted butter, cut into bits
2 c. sliced blanched almonds
1 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
In a bowl, whisk together 3 of the eggs, the buttermilk and almond extract.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Spicy Pumpkin Squares
Ingredients:
1 (18 1/4 oz.) pkg. spice cake mix
1 1/4 c. quick-cooking oats
1/2 c. margarine (soft)
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
3 eggs, divided
1/4 c. chopped nuts
1 (16 oz.) can pumpkin
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. salt
whipped cream or ice cream (for topping)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In large bowl, beat cake mix, oats, margarine, sugar and 1 egg until crumbly.
Reserving 2 cups crumb mixture, press remainder firmly on bottom of 13 x 9-inch baking dish; bake 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Steamed Pumpkin Pudding
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. each: salt, soda, cinnamon, ginger and cloves
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. brown sugar, packed
2 eggs
1/4 c. soured milk
1/2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
Directions:
Measure flour by dip-level-pour method or by sifting.
Blend flour, baking powder, salt, soda and spices.
Cream shortening and sugar.
Add eggs; beat well.
Add flour mixture alternately with sour milk and pumpkin.
Pour into greased 1 1/2-quart mold.
Steam 1 3/4 hours.
Cool a few minutes; loosen from sides of mold. Remove from mold.
Serve warm.
Makes about 10 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
2/3 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 to 1 tsp. ground cloves
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In
mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the pumpkin, orange juice, molasses and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Add to the creamed mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into two greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3 loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans onto wire racks.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 lb. beef, sliced in strips
1 red pepper
1 green pepper
1 large onion
8 flour tortillas
Directions:
Combine garlic, seasoned salt, cumin, chili powder, crushed red pepper, vegetable oil, lemon juice and cornstarch.
Add beef and marinate for 2 hours.
Chop onion and peppers.
Stir-fry beef until thoroughly cooked; remove from pan.
Stir-fry peppers and onions.
Re-add beef to heat up.
Place tortilla on plate; cover with damp paper towel.
Microwave for 30 to 45 seconds.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 sweet red pepper, chopped
4 (10-inch) flour tortillas
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1 onion, cut in strips
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. salsa
1 small zucchini, thinly sliced
2/3 c. low-fat sour cream
Directions:
In nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat; cook onion, garlic, chili powder, salt and pepper, stirring often, for 5 minutes or until onion is softened.
Add beef and salsa; cook, breaking up beef with back of spoon, for about 3 minutes or until beef is no longer pink.
Add peppers and zucchini; cook, stirring for 3 minutes or until tender-crisp and liquid has evaporated.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean top round steak
1 Tbsp. salad oil
2 cloves garlic, minced or pressed
1 large onion
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1 large red bell pepper, seeded and cut into thin strips
2 tsp. ground cumin
3 Tbsp. lime juice
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 lb. Roma tomatoes, diced
Directions:
Cut beef into strips and set aside.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over high heat; add meat and stir-fry until browned. Transfer meat to a bowl.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
3 lb. tri-tip or bottom sirloin beef
1/3 c. margarine
2 medium sized onions, cut into 1/4-inch slices
2 medium sized green peppers, cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 Tbsp. seasoning salt
8 medium tomatoes, cut into wedges
lemon wedges to garnish
Directions:
Place meat in shallow pan.
Pour marinade over and refrigerate 3 hours.
Remove meat from marinade and cut into 1/2 x 3-inch strips.
Melt margarine in 1 large skillet.
Add onions, peppers and seasoning salt; saute until tender.
Place meat into large cast-iron skillet and sear over medium heat until browned.
Add vegetables.
Place tomatoes over both meat and vegetables.
Garnish with lemon wedges.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
2 lb. skirt steak, trimmed
2 medium onions, cut into rings
2 medium green peppers, cut into strips
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 can Dr. Pepper
1 Tbsp. salt
1 clove garlic, crushed
6 oz. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. oil (vegetable)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except steak and garlic.
Rub steak with garlic, then add to marinade mixture.
Let set, covered, for 1 hour.
Drain steak and grill with high heat.
Cook, turning meat every 30 seconds until medium rare.
Remove and set aside.
Grill onions and peppers with 1 tablespoon oil in large frying pan until slightly tender.
Slice steak into 1/2-inch strips across the grain.
Add to onions and peppers; cook for 5 minutes more adding 1/4 cup of marinade to decarmelize pan.
Serve with hot flour tortillas, cheese, lettuce, diced tomato, sour cream and salsa.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Sauce For Broccoli
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. margarine
5 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. m.s.g.
3 dashes hot pepper sauce
3 1/2 c. milk
2 chicken bouillon cubes
5 egg yolks, beaten
1 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese
1 can sliced mushrooms
slivered almonds
paprika
1/4 c. minced onion
Directions:
Saute onion in margarine until tender.
Blend in flour and seasonings.
Add milk and bouillon cubes.
Stir over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Add a little of the heated sauce to eggs.
Stir this into rest of sauce.
Add cheese; stir until melted.
Add mushrooms; pour over broccoli in a casserole.
Sprinkle with almonds and paprika.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes, until brown.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-N-Cheese
Ingredients:
3/4 c. onion
3/4 c. celery
2 c. cooked Minute rice
1 c. water
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
4 boxes cooked broccoli spears
1 (16 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz, room temperature
1 stick margarine
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
cooked, cut up chicken (optional)
bacon bits (optional)
Directions:
Separately, cook rice and broccoli as directed on boxes.
Chop onion and celery.
Drain water from broccoli, yielding 1 cup.
In large pot (broccoli should be cooked in), add all ingredients. Use the 1 cup water that was yielded from the cooked broccoli. Mix well.
Bake for 1 hour, uncovered, at 350°.
Top with Cheddar cheese and bacon bits.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Broccoli
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen broccoli (chopped)
1/2 c. chopped onion
6 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. water
salt to taste
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
3 eggs, well beaten
1 stack Ritz crackers, crushed into crumbs
Directions:
Thaw broccoli and drain well.
Saute onion in 4 tablespoons of margarine.
Stir in flour.
Add water; cook over low heat until mixture thickens.
Add salt.
Blend in cheese.
Combine sauce and broccoli and eggs and mix gently until blended.
Turn into greased casserole.
Top with cracker crumbs.
Dot with remaining margarine.
Bake at 350° for 1/2 hour.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Broccoli Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. onion, finely diced
1/2 c. celery, finely diced
1/2 c. carrots, finely diced
1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1 qt. chicken stock (can use bouillon cubes)
1 qt. milk
1/8 tsp. soda
1 c. processed Cheddar cheese, grated (Velveeta)
salt and pepper
Directions:
Melt butter in bottom of soup pot.
Add onion, carrots and celery; saute over low heat until soft. Add flour and cornstarch, cooking until bubbly.
Add stock with milk and make a smooth sauce.
Next add the soda and cheese.
Cook until cheese is melted, adding salt and pepper to taste.
Add parsley a few minutes before serving.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Cheese Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 stick butter
2 tsp. flour
2/3 c. milk
1/2 to 3/4 c. Velveeta cheese (chunk)
Directions:
Cook on low heat.
Melt butter; stir in flour.
Add milk; stir well.
Add cheese, a small amount at a time.
Stir constantly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili(Diet)
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
3 cloves garlic
1 c. water
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can red kidney beans
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans
1 c. diced green pepper
1/4 c. nonfat sour cream
Directions:
Spray pot with cooking spray.
Place over medium heat until hot.
Add onion and garlic; saute 5 minutes.
Add water and next 7 ingredients.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, 30 minutes.
Serve with some sour cream on top.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/4 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. each: dried basil leaves, oregano leaves and ground cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
1 c. diced carrots
2 lb. tomatoes, cut in eighths or 2 cans (undrained)
1 can chickpeas, drained
1 can kidney beans (undrained)
Directions:
In a 5-quart saucepot, heat oil over medium heat.
Add next 6 ingredients.
Cook, stirring 5 minutes, or until onion is tender. Add zucchini and carrots.
Cook, stirring for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 to 35 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.
Freezes well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili For 4
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. carrots, chopped
1 c. green pepper, chopped
1/2 c. sesame seed
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder or to taste
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
2 c. tomatoes, chopped
4 c. kidney beans (cooked or canned)
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 can water
Directions:
In large, heavy skillet saute the first 5 ingredients in olive oil.
Cook until vegetables are almost tender.
Add sesame seed and saute lightly.
Add all remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook over medium-low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Sometimes I cook this in my crock-pot.
After sauteing the vegetables and sesame seed I just transfer to the crock-pot, add everything else and cook at low for 3 to 4 hours.
Make sure you rinse the kidney beans before adding to the vegetables.
I also add extra beans to stretch, if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/4 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
1 c. diced carrots
2 lb. ripe tomatoes, cut into eighths
1 (16 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
Directions:
In a large saucepot, heat vegetables and oil over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, chili powder, basil, oregano and cumin.
Cook, stirring until onion is tender.
Add zucchini and carrots, cook stirring 1 or 2 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, chickpeas and kidney beans.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes to 35 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Chili(Meatless)
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. green pepper, chopped
4 c. water, divided
1 can (15 to 16 oz.) Great Northern beans, rinsed and drained
1 can (15 oz.) navy beans, rinsed and drained
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can diced tomatoes
2 to 4 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large saucepan, cook the onion and green pepper in 1/2 cup water until tender.
Add beans, tomato paste and tomatoes.
Stir in chili powder, salt, pepper and remaining water; bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 lb. ground pork
1 c. Parmesan cheese
1 c. milk
1 egg
1 c. soft bread crumbs
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 clove minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except butter and mix well.
Shape meat into balls.
Melt butter in large frying pan.
Brown slowly in butter over low heat.
Place meatballs in hot cooked sauce. Cover and cook an additional 30 minutes.
Serve over spaghetti.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. minced fresh garlic
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 thin slices bread
1/4 c. water
1 lb. ground beef or ground round
1 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet (nonstick), brown onion and garlic in oil over moderately high heat for 2 minutes.
Remove from heat. Combine bread and mix with water in a large bowl.
Add beef, onion and garlic (don't wash skillet), parsley, salt, pepper, oregano and Parmesan cheese.
Stir in eggs and mix with a wooden spoon until well blended.
Shape into meatballs.
Brown on all sides in skillet onion was cooked in, about 15 minutes.
Then place in spaghetti sauce and simmer.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. milk
2 lb. ground beef
1/2 lb. ground pork
2 eggs
1 c. Quick oats
1/3 c. Parmesan or Romano cheese
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. dry basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine milk and bread and let soak, then add all remaining ingredients.
Mix well.
Shape into 1 1/2-inch balls.
Place in baking pan.
Bake in a 400° oven for 30 minutes.
Drain, then add sauce and cook 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Sophisticated Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/3 c. dry bread crumbs
1/3 c. milk
1 egg
2 Tbsp. onion, minced
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 can mushroom soup
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese, cubed
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients thoroughly.
Shape into small balls and brown.
Remove balls from skillet.
Pour off drippings and stir in remaining ingredients.
Mix until well blended and heat.
Serve meatballs over a platter of hot noodles.
Pour sauce on top.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry onion soup mix
2 c. water
2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. dried thyme leaves
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1 tsp. dried parsley leaves
1 1/2 lb. ground round
Directions:
Mix onion soup mix and water in saucepan; simmer 5 minutes. Pour 2 tablespoons of the tomato sauce into a cup; add garlic salt, thyme, pepper, oregano and parsley.
Mix well.
Add herb mixture to ground round and mix until blended.
Add remaining tomato sauce to onion soup mixture.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 egg
4 c. plain flour
Directions:
Scald milk; stir in sugar, salt and butter so that the sugar is dissolved and the butter melts.
Cool to lukewarm.
Dissolve the yeast in 1/4 cup of water and add to the milk mixture.
Add 1/2 of the flour and the egg and beat by hand until smooth.
Add the rest of the flour which makes a fairly stiff batter.
Cover tightly and cool for 3 hours.
Using 1/2 of the dough, knead it several times and roll to an oval shape.
Spread the top with softened butter (you choose amount) and sprinkle a mixture of cinnamon and sugar on top of the butter.
Roll up jelly roll style and cut into 1/2-inch slices.
Place in a greased pan and allow to rise for an hour or so.
(At this point, they may be cooked or placed in the refrigerator until needed.)
Place rolls into a cold oven when ready to be baked.
Turn oven to 350° and cook until lightly browned (about 30 minutes).
Top with a simple powdered sugar icing.
Because this dough contains an egg, use the dough within 3 days.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. shortening
1 Tbsp. salt
4 eggs, beaten
3 1/2 Tbsp. yeast, dissolved in 1 3/4 c. warm water
butter, softened
cinnamon sugar
1/3 c. sugar
1 3/4 c. boiling water
9 c. flour
Directions:
Combine shortening, sugar, salt and boiling water.
Beat eggs and add to first mixture.
Dissolve yeast in warm water and add. Add flour and mix well.
Place in refrigerator to chill.
Remove dough from refrigerator and roll to 1/4-inch thickness.
Spread with butter and then with cinnamon sugar.
Roll into a long roll; cut into rolls 1-inch thick.
Put in buttered pan and mash down lightly.
Put back in refrigerator until needed.
Turn oven and set temperature to 400°.
Put rolls into cold oven and bake until done.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 c. warm water
1 1/2 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 (3 oz.) pkg. vanilla pudding
2 c. milk
1/2 c. oil
2 large eggs
8 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix everything except cinnamon and brown sugar; let rise for 1 hour.
Roll out.
Mix brown sugar and cinnamon; sprinkle on top.
Roll up tightly, then cut about 1 1/2-inch apart.
Bake for 10 to 15 minutes.
For icing, just buy plain vanilla cake icing.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/4 c. warm water
1/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. shortening
1 tsp. salt
1 c. hot milk
1 beaten egg
4 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 tablespoon sugar to hot milk.
Add sugar, salt and shortening; cool.
Add egg, yeast and flour.
Let rise until double in bulk.
Roll out 1/4-inch thick. Spread warm butter; sprinkle sugar and cinnamon.
Roll up and cut in 1-inch pieces.
Put in deep loaf pan and let rise.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Berta'S Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
3 pkg. active dry yeast
5 to 6 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. shortening
3 eggs
3 1/2 c. warm water
3 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. sugar
raisins
walnuts (optional)
icing
Directions:
Mix yeast with 1/2 cup warm water; set aside.
Combine 4 cups of flour, salt, shortening, 1 1/2 cups sugar and eggs with warm water.
Add yeast mixture.
Turn out onto floured surface, kneading in remaining flour.
Knead dough for 10 minutes.
Shape into ball in greased bowl.
Cover; let rise 1 hour.
Roll out on floured surface into big circle.
Pour melted margarine onto dough.
Mix sugar and cinnamon together and sprinkle.
Roll dough into a log shape; slice 1 to 1 1/2 inches thick.
Bake in a 375° oven for 35 to 45 minutes.
Yields 3 dozen rolls.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower-Pasta-Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. potatoes, cubed
1 large onion, cut into thin strips
2 tsp. minced garlic
3 c. cauliflower florets
16 oz. can tomatoes, chopped
8 oz. pasta (shells, bowties, etc.)
1 c. chickpeas
4 c. chicken broth
4 c. water
basil, oregano, salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil in 4-quart pot over medium heat.
Add potatoes, onion and garlic.
Cook 5 minutes.
Add cauliflower and cook 2 minutes. Add water, broth, tomatoes, chickpeas and seasonings.
Bring to a boil.
Add pasta.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1 can French-style beans, drained
1 can small green peas, drained
1 onion, sliced (cut in 1/2)
1 green pepper, sliced
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. celery seed
3/4 c. oil
Directions:
Boil sugar, salt, vinegar and celery seed until it foams. Then add 3/4 cup oil and mix.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower-Pea Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower, broken into small flowerets
1 box frozen peas, cooked and drained
1 c. chopped celery
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 c. mayonnaise
1 1/4 tsp. Hidden Valley Ranch mix
2 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
In large bowl, combine cauliflower, peas, celery and onion. Mix mayonnaise, Ranch mix and milk and pour over vegetables. Better if made a day ahead.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Different Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine, softened
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. flour
1 c. whole wheat flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
1/2 c. salted sunflower kernels
1/4 c. sesame seed
Directions:
Cream butter.
Add sugar, beating until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla.
Beat well.
Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
Add to creamed mixture.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Best Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. solid shortening
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 1/3 c. granulated sugar
1 c. packed brown sugar
4 eggs
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 c. rolled oats
3 c. all-purpose flour
2 large (12 oz. each) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate baking pieces
2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, beat together on high speed the shortening, butter, granulated sugar and brown sugar until thoroughly combined, about 5 minutes.
Then beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in vanilla and lemon juice.
In a bowl, stir together baking soda, salt, cinnamon, oats and flour.
Beat dry ingredients into the creamed mixture until well combined; mix in chocolate pieces and nuts.
For each cookie, drop approximately 1/4 cup dough on lightly greased baking sheet 3 inches apart.
Bake at 350° for 16 to 18 minutes, or until golden brown.
Makes about 3 dozen cookies.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. softened butter
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Mix sugars, butter, eggs and vanilla until smooth.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Dr. Cookie'S Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. margarine
2/3 c. packed brown sugar
2/3 c. granulated sugar
2 large eggs
1/4 c. nonfat milk
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
3/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
Directions:
Coat 2 baking sheets with nonstick cooking spray.
Beat margarine and sugars with a mixer until smooth.
Add eggs; beat again.
Add milk and vanilla; beat again until smooth.
Add flour, baking soda and salt; beat until well mixed.
Add chocolate chips and stir.
Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls, 2 inches apart. Flatten with back of a spoon.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes, until light brown.
Cool on wire rack.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. butter
2 eggs
3/4 c. brown sugar, packed
3/4 c. granulated sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
2 1/4 c. flour
2 c. semi-sweet chocolate pieces
1 c. nuts or raisins
Directions:
Cream
together the butter, eggs and sugars until light and fluffy.
Sift together the baking powder, soda and flour. Stir into creamed mixture until well blended.
Fold in chocolate
and raisins
or
nuts.	Drop
by teaspoons onto greased baking	sheets and bake at 350° for 7 minutes or until lightly browned.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Fudge
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. peanut butter
2 cups quick-cooking oats
Directions:
Combine sugar and cocoa in a large sauce pan; add milk, stirring until smooth.
Add butter.
Place over high heat and bring to a boil.
Boil until smooth, about 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat.
Add peanut butter and stir until melted.
Add oats and mix well.
Drop mixture by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper and cool completely.
Makes about 3 1/2 dozen.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Oaties
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter
1/2 c. creamy or chunky peanut butter
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 c. granulated sugar
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. quick or old-fashioned uncooked rolled oats
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. chocolate chips
1 c. coconut or nuts (optional)
Directions:
Cream together butter, peanut butter and sugars.
Blend in egg and vanilla.
In another bowl, combine oats, flour and soda. Blend into creamed mixture thoroughly.
Stir in chocolate chips, nuts or coconut.
Shape into 1-inch balls.
Place on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 11 minutes or just until edges are golden brown.
Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet, then remove to cooling rack.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Delights
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
1 c. creamy peanut butter
3 c. quick cooking oats (uncooked)
Directions:
Combine the first 5 ingredients in a heavy saucepan; mix well. Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat; stir in peanut butter.
Add oats; mix well.
Quickly drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper.
Cool.
Makes about 5 1/2 dozen.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Bumps
Ingredients:
1/4 c. soft butter
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/2 c. brown sugar
2 c. rolled oats (regular or quick)
Directions:
In a medium bowl, mix all of the ingredients together.
Cover and chill in refrigerator for 15 minutes.
Roll into 1-inch balls and serve.
Makes 30 balls.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Peanut Butter Candy
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 stick margarine
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. peanut butter
3 c. quick oats
Directions:
Combine sugar, milk and margarine in saucepan; bring to boil. Cook 2 minutes, then remove from heat.
Stir in vanilla, peanut butter and oats.
Drop onto waxed paper.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Salad
Ingredients:
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite size pieces
1 pkg. Feta cheese, crumbled
1/2 c. seedless green grapes, halved
1/2 c. pine nuts, toasted
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 tsp. fresh cracked pepper
dash of salt
Directions:
Toss first four ingredients together.
Combine vinegar and seasonings, then slowly whisk in olive oil and add dressing to salad mixture.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. spaghetti
1/2 c. olive oil
1 egg, well beaten
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. well crumbled Feta cheese
1/4 tsp. black pepper
salt (if needed)
toasted pine nuts or slivered almonds (3 tsp., optional)
Directions:
Mix together oil, parsley, pepper, cheese and egg well in large bowl.
Cook pasta (spaghetti) and drain.
Add to bowl while hot and toss well
to coat spaghetti or mix into spaghetti while tossing.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Medley Salad
Ingredients:
6 c. cooked instant white rice, chilled
1 c. olives
12 1/2 oz. can white tuna, chilled
4 strips cooked bacon, crumbled
1/2 c. radishes
2 c. green and red bell peppers
1 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. green onions, chopped
1 c. frozen green peas
1 large bottle your favorite Italian salad dressing
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
crisp salad greens
tomatoes
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except salad greens.
Cover tightly and refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Serve over salad greens. I never use the radishes, bell peppers and tomatoes.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1/2 c. chopped fresh basil
2 Tbsp. green onion
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
12 oz. rotelle pasta, cooked and drained
1 each: small red, green and yellow bell pepper, sliced crosswise
1 medium size tomato
1/4 c. pitted black olives
8 oz. Mozzarella, cubed
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
Process oil, vinegar, 2 tablespoons basil, green onion, Parmesan, salt and pepper in blender or food processor until smooth.
Put pasta, bell pepper strips, tomato wedges, nuts and olives in large bowl.
Pour in dressing; toss to mix.
Roll cheese cubes in remaining 2 tablespoons basil to coat.
Add to salad; sprinkle with oregano.
Toss lightly.
Serve at room temperature. Makes 4 main dish servings.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (Tyson)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 tsp. black pepper (ground)
1 tsp. basil
3 Tbsp. capers
1/2 celery, chopped
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes, cut into strips
1 c. cheese (Mozzarella)
1/4 c. olives (black), sliced
4 loaves French bread (mini loaves)
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil chicken and cut into bite-size pieces.
In bowl, mix together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Tabasco, black pepper and basil. Mix in chicken, capers, celery, tomatoes, cheese and olives. Slice top off mini loaves lengthwise and hollow to form boats. Brush with melted butter, garlic and parsley.
Broil until golden and toasty.
Fill with salad mixture; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fresh Fruit Crumble
Ingredients:
6 c. fresh pears, pared, cored and sliced
1/3 c. Mrs. Butterworth's syrup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 c. uncooked oatmeal
1/2 c. margarine or 1/2 c. plain yogurt
1 tsp. lemon peel
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine pear slices, syrup, lemon juice and peel and cinnamon.
Mix well.
Put in 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Stir together flour, oatmeal and nutmeg.
With a pastry cutter, cut in margarine until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle over pears.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes or until pears are tender.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fruit Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. quick rolled oats
1 1/2 sticks melted margarine
1 can pie filling
1/2 tsp. soda
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except fruit.
Spread half of mixture in bottom of 8 x 8-inch pan.
Cover with fruit and top with remaining mixture.
Bake at 350°
for 40 minutes.
Can be served with ice cream or whipped cream.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fruit Crumble
Ingredients:
1 (21 oz.) can cherry, apple or blueberry pie filling
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
2/3 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
6 Tbsp. flour
6 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
In an 8 x 1 1/2-inch round microwave-safe baking dish, stir together fruit pie filling, lemon juice and cinnamon.
In a mixing bowl, stir together rolled oats, brown sugar and flour.
Stir in melted margarine until well combined.
Sprinkle oat mixture on top of fruit mixture.
Microwave, uncovered, for 12 to 14 minutes, giving the dish a turn once.
Serve warm.
Top with ice cream.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Raspberry Crumble
Ingredients:
3 Granny Smith apples, peeled and sliced
juice of 1 lemon
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen raspberries
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. unsalted butter
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Arrange apples in buttered 8 x 8-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with lemon juice.
Drain raspberries.
Sprinkle over apples.
Mix flour and sugar in bowl.
Cut in butter until crumbly.
Add nutmeg.
Sprinkle over fruit.
Bake at 375° for 25 minutes.
Serve with whipped cream.
Yield:
4 servings.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Twenty-Four Hour Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. halved green grapes
2 c. halved dark grapes
2 c. diced pineapple
2 c. orange sections
1 1/2 c. maraschino cherries, cut in half
2 sliced bananas
2 c. miniature marshmallows
1 1/2 c. broken pecans
2 eggs, slightly beaten
4 Tbsp. sugar
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cook in a double boiler.
When cool, add 1 cup whipping cream, whipped until soft peaks form.
Add to cooled custard.
Gently fold into fruit mixture.
Cover and chill 24 hours or overnight.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 c. coarsely chopped onions
1/2 c. sliced carrot
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
4 c. Italian tomatoes (plum Roma)
salt and pepper to taste
4 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. dried oregano
1 Tbsp. fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
Directions:
Tips:
Use more carrots (makes sweeter) or garlic or oregano if you like more herbs; whatever you desire, it's always good.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 garlic cloves (or instant)
2 c. finely chopped onions (or instant)
3 1/2 c. Italian plum tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
2 c. tomato puree (one 15 oz. can)
1 1/2 c. tomato paste (one 12 oz. can)
1/2 c. water or meat stock or wine
1 tsp. each: dried basil and oregano
1/2 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. salt
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the garlic and onions.
Cook, stirring until the onions are light brown.
Add the tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, water and seasonings. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Leftover sauce may be frozen.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 to 3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 white onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1 lb. mushrooms, chopped
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 to 3 tomatoes, chopped
2 tsp. basil
1 handful fresh basil leaves, chopped
1 (13 oz.) can tomatoes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. honey
3 tsp. black pepper
4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil in Dutch oven.
Add onion, bell pepper, celery, mushrooms, zucchini, fresh tomatoes, herbs and salt.
Saute over medium heat until onion is soft; add can of tomatoes, tomato paste, honey and black pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer partially covered for about 30 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 10 minutes. Add parsley last.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1 (28 oz.) can Italian tomatoes
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
4 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 clove garlic
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 Tbsp. olive oil
2/3 c. diced onion
1/2 c. dry white wine (optional)
Directions:
Put tomatoes with juice, tomato paste, parsley, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper in blender.
Blend until smooth.
Heat oil in 12-inch skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and saute 2 minutes.
Add tomato mixture and wine.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Yields 4 cups.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced
3 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 can (28 oz.) whole tomatoes
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add parsley and onion.
Slowly add tomatoes.
Stir to break up tomatoes.
Add bay leaf, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer on low about 15 minutes.
Serve over pasta dishes or with rice.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms (white)
1 can Carnation milk
1 stick butter
1/2 c. flour
pinch of garlic powder
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash and slice mushrooms; set aside.
Melt butter over low heat, then add mushrooms, sauteing them until they are slightly brown.
Add flour; stir as you add, then slowly pour in canned milk.
Stir until you get the consistency you like.
Add garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Makes a great sauce over veggies, pasta, chicken or fish.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
