Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 Egg Beater, beaten
1 (8 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (1 c.)
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.
Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in a small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beater.
Toss with fettuccine until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
2/3 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
In a small saucepan, cook onion in butter until tender, but not browned.
Stir in flour.
Drain mushrooms.
Stir in mushrooms, milk, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes more.
Stir in sour cream; heat through.
Serve with poultry, beef, pork or burgers.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Skillet
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. hot water
1 c. cooked shrimp
1 c. French-style green beans
1/2 c. celery
dash of pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 1/3 c. Minute rice
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Add rice to butter, onion, celery in skillet and saute until rice is golden brown.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil and then simmer uncovered 5 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
5 Tbsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 lb. shrimp, shelled and deveined
2 Tbsp. minced parsley
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
salt to taste
Directions:
In large skillet, heat butter and oil.
Fry the garlic, red pepper and
paprika
about
1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the shrimp and cook over medium heat until they turn pink. Stir constantly about 3 minutes.
Stir in parsley, lemon juice and salt.
Serve immediately.
Serve with bread for dipping.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Garlic
Ingredients:
1 pkg. (16-oz) uncooked linguine
1/2 c. olive oil
1 c. diced red bell pepper
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 tsp. crushed red pepper or more to taste
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Salt and black pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare linguine according to package directions; drain.
Heat oil in large skillet over medium heat.
Add bell pepper and garlic; cook 6 minutes or just until tender.
Add shrimp, lemon juice, crushed red pepper, salt and black pepper; cook 10 minutes or until shrimp is pink and opaque.
Sprinkle with parsley.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked linguine in large bowl and toss well.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
20 large shrimp, cleaned and shelled
1 tsp. fresh rosemary, chopped
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
1 tsp. fresh basil, chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/3 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add olive oil.
Saute onion and garlic in same skillet.
Add rosemary, basil, black pepper and shrimp.
Cook until shrimp loses transparency (do not overcook). Add salt to taste.
Add wine and cook until oil and wine become slightly thickened.
Sprinkle parsley over.
Serve with fresh Parmesan cheese and lemon wedge to garnish.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. crushed oregano
salt and pepper
lemon juice
1 lb. medium to large shrimp in shell
Directions:
Melt butter
in skillet with lid.
Add remaining ingredients, including shrimp in shells.
Toss well.
Set aside for 30 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Place over medium heat.
Stir and cover. Cook
for
5
minutes.
Shrimp
should
turn pink. Serve immediately over rice.
Serves 4.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced
3 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 can (28 oz.) whole tomatoes
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add parsley and onion.
Slowly add tomatoes.
Stir to break up tomatoes.
Add bay leaf, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer on low about 15 minutes.
Serve over pasta dishes or with rice.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 to 3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 white onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1 lb. mushrooms, chopped
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 to 3 tomatoes, chopped
2 tsp. basil
1 handful fresh basil leaves, chopped
1 (13 oz.) can tomatoes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. honey
3 tsp. black pepper
4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil in Dutch oven.
Add onion, bell pepper, celery, mushrooms, zucchini, fresh tomatoes, herbs and salt.
Saute over medium heat until onion is soft; add can of tomatoes, tomato paste, honey and black pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer partially covered for about 30 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 10 minutes. Add parsley last.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 garlic cloves (or instant)
2 c. finely chopped onions (or instant)
3 1/2 c. Italian plum tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
2 c. tomato puree (one 15 oz. can)
1 1/2 c. tomato paste (one 12 oz. can)
1/2 c. water or meat stock or wine
1 tsp. each: dried basil and oregano
1/2 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. salt
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the garlic and onions.
Cook, stirring until the onions are light brown.
Add the tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, water and seasonings. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Leftover sauce may be frozen.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 c. coarsely chopped onions
1/2 c. sliced carrot
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
4 c. Italian tomatoes (plum Roma)
salt and pepper to taste
4 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. dried oregano
1 Tbsp. fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
Directions:
Tips:
Use more carrots (makes sweeter) or garlic or oregano if you like more herbs; whatever you desire, it's always good.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 crushed garlic clove
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 3/4 c. whole peeled tomatoes and juice (14 1/2 oz. can)
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 lb. raw pasta
Directions:
Saute onion and garlic in oil.
Cut up tomatoes; add tomatoes and juice, tomato sauce, salt, basil and oregano.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat and cook, uncovered, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes.
Cook pasta according to label directions.
Drain.
Pour sauce over hot cooked pasta.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Creamy Rice Pudding
Ingredients:
1 qt. milk
1/2 c. rice
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
cinnamon
sugar
Directions:
Heat milk, rice and sugar and cook until tender.
Stir 2 or 3 times while cooking.
Take off burner and add beaten eggs.
Stir until thickened (do not cook).
If too thick, thin with a little heavy cream or milk.
Sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Tropical Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. coconut milk
1 1/2 c. uncooked long grain white rice
1/2-inch piece fresh ginger
1/2 c. pineapple tidbits
1/2 c. shredded coconut, toasted
1 1/2 Tbsp. cilantro (fresh), minced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red bell pepper, minced
1/2 c. red onion, minced
1/2 c. chopped toasted cashews
Directions:
Bring water and coconut milk to boil. Stir in rice and ginger. Cover. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed. Transfer to bowl. Remove ginger. Add pineapple, shredded coconut and cilantro to rice and stir to combine. Heat olive oil in saut pan. Add red bell pepper and onion and saut until softened. Add to rice. Last, add cashews to rice; stir well. Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Creamy Rice Pudding
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. rice
1 1/4 c. sugar
6 c. milk
2 c. water
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 c. milk
Directions:
Combine rice, sugar, 6 cups milk and water.
Bring to a boil. Cook 1 hour, covered, over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Mix together the eggs, vanilla and 2 cups milk.
Add to the heated rice mixture and heat an additional 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Moist 'N Creamy Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
1 pkg. (2 layer size) yellow cake mix
1 1/2 c. milk
2 c. coconut
1 1/2 c. or 8 oz. Cool Whip
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Prepare cake mix as directed on package.
Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Cool for 15 minutes.
When cool, make holes through cake. Combine milk, sugar and 1/2 cup coconut in saucepan.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for three minutes.
Carefully spoon over warm cake allowing liquid to soak down through holes.
Let cool.
Fold 1/2 cup coconut into Cool Whip and spread over the cake.
Sprinkle the rest of the coconut over the cake.
Chill overnight.
Store leftover cake in the refrigerator.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 lean pork chops (about 1-inch thick)
1 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
2/3 c. dry sherry
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except pork chops.
Mix well.
Place chops in shallow dish.
Pour marinade over chops.
Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning meat occasionally.
Remove pork chops from marinade and place on rack of broiling pan.
Broil 10 to 12 minutes on each side or until done, turning and basting once with marinade.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Grill Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large sweet pepper, cut in strips
2 small zucchini, julienned
2 small yellow summer squash, julienned
1 tsp. fresh thyme or 1 tsp. dried
1 tsp. fresh oregano or 1/2 tsp. dried
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
In a medium bowl, toss the red pepper, zucchini and squash with thyme, oregano and black pepper.
Drizzle 1 teaspoon of oil over vegetables and toss well.
Spread vegetables in a single layer on rack.
Cook vegetables 8 inches from heat until golden brown on both sides (3 to 4 minutes each side).
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herb Grilled Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. onion powder
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. basil leaves, crumbled
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground black pepper
1 medium-sized eggplant, cut in 1/2-inch slices
2 medium zucchini, cut in half, lengthwise
2 medium tomatoes, cut in 1/2, crosswise*
Directions:
*Italian Roma tomatoes also work well; split in half lengthwise.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops With Herbs
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
2 onions, sliced
1 can cream of celery soup
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried oregano
snipped parsley
Directions:
Brown chops in heavy skillet.
In same skillet, saute onions until golden.
Combine soup, milk, thyme, poultry seasoning, oregano, water and salt.
Remove chops and onions to baking dish. Cover with remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 1/2 hours in covered pan at 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Grilled Pork Chops
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
2 chopped garlic cloves
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Mix oil with garlic, soy sauce and lemon juice; set aside. Score meat on both sides; baste with lemon mixture and place on grill.
Partially cover and cook 8 to 10 minutes on each side. Turn 3 to 4 times; baste occasionally.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Cold Water Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
4 big Tbsp. cocoa
2 Tbsp. vinegar
6 Tbsp. oil
1 c. cold water
Directions:
Mix together and sift flour, sugar, baking soda, salt and cocoa three times.
Make 3 holes in dry ingredients.
In 1 hole, put 1 tablespoon vinegar.
In second hole, put the 6 tablespoons of oil. In third hole, put 1 tablespoon vinegar.
Put cold water over mixture.
Mix. Put in 8 x 8* pan.
Bake at 375° until done.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c. shortening
2 c. sugar
3 eggs
3 heaping Tbsp. cocoa
2 c. buttermilk
3 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 level tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cream shortening and sugar.
Add eggs; beat well.
Sift flour, cocoa (or spices), soda, baking powder and salt together.
Add flour alternating with buttermilk.
Bake at 325° until done, 30 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake(By Cliffus Ferguson)
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. cocoa
1/3 c. water
1/4 c. butter
1/2 tsp. soda
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. sour milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 or 3 eggs
Directions:
Mix cocoa and water; stir until smooth.
Set aside.
Sift dry ingredients.
Beat eggs; add soft butter and cream well.
Add cocoa mixture and vanilla.
Add flour and sour milk gradually. Beat well.
Bake in two layers, about 350°, until brown.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Can Do Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 c. shortening
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
2/3 c. cocoa
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Grease and flour 2 round pans or 1 oblong pan.
In large bowl, combine all ingredients.
Beat on low speed 30 minutes, scraping sides and bottom of bowl.
Beat 3 minutes on medium speed, scraping bowl frequently.
Pour into prepared pans.
Bake at 350° until done.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cocoa
2 c. boiling water
1 c. margarine, softened
2 1/2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Combine cocoa and boiling water, stirring until smooth; set aside.
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well with electric mixer at medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Combine flour, soda, baking powder and salt in medium bowl; add to creamed mixture alternately with cocoa mixture, beating with electric mixer at low speed, beginning and ending with flour mixture.
Stir in vanilla.
Do not overbeat. Pour batter into greased and floured pans (use three 9-inch round pans or one 9 x 13-inch pan).
Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes; test center of cake with toothpick.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes; remove from pans and cool completely on wire racks before frosting.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Microwave Corn On The Cob
Ingredients:
1 to 8 ears corn
Directions:
Corn may be husked before cooking.
Wrap in waxed paper or place in a covered glass dish and cook.
Rotate dish one-quarter turn through cooking time.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Fried Corn-On-The-Cob
Ingredients:
8 to 10 ears corn
Directions:
Ears of corn have been cleaned and silked.
Break ears into two pieces.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Herbed Corn On Cob
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 Tbsp. chives
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 tsp. Salad Supreme seasoning
8 hot cooked ears corn
Directions:
Combine butter and seasoning. Spread over corn. Yields 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Corn-On-The-Cob
Ingredients:
4 ears cooked corn
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Place vinegar and sugar in pan of cold water (enough to cover corn).
Bring to boil.
Add sweet corn.
Simmer until heated through.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Corn-On-Cob(Microwave)
Ingredients:
6 ears tender corn
2 Tbsp. water
butter or margarine
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place all ingredients in large baking dish.
Cover with wax paper, or plastic wrap.
Microwave 8 to 10 minutes.
Turn corn over after 5 minutes and test for doneness.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Lemon Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp
2 egg yolks
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, finely chopped
2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed
2 tsp. chives, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper or 1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Clean, peel and devein shrimp and set aside.
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add next 8 ingredients to bowl and top with cover.
Process for 30 seconds or until well mixed.
With processor running, add butter through food chute; process 1 minute or until sauce is thickened.
Set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet to 375°.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Drain shrimp and dredge in flour mixture.
Fry shrimp in hot oil until golden brown.
Turn once; drain.
Arrange shrimp in 4 or 5 individual baking dishes and top with sauce.
Broil shrimp 30 to 45 seconds. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Butter
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 stick butter, softened
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 small grated onion or 1 tsp. onion flakes
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 can small shrimp, drained and rinsed
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Beat all ingredients together except shrimp.
Add shrimp and mix.
Refrigerate.
Spread on crackers of choice.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Butter
Ingredients:
2 (5 oz.) cans small shrimp
1 Tbsp. minced onion
juice of 1 lemon
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 1/2 sticks real butter
1 large pkg. cream cheese
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients with mixer, after previously softening cheese and butter.
Serve with crackers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
8 oz. thin spaghetti
4 Tbsp. toasted sesame oil
6 green onions, finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dried hot pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 c. finely chopped salted dry peanuts
1/3 c. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Drain.
Rinse in cold water and toss with 2 tablespoons sesame oil.
Set aside.
Place remaining sesame oil in large heated frying pan.
Add green onions, garlic and pepper flakes.
Stir over medium heat until onions have softened, 2 minutes.
Add spaghetti, vinegar, sugar and soy sauce.
Heat mixture, tossing to combine for 3 or 4 minutes.
Stir in peanuts and cilantro.
Add salt to taste. Transfer to serving bowl.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Thai Noodles With Spicy Peanut Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. linguine
1 sweet red pepper
2 carrots
1 bunch of scallions, diced, for garnish
sesame seeds for garnish
Directions:
Cook linguine.	Rinse, drain and toss with olive oil.
Cut veggies into matchsticks or dice. Toss sauce with noodles and vegetables.
Garnish with scallions and sesame seeds.
Can be served hot or cold.
(If serving hot, blanch veggies).

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. creamy peanut butter
2 Tbsp. hot water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
Directions:
In medium bowl with wire whisk or fork, beat peanut butter with water until smooth.
Stir in vinegar and next 4 ingredients until blended.
Add cooked and drained pasta; toss gently to coat well. Serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Beef With Buckwheat Noodles In Spicy Peanut Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. flank steak
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut oil
1/2 lb. Chinese buckwheat noodles
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. crushed hot red pepper
2 Tbsp. Asian sesame oil
2 garlic cloves, minced
4 scallions, chopped
1/4 c. toasted sesame seed
Directions:
Cut steak across grain on diagonal into thin strips.
In a wok, heat oil over hig heat until hot, swirling to coat sides of pan.
Add steak and stir-fry until meat loses its red color, 2 to 3 minutes. Remove to plate.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: "Make Ahead" Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
9 large baking potatoes, peeled and cut in chunks
1/2 c. butter/oleo, softened
12 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
pinch of ground nutmeg
Directions:
Place potatoes in a large pot. Cover with water and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer over medium heat until potatoes are tender. Drain.
Put potatoes in mixing bowl.
Beat with mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in butter and cream cheese (which have been cut in small chunks).
Beat in sour cream, nutmeg, salt and pepper.
Transfer mixture to a heavily buttered casserole dish. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate.
Before serving, bring to room temperature, then bake, uncovered, in preheated 350° oven for 20 to 30 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.
May be fixed 2 to 3 days ahead.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Creamed Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. yellow Finn or long white potatoes, washed and peeled
1/2 c. (1 stick) unsalted butter, cut into pieces
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, cut into pieces
1/4 c. heavy cream
salt and freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cut potatoes in quarters. Place in a large stockpot with water to cover. Boil over high heat uncovered for 30 minutes or until soft. Drain and mash with potato masher or pass through a food mill. While hot, add butter, cream cheese, heavy cream and salt and pepper to taste. Whip until smooth with a wooden spoon.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
10 medium potatoes
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 c. (8 oz.) sour cream
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 1/2 tsp. chopped chives
1/2 to 1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika
Directions:
Boil potatoes until soft.
Mix with remaining ingredients. Place in serving bowl and top with paprika.
These may be made ahead and refrigerated or frozen until serving.
Reheat extremely well in oven or microwave.
Great time saver on holidays.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes (8 large)
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
2 c. sour cream
1 tsp. onion salt (optional)
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Cook peeled potatoes in boiling water until tender; drain. Add cream cheese, sour cream, onion salt, salt and pepper.
Beat until light and fluffy; cool.
Cover; place in refrigerator (will keep several days).

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs, well beaten
3 bananas, mashed
8 Tbsp. cold water
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
2 c. flour
3/4 c. nuts
Directions:
Following is both basic dough and feeding.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Nut Bread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
2/3 c. sugar
1/3 c. shortening
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. milk
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Stir together flour, baking powder, soda and 3/4 teaspoon salt.
Set aside.
In a mixer bowl, beat sugar and shortening with electric mixer until light, scraping sides of bowl often.
Add eggs, one at a time, and the milk, beating until smooth after each addition.
Add flour mixture and banana alternately to creamed mixture, beating until smooth after each addition.
Fold in nuts.
Turn batter into a lightly greased 8 x 4 x 2-inch loaf pan.
Bake in 350° oven for 60 to 65 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted near the center comes out clean.
Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pan; cool.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
4 very ripe bananas, mashed
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
4 whole eggs
1 stick butter or margarine
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 c. flour
Directions:
Slice bananas into a mixer bowl and beat well.
Add baking soda, salt and vanilla.
Beat well.
In a separate bowl, mix together butter, sugar and eggs.
Add flour, a little at a time, beating well after each addition.
Combine with banana mixture and beat well.
(Can add 1/4 cup raisins dusted with 1 tablespoon flour, if desired.
We like it best without raisins.)
Bake in 2 buttered 9 x 5-inch loaf pans for about 45 minutes.
(Recipe can be halved to make 1 loaf.)

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 ripe medium bananas, mashed (1 c.)
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
In a large bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking soda and salt.
In another mixing bowl, combine eggs, bananas, oil, buttermilk and vanilla.
Add to flour mixture, stirring just until combined.
Fold in nuts.
Pour into a greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch baking pan.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour 20 minutes or until bread tests done.
Cool on wire rack.
Yields 1 loaf.
Recipe does not double well.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sweet butter
1 c. brown sugar
4 medium ripe bananas, mashed
2 eggs, beaten
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. raisins
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
2 c. sifted flour or 1 1/2 c. flour and 1 c. 100% crumbled bran
Directions:
Cream butter and sugar until creamy and smooth.
Mash the bananas through a coarse sieve and mix with the sugar and butter mixture.
Add the lightly beaten eggs, lemon juice, nutmeg and raisins.
Sift the salt and baking powder with the flour.
Combine the two mixtures and bake in an oiled bread pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
3 eggs, beat well
1 1/2 c. pumpkin
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. white sugar
1 1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. milk (sweet or evaporated)
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Pour into shell and bake.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Chiffon Pie
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. gelatin (2 tsp. for 8-inch)
1/4 c. cold water (3 Tbsp. for 8-inch)
3/4 c. brown sugar (6 Tbsp. for 8-inch)
1/2 tsp. salt (1/3 tsp. for 8-inch)
2 tsp. cinnamon (1 1/2 tsp. for 8-inch)
1/2 tsp. ginger (1/3 tsp. for 8-inch)
1/2 tsp. allspice (1/3 tsp. for 8-inch)
1 1/3 c. mashed cooked pumpkin (1 c. for 8-inch)
3 large egg yolks (3 medium for 8-inch)
1/2 c. milk (1/3 c. for 8-inch)
Directions:
Blend gelatin and cold water.
Mix remaining ingredients together in saucepan.
Cook over low heat, stirring until it boils.
Boil 1 minute.
Remove from heat.
Stir in softened gelatin.
Cool.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
1 qt. (1 pt.) pumpkin
8 Tbsp. (4 Tbsp.) flour
5 c. (2 1/2 c.) sugar (mostly brown)
little salt
3/4 tsp. (1/2 tsp.) allspice
3/4 tsp. (1/2 tsp.) cinnamon
3/4 tsp. (1/2 tsp.) nutmeg
1/4 tsp. (1/8 tsp.) cloves
8 or 10 (4 or 5) eggs
9 lge. (5 1/2 ) c. milk
Directions:
Put 8 cups milk on stove; heat to boiling point.
Keep 1 cup of milk to mix in flour and pumpkin.
Separate egg whites; beat until stiff.
Add sugar and hot milk to flour, pumpkin, spices and egg yolk mixture.
Pour your hot mixture over egg whites; mix well.
Put into pie shells; bake at 375° for 50 minutes.
Makes 8 (4) pies.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
pastry crust (your favorite, unbaked)
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cloves
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 1/2 c. pumpkin (I use pumpkin, squash or sweet potatoes)
1 c. evaporated milk and 1/2 c. water or 1 1/2 c. milk or light cream
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. molasses
2 Tbsp. tart wine
Directions:
Put everything in a blender and blend until smooth.
It can be mixed until smooth with a mixer or by hand.
Bake at 425° for 30 to 40 minutes until knife inserted in middle comes out clean.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie Squares
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour, sifted
1/2 c. quick cooking rolled oats
1/2 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1/2 c. softened margarine
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Combine flour, oats, brown sugar and margarine.
Mix until crumbly.
Press into ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.
Bake for 15 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
1 c. nonfat plain yogurt
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 c. roughly chopped cilantro
3 c. diced cooked chicken breast
4 large whole wheat tortillas
4 large pre-washed lettuce slices (large enough to cover tortilla surface)
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In medium mixing bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and herb. Stir until blended. Salt and pepper to taste. Add chicken breast and stir until well coated. Place lettuce slices and 1/4 of chicken mixture on a whole wheat tortilla and wrap up. Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Asian Chicken Wrap
Ingredients:
6 (8-inch) flour tortillas
1 large carrot, peeled and sliced into strips
1 medium yellow squash, sliced into strips
6 scallions, thinly sliced
2 whole roasted red peppers, thinly sliced
8 oz. cooked shredded chicken
3 Tbsp. orange marmalade
1 Tbsp. low-sodium soy sauce
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
Directions:
Place flour tortillas on work surface.
Divide and layer sliced carrot, squash, scallions, red peppers and chicken in the center of each tortilla.
Roll up tortilla, enclosing filling. Slice in half.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breast
1 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. onion powder
1 Tbsp. pepper
15 jalapeno peppers, halved and seeded
2 tsp. seasoned salt
1 tsp. paprika
1 small onion, cut into strips
1 lb. sliced bacon, halved widthwise
Blue cheese dressing (for dipping)
Directions:
Cut chicken into 2 x 1 1/2-inch strips.
In a large plastic bag, mix garlic and onion powder, pepper, seasoned salt and paprika; add chicken and shake to coat.
Place a chicken and onion strip in each jalapeno half.
Wrap each with a piece of bacon and secure with toothpicks.
Grill, uncovered, over indirect medium heat for 18 to 20 minutes or until chicken juices run clear and bacon is crisp, turning once.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Tortillas Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked chopped chicken
8 oz. picante sauce
1 1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 can black beans, drained
8 flour tortillas
1 large tomato, cut up
1 c. shredded lettuce
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
1/2 c. guacamole
1/2 c. sour cream
1 tsp. fresh cilantro, chopped (optional)
Directions:
Combine chicken, picante sauce, chili powder and garlic powder in a large skillet; mix well. Cook over medium heat about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Add 3/4 cup cheese and beans to chicken mixture; mix well. Wrap tortillas in a kitchen towel and microwave on High for 1 minute.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Roll
Ingredients:
12 oz. cooked chicken breast (4) chopped very fine
1/2 c. chopped candied ginger, crushed
1/2 c. ground almonds
2 fresh shallots, minced
2 tsp. curry powder
salt and pepper
2 tsp. lemon juice
4 Tbsp. softened butter
1-8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Combine ginger, almonds, shallots, curry powder, salt and pepper, lemon juice, softened butter, cream cheese, and chicken. Toast in heavy skillet over medium heat 3/4 c. sesame seed, 1 tbsp. sugar.
Cool.
Shape chicken mix into 4 rolls.
Cut wax paper, spread 2 tbsp. seed on paper and roll the rolls in it.
Bring to room temperature to serve with sesame crackers.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf crusty French or Italian bread
1 stick butter
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, shredded (Sargento)
Directions:
Slice bread diagonally but leave bottom crust unsliced. Soften butter.
Add garlic, herbs and cheese to butter and mix well.
Gently pull slices of bread open and spread with butter. Take care not to break bottom crust.
Spread any leftover butter on top of loaf.
Carefully place buttered
loaf on foil and wrap ends, leaving top of loaf exposed.
Bake at 350°
until crusty. Great with spaghetti!

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onions (with tops)
3 garlic cloves, minced
1 loaf French bread (20 inch), halved lengthwise
1/3 c. minced fresh parsley
paprika
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic.
Spread on bread halves.
Sprinkle with parsley and paprika.
Wrap each half in foil and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours or can freeze.
Unwrap and place on a baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes, 20 if frozen.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
3 garlic cloves, minced
1 loaf French bread (20-inch), halved lengthwise
1/3 c. minced, fresh parsley (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic; spread on bread halves.
If desired, spread with parsley.
Wrap each half in foil. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours or freeze.
Unwrap and place on baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes if frozen) or until puffed but not brown.
Cut into slices.
Serves 12 to 15.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onion, with tops
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 loaf French bread (about 20 inches), halved lengthwise
fresh parsley (optional)
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic.
Spread on bread halves.
If desired, sprinkle with parsley and paprika.
Wrap each half in foil.
Refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours, or freeze.
Unwrap and place on a baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes, if frozen).
Cut into slices.
Yield: 12 to 15 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 medium loaf French bread (unsliced)
1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 cloves garlic, halved
1 tsp. dried parsley
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Cut slices down the length of bread at 1-inch intervals, without cutting all the way through. Rub slices and top of loaf with cut sides of garlic halves. Then mince garlic. Combine butter, garlic, parsley and Parmesan cheese in small bowl. Spread mixture between bread slices and on top of the loaf. Wrap bread in foil, leaving top partially uncovered. Bake until heated through, about 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. boiled potatoes, cut in chunks
2 c. sauerkraut
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 (20 oz.) can big franks, sliced
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 tsp. paprika
1 medium onion, diced
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Saute onion in butter and then add the big franks.
Add all other ingredients and mix well.
Spray an oblong pan with Pam and pour in ingredients.
Sprinkle with a little paprika.
Bake 45 minutes at 375°.
Makes a large casserole.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1 small flat can pineapple slices
1/2 stick butter
1 c. sugar (may use less)
1/2 c. orange juice
1/2 c. apricot nectar
1/2 c. pineapple juice (from can)
spices: cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg (optional)
Directions:
Cook yams until tender.
Do not overcook.
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add sugar and juices.
Cook until syrup is formed.
Dip sweet potatoes (quartered) in syrup, then place in a Pyrex baking dish.
Dip pineapple slices in syrup and place on top of potatoes. Sprinkle with spices, if desired.
Pour rest of syrup over dish. Bake until good and hot.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 onions, chopped
1 potato, cubed
1 c. mushrooms, sliced
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 carrot, grated
2 c. celery, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
2 c. beef broth
1 c. water
1/2 c. dry red wine
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
1 1/2 c. lentils, washed and drained
Directions:
Spray a heavy, 4-quart skillet with nonstick vegetable spray. Brown lightly onions, potato, mushrooms, garlic, carrot and celery.
Add remaining ingredients.
Simmer, partially covered, until lentils are soft (approximately 1 1/2 hours).
Add more water, if needed, during cooking.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. creamed sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 stick oleo, melted
1/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
salt
small can coconut
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Spread in buttered casserole dish.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1 large onion, chopped
1 large carrot, grated
1/2 stick celery, chopped
2 large potatoes, chopped
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 c. washed lentils
1 large can tomatoes
3 c. water or stock
thyme to taste
1 c. fresh corn
Directions:
Saute garlic, onion, carrot, celery and potatoes in oil.
Add the remaining ingredients together in a large pot.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer 1 hour.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Herb Tofu
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. tofu
4 Tbsp. plain yogurt
3 scallions, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 c. parsley leaves, chopped
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, cut in half and chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 zucchini, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
Directions:
In blender or food processor, place tofu and yogurt.
Add chopped vegetables and salt and pepper to taste.
Place on serving platter with bagels, crackers or pita bread.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Sesame Tofu
Ingredients:
1 lb. firm tofu
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/3 c. sliced green onion
1 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted
1 tsp. sesame seed oil
1/4 c. almonds, grind
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/4-inch thick or 3/4-inch cubes.
Mix soy sauce, onion, sesame seed, oil and almonds into small bowl.
In a dish, put sliced tofu and mixed sauce on the top of tofu; make layer. Cook in microwave about 4 to 5 minutes.
If you want to bring it to boil, use stainless pot or pan.
Cook about 3 minutes on medium-high temperature.
Serve with rice.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 whole frying chickens, cut into eighths
2 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground pepper
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 c. milk
2 eggs
2 c. plain bread crumbs
vegetable oil for pan-frying
2 lemons, cut into wedges
Directions:
Rinse the chicken and pat dry.
Place the flour, salt, pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg and garlic powder in a shallow baking dish; stir to distribute all the ingredients evenly.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken (8 pieces skinned)
1/2 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. garlic powder
1/4 Tbsp. oregano
1/4 Tbsp. paprika
1/4 Tbsp. red pepper
1/4 Tbsp. black pepper
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. corn meal
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. mustard
1/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a small bowl, add all seasonings. Reserve 1/2 tablespoon of seasonings.
Sprinkle majority of seasonings on chicken.
Add the 1/2 tablespoon of seasonings to flour and corn meal.
In a mixing bowl, beat milk, mustard and white wine.
Dip the chicken in this mixture, then dredge in flour and corn meal.
Spray pan with vegetable spray, then spray chicken.
Bake 30 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Steak
Ingredients:
1 or 2 eggs (beaten slightly)
1 Tbsp. milk
2 lb. round steak
1 c. bread or cracker crumbs
3 to 4 Tbsp. fat
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Add eggs to milk; mix well.
Cut steak into serving pieces, dip steak into egg mixture, dip into crumbs, brown steak on both sides in hot fat.
Season with pepper and salt.
Cover, steam over low heat for 1 hour or until meat is tender.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Savory Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. cut-up frying chicken
1 c. all purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. ground sage
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/2 tsp. crushed thyme
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Rinse chicken and pat dry.
In large bag, combine flour and seasonings.
In shallow bowl, beat eggs and water.
Place chicken a few pieces at a time in bag and shake to coat.
Dip in eggs and shake in bag again.
Fry chicken until done.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
2 (3 lb.) chickens, cut up for frying
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. freshly ground black pepper
1 tsp. ground thyme
1 c. milk
1 whole egg plus 3 egg whites
1 Tbsp. Tabasco
2 c. toasted bread crumbs
1 tsp. ground white pepper
2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Cover a baking sheet with wax paper and set aside.
Remove the skin and scrape off any visible fat from the chicken pieces.
In a large bowl, mix the flour, 1 tablespoon salt, black pepper and 2 teaspoons of the thyme.
Set aside.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef Shepherds Pie
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, chopped
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 c. green beans
1 c. tomatoes, diced
2 potatoes, cooked and mashed
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, optional
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Coat a 2 quart casserole dish with cooking spray.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Cook onion in oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Stir in the ground beef and basil, and cook and stir for 5 more minutes.
Mix in the garlic, green beans, and tomatoes, and simmer for 5 minutes. Transfer beef mixture to prepared dish.
In a mixing bowl, mix together the mashed potatoes, egg and water.
Spread evenly over meat mixture.
Bake in a preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, or until potatoes start to brown on top.
Sprinkle with cheese, and continue cooking for 5 minutes.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: S O S
Ingredients:
5 lb. ground beef
2 large onions, chopped
1 gal. tomatoes
lots of garlic powder
1/4 c. Texas Pete
2 large bell peppers, diced
1 pkg. celery, diced
1 gal. tomato sauce
1/2 c. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown ground beef slowly, breaking up in small pieces. Drain off grease and add all ingredients. Simmer. Season to your taste.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 medium onions, peeled and quartered
2 medium cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 c. hot water
2 Tbsp. minced fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
8 medium new potatoes with skin
2 medium green peppers, cut in eighths
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, drained and broken up
Directions:
In Dutch oven, brown beef, breaking up pieces with spoon.
Add onions, garlic, water, basil, salt, pepper and potatoes.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until potatoes are almost tender.
Add peppers and tomatoes.
Simmer 10 minutes or until all is tender.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef Surprise
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground round
salt and pepper to taste
1 medium onion, chopped
1 bag frozen French fries
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Press ground round evenly over bottom of buttered 13 x 9-inch pan.
Season with salt and pepper.
Sprinkle onion over meat. Sprinkle frozen French fries evenly over onion.
Mix chicken and mushroom soups together; add 3/4 cup water.
Pour carefully over meat and potato mixture.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Onion Beef(Makes 4 Or 5 Servings)
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. beef sirloin, thin sliced across the grain*
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. Chinese wine or dry sherry
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. sesame oil
1/4 c. beef broth
3/2 hoisin sauce
pinch of black pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 tsp. minced ginger
1 thinly sliced onion
4 green onions (including tops), cut into 2 inch pieces
1 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with 2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
*Thaw beef partially, it will be easier to slice that way.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. lentils
6 c. water
2 whole carrots, chopped
2 sticks celery, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
1 garlic clove, minced
dash of hot pepper
2 cubes beef bouillon
1 bay leaf
2 heaping Tbsp. tomato sauce
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 1/2 c. raw pasta
oil
Directions:
Saute onion in oil until soft, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add water and the rest of ingredients, except pasta. Bring to a boil. Cook 30 minutes on simmer covered.
Cook pasta in a separate pot and then add to lentils.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Smok-Y-Links
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils
3 c. water
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt (optional)
1/4 lb. bacon (optional)
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 clove minced garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 (1 lb.) can crushed tomatoes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. Smok-Y-Links
1 bay leaf
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine lentils, parsley, water, salt and bay leaf.
Simmer until tender (1 hour).
Cut bacon into cubes and cook crisp.
Remove; drain off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings or use 2 tablespoons of oil.
Saute celery, onion and garlic until tender.
Stir in flour and tomatoes and heat to boiling.
Drain lentils (if needed) and discard bay leaf.
Cut sausages into bite size pieces and add to mixture with lentils and bacon.
Simmer 15 minutes to blend flavors.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup Ii
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. brown lentils
8 c. beef stock
1 onion, chopped
1 carrot, diced
1 celery stalk, diced
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley
1 tsp. thyme
1 lb. smoked ham hock
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. shallots, minced
2 Tbsp. garlic, minced
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. coriander
1 c. cream
salt and pepper
Directions:
In soup pot, combine lentils, beef stock, onion, carrots, celery, cloves, pepper, parsley, thyme and ham hock.
Bring to boil; turn down to simmer.
Cook, covered, 35 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Remove ham hock and set aside.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 celery stalk, diced
1/2 medium onion, peeled and finely chopped
1 carrot, pared and diced
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 garlic clove, smashed and chopped
1 c. lentils
6 c. hot chicken stock
1/4 c. long grain rice, rinsed and drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat butter in saucepan. When hot, add celery and onion; cover and cook 3 minutes over medium heat. Add carrot, spices and garlic; cover and continue cooking for 3 minutes. Add lentils and chicken stock; season well and mix. Bring to a boil. Cook soup, partially covered, 2 hours over low heat. Sixteen minutes before end of cooking, add rice and finish cooking. Serve.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Lentils
Ingredients:
2 c. vegetable broth
1 bay leaf, crushed
sea salt to taste
1 c. picked over and washed dried lentils (yellow) or green split peas
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. apple juice or apple cider
3 Tbsp. cider vinegar
3 Tbsp. brown sugar or honey
Directions:
Bring broth to boil in kettle.
Add bay leaf, salt and lentils or peas.
Cover; simmer gently for 30 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients; stir to mix well.
Cook for 5 minutes, or until lentils or peas are tender.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
2/3 c. margarine
2 eggs
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. milk
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Take a large open field, a half dozen children.
Add 2 or 3 puppies.
Take a generous pinch of brook and pebbles.
Mix all together and put into the field.
Sprinkle with flowers.
Spread a blue sky over all and bake in sunshine.
When brown, set away to cool in a bathtub!

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: So Easy Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. margarine, softened
1/3 c. oil
1 Tbsp. milk
1 to 2 tsp. almond extract
1 egg
1 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, beat 3/4 cup sugar, margarine, oil, milk, almond extract and egg until light and fluffy.
Stir in flour, baking powder and salt; blend well.
Spread evenly into an ungreased 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking pan; sprinkle with 1 tablespoon sugar.
Bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown.
Cool 5 minutes.
Cut diagonally into bars.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. vegetable shortening
1/2 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. milk
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients.
Cream together butter, shortening and sugar.
Beat until light and fluffy.
Beat in vanilla and egg.
Add flour mixture; beat until smooth.
Blend in milk.
Drop by teaspoon onto lightly greased baking sheet.
Flatten with glass dipped in sugar.
Bake in a 400° oven for 12 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: World'S Best Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
5 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. powdered sugar
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. margarine
2 tsp. almond extract
1 c. oil
2 eggs
Directions:
Mix flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt together and set aside.
Mix together sugars, margarine and almond extract. Stir in oil and eggs.
Mix with electric mixer until well mixed. Add flour mixture one cup at a time.
Use electric mixer until mixture becomes very thick, finish mixing with a wooden spoon. Chill dough.
Roll chilled dough into walnut-sized balls.
Place on cookie sheet.
Press with fork or a tumbler dipped in sugar.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. oil
1 Tbsp. milk
1 egg
1/3 c. butter, softened
1 to 2 tsp. almond extract
1 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In bowl, beat sugar, butter, oil, milk, extract and egg until light and fluffy.
Stir in flour, baking powder and salt; blend well.
Spread evenly in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking pan. Sprinkle with a cinnamon/sugar mixture.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 medium onions, chopped
1 medium carrot, diced
2 garlic cloves, minced
10 oz. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. plus 1 1/2 tsp. mild or hot chili powder
2 tsp. ground cumin
2 cups canned whole Italian tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
4 oz. black beans, cooked and drained
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil; add onions and carrot. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, 3-5 minutes, until onions are softened. Add garlic; cook, stirring frequently, 5 minutes, until onions are golden brown.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 medium onion
1 medium green pepper
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 tsp. garlic
2 cans (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 can kidney beans, drained (save juice)
Directions:
Heat oil and add onion, pepper, beef and garlic.
Add tomato sauce, cumin, cayenne pepper, chili powder, oregano and salt. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
(If mixture is too thick, add water.)
Stir in the beans and cover and simmer for 5 minutes, until the beans are heated.
Add half of the juice from the beans while cooking.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. diced green pepper
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. finely chopped beef suet or 1 slice bacon, chopped fine
2 c. canned tomatoes
2 c. red kidney beans, drained (save liquid)
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. chili powder, diluted in 2 Tbsp. warm water
4 Tbsp. fat or oil
Directions:
Heat oil. Add onion, garlic, bacon and green pepper.
Saute until golden brown. Add beef and stir until lightly brown. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and bring to a quick boil.
Lower heat and simmer 30 minutes.
Add beans and simmer an additional 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
3/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) tomatoes, broken up
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) dark red kidney beans, drained (I prefer 1 lb. bag pinto beans), precook
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 to 2 tsp. chili powder
1 bay leaf
1 clove garlic or equivalent
1 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Brown meat, onion and green pepper.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove bay leaf. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne(Easy But Tasty)
Ingredients:
2 lb. lean ground beef
1 medium to large green pepper, sliced
1 medium to large onion, chopped or sliced
1 (15 oz.) can crushed or stewed tomatoes
2 (15 oz.) cans red kidney beans
1 or 2 Tbsp. corn or vegetable oil
1 tsp. beef bouillon powder
1 trace garlic powder or garlic clove
1 to 5 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
Sear ground beef at high temperature in a large pot.
Reduce temperature, pour off grease and add corn oil.
Add onions.
Cook with beef at lower temperature until translucent.
Add green peppers.
Cook until texture is to your taste.
Add canned tomatoes and can of beans.
Add from second can of beans to your own desired amount.
Rinse tomato and bean cans with one or two ounces of water; add to pot.
Add teaspoon of bouillon powder; stir well. Add chili powder to taste.
Add one or two shakes of garlic powder or one or two cloves of fresh garlic cloves.
Stir well and simmer 15 or 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple 'N Oat Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. chopped, pared raw apples
1/2 c. water
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. each: baking powder, cinnamon, soda and salt
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 c. rolled oats (regular)
1/2 c. seedless raisins
1/2 c. chopped nuts
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 c. melted shortening or cooking oil
Directions:
Combine apples, water and 1/2 cup brown sugar.
Cook until apples are almost tender, about 5 minutes.
Cool while preparing remaining ingredients.
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and spices.
Stir in remaining brown sugar, oats, raisins and nuts.
Add apple mixture, eggs and shortening or oil to dry ingredients; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Crisp
Ingredients:
3/4 c. rolled oats
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. butter or margarine
4 medium apples
Directions:
Set oven at 350°.
Lightly grease 8-inch round pan with butter.
Peel 4 medium sized apples; slice thin.
Place around bottom of pan.
Mix the first 4 ingredients until crumbly.
Put mixture on apples.
Bake for 35 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Yummy Oatmeal Apple Squares
Ingredients:
1 c. Butter Buds (liquid)
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Egg Beaters (1/2 c.)
1/3 c. apple juice
2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour or white flour
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
4 c. quick oats (not instant or old-fashioned)
2 c. peeled and diced green apples
1/2 c. raisins
1 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Spray Pam spray on a 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch pan.
Combine liquid Butter Buds, brown sugar and granulated sugar in a large bowl.
Beat at medium speed until well blended.
Beat in Egg Beaters, apple juice and vanilla.
Combine flour, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda and nutmeg.
Mix into creamed mixture at low speed until blended.
Stir in oats, apples and raisins with a spoon.
Spread in pan.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until brown and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan on cooling rack.
Cut into 2 1/2 x 1 1/2-inch bars.
Makes 3 1/2 dozen.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. rolled oats
1 c. flour
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. shortening
7 medium apples, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Mix first 5 ingredients until crumbly.
Press half of mixture in 9 x 12-inch pan.
Put in apples.
Sprinkle rest of mixture over apples.
Press lightly.
Sprinkle top with cinnamon.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 40 minutes.
Cool.
Cut into squares.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple And Oat Breakfast Mix
Ingredients:
2 c. quick cooking oatmeal
1 1/2 c. chopped, dried apples
2/3 c. chopped pecans
1/4 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
To dry apples:
Select any tart, firm-textured apple (Granny Smith, Jonathan or McIntosh).
Wash, peel, core and cut into 1/4 to 1/2-inch slices or rings.
Pretreat by dipping in ascorbic acid mixture.
Dry at 130° to 135° until pliable, preferably in a food dehydrator.
I use the oven; it works well.
I place fruit on a cookie sheet.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
4 c. lukewarm water
4 pkg. active dry yeast
4 Tbsp. sugar
4 Tbsp. shortening
4 tsp. salt
3 1/2 qt. flour
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except flour and let stand until dissolved.
Add about 1/2 the flour.
Beat 5 minutes.
Gradually add remaining flour to make a soft dough.
Knead until smooth and no longer stretchy (about 10 minutes), adding a small amount of flour as needed.
Place in greased bowl.
Turn over to grease top. Cover with towel and let rise in warm place until double in size. Punch down; let rise again.
Make into 5 or 6 loaves.
Let rise. Bake at 400° for 45 minutes.
This recipe will serve 40 people.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
14 c. flour
3 pkg. yeast
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. oil
6 1/2 tsp. salt
8 c. water
Directions:
Mix 1 1/2 cups of warm water, yeast and sugar; set aside and let rise until bubbly.
In a large bowl, mix the yeast mixture and the flour.
Mix well.
Add oil, salt and 8 cups water.
Knead for 20 minutes.
Let rise 6 hours, covered.
Knead again.
Grease 6 pans, fill pans 1/2 full.
Let rise to edge of pans. Beat 1 egg and brush over top of loaves.
Bake 1 hour at 450°.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Bread Deluxe
Ingredients:
2 heaping Tbsp. yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. salt
5 c. warm water
1 c. powdered milk
1 c. warm water
4 eggs, beaten
2/3 c. oil
15 c. flour
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Combine yeast, 1 cup of warm water and sugar; let stand 10 minutes.
Add to beaten eggs, salt, oil, 1 cup sugar and 5 cups of warm water.
Add yeast mixture, then gradually add 15 cups of flour to which you have added 1 cup of powdered milk. Mix until smooth.
Let rise.
Knead down.
Put into loaf pans; let rise until doubled in bulk.
Bake at 350° for about 45 minutes.
Makes 6 loaves.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. shortening
3 tsp. salt
1/2 c. warm water
8 c. flour
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. milk
3 pkgs. yeast
6 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Heat and melt shortening.
Add sugar, salt and milk.
Cool. Add yeast that has been dissolved in 1/2 c. warm water to cooled mixture.
Add flour, and beaten eggs alternately, beating well after each addition.
Place dough in greased bowl to rise until doubled.
Cover with cloth.
When rising is complete, punch down and put dough in 4 greased loaf pans.
Let rise, then bake at 350° until brown.
Takes about 35-40 minutes.
Butter crust when done.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 gal. water
2 pkg. yeast
1/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. oil
5 lb. flour
Directions:
Put water in a large bowl.
Add sugar and yeast.
Let set a few minutes.
Add sifted flour, salt and oil.
Stir until smooth.
Add flour, a little at a time until you have a soft dough.
Knead until it isn't sticky.
Turn dough over and grease the top.
Let rise in a warm place until double.
Work down and let rise again.
Make into loaves.
Let rise until light and fluffy.
Bake in 350° oven for 1 hour.
This makes 5 loaves.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 to 2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 tsp. five-spice powder
2 lb. sirloin, cut into thin slices
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. beef broth
1 tsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. fresh ginger, grated
2 cloves garlic, grated
1 onion, chopped
2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. snow peas
Directions:
Combine sesame oil and five-spice powder in a skillet and heat to medium-high heat; add beef and brown. Remove from pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. sirloin, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. oil
3 c. sliced vegetables (such as green onions, bell peppers, snow peas or mushrooms)
1 pkg. brown gravy mix
3/4 c. cold water
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
dash each of ground ginger and garlic powder
Directions:
Brown sirloin in oil.
Add vegetables.
Mix gravy mix, water and soy sauce together.
Add spices.
Pour over meat and vegetables.
Simmer 1 minute until thickened.
Serve with rice or noodles.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Beef
Ingredients:
1-1 1/2 lbs. round or sirloin steak
1/4 c. oil
1 sm. onion, sliced
3/4 c. thinly sliced carrots
1 1/2 c. diagonally sliced celery
1 sm. green pepper, cut in thin strips
1 4 oz. can sliced mushrooms, drained (or use fresh)
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar or use sweetner
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
Directions:
Trim steak and cut into thin strips, 2-inches long.
Sear in oil in hot skillet or Wok.
Stir until lightly browned.
Separate onion slices into rings and add with celery and carrots.
Stir-fry until crisp-tender, or longer if you prefer.
Add green peppers and mushrooms.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Fresh Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh green beans
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. salt
dash of garlic powder
1/4 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Stem and wash beans.
Put beans in a pot and cover with boiling water.
Bring to a boil and boil 1 minute; reduce heat. Add seasonings.
Cover and cook for approximately 15 to 20 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
Put in serving dish; drizzle with butter.
Top with almonds.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
3 pounds fresh green beans (stem ends removed)
1/2 teaspoon butter flavored buds or butter flavored cooking spray
1/8 teaspoon garlic powder
1 1/2 teaspoons crushed dried thyme
2 tablespoons slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
Bring green bean to a boil in a large covered pot.
Reduce heat and simmer until crisp and tender, 3 to 4 minutes.
Drain. Toss with butter flavored buds, garlic powder and thyme.
Garnish with toasted almonds.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans Almondine
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. green beans, trimmed
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. sliced natural almonds
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, washed and dried
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
In large skillet over high heat, bring 1-inch water to a boil.
Add washed green beans and cook 5 minutes; drain.
Remove beans and wipe out skillet.
In the same skillet over medium-high heat, melt the butter.
Add sliced almonds; cook 2 minutes or until browned, stirring frequently.
Meanwhile, halve the cherry tomatoes.
Add to skillet and cook 3 to 5 minutes, gently pressing with a wooden spoon to release the juices.
Season tomato mixture with salt and pepper.
Cook 5 minutes more or until softened.
Add cooked green beans to the skillet.
Gently toss all ingredients together; cook 1 to 2 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 8 servings.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh green beans, cut or left whole
2 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. blanched slivered almonds
1/4 to 1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Place
green beans in kettle of salted water with sugar added. Cook,
covered,
until
barely
tender
(from 10 to 25 minutes). Drain but keep hot for serving.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans Almondine
Ingredients:
1/3 c. slivered or shaved almonds
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 1/2 lb. fresh green beans, halved
1/3 c. water
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine almonds and butter in a 2-cup glass measure. Microwave, uncovered, at power level High for 4 to 6 minutes, or until almonds are lightly toasted.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Deep Frying Batter
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 c. ice water
2 Tbsp. oil
1 egg
Directions:
Mix all together.
(Good for onion rings, shrimp, etc.)

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries(Low Fat Recipe)
Ingredients:
3 medium potatoes
2 tsp. oil (or a little less)
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°. Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/4 inch thick slices, then cut into fry shaped strips. Pour oil into bowl and toss to coat. Spread on baking sheet and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake 20 minutes and then turn potatoes and bake until crisp, about 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: American-Indian Fry Bread
Ingredients:
4 c. flour
1 c. nonfat dry milk
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. shortening
1 1/2 c. warm water
Directions:
For smaller portions, recipe may be cut in half.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Frying Batter
Ingredients:
1 c. flat beer
1 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 c. flour
1/8 tsp. cayenne
1 to 1 1/4 lb. peeled, deveined large or medium shrimp
vegetable oil (for deep frying)
flour (in a shaker)
Directions:
Open the beer and pour off into a bowl 2 hours before mixing the batter.
Leave uncovered at room temperature.
To prepare the batter, combine all the ingredients in a large mixing bowl and whip at medium-high speed with an electric mixer until frothy and rather thin in texture.
(Or whip vigorously by hand with a whisk, for about 4 minutes.)
Cover the bowl with a plastic wrap and let stand at room temperature for at least 3 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Fried Tomatoes And Ricethis Recipe Is Adapted From A 19Th Century Book Of Recipes.
Ingredients:
1/3 cup uncooked rice
1/4 cup chopped onion
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1/2 cup cooked tomatoes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 to 1 cup hot water
2 Tbsp. bacon drippings
Directions:
Cook the rice in cooking oil for 15 minutes. stirring frquently. In another pan pour in bacon drippings. Add tomatoes, salt and pepper to the onions and continue to cook for 2 or 3 minutes, stirring often. Add hot water to the rice, a little at a time, until it reaches consistence of firm boiled rice. Add rice to the tomatoes and serve.
Serves 4 The original recipe read like this "Fry half a small cup of rice in hot lard 15 minutes. In another pan fry in drippings 1/4 of a small onion, not an El Paso onion, but a northern sized onion. Add 1/2 cup of tomato and let fry.
Add hot water to the rice until the consistency of firm boiled rice. Add a little at a time and put contents of the two pans together and serve in a hot dish with toast, if you like. Salt and pepper, of course."

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Beef Pot Roast
Ingredients:
3 lb. beef, boned
1 tsp. oil
2 medium onions, chopped
1 c. water
2 whole cloves
2 bouillon cubes
2 small bay leaves
1 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
sprig of parsley
pinch of thyme
pinch of rosemary
2 1/2 c. canned tomatoes
Directions:
Trim excess fat from meat; brown on all sides in oil in heavy pan.
Pour off fat.
Add remaining ingredients to meat.
Cover pan tightly and simmer for 2 to 3 hours or until meat is very tender. Stir and turn meat every 30 minutes.
Yields 12 servings.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pot Roast
Ingredients:
1 (3 1/2 lb.) boneless bottom round roast
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water
1/3 c. dry sherry
1/4 c. reduced calorie catsup
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. dried whole rosemary
1/4 tsp. dried whole thyme
