2 medium onions, sliced
1 bay leaf
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, undrained
Directions:
Trim all visible fat from meat.
Coat a Dutch oven with vegetable cooking spray; place over medium heat until hot.
Place roast in Dutch oven and brown on all sides.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Combine next 7 ingredients.
Pour over roast.
Add onion and bay leaf.
Cover and simmer 2 1/2 to 3 hours or until roast is tender.
Add mushrooms.
Cook until mushrooms are thoroughly heated.
Discard bay leaf.
Remove roast from cooking liquid.
Skim fat from liquid.
Yields 12 servings.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Walnut Roast
Ingredients:
3 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
1 1/2 c. walnuts, chopped
3 c. cooked brown rice
1 onion, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1/4 c. water
1 tsp. sage
1/3 c. whole wheat flour
3/4 c. sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 c. water
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Saute chopped vegetables with sage, salt and soy sauce in 1/4 cup water.
Blend flour and sunflower seeds with 2 cups water. Add to sauteed vegetables and simmer a few minutes.
Place in bowl bread crumbs, walnuts and brown rice.
Add sauteed vegetables and sunflower mixture.
Mix well.
Pour into casserole dish and bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes, until well browned.
Serve with Chicken-like or Cashew Gravy.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Beer Roast(Just Delicious)
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. roast (chuck or sirloin)
1 pkg. Lipton onion soup mix
1 can beer
2 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. white pepper (preferred)
1 whole chicken (3 1/2 to 4 lb.)
1 (12 oz.) can beer
Directions:
In small cup, combine chili powder, cumin, salt, sugar, cayenne and pepper. Rub evenly over outside and in cavities of chicken. If desired, rub some under skin over breasts and legs. Cover and refrigerate up to 24 hours.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pot Roast
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. beef rump, chuck or shoulder
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 sliced large onion
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 Tbsp. chives
1/8 tsp. thyme
1 minced clove garlic
1 bay leaf
1 chopped stalk celery
1 c. canned tomatoes
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Heat frying pan.
Add meat and brown on all sides.
Season with salt and pepper.
Put onion slices on top of meat; add wine and rest of ingredients.
If desired, add peeled halved potatoes, small peeled whole onions and carrots cut diagonally in 2-inch pieces during last hour of cooking.
Make gravy, using 1/2 cup dry wine to replace 1/2 cup of liquid.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
6 oz. semi-sweet baking chocolate
10 Tbsp. butter, softened
2 egg yolks, beaten
1 1/2 c. sifted confectioners sugar
2 tsp. vanilla extract
cocoa
Directions:
Melt chocolate in saucepan over very low heat, stirring constantly.
Cool.
Cream butter with egg yolks in bowl.
Add confectioners sugar gradually, blending well.
Stir in chocolate and vanilla.
Chill until firm enough to handle.
Shape into 30 to 35 balls.
Roll in cocoa.
Store in airtight container

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Truffles
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. milk chocolate (3 c. shaved or finely cut and firmly packed)
1/3 c. heavy cream
1/3 c. dairy half and half
1 1/2 tsp. pure vanilla
chocolate or white dipping chocolate (about 1 pkg. of melts)
Directions:
Melt milk chocolate in top of double boiler over hot (not boiling) water.
When melted, beat until smooth.
Meanwhile, combine heavy cream and half and half in small saucepan; heat to scalding.
Remove from heat; let stand until temperature is about 130°.
Add warm cream to melted chocolate at once.
Beat until smooth and well blended.
Remove from heat; add vanilla and let cool.
When cool, beat with electric mixer until candy is light and rather fluffy.
Let stand in refrigerator until firm.
When firm, roll a teaspoonful of candy into a ball in palms of hands.
Dip immediately into melted chocolate with dipping fork and place on wax paper to dry.
When ready to package, use small candy cups for each individual piece.
Makes 36 to 40 (2 pounds).

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Truffles
Ingredients:
8 oz. bittersweet chocolate
4 oz. unsalted butter, cut into small cubes
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. dark rum, cognac or orange liqueur
unsweetened cocoa
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a bowl over hot water.
Remove bowl from hot water and whisk in butter.
Next, whisk in egg yolks.
Add rum, cognac or liqueur.
Place bowl over cold water and beat vigorously until chocolate is thick and smooth.
Chill until workable.
Form into balls with 2 teaspoons; roll in unsweetened cocoa.
Place on a chilled plate until firm.
Roll in cocoa again and keep chilled in a covered container until served.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
16 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
16 Tbsp. unsalted butter, softened
6 egg yolks
5 Tbsp. dark rum
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
3/4 c. Dutch cocoa
Directions:
In double boiler, melt chocolate over simmering water.
Beat in softened butter, egg yolks, rum and vanilla with wire whisk. Remove from heat and refrigerate until firm enough to handle (1 hour), keeping tightly covered.
Combine cocoa and confectioners sugar.
Shape chocolate mixture into 1-inch balls and roll in cream and sugar.
Store in airtight container and refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Easy Truffles
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
3 c. confectioners sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
nuts, ground or coconut, flaked
Directions:
In microwave, melt chocolate on High for 3 to 4 minutes or until almost melted.
Stir after each minute.
Remove from microwave and stir until completely melted.
Add cream cheese and beat until smooth.
Add sugar gradually and beat well.
Add chocolate and vanilla and blend thoroughly.
Refrigerate for about 1 hour (one hour only).
Shape into 1-inch balls.
Roll into nuts or coconut.
Store in refrigerator.
Makes about 5 dozen.
Very good.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 medium avocado, peeled
1 small tomato, quartered
2 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl.
Add all ingredients except onion.
Process 1 minute or until lumpy.
Stir in onions.
Yields 2 cups.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 c. mashed avocados
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. pacantia sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix together and serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 avocados, peeled and chopped
2 green onions, chopped
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. dried cilantro or 1 fresh sprig
1 medium tomato, chopped
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine avocados, onions, lemon juice, salt, red pepper flakes, garlic powder and cilantro.
Using a fork or potato masher, mix and mash coarsely.
Add most of the tomatoes; stir well. Pour into serving bowl; garnish with remaining tomatoes and sprigs of cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 to 2 avocados (2 small or 1 large)
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 small onion
1 medium tomato
1 to 2 Tbsp. sour cream or plain yogurt (optional)
Directions:
Peel, seed and mash avocados.
Add lemon juice and sour cream. Mince onion.
Add to avocado.
Peel tomato.
Remove seeds and juice.
Chop tomato and add to avocado.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Mock Guacamole
Ingredients:
2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans cut asparagus, drained
1 c. finely chopped tomatoes
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. hot sauce
Directions:
Position knife blade in processor bowl.
Add asparagus. Process until smooth; transfer to mixing bowl.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Place mixture in a paper towel lined colander; drain 1 hour.
Cover and chill at least 3 hours.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. (heaping) plain flour
3 Tbsp. cocoa
2 c. sugar
4 eggs, separated
pinch of salt
butter
Directions:
Sift flour, sugar and salt.
Add enough evaporated milk to make paste.
Beat in egg yolks, one at a time.
Add rest of milk and finish filling pan with sweet milk.
Cook in a double boiler until it begins to thicken.
Add butter and vanilla.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Scratch Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. self-rising flour
2 c. sugar
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 stick butter
1/2 c. Wesson oil
1 c. water
2 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Mix
together in a big bowl flour, sugar, cocoa, cinnamon
and salt.
Melt
in
a
saucepan 1 stick butter, oil and water; bring
to a boil.
Add dry with liquid ingredients and mix well. Add beaten eggs, soda and buttermilk.
Add vanilla. Stir
all together and pour into a greased, floured pan.
Cook at
350°
for 30
to
40 minutes.
While cake is hot from the oven, pour frosting on it.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. boiling water
4 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. sugar
1 egg
2 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. cocoa
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Put sugar and water in 2-quart pan.
Cream shortening and sugar.
Beat in egg.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Add alternately with milk.
Add vanilla.
Pour pudding batter into hot syrup, being careful not to mix with syrup.
Cook, tightly covered, for 1 hour on medium heat.
Do not take cover of kettle off while cooking pudding, or pudding will not cook right.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Tarheel Scratch Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. butter
3 c. flour
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
6 eggs
Directions:
Cream the butter and sugar together.
Sift the baking powder and flour together.
Add the salt and mix with the butter, sugar and milk.
Beat thoroughly.
Beat the eggs until stiff and add to the rest of ingredients.
Stir well and bake in buttered layer cake pans for 20 to 25 minutes in a 375° oven.
Spread the layers with icing.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Grandma'S Scratch Cake
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. cocoa
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
3/4 c. oil
2 eggs
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. hot coffee
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Grease and flour pans, set aside.
Mix with a beater the first 8 ingredients.
Add the hot coffee and vanilla (mix on low).
Pour into pans.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.
Cool and frost with frosting.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. Stove Top dressing
1 1/4 c. water
1/4 c. white wine
12 carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 to 5 lb. roasting chicken
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare dressing as directed.
Set aside to cool.
Stir in wine.
Blanch carrots 5 minutes in boiling water.
Drain and put in crock-pot.
Stuff chicken with dressing and place in pot over carrots.
Cover pot and set on low for 6 to 8 hours.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken And Rice Slow Cooker
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 c. celery, sliced
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 pounds chicken thighs skinned and fat removed
1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup or cream of chicken
3/4 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 c. instant rice
Directions:
In a slow cooker combine mushrooms, celery, onion dill weed and pepper.
Top with chicken.
Pour soup and broth over chicken. Cover, cook on High 2 1/2 to 3 hours or Low 5 to 6 hours.
If using low turn slow cooker to high heat setting.
Stir uncooked rice into mushroom mixture.
Cover and cook for 10 minutes more.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 fryer
salt
flour
1 small onion
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. celery and parsley flakes (or any seasoning desired)
Directions:
Before you go to church Sunday morning, cut up and remove the skin from fryer; salt and flour lightly.
Arrange in single layer in slow cooker.
Slice onion; spread over chicken.
Sprinkle over this the seasoning, thyme and celery
and parsley flakes.
Place lid on cooker; turn on.
Come home from church and eat!

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Garlic Chicken(Slow Cooker Or Crock-Pot Recipe)
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken breast halves
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. water
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
1 tsp. minced fresh parsley
Directions:
Remove skin and fat from chicken and pat dry.
Mix oregano, seasoned salt and pepper together and rub all into chicken.
Brown chicken in 2 tablespoons of butter.
Transfer chicken to slow cooker.
Place water, lemon juice, garlic and bouillon granules in skillet used to brown chicken, scraping and incorporating all bits from bottom of skillet.
Pour over chicken and cook on high for 2 1/2 to 3 hours or on low for 5 to 6 hours.
Thirty minutes before serving, stir in the parsley and cook on high.
Serve with rice pilaf.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10.75 oz.) can condensed cream of celery soup
1 c. white rice
Directions:
Cut chicken breasts into large chunks. Place the chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup and the rice in a slow cooker. Cook on high for 3 hours or low for 4 hours.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Sauce For Fish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter. Blend in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and smooth. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over fish.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Fish Fry Coating Mix
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. yellow cornmeal
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. lemon pepper
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. onion powder
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and store in an airtight container.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Fried Fish
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fish fillets
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 c. coarsely ground almonds
1 egg plus 2 Tbsp. water
3 Tbsp. butter
4 Tbsp. flour
salt and pepper
lemon wedges
Directions:
Cut fillets in 4-inch portions.
Season with salt and pepper. Mix nuts and cayenne.
Dip fillets in egg and water mix; roll in flour.
Fry in butter in skillet or microwave 5 minutes with nut mix sprinkled over fillets.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Fish Fry
Ingredients:
2 to 3 c. corn flakes, crushed
2 eggs, beaten
hot oil
salt and pepper
lemon wedges or tartar sauce
Directions:
Cut fish into equal sizes so it all cooks in the same amount of time.
Salt and pepper fish.
Dip into egg, then into corn flakes.
Drop into hot oil and cook until golden.
Best to dry fish with soft cloth or paper towel before dipping.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/4 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 c. sugar
1 c. Starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Combine oil, water, sugar and Starter.
Stir well and add flour.
Place in greased bowl and turn to cover all surfaces with oil. Let rise in warm place. Bowl may be covered with towel or cookie sheet.
Turn dough onto floured surface and knead several times. Shape into loaves or rounds.
Place in greased pans.
Let rise for at least 8 hours. Bake at 350° until brown, about 20 minutes for rounds, 30 minutes for loaves.
May add 1 package of Italian seasoning mix for variety.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/4 c. sugar (scant)
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 c. Starter
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Mix flour, sugar and salt in a large bowl. Stir in liquids and mix, making stiff batter. (Do not knead at this time.) Push dough aside and spray with Pam or grease with Crisco.
Turn dough over to grease all sides. Cover lightly with foil and let stand overnight in warm place.
(A cold oven is a good place to let it stand.)

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. Starter
1/3 c. sugar
2 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. warm water
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix all ingredients.
Grease large container; put dough in and turn to grease top.
Cover with foil; let stand overnight.
Do not refrigerate.
Next morning, punch down and divide into 3 parts.
Knead each part on a floured surface 8 to 10 times.
Put in greased loaf pans; brush with oil.
Cover with waxed paper; let rise 4 to 6 hours.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 40 minutes. Brush top with melted butter.
Can be frozen.
If putting bread in pans on workday to rise, it can set all day.
Makes 3 loaves.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 c. starter
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Stir all ingredients, except flour.
When mixed, add flour, a little at a time, to other ingredients, mixing well.
Put dough in large greased bowl; turn dough to grease the top.
Cover with foil.
Let rise at room temperature overnight, or for at least 8 hours.
Punch down dough.
Turn out onto floured board and knead. Divide into 3 parts; shape into loaves.
Put in 3 greased loaf pans; brush tops with oil.
Cover with paper towel or plastic wrap.
Let rise an additional 4 to 5 hours.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Brush with butter; cool and wrap.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. milk or water
1/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1 packet active yeast
1 1/2 c. Starter
2 to 3 Tbsp. warm water
4 to 5 c. flour
Directions:
Scald milk.
Add sugar, shortening and salt.
Stir to mix thoroughly.
Dissolve yeast in 2 to 3 tablespoons warm water.
Let it bubble to ensure it is working.
Add to milk mixture along with 2 cups of flour.
Stir and keep adding flour to make a dough that can be handled easily.
Knead for 5 to 8 minutes, then cut into pieces to fill pans 1/2 full.
Be sure to grease pans.
Let rise to twice its size in warm place.
Bake in 400° oven for 35 to 45 minutes to a good golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. caraway seed
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme leaves
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. ground red pepper
3 lb. chicken wings
4 Tbsp. margarine or butter (1/2 stick), melted
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
In a small bowl, mix paprika, caraway seed, onion flakes (crushed), dry mustard, lemon peel, thyme leaves, salt and ground red pepper.
Brush wings with melted butter and lightly pat paprika mixture on wings.
Place wings in a large open roasting pan.
Bake 30 minutes or until tender.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
4 doz. chicken wings
1 c. oil
1 1/2 c. apple cider vinegar
2 Tbsp. salt
2 dashes Tabasco sauce
1 egg, beaten separately
3 Tbsp. cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. celery salt
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
dash of ground cloves
Directions:
Mix sauce ingredients in glass jar and
shake well.
Lay wings side by side in large pan (or two pans) so they are in a single layer.
Pour sauce over them and marinate 4 hours or overnight. Bake until done at 375° for 35 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/4 c. minced parsley
1 c. mayonnaise (Hellmann's Light)
1/4 c. Blue cheese, crumbled
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
pinch of cayenne
1/4 lb. butter
2 Tbsp. bottle hot sauce or to taste
50 pieces chicken wings (discard tips)
Directions:
Mix vinegar with milk and allow to curdle.
Add onion, garlic, parsley, mayonnaise, Blue cheese, lemon juice, salt, pepper and cayenne.
Mix well and refrigerate.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings
1 c. Louisiana hot sauce
2/3 c. butter
1/2 c. Burgundy wine
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
Directions:
Disjoint wings and wash.
Deep fry in oil; drain.
While wings are frying, mix all remaining ingredients and warm until butter is melted.
After draining wings, toss them in the sauce until coated. Serve with carrot and celery strips and Blue cheese dip.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Light, Hot 'N' Sassy Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oatmeal, crushed
2 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
3 egg whites
3 Tbsp. liquid red pepper sauce
3 chicken breasts, split, boned, skinned and cut up into strips
light Ranch dressing
Directions:
Blend dry ingredients.
Place in shallow bowl.
Beat egg whites with pepper sauce.
Coat chicken strips with oats.
Dip in egg mixture and then in oats.
Place in broiler rack, sprayed with Pam to coat.
Broil 4 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
Remove from oven; turn over.
Spray with Pam.
Return to oven; cook 2 to 3 minutes longer.
Serve with light Ranch dressing as dip.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 to 2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 tsp. five-spice powder
2 lb. sirloin, cut into thin slices
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. beef broth
1 tsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. fresh ginger, grated
2 cloves garlic, grated
1 onion, chopped
2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. snow peas
Directions:
Combine sesame oil and five-spice powder in a skillet and heat to medium-high heat; add beef and brown. Remove from pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. sirloin, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. oil
3 c. sliced vegetables (such as green onions, bell peppers, snow peas or mushrooms)
1 pkg. brown gravy mix
3/4 c. cold water
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
dash each of ground ginger and garlic powder
Directions:
Brown sirloin in oil.
Add vegetables.
Mix gravy mix, water and soy sauce together.
Add spices.
Pour over meat and vegetables.
Simmer 1 minute until thickened.
Serve with rice or noodles.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Beef
Ingredients:
1-1 1/2 lbs. round or sirloin steak
1/4 c. oil
1 sm. onion, sliced
3/4 c. thinly sliced carrots
1 1/2 c. diagonally sliced celery
1 sm. green pepper, cut in thin strips
1 4 oz. can sliced mushrooms, drained (or use fresh)
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar or use sweetner
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
Directions:
Trim steak and cut into thin strips, 2-inches long.
Sear in oil in hot skillet or Wok.
Stir until lightly browned.
Separate onion slices into rings and add with celery and carrots.
Stir-fry until crisp-tender, or longer if you prefer.
Add green peppers and mushrooms.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Mozzarella With Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh Mozzarella
3 ripe tomatoes
2 tsp. oregano
4 Tbsp. olive oil
freshly ground black pepper
10 fresh basil leaves, chopped
salt to taste (optional)
sliced black olives (optional)
Directions:
Slice Mozzarella and tomatoes.
Arrange by alternating overlapping layers on a serving platter.
Sprinkle oregano, black pepper and salt.
Drizzle olive oil.
Top with basil leaves.
Let sit 1/2 hour before serving.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes With Mozzarella
Ingredients:
tomatoes
Mozzarella
basil
salt and pepper
extra virgin olive oil
Directions:
Layer slices of tomatoes and Mozzarella.
Sprinkle with chopped fresh basil, salt and freshly ground pepper.
Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes-Mozzarella Salad
Ingredients:
3 med. tomatoes, sliced
1/2 lb. skim Mozzarella Cheese, sliced
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1/3 cup olive oil
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 Tbsp. finely chopped fresh basil
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Layer tomatoes and cheese in shallow dish. In small jar with a tight lid, place oil, vinegar, parsley, onion, basil, salt and pepper. Cover and shake well. Pour over tomatoes and cheese. Cover and refrigerate several hours, occasionally spooning dressing over tomatoes salad.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomato Basil Squares
Ingredients:
1 pkg refrig. pizza crust
2 c shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
1/4 c fresh parmesan cheese, grated
2/3 c mayonnaise
1 garlic clove, pressed
4 plum tomatoes, thinly sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Using lightly floured dough roller, roll out pizza crust on a rectangle baking stone or pan. Sprinkle crust with 1 cup of the mozzarella cheese; set aside. Thinly slice tomatoes; arrange in a single layer over the mozzarella cheese on the crust. Mix all the remaining ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Then spread to cover evenly over the crust. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until top is golden brown and bubbly.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomato-Mozzarella Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
2/3 c. olive oil
3 c. tomatoes (chunks)
2 c. cubed Mozzarella
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. basil
Directions:
Mix vinegar, oil, garlic, salt and pepper.
Pour over vegetables and cheese.
Sprinkle with basil.
Chill before serving.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
2 c. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 Tbsp. granulated sugar
6 oz. unsweetened chocolate
4 oz. white chocolate
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
Directions:
Heat cream, butter and sugar in a 2 1/2-quart saucepan over medium heat.
Stir to dissolve sugar.
Bring to a boil.
Place the semi-sweet, unsweetened and white chocolate in a steel bowl.
Pour the boiling cream mixture over chocolates.
Let stand 5 minutes. Stir until smooth.
Can put in 1 to 2 teaspoons vanilla, pecans or orange rind (optional).
Refrigerate.
Cut into bite-size pieces.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
1 c. heavy cream
10 oz. semi-sweet or bittersweet chocolate, chopped (2 c.)
Directions:
Gently warm the cream in a small saucepan over medium heat until small bubbles begin to appear at the edges.
Remove from heat.
Stir in chocolate until mixture is smooth and the chocolate has melted completely.
Do not stir so vigorously that bubbles form.
If there are any visible lumps, strain the mixture through a fine mesh sieve.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Sour Cream Ganache Frosting
Ingredients:
4 (3 oz.) bars bittersweet chocolate (Lindt-Excellence recommended)
1 2/3 c. sour cream, at room temperature
Directions:
In a double boiler set over hot water or in a microwave on High power, stirring every 10 seconds, melt the chocolate.
Remove from the heat and add the sour cream.
Stir with a rubber spatula until uniform in color.
If the pan feels warm, transfer to a bowl.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Intrigue(Pound Cake With Chocolate Center)
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. butter or margarine
2 c. sugar
3 eggs
1 c. milk
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. chocolate syrup
1/4 tsp. soda
1/4 tsp. peppermint extract
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients together.
Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time and beat well after each addition.
Add milk and vanilla.
Mix.
Alternate mixing wet and dry ingredients, blending well after each addition.
Pour 2/3 of batter into a 10-inch tube pan, greased on the bottom.
Add to the remaining batter the chocolate syrup, soda and mint extract. Mix well and pour over white batter.
Do not mix together! Bake at 350° for 65 to 70 minutes.
Cool in the pan.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Eclair
Ingredients:
1 stick of butter
1 c. water
1 c. all-purpose flour
4 eggs
Directions:
Bring butter and water to a boil.
Remove from heat and add flour.
Mix until mixture forms a ball.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Spread in greased 13-inch by 9-inch baking pan.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Cool.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Hot Dish
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 lb. boneless pork, cut into 1-inch cubes
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped red and green pepper
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 (10 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked and drained
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 (16 1/2 oz.) can creamed corn
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. saltine crumbs
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Cook pork, celery, pepper and onion in oil until meat is browned and vegetables are tender.
In large bowl, combine pork mixture, noodles, soups, corn, milk, salt and pepper; mix well. Put in ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Combine crumbs and butter; sprinkle on top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes until heated through.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooked Pork
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. country style ribs
1 medium onion, sliced
1 (27 oz.) can sauerkraut, rinsed and drained
1/3 c. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. catsup
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. caraway seed
Directions:
Place ribs and onion in slow cooker.
Combine remaining ingredients and pour over ribs.
Cover and cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours or high setting for 5 to 6 hours.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
1 (5 to 6 lb.) Boston butt
salt
1 tsp. chili sauce
1 tsp. celery seed
1 c. catsup
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. brown sugar
1 c. water
Directions:
Cook pork in lightly salted water over low heat 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
Drain, reserving 1 cup broth.
Cut pork into thin slices and place in a large shallow baking pan.
Combine salt, reserved broth and remaining ingredients.
Mix well and pour over pork slices.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Baked Navy Beans(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. dry navy beans (3 c.)
1 medium onion, chopped
1 c. brown sugar
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 Tbsp. dark molasses
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 lb. salt pork
Directions:
Cook dry beans in water until softened, 3 times the volume of water to beans, about 30 minutes.
Let stand for 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until softened.
Drain and put in crock-pot with all ingredients well mixed.
Cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours (high 4 to 6 hours), stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornbread mix (yes, mix)
2 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. salad oil
3 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, grated
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. cream-style corn
1/2 c. yellow cheese, grated
1/4 lb. bacon or more, fried crisp and crumbled
1/4 c. pimientos, chopped
1/4 c. garlic, chopped (optional)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and bake in 3 greased 8 x 8-inch pans at 400° until done and brown, about 35 minutes. Let cool; cut and enjoy with a tall glass of milk.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread(Makes 12 Servings)
Ingredients:
3 c. yellow cornmeal
1 c. creamed corn
1 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. salt
1 c. onion, chopped
1 1/3 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. salad oil
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. jalapeno, chopped
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well. Pour into greased 9 x 16-inch baking dish. Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornmeal
2 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. salad oil (vegetable oil)
3 eggs
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 can cream-style corn
1/2 c. finely chopped jalapeno (fresh or canned)
1 1/2 c. sharp cheese, shredded
1/4 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
1/4 c. pimientos, chopped
1/2 clove garlic, chopped fine
Directions:
Put cornmeal in large bowl, add milk and eggs and stir well. Add all other ingredients as given in order.
Bake in 3 greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pans at 400°, about 35 minutes or until done.
Can also be baked in muffin pans.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
1 c. yellow meal
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1/4 c. oil
2 eggs
1 can corn, drained
1 c. Cheddar cheese
1 Tbsp. pepper
1/2 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Bake for about 30 to 45 minutes at 425°.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. self-rising meal
2 1/2 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. salad oil
3 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, grated
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. cream-style corn
1/2 c. chopped jalapeno chili peppers
1 1/2 c. yellow cheese, grated
1/4 lb. bacon or more, fried and crumbled
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. pimentos, chopped
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together well. Bake at 400° for about 35 minutes or until done.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 can tomato soup
3/4 c. water
3 potatoes, sliced
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook meat and onion.
Drain.
Layer 1/2 of the potatoes in a 9 x 13-inch dish, then layer 1/2 of the meat mixture, followed by 1/2 cup of cheese.
Top with remaining potatoes, then rest of meat mixture.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Ground Beef Bake
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. minced green pepper
2 cans golden mushroom soup
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 medium onion
Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly.
Drain. Add green pepper, soup, salt and pepper.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Deviled Ground Beef On Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. catsup
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
4 c. hot mashed potatoes
Directions:
In large skillet, cook beef and onion until lightly browned. Drain fat off.
Sprinkle with flour, salt, mustard and pepper. Stir in water, Worcestershire sauce and catsup.
Cook and stir over medium heat about 5 minutes.
Serve over mashed potatoes.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Ground Beef Bake
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. minced green pepper
1 can golden mushroom soup
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 small onion, sliced thin
Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain. Add green pepper, soup, salt and pepper; set aside.
Layer potatoes and onion in greased casserole.
Spoon ground beef mixture over layers.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 5 minutes longer.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Scalloped Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
4 large unpeeled potatoes, sliced
1 beef bouillon cube
1 c. boiling water
2 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef with onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper in skillet for 5 to 10 minutes, stirring frequently; drain. Arrange 1/3 of the potato slices in 2-quart baking dish.
Layer ground beef mixture and remaining potato slices 1/2 at a time in dish.
Dissolve bouillon cube in boiling water.
Pour over layers. Dot with margarine.
Bake at 425° for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 15 minutes longer.
Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. chicken breast, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. chili powder
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 (16 oz.) can chopped tomatoes, drained
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery (optional)
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
2 Tbsp. dry red wine
1/8 tsp. red pepper
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
4 (6-inch) tortillas
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
2 jalapeno peppers, finely chopped
Directions:
Filling:
In skillet combine first 15 ingredients.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover tightly and simmer for 15 minutes. Uncover and cook for 5 minutes.
Remove from skillet.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1/8 tsp. cloves
5 Tbsp. butter
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. ground cumin (optional)
3 garlic cloves, crushed
2 Tbsp. onion flakes or 1 medium onion, chopped
1 c. catsup
1 can tomatoes, diced
1/2-1 c. water
1 whole lemon, sliced real thin and seeds removed
6 chicken breasts, cooked and shredded
Tortilla wrappers
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except chicken. Simmer 25 to 30 minutes over low heat. Remove bay leaf and all lemon slices.
Add chicken, stirring well. Simmer for 25 minutes longer.
Fill tortilla wrappers with chicken mixture.
Put in 9 x 13 inch dish (or larger). Spread sauce on them and cover with Jack cheese (shredded).
Put in oven at 400° until cheese is melted.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/4 c. canned diced green chilies
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
12 fresh corn tortillas
3 1/2 c. cooked, cubed white chicken meat
3 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1/2 to 1 c. sour cream (I prefer 1/2 c.)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Lightly grease shallow baking dish. To make sauce, saute onion and garlic in margarine 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes, sauce, chilies, sugar, cumin, salt and oregano.
Bring to boil; reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, uncovered.
Holding tortillas with tongs, soften by dipping into hot sauce.
Fill each tortilla with 1/4 to 1/3 cup chicken and 2 tablespoons of cheese. Roll up, tucking in sides to contain filling and arrange seam side down in prepared pan.
Stir sour cream into sauce.
Pour over enchiladas.
Top with remaining cheese.
Cover and bake for 40 minutes, until enchiladas are hot and bubbly.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
2 large chicken breasts, cooked and split into 12 strips
1 c. onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 c. green chilies, chopped
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano, crushed
1/2 tsp. basil, crushed
12 tortillas
2 1/2 c. Jack cheese, shredded
3/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
In saucepan, cook onion and garlic in margarine or butter until tender.
Add tomatoes, tomato sauce and seasonings.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat.
Dip each tortilla into tomato mixture to soften.
Place 1 piece of chicken and about 2 tablespoons shredded cheese on each tortilla.
Roll up and place, seam side down, in 13 1/2 x 8 3/4 x 1-inch baking dish.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 lbs. skinless boneless chicken breast
salt and pepper, to taste
2 tsp. cumin powder
2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. Mexican Spice blend
1 red onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 c. frozen corn, thawed
5 whole green chilies, canned
4 chipotle chilies, canned
1 can (28 oz.) stewed tomatoes
1 c. Cheddar and Jack cheeses, shredded
16 corn tortillas
1 1/2 c. enchilada sauce, canned
Directions:
Coat large saute pan with oil.
Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Brown chicken over medium heat, allow 7 minutes each side or until no longer pink.
Sprinkle chicken with cumin, garlic powder and Mexican spices before turning.
Remove chicken to a platter, allow to cool.
Saute onion and garlic in chicken drippings until tender.
Add corn and chiles. Stir well to combine.
Add canned tomatoes, saute 1 minute.
Pull chicken breasts apart by hand into shredded strips.
Add shredded chicken to saute pan, combine with vegetables.
Dust the mixture with flour to help set.
Microwave tortillas on high for 30 seconds. This softens them and makes them more pliable.
Coat the bottom of 2 (9 x 13) pans with a ladle of enchilada sauce.
Using a large shallow bowl, dip each tortilla in enchilada sauce to lightly coat.
Spoon 1/4 cup chicken mixture in each tortilla.
Fold over filling, place 8 enchiladas in each pan with seam side down.
Top with remaining enchilada sauce and cheese.
Bake for 15 minutes in preheated 350 degree oven until cheese melts.
Garnish with chopped cilantro, chopped scallions, sour cream and chopped tomatoes before serving.
Serve with Spanish rice and beans.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Tofu Burgers
Ingredients:
1 lb. firm tofu, mashed
1 c. quick oats
1/2 c. wheat germ
1 onion, minced
2 Tbsp. onion powder
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. dry parsley
Directions:
Mix together well.
Shape into patties.
Fry in a small amount of oil (divide for small family).

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Fried Tofu In Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 large egg
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. water
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. firm tofu
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. water
1 packet dry chicken bouillon
4 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 lb. mushrooms
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1 x 1 x 1/4-inch slices.
Add flour, 1 teaspoon water and salt to egg.
Beat until smooth.
Heat oil in frying pan.
Dip curd slices in the batter and brown on both sides in hot oil.
Remove browned curd slices to a dish.
Brown mushrooms, sliced, lightly in leftover oil.
Add water and bouillon and bring to a boil.
Add soy sauce.
Mix cornstarch and 1/4 cup water. Stir into sauce and cook until thick.
Add browned curd slices to sauce.
Cover pan and simmer for 1 to 2 minutes.
Serve at once. Makes 4 servings.
Preparation time:
30 minutes.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Doris' Jalapeno Pepper Poppers
Ingredients:
10 medium fresh jalapeno peppers
4 oz. cream cheese, softened
10 bacon strips, halved
Directions:
Cut peppers in half; remove seeds. Stuff with 2 tablespoons of cream cheese. Wrap with slice of bacon and secure with toothpick. Place on broiler rack that has been coated with nonstick spray. Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes or until bacon is crisp.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
fresh jalapeno peppers
Monterey Jack cheese, shredded
1/2 c. milk
1 egg
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
oil
Directions:
Slice open one side of pepper.
Clean out seeds, depending on taste.
Fill with cheese.
Mix milk, egg, flour and salt.
Beat into batter.
Heat oil.
Dip into batter.
Deep fry.
Drain on paper towel.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Corn Jalapeno Muffins
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp butter, softened
1 c all-purpose flour
1 c yellow or white cornmeal
4 tsp baking powder
1 Tbsp sugar
1 tsp salt
Pinch cayenne
2 large eggs, beaten
1 c buttermilk
1/2 c vegetable oil, or melted butter
1 c corn kernels
1 1/2 c cheddar cheese, grated
2 Tbsp minced jalapeno peppers, or to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 12 - cup muffin tin with the softened butter and set aside.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
1 dozen jalapeno peppers
1- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
1-1/2 c. self-rising flour
1-1/2 c. canola oil
water
Directions:
Wash peppers and slice in half lengthwise removing all seeds, being careful not to rub your eyes and wash your hands thoroughly when done.
Stuff each pepper half thoroughly with cream cheese. In med saucepan heat oil on med-high heat until oil is hot.
In a med size bowl mix all of flour with enough water to make batter consistency thick enough to cling to peppers.
Place poppers 6 at a time in hot oil.
Let cook until crisp turning over to cook both sides.
(New oil will not allow batter to brown as well.)
Remove cooked peppers from oil and drain on paper towels.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Jalapeno Appetizer
Ingredients:
1 small can jalapeno peppers, chopped and rinsed
1 1/2 lb. grated medium sharp Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 lb. Monterey Jack cheese
5 well-beaten eggs
Directions:
Put grated cheese in buttered 9 x 13-inch pan.
Pour peppers on top.
Pour beaten eggs over entire pan.
Bake at 300° for 45 minutes.
Serve warm or cold.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, coarsely chopped
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
2 medium firm red tomatoes (3/4 lb.)
2 medium zucchini (3/4 lb.)
1/4 tsp. basil (fresh if available)
1/4 tsp. oregano (fresh if available)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. Italian bread crumbs
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/4 tsp. paprika (optional)
cooked pasta or rice
Directions:
In heavy skillet (with metal handle) heat oil.
Add onion and saute until golden.
Add garlic and cook until slightly brown. Stir in tomatoes.
Cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
1/2 c. grated parmesan cheese
6 medium zucchini, sliced
2/3 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 large clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. each of salt, pepper, oregano and rosemary
4 c. peeled tomatoes
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Heat oil in a skillet and add zucchini, onion, parsley and the spices.
Saute mixture over medium heat, stirring often until zucchini is done but still crisp and tender.
Toss in chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Turn mixture into a serving dish and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 zucchini, cut in chunks
1/2 lb. Mozzarella cheese, cut in chunks
dash of salt
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Pour oil in bottom of 8-inch baking dish.
Add zucchini and Mozzarella cubes, salt and parsley.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Cover with bread crumbs.
Dot with butter.
Bake uncovered 45 to 50 minutes or until golden brown.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Fried Zucchini Flowers
Ingredients:
24 flower blossoms
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 clove garlic, minced (optional)
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Wash blossoms and remove inner small piece, drain and wrap in paper towel while making batter.
Beat eggs with salt, flour and baking powder.
Dip 1 flower at a time into batter and fry until golden.
Eat as appetizer.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
4 to 6 cubed zucchini
3/4 chopped onion
1 large garlic clove
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
3 to 4 large tomatoes, chopped
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/2 c. Parmesan
2 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil and saute the next 5 ingredients for about 20 minutes.
Add tomatoes and parsley and cook 5 to 10 minutes longer.
Sprinkle with Parmesan to serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 C. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 C. sour cream
1/2 C. cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Chill for two hours. Return to room temperature before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained (or you can use 1 can spinach, drained)
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing or Miracle Whip Light
1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 c. green onion slices
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients; mix well. Chill and serve with assorted vegetable dippers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
8 oz. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/4 c. chopped green onions
3 c. frozen cut leaf spinach, thawed and drained
8 oz. can water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. chopped red pepper
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Mix well.
Stir in onions, spinach, water chestnuts and red pepper.
Cover and refrigerate until flavor blends.
Serve with vegetables or assorted crackers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed
1 1/2 c. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. Knorr vegetable soup mix
1 c. (8 oz.) water chestnuts, chopped
3 green onions, finely chopped
Directions:
Squeeze spinach until dry. In medium bowl, stir together spinach, sour cream, mayonnaise, soup mix, chestnuts and green onions. Cover. Refrigerate 2 hours. Stir before serving. Make be served in a hollowed out round loaf of bread.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 pt. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. vegetable soup mix
1 pkg. frozen spinach, thawed, drained and chopped
1 can water chestnuts, chopped
green onions (if desired)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate.
Very good dip!

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apple Dessert
Ingredients:
4 to 6 apples, sliced
2/3 c. light brown sugar
dash of cinnamon
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. cold water
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. flour
1/2 c. butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Slice
apples
in deep baking dish.
Cover with 2/3 cup brown sugar,
cinnamon
and butter.
Sprinkle cold water over all. Combine
1/2
cup brown sugar, flour, 1/2 cup butter and salt to form
a crumbly mixture.
Put on top of apples.
Bake for 30
to 40
minutes or until apples are tender and crust a golden brown.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose white flour
4 to 6 c. cooking apples (1 1/2 to 2 lb.), peeled, cored and thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 ounce flour in mixing bowl. Squeeze lemon juice over apple slices.
Toss apples with sugar mixture.
Put
in
ovenproof
baking
dish.
Thoroughly
mix butter,
remaining
flour
and
cinnamon.
Add
lemon rind and remaining
1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake
in
oven
at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 c. sifted flour
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/3 c. chopped peanuts
6 medium apples
Directions:
Sift flour with sugar, salt and nutmeg.
Cut in peanut butter and butter until mixture is crumbly; add peanuts.
Peel apples; slice thin and place in well-greased baking dish (10 x 7 x 2-inch).
Sprinkle peanut butter mixture evenly over top of apples.
Bake 40 minutes at 350°, then increase temperature to 425° and bake 10 minutes longer or until browned.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apples
Ingredients:
6 tart apples
1/4 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
4 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. hot water
Directions:
Quarter apples and place in buttered pan.
Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, butter and water.
Pour over apples and bake at 350°. Can be served hot or cold or with milk.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: 6-Cup Salad("Quik-N-Ez")
Ingredients:
1 c. pineapple tidbits
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. fruit cocktail
1 c. mini marshmallows
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Chill as long as possible or overnight.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Layered Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh spinach, torn
1 small head red leaf lettuce
1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 (1.18 oz.) pkg. creamy Italian salad dressing mix
2 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen English peas, thawed
1/2 c. chopped green onion
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
chopped green onion and crumbled crisp bacon for garnish
Directions:
Combine spinach and lettuce; place half of salad greens in large clear glass salad bowl.
Combine sour cream, mayonnaise and salad dressing mix; stir well and spread half of mixture evenly over salad greens.
Layer (in order) the egg slices, peas, 1/2 cup green onion, 6 slices crumbled bacon and remaining salad greens. Spread remaining sour cream mixture over top, sealing to edge of bowl.
Cover and chill overnight.
Garnish with additional onion and bacon.
Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. fresh spinach leaves (about 10 c.)
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium tomato, cut into wedges
1/3 c. seasoned croutons
1/4 c. chopped red onion
4 slices bacon, crisp cooked and crumbled
1/2 c. Wish-Bone Classic Dijon vinaigrette dressing
1 hard-cooked egg, sliced
Directions:
In large salad bowl, combine spinach, mushrooms, tomato, croutons, red onion and bacon.
Add dressing and toss gently. Garnish with egg.
Makes about 6 side dish servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. dried minced onion
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
3/4 tsp. crushed beef bouillon cube
1/4 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
dash onion powder
1 banana, cut into pieces
1 orange, cut into quarters
2 cups orange juice
4 ounces Cool Whip
1-1/2 cups ice
1 (12 ounce) can pineapple juice
3 cups sugar
1/2 cup Smuckers orange marmalade
1/4 cup lemon juice
1 btl (32 ounce) orange-flavor seltzer water
1 pint orange sherbet
1 orange, thinly sliced
1/2 cup maraschino cherries
Directions:
Add ice cubes before serving.
(12 servings.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. instant onion
2 Tbsp. green pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
3/4 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and blend thoroughly.
(It is important that the ingredients be evenly distributed.)
Divide on three 6-inch squares of aluminum foil.
Fold foil to make airtight packages.
Label.
Store in cool dry place.
Keeps up to 6 months.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning(Healthy Mixes U-Make)
Ingredients:
1 c. dried minced onion
1/3 c. chili powder
2 Tbsp. cumin
4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 Tbsp. oregano
4 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and store in airtight container in a cool, dry place.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
4 tsp. instant minced onions
2 to 3 tsp. chili powder
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in covered jar.
Use within 6 months. Ingredients may be increased proportionally.
Makes enough for about 20 tacos.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Homemade Taco Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
6 tsp. chili powder
5 tsp. paprika
4 1/2 tsp. cumin
3 tsp. onion powder
2 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Seal and shake until evenly blended. This salt-free mix can be stored in an airtight container.
Makes 21 teaspoons (about 1/2 cup).

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1 1/2 c. chopped peanuts
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 beaten egg
2 tsp. vanilla, divided
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
2 eggs
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. creamy peanut butter
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, half the chopped peanuts and margarine until crumbly.
Stir in the beaten eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Mix well.
Press into bottom of 15 x 10-inch jelly roll pan and bake at 350° for 15 minutes.
Beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in condensed milk, 2 remaining eggs, sugar and peanut butter. Add remaining teaspoon of vanilla and mix until smooth.
Pour over prepared crust and sprinkle the remaining peanuts on top.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes until set.
Cool and cut into bars.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake
Ingredients:
25 Oreo cookies
1/4 c. margarine
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/2 c. peanut butter
4 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sugar
1 pt. whipping cream, whipped with 2 Tbsp. sugar
Hershey's chocolate syrup
Cool Whip
Directions:
Crush cookies and blend with margarine.
Press firmly on bottom of a 9-inch spring-form pan. Chill.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1 1/4 c. peanut butter, divided
4 pkg. cream cheese (8 oz.), at room temperature
1/4 c. sour cream
5 eggs
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. honey
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
peanut butter and peanut brittle for garnish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Coat 9-inch spring-form pan with nonstick cooking spray.
For crust:
In bowl combine graham cracker crumbs and 3/4 cup peanut butter.
Press onto bottom and 3/4 way up sides of pan; freeze 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: The Best Cheesecake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
1 1/4 c. flour
1/4 c. sugar
3 egg yolks
grated peel of 2 small lemons
5 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
5 eggs
1/4 c. milk
1 3/4 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
In small bowl with mixer at low speed, beat butter or margarine, flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 egg yolk and 1/2 of grated peel until well mixed; shape into ball; wrap; chill 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheese Cake
Ingredients:
1 Jell-O instant cheesecake mix
1 c. peanut butter
Directions:
Follow directions for instant cheesecake, adding the peanut butter to filling mix. Chill and cut into small squares. Very rich, but heavenly taste.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion
1 clove garlic, minced
5 large ripe red tomatoes
1 Tbsp. fresh basil, chopped
1/4 tsp. mustard powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper, ground
1/4 c. tomato paste
1/4 c. flour
2 c. chicken broth
4 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 c. light cream
Directions:
In a deep saucepan, melt butter.
Saute onion and garlic until golden.
Slice tomatoes and add with dry mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, 8 to 10 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste.
(If tomatoes are not full flavored, you may wish to add more paste.) Add flour and chicken broth, then bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
Puree in a blender, then strain to remove seeds and skins.
Add 1 to 2 cups light cream.
Reheat to serve, but do not boil.
Add sherry to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
2 lb. ripe tomatoes or 2 (15 oz.) cans tomatoes, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. butter
1 bay leaf
1 heaping tsp. brown sugar
2 tsp. basil, finely chopped
2 whole cloves
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 pt. light cream
1 c. milk
6 large croutons, buttered
2 Tbsp. chives, chopped
Directions:
Peel and seed tomatoes.
Saute onion in butter and add the chopped tomatoes, bay leaf, sugar, cloves, salt, pepper and basil. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are thoroughly cooked, about 25 minutes.
Remove bay leaf and cloves and transfer soup to blender or food processor to puree.
Add cream and milk and heat.
Serve topped with toasted buttered croutons.
Sprinkle with chives.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Creamy Shrimp Bisque
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 lb. shrimp (shelled and deveined, save shells)
1 celery stalk, chopped
1 c. wine
1 bay leaf
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
4 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion, chopped
1 carrot, chopped
2 1/2 c. water
1/4 c. regular long grain rice
1/2 tsp. salt
3 chicken flavored bouillon cubes
2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
In a 4-quart pot over medium-high heat, cook shrimp shells in hot olive oil until pink, constantly stirring with slotted spoon. Discard shells, leaving flavored oil in pot.
Add shrimp to oil and cook, over medium-high heat, stirring frequently, until shrimp turn pink, about 3 minutes; spoon into bowl.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add butter and chopped vegetables, cook until tender, stirring occasionally.
Stir in remaining ingredients with the exception of the tomatoes and cream, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until rice is tender (about 15 minutes).
Remove pot from heat, discard bay leaf, drain juice from tomatoes, remove seeds from tomatoes, stir tomatoes into rice combo and add shrimp.
In blender at high speed, blend mixture, one half at a time, until smooth.
Return shrimp mixture to pot, stir in cream.
Bring to short of boiling, over medium heat.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato-Mushroom Bisque
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 celery stalks, trimmed and chopped
1 small onion, chopped
1 leek (white and light green parts only), chopped
1 large shallot, chopped
1 garlic clove, chopped
3/4 lb. fresh mushrooms, stemmed and thinly sliced
2 1/2 lb. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
2 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. white wine
1/2 c. whipping cream
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. thyme
1 small bay leaf
pinch of saffron threads
Directions:
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in heavy, large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add celery, onion, leek, shallot and garlic. Cook 7 minutes.
Add 1/2 pound mushrooms and saute 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes, chicken stock, wine, cream, lemon, thyme, bay leaf and saffron.
Bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
1 - 14 ounce can tomato sauce
1 - 14 ounce can stewed tomatoes
1 small onion chopped
1/3 cup cooked, crumbled bacon
1 tablespoon sugar
3 bay leaves
1 tablespoon granulated garlic
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 cup V - 8 juice
salt and black pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, onion, bacon crumbles, sugar, bay leaves, garlic, chicken bouillon, V - 8 juice, salt and pepper in a large sauce pan. Mix well.
Simmer 1 hour.
Serve hot with homemade croutons.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. sherry or wine
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. ginger
1 clove garlic, minced
boiling water
1 tsp. fresh lemon juice
pinch of white pepper
2 egg yolks
2 oz. (1/8 lb.) butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Preheat the blender.
Put the butter on medium heat. Beat the yolks.
When the butter just starts to sizzle, pour it slowly into the beaten yolks (while beating) through the barely open top of the blender.
Add lemon juice.
Add salt and white pepper to taste.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 Tbsp. ground ginger
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
2 cloves garlic, minced
Directions:
Mix together.
Let stand for 2 hours at room temperature before using.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Teriyaki
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. orange juice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. freshly grated ginger or 1 tsp. ground ginger
2 Tbsp. sherry
3 garlic cloves, mashed
2 medium green peppers, cut into 1-inch squares
12 cherry tomatoes
12 medium mushrooms
12 pearl onions
1 1/2 lb. chicken breasts, boned, skinned and cut into 4 x 1/2-inch strips
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients in large shallow dish; stir with ladle.
Add vegetables and chicken; toss to coat.
Let marinate in refrigerator for several hours.
Toss occasionally.
Thread vegetables on 12 (6-inch) skewers alternating vegetables and chicken, weaving chicken strips in an accordion fashion.
Broil about 6 inches from heat, about 3 minutes on each side.
Baste chicken and vegetables thoroughly with marinade while broiling. Makes 6 servings (2 skewers each).

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: "Make Your Own" Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1 c. sherry (the real kind) or dilute to 1/2 c. sherry and 1/2 c. water
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 medium onion, chopped fine
1/2 tsp. dry ginger
2 tsp. sugar
2 whole chickens (fryers)
3 lb. ground meat
1 pork roast
6 to 7 small cans corn (whole kernel)
6 to 7 cans whole tomatoes
2 cans tomato sauce
1 can tomato paste (the smallest can)
2 (32 oz. size) bottles ketchup
1 lemon, squeezed and seeded (use juice only)
2 large onions, diced
2/3 c. vinegar (white)
1/2 c. sugar (white granulated)
1/2 c. sugar (brown granulated)
2 Tbsp. yellow mustard
1/3 stick butter
1 bottle hot sauce
salt and pepper to taste (to season meats as they are cooking)
1 fresh ham with the bone in it (9 to 14 lb.)
salt to taste
black pepper
2 garlic cloves, chopped
2 Tbsp. corn oil or vegetable cooking oil
2 large onions, peeled and left whole
1 whole chicken or if white meat is preferred, use breast filets
1 can Veg-All mixed vegetables
1 can Campbell's cream of chicken soup
2 deep dish pie shells, at room temperature
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Remove the skin from the chicken.
Place in a pot with enough water to cover the chicken.
Boil in a medium pot until tender.
Add the Veg-All and the cream of chicken soup. Mix well.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/3 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. sugar
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 tsp. fresh ginger, minced (or 1/2 tsp. ground ginger)
1/4 c. dry white wine (optional)
2 c. regular-strength beef broth (or 2 1/4 c., if wine is omitted)
Directions:
In a pan, blend together the cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar, garlic and fresh or ground ginger. Stir in wine, if used, and the beef broth. Cook, stirring until thickened. Makes about 2 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Pork
Ingredients:
2 lb. meat, cut in cubes and cooked
1/4 c. drippings
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery or celery seed
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. Accent
2 garlic, crushed, or granulated garlic
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. vinegar
1/3 c. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat drippings in saucepan.
Add other ingredients and simmer 2 or 3 minutes.
Add pork and simmer 5 to 10 minutes, longer if time permits.
Serve on buns or use as main dish.
The longer it simmers, the better it is.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Cocktail Pork Bbq
Ingredients:
1 lb. stewing beef, cubed
1 lb. pork, cubed
1 can tomato soup
1 c. water
1/3 bottle Worcestershire sauce
1 onion, chopped
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. vinegar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients
and simmer 3 hours.
Mash with potato masher; continue cooking until thick as desired.
Serve in chafing dish
with small rolls.
Triple amount for cocktail party.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Texas Bbq Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 stick of butter
1 small onion (chopped)
1 clove garlic (minced)
1 tsp. celery salt
1 cup catsup
1/2 cup vinegar
1 1/2 cups water
1/4 cup worcestershire sauce
3 bay leaves
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chili powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add onion, garlic and celery.
Cook until onion is tender.
Stir in water, catsup, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, bay leaves and pepper.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove a little of the sauce and mix with chili powder, then add to the rest of the sauce.
Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour before serving.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Barbecue
Ingredients:
3 or 4 lb. cooked pork shoulder or pork loin
5/6 c. catsup
2 1/2 tsp. brown sugar
1/8 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
dash of black and red pepper
2 1/2 tsp. vinegar
1/8 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/4 c. water
2 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/3 clove garlic, chopped
2/3 tsp. salt
1/3 c. ground onion
Directions:
Combine all ingredients together, except meat.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; add meat and simmer 1 hour.
Serve on warm buns with coleslaw.
Pull the pork into pieces.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: White Bbq Sauce For Chicken
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or oleo
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
few grains cayenne pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
2/3 c. water or stock
2 Tbsp. chopped pickle
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. vinegar
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
Directions:
Melt oleo.
Combine
dry
ingredients
and add to oleo. Stir until well blended.
Remove from heat.
Combine remaining ingredients and gradually stir into butter mixture.
Return to heat.
Stir until thick and smooth.
Enough for 2 chickens.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Fat-Free Strawberry Dessert(My Personal Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 box fat-free angel food cake
fresh strawberries
1 (8 oz.) container fat-free yogurt
Directions:
Prepare cake mix according to directions.
Wash and slice strawberries and add yogurt.
Mix well.
Place a slice of cake on plate; top with strawberry yogurt mix and add fat-free whipped cream if you desire.
