Light and fresh!

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free One Layer Yellow Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. self-rising flour
1/2 c. fructose sweetener
1/3 c. shortening
1 egg
3/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding
3 c. milk
3 bananas, sliced
1 regular size can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)
Cool Whip
nuts
1 box vanilla sugar-free pudding
Chocolate Sauce
sliced almonds
Directions:
Mix sugar-free pudding according to directions.
Let set. Spoon all of pudding between the 2 layers of cake.
Top with Chocolate Sauce and sliced almonds.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Low Calorie Dessert
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar-free drink mix
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
Directions:
Mix sugar-free drink mix with water as directed on package. Mix well and bring to boil.
Cool.
Add unflavored gelatin and mix until dissolved.
Pour into mold and chill in refrigerator until firm.
Makes 4 servings.
One serving equals negligible calories and free exchange.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. raisins
2 beaten eggs
1 c. unsweetened applesauce
3 Tbsp. liquid sweetener
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. chopped nuts
2 c. flour
3 c. water
3/4 c. oil
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Combine and cook raisins and water until water is absorbed. Cool; combine eggs, applesauce, oil, vanilla and sweetener.
Sift flour, soda, salt and spices.
Add to egg mixture.
Add raisins and nuts.
Pour into greased and floured Bundt or tube pan.
Bake at 350° for one hour.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: No Sugar Cookies(For Diabetics)
Ingredients:
3/4 c. oleo
1 egg, well beaten
1/2 c. raisins
3/4 c. oatmeal, toasted
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. nuts
3 tsp. Sucaryl
1 1/2 c. flour, sifted
2 bananas, mashed
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Pour 1/2 cup boiling water over raisins.
Let stand. Thoroughly cream butter, Sucaryl and beaten egg.
Sift dry ingredients and add to butter mixture; add raisins, vanilla, toasted oatmeal and nuts.
Drop by teaspoonful on baking sheet. Cook 15 minutes at 400°.
Makes 4 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter flavored shortening
1 1/4 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking soda
2 c. (12 oz.) chocolate chips
1 c. chopped nuts
1/2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. milk
1 3/4 c. flour
2 1/2 c. oatmeal
Directions:
Beat margarine and sugar until creamy.
Add eggs, milk and vanilla and beat well.
Add flour, baking soda and salt.
Mix well. On ungreased cookie sheet, drop by tablespoonful.
Bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.
Cool one minute before removing from cookie sheet.
Cool completely on cooling rack.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. flour
2 1/2 c. oatmeal
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
12 oz. chocolate chips
Directions:
In a large bowl, cream together butter and white and brown sugars, then add eggs and vanilla.
In another bowl, mix flour and oatmeal (process in blender until powdered), then in the same bowl put in baking powder and soda.
Combine all ingredients in one bowl and add chocolate chips.
Drop cookie dough on a cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 6 to 8 minutes or until light brown.
Makes 5 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. solid vegetable shortening
1/2 c. (1 stick) unsalted butter (room temperature)
3/4 c. sugar
3/4 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar
2 eggs
1 (3.4 oz.) pkg. vanilla instant pudding mix
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. water
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. old-fashioned oats
2 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
12 oz. chocolate chips
1 1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Butter heavy, large cookie sheet.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. white sugar
1 c. butter (or 1/2 butter, 1/2 oleo)
2 eggs
1 c. flour
2 c. oatmeal
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chocolate chips
1 c. peanut butter
Directions:
Beat eggs in large bowl.
Add brown sugar, white sugar and vanilla.
Add butter (melted).
Mix well.
Add peanut butter and mix well.
Sift together flour, salt and soda, then add this mixture to preceding mixture.
Add (slowly) oatmeal, mixing well. Add chocolate chips; mix well.
Form balls in hands, about walnut size.
Place on cookie sheet so can spread.
Bake about 10 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. shortening
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
3 tsp. hot water
3 c. oatmeal
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
1 c. pecans
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix together and bake at 375° for 5 minutes only.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. dark rum
1/4 c. milk
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. shredded coconut
16 medium-sized shrimp, peeled and deveined
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
In medium-sized bowl, mix eggs, 1 cup flour, rum, milk, baking powder and spices.
Place remaining flour in small bowl.
Spread coconut on small plate.
Dredge shrimp in flour, then dunk it in the batter, then dredge it in coconut.
Place coated shrimp on waxed paper.
Carefully drop shrimp in hot oil and fry 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Coconut Milk(Ginataang Hipon)
Ingredients:
1 lb. shrimp
1 1/2 lb. green beans
1 can coconut milk
hot green pepper (jalapeno)
ginger
cooking oil
Directions:
Saute ginger and shrimp.
Add coconut milk and let it simmer for about 5 minutes.
Lastly, add pepper and green beans.
Cover and let it boil until vegetable is cooked.
Do not overcook vegetables.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Curry With Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 large onion, finely chopped
1 cardamom pod, crushed
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
4 cloves
salt to taste
4 whole black peppercorns
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
4 c. large peeled shrimp
2 c. coconut milk*
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add onion and brown.
Add all the spices and saute for 2 minutes.
Add shrimp and saute 1/2 minute. Add coconut milk (strained) and 1/4 cup shredded coconut that is leftover after straining.
Cover and cook on medium heat until the gravy thickens.
Serve over plain rice or polao.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. large raw shrimp
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. white pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. ice water
oil for deep frying
2 c. short, shredded coconut
1/2 c. orange marmalade
1/4 c. Grey Poupon country mustard
1/4 c. honey
3 to 4 drops Tabasco
Directions:
Peel, devein and wash shrimp.
Dry well on paper towels.
Set aside.
In a bowl, mix all dry ingredients for batter.
Add 2 tablespoons oil and ice water.
Stir to blend.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1 c. shredded unsweetened coconut
3 c. distilled water
1 tsp. honey (raw)
pinch of salt
Directions:
Blend until very smooth.
Strain well or use on cereal unstrained.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey-Vegetable Chili
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive oil
15 oz. ground turkey
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped bell pepper
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
2 c. coarsely chopped tomatoes with juice
1/4 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. no-salt-added tomato paste
2 Tbsp. drained, canned, diced mild green chilies
1/4 tsp. salt
4 oz. rinsed, drained, canned kidney beans
1 c. frozen corn kernels
Directions:
Warm 2 teaspoons oil until hot, but not smoking.
Add the turkey and brown.
Put turkey aside and drain.
Add remaining 2 teaspoons oil to pan and saute onions and bell pepper until golden (3 to 5 minutes).
Stir in chili powder, garlic and cumin.
Cook, stirring, for 1/2 to 1 minute.
Add the next 5 ingredients.
Add turkey and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the kidney beans and corn.
Cook about 5 minutes until last ingredients are heated through.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Smoked Turkey
Ingredients:
1 (15 to 20 lb.) turkey
ground cayenne pepper
1 onion
1/2 bell pepper, cut in 4 pieces
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
6 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
water to almost fill the pan
Directions:
Put on about 10 p.m. and cook all night.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey Stuffed Peppers
Ingredients:
2 large green or red bell peppers
1/2 c. chopped onions
1/2 lb. lean ground turkey
3/4 c. fresh or frozen corn
3/4 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. parsley, chopped
1/4 c. grated low calorie Mozzarella cheese (1 oz.)
2 garlic cloves, chopped
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/3 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
Cut peppers lengthwise to form oval boats; remove seeds.
Boil them for 5 minutes or microwave them.
Drain and rinse with cold water.
In 10-inch frypan, saute onions and garlic for 2 minutes. Add ground turkey, tomato paste and corn, stirring frequently; cook 5 minutes.
Add rice, Worcestershire sauce and pepper; cook 2 minutes on low heat.
Fill each pepper boat with 1/4 of cooked turkey mixture.
Sprinkle each with cheese and broil or microwave on High for 2 minutes.
Serves 4. Contains 189 calories each serving.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
canola oil
1 lb. lean ground raw turkey
1 c. chopped celery
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can V-8 juice
1 (16 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained
1 bay leaf
2 Tbsp. dried minced onion
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. instant beef bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
1/2 to 1 c. beer (optional)
Directions:
Spray cold pan with canola oil.
Cook turkey and celery.
Use a meat fork to break turkey into pieces.
Cook until no longer pink.
Stir in remaining ingredients, tomatoes, juice, sauce, beans, spices and beef, if desired.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer at least 30 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Discard bay leaf.
Serves 4.
Can be doubled easily.
(Serving has 4 grams of fat and 380 calories.)

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey And Black Bean Chili
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped red bell pepper
1 c. chopped green bell pepper
1/2 c. chopped carrots
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. chili powder
3 tsp. ground cumin
1 lb. extra lean ground turkey breast
2 (16 oz.) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
3 c. canned chicken broth
1 (16 oz.) jar fresh mild salsa
1 Tbsp. low-sodium tomato paste
freshly ground pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large saucepan over medium-low heat, cook onion, pepper, carrots and garlic in hot oil until golden brown and tender. Sprinkle with chili powder and ground cumin. Cook, stirring frequently, 7 to 8 minutes until spices are fragrant. Add ground turkey breast and cook, stirring with wooden spoon to break up meat, about 5 minutes or until cooked through and slightly brown. Add beans, broth, salsa and tomato paste. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, 45 minutes or until thickened. Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 egg
2 c. grated, unpeeled zucchini
1 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. grated onion
1 qt. vegetable oil
Directions:
Mix first 5 ingredients
to
make
a batter; stir well. Add next 3 ingredients.
Mix
until blended.
Drop by teaspoon into hot oil.
Cook until brown.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini, sliced paper thin
1 c. flour
2 eggs, beaten
salt, pepper and oregano to taste
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. grated cheese
1 c. oil
Directions:
Put together zucchini, flour, eggs, salt, pepper, oregano, garlic, water and cheese.
Mix well.
Heat the oil.
When hot, drop batter by tablespoons into the oil and fry until golden brown. Drain on paper towels!

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
3 large eggs
1/4 c. all-purpose flour, unsifted
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 medium green zucchini, shredded
1 medium yellow squash, shredded
1 large carrot, pared and shredded
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. oil
Directions:
In large bowl, beat eggs, flour, onions, salt and pepper.
Stir in vegetables.
In large skillet, heat 1/4 cup oil.
Drop batter by tablespoons into hot oil.
Cook about 1 minute on each side or until golden brown.
Drain on paper towel.
Serve hot with Red Pepper Mayonnaise.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
2 c. Zucchini Squash, grated
1 small Onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. Sugar
1 Tbsp. Salt
6 Tbsp. Flour
2 Eggs
2 Tbsp. Margarine, melted
Directions:
Combine all ingredients with a spoon and drop by spoonsful on a hot griddle with melted margarine.
Cook until brown on one side, turn.
Serve immediately while they are hot.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
1 lb. zucchini (about 3 medium, unpeeled), grated
1 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
1 tsp. minced fresh chives
1 c. buttermilk pancake mix
1 egg, beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. vegetable oil
Directions:
Combine first 7 ingredients, stirring well. Drop mixture by tablespoonfuls into hot oil (375°). Cook until golden brown, turning once. Drain on paper towels; serve immediately. Yields 1 dozen fritters.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka
Ingredients:
2 medium egg plants
1 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. parsley
1 tsp. salt
1 slice bread, torn into crumbs
dash of ground cinnamon
milk and egg sauce
3 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 c. milk
dash of pepper
1 beaten egg
1 lb. ground meat
1/2 c. water
1 Tbsp. tomato paste
dash of pepper
2 beaten eggs
1/4 c. shredded American cheese
3 Tbsp. plain flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of ground nutmeg
1/4 c. shredded cheese
Directions:
Pare eggplant and slice 1/2-inch thick.
Sprinkle with salt and set aside.
Brown meat with onions and drain off fat.
Add water, parsley, tomato paste, salt and pepper.
Simmer until liquid is nearly gone.
Cool and stir in half bread crumbs, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup cheese and cinnamon.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion
salt and pepper to taste
1 1/2 lb. ground meat (beef or lamb)
1 clove garlic
1 c. tomato puree
1/2 c. cold water
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. salad oil
1 c. flour
2 medium eggplant, cut into 1/2 inch lengthwise
Directions:
Cook onion in butter with salt and pepper for 5 minutes.
Add meat and garlic; cook 10 minutes.
Add puree, water and nutmeg; cook 10 minutes.
Coat eggplant with flour seasoned with salt and pepper.
Fry in hot oil.
Place 1/2 of eggplant in baking dish and cover with 1/2 meat mixture.
Repeat layers and top with cheese. Bake at 350 degrees until hot.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka (Greek)
Ingredients:
2 onions, chopped
1 medium eggplant, pared and cut up
1 lb. hamburger
oil as needed
salt as needed
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. flour
3/4 c. milk
3/4 c. stock
2 c. shredded cheese
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 or 2 eggs, separated with whites beaten stiff
Directions:
Saute in oil separately until done the onion, eggplant and hamburger.
Drain; set aside.
Salt to taste.
Make a sauce with 3 tablespoons oil and the flour.
Cook over low heat.
Add the stock and milk; cook until thickened.
Add a little to the egg yolks, then put the egg yolks in sauce.
On a buttered casserole dish, layer eggplant, meat, cheese, sauce and nutmeg.
Repeat layers. Beat egg whites; smear on top.
Sprinkle a little cheese and nutmeg.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes, until bubbly.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka
Ingredients:
1-2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. sirloin, cut into strips
1-2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 large eggplant, peeled & cut into thin strips
4 scallions sliced or 1 small onion, chopped
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/2 red bell pepper cut into strips
1/2 green bell pepper cut into strips
1 14 oz. can tomatoes or 4 med. tomatoes peeled & chopped
2 Tbsp. ketchup
3 Tbsp. dry white wine
1/2 cup sliced Kalamata (ripe) olives
3 oz. crumbled feta
Directions:
Cook beef in oil, remove beef.	Add more oil if needed and cook garlic, egg plant, scallions for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms and peppers, cook 5 minutes.
Add ketchup, wine, olives.
Simmer 5-8 minutes, add beef, heat.
Serve alone or on rice or pasta.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Beef Moussaka
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. dry red wine
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 eggs
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
3/4 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1 large eggplant
Directions:
Brown meat with the onion and drain.
Stir in parsley, salt, pepper, nutmeg, tomato sauce and wine.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes.
Pare eggplant and cut into slices. Arrange half the eggplant in a baking dish.
Cover with the half the meat mixture.
Repeat layers.
Cover with aluminum foil.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes or until tender.
Beat together eggs, milk and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Pour over hot casserole and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake uncovered until custard is set, 10 to 15 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes, then cut into squares.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
1 butternut squash, halved and seeded
3 Tbsp. butter
fresh rosemary and thyme
grated nutmeg
salt and pepper
honey
Directions:
Place squash, cut side up, in shallow roasting pan. Place 1 tablespoon butter in each half. Place seasonings on each half. Cover pan with aluminum foil and roast 1 1/2 hours at 350°. Remove herbs, spoon squash into a bowl and mash until very smooth. In a saucepan, add honey and remaining butter; add seasonings and warm through before serving.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
4 medium squash
2/3 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. white sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
4 tsp. lemon juice
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cut potatoes for frying (about 6 good ones).
Coat with 1 heaping
tablespoonful of flour.
Fry in deep oil.
Salt to taste.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 c. melted margarine
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/3 c. water (from cooking squash)
1 c. cooked squash
1/2 c. raisins or mixed fruit
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat shortening, eggs, water and squash. Combine with dry ingredients until dry mix is moist. Pour into greased and floured pan.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
1 medium butternut squash
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 c. finely diced unpeeled apple
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. cottage cheese
1/8 tsp. each cinnamon and ginger
1/4 tsp. each salt and pepper
1 c. Cheddar cheese
dried parsley
Directions:
Slice squash in half lengthwise.
Place face down on a baking dish.
Add 1/2 cup water.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until flesh is tender and shell is firm enough to be stuffed.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked butternut squash
1/2 stick margarine
1 c. sugar
2 beaten eggs
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
raisins, nuts, coconut
Directions:
Mix all together and pour into greased baking dish.
Melt 1/2 stick margarine and drizzle over casserole.
Add topping.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. butter flavored granules
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
dash of ground red pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender. Process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides.
Pour into a small saucepan. Cook sauce over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Yields 2 3/4 cups.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1 pt. heavy cream
1 stick butter
2 Tbsp. cream cheese
1/2 to 3/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
In a saucepan, combine butter, heavy cream and cream cheese. Simmer until melted and mixed well. Add Parmesan cheese and garlic powder. Simmer on low for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Basic Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
3/4 to 1 Tbsp. garlic
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skim milk
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. black pepper
salt to taste
Directions:
Saute onion in the vegetable oil until tender.
Stir in the flour and garlic until smooth.
Slowly stir in the evaporated skim milk.
Cook over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil and begins to thicken, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat and stir in cheese, basil and black pepper.
Serve on hot pasta. Makes 1 1/2 cups sauce.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Light And Easy Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. butter flavored granules
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender; process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides.
Pour into a small saucepan.
Cook sauce over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Yields 2 1/2 cups.
Contains 86 calories, 0.8 g fat and 0.5 g saturated fat per 3 1/2-ounce serving.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
4 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
5 shakes hot pepper
2 c. milk
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat milk.
In separate pan, melt 3 tablespoons butter then add flour and garlic powder.
Mix well.
Add heated milk; whip until lumps are mostly gone.
Simmer 3 minutes until thickened, stir occasionally.
Add Parmesan cheese; mix well.
Add pepper and remaining butter.
Salt and pepper to taste.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. dark rum
1/4 c. milk
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. shredded coconut
16 medium-sized shrimp, peeled and deveined
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
In medium-sized bowl, mix eggs, 1 cup flour, rum, milk, baking powder and spices.
Place remaining flour in small bowl.
Spread coconut on small plate.
Dredge shrimp in flour, then dunk it in the batter, then dredge it in coconut.
Place coated shrimp on waxed paper.
Carefully drop shrimp in hot oil and fry 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. large raw shrimp
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. white pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. ice water
oil for deep frying
2 c. short, shredded coconut
1/2 c. orange marmalade
1/4 c. Grey Poupon country mustard
1/4 c. honey
3 to 4 drops Tabasco
Directions:
Peel, devein and wash shrimp.
Dry well on paper towels.
Set aside.
In a bowl, mix all dry ingredients for batter.
Add 2 tablespoons oil and ice water.
Stir to blend.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Tropical Coconut Fried Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. raw, peeled, deveined, large shrimp (fresh or frozen)
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. milk
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 to 3 c. shredded coconut
oil for frying
Sweet 'N Sour Sauce
Directions:
Thaw shrimp if frozen.
Measure 1 1/2 cups flour; set aside. In a 1-quart mixing bowl, combine the remaining 1 1/2 cups flour, milk, baking powder, curry powder and salt.
Place reserved flour and coconut in 2 separate shallow pans.
Dredge shrimp in flour, dip in bowl, then roll in coconut.
Fry in hot oil at 350° until coconut is golden brown.
Drain on paper towel before transfering to warming tray.
Serve hot with Sweet and Sour sauce.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
Tail section may be left on for easier handling.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Battered Shrimp
Ingredients:
4 c. sweetened shredded coconut
2 tsp. ground cumin
3/4 tsp. ground coriander
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
salt and pepper
2 beaten eggs
2 lb. large shrimp, shelled (leave on tails)
Directions:
Bake coconut in a 325° oven until brown (about 10 minutes; stir several times and watch carefully).
Coarsely grind coconut. Mix spices in a large bowl with eggs; coat shrimp.
Dredge in coconut.
Transfer to
greased baking sheets and refrigerate 1 hour to 1 day.
Bake in a 400° oven for about 12 minutes.
Serve with Mango Chutney Sauce.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
oil
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 egg
2 Tbsp. cream of coconut or whipping cream
3/4 c. flaked coconut
1/3 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Slit shrimp along curved side, cutting almost through.
Place on paper towel. Heat 2-inches of oil in a saucepan to 350°. Combine flour, salt and dry mustard in small bowl.
Beat egg and cream of coconut in small bowl.
In third bowl, combine coconut and bread crumbs.
Dip shrimp in flour mixture, then egg mixture, then coconut mixture.
Refrigerate until ready to cook.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Shrimp And Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. wine vinegar
1/3 c. water
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 c. salad oil
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 cloves garlic, crushed in a garlic press or minced
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. thyme, crushed
1 tsp. oregano, crushed
2 lb. large shrimp, cooked, peeled and deveined
3 small onions, sliced
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
2 ripe avocados, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Note:
To prepare, 20 minutes (allow time for chilling).

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Avocados And Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp, cooked, shelled and deveined
1 c. salad oil
1 medium red onion, thinly sliced
3/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/2 c. celery, minced
1/4 c. capers, undrained
5 bay leaves
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. pepper
3 drops of hot pepper sauce
lime juice
lettuce leaves
Directions:
Toss the
shrimp
with all ingredients, except the last three listed.
Chill
shrimp mixture for 24 hours.
Remove bay leaves and
strain
shrimp
mixture.
Sprinkle
diced avocados with lime juice.
Add avocados to the strained shrimp mixture. Serve on lettuce lined plates.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Shrimp-Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime Jell-O
1 c. hot water
1/2 c. cold water
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/8 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. diced shrimp (7 oz. can)
1/3 c. celery
1 tsp. chopped onion
1 c. diced avocado
Directions:
Dissolve gelatin in hot water.
Add cold water, vinegar, mayonnaise, salt and pepper.
Blend with rotary beater.
Pour into refrigerator tray.
Quick chill in freezing unit until firm, about 1-inch from edge, but soft in the center, about 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Lime-Cooked Shrimp With Avocados
Ingredients:
12 medium size shrimp, peeled and deveined
3/4 c. lime juice (from about 6 limes)
salt and pepper to taste
1 Tbsp. cumin
2 ripe avocados, peeled, pitted and cut into 8 slices each
2 red onions
1 c. thinly sliced cabbage
1 ripe tomato, diced small
1/4 c. fresh oregano
1 tsp. red chili flakes
1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil
Directions:
In a large pot of boiling water, blanch the shrimp for 45 seconds.
Remove and drain shrimp.
Cut them in half and place them in a flat, shallow pan.
Pour 1/2 cup of lime juice over the shrimp.
Sprinkle with salt, pepper and cumin.
Cover the pan and leave in refrigerator for 2 hours.
Remove shrimp and discard lime juice.
Place shrimp in a large bowl with avocados, onion, cabbage, tomato, oregano and chili flakes.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Avocado Crab Or Shrimp Salad
Ingredients:
1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime or lemon jello
1 1/2 c. hot water
3 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 ripe avocado
1 small pkg. cream cheese, softened
3/4 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. green pepper, chopped
1/4 c. pimento
1 tsp. onion juice
1/2 c. mayonnaise
2 hard-boiled eggs
1 can crab or shrimp
Directions:
Mix jello with hot water, vinegar and salt.
Set aside.
When starting to set, beat until foamy.
Mash avocado and mix with softened cream cheese.
Mix celery, green pepper, pimento, onion juice, mayonnaise and eggs; add to foamy jello.
Add avocado mix to jello.
Add crab or shrimp.
Pour into Pyrex dish and refrigerate.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: 6-Cup Salad("Quik-N-Ez")
Ingredients:
1 c. pineapple tidbits
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. fruit cocktail
1 c. mini marshmallows
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Chill as long as possible or overnight.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Quinoam, Leek And Tofu Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. tofu
2 tsp. sesame oil
1 clove garlic, pressed
1 leek, chopped
2 c. cooked quinoa
1 tsp. sea salt or 2 tsp. shoyu
dash of black pepper
1 c. bread crumbs
1 c. soymilk (optional)
1/2 c. cheese, grated (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Working with 1/2 cup tofu at a time, squeeze out water with hands.
Set aside.
Heat a large skillet or wok; add oil.
Add garlic, then leek.
Saute until lightly browned.
Add quinoa, then tofu, sauteing for 2 minutes after each addition.
Add seasonings.
Oil casserole.
Add 1/2 cup bread crumbs; rotate casserole to coat evenly.
Gently add the quinoa mixture.
Press a well in the center of the quinoa; pour in soymilk.
Cover with remaining bread crumbs and cheese.
Cover; bake for 20 minutes.
Remove cover; continue to bake until cheese is nicely browned.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Rice Quiche
Ingredients:
2 c. water
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli
1/2 c. chopped onion
3 c. cooked long grain rice
6 oz. shredded reduced-fat sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. frozen egg substitute, thawed and divided
Mazola vegetable spray
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. skim milk
2 (2 1/2 oz.) jars sliced mushrooms, drained
Directions:
Bring water to a boil in a medium saucepan.
Add broccoli and onion; cover.
Reduce heat and simmer 8 to 10 minutes or until vegies are tender.
Drain well; set aside.
Combine rice, 1/2 cup cheese, 1/2 cup egg substitute and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Press evenly over bottoms and up sides of two 9-inch quiche dishes or pie plates, coated with spray Mazola.
Combine remaining 1 cup egg substitute, remaining salt, pepper, milk, mushrooms and broccoli mixture in a bowl; stir well.
Pour mixture into dishes.
Bake at 375° for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven and sprinkle remaining cheese.
Bake until cheese melts (10 minutes).
Serves 12 (145 calories per serving).

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. chickpeas
1/2 lb. diced Mozzarella cheese
6 oz. jar roasted peppers, drained and cut into strips
1 c. paper thin sliced zucchini
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. wine vinegar (to taste)
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
dash of pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Herb Roast Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts
1 tsp. dried rosemary
1 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
1/4 c. chicken stock
1/2 c. low-fat sour cream
1 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
juice of 3 limes
cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix together the rosemary, sage, thyme, cumin and salt in a bowl. Sprinkle over the chicken breasts and rub in, coating both sides. Broil or grill chicken until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. milk
5 eggs
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. almond or orange extract
Directions:
Makes about 20 slices.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast In A Bowl
Ingredients:
6 slices bread, cubed
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
3/4 c. Egg Beaters
2 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 c. sliced bananas (optional)
Directions:
Pour melted butter over bread cubes to coat.
Mix Egg Beaters, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg and bananas (if used) and pour over bread cubes and stir gently to coat.
Bake in greased 2 quart baking dish, uncovered, at 375° for 40 minutes, or until a knife comes out clean.
Serve warm.
Dish into bowls that have been coated or drizzled with maple syrup.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
4 Tbsp. sugar
3/4 c. cold milk
1 Tbsp. butter
6 to 8 slices white bread
Directions:
With a fork, lightly beat the eggs, salt, nutmeg, sugar and milk until well mixed.
Melt butter in frying pan and heat until butter begins to brown.
Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture until well soaked and place in the frying pan to cook. Cook one side until lightly browned and flip over to brown the other side.
You can keep the cooked French toast hot in a warm oven until you've cooked all your bread.
Serve hot with butter and syrup.
Yield: 2 to 3 servings.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/8 tsp. salt
3 tsp. butter
6 slices French bread
1 Tbsp. powdered sugar
Directions:
Beat eggs.
Add milk, vanilla, flour and salt to eggs.
Beat with electric mixer.
Be sure flour is well mixed.
Heat skillet. Add teaspoon of butter to skillet.
Dip bread, a slice at a time, into batter.
Coat each side.
Drop bread into hot pan; cook 2 to 3 minutes per side or until golden brown.
Cut bread in half diagonally.
Sprinkle powdered sugar on toast.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter French Toast
Ingredients:
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/4 c. honey
1/4 tsp. salt
8 slices bread
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Blend peanut butter, honey and salt. Place about 2 1/2 tablespoons of peanut butter-honey mixture between 2 slices of bread to make a sandwich. Combine eggs and the milk. Soak sandwiches in egg mixture. Melt butter or margarine in a baking pan or frypan. Bake sandwiches at 400° (hot oven) about 40 minutes. Turn sandwiches to brown both sides. Or cook slowly in frypan on top of range. Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. onion, finely chopped
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped
2 small cans mushrooms, sliced
2 small cans tuna, drained
1 tomato, chopped, peeled and drained
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1 (10 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
In a small skillet, melt margarine and saute onion, green pepper and mushrooms, stirring often, until tender (about 5 minutes).
Stir together with next 6 items.
Add noodles, mixing well.
Turn into a greased 2-quart casserole.
Top with cheese and bake, uncovered, at 400° for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked and drained well
1 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach or broccoli, cooked
1/3 c. onion, sauteed in 1/4 c. butter
2 eggs, boiled and chipped finely
1 can cream of celery soup
3/4 c. milk
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Add to butter and onions; stir in vegetable and chopped eggs. Add 1 can (12 1/2 ounces) well drained, chopped tuna.
Stir in noodles and pour into a 2-quart casserole.
Add dash of Parmesan on top.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. diced green pepper
1 c. sliced celery
1/3 c. chopped onions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
2/3 c. milk
4 oz. process American cheese, cubed (about 1 c.)
8 oz. medium noodles
1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. chopped pimiento (from 4 oz. can) or add 1/4 c. diced red pepper with green pepper above
1 (9 1/2 oz.) can tuna, drained and flaked
1/3 c. toasted, slivered almonds
Directions:
Cook green pepper, celery and onions in butter for 10 minutes. Add soup and milk.
Blend and heat through.
Add cheese; heat until cheese melts.
Cook and drain noodles.
Combine noodles and 1/3 of soup mixture.
Turn noodles into baking pan.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1 (6 1/2 oz.) can tuna (undrained), flaked
1 (10 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. milk
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
1 Tbsp. chopped pimento
1 (8 oz.) bag egg noodles
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
In large skillet, saute onion and celery in butter.
Stir in tuna, soup, mayonnaise, milk, mushrooms and pimento.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package directions and drain in colander.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. Ritz crackers, crushed
1/2 c. thin sliced celery
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 c. mayonnaise
3/4 c.milk
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves
1 pkg. frozen green peas
1 (7 oz.) pkg. cooked elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Mix all ingredients, except crackers and cheese.
Place in ungreased 3-quart casserole dish.
Cover and bake for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle with topping (crackers and cheese).
Bake, uncovered, in oven until cheese is melted.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
Duncan Hines Butter Cake Mix
Directions:
Bake as directed on box.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
whole fryer chicken
onions, celery, salt and pepper
1 pkg. sweet coconut
1 c. milk
1 c. coconut milk
1 or 2 large onions
1 clove garlic, minced
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 to 3 Tbsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 c. flour
dash of cayenne pepper
2 1/2 c. chicken stock
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the fryer with onions, celery, salt and pepper.
Bone the chicken.
Simmer the package of coconut with the cup of milk, then set aside to cool.
Strain the coconut through cheesecloth.
Saute onions and garlic in butter, then add curry, cayenne and ginger; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add flour, coconut milk and chicken stock. Cook, stirring, until smooth and thick.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Stir in chicken and 1/2 cup half and half.
Do not boil.
Serve over hot rice with condiments: raisins, peanuts, mango chutney, pineapple chunks and coconut.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Curried-Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen shrimp in shells
1 c. sifted all purpose flour
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 slightly beaten egg
2 Tbsp. salad oil
2/3 c. grated coconut
1-1/2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
Cook 1 pound shelled shrimp; drain.
In saucepan melt 1/4 cup butter or margarine.
Stir in 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour.
Add 1 1/2 cups milk all at once; cook and stir till thickened and bubbly.
Add shrimp, 1/4 cup dry sherry, 1/2 teaspoon salt, dash pepper, and dash paprika.
Pour into 5 coquilles (individual baking shells).
Sprinkle each serving with 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese.
Broil 3 to 4 inches from heat till cheese browns.
Makes 5 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
1 box Duncan Hines all butter cake mix
Directions:
Bake in layers according to package directions.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
3 tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. finely chopped onions
1 tbsp. garlic
4 c. tomatoes (1 qt.)
4 c. tomato paste
1 tbsp. dry oregano
1 tsp. dry basil
1 bay leaf
2 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 -2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Saute finely chopped onions and garlic in the olive oil. Add the remaining ingredients and slow cook for approximately 1 hour.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
2 gal. tomatoes
4 medium onions
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. salt
1 Tbsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. red pepper
2 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. oregano
Directions:
Make a thickening of 3 scant cups clear-jel.
Add to mixture; cook until thick.
Cold pack 5 to 10 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. active yeast
2 Tbsp. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. salad oil
Directions:
Sprinkle yeast over warm water in large mixing bowl. Stir until dissolved. Add shortening, salt and half the flour.
Beat with wooden spoon until smooth, about 2 minutes.
Gradually add remaining flour, mixing with hands until dough is stiff and leaves side of bowl. Turn dough out onto floured board.
Cover with bowl. Let rest 10 minutes. Knead 8 to 10 minutes or until smooth and elastic. Place dough in lightly greased medium bowl. Cover with towel and let raise in warm place, about 1 hour.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
1 large onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 cans tomato paste (6 oz.)
1 can tomato sauce (8 oz.)
sliced pepperoni
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Cover bottom of skillet with oil.
Add onion and green pepper. Cook until onions are transparent.
Add oregano, garlic salt, salt and pepper.
Add tomato paste, tomato sauce and 2 cans of water per can of paste and sauce (6 cans).
Add pepperoni and mushrooms.
Simmer for 1 hour or more.
Makes enough sauce for 3 pizzas.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Garlic Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. red potatoes (3 to 4)
6 large garlic cloves, unpeeled and flattened
2 Tbsp. olive oil (any oil will do)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and then into 3 wedges per half.
Combine all ingredients in bowl; mix well.
Bake in shallow baking pan for 30 to 35 minutes or until potatoes are light brown and tender, turning occasionally.
Serve potatoes hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. small red potatoes
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. kosher salt
1 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°. Cut the potatoes in half or quarters and place in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, pepper and garlic; toss until the potatoes are well coated. Transfer the potatoes to a sheet pan and spread out into one layer. Roast in the oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour or until browned and crisp. Flip twice during cooking with a spatula in order to ensure even browning. Remove from the oven; toss with the parsley. Season to taste and serve hot.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 to 4 potatoes, peeled
olive oil
1 clove garlic per person, peeled and chopped
1/2 tsp. rosemary per person
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Boil potatoes for 5 minutes.
Drain and pat dry.
Slice.
In a pan large enough to hold the potatoes in one layer, add enough olive oil to coat the bottom generously.
Add potatoes and garlic and toss to coat.
Add rosemary, salt and pepper.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Potatoes With Garlic
Ingredients:
2 lb. small red potatoes, quartered
2 large cloves garlic, sliced thin
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large baking pan, toss potatoes with garlic, oil, salt and pepper.
Roast in a preheated 500° oven, stirring once for 30 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 c. raw rice
1 can tomato paste
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can shrimp or 1/2 lb. cleaned shrimp, cut small
1/2 c. or more peas
Directions:
Saute onion and peppers in oil.
Add rice; cook over medium heat until tanned; stir constantly.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper and broth.
Mix and cover tightly.
Simmer without stirring for 35 to 40 minutes.
Add shrimp and peas.
Mix well.
Cook an additional 5 minutes until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. bite-size asparagus or broccoli pieces
1 medium tomato, seeded and diced
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1 c. shredded Muenster cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
3 Tbsp. fresh basil
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook mushrooms, onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is tender, but not brown.
Stir in rice.
Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
In another saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer.
Slowly add 1 cup of broth to rice mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook and stir until liquid is absorbed.
Add 1 cup more broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed.
It should take 15 minutes.
Stir in tomato, carrot and remaining half cup broth. Cook until rice is slightly creamy and just tender, stirring constantly.
Stir in cheeses and basil.
If desired, garnish with tomato slices.
Serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Plain Risotto
Ingredients:
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon butter
1 medium onion (chopped)
1 cup Arborio rice
1/2 cup white wine or dry vermouth
4 cups chicken or vegetable broth
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil and butter in a saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion and saut until soft.
Add rice and saut until rice is coated.
Add white wine or vermouth and stir until all the liquid is absorbed.
Add hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, until it is all absorbed in the rice and rice is tender.
Add hot water if more liquid is needed.
Stir in parmesan cheese and fresh parsley, and serve warm.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto (Rice With Vegetables)
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced green onion
1 c. shredded carrots
1/2 c. chopped parsley
6 Tbsp. oleo
2 1/2 c. raw rice
5 chicken bouillon cubes
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
4 1/2 c. water
Directions:
Melt oleo in casserole dish.
Saute onions and carrots.
Add rice and saute until opaque.
Add bouillon cubes, bay leaf, salt, thyme and water.
Bring to boil.
Simmer 15 to 20 minutes.
Stir in parsley.
Serves 12.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
About 2 c. fresh blueberries
1 3/4 c. sugar, divided
3 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. milk
1 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
4 pints blueberries
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/3 c. water
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
After cooked and melted, fill a pie crust with blueberry filling.
Sprinkle 1/2 cup of crushed pecans over top of filling. Cut a second pie crust into lattice pieces and place over the top of the pie.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 lb. margarine
1 egg
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Mix with pastry blender until crumbles together.
Press part of mixture in a greased 14 x 11-inch pan.
Add 2 cans of fruit pie filling.
Sprinkle rest of crumbs on top of the fruit.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Serve with whipped cream.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
2 pt. blueberries
1/2 c sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. grated lemon rind
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
3/4 c. unsifted flour
3/4 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1 large egg
2 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°.
Grease an 8-inch round baking dish.
In baking dish, combine berries, 1/4 cup of sugar, cornstarch, 1 tablespoon of butter, lemon juice and rind and cloves.
In a small bowl, combine flour, 1/4 cup of sugar, baking powder and salt. Stir in egg, milk and 2 tablespoons of butter until soft dough forms.
Drop by tablespoonful onto blueberry mixture.
Bake 30 to 35 minutes or until topping is golden brown and filling bubbles. Delicious with ice cream.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 c. whole wheat pastry flour
1 1/2 t. baking powder
1 pint blueberries
1/3 c. fructose/sucanat
1/4 c. honey
1 t. lemon rind
3/4 c. water
1/4 c. butter
1/3 c. honey
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. skim milk
2 t. vanilla
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
Sift flour and baking powder.
In medium pan bring to a boil blueberries, fructose, 1/4 cup honey, lemon and water.
Cream butter and 1/3 cup honey.
Add egg, milk and vanilla.
Gradually add dry ingredients.
Pour hot blueberries in 1 1/2 quart baking dish.
Spoon flour mixture over the top. Bake 25 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream.
Serves 12.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
3 c. fresh blueberries
2 Tbsp. white sugar
1/3 c. orange juice
2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
1/2 c. butter, softened
1/2 c. white sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In 8-inch square baking dish, mix blueberries, 3 Tbsp. sugar and orange juice. Set aside. In small bowl, thoroughly mix flour, baking powder and salt. Set aside. In a medium bowl, cream butter and 1/2 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg and vanilla extract. Gradually add flour mixture, stirring just until ingredients are combined. Drop batter by rounded tablespoons over blueberry mixture. Try to cover as much of filling as possible. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, until top is golden brown and filling is bubbly.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpea And Tomato Stew
Ingredients:
6 medium-sized tomatoes
1/2 c. olive oil
2 medium-sized onions, peeled and chopped
4 cloves garlic, peeled and minced
2 c. boiled, drained chickpeas or drained canned chickpeas
1/2 c. very finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. salt or to taste
Directions:
Drop the tomatoes into boiling water for 15 seconds.
Remove with a slotted spoon and peel.
Mince the tomatoes.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Greek Chickpeas Salad
Ingredients:
2 tsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 to 3/4 c. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 c. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
2 (20 oz. each) cans chickpeas, drained
1 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
lettuce leaves (if desired)
Directions:
Combine cheese, mustard, salt, oil, lemon juice and pepper in container of electric blender; whirl until smooth.
Combine chickpeas and onion in large bowl.
Pour dressing over and toss. Refrigerate; may be prepared several days in advance.
Just before serving, add parsley; toss.
Spoon into lettuce lined salad bowl.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Steamed Veggies
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini, sliced
2 medium yellow squash, sliced
1 c. fresh broccoli flowerets
1/2 c. onion, diced
1/2 c. mushrooms, sliced
1 (12 oz.) pkg. spaghetti or fettucini
1/2 c. butter
1/2 to 1 c. whipping cream
salt and pepper
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Steam vegetables or saute in butter until still crisp.
Add mushrooms the last minute.
Cook pasta according to directions and drain.
Add butter, whipping cream, vegetables and seasonings. Toss well.
Serve warm with cheese sprinkled on top.
Serves 8.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Home Pasta Dough
Ingredients:
2 1/4 to 2 1/2 c. flour
2 eggs
1 egg yolk
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. water
Directions:
In 1 large bowl, combine 1 cup flour, 1/3 cup water and remaining ingredients.
Beat on low speed for 2 minutes, occasionally scraping bowl.
With wooden spoon, stir in enough additional flour to make a soft dough.
Turn on lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and not sticky, about 10 minutes. Divide dough into 5 sections and let set covered for 10 minutes. Roll dough out on floured surface or put through pasta machine. Cut into desired shapes.
Let dry or cook immediately.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta Alla Teresa
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. oil
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1/4 c. pine nuts
2 oz. Prosciutto
8 sundried tomatoes
1 c. heavy whipping cream
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese plus additional for garnish
1/2 lb. medium shrimp
8 oz. linguine
Directions:
Begin boiling water for pasta.
Heat butter and oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Saute garlic for 1 minute.
Cut Prosciutto and sundried tomatoes into thin julienne strips, stir into skillet with pine nuts and shrimp.
Saute for 2 minutes. Stir in cream, nutmeg, pepper and Parmesan cheese, bring mixture to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer over very low heat while cooking pasta.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta Delite(Excellent Dish For Company Or The Family.)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 medium garlic cloves, chopped fine
2 medium shallots, chopped fine
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes
6 oz. Ricotta cheese (can use less)
2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet or saucepan, heat the oil with the garlic and shallots over moderate heat.
When they sizzle, add the tomatoes, breaking them up with your hands.
Crumble in the Ricotta cheese and stir in the sugar, basil and oregano.
Simmer until the sauce is thick, but still slightly liquid, 7 to 10 minutes.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Perfect Pasta Supper
Ingredients:
12 oz. fettucini or linguini, cooked and drained
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter
1/2 c. whipping or heavy cream
2 egg yolks
1 tsp. finely minced onion
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
dash of salt and pepper
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. (2 oz.) grated Parmesan cheese
1 1/2 c. (about 1/2 lb.) diced or shredded ham
Directions:
Melt butter in large frying pan over medium-low heat.
Stir in cream, egg yolks, onion and seasonings until well blended.
Do not boil.
Stir in cheeses until melted.
Add pasta, stirring, until thoroughly blended.
Spoon immediately onto warmed serving plate. Sprinkle with ham.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Grandma'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. uncooked macaroni
4 Tbsp. butter
4 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 lb. cubed Velveeta
2/3 c. sour cream
1 1/3 c. cottage cheese
2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook and drain macaroni.
Place in 2 1/2 qt. greased casserole dish.
Melt butter over medium heat, stir in flour; mix well.
Add milk and cook over medium heat, stir constantly until sauce thickens.
Add salt, sugar, and cheese, mix well.
Mix sour cream and cheese into sauce.
Pour over macaroni; mix well.
Sprinkle grated cheese and bread crumbs over top.
Dot with butter.
The dish may be frozen at this point.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: `Big Mac' Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. Miracle Whip
1/3 to 1/2 c. relish
1/4 c. French dressing
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients. Great on burgers!

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac 'N' Cheese
Ingredients:
1 can condensed Cheddar cheese soup
1/2 can milk
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. hot cooked elbow macaroni
2 tsp. margarine, melted
1 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
Directions:
In a 1-quart casserole, combine soup, milk, mustard and pepper.
Stir in macaroni.
In a cup, combine margarine and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle over casserole and bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Yield:
4 side dish servings.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. elbow macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar, grated
1/3 bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook
macaroni	as
directed
and drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly,
until	mixture thickens. Add seasonings and
cheese, stirring
until
cheese
melts. Add macaroni and transfer to a buttered 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle over macaroni. Bake in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: The Lady'S Cheese Mac
Ingredients:
4 c. elbow macaroni, drained (approximately 2 c. uncooked)
2 c. grated cheddar cheese
3 eggs, beaten (see note)
1/2 c. sour cream
4 Tbsp. (1/2 stick) butter, cut into pieces
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk, or equivalent in evaporated milk
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
After macaroni has been boiled and drained, add cheddar cheese while macaroni is still hot.
Combine remaining ingredients and add to macaroni mixture.
Pour into casserole dish and bake for 30 to 45 minutes.
Top with additional cheese, if desired.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Chicken Taco
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 garlic clove, minced
2 c. cooked, diced chicken
1 pkg. Azteca flour tortillas
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. margarine
black olives, tomato and green chilies (optional)
Directions:
In skillet, heat oil.
Cook onion and garlic until tender. Add chicken.
Heat 3 minutes.
Remove from pan into bowl.
Heat tortillas according to package. Divide chicken onto center of tortillas.
Top with cheese and optional ingredients. Fold tortillas in half.
Melt margarine in same skillet.
Grill tacos on each side for 2 or 3 minutes or until cheese melts.
Makes 8 to 10 tacos.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lb. lean ground meat, browned and drained
1 Tbsp. chili powder
2 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. ground cumin (scant)
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. ground oregano (scant)
2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. water
2/3 c. taco sauce or salsa
Directions:
Brown and drain the meat.
Add the remaining ingredients. Stir and simmer, uncovered, for 20 to 30 minutes.
This is now ready to build your tacos.
This will also freeze very well.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Authentic Tacos
Ingredients:
3 1/2 lb. lean, boneless beef, pork or chicken
flour
water
1/2 bell pepper strips
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 small can tomato sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 jalapeno pepper, chopped
Directions:
Roll meat in flour and place in stock pot filled with 1/4-inch water.
Brown meat and cook on low heat for about 30 minutes.
Then roll up and heat to high and add remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 hour longer until meat is shredding.
Serve in flour tortillas and garnish with lettuce and picante sauce.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Baked Fish On Grill
Ingredients:
2 medium to large fish fillets
1 small onion
1 lemon
garlic salt
black pepper
butter
Directions:
Place 2 to 3 pats of butter under each fillet on aluminum foil.
Place 2 to 3 pats on top of each fillet.
Slice onion and pop out rings.
Lay on top.
Slice lemon in thin slices.
Place on top of onion.
Sprinkle with garlic salt and pepper to taste. Roll foil around and seal.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes (depending on size of fillets), turning once.
This may also be baked in a preheated oven.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 or 5 garlic cloves, sliced
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
4 or 5 tomatoes, skinned and chopped
1/2 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil and brown garlic until light brown.
Add onion and bell
pepper;
cook
a
little and add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer
for
5
minutes.
Add
water;
bring to boil. Reduce heat;
simmer
for 20 minutes.
Cook thin spaghetti or angel
hair pasta; drain.
Pour sauce over pasta; blend well. Sprinkle with grated Italian cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Vegetables In Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
3 medium carrots
2 small zucchini
1/4 c. butter
1 large onion, chopped
4 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried leaf tarragon, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. hot cooked drained pasta (fettucine noodles, ziti or shells)
Directions:
Cut carrots and zucchini lengthwise in thin slices with peeler.
Add to 1-inch boiling water in medium saucepan.
Cook until crisp-tender.
Drain.
Set aside.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: 30-Minute Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
1/2 small onion
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large can chopped tomatoes
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. sugar
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
Directions:
Chop garlic and onion very fine.
Saute in olive oil until soft.
Add tomatoes, basil and rest of seasonings.
Bring to a light boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetables In Garlic Sauce With Pasta
Ingredients:
3 medium carrots
2 small zucchini
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1 large onion, chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried tarragon leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. hot, cooked, drained pasta (fettuccini, ziti or shells)
Directions:
Cut carrots and zucchini lengthwise into thin slices with vegetable peeler. Bring 1 inch water to a boil in medium saucepan. Add carrots and zucchini. Cook until crisp tender. Remove from saucepan and drain; set aside. Melt butter in same saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic; cook until tender. Gradually stir in broth, cream and seasonings; simmer 5 minutes or until sauce in slightly thickened. Add vegetables; heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Add vegetables and sauce to hot cooked pasta; toss lightly.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Pasta-Garlic Clam Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
4 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
dash of cayenne
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme
2 (7 oz.) cans minced clams
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Saute onion, green pepper and garlic in olive oil until translucent.
(Add a little water and cover if necessary.) Add mushrooms and continue heating in covered saucepan for about 3 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients, including all liquid from clams; heat until hot in covered saucepan.
Serve with 1 cup spaghetti or linguine (2 ounces dry) per serving.
Top with Parmesan cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 pieces bread
butter, softened
2 to 3 slices your favorite sandwich cheese
Directions:
Prepare a medium size skillet with Pam cooking spray or butter. Heat skillet.
Lightly butter one side of each piece of bread.
Lay butter side down; place cheese on top, then place other slice of bread with butter facing up.
Cook on both sides until lightly browned.
Cut into strips or use your favorite cookie cutter for little fingers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 large mushrooms, sliced
2 medium green onions, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. freshly ground pepper
4 oz. cold Brie, cut into 1/8-inch thick slices
8 slices firm textured white bread, crusts removed
4 sprigs fresh tarragon
Directions:
In a heavy medium skillet, melt the butter over high heat. When the butter begins to brown, add the mushrooms and toss to coat.
Saute, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms have browned around the edges, 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the green onions and cook for 1 minute longer. Transfer the mushrooms to a plate and season with salt and pepper.
Divide the cheese among 4 slices of bread.
Top each with the mushrooms, leaving about 1/4-inch from the edge of the bread. Add a tarragon sprig and cover with the remaining 4 slices of bread.
Preheat a cast-iron ridged griddle or skillet for 10 minutes over moderate heat. Grill the sandwiches for 4 minutes per side or until the bread is lightly browned and the cheese has melted.
Serve halved as a first course or quartered as an hors d'oeuvre.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 slice cheese
2 slices bread
butter
Directions:
Take 2 slices bread and butter one side of each.
Put one piece of the bread buttered side down onto a hot griddle.
Put a slice of cheese on top of bread and put the other piece of bread, buttered side up, on top of cheese.
Let bottom get light or golden brown.
Turn and do the same to other side.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese
Ingredients:
4 slices bread
2 slices Kraft cheese
squeeze butter
Directions:
You will need a sandwich machine.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
Ingredients:
1/4 stick butter
2 slices bread
1 slice cheese
Directions:
Heat butter in skillet.
Put cheese in between bread.
Put in pan.
Cook until nice and brown.
Then eat it.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini-Potato Pancakes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. milk
1 egg
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
2 c. shredded potatoes (half a 20 oz. refrigerated pkg.)
8 oz. zucchini, shredded
1 small onion, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Whisk together milk and egg in medium size bowl.
Add the flour, baking powder, salt, pepper and garlic.
Whisk until smooth. Stir in the potatoes, zucchini, onion and cheese.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Using 1/4 cup for each pancake, cook until browned on underside, about 3 minutes.
Turn pancake over.
Reduce heat to medium-low; cook 5 minutes until cooked through.
Keep warm on plate.
Repeat. Makes 4 servings or 12 pancakes.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
