Title: Zucchini And Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini
3 medium potatoes (red)
2 tsp. oil
1 small onion, chopped
1 large ripe tomato, diced
1 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Cut unpeeled potatoes and zucchini into 1/2-inch pieces.
Heat oil in skillet.
Add potatoes.
Stir-fry 1 to 2 minutes.
Pour in chicken broth.
Cover and cook over low heat 5 minutes.
Add onion, zucchini, tomato and seasonings.
Stir.
Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Pie
Ingredients:
3 c. refrigerated loose-pack hash brown potatoes
1 beaten egg
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 medium zucchini, sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. margarine or butter
3 beaten eggs
3/4 c. shredded Swiss cheese
1/2 c. milk
2 tsp. fresh oregano or 1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1 egg, onion and Parmesan cheese.
Stir in potatoes.
Pat mixture into a 9-inch pie plate or a 10-inch quiche dish.
Bake, uncovered, in a 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes until golden.
Cool slightly; reduce oven to 350°.
In large skillet cook zucchini in garlic and butter until just tender. Cool and arrange on crust.
In mixing bowl combine remaining 3 eggs, cheese, milk, oregano, salt and pepper.
Pour over zucchini.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Appetizers
Ingredients:
3 c. thinly sliced, unpeeled zucchini
1 c. baking mix
1/2 c. onion, finely chopped
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 clove garlic, chopped
4 eggs, slightly beaten
Directions:
Make your selection carefully.
Do not choose too young or green but mature and ripe, coming from good stock.
Do not keep in a stew or hot water or pickle.
This tends to make them sour, hard or bitter.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Garden Zucchini Pie
Ingredients:
3 c. shredded potatoes (about 5)
1 egg, beaten
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 medium zucchini, thinly sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. shredded Cheddar and Swiss cheese
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place shredded potatoes in ice water to prevent discoloration. Rinse well and squeeze dry.
In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 egg, the onion and the Parmesan cheese.
Stir in the potatoes. Transfer the potato mixture to a 9-inch pie plate or a 10-inch quiche dish.
Pat the mixture in the bottom and up the sides. Bake uncovered in a 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until golden brown.
Reduce oven to 350°.
In a large skillet, cook zucchini and garlic until crisp-tender and cool slightly.
Arrange zucchini on top of crust.
In a small mixing bowl, combine the remaining 3 eggs, the cheese, salt and pepper.
Pour liquid over zucchini. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until filling appears set when gently shaken.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 bone-in pork loin chops (1/2-inch thick)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of celery soup (undiluted)
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 (2.8 oz.) can French fried onions, divided
1 (24 oz.) pkg. frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
Directions:
In a skillet, brown pork chops in oil on each side. In a large bowl, combine the soup, milk, sour cream, pepper, 1/2 cup cheese and 1/2 cup onions; fold in potatoes. Spread into a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Arrange chops on top; sprinkle with seasoned salt. Cover and bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes or until pork is tender. Uncover; sprinkle with remaining cheese and onions. Bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Yield: 6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Use Of Leftovers
Ingredients:
crisp cooked bacon or pork cooked leftovers
celery
lettuce
mayonnaise
Directions:
Chop up or grind bacon or pork and celery.
Mix with mayonnaise.
Serve on lettuce leaves as salad or as a sandwich with lettuce.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. ground mustard
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1/8 tsp. dried oregano
1/8 tsp. dried basil
1/8 tsp. salt
pinch of pepper
4 pork loin chops, 3/4-inch thick
1 to 2 Tbsp. oil
1 c. ketchup
1 c. water
1/4 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Combine first 10 ingredients; dredge pork chops.
In a skillet, brown chops in oil on both sides.
Place in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Helen'S Leftover Pork
Ingredients:
1 to 1 1/2 lb. cooked pork
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 onion, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can chunk pineapple
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 Tbsp. vinegar
3 Tbsp. water
1 to 2 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Julienne pork.
Add to soy sauce, ginger and mustard.
Toss and set aside.
Slice onion.
Brown pork about 6 minutes.
Add onion.
Cook about 2 to 3 more minutes.
Add pineapple and bring to a boil.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Dumb Bunny Carrots (Marinated)
Ingredients:
1 can tomato soup
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. mustard
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
5 c. cooked, sliced carrots
1 large green pepper, diced
1 large onion, diced
Directions:
Mix soup, oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, pepper, sugar and Worcestershire sauce in pan and bring to a boil.
Pour over carrots, green pepper and onion.
Mix and refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving.
Great for holidays.
Can be made in advance and last a long time in fridge.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Herbed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 bunch carrots
1 c. boiling water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. marjoram (dried)
1/4 tsp. savory (dried)
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
Directions:
Scrape carrots.
Cut into quarters (lengthwise), then halves (lengthwise).
Cook in hot water and salt, covered.
Cook 15 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
Add herbs and butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Heart Healthy Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean round steak
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 lb. broccoli, sliced
1/2 lb. carrots, cut in 1/8-inch slices
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Rub fish with Puritan oil.
Roll fish in corn flake crumbs. Season fish with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Healthy Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 to 2 lb. steak, cubed
2 c. broccoli spears
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. julienne carrots
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. chopped onion
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. cooking oil
Directions:
Brown steak in 1 tablespoon cooking oil.
Set aside bowl. Cook broccoli, celery and carrots in 1 tablespoon oil until onion is clear.
Drain excess oil from pan.
Salt to taste.
Heat until hot.
Serve with rice.
Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Healthy Choice Oriental Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. each: green yellow and red peppers, cut in strips
1/2 lb. snow peas
3/4 c. reduced-calorie Italian salad seasoning
1/2 tsp. minced ginger (ground may be substituted)
1 large Bermuda onion, sliced and separated into rings
1 lb. tomatoes, sliced into quarters or eighths
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In large skillet or wok, heat salad dressing, soy sauce and ginger.
Quickly saute peppers until almost crunchy-tender.
Add onion and cover, cooking for 1 minute longer.
Remove from heat, stirring in snow peas and tomatoes.
Serve over fluffy white rice.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Casserole(Fast Recipe For Leftover Chicken)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked cut-up chicken
2 to 3 cans crescent rolls
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 can milk
Directions:
Combine soup, milk and 1/2 cup cheese and heat until cheese melts.
Combine chicken with mix.
Cover bottom of pan.
Fill rolls with 1 tablespoon mix and place rolls on mix in pan.
Cover rolls with remaining mix.
Heat in 375° oven for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Feed
Ingredients:
1 small onion, sliced
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, divided
1 Tbsp. margarine
4 c. cubed leftover chicken or turkey
4 c. leftover gravy
1 chicken bouillon cube, crushed
dash of pepper
3 c. mashed potatoes
Directions:
In skillet, saute onion, mushrooms, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon thyme in the margarine.
Stir in the chicken, gravy, bouillon and pepper; spoon into a greased casserole and remaining thyme.
Spoon over mixture.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes.
Yield:
6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Leftover Chicken And Noodles
Ingredients:
1 can cream chicken soup
1/3 c. milk
1 1/2 c. diced cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. cooked noodles
1 c. corn
1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 tsp. paprika
pepper
1/4 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
In 1 1/2-quart casserole, blend soup and milk; stir in chicken, noodles, corn, peas, onion, pepper and paprika.
Top with crumbs. Cook for 30 minutes in a 350° oven.
Serves 4.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Feed
Ingredients:
1 small onion, diced
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, divided
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
4 c. cubed, leftover, cooked chicken
4 c. leftover gravy
1 chicken bouillon cube, crushed
dash of pepper
3 c. mashed potatoes
Directions:
In a skillet, saute the onion, mushrooms, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon thyme in butter. Stir in the chicken, gravy, bouillon and pepper. Spoon into a greased 3-quart casserole.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 unbaked pie shell
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. chopped shallots
1/3 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
5 to 6 dashes red pepper sauce
1 c. whipping cream
3 large eggs, beaten
6 strips bacon, fried crisp
4 oz. sliced mushrooms (fresh)
1 (10 oz.) box chopped spinach (frozen), well drained
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
In large bowl, mix grated cheese and flour.
Add shallots, celery, garlic, parsley, red pepper sauce and dry seasonings.
Stir to mix.
Add cream and eggs.
Stir to mix.
Add crumbled bacon, mushrooms and spinach.
Pour into unbaked pie shell and bake 45 to 55 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Cheese Quiche
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/8 t. salt
1/2 c. (1 stick) plus 1 t. butter, chilled and cut into pieces, divided
2 - 3 T. ice water
1 pkg. (10 oz.) fresh baby spinach, washed
1 c. light cream or half and half
3 eggs
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese
1/2 c. (2 oz.) Havarti or other white cheese, cubed
Directions:
Mix flour and salt in large bowl.
Cut in 1/2 cup butter until coarse crumbs form.
Add water, tossing with fork, until dough forms.
Press into a firm ball.
Wrap and refrigerate 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. diced onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. egg substitute
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. 1% low-fat cottage cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and drained
vegetable oil pastry
1 1/2 oz. part skim Mozzarella cheese slices
Directions:
Coat a large, nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Place over medium-high heat until hot.
Add mushrooms, onion and garlic; saute until tender.
Combine egg substitute and next 4 ingredients.
Stir in spinach.
Add mushroom mix, stirring well. Spoon in prebaked pastry shell.
Bake in a 350° oven for 35 minutes.
Arrange cheese slices on top.
Bake 5 minutes until cheese melts.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche(Microwave)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. (1/4 stick) butter
1 medium onion, minced
1 garlic clove, minced
3/4 c. whipping cream
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
4 eggs
3 Tbsp. chopped green onion
2 c. shredded Swiss cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/8 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1 baked 9-inch deep dish pie shell
Directions:
Cook first three ingredients on High until onion is soft, about 3 to 4 minutes.
Combine next five ingredients in bowl and beat until well blended.
Add cheese, spinach and seasoning and mix thoroughly.
Pour into pie shell.
Cook on 70% power until center is barely set, about 15 to 20 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
Yields 6 servings.
Total cooking time is 15 to 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen spinach, defrost and drain
3 Tbsp. butter
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. minced scallions
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
1 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. milk
1 c. Swiss cheese, grated
Directions:
Saute the scallions in 3 tablespoons butter.
Add spinach and stir over low heat to dry excess water and condiments.
Taste for enough seasoning.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. sliced green onions and tops
1 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and paprika in paper or plastic bag. Brush chicken with lemon juice.
Place a few pieces at a time in bag.
Shake to coat.
Heat oil to 365° in electric skillet or large heavy skillet.
Add chicken.
Brown.
Combine water and bouillon granules.
Stir until dissolved.
Add brown sugar and remaining lemon juice.
Pour into skillet.
Cover.
Reduce heat to 250°; simmer 5 minutes.
Turn chicken.
Sprinkle with onion and lemon peel.
Recover.
Simmer 10 minutes.
Serve garnish with lemon slices and additional parsley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (boneless, skinless)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, chopped or 1 tsp. dried rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine or water
1 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. honey
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
Directions:
In a shallow dish, combine all ingredients except chicken; mix well.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and marinate in refrigerator 20 to 30 minutes, the longer, the better.
Oil broiler pan and place chicken on prepared pan; broil 4 to 6 inches from broiler.
Cook 8 to 10 minutes on one side, basting with marinade.
Turn and continue cooking and basting 8 to 10 minutes longer or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear.
Can also be charcoal grilled.
Use same method as for broiling. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Marinade With Tangy Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. oil
1 can each: corn, peas and green beans, drained
1 green pepper, chopped
1 (4 oz.) jar pimento, drained and diced
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
Directions:
Heat together vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar and oil until sugar is dissolved.
Set aside to cool.
Place vegetables in large bowl and pour dressing over vegetable mixture.
Refrigerate overnight. Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola and corn oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. rosemary or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In a cup, mix first five ingredients.
Pour over chicken. Cover and let stand at room temperature no longer than 30 minutes, turning once.
Broil 10 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, turning once.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. mushrooms, cleaned, trimmed and sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced or put through a press
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 Tbsp. dry white wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. milk
1/2 c. grated Gruyere or Parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat half the butter in a frying pan and add mushrooms and garlic.
Cook over moderate heat 5 minutes or until mushrooms begin to soften.
Add thyme, rosemary and white wine and continue to saute another 5 minutes or until liquid evaporates.
Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper.
Remove from heat and set aside.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Vegetable And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
1 whole egg
1 egg white
splash of low-fat milk
1/4 c. mushrooms
1/4 c. tomatoes
1/3 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 green pepper
Directions:
Heat pan to medium temperature.
Saute vegetables in oil until soft.
In a bowl, whip whole egg, egg white and milk until fluffy. Remove vegetables from pan and begin cooking egg on low heat. After about 2 minutes, add vegetables and shredded cheese.
Season to taste.
Cover and continue to cook until egg is firm and cheese is melted.
Slip spatula under half of firm omelette and fold over.
Slide out of pan onto plate.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Omelette Casserole
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 1/4 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
salt
pepper
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. diced potatoes
1/4 c. scallions, sliced diagonally
3/4 c. diced ham
10 slices cheese (approximately)
green peppers, diced (optional)
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter, add potatoes, mushrooms and peppers (optional).
Cook until done, slightly browned.
Mix eggs and milk, blend with beater; set aside.
Melt 2 tablespoons butter, add egg mixture, stir frequently, cook until eggs are fully cooked.
(There should be a watery liquid remaining with eggs.) Add potatoes and mushrooms, ham, scallions, salt, pepper and cheese.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Cheese Omelet
Ingredients:
5 pieces bread, buttered on both sides
1/2 lb. Swiss cheese
4 eggs, well beaten
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
dash of pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese
2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Place bread in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Grate the cheeses; mix together and sprinkle on bread.
Mix together the eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt and pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over cheese.
Sprinkle mushrooms over top.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Remove from refrigerator 1 hour before baking.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Texas Omelette
Ingredients:
2 c. dried bread crumbs
6 smoked sausage links
1/2 c. diced onions
1/2 c. diced green pepper
7 eggs
1 1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 can cream of mushroom soup or cream of chicken soup
1 can milk
1 pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Layer croutons in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Dice sausage links and saute them with the onions and green peppers.
Sprinkle the sausage, onions and green peppers over the croutons.
Beat the eggs and add the Worcestershire sauce, soup and milk.
Beat mixture until smooth.
Layer the shredded cheese over the sausage and vegetables.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Flavorful Tofu(Kids Will Eat)
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1 small onion
1 can pasta ready tomatoes - 3 cheese
1/4 c. dry red wine
dash of chili pepper to taste
dash of marjoram to taste
dash of oregano to taste
dash of black pepper to taste
1/4 c. wheat germ
8 oz. mushrooms, sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. brown rice, cooked
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/2-inch thick slices and allow to dry on paper towels.
Start to cook brown rice.
In large saute pan saute onions in olive oil until translucent.
Add mushrooms, red wine and spices and continue to cook until mushrooms are soft.
Coat tofu with wheat germ by placing wheat germ in shallow dish and gently pressing tofu.
Add tofu to saute, moving vegies aside to place tofu directly on pan.
Pour can of tomatoes over all and gently mix vegies onto top and in with the tomatoes.
Allow to cook, covered, on medium heat for 7 minutes.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Mystic Tofu
Ingredients:
2 boxes extra firm tofu
1 large onion, sliced
2 medium tomatoes, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. cumin powder
1 tsp. curry powder
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro leaves
2 Tbsp. poppy seed
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
1 onion
1 large green pepper
15 to 20 fresh mushrooms
oregano, basil, salt and pepper (sprinkle)
3 cans chunk white tuna, water drained
1 small bag frozen peas
1 box Ronzoni seashells
1 1/2 large Velveeta cheese
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
In bowl, add soup, onion, spices and milk and mix.
Add sliced mushrooms and diced green pepper; stir.
Boil noodles to only 3/4 cooked.
Drain and add to mixture, then add tuna and frozen peas, stirring gently into even chunks.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Marinated Tofu Salad
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. tofu, parboiled, drained and dried
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. Chinese sesame oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. shoyu or tamari
2 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 head Chinese cabbage or equivalent, shredded
1 small carrot, shredded
2 to 3 scallions, chopped
handful watercress
gomahsio
Directions:
In a shallow pan combine oils, lemon juice, shoyu and vinegar.
Combine with a wire whisk.
Cut tofu in half horizontally, then diagonally to form thin triangles about 1/4-inch thick.
Place into the bowl with the marinade and chill for at least an hour.
Arrange the cabbage on center of the plates.
Top with tofu.
Arrange the watercress around the edges. Place some shredded carrots in the center, with the scallions. Pour the marinade over all with a sprinkle of gomahsio.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Tofu Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lasagna noodles
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 lb. soft tofu
1 lb. firm tofu
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
3 tsp. chopped basil or Italian seasoning
2 tsp. salt
4 c. spaghetti sauce
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Use 9 x 13-inch pan.
Defrost spinach and drain.
Place tofu, sugar, garlic powder, lemon juice and 1 teaspoon salt.
Blend until smooth.
Taste, add more salt, if necessary.
Cover bottom of pan with sauce.
Layer noodles, 1/2 tofu filling and 1/2 spinach.
Repeat layering, ending with noodles.
Cover with sauce.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. golden Caesar dressing (Kraft)
2 c. cherry tomatoes, halved
1 c. cucumber slices, halved
1 c. mushroom slices
1/4 lb. pepperoni slices
3/4 c. sour cream
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. green onion slices
2 c. pasta noodles, cooked, drained and chilled
Directions:
Pour dressing over tomatoes, cucumbers, mushrooms and meat. Cover, marinate in refrigerator several hours or overnight; drain. Combine sour cream, cheese and onions; toss with the noodles.
Top noodles with vegetable mixture.
Sprinkle with additional cheese, if desired.
Garnish with tiny choppings of the green onion stems.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Refrigerator Soup
Ingredients:
chicken or beef broth
leftover meat
vegetables
pasta
Directions:
Use canned broth or a favorite canned soup as a base.
Add meat and vegetables from previous meals.
Simmer until heated. Add pasta or rice if desired.
Serve with salad and bread. Delicious!

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. corkscrew macaroni
2 small carrots, sliced
2 green onions, chopped
1 (2 oz.) jar pimientos, drained
1 c. kidney beans
3/4 c. sliced celery
1/4 c. cooked English peas
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 c. Italian dressing
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/8 tsp. dried marjoram
1/8 tsp. pepper
lettuce leaves
2 tomatoes
2 boiled eggs
Directions:
Cook macaroni according to directions; drain.
Combine next 11 ingredients; toss well.
Chill at least 1 hour.
Spoon into lettuce lined dish.
Arrange tomato slices and egg wedges around edges.
Garnish with parsley.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Luscious Leftovers(Cold Salad)
Ingredients:
3 c. ham, cut up
1 c. (12 oz.) whole kernel corn, drained
1 c. chopped green pepper
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. minced onion
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
About 15 minutes before serving, mix in a large bowl.
Combine ham and all ingredients with the mayonnaise.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Unusual Pasta
Ingredients:
2 large cans tomato sauce
1 can tomato paste
1 bell pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
garlic powder to taste
pasta shells or noodles, cooked
white navy beans, cooked
Directions:
Simmer first 5 ingredients for several hours.
Cook pasta according to box directions (use desired amount).
Cook beans or use leftover beans.
Mix everything together and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Charcoal Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
8 thick lamb chops
1/2 c. white wine
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. garlic, minced
1 tsp. rosemary
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Season chops with salt and pepper.
Then marinate in a mixture of the other ingredients for 4 hours or overnight.
Grill the drained chops for 6 to 8 minutes on each side for a medium rare (pink center).

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Grilled Greek Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
4 lamb chops (3/4-inch thick), trimmed of fat
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. snipped fresh mint
1 tsp. paprika
dash of cinnamon
dash of nutmeg
1 clove garlic
4 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Prick the lamb chops with sharp fork, then place in shallow bowl.
In a small bowl, combine lemon juice, mint, paprika, cinnamon, nutmeg and garlic.
Pour over chops, turning once so entire surface is covered with the marinade.
Refrigerate at least 30 minutes.
Drain chops.
Grill or broil 5 minutes on each side. Serve over rice.
Low-fat and tasty.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Grilled Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
6 large lamb chops
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 to 4 cloves of garlic, peeled and cut thin
1 Tbsp. rosemary
Directions:
Brush lamb chop with olive oil, then roll in garlic and rosemary.
Put on grill until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Lamb Chops With Rosemary
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary
6 lamb chops or steaks
2 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 Tbsp. fresh sage, crushed
2 cloves garlic
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 large egg or whites from 2 large eggs
1 can (15 oz.) salmon, drained and flaked
1 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/4 c. minced onion
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Heat oven to
400°.
Spray
cookie sheet with vegetable cooking spray.
Beat egg
with
fork
in
a medium sized bowl. Add remaining ingredients
and	mix until well blended.
Shape in eight 1/2-inch patties.
Place on prepared cookie sheet and bake 10 to 12
minutes,	turning
once,	until golden brown on both sides.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Indonesian Grilled Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
1 lb. lamb loin chops, trimmed and sliced
1 c. shoyu
1 c. chopped and peeled ginger
1/8 c. chopped garlic
1/8 c. sesame oil
1/2 c chopped fresh mint
1/4 c. coarse grain mustard
Directions:
Marinate for 24 hours.
Grill over charcoal.
Serve on a saute of mixed kula greens.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
4 c. chicken, cooked and cut-up
2 pkg. frozen broccoli
2 c. milk
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 can French fried onions
Directions:
Grease 2-quart casserole dish. Cook broccoli as directed. Cut into bite-size pieces and arrange in casserole.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chopped frozen broccoli
1 c. Minute rice
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. milk
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (6 oz. can) water chestnuts, drained and sliced
Directions:
Cook broccoli by package directions; drain and set aside. Combine rice, soup, milk, cheese, salt and pepper.
Heat until cheese is melted and ingredients are well blended, then add onion, celery, water chestnuts and broccoli.
Stir thoroughly.
Place in a lightly greased 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish and heat in a 350° oven for about 30 minutes.
Fifteen minutes before removing from oven, cover top with finely crushed cracker crumbs.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded and divided
1 1/2 c. cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. pasta, cooked and drained
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped red or green pepper
1/4 c. milk
3/4 c. seasoned croutons (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix all ingredients except 1/2 cup cheese and croutons.
Spoon into a 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with reserved cheese and croutons.
Bake 30 minutes until thoroughly heated.
You may also heat in microwave oven on High for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. chopped, cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. bow tie pasta, cooked and drained
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped red or green pepper
1/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. each: crushed, dried oregano leaves and garlic salt
3/4 c. seasoned croutons (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Mix all ingredients, except 1/2 cup of the cheese and croutons.
Spoon into 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with reserved 1/2 cup cheese and croutons.
Bake for 30 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 pkg. frozen broccoli
4 chicken breasts
1 tsp. poultry seasoning
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 lb. mild cheese, sliced, shredded or cubed
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook broccoli until slightly tender.
Drain well.
Add poultry seasoning to enough water to cook chicken.
Simmer, covered, until tender, about 25 minutes.
Drain well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 c. chopped, cooked chicken, diced
1 (4 oz.) can green chili peppers, rinsed and chopped
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. ground coriander (optional)
3/4 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey jack cheese (6 oz.)
12 (6-inch) tortillas
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and green pepper in 2 tablespoons of margarine until tender.
Combine onion in a bowl with chicken and green chili peppers.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onions
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 c. chopped cooked chicken
1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies
3 Tbsp. margarine or butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. ground coriander (cilantro)
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. salsa (optional)
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese
12 corn tortillas or chips
Directions:
Cook onions and pepper in skillet until tender. Combine in bowl with chicken and chilies. Set aside. In the same skillet, melt 3 tablespoons butter. Blend in flour, coriander and salt. Stir in chicken broth all at once; cook and stir until thick. Remove from heat; stir in sour cream and 1/2 cup cheese. Cut up tortillas (or use chips) and mix together. Pour into 13 x 9 x 2 baking dish; sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake, uncovered, in 350° oven about 25 minutes. Serves 6. Can freeze. Can do ahead.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium onion, chopped
4 c. cooked shredded chicken
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 (14 oz.) cans whole tomato, diced
2 medium sized jars chunky-style salsa
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. parsley
1 doz. corn tortillas
3 c. grated Monterey Jack
1 (5 oz.) can sliced black olives
Directions:
Heat oil in large skillet and saute onion until soft and transparent.
Add chicken, tomato sauce, diced tomato, salsa, garlic powder and parsley; stir until blended well.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 15 minutes.
Place four corn tortillas in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Pour one-third of the chicken mixture over the top, spreading evenly layer one third of the cheese and one third of the olives on top of the chicken mixture.
Repeat layers two more times, ending with olives on top.
Bake uncovered at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes or until cheese is light brown and bubbly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 c. chopped cooked chicken
4 oz. can green chili peppers, rinsed, seeded and chopped
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. ground coriander
3/4 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. dairy sour cream
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese (6 oz.)
12 (6 inch) tortillas (corn)
Directions:
In large saucepan cook onion and green pepper in 2 tablespoons butter until tender.
Combine onion mixture in bowl with chicken and peppers; set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, chopped
4 c. cooked shredded chicken
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans whole tomatoes, diced
2 medium jars chunky salsa
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. parsley
12 corn tortillas
3 c. grated Monterey Jack cheese
1 (5 oz.) can sliced black olives
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet and saute onion until soft, add chicken, tomato sauce, tomatoes, salsa, garlic powder and parsley. Stir until well blended.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes.
Place 4 corn tortillas in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Pour 1/3 of the chicken mixture on top.
Spread evenly.
Layer 1/3 of cheese and 1/3 of olives on top.
Repeat layers 2 more times, ending with olives on top.
Bake, uncovered, 30 to 40 minutes at 350°.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Apple Cake - Dairy Free
Ingredients:
2 c. apples (Granny Smith)
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. sugar
1 c. cooking oil
4 eggs
1/4 c. orange juice
2 tsp. vanilla extract
3 c. flour, sifted
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Peel, core and chop the apples into small pieces.
Mix together with 3 tablespoons sugar and the cinnamon.
Set aside.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cream Of Anything Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. flour
2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans evaporated milk
cheese (optional)
1 to 2 c. chopped meat or vegetables
2 to 3 c. broth
Directions:
Make a roux of butter and flour; add milk and make a thick white sauce.
If cheese is used, add here and whisk to melt.
Mix in leftover cooked vegetables or meat; stir until smooth.
Add broth to desired consistency.
Season to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Dairy Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 (2 lb.) bag hash browns
1 can cream of chicken soup
12 oz. sour cream
1/2 c. onions, minced
salt and pepper to taste
2 c. Cheddar cheese or cheese of your choice
1/2 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix all in large bowl and transfer to 9 x 13-inch pan.
Top with 2 cups corn flakes and 1/2 cup of melted butter mixed together.
Bake at 325°
for 45 minutes or until potatoes are tender.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cream Of Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooked rice
1 qt. boiling water
2 tsp. salt
2 c. chopped vegetables (onion, tomatoes, turnips, carrots and greens)
2 c. evaporated milk
Directions:
Boil rice in water until almost tender.
Add salt and vegetables. Continue boiling until vegetables are tender.
Add milk and cook until heated.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Dairy Potato Bake
Ingredients:
1 (2 lb.) bag frozen hash browns, thawed
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of chicken soup
1 (12 oz.) carton sour cream
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/4 c. melted butter
2 c. crushed corn flake crumbs
Directions:
In large bowl, stir together the potatoes, 1/2 cup butter, salt, pepper, onion, soup, sour cream and cheese. Pour into buttered 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Top with corn flake crumbs. Drizzle with 1/4 cup melted butter and bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. sausage or bacon, cooked and drained
1/4 lb. sharp cheese, diced
1/2 lb. Velveeta, diced
1 stick butter
1 qt. milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
12 slices bread (crust removed)
1 tsp. dry onion
1/2 tsp. salt
6 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer bread, meat, cheese and onion.
Melt butter and pour over all.
Beat eggs, seasonings and milk.
Pour over.
Chill in refrigerator overnight and bake 1 hour at 350°. Let stand 15 minutes before serving.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 green onions, chopped
1 green or red pepper, chopped
1 pt. mushrooms, sliced
16 slices bread, cut into cubes
1 (8 oz.) pkg. grated Swiss cheese
1 (8 oz. pkg. grated Cheddar cheese
1 doz. eggs
2 c. milk
2 tsp. prepared mustard
3 Tbsp. margarine, melted
Directions:
Combine vegetables, bread and cheeses in greased 8 x 10 x 2-inch pan.
Combine eggs, milk and mustard; pour over vegetable mixture.
Cover and refrigerate 6 hours or overnight.
Bake at 325° for 60 to 65 minutes.
Before done, drizzle melted margarine over casserole and bake until done.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
5 medium potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced
1 to 2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. paprika
salt to taste
1 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 Tbsp. Texas Pete (optional)
1 medium onion, thinly sliced
3 large or extra large eggs, well beaten
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Heat olive oil in skillet. Add potatoes and spices. Brown potatoes on both sides. Scatter onion over all and cook with lid on until tender (turn gently once or twice).
Spread eggs over all and cover with grated cheese. Cook on very low temperature with lid on until eggs are set, approximately 10 to 15 minutes. Serve with ketchup and horseradish, if desired. Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
4 c. cubed bread (French is best)
2 c. shredded cheese
2 c. egg substitute
2 eggs, beaten
1 qt. milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
black pepper to taste
1/2 lb. bacon or sausage
4 to 5 green onions, thinly sliced
1 c. sliced mushrooms
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
Directions:
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan and arrange bread cubes along bottom. Sprinkle with shredded cheese.
Mix egg substitute, eggs, milk, mustard, Worcestershire and pepper.
Pour evenly over bread. Sprinkle with bacon or sausage chunks, onions, mushrooms and tomato.
Cover and chill for 12 to 24 hours.
Heat oven to 325° and bake for 1 hour or until set.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
8 slices white bread
softened butter
1 pkg. Smok-Y-Links
2 c. shredded Cheddar
4 eggs, whipped
2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Butter 1 side of bread slice.
Place buttered side down in lightly greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Top with 1/2 of sausage and 1 cup of cheese.
Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper together.
Pour half over cheese layer.
Repeat layering with bread buttered side up.
Cover with foil; chill for 12 hours.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes; remove foil and bake 15 minutes longer.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage
Ingredients:
3 c. water
4 1/2 c. rolled oats
1 c. water
1 Tbsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. dill seed
2 tsp. cumin
2 tsp. marjoram
1 tsp. oregano
2 tsp. garlic powder
2 Tbsp. sage
2 tsp. cayenne
1/4 c. sunflower seeds
2 tsp. thyme
2 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. nutritional yeast
Directions:
Bring 3 cups water to a boil.
Blend remaining ingredients, except oats, until smooth.
Add to the 3 cups of boiling water, then add oats.
Cook for 1 minute, stirring.
Shape into patties or links.
Bake on a nonstick cookie sheet at 350°.
Cook patties 30 minutes on one side, 20 minutes on the other.
Links or meatballs, cook for 35 minutes.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, finely chopped
1 to 2 ribs celery, finely chopped
1 green pepper, finely chopped
1 (12 oz.) pkg. sausage roll
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 to 2 cloves minced garlic
1/4 tsp. each: basil and thyme
cayenne or Tabasco sauce to taste
1 c. rice
2 1/2 c. chicken stock
Directions:
In a large skillet, melt butter.
Saute onion, celery and green pepper until soft.
Add sausage until browned and crumbly. Add mushrooms, garlic and spices.
Cook about 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in rice.
Add stock.
Boil.
Reduce heat to simmer and cook until liquid is absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice-Sausage Casserole
Ingredients:
2 pkg. chicken noodle mix
1 c. cooked brown rice
1 lb. hot bulk sausage, crumbled, browned and drained
1 lb. mild bulk sausage, crumbled, browned and drained
5 green onions, chopped
1 bell pepper, chopped
5 ribs celery, chopped
1 pkg. fresh mushrooms
slivered almonds and buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Saute vegetables.
Prepare soup, using 1/2 water called for in package directions.
Add soup, rice and sausage to vegetables and simmer a few minutes.
Place in casserole dish and top with almonds and bread crumbs.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Freezes beautifully.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage Rice Bake
Ingredients:
1 lb. smoked sausage, cut into 1-inch chunks
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. water
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 stalks celery, chopped
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. uncooked rice
Directions:
Place all ingredients in a greased oblong pan. Mix well.
Make sure it is covered. Bake at 375° for 1 hour.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Wild Rice Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. wild rice, cooked and drained (plain wild and white mixture can be used)
2 lb. sausage
1 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. flour
1/2 c. cream
2 cans condensed chicken broth (undiluted)
1 tsp. salt
black pepper to taste
1 pinch oregano
1 pinch thyme
1 pinch marjoram
dash of Tabasco
1/2 c. slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
Saute sausage and break into small pieces.
Saute mushrooms and onion in the fat.
Combine with sausage.
Mix flour and cream together until free of lumps.
Add to the sausage mixture, then add chicken broth and cook until thickened.
Add the cooked rice, seasonings and herbs.
Bake in a buttered casserole at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.
Sprinkle with toasted almonds and serve.
Makes 10 to 12 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 large eggs
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. melted butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix flour and salt in large bowl.
Make a well in center and add eggs, melted butter and half of milk.
With a whisk or wooden spoon, gradually stir the flour into the liquid mixture.
While stirring, gradually add more liquid until consistency is that of cream.
When all liquid is added, beat or whisk to remove all lumps.
Pour 1/4 cup of crepe batter into preheated pan.
Cook both sides on low heat until lightly browned.
Makes 6 to 8 crepes. Fill with fruit, ice cream, or scrambled eggs.
Fold and enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepe
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
2 eggs, well beaten
1 c. evaporated milk
1 c. water
1 Tbsp. melted shortening
Directions:
Mix together flour, baking powder and salt.
Combine eggs, milk and water.
Beat until smooth.
(I like to make batter the night before.)
In cast-iron skillet, add shortening (Crisco). When very hot, add 3 to 4 tablespoons of batter and fry until golden brown.
Serve with your favorite topping.
Brown sugar and sour cream is mine.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. butter, melted
1 can fruit filling (fresh fruit of your choice)
whipped cream
powdered sugar
Directions:
Beat ingredients together.
Pour batter into warmed skillet, just enough to thinly cover bottom of pan.
Cook over medium heat until golden.
Fill with fruit, roll up lengthwise and top with whipped cream and powdered sugar.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: Crepes(French)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 c. milk
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt together in a bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients.
Beat mixture until smooth.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
3 tsp. oil
pinch of salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix all together with a wire whip.
Fry as you would a pancake.
Drain on paper towel.
Cool.
Use whipped cream and top with fresh strawberries or blueberries.
Arrange the whipped cream on half of the crepe.
Then top with fresh fruit.
Then flip the crepe on top of fruit.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. linguine
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 lb. cleaned shrimp
1 garlic clove, minced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
dash of cayenne pepper
1 red or green pepper, cut in 1-inch matchstick pieces
1 red onion, thinly sliced
12 small black olives, chopped
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 tomatoes, cut in wedges
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions. Drain, rinse with cold water and drain again.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp-Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
2 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. oregano
1 c. prepared pasta sauce
11/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Saute garlic and oregano in oil.
Add shrimp and saute till done.
Add sauce and wine; serve over your favorite pasta.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
3 medium cloves garlic
1/3 c. good olive oil
1 lb. shrimp
1/2 lb. scallops (optional)
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. tomato paste
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley or 1 1/2 tsp. dried
1 lb. fresh tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1/2 tsp. each: oregano, rosemary and dried thyme
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook garlic in oil; add shrimp.
Cook a few minutes and remove from shrimp with slotted spoon.
Add tomatoes, chicken broth, tomato paste and herbs; cook until it measures around 2 cups. Just before serving, add seafood and serve over the pasta of your choice, cooked al dente.
This is an excellent pasta dish to use summer tomatoes.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Pasta Medley
Ingredients:
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) margarine
1 clove garlic, minced
12 oz. medium shrimp, cleaned
1 c. half and half
1 c. pea pods, cut in half diagonally
1 red bell pepper, cut into strips
1/4 c. water
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
8 oz. linguine, cooked and drained
1 wedge (4 oz.) parmesan cheese, shredded, divided
Directions:
Melt margarine in large skillet on medium heat. Add garlic; cook and stir until lightly browned. Stir in shrimp, half and half, pea pods, bell pepper, water and crushed red pepper. Simmer 3 to 5 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Pour sauce mixture over hot linguine. Sprinkle with 3/4 c. of cheese; toss to coat. Serve with remaining 1/4 c. cheese. Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh fettucini
1 lb. medium shrimp
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 tsp. sweet basil
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 cloves garlic, crushed
1 stick butter
1 green pepper
1 sweet red pepper
Directions:
Peel and devein shrimp.
Slice peppers.
Set aside dry ingredients.
In a large frying pan, melt butter.
Add garlic and peppers.
Cook on medium heat until soft.
Put water on for pasta and, once boiling, add pasta to water.
Place shrimp in frying pan; stir-fry with peppers until shrimp turn pink.
Add dry ingredients; mix.
Serve shrimp mixture over fettucini.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes
1/2 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. herb and pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/-8 inch wedges lengthwise.
Set aside.
Mix together oil and the rest of the ingredients.
Add the potatoes and coat well.
Place in a single layer on a cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° about 45 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt (if desired)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°. Peel potatoes and cut into slices 4-inches long and about 1/4-inch wide. Place in a bowl of iced water to crisp. Just before cooking, turn onto paper towel and pat dry. Turn pieces into a shallow baking pan. Sprinkle with vegetable oil. Shake pan to spread oil evenly over potatoes and spread into one layer. Bake 30 to 40 minutes, turning frequently, until golden brown. Turn potatoes onto paper towel. Sprinkle with paprika and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven French Fries(Dietetic)
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. salad oil
salt, pepper and paprika
Directions:
Slice potatoes in half and then slice each half into 8 thick crescent-shaped pieces.
Chill sliced potatoes 10 minutes (or longer) in ice cold water to crisp them.
Preheat oven to 475°. Drain potatoes well.
Toss lightly with oil.
Spray a baking pan with Pam.
Arrange the slices in a single layer.
Bake 25 minutes turning occasionally.
Season and serve.
Makes 4 (75 calorie) servings.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven French Fries
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes
1 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
spices (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Scrub potatoes, cut into long strips about 1/2-inch wide.
Dry strips thoroughly on paper towels.
Toss in a bowl with oil as if making a salad.
Toss with optional spices.
Spread potatoes in a single layer on a cookie sheet and place in preheated oven for 35 minutes.
Turn strips periodically to brown on all sides.
If a crispier, browner potato is desired, run under broiler for a minute or two.
Sprinkle with salt. Yield: 6 servings, 80 calories per serving.
This is a low cholesterol, reduced fat recipe.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Fat-Free Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
4 potatoes
1/2 c. liquid Butter Buds
lite salt to taste
Pam spray
Directions:
Cut potatoes into strips.
Arrange on Teflon baking sheet after dipping each strip into liquid Butter Buds or brushing Butter Buds on potatoes.
Optional seasoning to use is garlic, onion or chili powder instead of salt.
Sprinkle to taste.
Bake at 425° for 15 to 20 minutes or until golden brown.
Turn; bake 15 to 20 minutes more.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, cooked
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon
1 1/2 c. milk
1 stick margarine
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
3 eggs, separated
Directions:
Mash potatoes and margarine together.
Add sugar, salt, spices and flavorings.
Separate eggs.
Blend yolks with milk (add more milk if desired); add to potato mixture (will be a very thin consistency).
Pour into unbaked pie shell; cook at 400° until lightly browned (approximately 45 minutes).

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, cooked and mashed
3 1/2 c. sugar
1 c. all-purpose flour
3 eggs, beaten
2 sticks butter
1/2 c. Carnation milk
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. butter flavoring
Directions:
Combine potatoes, milk and butter.
Beat with electric mixer at medium speed, rinsing beaters several times to remove strings from potatoes.
Mix all dry ingredients, add alternately to potato mixture.
Then add egg and mix thoroughly, add flavoring and beat. Prick two pie crusts with a fork.
Pour potato mixture into pie crusts.
Bake 45 minutes in a 350° oven.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. whole-wheat flour
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. wheat germ or bran
3/4 c. soy margarine, softened (unsalted)
4 to 5 Tbsp. ice water
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients.
Add margarine and mix with fork until mixture is like cornmeal.
Sprinkle in ice water a little at a time and mix with fork until pastry holds together.
Roll into a ball and cut in half.
Roll out onto an 11-inch circle between 2 sheets of wax paper.
Remove top sheet and turn the piece with the pastry over the pie pan.
Remove paper and mold into place.
Crimp edges and pierce generously with a fork.
Place in refrigerator until filling is ready.
This recipe makes two crusts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. mashed sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 eggs, beaten
2/3 c. canned milk
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/2 c. flour, mixed with water to make a paste
Directions:
Beat potatoes.
Mix in all the spices, vanilla, eggs, milk and butter.
Mix well, then add flour mixture.
Pour into pie shells. Bake at 400° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
3 large sweet potatoes
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. evaporated milk
2 eggs, separated
2/3 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. vanilla
3 Tbsp. brandy
1 (9-inch) unbaked pie shell
Directions:
Boil sweet potatoes until tender.
Peel and mash.
Melt butter in milk and add to sweet potatoes.
Mix well.
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Set aside.
Add yolks and remaining ingredients to potatoes.
Gently fold in egg whites.
Pour into pie shell and bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) oleo
1 c. shortening
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. white sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. water
3 eggs (one at a time)
3 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat first 6 ingredients until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time. Beat well.
Combine dry ingredients and blend into butter mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop from teaspoon on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 10 minutes, or until golden brown.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. softened butter
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Mix sugars, butter, eggs and vanilla until smooth.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 lb. dark brown sugar
1 1/2 c. granulated sugar
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1 lb. butter or margarine, softened
6 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 Tbsp. water
4 c. chocolate chips or 2 (12 oz.) pkg.
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a large mixing bowl beat eggs for 4 minutes on high speed; add the sugar, vanilla and butter and mix well.
Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda.
Add the flour mixture to the batter slowly and mix well.
Add the water and mix again.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Measure 1/4 cup batter onto an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 13 to 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Be careful not to overbake.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Easy Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 box yellow cake mix (without pudding mix)
2/3 c. oil
2 eggs
1 c. nuts, chopped
1 pkg. chocolate chips
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Drop by spoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: No Egg Chocolates Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. margarine, softened
1 c. light brown sugar, packed
2 tsp. vanilla
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Cream margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add vanilla and mix well.
Add sifted dry ingredients.
Blend thoroughly.
Add chips and nuts.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberries With Chocolate Cream
Ingredients:
1 c. whipping cream
3 Tbsp. cocoa
1/4 c. + 1 Tbsp. powdered sugar
2 qt. medium-sized fresh strawberries
Directions:
Beat whipping cream until foamy.
Sift cocoa and powdered sugar together.
Serve with strawberries.
Yield: about 6 1/2 dozen appetizers.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Dessert
Ingredients:
1 stick oleo
6 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 c. chopped nuts
1 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Melt oleo in 9 x 13-inch pan; mix together remaining ingredients.
Reserve 1 cup and spread remainder evenly on bottom of pan.
Bake 20 minutes at 350°.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberries And Cream Dessert
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk
1 1/2 c. cold water
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding and pie filling mix
2 c. whipping cream, whipped (1 pt.)
1 (12 oz.) prepared loaf pound cake, cut into cubes
4 c. sliced fresh strawberries
1/2 c. strawberry preserves
additional fresh strawberries
slivered almonds
Directions:
In large mixing bowl, combine sweetened condensed milk and water; mix well.
Add pudding mix; beat until well blended.
Chill 5 minutes.
Fold in whipped cream.
Spoon 2 cups pudding mixture into 4-quart round serving bowl; top with half the cake cubes, half the strawberries, half the preserves and half the remaining pudding mixture.
Repeat layering, ending with pudding mixture.
Garnish with additional strawberries and almonds.
Chill for 4 hours.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Dessert
Ingredients:
2 c. small pretzels, crushed
3/4 c. melted butter
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Mix together and bake 8 minutes at 400°.
Cool thoroughly.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Strawberries And Cream Cake
Ingredients:
2 3/4 c. cake flour
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 c. white sugar
1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry flavored gelatin
1 c. butter, softened
4 eggs
1 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 c. strawberries, pureed
1 1/2 c. heavy whipping cream
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 1/2 c. fresh strawberries, sliced
1/2 c. margarine, softened
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
4 c. confectioners sugar
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 1/2 c. quartered strawberries
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour three 9-inch round cake pans. In large bowl, beat sugar, gelatin and butter until fluffy. Add eggs one at a time, beat well with each addition. Mix flour and baking powder, and beat alternately with milk into the sugar mixture. Fold in 1 tsp. vanilla and pureed strawberries. Divide equally into the three prepared cake pans. Bake for 25 minutes in preheated oven, or until toothpick inserted into center of cake comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes in pans, then remove from pans and cool completely.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: What Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. boiling water
1 stick butter
1 tsp. soda
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. quick cooking oats
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Pour boiling water over oats and butter which has been broken into chunks.
Stir until butter melts; set aside.
Sift flour, soda, cinnamon and salt.
Add to oat mixture; mix well.
Add sugars, then eggs; mix thoroughly.
Bake in a 2-quart dish 12 minutes in microwave.
Turn dish often.
Frost with topping.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Scripture Cake(Found In Old Testament)
Ingredients:
4 1/2 c. 1 Kings Chapter 4 Verse 22
1 c. Judges Chapter 5 Verse 25
2 c. Jeremiah Chapter 6 Verse 20
2 c. 1 Samuel Chapter 30 Verse 12
2 c. Nahum Chapter 3 Verse 12
2 c. Numbers Chapter 17 Verse 8
2 Tbsp. 1 Samuel Chapter 14 Verse 25
1 tsp. Leviticus Chapter 2 Verse 13
6 eggs Jeremiah Chapter 17 Verse 11
1/2 c. Judges Chapter 4 Verse 19
2 tsp. Amos Chapter 4 Verse 5
2 tsp. 2 Chronicles Chapter 9 Verse 9
Directions:
Mix thoroughly.
Bake in tube pan at 275° for 3 to 4 hours.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Stack Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar or 1 c. sugar and 1 c. molasses
5 to 6 c. biscuit flour (enough to make a soft dough)
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. nutmeg or ginger
2 c. dried apples, cooked and cooled to room temperature (3 commercial pkg; apple butter can be used instead)
1 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. shortening
3 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients except sugar and spices.
Cream together sugar, eggs, buttermilk, shortening, vanilla and spices. Gently combine creamed and dry ingredients using a fork.
Batter will resemble biscuit dough.
Set aside 1/2.
Grease and flour 4 (9-inch) cake pans.
Divide each half a second time.
Put each quarter of dough into cake pan and bake in oven preheated to 350° until golden brown, if made with molasses, or light brown if not, about 20 minutes.
Layers will be thin.
Remove cake layers from pans.
Put cooked apples between each layer.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Happiness Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. good thoughts
3 c. forgiveness for others
1 c. consideration
2 c. sacrifice
1 c. kind deeds
2 c. own faults, well beaten
4 c. prayers
Directions:
Mix thoroughly; add tears of joy, sorrow and sympathy.
Flavor with love and kindly service.
Fold in 4 cups of prayers, faith and enthusiasm; spread all into your daily life.
Blend well with human kindness; serve with a smile at all times and it will satisfy the hunger of many people less fortunate than ourselves.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Four Flavored Pound Cake
Ingredients:
vegetable cooking spray
1 3/4 c. sifted cake flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
3/4 c. sugar
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. skim milk
1/2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1/4 tsp. almond extract
1/4 tsp. rum extract
1/4 tsp. lemon extract
1/4 tsp. vanilla extract
4 egg whites, stiffly beaten
fresh strawberries
Directions:
Spray tube or Bundt pan with vegetable (oil) spray; dust with flour and set aside. Combine flour plus next 3 ingredients in large bowl. Add oil and milk. Beat at medium speed until smooth. Add lemon rind and next 4 ingredients.
Fold in 1/3 egg whites. Gently fold in remaining egg whites. Pour batter into pan. Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Cool in pan 10 minutes; remove from pan. Cool on rack.
Serve 3/4 cup fresh strawberries with each slice. Makes 16 servings. Contains 183 calories per 1/2 inch slice.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. chickpeas
1/2 lb. diced Mozzarella cheese
6 oz. jar roasted peppers, drained and cut into strips
1 c. paper thin sliced zucchini
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. wine vinegar (to taste)
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
dash of pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes to 1 hour.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Salad
Ingredients:
2 (19 oz.) cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. black olives, chopped or sliced
1/3 c. chopped red onion
1/3 c. chopped parsley
1/4 c. vinegar
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine the first 5 ingredients in a bowl.
In a small jar, shake together the vinegar, salt and pepper. Add the olive oil and shake again.
Pour dressing over chickpea mixture and toss.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Bennett'S Homemade Tortillas
Ingredients:
3 c. unbleached flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 c. shortening
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3/4 to 1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Combine flour and baking soda, then add salt and pepper. Combine shortening into mixture, using a fork or pastry knife, until mixture is crumbly, then slowly add boiling water.
Knead for 3 minutes.
Cover and let it rest for 15 minutes, until shiny.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. warm water
1 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. shortening
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder and salt.
Blend in shortening and water; knead.
Let sit covered for 15 minutes.
Roll into balls and roll out.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
8 c. flour
4 level tsp. baking powder
3 1/2 level tsp. salt
12 level tsp. shortening
2 1/4 to 2 1/2 c. warm water
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients, add shortening and blend well.
Add from 2 1/4 to 2 1/2 cups warm water, a portion at a time.
Knead well, shape into small balls, flatten and roll out with a rolling pin.
Place in a skillet that has been preheated to medium hot. Keep covered.
Makes 4 to 5 dozen.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Homemade Tacos
Ingredients:
1/2 green chili pepper, chopped
1/2 c. onions, chopped
1/2 c. green bell pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. chili powder
1 garlic clove, minced
2 tsp. cornstarch, mixed with cold water to make paste
1 lb. ground chuck, browned
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
8 corn tortillas
Directions:
Saute
peppers,
onions
and
bell
pepper in oil until soft. Add
chili powder, garlic, cornstarch paste, meat, salt and pepper.
Cook
over
medium heat about 1/2 hour, stirring until thickened.
Fry
tortillas
and fill with meat mixture. Garnish with lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Flour Tortillas
Ingredients:
6 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. shortening
2 c. warm water
Directions:
In a bowl, combine dry ingredients.
Cut in lard until particles are fine.
Add water gradually.
Form into a ball (1 inch round) and knead 5 minutes.
Cover with towel and let rest 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. bite-size asparagus or broccoli pieces
1 medium tomato, seeded and diced
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1 c. shredded Muenster cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
3 Tbsp. fresh basil
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook mushrooms, onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is tender, but not brown.
Stir in rice.
Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
In another saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer.
