Slowly add 1 cup of broth to rice mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook and stir until liquid is absorbed.
Add 1 cup more broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed.
It should take 15 minutes.
Stir in tomato, carrot and remaining half cup broth. Cook until rice is slightly creamy and just tender, stirring constantly.
Stir in cheeses and basil.
If desired, garnish with tomato slices.
Serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 c. raw rice
1 can tomato paste
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can shrimp or 1/2 lb. cleaned shrimp, cut small
1/2 c. or more peas
Directions:
Saute onion and peppers in oil.
Add rice; cook over medium heat until tanned; stir constantly.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper and broth.
Mix and cover tightly.
Simmer without stirring for 35 to 40 minutes.
Add shrimp and peas.
Mix well.
Cook an additional 5 minutes until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto (Rice With Vegetables)
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced green onion
1 c. shredded carrots
1/2 c. chopped parsley
6 Tbsp. oleo
2 1/2 c. raw rice
5 chicken bouillon cubes
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
4 1/2 c. water
Directions:
Melt oleo in casserole dish.
Saute onions and carrots.
Add rice and saute until opaque.
Add bouillon cubes, bay leaf, salt, thyme and water.
Bring to boil.
Simmer 15 to 20 minutes.
Stir in parsley.
Serves 12.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Risotto(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter (divided use)
2 c. rice
6 c. chicken broth
1 small bay leaf
1 lb. shrimp, peeled
1 tsp. minced garlic
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Stir in rice to coat.
Add broth and bay leaf.
Cook rice.
Separately melt 2 tablespoons of butter; saute shrimp and garlic.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked rice.
Add remainder of ingredients. Stir and serve.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet potatoes
1 egg white
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes into 1/4 inch by 1/2 inch strips. In a bowl, combine egg white and seasonings; beat well. Add potatoes; toss to coat. Place in a single layer on two baking sheets coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake, uncovered, at 450° for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Yield: 8 servings. One 1/2 c. serving equals 40 calories, 20 mg sodium, 0 cholesterol, 9 gm carbohydrate, 1 gm protein, trace fat. Diabetic Exchange: 1/2 starch.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Oven Fries
Ingredients:
2 medium sweet potatoes (12 oz. total), peeled
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive or canola oil
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
Coat baking sheet with vegetable oil spray.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Oven-Fried Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 large sweet potatoes, unpeeled (about 2 lb.)
2/3 c. fine, dry breadcrumbs
3/4 tsp. dried rosemary
1/3 c. milk
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Scrub potatoes; cut crosswise into 3/8-inch slices.
Combine breadcrumbs and rosemary.
Dip each slice in milk and dredge in breadcrumb mixture.
Place on a lightly greased baking sheet and coat with cooking spray.
Bake at 450° for 15 minutes.
Turn potatoes and bake 10 to 15 minutes or until tender.
Yield: 6 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Spiced Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. canola oil
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
2 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and cut lengthwise into 3/4-inch thick wedges
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine oil with salt, cinnamon and cayenne. Stir in sweet potatoes until each piece is well coated. Arrange sweet potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Turn potatoes; bake until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven; place on serving platter.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil, divided
4 large sweet potatoes or baking potatoes, scrubbed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Line cookie sheet with foil.
Brush with 1 teaspoon of oil.
Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/2-inch thick wedges.
Transfer to a large bowl.
Add remaining teaspoon of oil, salt and pepper.
Toss.
Spread potatoes in single layer on prepared cookie sheet.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes, until golden and crisp.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
1 qt. water
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 c. diced celery
1/2 c. diced onion
2 1/2 c. diced, peeled potatoes
1 c. diced carrots
1 (16 oz.) bag frozen California Blend vegetables
2 cans condensed cream of chicken soup
1 lb. process cheese, cubed
Directions:
Bring water to a boil in a large kettle; add next 6 ingredients.
Reduce heat and simmer, covered, until all vegetables are tender, about 30 minutes.
Stir in soup and cheese.
Cook until soup is heated through and cheese is melted.
Yields 10 to 12 servings (3 quarts).

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese(Casserole)
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c .milk
3 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling water with salt.
Cook five minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain. Arrange in a shallow, 2-quart well-buttered baking dish.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. fine dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter or margarine
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling salted water.
Cook 5 minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain.
Arrange in a shallow 2-quart well buttered baking dish.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in frying pan.
Add red and green pepper and garlic.
Saute for 1 1/2 minutes.
Sprinkle over cauliflower.
Mix cornstarch into milk.
Add 2 tablespoons butter to frying pan.
Stir in milk and cornstarch mixture; cook, stirring until thickened.
Add salt, pepper and cheese.
Stir until cheese is blended.
Pour over vegetables.
Mix bread crumbs and butter.
Sprinkle on top of casserole.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes or cover and refrigerate. Bake for 35 minutes, if chilled.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 lemon (juice)
1/2 onion, medium
1 large garlic clove, pressed
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped fine
1 tsp. mustard
1 small pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Mix all well.
Delicious served with vegetable trays for parties.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Salad
Ingredients:
large head cauliflower, broken up
1 green pepper
1 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled or substitute Bac*Os
1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1/4 c. sugar
2 c. grated Colby cheese
1/2 c. onion
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine cauliflower, cheese, green pepper, onion and bacon. Mix Miracle Whip, sour cream and sugar.
Pour over ingredients and toss lightly.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage Egg
Ingredients:
1 leftover sausage cake, chopped
1 egg
1 tsp. water
dash of natural seasoning or onion powder
oil or butter
Directions:
Mix egg with sausage meat, water and seasoning.
Pour into skillet with small amount of oil or butter.
Over medium or hot heat, cook as an omelet.
Turn once until edges are brown.
Serve with slices of tomato.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Saute And Sausage Or Turkey
Ingredients:
6 medium red potatoes
1 1/2 lb. green beans
3 medium onions
salad oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 lb. turkey-sausage links
3 medium tomatoes
Directions:
Cut each unpeeled potato into quarters and cut stem end from beans.
In 6-quart pan, heat potatoes covered in hot water to boiling over high heat.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 7 minutes.
Stir in green beans, adding more hot water if needed. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce heat to low and simmer 5 minutes.
Drain.
Thinly slice onions.
In 12-inch skillet over medium heat, put 1 1/2 tablespoons hot salad oil and cook sausage until lightly brown.
Add onions and continue cooking until onions are tender.
Stir in 1/2 cup water, turn heat to low; cover and cook until sausage is cooked through.
Remove sausage mixture to bowl.
In same skillet, in 1 1/2 tablespoons hot salad oil, cook potatoes and green beans with salt and pepper until potatoes are golden, stirring frequently. Cut tomatoes in wedges.
Return sausage mixture to skillet, then add tomatoes and heat through. Spoon on to warm platters.
Makes 8 main dish servings.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. bulk pork sausage
1 can mushroom soup (undiluted)
3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 c. thinly sliced potatoes
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In large skillet, cook sausage until no longer pink and drain.
In bowl, combine soup, milk, onions, salt and pepper.
In ungreased 11 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish, layer half of potato soup mixture and sausage.
Repeat layers.
Cover and bake 1 1/2 hours or until potatoes are tender.
Uncover and sprinkle with cheese. Return to oven until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potatoes Parmesan(Great For Leftover Spuds)
Ingredients:
2 c. mashed potatoes
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 egg
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese; mix well.
Coat baking pan with Pam.
Using 2 spoons, drop on pan. Sprinkle on 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 400° for 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Leftover Meat Pie
Ingredients:
mashed potatoes (instant works well, for 4 people)
1 large onion, cut in 1-inch pieces
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. warm milk
2 bouillon cubes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. celery salt
2 c. cooked meat, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 can peas and carrots
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Brown onion in butter.
Add flour, stock and seasonings.
Cook until thick, then simmer about 5 minutes.
Add meat and vegetables.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
6 cloves garlic, peeled and left whole
salt in water
Directions:
Boil potatoes and garlic in salt water until tender.
Drain well.
Add 1/2 stick light butter.
Using hand blender mash all above ingredients until smooth.
Slowly add skim milk and 2 Tablespoons lite mayo, until creamy consistency.
Sprinkle parsley before serving.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, pared
2 tsp. salt
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives, cubed
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. heavy cream
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Cook potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt in boiling water until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes until smooth; add cream cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon salt.
Mix until smooth.
Gradually add cream; mix well after each addition. Put in greased baking dish.
(Bake at once or cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.)
Dot top of potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake in 325° oven 30 minutes. Increase heat to 375° and bake 30 minutes more.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Herbed Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. potatoes
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, slivered
3/4 c. milk
2 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large pot, boil potatoes.
Drain.
In same pot, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until golden, stirring frequently.
Remove pot from heat and add potatoes, remaining 2 tablespoons butter, milk, basil, salt and pepper. Using an electric beater or potato masher, beat mixture until smooth.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 baking potatoes, peeled and quartered (about 4 lb.)
1 3/4 tsp. salt, divided
1/2 c. butter, softened
3/4 c. half-and-half
3 large garlic cloves, minced
1/2 tsp. ground white pepper
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil in a Dutch oven or stockpot; cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes or until tender; drain.
Beat potatoes, remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt, butter, half-and-half, garlic cloves, and pepper at medium speed with an electric mixer until smooth.
Stir in fresh parsley. Serve immediately.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 cloves crushed garlic
4 medium-sized all-purpose potatoes, peeled and thin sliced
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add garlic, potatoes and bay leaf.
Cook, partially covered, over moderate heat until potatoes are "fork tender" (reserving 3 tablespoons cooking water).
Discard bay leaf, transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl.
Add margarine, buttermilk and yogurt.
Beat with a mixer, then add just enough of the reserved water to make the potatoes creamy.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Soft Beef Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1 c. water
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. dried whole oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
8 (7-inch) flour tortillas
2 c. shredded lettuce
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1 (8 oz.) carton commercial guacamole
commercial taco or picante sauce
Directions:
Cook first 5 ingredients in a large skillet until meat is browned, stirring to crumble. Drain well. Stir in water, cumin, chili powder, oregano, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer over low heat 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Uncover and cook 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 tsp. minced onions
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Cook ground beef in skillet until browned. Drain excess fat. Add rest of ingredients.
Simmer, uncovered, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Makes 12 tacos.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Tacos(Quick Low Calorie Meal, Feeds 1 To 22)
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 can chicken or beef stock
1 pkg. taco seasoning or chili powder, black pepper and garlic salt
grated cheese
picante sauce
taco shells
onions
lettuce
cumin
tomato
Directions:
Cook ground beef in iron skillet on medium heat.
Add 1 can of beef or chicken stock.
Season with spices or package of taco seasoning.
When stock is reduced, serve meat with slotted spoon. Chop veggies and put each in it's own serving bowl.
Put grated cheese in bowl.
Heat shells on cookie sheet in 300° oven for 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Taco Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/3 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped onions
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 c. biscuit mix
1 tomato, sliced
Directions:
Grease a square baking dish.
Brown ground beef; drain.
Mix sour cream, mayonnaise, cheese and onion; reserve.
Combine biscuit mix and water until soft dough forms.
Pat in pan, pressing dough 1/2-inch up sides.
Layer beef, tomato and green pepper in pan.
Spoon sour cream mixture over top.
Sprinkle with paprika, if desired.
Bake in 375° oven until edges of dough are light brown, about 25 to 30 minutes.
Yield: 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Deep-Dish Taco Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. sour cream
1/3 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. (about 2 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 c. Bisquick baking mix
1/4 c. cold water
1 to 2 medium tomatoes, thinly sliced
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
Directions:
Grease	an
8
x
8
x 2-inch square baking dish.
Cook ground beef until brown;	drain.	Mix sour cream, mayonnaise, cheese and
onion;
reserve.
Mix	baking mix and water until soft
dough forms.
Pat
into pan, pressing dough 1/2-inch up sides.
Layer beef,
tomatoes and green pepper in pan.
Spoon sour
cream mixture over top.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake at 375° for 20 to 30 minutes.
Yields 5 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac-N-Cheese
Ingredients:
1 lb. elbow macaroni
1 stick butter or margarine
3 c. milk
1 lb. Velveeta cheese
1 c. bread crumbs
4 Tbsp. flour
dash of salt and pepper if desired
Directions:
Cook macaroni and put in casserole dish.
Slice up cheese. Melt 4 tablespoons butter; add flour.
Stir; add milk and stir. Add cheese to mixture and stir frequently.
When melted, add to macaroni and mix.
Melt remaining 4 tablespoons butter and add bread crumbs; put on top of macaroni and cheese.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
8 slices American cheese
2 c. elbow macaroni, cooked
2 c. milk
1 bread slice
1/2 tsp. mustard powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add milk.
Add mustard powder.
Slowly add cheese.
Stir on low until sauce is thick.
Pour into baking dish with the macaroni.
Add broken bread bits.
Cook in oven at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 c. uncooked macaroni
1 stick butter
1 1/2 lb. Velveeta cheese, cubed
1 can Milnot or evaporated milk
milk (enough to cover macaroni)
salt and pepper
Directions:
Put all ingredients in a prepared 9 x 13 pan and stir. Place in oven at 350°. Bake 1 hour. Every 15 minutes, pull out of oven and stir. Place back in oven; repeat process for that hour.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Grandma'S Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. uncooked macaroni
4 Tbsp. butter
4 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 lb. cubed Velveeta
2/3 c. sour cream
1 1/3 c. cottage cheese
2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook and drain macaroni.
Place in 2 1/2 qt. greased casserole dish.
Melt butter over medium heat, stir in flour; mix well.
Add milk and cook over medium heat, stir constantly until sauce thickens.
Add salt, sugar, and cheese, mix well.
Mix sour cream and cheese into sauce.
Pour over macaroni; mix well.
Sprinkle grated cheese and bread crumbs over top.
Dot with butter.
The dish may be frozen at this point.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mac 'N Cheese
Ingredients:
1 bag shell noodles, cooked
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 pkg. Cheddar cheese
1/4 brick Velveeta cheese
1 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Place cooked noodles into deep baking dish; add mushroom soup and both cheeses.
Mix thoroughly.
Top with a thin layer of bread crumbs.
Bake at 375° until a layer of crust forms on top, about 30 to 35 minutes.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Leek Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. coarsely chopped onions (about 1/2 lb.)
4 c. sliced leek (white part only, about 2/3 lb.)
2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
3 Tbsp. butter, margarine or oil
4 c. chicken stock (about 2 cans clear chicken broth)
salt
freshly ground white pepper or regular white pepper
1 c. half and half
Directions:
Saute onions, leek and potatoes in butter over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes.
Add stock and bring to a boil.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Puree potato-leek mixture in blender.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Add half and half.
Return to heat and heat through.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Chowder
Ingredients:
2 large leeks (white parts only)
1 lb. potatoes (about 3 medium), peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 c. chicken broth (homemade or canned)
freshly ground pepper to taste
salt (if desired, omit if using canned broth)
1 c. skim milk
2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley or 2 tsp. dried flakes
1/2 c. grated Cheddar (2 oz.)
Directions:
Separate and wash the leeks.
Slice them into 1/2-inch pieces. In a nonstick large saucepan, saute the potatoes and leeks in the butter or margarine for several minutes, stirring the vegetables to prevent browning.
Add the broth, pepper and salt.
Bring the chowder to a boil; reduce heat, cover and simmer chowder for 20 to 30 minutes or until tender.
Add the milk gradually; heat the chowder gently, but do not boil.
Stir in the parsley.
Serve chowder with a generous sprinkle of grated cheese.
If desired, puree in blender before adding milk.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottoms of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 pt. or more chicken broth
1 small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
Accent
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking until tender.
Add chicken broth and seasonings.
Add Accent while cooking.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Leek Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. potatoes, scrubbed and sliced
3 or 4 leeks (white part and 1 inch green), split open lengthwise and sliced
4 c. chicken stock (may use canned)
4 c. water
1 to 3 Tbsp. butter to taste
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large soup pot, combine potatoes, leeks, stock, water and butter.
Bring to a boil, turn down heat and let simmer for about 1 hour.
Stir occasionally.
Taste for seasoning and add salt and pepper if needed.
Mash some of the potatoes into the soup to thicken slightly.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. diced onions
2 c. diced potatoes
2 c. chopped leeks
1 tsp. salt
3 c. water or chicken broth
1 can evaporated milk
Directions:
In a large pot saute onions in oil
until clear.
Add water, salt, potatoes and leeks.
Cover and simmer for 25 minutes or until potatoes are soft.
Puree in blender and return to pot.
Add milk. Heat for 5 minutes until hot.
Serve with croutons and fresh ground black pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: "Shortbread"(Cookies)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Beat butter, powdered sugar and vanilla until fluffy. Gradually add flour until well blended.
Divide dough in 1/2. Shape each into ball.
Flatten to 1-inch rounds between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Refrigerate until firm.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Classic Shortbread
Ingredients:
1 stick butter (at room temperature)
1/3 c. powdered sugar (unsifted)
1/4 tsp. vanilla
1 c. flour
Directions:
Cream butter until light.
Mix in powdered sugar, then vanilla. Work in the flour.
Knead dough on unfloured surface until smooth. Use a shortbread pan or jelly roll pan.
Spray lightly with nonstick spray.
Put ball of dough in the middle of pan and spread to sides.
Prick entire surface with a fork, then bake at 325° for 30 to 35 minutes until very lightly browned.
Be sure middle of shortbread is completely cooked.
Cool 10 minutes, then loosen with a knife and flip onto a cutting board.
Cut while still warm into desired shapes.
Top with Lemon Curd, jelly or jam or dip in chocolate.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Fabulous Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
1 lb. unsalted butter, cold
1 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. unbleached all-purpose flour
Directions:
Work cold butter with hands until soft and creamy, but not too soft.
Add sugar and mix.
In another bowl, mix together the flour and salt. Mix this into the butter-sugar mixture with your fingers until the particles cling together.
Gather the dough into a ball, kneading gently until it becomes smooth and soft, not too oily. Try not to handle the dough too much. The warmth from the hands melts the butter even more and over-develops the butter.
Pat the dough into a rectangle, 3/8-inch thick.
Mark out the pieces with fork tines.
Use a dull knife to score the dough into small 1 1/2 x 2-inch rectangular pieces.
Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Remove the pan from the refrigerator and deepen the slice lines to remove from the pan.
Bake pieces on an ungreased cookie sheet.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. butter
1 c. powdered sugar
3 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Cream softened butter and confectioners sugar together until light. Sift flour and salt together and add to butter/sugar mixture. Add vanilla and blend thoroughly. Gather dough in a bowl; wrap in wax paper and chill 4 to 6 hours. Roll out chilled dough to 5/8-inch thickness. Cut out cookies (hearts or shamrocks are nice). Sprinkle tops with granulated white or colored sugar. Place cutout cookies on ungreased cookie sheet and refrigerate for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Jeweled Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. (2 sticks) margarine or butter, softened
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. almond extract or 1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. Quaker oats (quick or old fashioned, uncooked)
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. fruit preserves
1/4 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Beat margarine, sugar and almond extract until fluffy.
Stir in combined oats and flour.
Divide dough into four equal pieces.
Place two portions on opposite corners of a large ungreased cookie sheet.
Press each into circle about 1/8-inch thick.
Press edges of dough with tines of fork.
Repeat with other two pieces.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until light golden brown.
Remove from oven; spread 2 tablespoons preserves on center of each circle.
Sprinkle 1 tablespoon almonds over preserves.
Cool 10 minutes on cookie sheet.
With large knife, cut each circle into 8 wedges.
Remove to wire rack; cool completely.
Store loosely covered.
Yields 32 servings.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Mustard Marinade (For Grilling)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. Dijon mustard
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 cloves crushed garlic
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Brush on chicken while grilling. (Best to marinate chicken or pork for about 8 hours before grilling.)

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey-Mustard Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. crushed rosemary
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. oil
4 tsp. honey
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
2 lb. chicken
Directions:
Marinate chicken for about 1 hour.
Bake or broil until chicken is cooked.
Drizzle with remainder of marinade while cooking.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Mustard Marinade
Ingredients:
1 envelope honey mustard salad dressing mix
1/3 c. oil
1/3 c. orange juice
Directions:
Mix ingredients in bowl until well blended.
Reserve 1/4 cup for basting.
Pour marinade over meat, poultry, hamburger or seafood.
Cover and refrigerate.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
2 or 3 Tbsp. mustard
1/2 Tbsp. honey
oregano as desired
garlic powder as desired
chicken pieces
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients.
Stir or mix well.
Wash chicken pieces.
Place chicken in large flat baking pan.
Pour or spoon marinade over chicken and let it marinate several hours.
Place in oven at 375° for 1 hour or until done.
Make gravy with juices. Serve with rice, mixed vegetables and butternut squash baked.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Basted Chicken
Ingredients:
8 chicken breasts
1/2 c. honey
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. prepared mustard
Directions:
Dip chicken into other ingredients.
Refrigerate overnight. Bake 1 hour at 325°.
Baste with marinade.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice Breakfast
Ingredients:
leftover rice
milk
cinnamon
sugar
Directions:
Heat leftover rice in microwave oven.
Top with warm milk, cinnamon and sugar.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice
Ingredients:
rice
water
Directions:
Put rice and water together and cook it.
Eat with butter on it.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Leftovers Delight
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. minced onion
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 1/2 c. chopped leftover meat (beef, chicken or ham)
3 c. cooked rice
1 (10 oz.) can creamed soup
grated cheese
Directions:
Cook onion in margarine in skillet until tender.
Add meat, cooked rice and soup.
Combine thoroughly.
May add a little milk for moisture.
Cover and simmer over very low heat about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Serves four to five.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice Cereal
Ingredients:
leftover rice
brown sugar
milk
Directions:
Heat rice in saucepan with a little milk (to make it creamy) and sprinkle with brown sugar to taste.
Can also be done in microwave.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. oil
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
In a small saucepan, beat 1 egg; add remaining ingredients. Cook over medium-high, stirring constantly, until mixture begins to thicken.
Remove from heat.
Coat chicken wings, parts, breasts, etc. on the grill.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. catsup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce when grilling chicken, pork or beef.
Yields 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce for chicken, pork or beef.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1/2 c. chili sauce
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. honey
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 clove garlic, sliced thin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Heat to thicken and blend flavors.
Baste turkey with sauce during the last half hour of roasting.
Make 2 2/3 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. sesame oil
4 to 6 green onions, finely chopped
1 (1-inch) piece ginger root, peeled and minced
1/2 c. sugar
2 garlic cloves, finely chopped
Directions:
Combine soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, onions and ginger in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil to dissolve sugar and stir to blend flavors. Cool and pour over chicken.
Let stand at room temperature for 2 hours or refrigerate for 4 hours.
Bring chicken back to room temperature.
Place on grill and grill each side for 10 minutes.
Brown remaining sauce on chicken while on grill.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken legs
3/4 c. flour
3/4 c. corn flake crumbs
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Wipe chicken legs with damp paper towel. In clean bag, combine flour, corn flake crumbs, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and garlic.
Dip chicken in egg a couple at a time, then shake in bag to coat with flour mixture.
Arrange in greased pan.
Pour melted margarine over chicken.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 400°.
Remove foil, increase heat to 450° and bake 25 to 30 minutes until golden brown.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: First Down Drumsticks
Ingredients:
3/4 c. picante sauce
1/4 c. honey
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 to 1 tsp. fresh grated ginger or 1/2 tsp. "canned" ginger
Directions:
Remove skin from chicken.
Combine ingredients; simmer for 10 minutes.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Turn; brush with more sauce.
Bake 30 to 40 minutes longer.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven-Fried Drumsticks
Ingredients:
1/3 c. shortening
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 lb. chicken legs
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Melt shortening in small pan and set aside.
In paper bag, mix flour, salt, paprika and pepper.
Put 3 or 4 chicken legs in paper bag at a time and shake to coat chicken.
Arrange flour-coated chicken in a single layer in ungreased baking pan, 13 x 9 x 2-inch.
Drizzle the melted shortening on chicken.
Bake, uncovered, 45 minutes or until chicken is tender.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Miniature Drumsticks
Ingredients:
3 lb. broiling chicken wings
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. m.s.g.
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
3/4 c. buttermilk
oil or shortening
Directions:
Cut wings in half. Discard wing tips.
Combine flour, cheese and seasonings in shallow dish. Dip chicken pieces in buttermilk. Shake to remove excess. Roll in flour mixture.
Heat oil in electric skillet to 365°.
Fry chicken pieces for 5 minutes. Drain on absorbent paper.
Keep warm.
Yields 18 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wing Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken wings
1/3 c. sesame seed
2/3 c. fine dry breadcrumbs
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 c. half and half
Directions:
Remove and discard wing tips.
Separate remaining wing sections.
Cut skin at small end of each wing section.
Pull out one of the bones from section, having 2 bones; set aside.
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a small skillet, toast sesame seed over low heat until golden, stirring occasionally.
In a small shallow bowl, combine toasted seed, breadcrumbs, paprika, salt and seasoned salt.
Dip wing sections into half and half, then into breadcrumb mixture.
Arrange in a 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Pour melted butter over chicken.
Bake 45 to 55 minutes in preheated oven until tender.
Makes 24 appetizer servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Miss Opal'S Peach Salad
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water
20 oz. can crushed pineapple
8 oz. cream cheese
9 oz. Cool Whip
1/2 c. sugar
6 oz. box peach jello
1 c. chopped canned peaches
Directions:
Combine water, sugar, crushed pineapple and heat to boiling. Add peach jello and stir until dissolved.
Add cream cheese to hot mixture and stir until melted.
Mix well.
Chill until thickened, but not jelled!
Add chopped canned peaches and Cool Whip and mix well. Pour into 9 x 13-inch pan.
Chill!

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 head curly endive, torn
1/2 medium head iceberg (3 c.)
2 tomatoes, peeled, chopped
3/4 c. cubed Feta cheese
1/4 c. sliced, pitted ripe olives
1/4 c. sliced green onion
1/3 c. white vinegar
2/3 c. olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large mixing bowl, toss together endive and lettuce; mound onto 6 individual salad plates.
Arrange tomatoes, Feta cheese, olives and onions on top of greens.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Miss Lou'S Tea Cakes
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter, softened
1 c. sugar
1 egg
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/8 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. buttermilk
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy.
Add egg; beat well.
Combine flour, baking powder and salt.
Add to creamed mixture alternately with buttermilk, beginning and ending with flour mixture.
Gently stir in vanilla. Drop batter by heaping teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 12 minutes or until lightly browned.
Cool. Yields 5 dozen.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 large head lettuce, shredded
potato salad (recipe given)
2 or 3 tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 cucumber, cut lengthwise into fingers
1 to 2 avocados, sliced
6 slices Feta (Greek cheese)
1 green pepper, cut into rings
1/4 c. olive oil and 1/4 c. salad oil, blended
6 to 8 slices canned beets, cooked
shrimp, peeled and cooked
6 to 8 anchovy fillets
black olives (Greek-style preferred)
6 to 8 whole green onions
1/2 c. white vinegar
oregano
Directions:
Mound the potato salad on a large platter. Cover the potato salad with the shredded lettuce, then arrange the remaining vegetables in an attractive pattern on the lettuce. Place the anchovies and shrimp on top of the salad. The entire salad is then sprinkled with the vinegar, then the blended oil. Sprinkle liberally with oregano over all and serve at once. Toasted French or Greek bread is served with the salad. Each person serves himself from the beautiful salad platter. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Miss Mary'S Cabbage Casserole
Ingredients:
1/2 head cabbage, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 green pepper, chopped
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 c. milk
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
cornbread crumbs
Directions:
Cook
the
first
3 ingredients in lightly salted water until tender.
Drain.
Melt butter in saucepan.
Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.	Slowly add milk; stir	until thickened.
Add
cheese;
blend
until
melted. Preheat oven
to 325°.
Layer the drained cabbage mixture and cheese
sauce	in
a greased casserole.	Make several layers, ending with
sauce.
Bake until
bubbly.
Top with crumbs (we use cornbread crumbs that are sprinkled with poultry seasoning or you
could
use
cornbread stuffing
mix).
Return to oven until lightly browned.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 cube oleo
4 medium onions, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
9 garlic cloves, chopped
handful of celery leaves, chopped
10 dried chili peppers, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin seed, crushed
4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
2/3 can tomato sauce
Directions:
Fry on medium-high heat the oil, all spices and celery leaves until absorbed by oil and not powder.
Add tomato sauce and cook until thick.
Skin and cup up chicken and put in large pot. Add sauce to chicken and simmer 20 to 25 minutes.
Add water to not quite halfway to the top of chicken.
Cover and simmer until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken, skinned and cut into small pieces
salt to taste
2 tsp. black pepper
1/3 c. oil
1 1/2 large onions, chopped
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
2 whole cardamom pods, crushed
4 whole cloves
1 1/2 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. chili powder or to taste
3 tsp. ground coriander
2 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
2 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
2 bay leaves
2 Tbsp. ketchup
1 c. water
Directions:
Wash the chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in a Dutch oven.
Add chicken and brown over medium heat.
Remove and reserve chicken.
Add onions, cinnamon stick, cardamom and cloves to pan.
Saute until onions are lightly browned.
Add more oil if needed.
Add turmeric, chili powder, coriander, ginger, garlic, cumin and bay leaves.
Fry spices 4 to 5 minutes, sprinkling with water if they become too dry.
Stir in ketchup and return chicken to pan.
Pour in water and bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer over low heat until chicken is tender and sauce is thickened, about 30 minutes.
Serve with rice or bread.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. prepared mustard
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. water
1 clove garlic, minced
2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer chicken or one 4 to 5-lb. domestic duck or wild goose
cooking oil or melted butter
2 large potatoes, peeled and quartered or 8 new potatoes
6 medium carrots, bias-sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
2 medium apples, cored and cut into wedges
Directions:
Set oven to 375°.
In a small saucepan combine first 10 ingredients.
Bring to boiling, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat; set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken pieces, skinned
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2-inch pieces ginger, chopped
2 tsp. cumin seed, ground
3 Tbsp. natural yogurt
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. turmeric
pinch of chili powder
1 tsp. pepper
2 onions, chopped
salt
Directions:
Place the garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, chili pepper, coriander and yogurt in a large bowl with salt to taste.
Mix well.
Add chicken and leave for 4 hours; turn occasionally. Heat the oil in the pan; add the onion and fry until golden. Add the chicken and marinade.
Bring to simmering point; cover and cook for about 30 minutes, until the chicken is tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. flour
1 Tbsp. salt
4 c. cooked chicken
1 c. chicken stock
2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
3 Tbsp. curry powder
Directions:
Fry onions in butter.
Add flour, salt, curry powder and chicken stock.
Stir constantly until mixture is thick.
Add milk, lemon juice and chicken.
Heat well.
(May be made in advance and reheated.)
Serve over rice with chopped bacon or chutney, diced pineapple and coconut.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low Carb Breakfast Smoothie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sliced fruit
1/2 c. cottage cheese
1/4 c. plain yogurt
strawberries, raspberries, peaches (fresh or frozen)
flavor with sugar-free Tang or Crystal-Lite to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Add ice if using fresh fruit and blend again until slushy.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Take Alongs
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or margarine
2/3 c. sugar
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. oats (quick or old-fashioned)
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. wheat germ or finely chopped nuts
6 crispy cooked bacon slices, crumbled
Directions:
Beat together until well blended the butter, sugar, egg and vanilla.
Add the combined flour, soda and salt; mix well.
Stir in oats, cheese, wheat germ and bacon.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 14 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet; remove to wire cooling rack.
Store in loosely covered container. Yield:
about 3 dozen cookies.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low-Carb Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms
1 lb. bulk breakfast sausage (hot or sage)
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 350°. Clean the mushrooms. Remove their stems and use a paring knife to make the hole for stuffing larger. Brown and drain the sausage and stir in the cream cheese. Spoon the mixture into the mushroom caps. Bake for 20 minutes. Yield: About 30 mushrooms.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast For One
Ingredients:
1 slice bread, tear into bite-size pieces
1 egg, beaten well
cinnamon to taste
2 tsp. sugar or 1 to 2 pkg. Sweet 'N Low
1/2 Granny Smith apple (tart), diced and unpeeled
small dab of diet margarine
Directions:
Fry apples with margarine in nonstick skillet until softened. Crumble bread into beaten egg.
Mix until bread is soaked like French toast.
Pour into skillet with apples.
Add cinnamon and sugar (or Sweet 'N Low).
Continue to fry until bread is toasty and apples are turning brown and are done.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Low-Carb Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms
1 lb. bulk breakfast sausage, hot or sage
1 pkg. - 8 oz. cream cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Clean mushrooms.
Remove stems and using a paring knife, make the hole for stuffing larger. Brown and drain sausage.
Stir in cream cheese until melted. Spoon mixture into mushroom caps.
Bake for 20 - 25 minutes.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Friendly Recipe
Ingredients:
1 tongue
2 ears
1 heart
1 mind
2 eyes
2 hands
Directions:
One Tongue that doesn't slander.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Kid'S Favorite Chicken
Ingredients:
8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 roll Ritz crackers, very finely crushed
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
black pepper to taste
1 stick margarine, melted
Directions:
Mix cracker crumbs, cheese, salt, garlic and pepper; set aside.
Cut chicken into small pieces (about 1 1/2 inches).
Dip chicken in margarine, then into crumb mixture.
Place on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until done.
Serve with Pineapple Dipping Sauce.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Recipe For Making Friends
Ingredients:
1/2 cup friendship
1 cup thoughtfulness
1 cup Faith
1 cup Hope
1 cup Charity
Directions:
Be sure to add a teaspoon of gaiety that sings and then the ability to laugh at little things.
Moisten with a few tears of heart felt sympathy.
Bake in a good natured pan.
Serve repeatedly.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken For A Crowd
Ingredients:
4 c. diced, cooked chicken or turkey
1 c. chopped celery
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. mayonnaise
a little curry
water chestnuts, if desired
8 slices bread, cubed
3 eggs
1 pt. half and half cream
1 can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Put 4 slices cubed bread on bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch Pyrex dish.
Add chicken mixture.
Top with 4 slices of cubed bread.
Mix eggs and half and half cream.
Pour over casserole. Let stand, covered in refrigerator, overnight.
Next day, spread soup over mixture.
Top with grated Cheddar cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve immediately.
Serves 10.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Kid'S Wagon Wheel Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 tsp. chili powder
1 (12 oz.) jar chili sauce
2 c. kidney beans
10 hot dogs
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
4 wedge shapes of Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Slice 1 hot dog, end to end, and crosswise.
Saute onion in butter; add seasonings.
Blend in chili sauce, kidney beans and 9 sliced hot dogs.
Cook over medium heat until heated thoroughly, about 5 minutes.
Stir in grated cheese; heat until cheese melts. Pour into casserole and decorate top with cheese wedge shapes to form wagon wheel.
Place cut hot dog strips on top of cheese shapes and bake at 375° for a few minutes or until cheese melts.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. smoked sausage
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. green pepper strips
1/3 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
2 1/4 c. milk
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 c. ziti
Directions:
In a large pan, brown sausage.
Slice into coin size pieces. Remove from pan and drain.
Melt margarine and cook mushrooms, green pepper and onions until tender (but do not brown).
Blend flour into vegetable mixture.
Gradually stir in milk.
Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until it begins to boil. Blend in cheese until melted.
Cook ziti; drain.
Stir hot ziti, cheese, vegetables and sausage together.
Pour into 2-quart buttered dish.
Bake at 350°, covered, for 30 minutes.
Makes about 6 servings.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Italian sausage, cut into slices
1/3 c. chopped onions
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
2 c. eggplant, pared and cut into strips
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
3 c. uncooked ziti
3 1/2 c. spaghetti sauce
1 c. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown sausage, onions, garlic, mushrooms and eggplant.
Saute until vegetables are tender; drain off fat.
Add salt and pepper. Set aside.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Ziti With Sausage And Cream Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ziti
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 lb. Italian sweet sausage, casing removed
1 c. heavy whipping cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat butter and oil in large frying pan.
Add onion and saute for 2 minutes.
Add sausage and cook, crumbling with fork, for 10 minutes, or until lightly browned.
Reduce heat to low and add cream, salt and pepper.
Continue to cook, stirring constantly, until sauce thickens; do not boil.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Michael'S Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 lb. ziti, cooked
1/2 lb. loose sausage
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
3 c. spaghetti sauce
Directions:
In a skillet, brown sausage and ground beef; set aside.
In a 9 x 13-inch baking dish, place 3 to 4 tablespoons of sauce evenly over bottom.
Layer noodles, meat, cheeses and sauce in 3 even layers, topping with noodles and sauce.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes until cheese is melted and heated through.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti With Sausage
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti
1 1/2 lb. sweet Italian sausage links
1 medium size onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 (30 oz.) jar chunky garden-style spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded part-skim Mozzarella cheese (2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) container part-skim Ricotta cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
About 1 1/4 hours before serving:
In saucepot, prepare ziti as label directs, but do not use salt in water.
Drain ziti and return to pan.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. flour
1 tsp. soy sauce (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. water
vegetables
Directions:
Beat first 6 ingredients together until smooth.
Dip vegetables in tempura batter and cook in hot oil until brown.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Crispy Shrimp Tempura Batter
Ingredients:
2 lb. raw shrimp
2 eggs, separated
3/4 c. beer
1 Tbsp. oil
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 c. cornstarch
1 tsp. ginger
flour (for dipping)
oil (for frying)
Directions:
Beat egg yolks with beer, oil, soy sauce and ginger for 2 minutes well.
Just before ready, beat egg whites until stiff. Fold egg whites into the rest of batter.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Mixed Vegetable Tempura
Ingredients:
1/2 c. cooked salad shrimp
1 c. mixed vegetables
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 eggs
1 c. sifted cake flour
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Pour vegetable oil at least 2-inches deep into wide skillet. Heat to 375°.
Beat the eggs with wire whisk; blend in 1/2 cup water.
Sprinkle the cake flour evenly over the liquid.
Stir in flour with whisk only until moist and large lumps disappear.
Mix the shrimp, mixed vegetables and onion into flour mixture.
Drop by spoonfuls into hot oil.
Fry until lightly golden.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cold water
2 Tbsp. whole wheat flour
1/2 Tbsp. beaten egg
salt
oil for frying
pre-cut vegetables
Directions:
You will need the following equipment:
skillet, spatula, mixing bowls, forks, measuring spoons, paper towels, pot holder and spatter screen.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Tempura Veggies
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. melted butter
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. milk
1 egg yolk
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. milk
1 egg white
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Beat egg yolk. Add butter, salt and 1/4 cup milk.
Add flour and stir until smooth, then add other 1/4 cup milk.
Beat egg white until peaks form.
Add sugar to whites and beat until stiff. Fold into flour mixture.
Dip cut veggies into flour and then into batter.
Deep fry until golden.
Especially good is zucchini, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, broccoli or whatever you like best.
Even apple slices are good this way.
Will do about 2 pounds fresh veggies.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Scallops
Ingredients:
1 lb. scallops
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped mushrooms
1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. butter
2 Tbsp. parsley (garnish)
Directions:
Pat dry scallops with paper towel.
Place in greased pie plate. Sprinkle with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Top with mushrooms; drizzle with 1/4 cup butter.
Mix remaining 1/4 cup butter with bread crumbs.
Sprinkle over mushrooms.
Broil in preheated broiler 6 inches from heat until scallops are opaque, 10 to 12 minutes. Garnish with parsley.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Company Pie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. walnuts
1/2 c. pecans
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. dried cranberries
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 c. butter softened
1 c. sugar
2 large eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 pie shell unbaked
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine nuts and fruit with vinegar; let stand.
Cream together butter and sugar; add eggs, vanilla and spices, beat well.	Stir in nut and fruit mixture into batter. Turn into an unbaked pie shell, bake at 400° for 35 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Chicken Pie
Ingredients:
5 lb. cooked chicken (boneless), pulled in pieces
1 c. pimento, diced
1 (#10) can Veg-All mixed vegetables
1 c. chicken fat or margarine
1 c. flour
1 qt. milk
1 qt. chicken stock
2 tsp. sage
1 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. marjoram
2 doz. drop biscuit dough
Directions:
Fold chicken, pimento and Veg-All together.
Mix fat and flour together.
Cook until smooth and golden.
Add milk and stock, whipping until smooth and thick.
Add seasoning and fold into chicken vegetable mixture.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Upside-Down Pie
Ingredients:
7 1/2 oz. pkg. frozen puff pastry
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, chopped
3 egg yolks
1 c. mushrooms
4 oz. bacon slices
1/2 c. crumbled Blue cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped sorrel and chervil
Directions:
Thaw pastry.
Mix ground beef, salt, pepper and onion; bind with egg yolks.
Wash and quarter mushrooms.
Cover the bottom of an 8-inch loose bottomed cake pan with the bacon.
Arrange the cheese, herbs and mushroom quarters on top.
Cover the meat mixture, pressing it down firmly and smoothly on the top.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Bachelor'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked beef hunks
2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. flour
1/3 chopped onion
3/4 c. cooked carrots, diced
1/2 c. celery, cut up
1/2 chopped green pepper
seasonings
Directions:
Combine onion, celery, beef and pepper in big skillet with a little cooking fat in it.
Brown slowly and stir constantly.
When browned, add the rest of the ingredients; stir until pretty hot again and pour into a greased baking dish.
Then on top, spread some mashed potatoes.
Bake at 390° until brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffle
Ingredients:
4 egg yolks
1/3 c. sugar
5 oz. bittersweet chocolate (Tobler, Lindt if possible)
2 Tbsp. heavy cream
1 tsp. instant coffee
2 Tbsp. cognac, rum, Grand Marnier or liqueur of choice
5 egg whites
Directions:
Ribbon egg yolks, sugar and salt heavily.
Melt chocolate and let cool.
Add heavy cream, instant coffee (dissolved in the liqueur) and blend into ribboning yolks.
Beat the whites and fold into the base.
Spoon into a buttered and lightly sugared 6-cup souffle dish.
Bake in a 400° oven for 12 to 14 minutes.
Can freeze.
Take right from freezer to oven only put on lower rack; add 5 minutes for light souffle.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffl
Ingredients:
1/3 c. sugar
1/3 c. baking cocoa
1/4 c. all purpose flour
1 c. skim milk
2 T. melted reduced fat butter
3 large beaten egg yolks
4 large beaten egg whites
1/4 t. cream of tartar
1/8 t. salt
3 T. sugar
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients in a sauce pan.
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly, and heat to boiling.
Remove from heat. Gradually add the beaten egg yolks to this mixture, and then stir in the melted butter.
Set aside.
Beat the next three ingredients with an electric mixer until foamy.
Gradually beat in sugar until meringue forms stiff and glossy peaks.
Gently combine the two mixtures and carefully pour into a well greased 6 cup souffl dish. Bake on lowest oven rack at 350 degrees for 1 hour.
Serve immediately with fat free cool whip.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Classic Chocolate Souffles
Ingredients:
sugar
1/2 c. whole milk
1 1/4 c. sugar
7 oz. unsweetened chocolate, chopped
6 large egg whites
4 large egg yolks
powdered sugar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter 8 (2/3 cup) souffle dishes. Sprinkle with sugar.
Tap off excess.
Bring milk and 1 cup of sugar to simmer in large saucepan, stirring until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to low.
Add chocolate and stir until smooth.
Pour into large bowl.
Cool 10 minutes.
Beat whites into soft peaks. Add remaining 1/4 cup sugar and beat until stiff.
Whisk 1/4 whites and yolks into chocolate mixture.
Fold in remaining whites.
Bake until souffle puffs about 16 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Souffle
Ingredients:
1/2 c. raspberries
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine plus 1 Tbsp.
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. milk
dash of salt
2 large eggs, separated
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 oz. sq. unsweetened chocolate
butter or margarine for dish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Coat bottom and sides of 2-cup souffle dish or two 10-ounce cups with butter (1 tablespoon of butter). Melt 2 tablespoons of butter and chocolate in saucepan.
Add flour and stir until smooth, stirring continuously. Gradually add milk until thick.
Add salt and remove from heat.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mint Souffle
Ingredients:
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. flour
3/4 c. milk
1 egg, slightly beaten
2 sq. (2 oz.) sweet baking chocolate
2 Tbsp. white creme de menthe
6 egg whites, stiffly beaten
butter
granulated sugar
Directions:
Combine 2 teaspoons sugar and flour in saucepan.
Gradually stir in milk, mixing well.
Stir in egg and egg yolk and cook over low heat until thickened, stirring constantly.
Cool.
Melt chocolate in creme de menthe.
Stir into egg mixture.
Fold in stiffly beaten egg whites.
Spoon into 4 (8 ounce) souffle cups which have been lightly buttered and sprinkled with granulated sugar.
Bake in a pan of hot water at 350° for 20 minutes or until souffle tests done (a silver knife inserted in center comes out clean when done).
Serve at once.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 slice cheese
2 slices bread
butter
Directions:
Take 2 slices bread and butter one side of each.
Put one piece of the bread buttered side down onto a hot griddle.
Put a slice of cheese on top of bread and put the other piece of bread, buttered side up, on top of cheese.
Let bottom get light or golden brown.
Turn and do the same to other side.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 pieces bread
butter, softened
2 to 3 slices your favorite sandwich cheese
Directions:
Prepare a medium size skillet with Pam cooking spray or butter. Heat skillet.
Lightly butter one side of each piece of bread.
Lay butter side down; place cheese on top, then place other slice of bread with butter facing up.
Cook on both sides until lightly browned.
Cut into strips or use your favorite cookie cutter for little fingers.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese
Ingredients:
4 slices bread
2 slices Kraft cheese
squeeze butter
Directions:
You will need a sandwich machine.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 large mushrooms, sliced
2 medium green onions, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. freshly ground pepper
4 oz. cold Brie, cut into 1/8-inch thick slices
8 slices firm textured white bread, crusts removed
4 sprigs fresh tarragon
Directions:
In a heavy medium skillet, melt the butter over high heat. When the butter begins to brown, add the mushrooms and toss to coat.
Saute, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms have browned around the edges, 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the green onions and cook for 1 minute longer. Transfer the mushrooms to a plate and season with salt and pepper.
Divide the cheese among 4 slices of bread.
Top each with the mushrooms, leaving about 1/4-inch from the edge of the bread. Add a tarragon sprig and cover with the remaining 4 slices of bread.
Preheat a cast-iron ridged griddle or skillet for 10 minutes over moderate heat. Grill the sandwiches for 4 minutes per side or until the bread is lightly browned and the cheese has melted.
Serve halved as a first course or quartered as an hors d'oeuvre.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
Ingredients:
1/4 stick butter
2 slices bread
1 slice cheese
Directions:
Heat butter in skillet.
Put cheese in between bread.
Put in pan.
Cook until nice and brown.
Then eat it.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
oil
1 large or 2 medium onions, chopped fine
salt and pepper
2 or 3 cloves garlic
2 fresh medium tomatoes, chopped fine
8 to 10 chicken thighs
1 1/2 c. long grained rice
Directions:
In a large pot put enough oil to cover the bottom.
Put in chicken pieces and lightly brown.
Add garlic, onions, tomatoes, salt and pepper.
Cook with cover on for 1/2 hour.
Remove cover and cook until sauce is reduced and thick.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken thighs
1 c. rice
2 tsp. poultry seasoning
2 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. pepper
1 small can peas (optional)
Directions:
Put chicken thighs in large saucepan; cover with water.
Add all seasonings.
Bring to boil; continue boiling until meat begins to fall off bone.
Remove thighs from water; take meat off bone and discard skin and bone.
Continue boiling water until about 2 cups remain in saucepan.
Add rice and boned chicken.
Cover; simmer for about 20 minutes, until all water is absorbed.
Drain and add peas.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs And Rice
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon
1 to 1 1/2 lb. chicken thighs (boneless)
1/2 c. long grain rice
1 small onion, cut into thin wedges
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and cut up
1/2 c. quartered fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet cook bacon until crisp.
Drain, reserving drippings.
Crumble bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken in reserve drippings, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper.
Remove chicken from skillet.
Cook rice, onion wedges and garlic in skillet drippings until rice is golden brown.
Stir frequently.
Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, wine, bouillon granules, salt, basil and 1 cup water.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Adobo
Ingredients:
6 chicken thighs
1/2 c. vinegar
1 c. water
5 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 head garlic, crushed
12 pieces peppercorn, crushed
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Marinate chicken in vinegar, soy sauce, peppercorn and 1/2 garlic.
Add water and simmer, uncovered, until tender.
Strain sauce; separate the sauce from meat.
Allow to cool.
To reduce sauce, cook in open saucepan; simmer until sauce thickens with bay leaf.
Heat cooking oil; brown meat and half garlic.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Dinner(Serves 5)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
10 chicken thighs (about 3 lb.)
3 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces (undrained)
2 c. boiling water
minced fresh parsley (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped onions
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 chicken bouillon cubes
4 chicken breasts, split and boned
1 (5 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1 pkg. corn bread stuffing (about 3 c.)
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix soup, mayonnaise, chestnuts and celery.
Lightly grease 3-quart casserole.
Lay breasts in pan.
Pour over mixed ingredients.
Mix stuffing with melted butter and sprinkle on top of chicken.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Delicious!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 boneless breasts
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1 small bottle olive oil
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1 pkg. fettucine noodles
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. favorite wine
4 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. water
salt to taste
Directions:
Dip chicken in egg, milk and bread crumbs.
Brown lightly in olive oil.
Remove chicken and set aside. Make gravy with flour and butter.
When bubbly, add wine and water.
May need to add more water to get to right consistency.
Squeeze in lemon juice. Add chicken to gravy. Slice lemons on top.
Add salt and garlic. Cover and simmer 20 to 30 minutes.
Serve over pasta.
Soooo Good!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
3 large chicken breasts, split, skinned and boned
1 egg, beaten
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 clove garlic, mashed
1 c. Marsala cooking wine
1 can chicken broth
1 lemon
Directions:
Flatten chicken pieces between sheets of wax paper with rolling pin or mallet.
Pieces should be 1/4-inch thick.
Combine egg and milk in dish.
Combine flour, salt and pepper on wax paper.
Dip chicken into egg mixture, then into flour mixture to coat all sides.
Refrigerate 2 hours.
Heat oil and butter in large skillet. Brown chicken on both sides.
Remove to platter.
Saute onion, mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Remove to platter.
Add wine and chicken broth to pan; boil 10 minutes to reduce liquid.
Return chicken and vegetables to pan; heat thoroughly.
Arrange on platter.
Garnish with lemon slices.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. shredded mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. shredded provolone cheese
1/4 c. shredded Asiago cheese
3 Tbsp. oil-packed sun dried tomatoes, drained and chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 pkg. (10 oz.) mushrooms, sliced
3/4 c. low-sodium chicken broth
1 tsp. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Flatten chicken between 2 sheets of wax paper to 3/4 inch thickness. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Place on jellyroll pan. Bake 15 minutes. turn chicken; bake until almost done, 10 minutes. Meanwhile, combine cheeses, tomatoes, parsley and oregano. Remove chicken from oven. Sprinkle each piece with one-fourth of mixture. Return to oven until cheese is melted and chicken is no longer pink in center; about 5 minutes. Transfer to platter. In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add mushrooms; cook, stirring occasionally, until softened. Whisk together broth and flour; pour into skillet. Bring to boil; cook, stirring occasionally until thickened, 4-5 minutes. Remove from heat, stir in butter until almost melted. Pour sauce over chicken; sprinkle with additional parsley.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
2 whole chicken breasts, skinned, boned and halved lengthwise
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
3/4 c. beef broth
1/4 c. Marsala or other dry red wine
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place each breast half between two pieces of heavy-duty plastic wrap or waxed paper and set on a sturdy surface.
With flat side of meat mallet, pound to 1/4-inch thickness.
Remove plastic or waxed paper; dredge each piece slightly in flour.
In skillet, melt butter and oil.
Saute mushrooms over medium heat until tender.
With slotted spoon, remove from skillet.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts (8 pieces), boned and skinned
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. oregano
6 Tbsp. margarine
1 1/4 c. Marsala or dry sherry, divided
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Pound breasts slightly and dredge in flour mixed with seasonings.
Melt margarine in skillet; brown chicken on both sides.
Add 1 cup wine, cover and simmer 1/2 hour or until tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. celery seed
1 lb. fish fillet
Directions:
Place butter in baking dish.
Microwave on High to melt butter (45 seconds).
Blend in seasonings.
Coat fish fillets in mixture. Place around in dish.
Cover with wax paper and microwave on High until fish flakes (with fork).
Approximate time is 5 to 6 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Sauce For Fish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter. Blend in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and smooth. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over fish.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish Roll-Ups
Ingredients:
8 fish fillets (about 2 lb.)
1 1/2 c. cooked rice
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped broccoli, thawed
1/3 c. butter
1/3 c. lemon
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In small saucepan, melt 1/3 cup butter.
Add 1/3 cup lemon, 2 teaspoons salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
In medium bowl, combine 1 1/3 cups rice, 1 cup cheese, 1 package broccoli and 1/4 cup lemon mixture.
Divide among 8 fillets; roll-up and place seam-side down in 11 x 7-inch baking dish.
Top with remaining sauce.
Bake at 375° for 25 minutes or until fish flakes with fork.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter or margarine
2 1/4 c. sugar
3 lemons
Directions:
Allspice:
pot roasts, squash, fish, eggs, sweet potatoes.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sour cream
1 Tbsp. honey
1 1/2 c. peeled, cored and diced apples
1 c. diced celery
1/2 c. coarsely chopped walnuts
1 c. halved, seeded grapes
Directions:
Combine mayonnaise, sour cream and honey.
Add apples; mix well to prevent apples from discoloring.
Add celery, walnuts and grapes; mix lightly.
Chill well before serving.
Yield: 3 or 4 servings.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
6 c. celery, chopped
9 c. apples, diced
3 c. walnuts, coarsely chopped
6 c. seedless grapes, halved
1 qt. mayonnaise
Directions:
Mix all ingredients and mix until well blended.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. diced celery
1 c. diced apples
1 c. grapes (white, purple or mixed), halved and seeded
1/2 c. walnuts or pecans
3/4 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Prepare the first 3 ingredients. Combine the the remaining ingredients.
Yields 6 servings.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
5 red apples, cut up
3 bananas, cut up
3 c. red seedless grapes
2 c. celery, cut up
1 c. raisins
1 small jar maraschino cherries, cut up
1 c. mayonnaise
1/3 c. honey
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 to 1 c. walnuts or pecans
1 small bag marshmallows (if desired)
Directions:
Mix together apples, bananas, grapes (use Fruit-Fresh liberally), celery, raisins and cherries.
Mix mayonnaise, honey and sour cream; pour over fruit mixture and mix well.
Last, add nuts and marshmallows.
Keep refrigerated.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad(Serves 8)
Ingredients:
4 apples, peeled and cubed
3 large stalks celery - sliced
1/2 cup red or green seedless grapes (halved)
1/2 cup walnuts, chopped
1 pear (optional) peeled and cubed
1/2 cup
1 tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 cup raisins
Directions:
Whisk together mayonnaise, sugar and lemon juice.
Combine apples and pear (stored in fruit fresh or lemon juice and then drained.
Add apples, pear, celery, raisins and walnuts.
Chill.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Horseradish Pate(A Great Way To Use Leftover Cooked Salmon)
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked salmon, flaked
1/3 c. shallots, minced
1 Tbsp. horseradish
2 Tbsp. diet mayonnaise (enough to hold it together)
freshly ground pepper
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 to 3 cucumbers, thinly sliced
Directions:
In a bowl, combine salmon, shallots, dill, horseradish, mayonnaise and pepper.
Let ripen at least 4 hours in the refrigerator.
(Keep only 1 to 2 days in the refrigerator.) Spread on thinly sliced cucumber rounds.
Can also be used as a dip for raw vegetables.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Croquettes
Ingredients:
1 can (14 1/2 oz.) salmon
1 1/2 c. leftover mashed potatoes
1 egg
1 onion, chopped
1/4 c. cracker crumbs
Directions:
Mix first four foods.
Form cone shaped; dip into cracker crumbs.
Cook 5 minutes on each side.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Spread
Ingredients:
2 cans (15 oz.) salmon, drained, boned and flaked
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1 Tbsp. prepared horseradish
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
2 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sour cream
fresh dill or parsley (optional)
toasted bread rounds or crackers
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine first 8 ingredients; mix well. Spread on a serving platter and shape into a loaf or ball.
Top with sour cream.
Garnish with dill or parsley if desired.
Serve with bread rounds or crackers.
