Yields 8 to 10 appetizer servings.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Loaf
Ingredients:
1 can pink salmon, drained and flaked
1/4 c. diced onion
1 1/2 c. leftover mashed potatoes
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Drain and flake salmon.
Combine salmon, egg, mashed potatoes, onion, salt and pepper.
Place in buttered loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8 people.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: What Shall We Do With The Leftover Turkey
Ingredients:
6 slices white bread
2 c. cubed turkey
1 c. cubed ham
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 can sliced water chestnuts
1/4 c. sliced pimentos
1 c. mayo
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 slightly beaten eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. sharp cheese, shredded
Directions:
Butter 2 slices of bread.
Cut into small cubes and set aside. Cut remaining bread in cubes.
Place half of unbuttered cubes in bottom of an 8
x
8 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine turkey, ham, vegetables, seasonings and mayonnaise. Spoon over bread.
Place remaining unbuttered cubes over mixture. Combine eggs and milk; pour over all.
Chill for 1 hour or overnight. Spoon soup over top and sprinkle with the buttered cubes. Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until set. Sprinkle shredded cheese over top during the last few minutes of baking.
Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 6 healthy servings.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: "Goodbye" Turkey
Ingredients:
5 Tbsp. sifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/4 c. butter, melted
2 1/2 c. milk or light cream
1 1/3 c. Minute rice
1 1/2 c. turkey or chicken broth
1/2 c. grated American cheese
1 1/2 c. cooked asparagus or sweet peas
2 c. turkey
2 Tbsp. toasted slivered almonds
Directions:
Sift flour, half of salt and onion salt into butter.
Stir in milk.
Cook over hot water, stirring occasionally until thickened. Pour Minute rice into 2-quart shallow baking dish.
Combine broth, remaining salt and pour over rice.
Sprinkle half of cheese over rice.
Top with asparagus or peas, then turkey.
Pour on sauce.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Bake at 375° about 20 minutes.
Top with almonds.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey Pie
Ingredients:
4 potatoes, diced
2 carrots, sliced
1 stalk celery, diced
1 onion, chopped
1/2 c. Bisquick
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 stick butter or margarine
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. cold mashed potatoes
leftover turkey and gravy
leftover peas or other vegetables
Directions:
Grease 2-quart baking dish with butter generously.
Cook first four ingredients together.
Mix Bisquick, flour, parsley and margarine together.
Beat eggs; season with salt and pepper and mix with leftover mashed potatoes.
Add to Bisquick mixture and work together.
Mixture will be sticky.
Spoon mixture into dish and using the back of spoon, pat it into bottom and sides of dish. Save some mixture for top.
Put cold turkey, gravy and peas in dish; add potatoes, carrots, celery and onion.
Put more turkey and gravy in center.
Spoon Bisquick mixture around sides, sealing well.
Let circle in center open.
Bake at 375° to 400° for 1 hour.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey Loaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
4 eggs, beaten
2/3 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 c. soft bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. pimento, diced
3 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped
1 tsp. parsley flakes
3 c. turkey, cut in small cubes
Directions:
Place butter in small dish and cook 1/2 minute or until melted.
Combine eggs, milk, salt, bread crumbs, pimento, green peppers, parsley and turkey.
Add butter and mix well.
Spoon mixture into greased 2-quart ovenware dish.
Cover.
Cook for 15 to 20 minutes.
Let stand 5 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
4 lb. chicken fryer
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. melted butter
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 tsp. sweet basil, crushed
1 tsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Sprinkle chicken cavities with the garlic salt and crushed rosemary. Truss chicken and place in an open roasting pan. Combine butter, wine, rosemary, basil, parsley, salt and pepper in a small saucepan. Cook over low heat a few minutes until thoroughly blended.
Baste chicken with wine sauce. Roast 20 minutes per pound until tender. Baste frequently. The last 20 minutes, turn to brown underside.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Country Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken
1 pkg. savory herb with garlic soup mix
2 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375° in 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Arrange chicken.
In small bowl, combine remaining ingredients; brush on chicken.
Bake 45 minutes or until chicken is done.
Makes about 4 servings.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken(Serves Four)
Ingredients:
1 large roasting chicken (about 6 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
3/4 tsp. thyme leaves
3/4 tsp. basil leaves
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Wash chicken; pat dry.
Cream together 3 tablespoons butter, garlic, Parmesan, sage, thyme and basil.
This mixture goes under the skin, so turn chicken breast side up and make skin as loose as possible.
Spread herb mixture underneath the skin.
Smear butter on outside of skin.
Put chicken breast up in roasting pan and place in oven.
Melt remaining butter.
Cook chicken 15 minutes, basting once.
Reduce to 350°.
Roast 20 minutes per pound, basting with butter every 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roast Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts
1 tsp. dried rosemary
1 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
1/4 c. chicken stock
1/2 c. low-fat sour cream
1 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
juice of 3 limes
cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix together the rosemary, sage, thyme, cumin and salt in a bowl. Sprinkle over the chicken breasts and rub in, coating both sides. Broil or grill chicken until done.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic And Rosemary Roast Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (3 1/2 to 4 lb.) chicken
salt and pepper
2 medium garlic cloves, flattened
3 fresh sprigs or 1 Tbsp. dried rosemary
1/4 lemon
paprika
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
9 small shallots
2 medium garlic cloves
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. minced fresh rosemary or 1/2 tsp. dried
1 large red bell pepper, sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Pat chicken dry.
Sprinkle inside and out with salt and pepper.
Rub inside and out with flattened garlic and rosemary and place inside with lemon quarter.
Truss and sprinkle with paprika.
Melt butter with oil in heavy ovenproof skillet over high heat.
Add chicken, breast up.
Add shallots and 2 whole garlic cloves.
Cook until bottom of chicken is brown; stir vegetables frequently, about 4 minutes.
Add lemon juice and baste chicken with pan juices.
Sprinkle vegetables with rosemary.
Put skillet in oven and roast 45 minutes, basting chicken and stirring vegetables occasionally.
Mix bell peppers into skillet and cook 35 minutes until done.
Take shallots and peppers out as they get done.
Serve chicken warm or at room temperature.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup(6 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small clove garlic, minced
1 lb. fresh mushrooms, cut in 1/4-inch dices
1/4 c. flour
3 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1/4 c. dry sherry
1 bay leaf
1/4 c. (2 oz.) cream cheese, cut in bits
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Add onion and saute 3 to 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook 30 seconds.
Stir in mushrooms and saute until they release juices.
Sprinkle on flour and blend. Cook 1 minute.
Add stock, milk and sherry.
Bring to boil and stir constantly.
Add bay leaf and simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in cream cheese, lemon juice and Tabasco.
Stir until smooth and cream cheese is melted.
Season with salt.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion
1 clove garlic, finely chop
1 lb. mushrooms
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. chicken stock
2 1/2 c. milk or more (as desired)
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1/4 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter in skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until onion is tender.
Add mushrooms.
Cook until liquid is evaporated. Melt butter in large saucepan.
Whisk in flour.
Cook, stirring constantly, 2 to 3 minutes without browning.
Whisk in milk.
Add seasoning.
Bring to boil.
Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, chopped
1 tsp. oil
4 cans mushrooms
1/4 c. flour
3 1/2 c. water
3 chicken bouillon cubes
1 tsp. chopped basil
1 bay leaf
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
1 1/4 c. skim milk
Directions:
Add oil to a medium saucepan and saute onions and garlic until onions are translucent.
Add mushrooms and 1/4 cup flour.
Add water, bouillon cubes, bay leaf, pepper and salt.
Let it come to a boil and simmer for about 20 minutes.
Add skim milk, then mix 2 tablespoons cornstarch with 2 tablespoons water and add to soup. Cook until thickened.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Soup
Ingredients:
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 (16 oz.) can corn
parsley
Directions:
In saucepan, heat soup, milk, mayonnaise and corn (with liquid), stirring occasionally.
Garnish with parsley.
Makes 5 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Baked Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 can mushroom soup
6 or 8 potatoes
1 1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cooking oil
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
You will need a 2-quart square Pyrex baking dish.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Pate
Ingredients:
3 lb. fresh spinach
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. wine or cider vinegar
3 eggs
1/2 c. skim milk
1/8 tsp. nutmeg, grated
4 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. Gruyere cheese
3/4 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
sea salt to taste
pepper
Directions:
Wash and stem spinach.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter a loaf pan.
Puree spinach or chop fine.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Feta cheese
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
2 eggs
1/4 c. Romano cheese
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small chopped onion
1 pkg. filo dough (1/2 for 9 x 13-inch pan)
1 1/2 sticks melted oleo
Directions:
Mix really good the first 6 ingredients.
Brush oleo in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer 1 sheet of filo; brush with oleo.
Do that about 7 or 8 layers.
Put filling on that and add about 7 more sheets of filo, brushing after each with oleo.
Put in refrigerator to chill, then cut through top layer just before you bake at 350° for 50 minutes.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Supreme
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed
2 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. chopped onion
1 3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 well beaten eggs
1/2 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
Directions:
Saute spinach in butter.
Add onion, cottage cheese, salt, pepper and eggs.
Mix.
Add cheese.
Place in greased 8 x 8-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes until firm.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach And Fettucini
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter
3 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1 lb. fettucini
1 c. heavy cream
1 clove garlic, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, drained and chopped
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
pepper to taste
Directions:
In skillet, melt 1/2 the butter, add garlic and onion, cook until golden.
Add spinach, cover pan, cook until spinach is heated through.
Meanwhile, cook noodles.
Drain and return to pot.
Toss with remaining butter, spinach mixture, Parmesan and cream until all are blended and heated through.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Of A Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. cinnamon
3 eggs
3/4 c. oil
3/4 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. honey
2 tsp. vanilla extract
2 c. grated carrots
3 1/2 oz. coconut
1 c. chopped walnuts
1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple
Directions:
Grease and flour 2 (9-inch) baking pans; set aside.
Sift flour, soda, cinnamon and salt together; set aside.
In a large bowl, beat eggs, add oil, buttermilk, sugar, honey and vanilla. Mix well.
Add flour mixture, pineapple, carrots, coconut, add walnuts.
Stir well.
Pour into pans.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until cake tests done.
Cool on rack for 10 minutes, then remove from pans.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Roasted Apples
Ingredients:
4 medium apples
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. orange juice
1 tsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. grated orange peel
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/3 c. hot water
Directions:
Pare top 1/3 of the apples and remove core, leaving 1/2-inch of core on bottom.
Place apples in oiled baking dish. Combine honey, orange juice, lemon juice, orange peel and ginger.
Mix well.
Spoon over apples, allowing mixture to fill centers and coat entire surface.
Pour water into baking dish. Bake, covered, at 400° for 15 minutes.
Remove cover and bake 30 minutes longer or until apples are glazed and tender.
Baste with liquid from baking dish every 15 minutes.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 lb. miniature peeled fresh carrots
1/4 c. honey
4 Tbsp. butter
dash of salt
Directions:
Steam carrots to desired doneness.
Add remaining ingredients; serve.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Roasted Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) bag mini pretzels (9 c.)
1/4 c. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. butter/margarine
1 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. light corn syrup
1/8 tsp. baking soda
Directions:
Place the pretzels in a large bowl, set aside.	In a microwave safe bowl mix the rest of the ingredients except the baking soda. Microwave for 2 minutes, stirring after 1 minute. Remove from microwave and add the baking soda.
Pour over pretzels, stir to coat well.
Spread pretzels out on sprayed wax paper to cool.
Store in an airtight container.
Easy and delicious snack!

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Carrots
Ingredients:
1 lb. pkg. carrots, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. honey
1/4 c. margarine, melted
1/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
Directions:
Cook carrots in small amount of boiling water for 5 to 10 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain.
Reserve 1/4 cup of the carrot liquid.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Primavera
Ingredients:
5 garlic cloves, minced
4 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. asparagus, cut in bite-sized pieces
2 zucchini, thinly sliced
2 carrots, thinly sliced
1/2 c. peas
1 c. broccoli florets
1 c. cauliflower florets
1 onion, sliced in crescents
6 leaves fresh basil, chopped
1 c. chicken broth
8 to 10 mushrooms, sliced
1 lb. rigatoni
grated cheese
Directions:
In a large skillet, saut garlic in oil.
Add vegetables and basil and saut until almost tender.
Add chicken broth and mushrooms.
Bring to a boil, quickly reduce heat and cover. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Mix well.
Serve over pasta cooked al dente. Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Serves 6.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Primavera
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. butter
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1/4 tsp. grated lemon peel
1 zucchini, sliced in strips
1 red or green pepper, sliced
1 lb. shrimp
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms
1 lb. spaghetti, cooked
Directions:
Melt
butter
in
oil.	Add
lemon
peel and garlic and simmer 1	minute.
Add zucchini and green/red peppers.
Saute for 2
to 3
minutes.
Add shrimp and mushrooms.
Remove from heat.
Place in	fridge and allow to marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Return to	stove.	Saute
mixture	until shrimp are pink (about
3 to 5 minutes).
In the last few minutes stir in salt,
pepper,
basil, parsley
and
lemon juice.	Spoon over cooked spaghetti and toss well.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 large onions, chopped
2 carrots, scraped and thinly sliced
2 c. fresh broccoli flowerets
1 medium bell pepper, cut into thin strips
1 sweet red pepper, cut into thin strips
6 fresh mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. crushed basil
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
8 oz. linguine, cooked and drained
Directions:
In a
large skillet, add olive oil and saute garlic and onions until
soft, about 2 1/2 minutes.
Add carrots, broccoli, peppers, mushrooms, basil and crushed red pepper.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring until broccoli and carrots are crisp-tender. Add
cream, Parmesan,
parsley,
salt
and pepper; cook until boiling.
Pour over cooked linguine.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Primavera
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. + 1 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1 c. sliced mushrooms
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 c. low sodium chicken broth
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
15 oz. shelled large shrimp or bite sized chicken
2 c. hot bow tie pasta
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes (optional)
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet; add broccoli and carrots.
Cook over medium heat; stir frequently until carrots are tender-crisp, about 2 minutes.
Stir in mushrooms and garlic; cook 1 minute longer. Whisk in broth and cornstarch; add chicken pieces or shrimp.
Cook chicken about 6 minutes and shrimp 3 minutes.
Stir in remaining ingredients, toss and combine.
Contains 306 calories, 8 g fat.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Creamy Primavera
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
2 c. broccoli flowerets
1 c. carrots (slices)
1 garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves, crushed
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1 c. sour ream
1 c. cherry tomato halves
6 oz. fettuccine, cooked and drained
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Melt 3 tablespoons butter in a large skillet.
Add broccoli, carrots and garlic; cook 10 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove vegetable mixture from skillet.
Melt remaining butter in skillet over medium heat.
Blend in flour, oregano and salt.
Gradually add milk; cook, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Add vegetable mixture and remaining ingredients; heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Couscous Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. water
1 c. couscous
about 3 Tbsp. olive oil
about 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3 scallions (including green parts), finely chopped
1/2 c. tightly packed Italian parsley, finely chopped
2 medium ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. finely chopped mint
kosher salt
black pepper
Directions:
Bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Pour in the couscous.
Cover the pan and remove from the heat.
Let stand for 5 minutes.
Uncover the pan and stir the couscous right away with a fork.
(If the grains do not separate, fluff them gently with your fingers.)
Transfer the couscous to a bowl and stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season the salad to taste with more lemon juice, salt and pepper.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Creamed Spinach
Ingredients:
spinach
3/4 c. milk
3 Tbsp. soft butter
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. paprika
1 thin sliced onion
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 peeled clove garlic
Directions:
Rinse spinach real good. Remove coarse stems.
(I used 1/2 bag of spinach in "salad section.")

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: California Curried Couscous(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. curry powder
1 c. couscous
2 large garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. chopped chutney
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. toasted pine nuts
1/4 c. dried currants
1/2 c. thinly sliced green onions
Directions:
Bring chicken broth with curry to boil in medium saucepan. Stir in couscous; cover and reduce to low heat.
Cook 5 minutes. Remove from heat and fluff with a fork.
Cover until needed. While couscous cooks, saute garlic, celery and onion in olive oil over medium heat until soft, but not browned, about 5 minutes. Combine chutney and lemon juice in small bowl.
Toss couscous with onion/celery mixture.
Stir pine nuts, currants and green onions into chutney mixture in small frying pan over low heat.
Pour over couscous and stir to combine.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Kraut Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. kraut
1/2 c. diced onion
1/2 c. mango peppers, diced
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix all ingredients and chill before serving.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
3 fresh mangoes, peeled and chopped
16 oz. can unsweetened pears, chopped
20 oz. can chunk pineapple
16 oz. can unsweetened peaches
1 c. seedless golden raisins
1 c. coarsely chopped nuts, walnuts or pecans
1/2 pt. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
Directions:
Drain all fruits well and add to mangoes.
Beat cream to pudding consistency, fold in mayo.
Put all ingredients together, cover, refrigerate until ready to serve. Serve with mint leaves for garnish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: *Mango Chutney*
Ingredients:
6 lb. mangos (about 26 large mangos, or about 12 cups), chopped or put through grinder course
5 lb. brown sugar
3 pt. vinegar
2 c. water
1 c. ginger, finely chopped
1 c. onion, finely chopped
1 doz. small Hawaiian chili peppers, without seeds
6 doz. whole Hawaiian chili peppers
3 Tbsp. salt
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1 lb. seedless raisins, chopped
1 lb. seeded raisins, whole
Directions:
Combine vinegar, water, salt and sugar in a large pot and bring to a boil.
Add onions, raisins, garlic and ginger and bring to a boil again.
Add mangos and chili peppers and bring to a boil.
Cook for 20-30 minutes until mangos look clear or glassy. Gently stir mixture occasionally to avoid sticking to the bottom of the pot.
Remove from heat, place mixture in hot sterilized jars and seal immediately.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Mango Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. baking soda
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped nuts
2 c. chopped mangoes
1/2 c. salad oil
1/2 c. melted butter
1 tsp. vanilla
3 eggs
1/2 c. raisins (optional)
Directions:
Sift all dry ingredients into large bowl.
Make a well in center and add all remaining ingredients.
Mix and pour into a loaf pan.
Bake at 325°.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: 5 Cup Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. miniature marshmallows
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. sour cream
1 c. mandarin oranges, drained
1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
Directions:
Blend all ingredients; chill and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Seafood Paella
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) can crab meat
1 can smoked oysters
1 Tbsp. corn oil
1/2 c. chopped green onion with tops
4 c. cooked yellow saffron rice
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can diced tomato
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 lb. fresh or frozen peeled shrimp
2 c. frozen green peas, defrosted
1/2 oz. jar chopped pimiento with juice
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 large bay leaves
Directions:
Saute onions in oil.
Combine all ingredients in stove top pan.
Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes until seafood is cooked.
Remove bay leaves before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
2 c. rice (yellow)
2 c. chicken chunks
1/2 c. sliced black olives
1 c. scallops
1 c. shrimp
2 to 3 muscles
6 clams
lobster tails (if desired)
other seafood of desire (optional)
Directions:
Steam or boil all seafood.
Cook rice.
Mix all ingredients together and bake 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Seafood Rice(Paella A La Valenciana)
Ingredients:
6 c. chicken broth
1/2 tsp. saffron
1 onion, chopped
2 small chickens
salt
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 lb. Spanish chorizo sausage (1/4-inch slices)
1 large pork chops, diced
1/4 lb. cured ham, diced
4 scallions, chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
2 red pimientos (homemade or imported), diced
1 lb. small or medium shrimp, shelled
4 lobsters tails, split or 8 king crab claws
3 c. short grain rice
5 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 bay leaf
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 lb. fresh or frozen peas
18 clams (available at room temperature)
18 small mussels
lemon wedges (for garnish)
chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat the broth with the saffron and simmer 15 minutes.
Cut the chicken into small serving pieces, the whole breast in 4 parts. Sprinkle with salt.
In a metal paella pan, with about a 15-inch base, heat the oil.
Add the chicken pieces and fry over high heat until golden.
Remove to a warm platter.
Add the chorizo, pork and ham to the pan and stir-fry about 10 minutes.
Add the chopped onion, scallions, garlic and pimientos and saute until the onion is wilted.
Add the shrimp and the lobster and saute about 3 minutes more or until the shrimp and lobster barely turn pink (the lobster will cook more in the oven).
Remove the shrimp and lobster to the platter with the chicken.
Add the rice to the pan and stir to coat it well with the oil.
Sprinkle in the 5 tablespoons chopped parsley and the bay leaf.
Stir in the chicken broth, boiling the wine, lemon juice and peas.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dry white wine
3 Tbsp. saffron threads
light vegetable oil cooking spray
1 c. chopped onion (1 medium onion)
1 c. arborio rice
1 banana pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
1 red bell pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
1 yellow bell pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
3 c. hot chicken stock, fat skimmed off
6 oz. boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed
1/2 c. squid rings
1/2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
12 mussels, scrubbed
12 littleneck clams, scrubbed
4 (3 oz.) freshwater lobster tails or 2 (6 oz.) lobster tails, cut in half
1/2 c. canned sliced artichoke hearts
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 c. chopped tomato (1 medium tomato)
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 350°.
Put the white wine and saffron threads in a small bowl and set aside.
Preheat a large, heavy paella pan or frying pan for about 1 minute over medium-high heat. Spray it 4 times with the vegetable oil.
Saute the onion for 2 to 3 minutes until limp.
Add the rice and saute for about 1 minute until golden.
Add the wine and saffron and stir until the liquid is completely absorbed.
Stir in the peppers.
Add the hot chicken stock 1/4 cup at a time, stirring until absorbed.
Keep the stock over low heat.
When only 1/2 cup of the chicken stock remains to be added, stir in the chicken.
With the last addition of stock, stir in the squid and shrimp.
Turn the burner off.
The rice should be tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
1 c. rice
1 (3 lb.) chicken
1 qt. water
4 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 onion, sliced
2 sprigs parsley
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
1/4 tsp. saffron
1 lb. shrimp
1 c. peas
12 clams or mussels
1 lb. sausages
2 cloves garlic
Directions:
Cook chicken in water until tender with 2 teaspoons salt, the pepper, onion, parsley and celery.
Remove from broth; take chicken off bones in large pieces.
Strain broth and save.
Cook rice and garlic in olive oil until straw-colored.
Add 1 1/2 cups broth, saffron, peas, shrimp and 2 1/2 teaspoons salt together.
Bring to a boil.
Pour into 2-quart casserole dish; add sausages.
Bake for 1 hour in moderate oven.
Add clams or mussels and bake until clams open.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Fresh Fried Potato Chips
Ingredients:
7 or 8 medium potatoes, scraped and sliced thin
1 c. Pet milk
1/2 c. flour
deep fat (for frying)
pepper and salt to taste
Directions:
Put potatoes in a large bowl and add salt and pepper.
Moisten well with Pet milk.
Sift about 1/2 cup flour over potatoes and coat potatoes well.
Fry in deep fat until brown.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Potato Chips
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 inch deep vegetable oil
salt
Directions:
Slice potatoes as thinly as possible.
Soak in cold water for 1 hour; drain and pat dry.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Oven Chipped Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 unpared potatoes, thinly sliced
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. grated onion
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. dried leaf thyme
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Layer potato slices in a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Melt butter in a small saucepan.
Stir in grated onion, salt and pepper.
Brush potato slices with butter mixture.
Bake in a 425° oven for 45 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Sprinkle with parsley, thyme and shredded cheese.
Bake 15 minutes longer or until cheese is melted.
Yield: 4 to 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Chips
Ingredients:
3 to 4 medium yams
1 to 1 1/2 c. vegetable oil
salt
Directions:
Peel and wash yams.
Slice as thin as possible, the thinner, the better.
Heat oil in a deep frying pan; let oil get very hot. Place chips in oil until golden brown.
Place cooked chips on a paper towel.
Salt to taste and serve.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Fried Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 c. cold diced potatoes
3 eggs
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Melt butter. Fry potatoes until nearly done. Break the eggs over them and stir quickly.
Add salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. peanut oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 tsp. minced garlic
7 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. thinly sliced carrots
1 tsp. minced ginger root
1 lb. lean pork, cut in strips
1 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots, drained
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
6 oz. frozen pea pods
1/4 tsp. sesame oil
2 eggs, well beaten
Directions:
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, ginger and pork; cook and stir until tender. Stir in broth, soy sauce, pepper and sesame oil; bring to a boil. Add carrots; simmer 15 minutes.
Add all remaining ingredients except eggs; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Stir in eggs with a fork to separate into strands.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
3 c. defatted chicken
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. water
1 egg white
1 Tbsp. angostura low-sodium soy sauce
4 tsp. finely chopped chives or scallion tops
Directions:
Bring the chicken stock to boil.
With a wire whisk, mix together egg whites, flour and water until smooth.
Pour a thin stream into boiling chicken stock.
Do not stir until egg mixture is cooked.
Add the soy sauce and mix well.
Ladle into consomme cups and top each serving with 1 teaspoon chopped chives or scallion tops.
Makes 3 cups.
Each 3/4 cup serving contains approximately 42 calories, 0 mg cholesterol and 167 mg sodium.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup(For When You Feel Under The Weather.)
Ingredients:
3 c. chicken stock
1 Tbsp. beef bouillon
1 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 Tbsp. cold water
2 eggs, slightly beaten
2 scallions, chopped
Directions:
Bring chicken stock and bouillon to a boil.
Add cornstarch with cold water.
Thicken until clear.
Add scallions and stir. Add eggs, stirring gently with fork.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
6 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. cornstarch and cold water
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 eggs, beaten slightly
2 green onions, chopped (including tops)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Heat broth to boiling.
Blend cornstarch and water to make smooth paste.
Stir in soy sauce and sugar.
Slowly stir into broth.
Bring to boil and simmer until clear, stirring constantly. Remove from heat.
Slowly add eggs, stirring until eggs shred. Add green onions and serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
3 qt. chicken, ham, beef or pork unseasoned broth
1/4 c. frozen green peas
1/4 c. whole kernel or cream-style corn
1/4 c. diced canned or pre-cooked ham, bacon spam or any other lunch meat
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 - 1/2 c. corn starch, mix with cold water
2 green onions, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
5 mushrooms
Directions:
Bring broth to boil and add peas, corn, and meat.
Add salt and pepper.
Add beaten eggs all at once while stirring thoroughly.
Wait for soup to be boiled again then pour cornstarch mixture very slowly, stirring constantly until broth thickens. Sprinkle fresh mushrooms and green onions on top, stirring and pour immediately into sour tureen.
Serve.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans Cuban Style
Ingredients:
2 qt. plus 3 c. water, divided
1 lb. dry black beans, rinsed and sorted
2 1/2 tsp. salt, divided
3/4 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
2 medium onions, peeled, ends removed and chopped
1 medium green pepper, washed, seeded, cored and chopped
4 garlic cloves, peeled, ends removed and crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
1 1/2 c. uncooked rice
1 tsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. vinegar
1 c. onions, peeled, ends removed and chopped
Directions:
In a large pot, place 1 quart of water and beans.
Bring to a boil; boil for 2 minutes.
Remove from heat and set aside for 1 hour.
Discard water.
In a large pot, place beans, 1 quart water and 2 teaspoons salt or to taste.
Cook beans until tender, about 30 minutes.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Quinoam, Leek And Tofu Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. tofu
2 tsp. sesame oil
1 clove garlic, pressed
1 leek, chopped
2 c. cooked quinoa
1 tsp. sea salt or 2 tsp. shoyu
dash of black pepper
1 c. bread crumbs
1 c. soymilk (optional)
1/2 c. cheese, grated (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Working with 1/2 cup tofu at a time, squeeze out water with hands.
Set aside.
Heat a large skillet or wok; add oil.
Add garlic, then leek.
Saute until lightly browned.
Add quinoa, then tofu, sauteing for 2 minutes after each addition.
Add seasonings.
Oil casserole.
Add 1/2 cup bread crumbs; rotate casserole to coat evenly.
Gently add the quinoa mixture.
Press a well in the center of the quinoa; pour in soymilk.
Cover with remaining bread crumbs and cheese.
Cover; bake for 20 minutes.
Remove cover; continue to bake until cheese is nicely browned.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. black beans
1/4 lb. ham for seasoning
1 large onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 green peppers, chopped
1 bay leaf
1/8 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
3 to 4 c. cold water
2 pkg. yellow rice
chopped green onions, fat-free sour cream and tomato for garnish (optional)
Directions:
Wash beans thoroughly.
Cover with water and put in large pot to soak overnight.
Drain beans and place in crock-pot with 3 to 4 cups of water.
Add all other ingredients, except the rice.
Cook on high for 1 hour, then cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Remove bay leaf.
Cook rice according to directions on package.
Serve beans over rice.
Garnish as desired.
This is a low-fat, high fiber meal.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Broccoli Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh broccoli
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 whole chicken breasts, skinned and cut into bite size pieces
3 Tbsp. oil
2 large onions, chunked
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine 3/4 cup water, 1 tablespoon cornstarch and 2 tablespoons soy sauce; set aside.
Combine remaining cornstarch and soy sauce; stir it into chicken pieces until well-coated.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/4 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
4 scallions, cut into 1-inch pieces
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. dry sherry
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. Oriental sesame oil
Directions:
In a large frying pan or wok, heat oil over medium high heat. Add the chicken cubes and stir-fry 3 minutes, until chicken becomes opaque.
Remove with slotted spoon and set aside.
Add broccoli, fry for 1 to 2 minutes.
Add mushrooms, scallions, soy sauce, ginger and sesame oil.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add cornstarch, dissolved in water, and chicken.
Cook until heated through and sauce has thickened.
Serve over rice or angel hair pasta.
Serves 4.
Preparation time 20 minutes.
Cooking time 20 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken breast strips
2 Tbsp. oil
4 c. vegetables (broccoli, green peppers, water chestnuts, onions)
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. garlic powder
3/4 tsp. ginger
1 1/2 c. Minute rice
Directions:
Stir-fry chicken in hot oil in a large skillet until brown. Add vegetables.
Fry until crispy and tender.
Mix broth, soy sauce, cornstarch, sugar, garlic powder and ginger.
Add to chicken and vegetables.
Bring to boil.
Cook for 2 minutes. Prepare rice as directed on package.
Serve chicken and vegetables over rice.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fried Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 whole chicken breasts, skinned and cut in 1-inch pieces
2 c. broccoli flowerets
1 medium red bell pepper, cut in 1-inch chunks
1/2 c. sliced onion
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. vegetable juice
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. grated, fresh ginger
3 c. hot, cooked rice
Directions:
In 10-inch skillet over medium heat in hot oil, cook chicken, a few pieces at a time, until lightly browned.
Remove with slotted spoon.
Add broccoli, pepper, onion and garlic; cook until tender-crisp.
In small bowl, stir together juice, cornstarch, soy sauce, brown sugar and ginger.
Stir into vegetables.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until slightly thickened.
Add reserved chicken pieces and heat through.
Serve over hot, cooked rice.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken breast strips
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
4 c. vegetables (fresh or frozen): broccoli, green peppers, water chestnuts, carrots
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Stir-fry chicken in oil until chicken is thoroughly cooked. Add all ingredients.
Stir and bring to a boil for 1 minute. Serve over rice.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Company Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
4 bacon strips, diced
1 doz. Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh chives
1 carrot, thinly sliced
10 stuffed green olives, sliced
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/3 c. chicken broth or dry white wine
1 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
Directions:
In a skillet, fry bacon just until cooked.
Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons drippings.
Add remaining ingredients; cook and stir over medium-high heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until Brussels sprouts are crisp-tender.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: The Best Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
6 slices bacon, cut across into 1/4-inch pieces
1/2 c. pine nuts
2-1/2 lb. (8 cups) Brussels sprouts, halved, cored and each half cut into quarters
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 cup carrots, peeled and cut into very small dice
2 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. chopped Italian parsley
Directions:
Place the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat and cook until the fat is rendered.
Add the pine nuts and cook until the bacon is crisp and the nuts are golden, about 1 minute.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Bacon
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. chopped pecans
2 (10 oz. each) boxes frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed and halved or 2 c. fresh, halved
1/4 c. apple juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook bacon over medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently until crisp.
Stir in pecans and cook 1 minute, until roasted. Drain all but 1 tablespoon fat from skillet; remove bacon and pecans to a paper towel.
Add Brussels sprouts and stir to coat with remaining bacon fat.
Stir in apple juice, cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low and simmer 8 to 10 minutes (for frozen) or 10 to 12 minutes (for fresh).
Before serving, add bacon, pecans, salt and pepper.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen Brussels sprouts
water
4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. sour cream
salt to taste
Louisiana hot sauce or ground cayenne pepper to taste
Directions:
If using fresh sprouts, rinse well and cut off any discolored leaves.
With a paring knife, cut a "plus"
sign in the stem end to insure even cooking.
Place the sprouts in a large saucepan and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and continue boiling for about 10 minutes or until the stem side is tender when pierced with a knife.
Drain and set the sprouts aside.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Bacon Tossed Brussel Sprouts
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. and 1/2 tsp. salt
3 pt. Brussel sprouts, cleaned and halved
8 strips thick sliced bacon, cut crosswise into thin strips
1/3 c. onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. pepper
3-4 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Fill 6 quart Dutch oven with water. Add 1 Tbsp. salt. Bring water to a boil; add Brussels sprouts. Reduce heat to medium. Cook 12 minutes, until crisp and tender. Drain and rinse under cold water to stop cooking. In large non-stick pan, over medium heat, cook bacon for 5 minutes until slightly crisp. Pour off fat. Add onion to bacon in skillet and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Add sprouts, remaining salt and pepper. Heat thoroughly. Add vinegar and butter, stirring to melt butter.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. old-fashioned oats
1 c. raisins or dried cranberries
1 c. unsalted peanuts
1/2 c. unsalted sunflower seeds
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies
2 Tbsp. sesame seeds
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. chunky peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
Directions:
Toast oats for 15 minutes at 250°. Add peanuts, raisins and sunflower seeds. Cool. Mix in Rice Krispies. Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows. Add dry mixture
and mix together. Press into buttered pan. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. To serve, cut into desired size or cut and wrap to store.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies cereal
1 c. quick oats
1/2 c. toasted sesame seed
1/4 c. butter (1/2 stick)
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
1/2 c. peanuts, halved
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Grease 9 x 13-inch pan.
In large frying pan, combine cereal, oats and sesame seed.
Toast over medium heat for a few minutes until crisp, stirring constantly.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or oleo
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
2 c. Rice Krispies
2 c. Minute oatmeal
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. peanuts
wheat germ
Directions:
Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows in a microwave until smooth. Add remaining ingredients, mixing thoroughly. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan lined with foil or sprayed with cooking spray. Flatten. When set, cut into squares.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
3 c. miniature marshmallows
1/2 c. crunchy peanut butter
1/4 c. honey
3 Tbsp. margarine
4 Tbsp. cocoa
4 c. Rice Krispies
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Melt together first 5 ingredients, stirring over low heat until marshmallows are melted. Add Rice Krispies and vanilla. Place in foil-lined pan and cool thoroughly. Cut into squares. Store in plastic container.
Makes 24 squares.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Bionic Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. kidney beans, drained
1/2 c. oil
1 egg
1/4 c. honey
1/3 c. molasses
1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. whole wheat flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/3 c. chocolate chips
1/3 c. raisins
Directions:
In blender, combine first 6 ingredients (kidney beans, oil, egg, honey, molasses and applesauce).
In large bowl, mix dry ingredients (flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, allspice and nutmeg).
Stir liquid mixture into dry ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips and raisins.
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
Cool 10 minutes; cut into 24 bars. Great for camping, hiking and skiing trips.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Individual Strawberry Shortcakes
Ingredients:
3 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or shortening
3/4 c. milk
2 qt. strawberries, crushed and sweetened
Directions:
Sift flour once.
Measure.
Add baking powder and salt and sift again.
Cut in shortening.
Add milk all at once and stir carefully until all flour is dampened.
Then stir vigorously until mixture forms a soft dough and follows spoon around bowl.
Drop 3/4 cup dough onto ungreased baking sheet*.
Brush with milk (or cream). Bake in hot oven (450°) for 15 to 20 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
4 egg whites
1 1/2 sticks softened butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. milk
3 c. finely sifted flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 qt. strawberries
3 c. whipping cream (or more; use mountains of whipped cream!)
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Stiffly whip the cream.
Rinse and cap the strawberries; blot dry on paper towels.
Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. (If strawberries are sweet, no sugar is required.)
Divide the strawberries and put between cake layers.
(Do not put strawberries on top or they may bleed into cream.)
Spread whipped cream over the cake.
Cut and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Preheat oven.
Sift the flour.
Add the baking powder, salt and sugar.
Break in the egg; add the milk.
Blend and drop onto very lightly greased cookie sheet by tablespoon.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 425° or for 25 minutes at 375°.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake(Lo-Cal)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
1/3 c. sugar
1 large egg, separated
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. skim milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 egg white
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Beat two egg whites until stiff.
Add 2 tablespoons of sugar and set aside.
Beat margarine, sugar, egg yolk and salt.
Add vanilla to milk.
Add baking powder to flour.
Add liquid and dry alternately as you mix.
Fold in beaten egg whites.
Put in a greased and floured 9-inch pan.
Bake 30 minutes at 350° until done and golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Shortcake(For Strawberries Or Raspberries)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. oil
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Sift flour, baking powder and salt.
Mix oil, vanilla and sugar until light and fluffy.
Combine with flour mixture.
Add eggs, 1 at a time.
Add milk.
Pour into 2 greased and floured 8 x 8-inch pans.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub
Ingredients:
1/4 c paprika
2 Tbsp granulated garlic
2 Tbsp Granulated onion
2 tsp peppercorns
1 tsp dry mustard
1 tsp chili powder
2 Tbsp cumin seed, toasted
3 Tbsp coriander seed, toasted
1/4 c kosher salt
1/4 c light brown sugar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a clean coffee grinder. Rub on chicken directly or coat in a plastic storage bag. Make sure chicken is dry before applying.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. red cayenne pepper
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Process until the bay leaf is pulverized and mixture is thoroughly blended.
Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 months.
Makes about 1/2 cup.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Honey Barbecue Rub
Ingredients:
4 beef top sirloins (4 oz. each)
1/4 c. honey
4 cloves garlic, diced
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. chili powder
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Rub each steak with 1 tablespoon honey.
Combine rest of the ingredients and rub into steaks.
Let stand 20 to 30 minutes. Barbecue or broil to desired degree of doneness.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Goodie'S Bbq Rub
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp salt
2 Tbsp crushed red pepper
1/2 Tbsp dry rosemary
1 Tbsp chopped garlic
2 Tbsp cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp dry sage
2 Tbsp paprika
Directions:
Mix all together and use as a dry rub before cooking ribs or chicken.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Homemade Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 small onions
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 c. catsup
3/4 c. water
Directions:
Fry onions and butter until brown.
Add all the rest of ingredients with onions and slow-cook for 10 to 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Grits
Ingredients:
4 servings instant grits
1 can chicken broth
1 Tbsp. dry wine
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. ground red pepper
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, prepared according to pkg. directions
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese
1 1/4 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1 1/4 c. water
2 tsp. dried thyme
1 1/2 tsp. chicken bouillon
1 1/3 lb. potatoes, cut in 1/4-inch slices
Directions:
In large saute pan, combine all ingredients except potatoes; bring to a boil.
Add potatoes; cover and simmer 20 to 25 minutes until tender, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Easy Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. chopped scallions
1/2 c. finely chopped carrots
1 clove garlic finely chopped
6 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. small pasta or rice (I use orzo)
10 c. washed, steamed, coarsely chopped spinach (1 -1/2 lbs.)
Directions:
In a large saucepan, melt 2 1/2 Tbsp. butter.
Add the carrots, scallions and clove of gallic; saute until the scallions are soft. Bring the chicken broth to a boil, stir in rice or pasta.
Simmer 5 to 10 minutes.
Just before serving, stir the spinach into the hot liquid.
Cook for two to three minutes until spinach is done.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Top with parmesan cheese and/or croutons if desired.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 can water chestnuts, chopped and drained
2 envelopes Herb-Ox instant chicken broth
Directions:
Drain spinach through colander until no water remains (press using food handler gloves).
Add remaining ingredients; mix well. Chill.
Serve with cut up vegetables, crackers, party size breads or bagel chips.
Kids love it!

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Pate
Ingredients:
3 lb. fresh spinach
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. wine or cider vinegar
3 eggs
1/2 c. skim milk
1/8 tsp. nutmeg, grated
4 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. Gruyere cheese
3/4 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
sea salt to taste
pepper
Directions:
Wash and stem spinach.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter a loaf pan.
Puree spinach or chop fine.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Fried Spinach Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients:
1 (10-oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed, drained
1/4 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg (optional)
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
6 chicken breasts, skinless, boneless
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Place breast between heavy plastic wrap and flatten to 1/4-inch thickness.
Place 1/2 teaspoon of spinach mixture on each flattened breast.
Fold in sides and ends and secure with toothpicks. Combine egg and milk, mix well.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture, then dip in egg mixture, and dredge in flour mixture.
Pour oil to 1 inch in skillet and fry chicken in hot oil about 15 minutes or until golden brown.
May also dip in egg wash and roll in cornflake crumbs (with seasonings) and bake.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2/3 c. shortening
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. vinegar
5 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
Sift together the flour and salt into bowl.
Cut in shortening and butter until crumbly.
Mix vinegar with cold water.
Add to flour mixture.
Stir with fork until dough clings together. Divide into 2 portions.
Roll on floured surface.
Makes 2 crusts.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Three Flaky Pie Crusts
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/3 c. Crisco
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
3 Tbsp. vinegar
7 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder and salt together.
Cut in shortening.
Mix egg, water and vinegar in a cup; beat slightly. Then pour into flour mixture and mix (with fork or pie dough cutter) until you can form one big ball.
Divide into 3 sections. Place each part into a quart size plastic bag.
Mash each flat. Refrigerate extras up to one month in Ziploc bag.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. flour (all-purpose)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. oil
2 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
In a medium bowl, sift together flour and salt.
Dribble oil over flour.
Mix with flour until oil and flour are mixed.
Dribble water over this mixture.
Stir to form smooth ball.
Dampen work surface.
Put large wax paper down.
Put dough on this.
Cover with another piece of wax paper.
Roll out.
Remove wax paper.
Shape in pie plate.
Prick holes in shell for cream pies.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes in a 425° oven.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 cup warm milk
1 cup solid shortening
2 cups self rising flour
Directions:
Mix all ingredients into a
bowl.
Pour onto floured surface. Cover with flour and shape into a ball.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Flaky Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/3 c. + 1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. ice water
Directions:
Divide shortening in half.
Work 1/2 into the dry ingredient mixture, until smooth.
Work other 1/2 into the mixture until just about the size of a pea.
Make well in center and add the ice water, 1 tablespoon at a time.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Baked Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp (large), shelled
5 or more garlic, chopped
1/2 c. parsley, chopped
3/4 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. pepper flakes
Directions:
Melt butter and olive oil together.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter(Microwave; Easy)
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen, peeled and deveined shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in microwave-safe dish (8 or 9-inch); a Corning Ware dish works great.
Heat butter 35 to 45 seconds to melt. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.
Place shrimp in colander; run cold water over to clean and separate.
Drain.
Stir shrimp into butter mixture to evenly coat.
Cover tightly with plastic wrap.
Microwave 6 to 8 minutes on High.
Stir every 2 minutes.
When shrimp are tender and opaque, let stand 1 1/2 minutes before serving.
Serve with toothpicks.
Fresh shrimp may be used if deveined and peeled.
Makes 1 1/2 to 2 cups.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Lemon Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp
2 egg yolks
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, finely chopped
2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed
2 tsp. chives, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper or 1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Clean, peel and devein shrimp and set aside.
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add next 8 ingredients to bowl and top with cover.
Process for 30 seconds or until well mixed.
With processor running, add butter through food chute; process 1 minute or until sauce is thickened.
Set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet to 375°.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Drain shrimp and dredge in flour mixture.
Fry shrimp in hot oil until golden brown.
Turn once; drain.
Arrange shrimp in 4 or 5 individual baking dishes and top with sauce.
Broil shrimp 30 to 45 seconds. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Bake
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen shrimp
lemon pepper to taste
garlic salt to taste
1/2 stick melted butter
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in baking dish. Cover and let cook in oven until piping hot.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
1 lemon
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
4 chicken breasts (1 lb. total), pound to thin slices
2 tsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. reduced-sodium or regular chicken broth
1 Tbsp. capers, rinsed
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. butter
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
With a sharp knife, remove skin and white pith from lemon and discard.
Working over a bowl, cut lemon segments from their surrounding membranes.
Chop segments coarsely and reserve with the juice.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
6 chicken breast halves, skinned and boned
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 lemon, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Place each piece of chicken between 2 sheets of waxed paper; flatten to 1/4-inch thickness with meat mallet.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture.
Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken.
Cook 3 to 4 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Remove chicken; drain on paper towels.
Keep warm.
Add lemon juice and lemon slices to pan drippings in skillet.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Pour lemon mixture over chicken and sprinkle with parsley.
Yields 6 servings.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata(Serves 2 As Scaled; Original Recipe Serves 2)
Ingredients:
2 boneless chicken breasts
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 lemon, juice only
1 large onion, sliced
Directions:
Blend flour, thyme and pepper.
Flatten chicken with mallet or plate (place between waxed paper).
Dredge chicken in flour.
Add olive oil to preheated heavy saute pan and quickly brown chicken over medium-high heat, about 2 minutes per side.
Remove and set aside.
Saute onion until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
Add chicken, wine and lemon juice and cook until sauce thickens, about 3 to 5 minutes.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 whole skinned and boned chicken breasts, halved lengthwise
1/4 c. flour
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. fresh sliced mushrooms
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. dry white wine or chicken broth
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Place chicken between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Pound chicken to 1/2-inch thickness.
Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with flour.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in 3 tablespoons of butter over medium heat for about 5 minutes or until lightly golden.
Remove from skillet and keep warm.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 whole chicken breasts, halved lengthwise
dash of salt and pepper
1/4 c. flour
4 Tbsp. margarine
1 c. fresh mushrooms
1 garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Place chicken breast between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Pound chicken to 1/2 inch thickness.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper; coat with flour.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in 3 tablespoons butter 5 minutes until golden brown.
Remove from skillet.
Add remaining butter; cook mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Return chicken to pan.
Add wine and lemon juice.
Simmer 7 to 10 minutes.
Top with parsley.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. frying chicken
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. mushrooms, sliced
3 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 tsp. crushed garlic
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 can artichoke hearts
1 can black olives
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 can Hunt's tomato paste
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Rinse chicken well.
In a bag, combine flour, salt and pepper. Shake chicken (few pieces at a time) in flour mixture to coat.
In a large skillet, brown chicken in oil.
Remove from skillet.
Add mushrooms, parsley, garlic and thyme.
Cook until mushrooms are tender.
Add artichoke hearts and olives.
Return chicken to skillet.
Mix together tomato paste and wine.
Pour over chicken. Simmer covered 40 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink inside.
Sprinkle with additional parsley, if desired.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken
Ingredients:
1 to 1 1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken pieces
1 (29 oz.) can Veg-All homestyle large cut vegetables
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley
Directions:
Place chicken in a 3-quart baking dish.
Combine Veg-All homestyle mixed vegetables, tomatoes, onion, green pepper, lemon juice, basil and oregano in a bowl.
Pour over the chicken.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.
Sprinkle with parsley.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (Tyson)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 tsp. black pepper (ground)
1 tsp. basil
3 Tbsp. capers
1/2 celery, chopped
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes, cut into strips
1 c. cheese (Mozzarella)
1/4 c. olives (black), sliced
4 loaves French bread (mini loaves)
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil chicken and cut into bite-size pieces.
In bowl, mix together mayonnaise, lemon juice, Tabasco, black pepper and basil. Mix in chicken, capers, celery, tomatoes, cheese and olives. Slice top off mini loaves lengthwise and hollow to form boats. Brush with melted butter, garlic and parsley.
Broil until golden and toasty.
Fill with salad mixture; sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Chicken Mediterranean
Ingredients:
4 to 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
3 to 4 large potatoes (unpeeled), quartered
1 Tbsp. (15 ml) olive oil
1/4 c. (60 ml) fresh lemon juice
1 Tbsp. (15 ml) finely chopped fresh rosemary leaves or 1 tsp. (5 ml) dried
2 to 4 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. (60 ml) chopped scallions (spring onions)
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. (60 ml) Kalamata or other black olives
1 c. (250 ml) sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Place the chicken and potatoes in an ovenproof casserole. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Sprinkle with rosemary, garlic, scallions, salt and pepper. Marinate in the refrigerator for 30 to 60 minutes, turning occasionally. Bake, covered, in a preheated 400°F (200°C) oven for 30 minutes. Add the olives and mushrooms; bake an additional 30 minutes. Serves 4 to 6.

question: I need a recipe for a Mediterranean chicken bowl.
answer:
Title: Chicken Mediterranean
Ingredients:
6 oz. boneless chicken breast
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1 c. julienne cut vegetables
1 tsp. oregano, rosemary, thyme and sage mixed
1 Tbsp. butter (optional)
1 tsp. chopped shallots
Directions:
Cut chicken into 3 to 4 pieces.
Heat oil over medium heat and place meat in pan, turning after a few minutes.
Add vinegar, shallots, herbs and vegetables.
Cover and simmer for 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in butter and serve.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Brownies(1944 Recipe)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1 stick butter or oleo
2 eggs
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. nuts, chopped
Directions:
Mix eggs, which have been beaten, with sugar; beat well.
Melt butter and stir in cocoa.
Add to egg mixture.
Add flour and vanilla.
Fold in nuts.
Bake 1 hour at 300° in an 11 x 7 x 1 1/2-inch pan.
When pan has cooled, cut in squares.
Double recipe and bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Quick Delicious Brownies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
4 Tbsp. cocoa
2 eggs
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. nuts (optional)
Directions:
Melt butter in a medium saucepan.
Add sugar and cocoa.
Mix thoroughly.
Remove pan from heat.
Add remaining ingredients. Spread batter in a greased and floured 9-inch square pan.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.
Makes about 2 dozen 1 1/2-inch squares.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Farmer'S Brownies
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cocoa
3/4 c. butter
1 c. hot water
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 c. sour milk
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped nut meats
Directions:
Stir butter into cocoa and hot water; allow to cool. Sift dry ingredients together and stir into cocoa mixture. Add eggs; beat in sour milk and then vanilla. Add nuts. Spread on a greased 16 x 11-inch jelly roll pan. Bake at 375° for about 20 minutes. When cool, top with an icing of half cocoa and half powdered sugar with 2 tablespoons of softened butter added for richness.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Easy To Make Brownies
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
2 tsp. cocoa
2 eggs
2/3 c. oil
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Blend all ingredients and put in 8 x 8-inch size pan.
Bake 20 minutes at 350°.
Ice with your favorite frosting.

question: How do I make soft and chewy brownies?
answer:
Title: Brownies #1
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. granulated sugar
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. strong brewed coffee or water
1/4 c. dark, unsweetened cocoa
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
In
a
large
mixing bowl, combine the flour and sugar. In
a heavy
saucepan,
combine butter, shortening, coffee or water
and cocoa.
Stir
and
heat
to boiling.
Pour boiling mixture over the flour and sugar in the bowl.
Add the buttermilk, eggs, baking soda and vanilla.
Mix well, using a wooden spoon
or
high
speed on
electric
mixer.
Pour into a well buttered
pan.
Bake
at 400° for 20 minutes or until brownies test
done in the center. Frost while still warm with brownie frosting.
Cool and cut into bars.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
4 medium squash
2/3 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. white sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
4 tsp. lemon juice
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cut potatoes for frying (about 6 good ones).
Coat with 1 heaping
tablespoonful of flour.
Fry in deep oil.
Salt to taste.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 c. melted margarine
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/3 c. water (from cooking squash)
1 c. cooked squash
1/2 c. raisins or mixed fruit
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat shortening, eggs, water and squash. Combine with dry ingredients until dry mix is moist. Pour into greased and floured pan.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
2 c. plain flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
8 oz. crushed pineapple (undrained)
2 c. grated butternut squash
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Beat eggs. Add to spice mixture. Mix dry ingredients together. Slowly add to spice mixture. Beat 5 minutes. Add pineapple, squash and nuts. Fold in. Pour in large, greased tube pan. Bake at 300° for 55 minutes. Cool. Frost with Buttercream Frosting or your favorite frosting.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked butternut squash
1/2 stick margarine
1 c. sugar
2 beaten eggs
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
raisins, nuts, coconut
Directions:
Mix all together and pour into greased baking dish.
Melt 1/2 stick margarine and drizzle over casserole.
Add topping.

question: What can I make with butternut squash and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. squash, peeled and seeded
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. curry
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
3 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter
1/2 c. cream or evaporated milk
Directions:
Saute onion until wilted.
Add garlic.
Cut squash into 1-inch cubes.
Put into soup pot.
Add chicken broth, water and nutmeg; boil until squash is tender.
Remove from heat.
Add curry and pepper; stir.
Stir in Worcestershire sauce and peanut butter. Whirl mix in blender or food processor, adding cream or evaporated milk.
Reheat.
Makes 2 1/2 quarts.
Freezes well.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
2 large zucchini
boiling water
1/4 c. margarine or butter
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. red bell pepper, chopped
4 c. dry bread, cubed
2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. sweet basil, whole
1/2 tsp. whole marjoram
1 tsp. whole thyme
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
salt to taste
white pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut end off zucchini and cut lengthwise in half to make 8 boats.
Hollow out inside of zucchini in a canoe fashion, leaving 1/4-inch flesh on boat.
Heat water to boiling; salt lightly. Blanch boats in water for 3 to 4 minutes until flesh is tender. Lift out gently; drain upside down on paper towels.
Melt margarine in medium pan.
Saute garlic, onion, celery, carrots and red bell pepper until tender.
Mix sauteed vegetables, bread cubes, chicken broth, marjoram, sweet basil, thyme, salt, pepper and 1/4 cup of the Parmesan cheese.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Place zucchini boats in lightly oiled shallow baking pan.
Fill boats with stuffing mix.
Sprinkle tops with remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until cheese is browned.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats(Yield:  6 Servings)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. small zucchini
3/4 c. grated Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/4 c. minced onion
2 Tbsp. parsley
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Boil zucchini until tender; cut in half lengthwise.
Scoop out zucchini and reserve shells.
Add 1/2 cup cheese and next 6 ingredients.
Stuff shells with mixture.
Dot with butter and 1/4 cup cheese.
Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini
1/2 c. brown rice (uncooked)
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 red or green pepper, diced
1/2 c. mushrooms, chopped
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
dash of cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. fresh parsley, chopped
2 tomatoes, chopped
10 pimento-stuffed green olives, sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Cook the rice in 1 1/2 cups of water until done; set aside.
Wash the zucchini thoroughly, trim ends and slice in half lengthwise.
Scoop out the pulp, leaving a 1/4-inch shell.
Chop the zucchini pulp and reserve for later use. Saute onion and garlic in oil until softened.
