Add the chopped zucchini, red or green pepper, mushrooms, herbs, spices and salt and cook until the zucchini is softened.
Remove from heat; add the tomatoes and rice and mix well.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Italian Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini
1/4 lb. sausage
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1 egg, slightly beaten
dash garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. Accent
6 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
1/2 - 3/4 c. crushed crackers
Directions:
Boil zucchinis 7 to 10 minutes, drain and let cool.
Cut each zucchini in half, lengthwise and scrape out pulp.
Set zucchini aside and mash pulp and pour off liquid.
Fry sausage and onion and drain well.
Combine sausage with pulp mixture.
Add egg and remaining ingredients and mix well.
Fill zucchini halves with mixture.
Sprinkle extra parmesan cheese on top of zucchini boats and bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
6 (6-inch) zucchini
1 c. chopped onions
1/2 c. chopped green peppers
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 c. chopped mushrooms
4 tomatoes, chopped
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. parsley
1 c. Ricotta or cottage cheese
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
flavored bread crumbs
olive oil
Directions:
Place zucchini in microwave to soften.
Let cool, cut in half. Scoop out half of zucchini pulp and set aside.
Saute zucchini pulp, onions, pepper, celery, mushrooms, tomatoes, garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil and spices.
Add Ricotta and Cheddar cheeses. Spoon evenly into zucchini boats; top with bread crumbs.
Place in oiled pan.
Drizzle olive oil over zucchini.
Cover.
Bake in 350° oven for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Individual Strawberry Shortcakes
Ingredients:
3 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or shortening
3/4 c. milk
2 qt. strawberries, crushed and sweetened
Directions:
Sift flour once.
Measure.
Add baking powder and salt and sift again.
Cut in shortening.
Add milk all at once and stir carefully until all flour is dampened.
Then stir vigorously until mixture forms a soft dough and follows spoon around bowl.
Drop 3/4 cup dough onto ungreased baking sheet*.
Brush with milk (or cream). Bake in hot oven (450°) for 15 to 20 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
4 egg whites
1 1/2 sticks softened butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. milk
3 c. finely sifted flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 qt. strawberries
3 c. whipping cream (or more; use mountains of whipped cream!)
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Stiffly whip the cream.
Rinse and cap the strawberries; blot dry on paper towels.
Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. (If strawberries are sweet, no sugar is required.)
Divide the strawberries and put between cake layers.
(Do not put strawberries on top or they may bleed into cream.)
Spread whipped cream over the cake.
Cut and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Preheat oven.
Sift the flour.
Add the baking powder, salt and sugar.
Break in the egg; add the milk.
Blend and drop onto very lightly greased cookie sheet by tablespoon.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 425° or for 25 minutes at 375°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake(Lo-Cal)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
1/3 c. sugar
1 large egg, separated
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. skim milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 egg white
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Beat two egg whites until stiff.
Add 2 tablespoons of sugar and set aside.
Beat margarine, sugar, egg yolk and salt.
Add vanilla to milk.
Add baking powder to flour.
Add liquid and dry alternately as you mix.
Fold in beaten egg whites.
Put in a greased and floured 9-inch pan.
Bake 30 minutes at 350° until done and golden brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Shortcake(For Strawberries Or Raspberries)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. oil
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Sift flour, baking powder and salt.
Mix oil, vanilla and sugar until light and fluffy.
Combine with flour mixture.
Add eggs, 1 at a time.
Add milk.
Pour into 2 greased and floured 8 x 8-inch pans.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. mushrooms, cleaned, trimmed and sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced or put through a press
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 Tbsp. dry white wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. milk
1/2 c. grated Gruyere or Parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat half the butter in a frying pan and add mushrooms and garlic.
Cook over moderate heat 5 minutes or until mushrooms begin to soften.
Add thyme, rosemary and white wine and continue to saute another 5 minutes or until liquid evaporates.
Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper.
Remove from heat and set aside.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Omelet
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced mushrooms (about 1/4 lb.)
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1 medium garlic clove, minced
6 tsp. butter or margarine
6 or 12 eggs
1 c. water
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed tomato soup
1 large bay leaf
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine mushrooms, onion, green pepper and garlic in 2 teaspoons margarine in small saucepan and cook until tender.
In another saucepan, blend water, soup, bay leaf, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper to taste and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove bay leaf.
Keep sauce hot.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Spinach Omelette
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1/2 c. milk
1 small onion, diced
1/2 c. frozen spinach
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. American cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Bac*Os
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Beat eggs and milk together.
Add onion and spinach (finely chopped), butter and American cheese.
Pour into a buttered casserole and bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Top with Bac*Os and grated Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Fresh Spinach Omelet
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 small garlic clove, crushed
8 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/4 c. chopped spinach
Directions:
In skillet over medium-low heat, cook garlic 1 minute in butter or margarine. In small bowl, beat eggs, salt, pepper and 2 tablespoons of water. Stir in spinach. Tilt skillet to grease sides. Pour egg mixture into skillet; cook until set around sides. With a spatula, lift edges, tilting skillet to allow uncooked portion to run under omelet. Shake skillet occasionally to
keep omelet moving in pan. Increase heat slightly to brown bottom of omelet. With spatula, fold omelet in half; slide onto warm platter. Serve immediately. Yield:
3 servings.

question: How do I make a simple spinach and mushroom omelette?
answer:
Title: Spanish Omelette Sauce
Ingredients:
1 6 oz. can tomato paste
1 15 oz. can tomato sauce
1 4 oz. can mushroom pieces
1 5 oz. green pepper, sliced and cut (approx. 1 c.)
1 large onion sliced and cut (approx. 1 c.)
2 small stalks celery and leaves (approx 1 1/3 c.)
2 6 oz. cans water
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic (I use more)
1 very small hot pepper or a few flakes
1/4 tsp. dried basil or few fresh leaves
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, and simmer for 1/2 hour. Makes 3 pints.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil Stew
Ingredients:
5 c. water
1 c. dried lentils, washed
1 Tbsp. salt
1/8 tsp. thyme
1/8 tsp. marjoram
1/4 c. olive oil
3 large, chopped onions
3 carrots, chopped fine
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 tomatoes, cut up
1/4 c. dry sherry
Directions:
Bring water, lentils, salt, thyme and marjoram to a boil. Cover and simmer 15 minutes.
Saute onions and carrots in olive oil slowly, until soft.
Add to stock, along with chopped parsley, tomatoes and sherry.
Cover and simmer until lentils are tender. When ready to serve, put grated Swiss or Jack cheese in the bottom of each bowl and fill with hot stew.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. lentils
3 medium potatoes, diced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. V-8 juice
1 (15 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. salt
3 medium carrots, diced
2 bay leaves
1 small can tomato paste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic powder
salt to taste
Directions:
In a large 8-quart pot, cook lentils with 1 pint of water and salt.
Put all ingredients in pot.
Meanwhile, saute 2 large onions in 1 tablespoon olive oil and 3 tablespoons water.
Add to the pot when onions are soft.
Simmer for about 1 hour or until the vegetables are soft, not overcooked.
Stir occasionally.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil And Barley Stew
Ingredients:
2 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil
3/4 c. chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. cumin seed
1 tsp. minced garlic
6 c. water
3/4 c. dry lentils
3 carrots, cut into coins
1 qt. canned tomatoes or spaghetti sauce
1/2 to 3/4 c. barley
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. rosemary or basil (2 tsp. dry or 1/4 c. fresh)
Directions:
Saute in oil, celery, onion, cumin and garlic.
Add water and lentils; cook 20 minutes.
Add tomatoes, barley, salt, pepper and herbs.
Simmer 30 minutes.
Add carrots and simmer another 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Lentil Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
3 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can Italian style tomatoes, chopped
1 c. peeled and chopped potato
1/2 c. chopped carrot
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1 Tbsp. dried basil, crushed
1 clove garlic, minced
dash of pepper
Directions:
Rinse and drain lentils.
In a large saucepan, combine lentils, chicken broth, undrained tomatoes, potato, carrot, celery, onion, parsley, basil, garlic and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 45 to 50 minutes or until lentils and vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally. Low-fat, no cholesterol.

question: What’s a good recipe for a lentil and vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium carrots
2 medium celery stalks
1 medium onion
3/4 lb. small red potatoes
1 (14 to 16 oz.) can Italian stewed tomatoes
3 c. water
1 c. dry lentils
2 (13 or 14 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 garlic clove
2 Tbsp. olive and salad oil
1 small head escarole
Directions:
Dice carrots, celery and onions.
Cut potatoes into 1/2-inch pieces.
Mince garlic.
In 5-quart Dutch oven over medium high heat, in hot olive oil, cook vegetables until tender.
Add garlic. Cook until brown.
Stir in tomatoes, lentils, broth, potatoes and water.
Over high heat, heat to boiling.
Reduce to low and cover. Simmer for 50 minutes.
Thinly slice escarole.
Just before serving, stir into soup.
Cook until wilted.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Tomato Soup(My Mother'S Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 large onion
small amount of oil and butter
1 heaping Tbsp. flour
1 pt. water
1 pt. tomatoes (home can if possible)
black pepper and salt to taste
1 tsp. sugar
1 c. milk
Directions:
Cook onion in oil and butter, but do not brown.
Stir in flour (do not brown); add water and tomatoes.
Add pepper and salt and sugar.
Cook slowly until thickened.
When soup is thick, add milk and heat until piping hot (do not boil).
Serve with crackers or cornbread.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Tomato Soup
Ingredients:
3 to 4 qt. sliced ripe tomatoes (need not be skinned)
6 medium sized onions, sliced fine
6 to 8 Tbsp. sugar
few sprigs fresh parsley
40 whole cloves
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
6 Tbsp. butter
6 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. water
whipped cream or sour cream
Directions:
Boil tomatoes, onions, sugar, parsley, cloves, salt and pepper together until vegetables are thoroughly cooked.
Strain entire mixture through sieve.
Discard vegetables and return broth to stove.
Add butter to broth, then add cornstarch dissolved in the water; make sure mixture is smooth or soup will be lumpy.
Let soup come to gentle boil; it will thicken.
Serve hot with dollop of cream, I use nonfat, and parsley sprig for garnish.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Italian Tomato Soup(Preparation Time:  30 Minutes)
Ingredients:
1 yellow onion
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. whole wheat flour
2 1/2 c. vegetable broth
5 to 6 tomatoes
1 Tbsp. chili sauce
2 bay leaves
1 tsp. basil leaves
1 tsp. herb salt
3 to 4 Tbsp. whipping cream
chopped parsley
Directions:
Peel and chop onion.
In a large skillet or pan, heat oil. Saute onion in oil for a few minutes, until soft.
Add pressed garlic.
Sprinkle with whole wheat flour.
Stir to combine.
Add vegetable broth.
Heat, stirring constantly.
Dip tomatoes in hot water; peel and chop.
Add tomatoes to soup, stirring.
Add chili sauce, bay leaves, basil and herb salt.
Bring to a boil.
Cook, covered, over medium-low heat for about 15 minutes.
Add cream to soup just before serving.
Sprinkle with parsley.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Fresh Tomato Soup
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. flour
1 c. water
6 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
1 1/4 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 bay leaf
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
In 3-quart pan, heat oleo.
Cook onions until tender.
Stir in flour.
Slowly stir in water.
Add tomatoes and remaining ingredients (except lemon slices).
Heat to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer 20 minutes.
Stir frequently.
Add more water, if needed.
Makes 4 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a simple tomato soup.
answer:
Title: Tomato Soup
Ingredients:
1 peck tomatoes (8 qt.)
3 medium onions, chopped
1 to 2 hot peppers
3 green peppers, chopped
garlic powder to taste
1/2 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. celery seed
1 stick margarine
1/2 c. flour with a little water to make thickening
Directions:
Cook tomatoes, onions, peppers and garlic powder together until done (about 2 hours).
Run through sieve and then add sugar, salt, celery seed, margarine and flour.
Cook until thick.
Seal in clean hot jars.
Makes 9 to 12 pints.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
1/2 c. confectioners sugar
3/4 c. butter
1 1/2 c. flour
8 oz. cream cheese
1 egg
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
fruit for topping
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 c. pineapple juice (can use other juices or water to make 1 1/2 c.)
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Cut confectioners sugar, butter and flour with pastry blender. Press into 12 0r 14-inch pan and bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes.
Don't overcook.
Beat together softened cream cheese, egg, sugar and vanilla.
Spread on the cooked crust and bake until set (10 to 15 minutes).
Allow to cool some.
Arrange fruit on top in concentric circles.
Don't use bananas.
Good ones are fresh kiwi, grapes and strawberries; and also canned pineapple, mandarin oranges and peaches, but any fruit is okay, except bananas. Combine cornstarch, sugar and juices.
Cook and stir until thickened.
Cool and spread over fruit.
Refrigerate.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
1/3 c. whole wheat flour
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. ice water
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. orange juice
1 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced
3/4 c. banana, thinly sliced
1 c. strawberries, thinly sliced
Directions:
Crust:
Combine flours and 1 tablespoon sugar; cut in margarine until dough resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle with ice water and toss until crumbly; form into a ball.
Put ball of dough between two pieces of wax paper and roll into a 10-inch circle.
Remove top sheet of wax paper and invert onto an ungreased baking sheet. Remove remaining wax paper and crimp pastry edges.
Prick all over with a fork.
Bake at 400° for 12 to 15 minutes (should be lightly browned).
Cool.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
1/3 c. whole-wheat flour
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. ice water
2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. orange juice
1 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced
3/4 c. banana, thinly sliced
1 c. strawberries, thinly sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Cranberry Fruit Tarts
Ingredients:
1 can whole cranberries
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 c. self-rising flour
1/4 c. shortening
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
Thicken cranberries with cornstarch.
Combine flour, shortening and milk.
Roll out on floured surface.
Cut with 4-inch cutter. Spoon 1 teaspoon of cranberries on each one.
Go around each with milk to seal edges.
Cover and seal with a fork to crimp.
Lightly grease sheet to bake.
Bake at 375° 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick fruit tart?
answer:
Title: Cool Fruit Tart
Ingredients:
2 c. Bisquick
1/3 c. sugar
1/3 c. margarine
1 egg
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese
1/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. chilled whipping cream
sliced fruit (strawberries and kiwi work well)
1/4 c. apple jelly, melted
Directions:
Mix Bisquick and 1/3 cup sugar.
Cut in margarine until crumbly.
Mix in egg until soft dough forms.
Spray fruit tart pan with Pam.
Work dough toward edges.
Prick with fork.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 375° until brown.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Lemon Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp
2 egg yolks
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, finely chopped
2 to 3 cloves garlic, crushed
2 tsp. chives, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper or 1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Clean, peel and devein shrimp and set aside.
Position knife blade in food processor bowl; add next 8 ingredients to bowl and top with cover.
Process for 30 seconds or until well mixed.
With processor running, add butter through food chute; process 1 minute or until sauce is thickened.
Set aside.
Heat oil in large skillet to 375°.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Drain shrimp and dredge in flour mixture.
Fry shrimp in hot oil until golden brown.
Turn once; drain.
Arrange shrimp in 4 or 5 individual baking dishes and top with sauce.
Broil shrimp 30 to 45 seconds. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Butter
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 stick butter, softened
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 small grated onion or 1 tsp. onion flakes
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 can small shrimp, drained and rinsed
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Beat all ingredients together except shrimp.
Add shrimp and mix.
Refrigerate.
Spread on crackers of choice.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Butter
Ingredients:
2 (5 oz.) cans small shrimp
1 Tbsp. minced onion
juice of 1 lemon
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 1/2 sticks real butter
1 large pkg. cream cheese
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients with mixer, after previously softening cheese and butter.
Serve with crackers.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Bake
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen shrimp
lemon pepper to taste
garlic salt to taste
1/2 stick melted butter
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in baking dish. Cover and let cook in oven until piping hot.

question: How do I make lemon garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Butter
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 stick oleo, softened
1 small onion, chopped fine
dash of lemon juice
dash of Worcestershire sauce
dash of garlic salt
1 can drained shrimp
Directions:
Mix all of the ingredients and refrigerate.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Smoothie
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
1/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 c. crushed ice
Directions:
In a blender, add milk, sugar, peanut butter and vanilla. Blend on high speed.
Add ice until the smoothie gets thick.
Make sure all ice is chopped up.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter And Jelly Smoothie
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. blackberry jelly
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1 banana, frozen and chunked
2 Tbsp. honey
2 tsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In a blender combine milk, jelly, peanut butter, banana, honey and wheat germ. Blend until smooth.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Smoothie
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) white chocolate
1 (1 lb.) butterscotch
1 c. peanut butter
Directions:
Melt white chocolate and butterscotch in top of double boiler. Stir in peanut butter.
Put in little papers and cool.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Smoothies
Ingredients:
1 pound white summer coating chocolate
1 pound butterscotch summer coating
1 cup peanut butter (smooth or chunky)
Directions:
Melt white chocolate and butterscotch coating.
Add peanut butter.
Mix well.
Drop by teaspoons into small paper baking cups.

question: What’s a recipe for a peanut butter smoothie?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. roasted peanuts
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Put ingredients in blender.
Grind and serve on crackers, celery or apple slices.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Glazed Teriyaki Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into strips,
3 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided
4 medium carrots, julienne
1 medium sweet onion, julienne
1/2 cup soy sauce
1/4 cup packed brown sugar
Hot cooked rice
Sesame seed, toasted, optional
Sliced green onions, optional
Directions:
In a large skillet, stir-fry chicken in 2 tablespoons oil for 6-8 minutes or until juices run clear. Remove chicken and set aside. In the same skillet, stir-fry carrots in remaining oil for 2 minutes. Add onion, stir-fry about 2-4 minutes longer or until vegetables are tender.
Combine soy sauce and brown sugar, add to skillet. Bring to a boil. Return chicken to skillet. Boil for 5 minutes or until sauce
is slightly thickened. Serve over rice. Sprinkle with sesame seed and green onions if desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Chicken(Stir-Fry Chicken With Steamed Vegetables)
Ingredients:
2 lb. boneless chicken breasts, cut into small, bite size pieces (beef, veal, or pork can be substituted for chicken)
1 bag frozen stir-fry vegetables
1 medium red or green bell pepper
5 oz. jar mushrooms
8 oz. can sliced water chestnuts
1 large onion, chopped
1/4 c. low sodium soy sauce (plain or teriyaki)
1/4 c. red cooking wine
2-3 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
In large frying pan, cook chicken on high in olive oil, adding soy sauce during browning process to keep from sticking. Add wine and stir in onions, pepper, and garlic salt. Continue to add soy sauce as needed for liquid.
Cook on medium high for about 2 minutes.	Add mushrooms, water chestnuts, and bell pepper.
Cook on medium high for about 4 minutes.
Add frozen vegetables over top of chicken mixture. Allow vegetables to steam until desired tenderness; 1/4 cup water may be added before vegetables if there is not enough moisture to create steam.
Can be served over rice or with Chinese noodles.
Serves 4-6.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. flank steak
1/4 c. reduced-sodium soy sauce
1/4 c. water
2 Tbsp. honey
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. vegetable oil
1 onion, chopped
2 c. broccoli, chopped
1 c. fresh mushrooms, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1 tomato, chopped
Directions:
Trim fat from beef.
Cut into strips.
Combine next 5 ingredients in an 8-inch square pan.
Add steak to marinade; turn to coat.
Cover and marinate in refrigerator 30 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Country Store Stir-Fry Teriyaki
Ingredients:
1/2 pkg. "Butcher Block" beef teriyaki
1 pkg. Birds Eye stir-fry vegetables
Directions:
Cut beef into small pieces.
Cook vegetables and beef together according to vegetable directions.
Serve on a bed of rice. Ready in minutes. Serves 2.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken teriyaki stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (4 lb.) bag chicken party wings
4 to 6 cloves garlic, minced
1-inch fresh ginger, grated
4 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 1/4 c. sugar
1 c. soy sauce
Directions:
Boil chicken until done but do not overcook.
Drain; set aside.
In frying pan, add oil, garlic and ginger.
Saute 1 1/2 minutes.
Add chicken; continue to saute over low heat 2 to 3 minutes longer.
Add sugar and soy sauce.
Mix well.
Simmer 45 minutes to 1 hour or until thick.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower (cut into florets)
1 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
24 saltines, crushed
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
1 (14 1/2-oz.) can diced tomatoes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 1/2 c. (6-oz.) shredded sharp cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook cauliflower in boiling water to cover with 1/2 teaspoon salt for 5 minutes, drain. In a large bowl, stir together 1/2 teaspoon salt, butter, crackers, sugar and pepper, mix well. Stir in cauliflower, bell pepper, tomatoes, onion and 1 1/4 cups cheese. Spoon into a lightly greased 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 to 2 garlic cloves, minced
4 oz. cooked ham, chopped
1 head cauliflower, broken into florets
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. whipping cream
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
pinch of cayenne pepper
1 1/2 c. (4 to 6 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese
2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt butter in a large skillet. Saute garlic and ham for 2 minutes. Add cauliflower and cook just until crisp-tender. Combine flour and cream; stir into skillet and blend well. Add salt, pepper and cayenne pepper. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly; cook and stir 1 minute more. Pour into a 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese.
Place under a preheated broiler until lightly browned, about 2 to 4 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve immediately. Yield: 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Golden Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1/4 c. chopped yellow onions
6 Tbsp. unsalted butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. water
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 head cauliflower, chopped and blanched
3 well beaten eggs
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. buttered, toasted bread crumbs
Directions:
Saute onions in 4 tablespoons butter until soft.
Add flour and water to make white sauce.
Blend in cauliflower and cheese.
Add eggs and mix until blended.
Put into greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with breadcrumbs, parsley and 2 tablespoons butter and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower, cored
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. mild Cheddar cheese, shredded
1/4 c. Italian seasoned bread crumbs
Directions:
Place cauliflower upside down in a 2-quart microproof casserole dish.
Add water.
Cover with lid and cook on High for 4 minutes; turn cauliflower over.
Cover and cook on High for 4 to 5 minutes or until tender; drain and reserve liquid.
Mix liquid with cheese and bread crumbs.
Pat mixture gently onto cauliflower.
Cover and cook on High for 1 to 2 minutes or until cheese begins to melt. Let stand, still covered, 3 minutes before serving.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
2 medium heads cauliflower
2 c. sour cream
2 c. grated sharp processed American cheese
2 tsp. toasted sesame seed
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash cauliflower; break into flowerets.
Cook, covered, in a small amount of boiling water until tender, 10 to 15 minutes; drain well.
Place half the flowerets in a 2-quart casserole; season with salt and pepper.
Spread with 1 cup sour cream and 1 cup cheese; top with 1 teaspoon sesame seed and repeat layers. Bake in 350° oven until cheese melts and sour cream is heated through.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar
Ingredients:
3/4 c. olive oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. finely grated Parmesan cheese
1 can anchovies, drained and chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. black pepper
salt
4 boneless, skinless chicken halves
1/2 lb. green beans, drained and cooled
6 to 8 small potatoes, cooked and cooled, cut into quarters
3/4 c. cooked or thawed frozen corn
1 medium carrot, cut in halves
2 green peppers, sliced
finely chopped parsley
basil
Directions:
To make Caesar Dressing, place first 7 ingredients in food processor, processing until smooth and creamy.
Add salt to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast
1 head (bunch) romaine lettuce, chopped
2 cloves garlic
1/3 c. olive oil
1/2 fresh lemon, squeezed into oil
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. Grey Poupon mustard
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 c. croutons
1 c. Italian bread crumbs
Directions:
Wash and dry lettuce.
Bread the chicken with egg and crumbs. Place in skillet and cook thoroughly.
Crush the cloves of garlic and mix with olive oil, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and mustard.
When dressing is completely mixed, add the lettuce and toss with Parmesan cheese.
Top with sliced chicken and croutons.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut in strips
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. lemon and pepper seasoning
2 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite size pieces
1 c. garlic croutons
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat oil in nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
Toss chicken with lemon and pepper seasoning and garlic powder to evenly coat.
Add to skillet and cook 4 to 5 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Do not drain off fat.
In a small bowl, combine vinegar, mustard and Worcestershire sauce with a whisk.
Stir into chicken mixture.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with chicken mixture, croutons and cheese. Top with fresh grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.
Makes 4 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1 large head romaine lettuce (about 1 lb.)
1 (2 1/2 lb.) refrigerated roasted whole chicken
1 pt. cherry tomatoes
1 c. pitted ripe olives
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
1/2 (2 oz.) can anchovies, drained
3 Tbsp. extra virgin olive oil or olive oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
About 25 minutes before serving:
Wash lettuce and drain well; cut into 2-inch pieces.
Remove chicken from bones; discard skin. With fingers, tear meat into shreds.
Cut each cherry tomato and olive in half.
In a large bowl, combine lettuce, chicken, cherry tomatoes, olives, Parmesan cheese and black pepper.

question: I need a recipe for a chicken Caesar wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken breast halves
2 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 c. olive oil
1 (1 lb.) head romaine lettuce, torn into bite sized pieces (about 8 c.)
1 c. garlic croutons
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Microwave or grill chicken.
When meat is cool enough to handle, cut into 1/4-inch crosswise strips and set aside.
Combine vinegar, mustard, Worcestershire, lemon pepper and garlic powder. Gradually whisk olive oil into dressing.

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Granola(Kids Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 c. old-fashioned oatmeal, uncooked
1 1/2 c. wheat germ (raw or toasted)
1 c. coconut, grated
1/4 c. nonfat dry milk
2 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1 c. raisins
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix dry ingredients.
Combine oil, honey and vanilla in a saucepan and warm.
Add these to the dry ingredients and stir until all the particles are coated.
(Hand mixing works well here).
Spread this mixture in a long, low pan or rimmed baking sheet that has been sprayed with vegetable shortening. Bake at 250° for an hour, turning with spatula every 15 minutes. When finished toasting, add raisins and toss.
Cool and store in an airtight container.

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
2 c. old fashioned oats
1 1/2 c. chopped almonds
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
300°.
In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, coconut,
wheat
germ and salt.
Stir in milk and oil and mix
thoroughly.
Spread
on
a
wax-paper
lined shallow baking pan and bake, stirring occasionally for 1 hour or until golden. Stir
in
raisins.	Let
cool
and	store in airtight containers. Makes 7 1/2 cups.
(And it's delicious too!)

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
5 c. quick oats
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. dry milk
1/3 c. honey
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
pinch of salt
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Place 1/4 cup of mung beans in a quart jar and cover with tepid water.
Cover with cheesecloth and tie securely.
Soak overnight.
Drain water off.
Set in a warm, dark place.
Every day, rinse with tepid water and drain.
Place in a warm dark place again.
Repeat 4 to 5 days or until sprouts are as big as you want.

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Easy Granola Mix
Ingredients:
5 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
1 1/2 c. wheat germs
1 c. shredded coconut
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/2 butter, melted
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins and/or chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oats, wheat germ, coconut, brown sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Add maple syrup and mix well. Stir together melted butter and vanilla and mix in the mixture. Turn into a large shallow pan. Bake at 325° for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring after 10 minutes. Cool. Add raisins and/or nuts. Store in airtight container.

question: I want a recipe for a homemade granola mix.
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick type)
1 c. chopped peanuts (no skins)
1/2 c. Grape-Nuts
1/2 c. bran (unprocessed, uncooked)
sugar substitute to equal 1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Spread the oatmeal on a cookie sheet and heat in a 350° oven for 10 minutes.
Combine all but the last two ingredients.
Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet or pan for 20 minutes, stirring once to brown evenly.
Allow mixture to cook in the oven.
Add wheat germ and raisins.
Refrigerate in glass jars or plastic containers.
(Granulated sugar substitute was more acceptable than liquid sugar substitute in this product.)

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Fried Onion Rings
Ingredients:
3/4 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. oil
1 egg
2 large onions
oil for frying
Directions:
Sift flour and salt into bowl.
Add milk, oil and egg.
Beat until smooth.
Cut onions into 1/4-inch slices and separate into rings.
Dip each ring into batter.
Drain excess batter into bowl. Drop into 1 inch of oil heated to 375°.
Fry 2 to 3 minutes, turning occasionally.
Drain on paper.
Leftovers may be cooled, wrapped and frozen.
Reheat in 350° oven for 5 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: French Fried Onion Rings
Ingredients:
1 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. allspice or cloves, ground
1/2 tsp. ground turmeric
1 tsp. sugar
1 egg, well beaten
2/3 c. water
3 medium yellow onions
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Stir together flour, baking powder, salt, allspice, turmeric and sugar.
Beat egg with water and add to flour mixture.
Mix well to make a smooth batter.
Cut onions into rings 1/4-inch thick and mix with salt. Dip onion rings in batter, a few at a time.
Fry in deep fat heated to 360° until rings are browned and float to top of fat.
Remove rings from fat with slotted spoon. Drain on paper towels. Serve hot.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Fried Onion Rings
Ingredients:
1 egg, separated
1/3 c. beer or ale
1/8 tsp. Tabasco sauce
1/2 c. flour
frying oil (deep fryer)
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. melted butter
2 mild sweet onions, cut into rings
Directions:
Beat egg yolk until light; gradually stir in beer, Tabasco sauce, flour, salt and paprika.
Mix well and stir in butter. Beat egg white stiff but not dry.
Fold into batter.
Dip onion rings, a few at a time, into batter.
Heat oil in fryer to 375°. Place onion rings, a few at a time and deep fry 2 to 3 minutes. If desired, fry ahead and heat in 400° oven before serving.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: Onion Rings
Ingredients:
4 medium onions, sliced 1/4-inch thick
cold water
3/4 c. flour
1 egg, beaten
2/3 c. milk
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. shortening, melted and cooled
oil for frying
Directions:
Separate onion slices into rings; soak in cold water for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, beat flour, egg, milk, sugar, salt and shortening together.
Drain onions and pat dry. With fork, dip rings into batter.
Preheat oil to 375°.
Fry in at least 1-inch of oil a few at a time for 2 to 3 minutes or until golden brown.
Drain on paper towels.
Keep warm in oven while frying remaining rings.

question: How do I make crispy fried onion rings?
answer:
Title: French Fried Onion Rings
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cornmeal
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. melted bacon drippings
1 egg white, unbeaten
5 Tbsp. milk
3 large onions
Directions:
Sift together cornmeal, flour and salt in a bowl.
Combine 1/2 cup milk, bacon drippings and egg white.
Add to flour mixture all at once.
Beat until smooth.
Add just enough additional milk to make a medium-thin batter.
Peel, wash and dry onions.
Cut in 1/4-inch slices.
Separate onion rings.
Dip each ring into batter. Fry in oil until golden brown.
Drain on absorbent paper and sprinkle with salt.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. raisins
1 c. water
3/4 c. Crisco
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
2 1/2 c. flour
2 c. oats
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 c. nuts
Directions:
Simmer raisins in water until raisins are plump; save liquid. Mix together all ingredients, except raisin liquid.
Add water to make 1 cup, then add to other ingredients.
Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes at 400°. Very good soft cookie.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs, well beaten
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. raisins
1 c. shortening
1 c. packed light brown sugar
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
2 c. rolled oats
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
In a large mixing bowl stir together all ingredients.
Shape into 1-inch balls.
Place on ungreased baking sheets.
Flatten with fingers.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Do not overbake.
Remove cookies to a wire rack to cool. Yields 3 1/2 dozen.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs, well beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins
1 c. shortening
1 c. packed light brown sugar
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. rolled oats
1 c. coarsely chopped pecans (optional)
Directions:
In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients.
Shape into 1-inch balls.
Place on ungreased baking sheets.
Flatten with fingers.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 11 minutes or until golden brown.
Do not overbake. Remove cookies from pan and cool on wire racks.
Makes about 3 1/2 dozen.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Raisin Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. raisins
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. rolled oats
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. cloves
3/4 c. shortening
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Simmer raisins in water over low heat until plump (20 to 30 minutes).
Drain raisin water into measuring cup and add water to make 1/2 cup.
Mix shortening, sugar, eggs and vanilla.
Stir in raisin-water.
Stir in flour, baking powder, soda, salt and spices; add rolled oats, nuts and raisins.
Drop onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make oatmeal cookies with raisins?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal-Raisin Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 sticks butter, softened
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 large egg
1 3/4 c. old fashioned rolled oats
1 c. raisins
1 Tbsp. grated orange or lemon rind
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
In medium bowl, mix together flour, baking powder and salt.
In a large bowl, using an electric mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy; beat in egg.
Reduce mixer to low speed and beat in flour mixture, oats and rind.
Stir in the raisins.
Drop by tablespoon onto greased cookie sheets two inches apart.
Bake for 10 minutes.
Cool on wire racks.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 onions, chopped
1 potato, cubed
1 c. mushrooms, sliced
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 carrot, grated
2 c. celery, sliced
1 (16 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
2 c. beef broth
1 c. water
1/2 c. dry red wine
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
1 1/2 c. lentils, washed and drained
Directions:
Spray a heavy, 4-quart skillet with nonstick vegetable spray. Brown lightly onions, potato, mushrooms, garlic, carrot and celery.
Add remaining ingredients.
Simmer, partially covered, until lentils are soft (approximately 1 1/2 hours).
Add more water, if needed, during cooking.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Lentil Tomato Salad
Ingredients:
1 cup dried lentils
1 quart water
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup olive or salad oil
1/4 cup tarragon or cider vinegar
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon dry mustard
1/2 teaspoon paprika
1/4 teaspoon pepper
1/2 cup chopped green onion
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
3 medium tomatoes chopped or sliced
1 teaspoon chopped chives
Directions:
Rinse lentils and place in a saucepan. Add water, salt and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered about 30 to 40 minutes until lentils are just tender. Drain.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Tomato Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. dried lentils
2 qt. water
1 c. chopped onion
2 c. chopped carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1/8 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. dill weed
6 oz. can tomato paste
Directions:
Place lentils, water, onion, carrots and celery in large pot. Bring to boil.
Reduce heat.
Simmer gently 2 hours.
(Add water if level gets too low.)
Add spices and stir.
Simmer another hour.
Stir in tomato paste.
Mix well.
Simmer 5 to 10 minutes. Serve.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Tomato Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. dried lentils (about 2 1/4 c.)
8 c. water
1 large onion, chopped
6 carrots, chopped
3 stalks celery, chopped
1 large can tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 bay leaves (optional)
1 tsp. sweet basil (optional)
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
Directions:
Put all ingredients (except the tomatoes) into a large pot and simmer 3 hours.
Add more water if needed.
Stir in the tomatoes at the end.
Serves 11 cups.

question: What can I cook with lentils and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Tomato-Lentil Delight
Ingredients:
2 c. uncooked lentils
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. celery
1/2 c. diced carrot
1 Tbsp. dried parsley
4 c. tomato juice
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. sweet basil
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cook lentils, onion, carrot and celery together in 4 cups water for 1/2 hour.
Add other ingredients and simmer 1/2 hour.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. water
1 medium size hen or 1 large frying chicken, disjointed
3 c. self-rising flour
desired amount salt and black pepper
Directions:
Place chicken, salt and black pepper in a large pot.
Boil over medium heat until tender.
Remove chicken from stock. Combine flour, shortening and water in a mixing pan.
Mix well to form soft dough.
Roll out paper thin.
Cut in small strips.
Drop in boiling broth.
Stir lightly.
Cook dumplings for 10 to 15 minutes or until tender.
Remove from heat and add chicken.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. Stove Top dressing
1 1/4 c. water
1/4 c. white wine
12 carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 to 5 lb. roasting chicken
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare dressing as directed.
Set aside to cool.
Stir in wine.
Blanch carrots 5 minutes in boiling water.
Drain and put in crock-pot.
Stuff chicken with dressing and place in pot over carrots.
Cover pot and set on low for 6 to 8 hours.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
3 boiled eggs
2 big cans biscuits
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
8 c. water
Directions:
First put in pressure cooker for 35 minutes; then let pressure cooker cool.
Take off lid, put on stove and let it come to a boil; then add 3 boiled eggs in it, 2 big cans biscuits or make own dough.
Let it cook 10 minutes, until done.
Add 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken 'N Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole fryer
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. shortening
2 eggs
sweet milk
Directions:
Boil fryer until tender. Remove from broth and set aside to cool. Mix dry ingredients.
Cut in shortening.
Add beaten eggs and enough milk to make a stiff dough. Roll out really thin on heavily floured board.
Cut into pieces (pizza cutter works great!).
Drop into rapidly boiling broth.
Cover and simmer on very low heat for 5 to 10 minutes. Remove skin and bones from chicken and pull into bite size pieces.
Add chicken to pot and season to taste with black pepper.
I pour about a cup of sweet milk in pot just as it's finished cooking.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken 'N Dumplings
Ingredients:
3 lb. fryer
1 stick butter
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 c. hot water (warm as hand will stand)
4 c. sifted self-rising flour
Directions:
Boil fryer until tender with butter, salt and pepper.
Make stiff dough of water and flour.
Knead until ready to roll.
Roll thin.
Flour and let stand for 10 minutes.
Then roll again.
With chicken at full boil, drop dumplings in and push down with a fork. Do not stir.
Boil 5 minutes.
Cut off heat and let stand until ready to serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
2 3/4 c. flour (heap a little)
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. nuts (optional)
1 1/2 c. salad oil
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. finely grated raw carrots
Directions:
Sift together first 5 ingredients.
Combine oil and sugar and mix well.
Add eggs (one at a time) to sugar and oil mixture; beat well.
Add carrots and mix well.
Add nuts.
Bake at 350° for 50 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Upside-Down Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
3 rounded Tbsp. butter or 50/50 butter and oil, mixed
3 to 6 Tbsp. brown sugar (more or less to taste)
nuts (walnuts or pecans)
1 1/2 c. whole wheat pastry flour
1 1/2 c. unbleached white flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. soda
1 tsp. sea salt
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. raw wheat germ (optional)
1 c. (expeller pressed) canola or sesame oil
2 well beaten eggs
1 1/2 tsp. pure vanilla
4 c. finely grated carrots
1 small can crushed pineapple in natural juice
1 c. nuts or 1 c. raisins (optional)
Directions:
Prepare 2 round cake pans with the butter or 50/50 butter and oil mixture (I use expeller pressed canola or sesame oil).
Coat bottom and sides of pan.
Add 3 to 6 tablespoons brown sugar, spreading evenly.
Press walnuts or pecans into sugar, covering the bottom of pan with nuts.
About 5 minutes before filling the pan with batter, warm the pans in a 350°, preheated oven.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. ground allspice
1/2 tsp. freshly grated nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1 1/2 c. whole wheat pastry flour
1/3 c. wheat bran
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. grated carrots
1 c. raisins or other dried fruit
3/4 c. honey
1 1/2 c. water
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In bowl, mix together all dry ingredients well.
Mix together all liquid ingredients in separate bowl.
Fold dry ingredients into the wet ones and mix well.
Do not overmix.
Pour into a 9 x 5 x 3-inch nonstick loaf pan.
Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
3 c. raw carrots, grated
2 c. sugar
2 tsp. soda
2 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
4 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 c. salad oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
dash of nutmeg
1/4 tsp. clove
3/4 c. chopped pecans
3/4 c. raisins
Directions:
Beat eggs. Add sugar and beat. Mix dry ingredients and add alternately with salad oil. Add vanilla, carrots, nuts and raisins. Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes in 9 x 13-inch pan or bake 1 hour in an angel food cake pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for a moist carrot cake?
answer:
Title: Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
3 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
2 c. coarsely grated carrots
1 1/3 c. salad oil
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. undrained crushed pineapple
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 tsp. lemon extract
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Combine the first 6 ingredients in a large mixing bowl.
Add carrots, oil and eggs; beat until well mixed.
Add remaining ingredients and stir.
Pour batter into two 9 x 5-inch loaf pans or one 10-inch Bundt pan.
Bake for approximately 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Remove cakes from the oven and allow to cool. When completely cool, top with Cream Cheese Frosting.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg, beaten
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. oil
1 1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Beat all ingredients until smooth.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Pancakes(Makes About 10)
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. flour
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 to 1 1/2 Tbsp. Sugar Twin
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium eggs
1 1/4 c. nonfat milk
2 Tbsp. diet margarine, melted
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl.
Beat eggs in another bowl; stir in nonfat milk and melted margarine.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Stir just until dry ingredients are wet.
Use about 3 tablespoons of mixture for each pancake.
Cook over low heat until bubbles appear on top.
Turn and brown on other side.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 small eggs, beaten
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients and set aside.
Mix remaining ingredients together.
Combine both mixtures and stir just until dry ingredients are moist.
Spoon onto greased hot griddle.
Turn pancakes as soon as bubbles begin to burst on top.
Turn only once.
Serve piping hot (sour milk may be used instead of buttermilk).

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Pancakes
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Flour
1/2 tsp. Cinnamon
1 tsp. Baking powder
1/4 tsp. Salt
1Tbsp. Sugar
1/2 tsp. Baking soda
1 Large egg
2 Tbsp. Olive oil
1 c. Buttermilk
1/2 c. Whole wheat flour
Directions:
Put flours, sugar, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, and salt into a large bowl, stir to mix well and set aside. Whisk together the buttermilk, egg and oil, stir into the flour mixture to form a smooth batter. Place the griddle over a medium high heat until the griddle feels hot when you place your hand above it. Lightly grease the griddle. For each pancake pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the griddle and cook for 3-5 minutes until bubbles appear on the surface and undersides are brown. Adjust the heat if pancakes brown too fast. Turn over and cook a further 1-2 minutes to brown the second side. Makes 8 pancakes.

question: How can I make fluffy pancakes without eggs?
answer:
Title: Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. margarine or butter, melted
1 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Beat egg.
Add milk, vanilla and sugar; beat.
Add butter or margarine.
Add everything except flour.
Beat again.
Slowly add flour, beating continuously and scraping side of bowl.
If batter is too thick, add milk.
If too thin, add more flour.
Serves 2 hungry people.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Sandwiches
Ingredients:
3 strips fried bacon to 1 sandwich
Directions:
This sandwich is especially good on toasted whole wheat bread. If you prefer, it can be made on plain white bread, but it is not as eye-appealing.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Egg Bake
Ingredients:
1/4 c. mayonnaise
5 slices bread, toasted
4 slices American cheese
12 bacon slices, cooked and crumbled
4 eggs
1 tomato, sliced
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
2 green onions, thinly sliced
shredded lettuce
Directions:
Spread mayonnaise on one side of each slice of toast and cut into small pieces. Arrange toast, mayonnaise side up, in a greased 8-inch square baking dish. Top with cheese slices and bacon. In a skillet, fry eggs over medium heat until completely set. Place over bacon. Top with tomato slices; set aside.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
chopped tomatoes to taste
Bac*Os to taste
toast
Directions:
Mix the first 4 ingredients.
Cut toast into diagonal pieces and dip into the dip mixture.
Taste like bacon, lettuce and tomato sandwich.

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: Blt Pie
Ingredients:
8 slices bacon, fried crisp, crumbled and divided
1/3 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese
1 c. chopped tomato
2/3 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Pet-Ritz pie crust shell
1 egg
2/3 c. Pet evaporated milk
1 tomato, thinly sliced
1/3 c. shredded lettuce
Directions:
Preheat oven and baking sheet to 350°.
In a small bowl, combine half the bacon, cheese, chopped tomatoes, onion and parsley.
Spoon into pie crust.
Beat egg with evaporated milk. Slowly pour over bacon mixture.
Arrange sliced tomato on top of pie.
Bake on preheated baking sheet for 35 minutes (30 minutes for regular crust) or until pie crust has browned or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Let stand for 15 minutes; top with shredded lettuce and remaining bacon.
Serve.
Makes 8 servings (6 for regular crust).

question: How do I make a classic BLT sandwich?
answer:
Title: B.L.T. Sandwich
Ingredients:
4 or 5 slices bacon, fried crisp
2 slices bread
2 slices tomatoes
lettuce as wanted
Directions:
Cover bread with mayonnaise.
Add bacon, tomatoes and lettuce.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Spanish Rice With Turkey
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 medium pepper, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cans tomatoes
1 c. water
4 oz. uncooked rice
3/4 tsp. oregano
salt
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Cook turkey, onions and pepper until done, stirring constantly.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serves 4.
Counts as 3 proteins, vegetable and 1 bread.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey And Rice Dressing
Ingredients:
1 turkey (10 to 12 lb.)
3 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. margarine
2 c. chopped green onions
2 c. diced celery
1 c. chopped bell peppers
1 c. chopped parsley
1 1/2 c. chestnuts, roasted
2 c. Granny Smith apples, diced
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
8 c. mahatma rice, cooked
1 pkg. French's brown gravy mix
Directions:
Remove neck and giblets; place in 3 1/2 cup chicken broth and simmer for 30 minutes.
Reserve broth in a 5 to 8-quart Dutch oven. Melt margarine over medium heat.
Saute onions, celery and peppers. Add parsley, chestnuts, apples, currants, pine nuts, cinnamon, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and Mahatma rice.
Mix thoroughly. In microwave, heat 2 packages of French's brown gravy mix with 2 cups turkey broth for 1 minute, stir and heat another minute.
Add to stuffing mixture and mix well.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey Wild Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground turkey
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. finely chopped carrots
6 c. low salt chicken broth
1/2 c. uncooked wild rice
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. flour
2 c. skim or regular milk
Directions:
Crumble ground turkey into 6-quart saucepan or Dutch oven. Stir in onion and carrots.
Cook over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir in chicken broth, rice, poultry seasoning, pepper and thyme.
Bring to boil and reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 45 to 55 minutes or until tender.
Place flour in a small bowl. Gradually add milk, blending until smooth.
Cook and stir over medium heat until soup bubbles and thickens slightly.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey And Rice Dressing
Ingredients:
1 turkey (10 to 12 lb.)
3 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. margarine
2 c. chopped green onions
2 c. diced celery
1 c. chopped bell peppers
1 c. chopped parsley
1 1/2 c. chestnuts, roasted and halved
1 c. currants
1 c. pine nuts
2 c. Granny Smith apples, diced
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
8 c. Mahatma rice, cooked
2 pkg. French's brown gravy mix
Directions:
Remove neck and giblets; place in 3 1/2 cups chicken broth and simmer for 30 minutes.
Reserve broth.
In a 5 to 8 quart Dutch oven, melt margarine over medium heat.
Saute onions, celery and peppers.
Add parsley, chestnuts, apples, currants, pine nuts, cinnamon, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and Mahatma rice; mix thoroughly.
In microwave heat 2 packages of French's brown gravy mix with 2 cups turkey broth for 1 minute; stir.
Heat another minute.
Add to stuffing mixture and mix well.
Wash turkey and rub inside and out with margarine.
Season with salt and pepper. Fill chest cavity with stuffing.
Plac turkey in large pan.
Bake at 325° for 3 1/2 to 4 hours.

question: What can I make with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Taco Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey or beef
1 chopped onion
1 1/2 c. salsa
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
Directions:
Brown meat and onion in skillet.
Add salsa and tomato sauce; bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve with rice.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Beans-N-Rice That Fill You Up
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped onion (set aside)
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/8 tsp. dried coriander
1/4 tsp. ground red pepper
1 (15 oz.) can black beans, rinsed and drained
chopped tomato (optional)
Directions:
In nonstick pan, heat oil; add 1 cup onion and 1/2 cup green pepper and cook until tender.
Add rice, cumin, red pepper and coriander.
Mix and heat 2 minutes.
Add beans; heat.
Add uncooked onion and tomato if desired.
Approximately 125 calories per 1/2 cup; less than 2 grams of fat.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Easy Black Beans And Yellow Rice(No Fat)
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. long grain white rice
1/2 tsp. ground turmeric
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 (15 oz.) can black beans, drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can whole tomatoes, undrained and chopped
1 tsp. sugar
3/4 tsp. dried Italian seasoning
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. hot sauce
Directions:
Rice:
Combine water, rice and turmeric in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Let stand 5 minutes or until liquid is absorbed.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Portuguese Rice
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen lima beans
5 c. water
2 c. rice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Bring all ingredients to a boil in saucepan.
Lower heat and simmer for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice Surprise
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. rice, cooked
1 can Progresso black beans, drained
1 jar salsa or picante sauce
Directions:
May substitute bean of your choice.

question: What can I cook with beans and rice?
answer:
Title: Rice With Black Beans(20 Minutes)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 (15 oz.) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
2/3 c. water
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1 1/2 c. Minute brown rice, uncooked
Directions:
Heat oil in large skillet.
Add onion and garlic, cook and stir until tender but not browned.
Stir in beans, tomatoes, water and oregano.
Bring to boil.
Stir in rice.
Return to boil. Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Let stand for 5 minutes.
Makes 4 servings.
Recipe can be doubled.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Pasta
Ingredients:
1 lb. pasta
1 stick butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. fresh ginger
1 1/2 Tbsp. yellow mustard seeds
1/3 c. dry-roasted cashews (unsalted)
1 1/2 Tbsp. shredded coconut
1/3 c. chopped cilantro
shrimp
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. fresh ginger
1/3 c. scallions, sliced
1 1/2 Tbsp. lime juice
salt and pepper
lime wedges and cilantro
Directions:
Grate ginger or cut into fine strips.
Heat a large frying pan and add butter, 2 1/2 tablespoons ginger, the mustard seeds and cashews.
Saut for 2 minutes.
Add precooked pasta (use a kind with ridges), coconut and cilantro.
Saut over medium heat until hot.
Set aside; keep warm.
Heat a large frying pan and add oil and 1 1/2 tablespoons ginger.
Saut 30 seconds.
Add shrimp (use large precooked ones), scallions and lime juice.
Saut until hot.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve over hot pasta and garnish with lime wedges and cilantro.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Wine
Ingredients:
12 oz. fresh or frozen shelled shrimp
1 c. onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, crushed (if desired)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (1 c.)
10 oz. dry pasta, cooked (6 c.)
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. snipped fresh parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp if frozen.
In saucepan cook onion in 2 tablespoons butter and olive oil until tender, but not brown. Stir in wine, bouillon granules, basil, garlic (if used), salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and boil gently, uncovered, for 12 to 15 minutes or until liquid is reduced by 2/3.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Vegetables
Ingredients:
olive or salad oil
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
2 green onions, thinly sliced
1 1/2 tsp. grated fresh ginger root
1 garlic clove, minced
salt
2 medium-size carrots, thinly sliced
1 medium yellow pepper, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
2 c. small broccoli florets
3/4 (16 oz.) pkg. bow tie or rotella pasta
1/2 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
About 40 minutes before serving:
In nonstick 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot olive or salad oil, cook shrimp, green onions, grated ginger, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring constantly until shrimp are opaque throughout, about 3 minutes.
With slotted spoon, remove shrimp mixture to bowl.
In dripping remaining in skillet and 1 teaspoon additional hot olive or salad oil, cook carrots, yellow pepper and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring frequently, until vegetables are golden and tender-crisp.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Pasta Medley
Ingredients:
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) margarine
1 clove garlic, minced
12 oz. medium shrimp, cleaned
1 c. half and half
1 c. pea pods, cut in half diagonally
1 red bell pepper, cut into strips
1/4 c. water
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
8 oz. linguine, cooked and drained
1 wedge (4 oz.) parmesan cheese, shredded, divided
Directions:
Melt margarine in large skillet on medium heat. Add garlic; cook and stir until lightly browned. Stir in shrimp, half and half, pea pods, bell pepper, water and crushed red pepper. Simmer 3 to 5 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Pour sauce mixture over hot linguine. Sprinkle with 3/4 c. of cheese; toss to coat. Serve with remaining 1/4 c. cheese. Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with shrimp and pasta?
answer:
Title: Herbed Shrimp And Pasta
Ingredients:
1 lb. unpeeled, medium-size fresh shrimp
4 oz. angel hair pasta (uncooked)
1/2 c. butter
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 c. half and half
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 tsp. chopped fresh dill weed or 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Peel and devein shrimp; set aside. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside; keep warm. Melt butter in a heavy skillet over medium-high heat; add shrimp and garlic. Cook 3 to 5 minutes, stirring constantly; remove shrimp and set aside, reserving garlic and butter in skillet. Add half and half to skillet; bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low and simmer about 15 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally. Add shrimp, parsley and seasonings; stir until blended. Serve over angel hair pasta with steamed or sauteed red, green and yellow pepper strips.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Cream Coconut Icing
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. powdered sugar
3 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
dash of salt
grated rind of 1/4 lemon or orange
1 1/2 c. coconut
Directions:
Cream the butter until soft.
Add sugar alternately with lemon juice.
Add a dash of salt.
Beat until smooth and light.
Add grated rind of lemon.
Spread and sprinkle coconut on top and sides of cake.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Ice Cream
Ingredients:
5 eggs, separated
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
2 c. heavy cream
2 1/2 tsp. vanilla
6 c. whole milk
Directions:
Put egg yolks into a large bowl.
Add sugar and beat until thick.
Beat egg whites and set aside.
Add remaining ingredients (except egg whites) to egg yolk mixture, blending well.
Fold in egg whites.
Pour into ice cream freezer and freeze.
Various fruits such as peaches, strawberries, etc., can be added.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Cream Cheese Icing
Ingredients:
1 small pkg. cream cheese
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 1/2 Tbsp. milk or cream
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Soften cream cheese at room temperature.
Add sugar and liquids and beat until smooth.
Add more sugar or cream to make the consistency to spread.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Ice Cream
Ingredients:
4 eggs, beaten
2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. milk
2 pt. cream
1/2 pt. whipping cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except vanilla in saucepan.
Heat until little beads appear.
Remove from heat and add vanilla.
Mix well and pour into ice cream freezer.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Cream Cheese Icing
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/3 c. dairy sour cream
1 c. confectioners sugar
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter, softened
Directions:
Beat together the cream cheese, sour cream and butter in medium-size bowl until fluffy. Gradually beat in the confectioners sugar until well blended and smooth.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Cheese
Ingredients:
speck of butter
3 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 tsp. or less pepper
1 tsp. baking powder
24 oz. shredded Cheddar (white)
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 small onion
Directions:
In a very large bowl, beat eggs.
Add flour, milk, pepper and baking powder and mix.
Boil spinach and drain well.
Add cheese, spinach and finely chopped onion to bowl.
In pan, melt a little butter.
Wipe excess with paper towel.
Pour mix into 13 x 9 x 2-inch Teflon pan and bake uncovered at 350° for 35 minutes.
Best if covered and refrigerated overnight.
Cut like brownies when cold.
Heat in oven or microwave before serving.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 unbaked pie shell
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. chopped shallots
1/3 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
5 to 6 dashes red pepper sauce
1 c. whipping cream
3 large eggs, beaten
6 strips bacon, fried crisp
4 oz. sliced mushrooms (fresh)
1 (10 oz.) box chopped spinach (frozen), well drained
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
In large bowl, mix grated cheese and flour.
Add shallots, celery, garlic, parsley, red pepper sauce and dry seasonings.
Stir to mix.
Add cream and eggs.
Stir to mix.
Add crumbled bacon, mushrooms and spinach.
Pour into unbaked pie shell and bake 45 to 55 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach-Cheese Squares
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. butter, melted
3 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 lb. Cheddar, shredded
20 oz. frozen spinach, thawed (squeeze out water)
1 Tbsp. or more onion, minced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Bake in large greased rectangular pan at 350° for 35 minutes.
Cool 45 minutes.
Cut into small squares.
Reheat at 325° for 10 to 12 minutes when serving as hors d'oeuvre.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Eggs, Italian-Style
Ingredients:
4 green onions, chopped
1 lb. fresh cooked spinach
2 eggs, beaten
garlic, chopped
olive oil
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute green onions (use blades, too) in a little butter or oleo and olive oil.
Mix spinach (drained) into skillet.
Stir 2 beaten eggs into the mixture and stir until eggs are done.
Top with Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I make with only eggs, spinach, and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggs
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1 c. cream
6 oz. cream cheese
4 c. cubed day old firm white or French bread
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
10 eggs, lightly beaten
4 c. (1 qt.) milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. onion powder
dash of freshly ground pepper
8 to 10 slices cooked bacon, crumbled
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. chopped, peeled tomatoes
sausage (optional)
ham (optional)
green/red pepper (optional)
Directions:
Generously butter a 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Arrange bread cubes in dish and sprinkle with cheese.
Beat together next 5 ingredients with pepper to taste and pour evenly over cheese and bread. Sprinkle with bacon, mushrooms and tomato. Cover and chill overnight.
Preheat oven to 325°.
Bake casserole, uncovered, until set, about 1 hour
(tent with foil if top begins to overbrown).
Makes 12 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. dried chickpeas (garbanzo beans, about 12 oz.)
2 c. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
5 garlic cloves, peeled
1 onion, quartered
1 leek, trimmed and cut into 3 pieces
6 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
Yogurt-Tahini Dip
8 (6-inch) pitas, cut in half
Directions:
Sort and wash chickpeas and place in large bowl. Cover with water to 2 inches above beans. Cover and let stand for 8 hours. Drain beans. Combine chickpeas, cilantro and next 8 ingredients in a food processor until mixture resembles coarse meal. Divide chickpea mixture into 16 equal portions, shaping each into 1/2 inch thick patties. Heat 2 Tbsp. oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add 5 patties and cook 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat procedure twice with remaining oil and patties. Spread 1 Tbsp. Yogurt-Tahini Dip in each pita half. Fill with 1 patty. Serves 8 (2 pita halves each).

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Soy Falafel
Ingredients:
1 cake firm tofu
1/3 c. finely chopped onions
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped fresh Italian parsley
1/2 Tbsp. dark sesame oil
1 Tbsp. tamari soy sauce
ground black pepper to taste
1 or more garlic cloves to taste, minced
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Press and mash the tofu.
Mix with remaining ingredients in a medium bowl.
Form into 1-inch balls. Bake on oiled baking sheet for about 30 minutes, turning occasionally until golden and crusty on the outside.
These make a great sandwich served with sliced fresh tomato in pita pockets with a sauce made of plain yogurt and fresh dill.
(Not a children's favorite!)

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel And Tehina
Ingredients:
8 oz. chickpeas (I use canned)
1/4 tsp. coriander
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. ground red chili pepper
1 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. cracked wheat flour
1 lightly beaten egg
oil for deep frying
Directions:
Drain can of chickpeas.
Mash.
Add next seven ingredients. Mix thoroughly.
Taking a spoonful of the mixture at a time, roll into balls about 1-inch in diameter.
Heat oil and deep-fry falafel until browned.
Drain.
Serve hot on a gyro bread or in a pita bread pocket with tehina on top Tehina recipe follows.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafil Or Taamiyah(Lebanese; International)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fava beans, soaked in water for 18 hours, drained and finely ground with electric grinder
1 1/2 c. chickpeas, soaked in water for 19 hours, drained and finely ground with electric grinder
1 1/2 lb. finely chopped onions
4 c. finely chopped parsley
3 c. finely chopped fresh coriander
1 tsp. ground coriander
1 tsp. crushed garlic
1/4 tsp. cayenne
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. flour
vegetable oil (for frying)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients very well and knead well. Let it stand, covered, for 2 1/2 hours. Let the oil get hot on high heat. Add a dash of baking soda to the falafil with tablespoon water. Mix well. Shape into small circles; pat with the palm of your hands, then fry in oil for 3 minutes on each side or until brown. Drain. Serve with pita bread, chopped parsley, pickles, tahini, chopped tomatoes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade falafel?
answer:
Title: Pork Chop Casserole
Ingredients:
6 to 8 pork chops
1 large pkg. frozen string beans
1 onion, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can crushed tomato
4 small potatoes with skins washed
Directions:
This favorite was discovered on our excursions to Miami art festivals.
Falafel is sold as a street snack, a pita sandwich and is called a "dig dag.".
The sabras claim it as part of their Oriental heritage, and in Israel, falafel is an ingredient of many dishes.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff 1
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. plain mustard
1 lb. beef or tenderloin, cut 1/4-inch thick
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. minced onion
1 can mushrooms
1 clove garlic
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can beef bouillon
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. dill
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Salt and pepper meat.
Put a little mustard on meat and meat tenderizer also.
Let stay in refrigerator for a few hours.
Saute onion and mushrooms in garlic and butter.
Brown meat in drippings. Add soup and other ingredients.
Cook over low heat about 30 minutes until meat is tender.
Add sour cream last and garnish with parsley.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
3 lb. top round, cut in 2-inch square pieces
3 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 c. finely chopped onion
4 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. flour
2 c. beef broth
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1 tsp. dill seed
2 c. sour cream
Directions:
In a large skillet, brown meat in oil. Remove. Cook onion in drippings. Add mushrooms and cook. Blend flour with 1/4 cup broth and add to pan. Add beef broth gradually, stirring constantly. Add salt, pepper, dill weed and dill seed.
Place ingredients in crock-pot. Cook on low for 6 to 8 hours. Add sour cream just before serving over noodles or rice.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground round
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 (8 oz.) can mushrooms, undrained
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1 c. sour cream
approximately 2 c. cooked noodles
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Brown meat and onions.
Pour off any grease.
Add flour, salt, pepper and mushrooms.
Cook 5 minutes over medium heat, uncovered. Add soup and simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes.
Stir in sour cream and cooked noodles.
(Adjust quantity to personal taste.) Sprinkle with parsley.
