Makes 4 generous servings.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
3 lb. beef tenderloin, sirloin tip or top round, cut into strips
2 Tbsp. butter
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. Kitchen Bouquet or Gravy Master
2 garlic cloves, crushed
1/2 c. flour or Wondra
rice or noodles
2 c. beef broth or beef bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. paprika
1 c. ketchup
2 large onions, sliced
1 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. cold water
1 c. sour cream
2 Tbsp. butter and oil
Directions:
Melt butter and oil in large skillet.
Saute beef in batches over high heat, browning thoroughly.
Add more butter and oil if necessary.
Add salt, paprika, pepper, Kitchen Bouquet, broth and ketchup.
Simmer until meat is tender (about 20 minutes).
Combine flour and water; add to meat mixture; stir until thick.
In a separate skillet melt butter and oil.
Saute onions, garlic and mushrooms until brown (about 20 minutes over high heat).
Add vegetables to meat.
Simmer 5 minutes.
Add sour cream and serve over rice or noodles.

question: How do I make a simple beef stroganoff?
answer:
Title: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients:
2 lb. filet of beef
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
3 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. meat extract paste
1 Tbsp. catsup
1 (8 oz.) container sour cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can beef bouillon (undiluted)
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. snipped fresh dill or 1/4 tsp. dried dill
1 1/2 c. cooked wild rice, tossed with 4 c. cooked white rice
fresh dill or parsley, snipped
Directions:
Trim fat from beef.
Cut filet crosswise into 1/2-inch thick slices.
Cut each slice across grain into 1/2-inch wide strips. Slowly heat large, heavy skillet.
In it, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Add just enough beef strips to cover skillet bottom. Over high heat, sear quickly on all sides.
With tongs, remove beef as it browns.
(It should be browned outside, rare inside.) Brown rest of beef; set aside.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. lentils
6 c. water
2 whole carrots, chopped
2 sticks celery, chopped
1 small onion, chopped
1 garlic clove, minced
dash of hot pepper
2 cubes beef bouillon
1 bay leaf
2 heaping Tbsp. tomato sauce
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 1/2 c. raw pasta
oil
Directions:
Saute onion in oil until soft, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add water and the rest of ingredients, except pasta. Bring to a boil. Cook 30 minutes on simmer covered.
Cook pasta in a separate pot and then add to lentils.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Creole Style Lentils
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped carrots
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
few drops hot pepper sauce
1 c. lentils, cooked and drained
hot cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Cook carrots, celery and onion in hot margarine in medium size saucepan until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, sugar, pepper, pepper sauce and lentils.
Cover; simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.
Makes about 5 1/2 cups.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup Ii
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. brown lentils
8 c. beef stock
1 onion, chopped
1 carrot, diced
1 celery stalk, diced
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley
1 tsp. thyme
1 lb. smoked ham hock
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. shallots, minced
2 Tbsp. garlic, minced
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. coriander
1 c. cream
salt and pepper
Directions:
In soup pot, combine lentils, beef stock, onion, carrots, celery, cloves, pepper, parsley, thyme and ham hock.
Bring to boil; turn down to simmer.
Cook, covered, 35 minutes, or until lentils are tender.
Remove ham hock and set aside.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Smok-Y-Links
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils
3 c. water
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt (optional)
1/4 lb. bacon (optional)
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 clove minced garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 (1 lb.) can crushed tomatoes
1 (12 oz.) pkg. Smok-Y-Links
1 bay leaf
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine lentils, parsley, water, salt and bay leaf.
Simmer until tender (1 hour).
Cut bacon into cubes and cook crisp.
Remove; drain off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings or use 2 tablespoons of oil.
Saute celery, onion and garlic until tender.
Stir in flour and tomatoes and heat to boiling.
Drain lentils (if needed) and discard bay leaf.
Cut sausages into bite size pieces and add to mixture with lentils and bacon.
Simmer 15 minutes to blend flavors.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 celery stalk, diced
1/2 medium onion, peeled and finely chopped
1 carrot, pared and diced
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 garlic clove, smashed and chopped
1 c. lentils
6 c. hot chicken stock
1/4 c. long grain rice, rinsed and drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat butter in saucepan. When hot, add celery and onion; cover and cook 3 minutes over medium heat. Add carrot, spices and garlic; cover and continue cooking for 3 minutes. Add lentils and chicken stock; season well and mix. Bring to a boil. Cook soup, partially covered, 2 hours over low heat. Sixteen minutes before end of cooking, add rice and finish cooking. Serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, torn
1 bell pepper, chopped
1 onion (red is best), chopped
1 c. celery, sliced
1 pkg. frozen garden peas
1 c. bacon bits
1 can water chestnuts
1 c. grated cheese
1 c. sour cream
1 c. sugar
1 c. salad dressing
Directions:
Layer first eight ingredients as listed in a large bowl. Combine last three items and pour over cheese.
Cover tightly and set in refrigerator overnight.
Stir first before serving.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Potato Salad
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. new potatoes, cut in 1/2-inch cubes (6 c.)
1 tsp. salt
3/4 c. mayonnaise
3/4 c. sour cream
3/4 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Pare potatoes.
Cover with water.
Add 1 teaspoon salt.
Cook, covered, for 10 to 15 minutes.
Drain.
Cool and chill.
Blend together mayonnaise, sour cream, celery and onion.
Add bacon.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Gently fold in potatoes.
Chill.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Potato Salad
Ingredients:
2 lb. all-purpose potatoes
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sour cream
1 Tbsp. horseradish
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
3 bacon slices, cooked and crumbled
2 green onions
Directions:
Peel
potatoes; place in large saucepan in salted water and cook
until tender.
Drain and cool completely.
Cut into 1-inch cubes.
In
a
large
bowl mix mayonnaise, sour cream, horseradish,
parsley,
salt and pepper until smooth.
Stir in potatoes and other ingredients.
Mix well.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
2 lettuces (red and iceberg)
1 cucumber, sliced
1 avocado, sliced
1 bunch green onions, sliced
2 cans mandarin oranges, drained
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. orange juice
1/2 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Prepare first 5 ingredients in salad bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients and pour over the first combination.
Serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
3 to 4 medium tomatoes
1 small to medium onion (preferably Vidalia)
1 to 2 green peppers
any other veggies (optional)
1/3 c. canola oil
1/3 c. balsamic vinegar
1/8 c. sugar or to taste
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. garlic
1 Tbsp. ketchup
Directions:
In medium bowl mix canola oil, balsamic vinegar, sugar, pepper, garlic and ketchup.
Cut vegetables into bite size pieces and stir into mixture.
Serves 4 to 6. Best when chilled.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: 3 Bean Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
4 Tbsp. chili powder
1 small hot chili pepper, chopped fine
8 oz. baby carrots, chopped extra fine
2 c. rough chopped onions
1 c. rough chopped bell pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery
8 oz. tofu crumbles
salt and pepper to taste
1 (29 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 Tbsp. dark molasses or sorghum
2 (16 oz.) cans small pink beans
1 (16 oz.) can pinto beans
1 (16 oz.) can garbanzo beans
Directions:
Heat olive oil in cooking pot on medium high.
Add to hot oil the garlic, chili powder, chili pepper, carrots, onions, bell pepper, celery, tofu crumbles and salt to taste.
Cook until tender (approximately 10 minutes).
Add tomato and molasses.
Cook on low heat until all ingredients are blended together (approximately 5 minutes).
Drain all beans and add to mixture. Continue to cook on low heat until beans are heated through (10 to 15 minutes).

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Mystic Tofu
Ingredients:
2 boxes extra firm tofu
1 large onion, sliced
2 medium tomatoes, chopped (optional)
1/2 tsp. cumin powder
1 tsp. curry powder
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
2 Tbsp. chopped cilantro leaves
2 Tbsp. poppy seed
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
1 onion
1 large green pepper
15 to 20 fresh mushrooms
oregano, basil, salt and pepper (sprinkle)
3 cans chunk white tuna, water drained
1 small bag frozen peas
1 box Ronzoni seashells
1 1/2 large Velveeta cheese
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
In bowl, add soup, onion, spices and milk and mix.
Add sliced mushrooms and diced green pepper; stir.
Boil noodles to only 3/4 cooked.
Drain and add to mixture, then add tuna and frozen peas, stirring gently into even chunks.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Balls
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 onion, finely chopped
1 large carrot, grated
1 green pepper, finely chopped
1 1/2 tsp. dried basil
3/4 tsp. dried oregano
2 large eggs
1 c. bread crumbs
3/4 c. walnuts, ground
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 1/2 tsp. sesame oil
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
black pepper to taste
3 cakes tofu, pressed
Directions:
Press water out of tofu, placing plates or weighted cutting board on top for 1/2 hour.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Veg Enchiladas
Ingredients:
1 bunch chives, chopped
2 c. fresh corn
1 red bell pepper, sliced
1 jalapeno, minced
1 tsp. cumin seed
1 lb. tofu, crumbled
10 (8-inch) corn tortillas
Directions:
Saute all ingredients (except tortillas) until tender, then wrap in corn tortillas.
Pour peanut butter sauce over enchiladas and top with cheese if desired.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
5 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. warm water
Directions:
Put yeast, warm water and sugar in a small bowl.
In a large bowl, add the flour, salt/yeast mixture and warm water.
Mix together, then on a floured surface, knead for a few minutes.
Put dough into a well-greased bowl.
Cover with wax paper.
Let rise for 1 hour, then spread dough onto a well-greased pizza pan or cookie sheet.
Let rise another 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° or until crust is brown on bottom.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
2 pkg. yeast
pinch of sugar
pinch of salt
1 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Add water and oil.
Mix and knead until you are able to roll into a smooth ball.
Place in warm place with towel over it.
Let rise 30 minutes.
Punch down and let set for 4 minutes.
Roll out and place on pan and let rise for 15 minutes.
Add toppings (sauce, cheese, meats, veggies, etc.). Place pizza in cold oven, set temperature to 500° and bake for 15 to 17 minutes, or longer depending on your oven!
(This recipe works best on "Air-Pans.")

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water (105~ to 115~)
1 pkg. active dry yeast
2 Tbsp. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salad oil
Directions:
Mix yeast in 1 cup of warm water, then add your flour, salt and shortening.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey And Rice Dressing
Ingredients:
1 turkey (10 to 12 lb.)
3 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. margarine
2 c. chopped green onions
2 c. diced celery
1 c. chopped bell peppers
1 c. chopped parsley
1 1/2 c. chestnuts, roasted and halved
1 c. currants
1 c. pine nuts
2 c. Granny Smith apples, diced
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
8 c. Mahatma rice, cooked
2 pkg. French's brown gravy mix
Directions:
Remove neck and giblets; place in 3 1/2 cups chicken broth and simmer for 30 minutes.
Reserve broth.
In a 5 to 8 quart Dutch oven, melt margarine over medium heat.
Saute onions, celery and peppers.
Add parsley, chestnuts, apples, currants, pine nuts, cinnamon, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and Mahatma rice; mix thoroughly.
In microwave heat 2 packages of French's brown gravy mix with 2 cups turkey broth for 1 minute; stir.
Heat another minute.
Add to stuffing mixture and mix well.
Wash turkey and rub inside and out with margarine.
Season with salt and pepper. Fill chest cavity with stuffing.
Plac turkey in large pan.
Bake at 325° for 3 1/2 to 4 hours.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey Wild Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground turkey
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. finely chopped carrots
6 c. low salt chicken broth
1/2 c. uncooked wild rice
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. flour
2 c. skim or regular milk
Directions:
Crumble ground turkey into 6-quart saucepan or Dutch oven. Stir in onion and carrots.
Cook over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Stir in chicken broth, rice, poultry seasoning, pepper and thyme.
Bring to boil and reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 45 to 55 minutes or until tender.
Place flour in a small bowl. Gradually add milk, blending until smooth.
Cook and stir over medium heat until soup bubbles and thickens slightly.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Spanish Rice With Turkey
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 medium pepper, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cans tomatoes
1 c. water
4 oz. uncooked rice
3/4 tsp. oregano
salt
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Cook turkey, onions and pepper until done, stirring constantly.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serves 4.
Counts as 3 proteins, vegetable and 1 bread.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Turkey And Rice Dressing
Ingredients:
1 turkey (10 to 12 lb.)
3 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. margarine
2 c. chopped green onions
2 c. diced celery
1 c. chopped bell peppers
1 c. chopped parsley
1 1/2 c. chestnuts, roasted
2 c. Granny Smith apples, diced
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
8 c. mahatma rice, cooked
1 pkg. French's brown gravy mix
Directions:
Remove neck and giblets; place in 3 1/2 cup chicken broth and simmer for 30 minutes.
Reserve broth in a 5 to 8-quart Dutch oven. Melt margarine over medium heat.
Saute onions, celery and peppers. Add parsley, chestnuts, apples, currants, pine nuts, cinnamon, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and Mahatma rice.
Mix thoroughly. In microwave, heat 2 packages of French's brown gravy mix with 2 cups turkey broth for 1 minute, stir and heat another minute.
Add to stuffing mixture and mix well.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice(Lo-Cal)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground turkey
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped pepper
1 1/2 c. cold cooked rice
3 eggs, scrambled
Directions:
Brown turkey, onion and pepper until tender.
Add rice and stir-fry.
Top with scrambled egg.
Serves 3.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 c. peeled, cubed potatoes
2 c. water
1 c. diced celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. parsley flakes
2 c. creamed corn
2 c. whole kernel corn
2 to 3 c. rich soy or tofu milk
Directions:
Place all ingredients, except the last three, in a large kettle and simmer over low heat until potatoes are almost done.
Stir in corn and continue simmering for 10 minutes, stirring frequently. Add milk to desired consistency.
Turn heat off and let stand for 15 to 20 minutes.
Remove bay leaf before serving.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
3 small potatoes, pared and diced into 1/2-inch cubes
2 c. boiling water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 c. milk
1/2 c. half and half
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. paprika
salt and pepper
1 3/4 c. fresh corn kernels (approximately 3 ears) or 1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen whole kernel corn
2 Tbsp. sliced fresh or canned pimiento
Directions:
Cook potatoes in boiling water and salt about 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.
Meanwhile, saute the onion in butter until tender.
When potatoes are cooked, stir in onion, corn, pimiento, milk, half and half, brown sugar, paprika, salt and pepper to taste.
Simmer 20 to 30 minutes longer until soup is slightly thickened.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola oil
1 small onion
2 Tbsp. flour
2 1/2 c. corn
2 c. milk
1 c. light cream or evaporated milk
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
3/4 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Heat oil.
Saute onion until soft.
Stir in flour.
Add corn. Gradually stir in milk.
Continue to stir until thick.
Add sugar, salt, white pepper, thyme and cream or evaporated milk.
Blend well.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon, cut in 1/2-inch pieces
1 red pepper, diced
1 (17 oz.) can creamed corn
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 large onion, chopped
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
5 c. milk
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In medium saucepot, saute bacon until lightly brown.
Remove bacon and drain.
Saute onion and red pepper.
Cook 3 to 5 minutes, stirring often.
Stir in flour.
Gradually stir in milk, corn, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper.
Bring just to boiling point over low heat; simmer one minute, stirring constantly.
Sprinkle chowder with sauteed bacon pieces.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Creamy Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
3 tsp. butter or bacon drippings
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
1/4 c. finely chopped green peppers
3 tsp. flour
3 medium onions, chopped
5 medium potatoes, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1 (17 oz.) can cream-style corn
black pepper to taste
2 c. milk
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, cook vegetables until tender.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Simmer about 10 minutes, stirring once or twice.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Company Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
10 potatoes, boiled
salt and pepper
1 (16 oz.) cream cheese, softened
2 eggs, beaten lightly
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
2 Tbsp. minced chives and/or 1 small onion, grated
1 (3 1/2 oz.) can French fried onions
Directions:
Drain potatoes.
Beat until smooth.
Add salt and pepper, then cream cheese and beat again.
Blend in onion, eggs, flour and parsley and beat again.
Turn into buttered casserole dish. Spread crushed onion over top and bake at 325°
for 30 minutes.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 to 8 potatoes
1/2 stick butter
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
6 to 8 potatoes, grated
1 toe garlic, mashed
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. oleo or chicken fat *
1 onion, grated
1 tsp. salt
4 eggs
2 bacon strips, fried crisp and crumbled
6 medium potatoes
1/2 c. butter
1 c. hot milk
1/3 c. Cheddar cheese
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped chives
1 Tbsp. shortening
4 c. diced apples (1 large apple makes 1 c.)
2 eggs
1 c. chopped nuts
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. baking soda
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. salt
2 c. flour, sifted
Directions:
Peel, core and dice apples.
Place in a bowl and add eggs and mix.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Pour into a greased and floured pan and bake 1 hour and 15 minutes or until done in a 325° oven.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
8 to 10 potatoes
salt and pepper to taste
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
2 eggs, beaten lightly
2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. parsley
1 small onion, grated
1 (3 1/2 oz.) can French fried onions
Directions:
Boil the potatoes. Drain and mash with mixer. Season to taste. Add cream cheese and beat thoroughly.
Blend in eggs, parsley and onion; beat until fluffy.
Place in buttered casserole. Bake, uncovered, at 325° for 25 minutes.
Place French fried onions on top and bake 5 minutes more.
May be prepared in advance and refrigerated.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Fried Mashed Potato Patties
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. leftover mashed potatoes
2 Tbsp. milk
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/4 c. flour
Directions:
Mash cold potatoes until soft; add milk; mix well.
Add egg, salt, pepper and flour.
Mix until well blended.
Fry in oil until golden brown on both sides.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Grits
Ingredients:
4 servings instant grits
1 can chicken broth
1 Tbsp. dry wine
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. ground red pepper
1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, prepared according to pkg. directions
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese
1 1/4 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1 1/4 c. water
2 tsp. dried thyme
1 1/2 tsp. chicken bouillon
1 1/3 lb. potatoes, cut in 1/4-inch slices
Directions:
In large saute pan, combine all ingredients except potatoes; bring to a boil.
Add potatoes; cover and simmer 20 to 25 minutes until tender, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Easy Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. chopped scallions
1/2 c. finely chopped carrots
1 clove garlic finely chopped
6 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. small pasta or rice (I use orzo)
10 c. washed, steamed, coarsely chopped spinach (1 -1/2 lbs.)
Directions:
In a large saucepan, melt 2 1/2 Tbsp. butter.
Add the carrots, scallions and clove of gallic; saute until the scallions are soft. Bring the chicken broth to a boil, stir in rice or pasta.
Simmer 5 to 10 minutes.
Just before serving, stir the spinach into the hot liquid.
Cook for two to three minutes until spinach is done.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Top with parmesan cheese and/or croutons if desired.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 can water chestnuts, chopped and drained
2 envelopes Herb-Ox instant chicken broth
Directions:
Drain spinach through colander until no water remains (press using food handler gloves).
Add remaining ingredients; mix well. Chill.
Serve with cut up vegetables, crackers, party size breads or bagel chips.
Kids love it!

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Pate
Ingredients:
3 lb. fresh spinach
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. wine or cider vinegar
3 eggs
1/2 c. skim milk
1/8 tsp. nutmeg, grated
4 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. Gruyere cheese
3/4 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
sea salt to taste
pepper
Directions:
Wash and stem spinach.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter a loaf pan.
Puree spinach or chop fine.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Fried Spinach Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients:
1 (10-oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed, drained
1/4 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg (optional)
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
6 chicken breasts, skinless, boneless
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Place breast between heavy plastic wrap and flatten to 1/4-inch thickness.
Place 1/2 teaspoon of spinach mixture on each flattened breast.
Fold in sides and ends and secure with toothpicks. Combine egg and milk, mix well.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture, then dip in egg mixture, and dredge in flour mixture.
Pour oil to 1 inch in skillet and fry chicken in hot oil about 15 minutes or until golden brown.
May also dip in egg wash and roll in cornflake crumbs (with seasonings) and bake.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Deep Fried Turkey
Ingredients:
1 wild turkey breast
vegetable oil to fill fish cooker
Directions:
Heat oil in cooker until paper match laying in oil on the bottom of the cooker bursts into flames.
Slowly lower breast into cooker and cook until outside is dark brown.
Unbelievably simple - unbelievably good!

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast
1/2 c. melted butter
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. minced onions
1 tsp. dried sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except turkey, in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Place turkey breast in a 13 x 9-inch oiled baking dish.
Pour 1/2 the mixture over the turkey; cover with foil and bake about an hour.
Pour the other 1/2 over the turkey and continue baking another hour.
Check for doneness.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Turkey Breast Tenderloins
Ingredients:
1 pkg. crackers, crushed
1 egg
1 Tbsp. water
Season-All spice to taste
California style garlic powder to taste
boneless turkey breasts (depending on servings)
olive or vegetable oil
Directions:
In a bowl, mix cracker crumbs, garlic powder and Season-All. In separate bowl, beat egg and water with a fork.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Easy Roast Turkey Breast(Moist And Delicious)
Ingredients:
1 (6 to 7 lb.) turkey breast
1 Tbsp. salad oil
3/4 tsp. rubbed sage
3/4 tsp. dried thyme
salt (optional)
3/4 tsp. pepper
browning and seasoning sauce (optional)
all-purpose flour
1 medium onion, halved and sliced
Directions:
You will need 1 large oven cooking bag (20 x 14-inch) with tie.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast (6 to 7 lb.)
2 stalks celery
1 large onion, cut
salt and pepper
Directions:
Thaw turkey breast in refrigerator.
Wash and dry well.
Rub outside well with salt and pepper.
Also sprinkle some on the inside.
Fill cavity with chunks of celery and onion.
Wrap breast good and tight with aluminum foil.
Put in crock-pot.
Add 1 cup of water.
Turn to high for about an hour.
Reduce to low and cook all night.
You will have lots of good broth and the turkey breast will be nice and juicy and tender.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Ground Lamb Curry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground lamb
2 Tbsp. flour
1 large onion, sliced thinly
1/2 to 2 tsp. curry powder (depends on taste)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water or stock
1/2 c. raisins
juice and grated peel of 1 lemon
2 whole cloves
Directions:
Brown meat in large skillet; pour off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings. Push meat to one side. Add flour and brown slightly, stirring constantly. Add all remaining ingredients and mix in the meat. Cover and simmer about 15 minutes or until onions are tender. Remove cloves before serving. Serve over hot rice. Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Lamb Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
5 eggs, well beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. sugar
2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. mace
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cream the butter. Add sugar. Add eggs.
Beat on high speed 3 minutes. Sift, measure and sift flour, salt, mace and baking powder together. Sift again. Add dry ingredients to creamed mixture in 3 installments.
Beat 1 minute after each addition. Add lemon juice. Beat 1/2 minute.
Pour into bottom and face of lamb. Place on cookie sheet in oven at 325° for 1 hour.
Remove from oven.
Lift lid off.
Usually done at this point.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Jack'S Lamb Stew
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. boneless lamb, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter
1 onion, quartered
1 1/2 c. red wine
1 lb. carrots
1 1/4 lb. small new potatoes
parsley for garnish
3 cloves garlic, crushed
12 medium yellow onions, peeled
12 medium whole mushrooms
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/4 tsp. dried thyme
2 sprigs parsley
1 large bay leaf
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and pepper. Coat lamb evenly with flour mixture. Reserve leftover flour. Brown lamb well in hot butter in Dutch oven, along with quartered onion and garlic. Remove lamb when done. Add yellow onions, mushrooms and sugar to drippings in pan. Cook, covered, for 5 minutes or until browned.
Return lamb to Dutch oven. Add thyme, parsley and bay leaf. Toss with drippings to coat evenly.
Stir in 2 cups water and 1 cup wine. Place a large sheet of waxed paper over top of Dutch oven.
Place lid on top of paper, letting it hang over. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 40 minutes.
(To keep from diluting sauce, pour off any liquid collecting on top of paper during cooking.)

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Leg Of Lamb Mosaic
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied (with fell)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, minced or 1 tsp. dried, crumbled
2 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 lb. fresh spinach leaves, stemmed
4 medium carrots, cooked
4 whole pimientos, drained
1/2 medium onion, thinly sliced
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 medium celery stalks, chopped
2 medium carrots, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. dry vermouth
1 c. chicken stock
Directions:
Position rack in center of oven and preheat to 325°.
Pat meat dry.
Place on surface, fell side down with long edge toward you. Sprinkle with rosemary and garlic.
Cover with layer of spinach leaves.
Arrange 4 carrots in 2 rows across center of meat. Surround carrots with pimientos.
Scatter onion slices atop carrots.
Sprinkle with parsley, 2 teaspoons salt, 3/4 teaspoon pepper and cayenne.
Starting at short end, roll meat up tightly. Tie securely with kitchen twine at 2-inch intervals.
Place on rack in roasting pan.
Add celery, 2 chopped carrots and onion to pan.
Pour vermouth over meat.
Season with salt and pepper. Roast until thermometer inserted in thickest part of meat registers 130° (for medium rare), about 1 1/2 hours, adding up to 1/2 cup water to pan if necessary to keep vegetables from sticking.
Transfer meat to cutting board; let stand 15 minutes.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Lamb In Mustard Sauce
Ingredients:
1 tsp. ground rosemary
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove mashed garlic
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
Directions:
Split 1 hogie roll.
Remove about 2 tablespoons of bread crumbs from middle of roll.
Cook 2 slices bacon crisp.
Paint inside of roll with mayonnaise.
Place bacon on roll, then 4 oysters (raw) on top of bacon.
Roll and seal in aluminum foil. Bake in a 350° oven for 20 minutes.
Slice in thirds and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Tomato Pasta
Ingredients:
12 medium Roma tomatoes
3 to 6 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. olive oil
1 lb. dry spaghetti, cooked according to directions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. fresh whole or 2 Tbsp. basil leaves
Directions:
Cut tomatoes in half lengthwise; set cut side up in a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.
Mix garlic with 1/3 cup parsley and 2 tablespoons olive oil; pat mixture over cut side of tomatoes.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons of olive oil over tomatoes.
Bake at 425° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pesto Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg prepared pesto
1/2 c. miracle whip
3 c. rotini cooked and drained
1/2 c. pitted ripe olive slices
3 Tbsp. chopped sun dried tomatoes in oil drained
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix pesto and salad dressing until well blended.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Refrigerate.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
4 large ripe tomatoes, cut in wedges
1/2 c. Feta cheese, crumbled
1/2 c. basil leaves, cut in strips
3 cloves minced garlic
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
8 oz. pasta
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Add remaining ingredients and stir.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Italian Pasta
Ingredients:
1 c. Hellmann's real or light mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. twist macaroni, cooked and drained
1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover.
Chill.
Makes 3 cups.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Italian Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. twist macaroni, cooked and drained
1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. sliced ripe olive
Directions:
Can also add sliced artichoke hearts.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Roasted Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
2 red onions
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
2 Tbsp. garlic olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
Directions:
Make cauliflower into 1-1/2 inch florets.
Cut red onions into 8 wedges.
Heat oven to 475°.
In non-stick roasting pan, mix cauliflower, onions, oil, salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper.
Roast 15 minutes. Toss and roast 5 to 10 minutes until lightly charcoal and tender. Transfer to platter, top with 1/4 tsp. pepper, parsley and cheese.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. mustard
1/2 c. shredded cheese
Directions:
Place cauliflower in 1 1/2-quart glass dish.
Add water. Cover and microwave for 8 to 10 minutes.
Combine mayonnaise, mustard and onion.
Spoon sauce on top of cauliflower and sprinkle with cheese.
Roast for 2 minutes.
Let stand 2 minutes; serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Medley
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower
1 (10 oz.) pkg. Brussels sprouts
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen creamed onions
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 c. shredded Cheddar
1 (2 oz.) jar pimento
1/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
Directions:
Wash cauliflower.
Break into flowerets.
Cook covered in small amount of boiling salted water, about 10 minutes.
Cook Brussels sprouts and onions according to directions.
Combine all vegetables in lightly greased 9 x 13 dish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
1 med head of cauliflower
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
1/8 tsp. pepper
8 oz. herb seasoned stuffing mix
1 c. water
1/2 c. melted butter
Directions:
Break califlower into small pieces.
Cook until just tender, drain an place in a 2 Qt. casserole dish.
3 Tbsp.
butter in pan and stir in flour to make a paste.
Blend in milk and slowly bring to a boil and simmer until thickened.
Add salt and pepper and pour over cauliflower.
Mix together stuffing, water and melted butter and spoon over top of casserole.
Bake 350° for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Tangy Mustard Cauliflower(Very Good)
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower
2 Tbsp. water
1/2 c. salad dressing
1 tsp. finely chopped onion
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Place cauliflower in 1 1/2-quart glass casserole.
Add water. Cover with plastic wrap.
Microwave on High for 8 or 9 minutes or until tender and crisp.
Combine salad dressing, onion and mustard in bowl.
Spoon over top of cauliflower.
Sprinkle with cheese. Microwave on roast for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes to heat topping and melt cheese.
Let stand 2 minutes before serving.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Scratch Italian Sauce
Ingredients:
2 tomatoes per person
1/2 green pepper per person, chopped
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. basil
2 green onions per person, chopped
1 clove garlic
1 Tbsp. oregano
salt to taste
Directions:
Peel and seed tomatoes. Chop up and set aside.
Saute green onions, green peppers and garlic.
Pour in tomatoes and spices. Simmer on low for at least 1 1/2 hours, covered.
Serve on pasta or grilled chicken.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. paprika
3 tsp. salt
3 tsp. dry mustard
3/4 tsp. chili powder
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
6 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
3 c. tomato juice
3/4 c. chili sauce
3/4 c. vinegar
1 1/2 c. onions, chopped
Directions:
Mix
all
ingredients thoroughly.
Boil for 15 minutes. Pour into
sterilized
jars to within 1/2 inch of top.
Put on cap; screw
band firmly tight.
Process in boiling water bath 10 minutes.
Yields 4 half pints.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Texas Bbq Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 stick of butter
1 small onion (chopped)
1 clove garlic (minced)
1 tsp. celery salt
1 cup catsup
1/2 cup vinegar
1 1/2 cups water
1/4 cup worcestershire sauce
3 bay leaves
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chili powder
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add onion, garlic and celery.
Cook until onion is tender.
Stir in water, catsup, vinegar, worcestershire sauce, bay leaves and pepper.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove a little of the sauce and mix with chili powder, then add to the rest of the sauce.
Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour before serving.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. hot water
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
dash of red pepper
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
few drops of Tabasco
1 tsp. chopped onion
clove of garlic
Directions:
Mix ingredients and heat to boiling; remove garlic.
Dip meats in sauce before broiling or roasting or use to baste during roasting.
Approximate yield:
2 cups sauce.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: White Bbq Sauce For Chicken
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or oleo
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
few grains cayenne pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
2/3 c. water or stock
2 Tbsp. chopped pickle
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. vinegar
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
Directions:
Melt oleo.
Combine
dry
ingredients
and add to oleo. Stir until well blended.
Remove from heat.
Combine remaining ingredients and gradually stir into butter mixture.
Return to heat.
Stir until thick and smooth.
Enough for 2 chickens.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 orange
1 apple
2 bananas
1 pear
1 grapefruit
1 c. mandarin oranges
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 c. white raisins
1/2 c. white seedless grapes
3 c. colored miniature marshmallows
1 small can pineapple chunks
1 c. purple seedless grapes
1/2 c. red cherries
1/2 c. green cherries
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sour cream
2 tsp. soft cream cheese
10 oz. Cool Whip
Directions:
Mix everything well.
Put in a covered bowl overnight in refrigerator.
Mix with fruit before serving.
Chop all fruit and sprinkle with Fruit-Fresh.
Mix well in a large bowl.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Spiritual Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. love
1 c. joy
1 c. peace
1 c. patience
1 c. kindness
1 c. goodness
1 c. faithfulness
1 c. gentleness
self-control
unmeasured outpouring of the Holy Spirit
Directions:
Blend all ingredients together.
Continually pour Holy Spirit generously as you stir.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Frozen Fruit Salad(Make Ahead Recipe)
Ingredients:
1/3 c. coarsely chopped walnuts (1 1/2 oz.)
3 Tbsp. finely chopped maraschino cherries, drained on paper towel to avoid pink tint in mixture
1 (9 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
1 medium banana, diced
2 c. sour cream
3/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix together sour cream, sugar, lemon juice and salt.
Blend in pineapple, walnuts and cherries.
Mix in banana.
Line 10 (2 1/2-inch) muffin pan wells with paper baking cups.
Spoon mixture into cups and freeze until firm.
Remove papers before serving on lettuce.
Let stand at room temperature for a short while to soften slightly or pour entire mixture into mold and freeze (the night before at least).

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fresh Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
2 oranges, peeled and sectioned
2 apples, cubed
2 bananas, sliced
2 peaches, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Combine fruit and set aside.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruited Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
4 c. chicken, cooked and chopped
2 c. celery, diced
2 c. seedless grapes, halved
1 can pineapple tidbits, drained
1 can mandarin oranges, drained
1 c. slivered almonds, toasted
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sour cream
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine chicken, celery, grapes, pineapple and mandarin oranges; toss well.
Combine mayonnaise, sour cream, salt and pepper.
Add to chicken mixture, stirring well.
Chill several hours before serving.
Sprinkle almonds on top.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Couscous With Chickpeas And Feta Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can chicken broth or vegetable broth
1 c. packaged couscous (1 box)
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 c. sliced scallions (with tops)
4 oz. crumbled Feta
1 (2 1/4 oz.) can drained ripe olives
2/3 c. Italian vinaigrette dressing
Directions:
In medium saucepan, bring broth to boil.
Stir in couscous. Remove from heat; cover and let stand for 5 minutes.
Transfer couscous to large bowl and fluff with fork.
Let stand 5 minutes; fluff again. mix in chickpeas, scallions, cheese and olives.
Pour dressing over mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Serve on bed of lettuce.
Serves 6. Enjoy.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Braised Vegetables With Couscous
Ingredients:
4 tsp. vegetable oil
2 c. sliced onions
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced zucchini
1 lb. rinsed, drained, canned chickpeas
1 sq. Knox vegetable bouillon
1/2 tsp. cumin
4 oz. uncooked couscous
Directions:
In nonstick Dutch oven, heat oil.
Add onions, carrots, celery and zucchini.
Cook over high heat, stirring frequently until onions are lightly browned.
Add 3 cups water, chickpeas, bouillon, cumin and dash of pepper.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until carrots are tender.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Spicy Vegetable Couscous
Ingredients:
1 c. each chopped zucchini and summer squash
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove chopped garlic
1 c. chickpeas
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley (fresh)
2 tsp. curry
1 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes
1 lb. firm tofu (optional)*
3 c. cooked couscous
Directions:
Saute vegetables (and tofu, if desired) over medium heat until just tender.
Add chickpeas and spices, except for parsley.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, pared
2 tsp. salt
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives, cubed
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. heavy cream
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Cook potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt in boiling water until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes until smooth; add cream cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon salt.
Mix until smooth.
Gradually add cream; mix well after each addition. Put in greased baking dish.
(Bake at once or cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.)
Dot top of potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake in 325° oven 30 minutes. Increase heat to 375° and bake 30 minutes more.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 cloves crushed garlic
4 medium-sized all-purpose potatoes, peeled and thin sliced
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. plain low-fat yogurt
Directions:
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, bring 3 cups water to a boil. Add garlic, potatoes and bay leaf.
Cook, partially covered, over moderate heat until potatoes are "fork tender" (reserving 3 tablespoons cooking water).
Discard bay leaf, transfer potatoes to a large mixing bowl.
Add margarine, buttermilk and yogurt.
Beat with a mixer, then add just enough of the reserved water to make the potatoes creamy.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 to 10 medium potatoes (can also use 6 to 8)
1 (8 oz.) Philadelphia cream cheese
1 egg
onions to taste (about 1 Tbsp.), chopped finely
Directions:
Peel potatoes.
Cook and mash.
Add cream cheese, egg and onions.
Bake until fluffy or about 30 minutes at 350°.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Baked Fish On Grill
Ingredients:
2 medium to large fish fillets
1 small onion
1 lemon
garlic salt
black pepper
butter
Directions:
Place 2 to 3 pats of butter under each fillet on aluminum foil.
Place 2 to 3 pats on top of each fillet.
Slice onion and pop out rings.
Lay on top.
Slice lemon in thin slices.
Place on top of onion.
Sprinkle with garlic salt and pepper to taste. Roll foil around and seal.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes (depending on size of fillets), turning once.
This may also be baked in a preheated oven.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Lemon Broiled Fish
Ingredients:
3/4 c. fresh lemon juice
3/4 c. unsalted (sweet) butter, melted
1 tsp. sage
3 lb. fresh fish (fillet of sole, flounder, haddock, halibut, salmon, trout, whiting)
Directions:
Combine lemon juice, butter and sage.
Pour over fish. Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
4 fish fillets
1/2 c. margarine
1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt
1/4 Tbsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
light vegetable oil cooking spray
1/4 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
4 tsp. blackening seasoning
4 (4 oz.) catfish fillets
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 400°.
Spray the vegetable oil over the baking sheet 3 times to coat.
Put the cornmeal, thyme and basil on a large plate and mix well.
Sprinkle 1/8 teaspoon of the garlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon of the lemon pepper and 1 teaspoon of the blackening seasoning on each of the catfish fillets.
Coat the fillets thoroughly with the cornmeal mixture and transfer them to the prepared baking sheet.
Dust each fillet with 1/8 teaspoon of the paprika.
Coat the catfish lightly with the cooking spray. Place the baking sheet on the bottom shelf of the oven.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Reduce the heat to 350° and bake for about 5 minutes more, until the crust is golden and the fish flakes easily.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Light 'N Lemony Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen sole, halibut or other firm fish
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 c. lemon juice
4 green onions, sliced thin
1/2 tsp. white pepper
4 Tbsp. sherry
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. seasoned salt
Directions:
Arrange fish fillets in single layer in a baking dish.
Combine remaining ingredients, except onions, and pour over fish.
Bake at 425° for 15 minutes, basting occasionally.
Remove fish and garnish with green onions.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Catfish Cajun-Style
Ingredients:
1 tsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
1 tsp. white pepper
1 tsp. Creole seasoning
1 tsp. blackened fish seasoning
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
4 catfish fillets (1 1/3 lb.)
vegetable cooking spray
lemon wedges and celery tops (garnish)
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in a small bowl. Sprinkle lemon juice and seasoning mixture on both sides of fish.
Spray a fish basket with cooking spray.
Place fish in basket. Grill fish, covered, over medium coals (400°) for 7 to 10 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Remove fish from basket; place on a serving platter.
Garnish, if desired. Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
1 large ripe avocado
8 hard-cooked eggs, cut in half
1/2 c. softened cream cheese
pinch of salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Mash yolks of eggs with fork.
Add the cheese, 3/4 avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stuff the egg whites.
Slice remaining avocado thinly.
Put thin slice of avocado on top of eggs.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Salza
Ingredients:
2 ripe California avocados, peeled and diced
1/2 c. canned corn (uncooked)
1 (2.2 oz.) can sliced black olives, drained
1/4 c. diced red pepper
2 Tbsp. toasted, slivered almonds, chopped
2 Tbsp. diced white onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1 tsp. oregano
3 Tbsp. extra virgin olive oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients, except avocado. Store in sealed container at room temperature for 6 to 8 hours. Before serving, add diced avocados.
Serve with chicken or your favorite grilled meat.
Makes 3 cups.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Loaf Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
3/4 c. shortening, creamed
3 eggs
2 c. flour
3 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. allspice
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. pureed avocado
3/4 c. buttermilk
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
3/4 c. raisins
Directions:
Combine sugar and shortening, beating until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Fold into sugar mixture.
Add pureed avocado and buttermilk.
Stir in vanilla, walnuts and raisins. Let batter stand for 10 minutes.
Grease glass loaf pan with additional shortening.
Line greased pan with waxed paper.
Fill half full with batter.
Microwave on High for 8 minutes, turning quarter turn every 2 minutes.
Cool for a few minutes; remove to rack to complete cooling.
Repeat with remaining batter for second loaf.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Salad(Yields 12 Servings)
Ingredients:
6 c. cubed chicken, cooked
4 c. thinly sliced celery
2 c. toasted croutons
2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. toasted, slivered or chopped almonds
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 small jar pimento
4 tsp. grated onion
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Melt 1 stick of butter in pan and brown 2 cups of croutons in oven.
Combine all ingredients except cheese and 2 cups croutons. Pile chicken mixture in 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Sprinkle with cheese and 2 cups croutons.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes in 425° oven. Cut into squares before serving.
Enjoy!

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stack-Up Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. cubed cooked chicken
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
pepper to taste
2 to 3 c. shredded lettuce
1 large cucumber, sliced
1 c. macaroni, cooked and drained
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 c. mayo or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. milk
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tomatoes, cut into wedges
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
In mixing bowl, combine chicken, curry, salt, paprika and pepper.
Toss to mix well.
In a clear glass salad bowl, layer lettuce, coated chicken, cucumber, macaroni and green pepper.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. diced celery
3 c. cubed cooked chicken
1/2 c. small seedless grapes
1/2 c. toasted pecans, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. flaked coconut
1/4 c. whipping cream, whipped
3/4 c. salad dressing or mayonnaise
1/4 tsp. salt
few grains pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine the first 5 ingredients, tossing together lightly with a fork.
Gradually blend the salad dressing and seasonings into whipped cream.
Pour over salad ingredients in bowl; fork-toss to mix lightly but thoroughly.
Cover; chill thoroughly.
Serve on chilled, crisp greens, or use to fill center of a tomato.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad With Fruit
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken breasts, cooked and chopped
3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
2 stalks celery, finely chopped
1/4 c. sweet pickle relish
1/4 c. green olives, chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. pecans or walnuts, chopped
3/4 c. seedless grapes, sliced
1 Golden Delicious apple, peeled, cored and diced
1 c. Miracle Whip or mayonnaise (more or less)
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except dressing. Mix thoroughly. Add enough of the Miracle Whip or mayonnaise to properly moisten salad. May need more or less than 1 cup.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad(Number Of Servings: 4)
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. cubed cooked chicken
1 c. thinly sliced celery
1 c. halved green grapes
2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine chicken, celery, grapes and parsley. Combine the next 7 ingredients; mix well. Pour over chicken mixture and toss. Chill for at least 1 hour. Before serving, sprinkle with sliced almonds.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. cumin
Directions:
Brown the ground beef and onions. Drain. Add other ingredients and simmer over low heat until most of the liquid is absorbed. Easily increased for more than 1 pound.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Meat Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Brown beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain excess fat.
Stir in remaining ingredients; simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Makes filling for 8 taco shells.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. water
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix or use Taco Seasoning Mix recipe
1 can pinto, red, or chili beans, drained
1 can whole kernel corn, drained
Directions:
Brown ground beef in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess grease.
Add water and taco seasoning mix and beans. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, add corn stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Picadillo (Filling For Tacos)
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. diced onion
2 or 3 cloves garlic, minced (if desired)
1 large tomato
1 or 2 potatoes, diced
1 or 2 carrots, diced
1/2 c. peas
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. fresh cilantro, chopped (available in Cub Foods produce)
1 or 2 jalapeno peppers, diced
Directions:
Cook ground beef until browned.
Drain off excess fat.
Add onion, garlic and peppers.
Cook until tender.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cover and simmer for 20 to 25 minutes.
Serve as a filling in corn or flour tortillas that have been warmed on a grill or in the microwave.
Serve with hot sauce.
Especially good with frijoles (beans).

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Meat-Filled Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 envelope taco seasoning mix
3/4 c. water
12 taco shells
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. Colby or Cheddar cheese, shredded
shredded lettuce
taco sauce
Directions:
Cook beef, onion and garlic until done.
Drain off fat.
Stir in taco seasoning mix and water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, arrange taco shells on a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
Warm in a 350° oven for 5 to 10 minutes.
Stuff each taco shell with meat, tomatoes, cheese, lettuce and top with taco sauce.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1 (11 1/8 oz.) can Italian tomato soup
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4-1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Combine soup, water, vinegar, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, and pepper sauce.
Spoon mixture over chops. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes or until chops are done.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops And Dressing
Ingredients:
4 pork chops (boneless)
3 c. soft bread cubes
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. melted butter
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 c. water
Directions:
Brown chops on both sides. Mix together bread cubes, poultry seasoning, onion, water and melted butter. Place chops in a baking dish and place a mound of stuffing on each chop. Blend cream of mushroom soup and water. Pour over chops and stuffing. Bake, uncovered, at 350° about 1 1/4 hours.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter
1 c. coarse cracker crumbs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 egg, beaten
2 Tbsp. milk or more
6 pork chops
Directions:
Combine crumbs, salt and pepper. In another bowl, blend egg and milk.
Coat chops with crumbs.
Dip in egg mixture and again in crumbs.
Place butter in pan.
Melt.
Place chops in a 13 x 9-inch pan and bake at 325° for 30 minutes.
Turn chops and bake 30 minutes more.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. salt
pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. rosemary, crushed
1 can French fried onion rings
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Coat chops in mixture of flour, salt and pepper.
Brown chops in skillet.
Place chops in baking dish.
Combine soup, water, ginger and rosemary; pour over chops.
Sprinkle with half of the onion rings.
Cover.
Bake at 350° for 50 minutes.
Uncover; sprinkle with remaining onion rings and continue baking 10 minutes.
Remove meat to platter.
Blend sour cream into soup mixture; heat through.
Serve meat and gravy with fluffy rice.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 pork chops (1 1/2 lb.)
1/3 c. finely diced celery
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 cans tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease shallow baking dish.
Brown chops in greased frying pan.
Place in baking dish.
Sprinkle with celery, brown sugar, lemon juice and seasonings.
Pour tomato sauce and water over chops.
Cover and bake in moderate 350° oven for 1 1/4 hours until chops are done.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 c. water or chicken stock
8 oz. dried lentils
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil over medium heat until onions are tender. Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice. Simmer about 5 more minutes. Serves 4.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
8 c. chicken stock or 48 oz. can stock
2 cloves chopped garlic
1 onion, chopped
3/4 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. lentils
1 bunch spinach
3 Tbsp. lemon juice or vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Wash and pick over lentils.
Place in boiling water and cook 2 minutes.
Cover; let sit 1 hour and drain.
(This removes gas.)

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Good Carrots
Ingredients:
12 carrots, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. celery salt
3 c. buttered bread crumbs or Pepperidge Farm stuffing
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese slices
Directions:
Cook carrots.
Saute onion in butter.
Stir in flour, salt, dry mustard and milk.
Add pepper and celery salt.
In 2-quart casserole, arrange layers of carrots and cheese, ending with carrots.
Pour on sauce.
Top with crumbs.
Bake 20 minutes or until hot throughout.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Corned Beef And Cabbage
Ingredients:
corned beef
cabbage
potato
carrot
Directions:
Boil all ingredients together until cooked and serve.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Freezer Slaw
Ingredients:
1 large head of cabbage (shred)
1 or 2 carrots (shred)
1 or 2 green peppers (shred)
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix and let stand 1 hour.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Company Carrots
Ingredients:
12 carrots, cut into 3-inch long strips and cooked until tender (save water)
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. horseradish
1/4 c. reserved carrot water
salt and pepper (lightly)
1/2 c. cracker or bread crumbs (Ritz taste good)
1/2 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Combine carrots, mayonnaise, onion, carrot water and horseradish.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Top with crumbs and cheese.
Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Herbed Carrot Potato Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. snipped chives
1 tsp. Worcestershire
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 medium carrots (2 c.), thinly bias sliced
8 medium potatoes, cooked, peeled and sliced (7 c.)
1 c. thinly bias sliced celery
1/2 c. pitted ripe olives, sliced
leaf lettuce (optional)
Directions:
Combine mayonnaise or salad dressing, sour cream, lemon juice, chives, Worcestershire, salt, dill weed, mustard and pepper until well combined.
In a medium pan, heat small amount of water to boiling; add carrots and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes.
Drain. Rinse with cold water; drain again.
In a large bowl, gently toss together the sliced potatoes, sliced carrots, celery and olives. Add sour cream mixture.
Gently toss to coat well.
Cover and chill several hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: So Easy Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. margarine, softened
1/3 c. oil
1 Tbsp. milk
1 to 2 tsp. almond extract
1 egg
1 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, beat 3/4 cup sugar, margarine, oil, milk, almond extract and egg until light and fluffy.
Stir in flour, baking powder and salt; blend well.
Spread evenly into an ungreased 15 x 10 x 1-inch baking pan; sprinkle with 1 tablespoon sugar.
Bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown.
Cool 5 minutes.
Cut diagonally into bars.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: "Sugar Cookies"
Ingredients:
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. butter or margarine
1 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cream of tartar
5 1/4 c. plain flour
Directions:
Cream sugars and butter or margarine.
Add eggs; stir in oil and vanilla.
Combine dry ingredients.
Add to mixture.
Blend well.
Refrigerate overnight.
Form into small balls; place on greased cookie sheet.
Use small glass dipped in white sugar to press balls flat.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
3 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
2/3 c. margarine
2 eggs
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. milk
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Take a large open field, a half dozen children.
Add 2 or 3 puppies.
Take a generous pinch of brook and pebbles.
Mix all together and put into the field.
Sprinkle with flowers.
Spread a blue sky over all and bake in sunshine.
When brown, set away to cool in a bathtub!

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: World'S Best Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
5 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. powdered sugar
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. margarine
2 tsp. almond extract
1 c. oil
2 eggs
Directions:
Mix flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt together and set aside.
Mix together sugars, margarine and almond extract. Stir in oil and eggs.
Mix with electric mixer until well mixed. Add flour mixture one cup at a time.
Use electric mixer until mixture becomes very thick, finish mixing with a wooden spoon. Chill dough.
Roll chilled dough into walnut-sized balls.
Place on cookie sheet.
Press with fork or a tumbler dipped in sugar.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
1 c. shortening
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. granulated sugar
2 eggs
4 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Cream butter, shortening and both sugars.
Add eggs and beat well.
Blend in flour and soda; mix in vanilla.
Roll in small balls.
Sprinkle with sugar and place on greased cookie sheet. Flatten with glass or refrigerate until firm (overnight) and roll out and cut with cutters.
Color may be added.
Best when soft (before refrigerating).
Bake at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers (any color)
1 tsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium squash, diced (yellow)
1 medium zucchini, diced
1/2 c. onion, diced
2 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. tomato juice (no salt added)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°. Cut peppers in half lengthwise. Remove stems, rubs and seeds. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, swirling to cover bottom. Saut crookneck squash, zucchini, onion and garlic until zucchini is tender-crisp (about 4 minutes). Don't overcook. In a medium bowl, combine rice and cheese. Gently stir into skillet. Stuff pepper halves with vegetable mixture. Place in a 9-inch casserole dish. Carefully pour tomato sauce around peppers. Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Serves 8.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
2 lb. hamburger meat
2 to 3 green onions
1/2 regular onion
2 chopped tomatoes
parsley, salt and pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 tsp. garlic
2 to 3 c. cooked, seasoned rice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. tomato sauce
1/2 c. white cooking wine
1/2 c. water or chicken stock
Directions:
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
6 large bell peppers
2 c. cooked rice
1 lb. ground meat
1 can tomatoes and green chilies
1/2 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut tops off and center out of peppers.
Put peppers in boiling water; cook until tender.
Saute meat and pepper tops with salt.
Drain off excess oil.
Mix well the meat, rice, 1/2 of liquid from tomatoes and soups.
If you want it hotter, add rest of tomato juice.
Place peppers in pan and stuff with mixture. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes, or until bubbling hot.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger meat
1 small onion, chopped
6 green peppers
1/2 c. uncooked rice
tomatoes
tomato sauce
1/4 c. water
salt, pepper, oregano, basil, parsley and onion salt
cheese
Directions:
Place a little oil in skillet. Brown meat with onion; drain. Add salt, pepper and other seasonings
(use the seasonings you like). Add rice, tomatoes, sauce and water; cook on low heat for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. Wash and cut off tops of peppers. Take out seeds. Put in pan and cover with water and bring to a boil. When a knife goes through peppers and they are tender, remove from water and set aside. Put mixture in peppers. (Peppers can be left whole and cut in half.) Sprinkle cheese on top to melt (whatever kind you like).
These can be put in freezer for later when you need something fast. Serve with mashed potatoes and vegetable.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
