Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked rice
1/2 roll Prosage
1/2 c. sliced, cooked mushrooms
3 eggs
French fried onions (optional)
1/2 c. diced celery
1/2 c. diced onion
4 bell peppers
salt and McKay's chick style to taste
Directions:
Saute Prosage, celery and onion until transparent.
Mix in rice and eggs.
Remove seeds and stem from peppers and parboil them for 5 minutes.
Set peppers in a greased casserole and fill with rice mixture.
Don't crowd peppers as they will swell some in baking. If there is some rice mix left over, it can be placed in between peppers.
Top with French fried onion rings that come in a can.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. light or dark corn syrup
1/4 c. light cream or top milk
1 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. peanut butter
Directions:
Combine first three ingredients and cook 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and add butter.
Cool.
Stir in peanut butter

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Sauce
Ingredients:
2/3 c. (1 small can) evaporated milk
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/4 c. light corn syrup
Directions:
Add milk to peanut butter, a small amount at a time, blending until smooth. Stir in corn syrup. Makes 1 1/3 cups.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce With Grilled Chicken
Ingredients:
1 1/2-inch piece ginger root, peeled and minced
1/2 head garlic, peeled and crushed
2 lb. creamy peanut butter
1/2 c. chicken stock
1/4 c. light soy sauce
2 Tbsp. chili oil
lime juice to taste
1/4 c. honey
1/4 c. chopped cilantro leaves
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in mixing bowl; mix well.
Season to taste.
Store in a sealed container until ready to use.
Keeps for several weeks in refrigerator.
Makes 2 quarts.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. cocoa
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/3 c. milk
Directions:
Mix sugar, flour and cocoa in a saucepan.
Add butter, peanut butter and milk; heat to boiling.
Serve warm over cake in dish. Serves 8.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Szechuan Peanut Sauce
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. unhomogenized peanut butter
1/2 ??? plain nonfat yogurt
2 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. low sodium soy sauce
1/4 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 garlic clove, finely chopped
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Refrigerate in tightly covered container.
Yields 1 cup.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Spanish-Style Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 lb. sweet or spicy Italian sausage or chorizo, cut into 1/2-inch slices
1 whole chicken breast, boned, skinned and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 medium green pepper, chopped
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 2/3 c. hot water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground thyme
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. frozen green peas
1 1/2 c. instant rice
2 medium tomatoes, diced
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet; add sausage and brown well, about 5 minutes.
Drain fat.
Add chicken, onion and green pepper and cook 5 minutes longer.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Sausage
Ingredients:
3 c. water
4 1/2 c. rolled oats
1 c. water
1 Tbsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. dill seed
2 tsp. cumin
2 tsp. marjoram
1 tsp. oregano
2 tsp. garlic powder
2 Tbsp. sage
2 tsp. cayenne
1/4 c. sunflower seeds
2 tsp. thyme
2 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. nutritional yeast
Directions:
Bring 3 cups water to a boil.
Blend remaining ingredients, except oats, until smooth.
Add to the 3 cups of boiling water, then add oats.
Cook for 1 minute, stirring.
Shape into patties or links.
Bake on a nonstick cookie sheet at 350°.
Cook patties 30 minutes on one side, 20 minutes on the other.
Links or meatballs, cook for 35 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Sausage Gumbo
Ingredients:
1/2 c. high grade oil
1 c. flour
Directions:
Put oil in thick iron pot over medium heat.
When hot, stir in flour and continue to stir until a deep brown color, about 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Sausage Soup Micaele
Ingredients:
1/2 c. coarsely chopped carrots
1/2 c. minced celery
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter
3 c. leeks, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
2 c. shredded cabbage
2 qt. chicken stock
5 Tbsp. flour
2 c. potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch cubes
1/2 tsp. marjoram
2 c. polish kielbasa, skinned and thinly sliced (3/4 pound)
salt and pepper to taste
minced parsley, garnish
minced fresh dill, garnish
Directions:
In a large kettle or dutch oven, saute carrots and celery in 1/4 c. (1/2 stick) butter until vegetables are softened.
Add leeks and cabbage and saute 3 minutes.
Stir in chicken stock, bring to a boil and simmer 15 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Sausage Patties
Ingredients:
1 lb. pork shoulder, cut into small cubes
1 lb. veal stew meat, cut into small cubes
2/3 c. cracker meal
1 egg
2 tsp. milk
1/2 tsp. salt or to taste
1 tsp. dried rosemary
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
1/2 tsp. dried sage
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
1/4 tsp. dried red pepper flakes
1/4 c. parsley leaves
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
In food processor fitted with metal blade, process pork and veal until very finely chopped.
Add cracker meal, egg, milk, seasonings and parsley leaves; process until well combined.
Shape into 2 1/2 to 3-inch patties.
In medium skillet, heat butter or margarine and oil over moderately high heat.
Fry patties in batches without crowding until golden brown and all pink is gone, about 3 to 4 minutes on each side.
Drain on paper towels.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves coarsely chopped garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
freshly squeezed lemon
Directions:
Cut off stems from sprouts and remove outer yellow layer.
Cut small x in bottom of each.
Rinse in cold water; drain and pat dry.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen Brussels sprouts
water
4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. sour cream
salt to taste
Louisiana hot sauce or ground cayenne pepper to taste
Directions:
If using fresh sprouts, rinse well and cut off any discolored leaves.
With a paring knife, cut a "plus"
sign in the stem end to insure even cooking.
Place the sprouts in a large saucepan and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and continue boiling for about 10 minutes or until the stem side is tender when pierced with a knife.
Drain and set the sprouts aside.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Better Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. Brussels sprouts
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 cloves garlic
1 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Cut off stem and "X" bottom of each sprout.
Over low heat, melt the butter with olive oil in a large pot.
Add garlic; cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Add sprouts; toss with butter mixture.
Add chicken broth, salt and pepper.
Cover; cook for 10 to 15 minutes over low.
Do not overcook.
Drain; return to pot.
Before serving, toss with melted butter and parsley.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Company Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
4 bacon strips, diced
1 doz. Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh chives
1 carrot, thinly sliced
10 stuffed green olives, sliced
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/3 c. chicken broth or dry white wine
1 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
Directions:
In a skillet, fry bacon just until cooked.
Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons drippings.
Add remaining ingredients; cook and stir over medium-high heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until Brussels sprouts are crisp-tender.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Cream And Garlic
Ingredients:
3 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cross cut in base
1/4 cup unsalted butter
2 medium garlic cloves, minced
1 cup whipping cream
1 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again.
(Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.)
Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until soft, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add Brussels sprouts, cream, salt and pepper and cook until cream thickens enough to coat Brussels sprouts, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
Serve hot. Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 1/3 c. warm water (105~ to 115~)
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
3 1/2 to 4 c. unsifted all-purpose flour
1 egg
1 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. coarse salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Grease 2 large baking sheets.
In a large bowl, sprinkle yeast over warm water.
Stir with rubber spatula until well blended and yeast is dissolved.
Water temperature should be between 105° and 115°.
If water is too hot, will kill yeast.
With a wooden spoon, gradually stir in sugar, salt and enough flour (about 3 1/2 cups) until a soft and slightly sticky dough forms.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 1/2 c. lukewarm water
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
4 c. flour (approximately)
1 egg
coarse salt
Directions:
In large bowl, soften yeast in water.
Add salt and sugar. Mix in flour and knead to make a soft, smooth dough.
Do not let rise.
Cut into long thin pieces and make into pretzel shape.
Put on cookie sheet covered with foil and dusted with flour.
Brush pretzels with beaten egg and cover with coarse salt.
Bake at 400° for 15 minutes, or until light brown.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1/8 c. hot tap water
1/3 c. brown sugar
1 1/3 c. warm water
approximately 5 c. flour
baking soda
Kosher salt
Directions:
In a large bowl place 1/8 cup hot water from tap.
Add yeast and stir until dissolved.
Add warm water and brown sugar.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flour until dough does not stick to sides of bowl.
Place dough on a floured surface and knead until smooth. Pinch off dough the size of a golf ball and roll into a rope approximately 10 inches long.
Form into shape of pretzel and place on a floured surface.
Prepare cookie sheets sprayed with Pam. Fill frying pan with water.
For every cup of water add 1 tablespoon of baking soda.
Bring water to a slow boil.
Place pretzels into slowly boiling water for approximately 30 seconds. Place pretzels on cookie sheet and salt with Kosher salt.
Bake at 475° just until golden brown.
Pretzels are best if eaten right away.
They can be frozen after the frying pan step and baked from frozen at a later date.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
2 (1/4 oz. each) pkg. active dry yeast
2 c. warm water (110~ to 115~)
1/2 c. sugar
2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
1 egg
6 1/2 to 7 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 egg yolk
2 Tbsp. water
coarse salt (optional)
Directions:
In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.
Add sugar, salt, butter and egg.
Stir in 3 cups of flour; mix until smooth. Add enough additional flour to make a stiff dough.
Cover bowl tightly with foil; refrigerate for 2 to 24 hours.
Punch dough down and divide in half.
On a lightly floured surface, cut each half into 16 equal pieces.
Roll each piece into a 20-inch rope. Shape into the traditional pretzel shape and place on a greased baking sheet.
In a small bowl, combine egg yolk and water; brush over the pretzels.
Sprinkle with salt if desired.
Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 25 minutes.
Bake at 400° for 15 minutes or until brown.
Yield:
32 pretzels.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. warm water
2 1/2 to 3 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 egg white
1 tsp. each salt and water
Directions:
Beat egg white with 1 teaspoon each salt and water.
Combine remaining ingredients.
Cover, let rise in a warm place until doubled, 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Punch down dough; divide into 12 equal balls.
Roll each out with palms of hands on floured surface to form 18 inch long ropes.
Twist into pretzel shape, tucking ends under.
Place on greased baking sheets.
Let rise, uncovered (until puffy), 20 to 25 minutes.
Brush lightly with egg white mixture.
Sprinkle with caraway seed or coarse salt.
Bake at 425° until well browned, 12 to 15 minutes.
Good served warm with cheese sauce.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant From The Border
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
4 slices bacon, chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut into chunks
1 can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant-Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion, chopped
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
2 cloves garlic
1 medium eggplant, peeled and diced
3 zucchini, diced
3 carrots, diced
2 stalks celery, diced
8 large tomatoes, peeled and quartered
4 c. beef stock
1 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. elbow macaroni
Directions:
Saute onion, ground beef and garlic in olive oil in a large stockpot for 5 minutes.
Stir eggplant into mixture and cook 3 minutes.
Add zucchini, carrots, celery, tomatoes, beef stock, oregano, basil, salt, sugar and pepper.
Simmer, uncovered, for 1 to 2 hours.
Add macaroni and cook 20 minutes more.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
2 eggplants
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, sliced
Season-All seasoned salt to taste
1 c. Pepperidge Farm dressing mix bread crumbs
1 c. Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese
2 c. cooked tomatoes, chopped fine
1 green pepper, chopped
Directions:
Slice eggplant 1/4 inch thick, peel.
Soak in salt water for 30 minutes (about 2 tablespoons salt in large bowl).
Put a saucer on top to immerse eggplant in water.
Brown ground beef, when almost done add green pepper and onion.
Season with seasoned salt, when pepper and onion are done drain meat mixture.
Add tomatoes and heat meat mixture.
Drain eggplant, fry in hot oil until brown. Drain, put a little meat mixture in bottom of casserole.
Add layer of eggplant, a layer of meat mixture, 1/4 cup bread crumbs, 1/4 cup Mozzarella and 2 tablespoons Cheddar.
Layer eggplant, meat, bread crumbs and cheeses until all is used.
Sprinkle bread crumbs on top.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 40 minutes or until done.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 eggplant
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/4 stick margarine
1 onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 c. Italian rice, cooked
1/3 c. seasoned bread crumbs
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. parsley
1/3 lb. grated Romano cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.
Cook in boiling salt water. Drain well.
Mash eggplant down with a fork.
Brown ground beef in butter with spices, onion and green pepper.
Stir in eggplant and cooked rice.
Spoon into lightly greased Pyrex casserole. Sprinkle with bread crumbs and grated Romano cheese.
Cover and bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Main Course
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 large onion
1 carrot
1 green pepper
1 stalk celery
1/2 lb. mushrooms
1 medium eggplant
1/2 jar spaghetti sauce
Italian seasoning
Mozzarella cheese
grated cheese
Directions:
Saute ground beef until it is nearly cooked.
Slice veggies except for eggplant.
If eggplant is tender and fresh, leave skin on and cut in cubes.
(If not, peel it.)
Spray a casserole dish with Pam.
Combine veggies, meat, Italian seasoning and some of the grated cheese; pour into casserole dish.
Do not add Mozzarella yet.
When your casserole is cooked, 350° for about 1 to 1 1/4 hours, sprinkle with grated cheese and top with Mozzarella.
The heat from the food will melt the cheese, also good without meat sauce.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 medium onion, diced
1 medium green pepper, diced
1 small clove garlic, minced
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
4 medium zucchini (2 lb.), cut in 1 1/4-inch slices
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. basil
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese, grated
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet over medium heat in hot oil, cook onion, green pepper and garlic until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add tomatoes with liquid and next 5 ingredients.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until zucchini are tender-crisp, about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to break up tomatoes.
When zucchini are done, sprinkle evenly with cheese. Cover and simmer for about 3 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini-Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 large onion, chopped (1 c.)
1 clove garlic, minced
1 lb. zucchini, trimmed and chopped
1/4 c. olive oil
2 large ripe tomatoes, peeled and chopped
2 tsp. leaf basil, crumbled
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
dash of sugar
Directions:
Saute onion, garlic and zucchini in oil in a medium saucepan until soft; stir in tomatoes, basil, salt, pepper and sugar.
Heat to bubbling; simmer 30 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly. Serve over fettucelle or spaghetti.
Yield:
3 cups.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Baked Zucchini
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini, sliced thin
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 green pepper, chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 tsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
pepper to taste
8 oz. tomato sauce
Directions:
Simmer all ingredients together for 1/2 hour.
Layer in casserole dish with shredded Mozzarella cheese and cooked bacon (any amount).
Bake at 350° until cheese melts, approximately 15 minutes.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini, sliced
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 medium tomatoes, cut in wedges
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
3 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Place zucchini in 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with half of seasonings.
Layer tomatoes and onion over zucchini.
Sprinkle with remaining seasonings.
Top with cheese; dot with butter. Cover.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Saute
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
3 medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped
1/2 tsp. each: salt and dried basil
1/4 tsp. each: sugar and oregano
dash of pepper
1/4 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 lb. zucchini, unpeeled and sliced
Directions:
Saute onion in oil in a frypan until soft.
Mix in garlic, tomatoes, salt, basil, sugar, oregano, pepper and chicken broth. Bring to a boil, lower heat and simmer 20 minutes, covered.
At the end of 20 minutes, uncover.
Mix in zucchini; over medium heat, cook until tomato sauce is reduced and thickened, about 10 to 15 minutes.
Salt to taste and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 can chick peas, drained (reserve liquid to add if needed)
2 Tbsp. Tahini sesame paste
drizzle of olive oil
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. coriander
1 clove garlic, crushed
salt
juice from 1/2 of lemon
Directions:
Place all ingredients in food processor.
Process until well blended.
Serve with pita chips, celery, and carrot sticks.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2/3 c. white sesame seed
3/4 oz. garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
19 oz. can garbanzo beans
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. sugar
water (as needed)
pinch of cayenne (as needed)
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley (as needed)
Directions:
Process sesame seed several minutes until consistency of coarse peanut butter.
Add garlic cloves, their oil and lemon juice. Blend, then add drained garbanzos.
Add salt, cumin and sugar, then process until smooth.
Add very little water for sandwich spread, a bit more for dip.
Add a dash of cayenne pepper, if you like heat. Before serving, add chopped parsley for color and flavor.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzos (chickpeas)
1/2 c. tahini paste
3 to 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 to 4 Tbsp. water
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
pinch of coriander
salt to taste
pita bread, warmed and cut into triangles
Directions:
Mince garlic in food processor.
Add garbanzos, tahini, lemon juice, water, olive oil, salt and cumin.
Blend until smooth.
Add lemon juice or water if too thick.
Transfer to serving dish and garnish with olives, chopped red onion and chopped tomato.
Use pita triangles for dipping.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dried chickpeas
3 Tbsp. garlic, crushed
1 Tbsp. tahini (look at Greek market)
3 Tbsp. olive oil
salt to taste
juice of 6 lemons
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Cook the chickpeas with salt for 20 minutes in the pressure cooker (or until peas are soft).
Drain chickpeas.
Combine with other ingredients in blender.
Blend until creamy.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. (15 oz. can) cooked chickpeas, drained, reserve liquid
1/4 c. tahini (sesame paste)
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 large cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
water if needed
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 c. scallions
dash of cayenne
Directions:
In blender (in batches) or in food processor, process chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice until mixture reaches consistency of coarse paste; use as much of reserved pea liquid or water as needed.
Add garlic, coriander, cumin, paprika and cayenne and process again.
Transfer to a bowl and add scallions. Cover and chill one hour before serving the dip.
Add parsley as garnish.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
2 to 3 ripe bananas, mashed
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Cream butter.
Gradually add sugar, medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Beat after each egg.
Stir in bananas, vanilla and cinnamon.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients.
Gradually add to creamed mixture.
Beat until blended.
Stir in chips and walnuts. Spoon batter into loaf pan (greased).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Shield with foil after 1 hour.
Test with toothpick until comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan; cool completely.
Yields 1 loaf.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. baking soda
4 Tbsp. sour cream
1 c. banana, mashed
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chocolate chips
Directions:
Cream butter, sugar; add eggs, baking soda and sour cream. Beat well.
Add rest of ingredients.
Mix well.
Spray 9 x 3-inch pan with Pam.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until toothpick is dry.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. flour, unsifted
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. mashed ripe bananas (about 3 small ones)
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 eggs
1 c. Hershey's mini semi-sweet chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Lightly grease the bottom only of a 9 1/4 x 5 1/4 x 2 3/4-inch loaf pan.
Set aside.
In large mixing bowl combine all ingredients except small chocolate chips and walnuts; blend well on medium speed.
Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Bake at 350° for 60 to 65 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool 10 minutes; remove from pan.
Cool completely.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. shortening or oil
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
3/4 c. mashed ripe bananas
1 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
3/4 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 bag chocolate chips
Directions:
Cream shortening or oil and sugar until fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each.
Stir in banana.
Sift together dry ingredients; add to banana mixture and chocolate chips, mix well.
Pour into greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread With Chocolate Chips
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oleo
2 eggs
2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1/4 c. chocolate chips
1/4 c. maraschino cherries
1 c. sugar
2 bananas, mashed
1 tsp. flour
1/4 c. nuts
1 tsp. oil
Directions:
Mix all ingredients. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. whole tiny new potatoes (20 to 24)
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced, or 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place peeled potatoes in a greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine the margarine, water, garlic, salt and pepper.
Drizzle over potatoes.
Toss to coat.
Bake, covered, at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes, stirring once.
Uncover; bake 20 minutes more or until the potatoes are tender and slightly browned.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Garlic Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. red potatoes (3 to 4)
6 large garlic cloves, unpeeled and flattened
2 Tbsp. olive oil (any oil will do)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and then into 3 wedges per half.
Combine all ingredients in bowl; mix well.
Bake in shallow baking pan for 30 to 35 minutes or until potatoes are light brown and tender, turning occasionally.
Serve potatoes hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Potatoes With Garlic And Rosemary(Makes About 3 Cups)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 to 5 cloves garlic, smashed
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh rosemary
2 lb. Yukon gold and/or red skinned potatoes (unpeeled), cut into large chunks
coarse sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450° with rack in lower third.
Bring 6 quarts salted water to a boil in a large saucepan.
Heat oil, garlic and rosemary on a large baking sheet (with sides) on stove top over medium-low heat.
Do not allow garlic to brown.
To heat oil, place the pan directly on the stove top.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 to 4 potatoes, peeled
olive oil
1 clove garlic per person, peeled and chopped
1/2 tsp. rosemary per person
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Boil potatoes for 5 minutes.
Drain and pat dry.
Slice.
In a pan large enough to hold the potatoes in one layer, add enough olive oil to coat the bottom generously.
Add potatoes and garlic and toss to coat.
Add rosemary, salt and pepper.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden brown.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Chicken Imperial
Ingredients:
1/3 c. dry sherry
4 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. paprika
2 to 3 dashes hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 to 3 lb. boneless chicken thighs
Directions:
In 1-quart saucepan, combine first 10 ingredients and simmer for 5 minutes.
Arrange chicken in a large roasting pan.
Pour liquid mixture over chicken.
Bake at 375° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, basting frequently with juices.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken Legs Or Wings
Ingredients:
30 chicken wings, cut into 3 pieces (I use leg parts)
3/4 c. butter
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
3/4 c. water
1 tsp. crushed hot red pepper
1/4 tsp. Chinese five-season powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except chicken, in saucepan and cook until slightly thickened on top of stove.
Place chicken in roasting pan and baste with sauce.
Roast, uncovered, at 350° for 2 hours, basting and turning occasionally.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Roasted Turkey Thighs With Autumn Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 (1 1/4 lb.) pkg. Turkey Selects turkey thighs
8 small new red potatoes, quartered
4 medium carrots, diagonally sliced 1/2-inch
1 large onion, coarsely chopped
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fresh mushrooms, quartered
4 cloves garlic, minced
5 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can chicken broth
1 c. dry red wine
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. thyme leaves
1 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 1/2 lb. beef chuck roast, coarsely ground
1 1/2 lb. pork shoulder, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 large onion, chopped
3 large garlic cloves, minced
3 c. beer or water
1 c. Special Tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 c. chili powder
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. cumin
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. instant masa mix, combined with 3 Tbsp. warm water
1 (4 to 5 lb.) duckling
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
5 green onions
1 Tbsp. honey
orange slices (optional)
fresh parsley or coriander (cilantro or Chinese parsley)
1/2 c. canned plum sauce
quick thousand layer buns
Directions:
Rinse duck inside and out and pat dry; cut off tail and discard.
Reserve giblets for other uses.
Mix together ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, pepper and cloves.
Sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of spice mixture inside duck.
Stir 1 tablespoon of the soy into remaining spice mixture, then rub evenly over exterior of bird. Cut one of the green onions in half and tuck inside cavity of duck.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until next day.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Mahogany Glazed Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. brewed dark roast coffee
1/2 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. dark molasses
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. finely grated fresh ginger
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
salt and pepper to taste
6 each of chicken thighs and breasts, skin removed
Directions:
In a saucepan, combine all the ingredients, except the chicken.
Bring to a boil and cook about 4 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat.
Place the chicken on a rack and baste with the mixture.
Bake in a 375° oven for at least 45 minutes or until cooked.
Baste every 10 minutes.
Pour the remaining sauce over the chicken and serve.
Serves 6.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Deluxe Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chicken thighs
1 c. rice
1 pkg. Cup-a-Soup
2 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In roasting pan, place rice and Cup-a-Soup and mix dry.
Place chicken on top of rice mixture; add salt and pepper.
Sprinkle on chicken.
Add water.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Cook for 1 hour or until liquid is absorbed.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Pepper Steak
Ingredients:
sliced beef
1 pepper, sliced and cleaned
1 can beef gravy
1 onion, sliced
Directions:
Combine beef, pepper and onion.
Cook in gravy until tender. Serve over rice or noodles.
You can use leftovers.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak "A" Round
Ingredients:
1 large round steak, cubed
1/4 c. steak sauce
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. brown sugar
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. celery, diced
1 c. cabbage, shredded
1/2 c. onion, diced
1 medium tomato, cubed
1 can sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. beef bouillon
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Marinate steak in refrigerator with first 8 ingredients for up to 3 hours.
Drain. In large skillet melt 2 tablespoons butter, add cubed steak and fry until brown, stirring often.
Remove from pan.
In same pan, add 3 tablespoons butter, celery, cabbage and onion.
Stir and cook until crisp-tender.
Add tomatoes and mushrooms.
Heat through and then add beef and bouillon.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve with rice or mashed potatoes.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Leftover Mashed Potato Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. mashed potatoes
1 medium onion, diced
1/3 stick margarine or butter
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 ham steak, cut into bite size pieces (may use leftover ham)
1 soup can milk
Directions:
Melt butter. Add onion and ham.
Saute until onion is tender and golden.
Add cream of mushroom soup and milk.
Stir until blended.
Add mashed potatoes and cook until hot.
May add extra milk for your own consistency.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Surprise
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chuck fillets
1 1/2 c. ketchup
1 1/2 c. water
1 small onion, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1/8 tsp. seasoned salt
1/8 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 tsp. A.1. steak sauce
4 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Brown steaks in oil on both sides.
Drain thoroughly and place in baking dish.
Mix together all of the other ingredients in a large bowl and pour over steaks.
Bake, uncovered, in oven at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve over hot, cooked rice.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Flank Steak Fix-Up
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef flank steak, scored
1 garlic clove, halved
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 to 6 slices bacon
1/2 c. Gold Medal flour
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. marjoram leaves
1 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
Directions:
Rub steak with garlic; sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and the pepper.
Cut meat crosswise into 4 to 6 serving pieces.
In large skillet, cook bacon.
Drain bacon; reserve 2 tablespoons drippings in skillet.
Place slice of bacon on each piece of meat, roll up and secure with wooden picks.
Coat rolls with flour.
Brown rolls in the reserved bacon drippings over medium heat.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. warm water
2 large or 3 medium eggs
3/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. warm water
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
1/2 c. raisins
5 1/2 to 6 c. bread flour
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Dissolve sugar and yeast in warm water.
Beat eggs in large mixing bowl.
(Have water, whipping cream and eggs at lukewarm temperature.)
To eggs, add 3/4 cup sugar, salt, water, whipping cream, vanilla, lemon extract, raisins and flour; beat by hand until well blended.
This should be a soft dough; too sticky to knead but stiff to stir.
Turn into greased bowl and cover.
Let rise in warm place until doubled (1 to 1 1/2 hours).
Stir down; let rise again.
Divide dough into fourths.
Combine 1 cup sugar and cinnamon; melt butter.
Roll dough on floured board (use enough flour to handle dough); brush with melted butter.
Sprinkle cinnamon-sugar mixture (1/4) over dough.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Homemade Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 egg
4 c. plain flour
Directions:
Scald milk; stir in sugar, salt and butter so that the sugar is dissolved and the butter melts.
Cool to lukewarm.
Dissolve the yeast in 1/4 cup of water and add to the milk mixture.
Add 1/2 of the flour and the egg and beat by hand until smooth.
Add the rest of the flour which makes a fairly stiff batter.
Cover tightly and cool for 3 hours.
Using 1/2 of the dough, knead it several times and roll to an oval shape.
Spread the top with softened butter (you choose amount) and sprinkle a mixture of cinnamon and sugar on top of the butter.
Roll up jelly roll style and cut into 1/2-inch slices.
Place in a greased pan and allow to rise for an hour or so.
(At this point, they may be cooked or placed in the refrigerator until needed.)
Place rolls into a cold oven when ready to be baked.
Turn oven to 350° and cook until lightly browned (about 30 minutes).
Top with a simple powdered sugar icing.
Because this dough contains an egg, use the dough within 3 days.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c water, 105~-115~
2 pkgs active dry yeast
1/2 c dry milk
1/2 c butter, softened
1/4 c honey
1/4 c sugar
1 tsp sugar
1 tsp salt
3 eggs
4-1/2 c flour
Directions:
Place the water in a large bowl.
To dissolve yeast, add it and the 1 tsp sugar to the water and let stand for 5 minutes.
Add dry milk, butter, honey, sugar, salt, eggs and 2 cups of flour. Blend together on low speed, then beat at medium speed for 3 minutes.
Add the rest of the flour to make a soft dough.
Knead until smooth and elastic with bread hooks or by hand, 5-10 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, cover and let rise in a warm place until it doubles in bulk.
Punch down.
Take half the dough and roll it into a 9x12 inch rectangle about 1/4 inch thick. Spread with half of the cinnamon sugar filling (recipe to follow). Roll up like a jelly roll, starting with 12 inch side.
Cut into 1 inch slices and place on greased cookie sheets.
Cover with a towel.
Repeat process with the other half of the dough.
Let the rolls rise until they double in bulk in a warm place.
Bake at 375° for 12-15 minutes or until golden brown.
Remove from baking sheets to cooling racks.
Dribble glaze (recipe to follow) over top of the warm rolls.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: World'S Best Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
2 1/2 Tbsp. active dry yeast
1 1/2 c. warm milk
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 1/2 c. granulated sugar
1 1/2 c. butter (3 sticks)
6 eggs
10 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. melted butter
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water and let stand for 5 minutes. Dissolve sugar and butter in warm milk.
Add eggs, 2 cups of flour and yeast mixture and beat until smooth.
Continue adding flour gradually, working dough until all flour is moistened.
Dough should be dry and not too moist.
Turn out on lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and elastic, about 8 to 10 minutes. Place dough in lightly greased bowl, turning to coat.
Cover, and let rise until double in bulk (about 1 hour).
Turn dough out on lightly floured surface, knead until smooth, and let rise again until double in size (about 1 hour).

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/4 c. warm water
1/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. shortening
1 tsp. salt
1 c. hot milk
1 beaten egg
4 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 tablespoon sugar to hot milk.
Add sugar, salt and shortening; cool.
Add egg, yeast and flour.
Let rise until double in bulk.
Roll out 1/4-inch thick. Spread warm butter; sprinkle sugar and cinnamon.
Roll up and cut in 1-inch pieces.
Put in deep loaf pan and let rise.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Authentic Tacos
Ingredients:
3 1/2 lb. lean, boneless beef, pork or chicken
flour
water
1/2 bell pepper strips
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 small can tomato sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 jalapeno pepper, chopped
Directions:
Roll meat in flour and place in stock pot filled with 1/4-inch water.
Brown meat and cook on low heat for about 30 minutes.
Then roll up and heat to high and add remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 hour longer until meat is shredding.
Serve in flour tortillas and garnish with lettuce and picante sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Taco Salad(Quick And Easy!)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
corn chips
1 tomato, diced
1 (8 oz.) jar taco sauce
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 medium diced onion
shredded Cheddar cheese
1 head lettuce, shredded
3 Tbsp. soy sauce (light)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. rice vinegar
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. sesame oil
4 c. shredded lettuce
8 oz. flaked cooked fish
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1/2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/4 c. chopped red cabbage
1/4 c. diagonally sliced green onions
1/4 c. thinly sliced celery
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
To make dressing, whisk first 6 ingredients together in a large bowl.
Add lettuce, fish and vegetables.
Toss with dressing.
Top with bean sprouts and serve.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tacos
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. salt
2 cans refried beans
1 small can Pet milk
1 onion
chili powder to taste
2 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
4 c. cheese
Directions:
Fry beef, onion, salt and chili powder together.
Drain. Blend refried beans and Ro-Tel tomatoes.
Add to beef.
Then add Pet milk and cheese.
Cook until cheese is melted.
Serve over corn chips.
Then top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes, onions, sour cream and taco sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Fish Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. fish portions
1 c. macaroni
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 1/2 Tbsp. taco mix
1 medium green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook macaroni and drain.
In saucepan, stir undrained tomatoes, onions and taco mix.
Add macaroni and green pepper strips.
Bring mixture just to boiling and pour into 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish.
Put fish on mixture and spoon some sauce over it.
Bake covered at 350° for 35 minutes.
Uncover and sprinkle cheese over fish and bake 5 more minutes.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes
1/2 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. herb and pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/-8 inch wedges lengthwise.
Set aside.
Mix together oil and the rest of the ingredients.
Add the potatoes and coat well.
Place in a single layer on a cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° about 45 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: No Fry French Fries
Ingredients:
6 large potatoes
1/4 c. oil
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (optional)
1/2 tsp. garlic powder (optional)
1 tsp. paprika (optional)
1/2 tsp. pepper (optional)
Directions:
Scrub potatoes well and cut into strips.
Combine oil, salt and pepper (may add optional ingredients) into a plastic bag.
Add potatoes and shake to coat.
Spread strips on 2 cookie sheets in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 to 30 minutes until golden brown and tender.
Stir once.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven French Fries
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes
1 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
spices (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Scrub potatoes, cut into long strips about 1/2-inch wide.
Dry strips thoroughly on paper towels.
Toss in a bowl with oil as if making a salad.
Toss with optional spices.
Spread potatoes in a single layer on a cookie sheet and place in preheated oven for 35 minutes.
Turn strips periodically to brown on all sides.
If a crispier, browner potato is desired, run under broiler for a minute or two.
Sprinkle with salt. Yield: 6 servings, 80 calories per serving.
This is a low cholesterol, reduced fat recipe.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt (if desired)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°. Peel potatoes and cut into slices 4-inches long and about 1/4-inch wide. Place in a bowl of iced water to crisp. Just before cooking, turn onto paper towel and pat dry. Turn pieces into a shallow baking pan. Sprinkle with vegetable oil. Shake pan to spread oil evenly over potatoes and spread into one layer. Bake 30 to 40 minutes, turning frequently, until golden brown. Turn potatoes onto paper towel. Sprinkle with paprika and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: French Fries
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
2 tsp. oil
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/2 inch wide sticks. Place in bowl of ice water about 30 minutes to crisp, then drain.
Pat dry with paper towels. Place sticks into plastic bag and add oil, paprika and salt. Shake to coat. Place on large cookie sheet in single layer. Bake at 425° for 30 to 35 minutes. Stir once or twice. Bake at 450° for last 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts (split and skinned)
3 cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
cornstarch and water to thicken
3 stalks celery, diced
1 small can mushrooms
2 1/2 to 3 c. chicken stock (canned or homemade)
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken into strips about 1 1/2 to 2-inches wide, coat them with the flour seasoned with salt and pepper.
Brown the chicken in a little oil on both sides, remove from pan.
Put chicken back in pan.
Let this cook about 35 minutes.
Mix enough cornstarch and water to thicken the broth that chicken was cooked in.
Take chicken out to thicken, after it is thickened as in gravy, put chicken back into pan to heat.
Serve over rice. Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Tasty Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
3 c. rice crispy cereal, slightly crushed
1 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 tsp. dill weed
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 lb. chicken tender or breasts (skinless and boneless)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Mix cereal, salt and dill. Dip chicken in oil.
Roll in cereal mixture to coat thoroughly.
Place on foil-lined pan. Bake uncovered for 30 to 40 minutes or until chicken is fully cooked.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
chicken breasts
egg
milk
crushed sour cream and onion potato chips
1 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. pepper
butter
Directions:
Cut up chicken breasts.
Dip in milk and egg.
Roll in crushed potato chips with onion salt and pepper.
Set at room temperature for 5 minutes.
Top with butter.
Bake at 350° until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
4 or 5 boneless chicken breasts
3/4 c. flour
Adolph's tenderizer
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/3 tsp. red pepper
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Wash chicken.
Cut in strips across the grain.
Sprinkle with Adolph's tenderizer.
Let set a few minutes.
Add buttermilk.
Mix seasoning with flour.
Stir chicken in buttermilk.
Roll chicken in flour.
Fry in hot grease at medium heat until tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Cheesy-Mushroom Chicken
Ingredients:
14 to 16 chicken tenders
1 can mushrooms, cut small
1 (8 oz.) bag Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. butter, melted
salt
pepper
Directions:
Salt and pepper chicken; dip chicken in melted butter.
Arrange pieces in square baking pan.
Bake in oven for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from oven; sprinkle cheese over chicken, then sprinkle mushrooms on top of the cheese.
Place back in oven under broiler for just a few seconds until cheese turns a light brown.
Remove and serve.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken (8 pieces skinned)
1/2 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. garlic powder
1/4 Tbsp. oregano
1/4 Tbsp. paprika
1/4 Tbsp. red pepper
1/4 Tbsp. black pepper
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. corn meal
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. mustard
1/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a small bowl, add all seasonings. Reserve 1/2 tablespoon of seasonings.
Sprinkle majority of seasonings on chicken.
Add the 1/2 tablespoon of seasonings to flour and corn meal.
In a mixing bowl, beat milk, mustard and white wine.
Dip the chicken in this mixture, then dredge in flour and corn meal.
Spray pan with vegetable spray, then spray chicken.
Bake 30 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 whole frying chickens, cut into eighths
2 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground pepper
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 c. milk
2 eggs
2 c. plain bread crumbs
vegetable oil for pan-frying
2 lemons, cut into wedges
Directions:
Rinse the chicken and pat dry.
Place the flour, salt, pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg and garlic powder in a shallow baking dish; stir to distribute all the ingredients evenly.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. crushed soda crackers
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/2 bay leaf, crushed
1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 fryer chicken
1/3 c. salad oil
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except milk and salad oil.
Dip chicken in milk and coat with crumb mixture.
Place in shallow roasting pan, skin side up (do not grease pan).
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Brush with salad oil; bake 30 more minutes, or until nicely browned and tender.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Steak
Ingredients:
1 or 2 eggs (beaten slightly)
1 Tbsp. milk
2 lb. round steak
1 c. bread or cracker crumbs
3 to 4 Tbsp. fat
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Add eggs to milk; mix well.
Cut steak into serving pieces, dip steak into egg mixture, dip into crumbs, brown steak on both sides in hot fat.
Season with pepper and salt.
Cover, steam over low heat for 1 hour or until meat is tender.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Unfried Fried Chicken(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
6 drumsticks, skin removed
3 breasts, cut in 1/2, skin removed
1 c. plain nonfat yogurt
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. Creole seasoning
dash of cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. dried basil
3 1/2 c. ice water
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1 c. Italian bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. Old Bay seasoning
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Spray a baking sheet with three coats of vegetable oil spray.
Combine chicken and ice water in large bowl. Put yogurt in a medium bowl, set bowl aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Jumbles
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sifted flour
3/4 tsp. baking soda
1 c. soft shortening
1 1/2 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. powdered cloves
1/4 c. sour milk or buttermilk
2 unbeaten eggs
1 1/2 c. uncooked rolled oats
1 c. chopped nuts
1 c. raisins
Directions:
Sift flour and add soda.
Measure shortening and next six ingredients into large bowl.
Beat vigorously with spoon or electric mixer until well mixed.
Stir in flour, oats, nuts and raisins.
Drop by teaspoon 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375° oven for 10 to 15 minutes.
Makes 3 1/2 dozen.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Bake
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter or margarine
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. oatmeal
1 whole egg
2 egg whites (save yolks)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. boiling water
Directions:
Cream well butter, white sugar and brown sugar.
Pour 1 1/4 cups boiling water over 1 cup oatmeal.
Add 1 whole egg, 2 egg whites (save yolks) and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
Sift together 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 teaspoon soda, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Combine creamed mixture and oatmeal; gradually add dry mixture.
Bake 30 minutes at 350°.
When taken from oven, cover with following topping.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
3 small eggs, beaten
1 1/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. plus 1/3 c. oil
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
5 c. oatmeal (quick cooking)
3 3/4 tsp. baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/2 c. plus 6 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Beat eggs and add brown sugar and milk.
Add salt, vanilla, baking powder and cinnamon.
Stir altogether.
Stir in the oatmeal.
Put in a large lightly buttered baking pan.
Bake in a 350° oven for 1/2 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, melted
2 eggs, beaten
2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
Directions:
Thoroughly mix all ingredients together.
Pour into a buttered 8 x 8 inch pan and bake at 350° for 40 to 60 minutes. Serve hot with cold milk, tastes great with cinnamon or fried apples.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs, beaten (optional)
3 c. quick oats
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
Directions:
Cream together the first 3 ingredients.
Add the rest to creamed mixture.
Bake in a 10 x 10-inch pan at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally (stirring is not a must).
Add raisins if desired.
Can be mixed the night before.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Mayonnaise Dressing
Ingredients:
2 small garlic cloves
1 tsp. anchovy paste
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. Dijon-style mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. bottled mayonnaise (not diet)
1/2 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Whisk in a blender.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Makes 1 1/3 cups.
Keeps in a jar in refrigerator up to 2 weeks.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 qt. mayonnaise
6 eggs
1 tsp. curry powder
1 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. anchovy paste
1/2 c. lemon juice
parsley
Directions:
Blend eggs in blender; add anchovy paste.
Add rest of ingredients except mayonnaise and lemon juice.
Blend well. Empty mayonnaise in large mixing bowl.
Pour contents of blender over mayonnaise and mix by hand.
Add lemon juice and parsley. Chill.
Keep in refrigerator 4 to 6 weeks.
Serve with croutons.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 egg
3/4 c. salad oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Beat egg until very fluffy.
Add salad oil and keep beating until incorporated and thickened.
Then add rest of ingredients. Refrigerate.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. garlic
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
4 eggs
2 oz. anchovy paste
4 oz. Dijon mustard
2 oz. lemon and pepper seasoning
5 oz. lemon juice
24 oz. olive oil
8 oz. salad oil
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Chill for 30 minutes and serve.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad
Ingredients:
1 head romaine lettuce (leaves separated)
1 egg, lightly beaten
2 garlic gloves, crushed
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1/2 c. olive oil
4 anchovy fillets, drained and chopped
2 hard-cooked eggs, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
3/4 c. pumpernickel croutons
Directions:
Rinse lettuce and let dry.
Refrigerate wrapped in paper towels for several hours to crisp leaves.
Whisk raw egg, garlic, lemon juice and oil together and pour into bottom of large salad bowl.
Add lettuce, anchovies and hard-cooked eggs.
Toss thoroughly with dressing.
Add cheese and toss again.
Sprinkle with croutons.
Serve immediately.
Pass the peppermill.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Breast - Sauteed With New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
4 to 6 large chicken breasts
1 slice onion
1 minced clove garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 c. hot water
1 (No. 303) can small potatoes, drained
1/4 c. red wine
snipped parsley
Directions:
Saute chicken in large skillet in hot butter until both sides are brown.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook about 5 minutes.
In a small bowl combine flour, salt and pepper and slowly stir in bouillon cube which has been dissolved in the hot water.
Pour over browned chicken.
Cook slowly covered for about 25 minutes or until chicken is tender.
Add potatoes and wine.
Heat potatoes thoroughly.
Garnish with parsley.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Company Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 pkg. hash brown potatoes
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. sour cream
1 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Put into greased pan.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Irish Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/2 c. softened butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
2/3 c. condensed milk
6 c. confectioners sugar
1/2 c. coconut
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Blend well.
Form into balls and roll in cinnamon.
Enjoy!

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Bacony Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can new potatoes, drained
1 (6 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
salt
4 slices bacon, cut into quarters
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. salad oil
4 chicken cutlets
Directions:
Preheat broiler.
Slice potatoes 1/2-inch thick.
Pat dry with paper towel.
Arrange in bottom of a 13 x 9-inch broiler pan. Cover with mushrooms.
Sprinkle lightly with salt.
Top with bacon slices.
Broil 10 minutes, turning occasionally.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Yiayia'S Greek Chicken Breasts With Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 chicken breast halves (with or without skin)
salt and pepper
oregano
1/2 stick butter (do not use margarine)
juice of 1 or 2 lemons
6 to 8 potatoes, peeled and quartered
water
Directions:
Wash and dry chicken.
Season with salt, pepper and oregano. Spray baking pan lightly with cooking spray.
Place seasoned chicken into baking pan, meaty side down.
Dot with butter. Squeeze lemon juice over chicken.
Add a small amount of water to pan.
Cook for 1/2 hour at 350°.
Turn chicken over.
Place potatoes around chicken.
Turn potatoes to coat with drippings. Add a little more salt and pepper to the potatoes if you like. Bake an additional 1/2 hour or until chicken is done.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: "One Pot" Dinner(Makes A Big Hit ... Especially With The Men.)
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
3/4 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (1 lb. 15 oz. size) cans pork and beans
1 (1 lb.) can kidney beans, drained
1 (1 lb.) can butter limas, drained
1 c. ketchup
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet; drain off fat and put beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onions; drain off fat.
Add bacon, onions and remaining ingredients to crock-pot.
Stir together well.
Cover and cook on low 4 to 6 hours.
If using the 2-quart crock-pot, reduce this recipe by half.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 to 2 lb. stew beef (boneless and extra lean)
carrots, as many as you think you need
potatoes, as many as you think you need
1 large onion
1 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix together in crock-pot and cook on low while you are at work.
Add any vegetables desired, even a can of mixed vegetables (cabbage, celery, broccoli, mushrooms, etc.).
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large can corn
4 large sliced potatoes
1 large sliced onion
1 large can tomatoes
3 large sliced carrots
1/2 c. ketchup
1 Tbsp. mustard
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Make patties out of ground beef.
Sprinkle salt and pepper on each one.
In a large Dutch oven or pot, place a layer of patties. Add a layer of all vegetables.
Repeat layers until you have used all ingredients.
Mix ketchup, mustard and water; pour over top. Cook on medium until it starts to boil.
Turn stove on low heat; cook for 1 1/2 hours.
May need to add more water, depending on stove variations.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 c. chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. uncooked medium egg noodles
1 can (16 oz) kidney beans rinsed & drained
1 can (14 1/2 oz) stewed tomatoes
3/4 c. water
1 beef bouillon cube
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook meat until no longer pink; drain. Add onion, celery and green pepper, cook for 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Add Worcestershire sauce, salt, basil and pepper.
Stir in noodles, beans, tomatoes, water and bouillon.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until noodles are tender.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: Hunter'S "One Pot" Dinner
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef
3/4 lb. bacon, cut up into small pieces
1 c. chopped onion
2 (31 oz.) cans pork and beans
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
1 c. catsup
1 (16 oz.) can lima beans, drained
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
3 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Brown beef, drain and place beef in crock-pot.
Brown bacon and onion.
Drain.
Add everything to crock-pot.
Stir together. Cover and cook on low for 4 to 9 hours in crock-pot.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
4 cooked chicken breasts (skinless), cut in pieces
1 can mushrooms
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/4 c. flour
4 tsp. fat free chicken broth
1/3 c. low-fat Parmesan
1/4 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
10 to 12 oz. cooked fettucine
1 c. evaporated skim milk
Directions:
In saucepan over low heat, blend flour, liquid Butter Buds, skim milk and chicken broth.
Add minced garlic, salt and pepper. Continue to cook over low heat stirring constantly until the sauce thickens.
Stir in Parmesan cheese.
Combine sauce with chicken and mushrooms.
Fold into cooked pasta.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. oregano
4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
2 chicken broiler fryers, halved
1 c. flour
4 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Combine oil, lemon juice, Parmesan cheese, oregano, 2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over chicken halves. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or longer.
Combine remaining ingredients, except butter.
Remove chicken from marinade and roll in the flour mixture.
Saute chicken in butter until browned on both sides.
Place each chicken half, skin side up, in center of a double thick square of heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Bring up sides and ends and seal with tight folds.
Place packets on baking sheet and bake at 425° for 1 hour.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Classic Alfredo Pasta
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. uncooked fettuccine
1/2 c. butter or oleo
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 c. heavy or whipping cream
4 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Cook fettuccine according to your taste of doneness; drain. Meanwhile, in small saucepan, melt butter over medium heat; gradually stir in cheese, then cream until well blended.
Continue heating sauce, stirring constantly, just to boiling point.
Remove from heat; stir in parsley.
Add sauce to hot fettuccine; toss lightly.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Chicken
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken fillets
1 yellow squash (small)
1/2 Tbsp. fresh or powdered garlic
1 tsp. Romano/Parmesan cheese, grated
3 Tbsp. fresh or dried basil, chopped
3/4 lb. linguini
1 zucchini squash (small)
1 sweet red pepper
1/2 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1/4 c. reduced-salt chicken stock
1/4 c. evaporated skim milk
Directions:
Note:
Chicken may be 4 breast halves.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, boned
2 slices bacon
1 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 pt. light cream
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/3 c. frozen peas
1 chopped scallion
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Cut bacon into small pieces and chicken into about 1-inch cubes.
Add garlic and oil into hot skillet; cook until chicken is done.
Remove from skillet.
Reheat pan and add wine so that it picks up flavors from skillet.
Slowly add cream, scallions, cayenne pepper, oregano and peas.
Mix cornstarch with about 4 ounces water.
Add a little at a time until you get a creamy sauce.
Add chicken and bacon mixture; heat.
Add black pepper to taste.
Serve over pasta.
Shrimp may be substituted for chicken.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. sliced green onions and tops
1 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and paprika in paper or plastic bag. Brush chicken with lemon juice.
Place a few pieces at a time in bag.
Shake to coat.
Heat oil to 365° in electric skillet or large heavy skillet.
Add chicken.
Brown.
Combine water and bouillon granules.
Stir until dissolved.
Add brown sugar and remaining lemon juice.
Pour into skillet.
Cover.
Reduce heat to 250°; simmer 5 minutes.
Turn chicken.
Sprinkle with onion and lemon peel.
Recover.
Simmer 10 minutes.
Serve garnish with lemon slices and additional parsley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. oleo
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. onion salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Dip cut up fryer parts in sauce. Place chicken, skin side down, in shallow pan.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 c. water
1/3 to 1/2 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
2 Tbsp. butter
2 egg yolks, slightly beaten
Directions:
Combine sugar and cornstarch in saucepan.
Gradually add water, blending until smooth.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thick and clear.
Remove from heat. Blend about 1/2 cup of hot mixture in saucepan and cook 2 minutes. Add lemon rind, lemon juice and butter.
Serve warm or cold. Sauce may be refrigerated and reheated.
Yields 2 3/4 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. chicken broth
1/3 c. fresh lemon juice
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. lemon zest
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
3/4 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 2 large), cut the chicken in strips
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/3 c. cooking oil
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. toasted sesame seeds
Directions:
Toast sesame seeds by swirling in a nonstick skillet until they smell nutty.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts, halved, boned and skinned
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. clarified butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. Madeira wine
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 large lemon, cut in 6 slices
3 Tbsp. capers
1 tsp. chopped pimento
1/4 c. fresh chives
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettuccine, cooked according to package
Directions:
Pound chicken breasts to 1/4-inch thickness between 2 pieces of waxed paper.
Mix salt, pepper, paprika and flour in a plastic bag; add chicken, one piece at a time, and shake to coat.
Place butter and oil in a saute pan or large skillet; heat over medium heat until bubbly.
Add garlic and chicken; saute, turning, about 6 minutes or until chicken is brown and fork can be easily inserted.
Drain on paper towels and keep warm.
Drain all but 2 tablespoons of cooking fat from pan; add wine and deglaze pan, scraping up brown bits.
Add lemon juice and heat 1 minute; return chicken to pan; add lemon slices and heat 2 minutes.
Add capers and pimento.
Sprinkle chives over all.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: My Best Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
5 large cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 lb. ground beef
1/4 lb. pork sausage
3 Tbsp. Contadina tomato paste
1 (28 oz.) can Contadina whole tomatoes, chopped with juice
1 (8 oz.) can Contadina tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. crushed thyme
2 tsp. crushed basil
3/4 tsp. crushed oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 (15 oz.) carton part-skim Ricotta cheese
1 egg, well beaten
1 tsp. dried parsley
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese, divided
1 1/3 c. grated Mozzarella cheese, divided
8 lasagna noodles
Directions:
Prepare meat
sauce.
In a 3-quart saucepan, heat olive oil; add
chopped onion and saute about 3 minutes.
Add garlic and red pepper; saute 1 minute.
Add ground beef and sausage. Brown meat, then drain off fat.
Add chopped tomatoes, paste, sauce,
sugar, salt, pepper, thyme, basil and oregano.
Bring to a
boil;
lower heat
and
simmer, uncovered, for about 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
3 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 small diced onion
1/4 c. diced green pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
5 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1 can water
1/2 c. ketchup
4 c. Mozzarella cheese
1 pkg. lasagna noodles
Directions:
Brown meat; add onions, green peppers and oil.
Add all the spices, seasonings, tomato sauce, ketchup and water.
Simmer until thick, about 1 hour.
Cook 1 package lasagna according to the package.
I add 1 tablespoon oil to water so noodles don't stick. Layer noodles, then sauce (about 1 1/2 cups per layer), then Mozzarella cheese in a 9 x 13-inch pan, 3 layers high.
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 tsp. shortening, vegetable spray or oil
3 Tbsp. oil
1 (at least) garlic clove
2 c. mushrooms, cleaned and sliced
2 c. green pepper, seeded, cored and sliced
12 to 16 oz. spinach, well washed, rinsed, drained and chopped (I've used chopped, frozen and it works)
2 eggs, beaten, or equivalent of Egg Beater type
1 lb. tofu, drained and crumbled
3/4 tsp. oregano
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. fresh parsley (at least), washed, dried, stems removed and rinsed
5 c. Marinara sauce or tomato sauce (canned or homemade)
12 oz. lasagna noodles, cooked
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese (light skim), shredded
3 oz. fresh Parmesan cheese, shredded or grated
Directions:
Spray 9 x 13-inch baking dish with shortening or vegetable spray/oil.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 1/2 tsp. dry garlic salad mix
2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
1 lb. hamburg
4 slices bread, crumbled
1/4 c. milk
2 slightly beaten eggs
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. chopped parsley
2 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 c. water
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. fennel seed
1 tsp. dry basil
1 lb. lasagna
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
Directions:
Melt 4 tablespoons margarine in a large saucepan.
Add chopped onions, salad mix and tomatoes.
Simmer until liquid is evaporated. Mix into tomato mixture, tomato paste, water, sugar, 1/4 cup parsley, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, fennel seed, basil and 1 teaspoon salt.
Simmer 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Mix hamburg and bread crumbs in large bowl.
Add 1/4 cup milk, eggs, 1/4 cup parsley, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, 1 1/2 teaspoons salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Mix with hands until well moistened.
Brown in 2 tablespoons margarine. Drain and add to tomato mixture.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. whole basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. can tomatoes
1 (12 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
8 oz. egg noodles
3 c. creamed cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan and Romano cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 beaten eggs
1/2 Tbsp. + 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Brown beef; spoon off fat.
Add next 7 ingredients.
Simmer approximately 30 minutes.
Cook noodles; rinse and combine remaining ingredients in bowl except Mozzarella cheese.
Layer noodles, cottage cheese, Mozzarella, then meat sauce.
Repeat. Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before cutting into squares.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs
3/4 c. milk
5 apples
1/4 c. currants
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Work butter in mix.
Beat egg; add milk and stir dry ingredients.
Spread dough in a well-buttered biscuit pan.
Spread apples on dough, pressing sharp edges of fruit into mixture.
Sprinkle with currants, sugar and cinnamon which has been mixed.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. chopped apples
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Beat together eggs and sugar.
Add vegetable oil.
In large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon.
Slowly mix dry ingredients into egg mixture.
Blend well.
Fold in apples and nuts.
Spread into a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
3 c. peeled, chopped apples
1 c. chopped nuts
raisins
3 c. flour (I use 1/2 whole wheat)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Blend oil, sugar and eggs well.
Stir in apples, nuts and raisins.
Add flour, vanilla, baking soda and cinnamon.
Bake about 1 hour in greased 13 x 9-inch pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
3 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. apples, cubed
3/4 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oil, sugar and eggs.
Add salt, baking soda, cinnamon, flour and vanilla.
Add apples and walnuts.
Bake in ungreased 13 x 9-inch pan at 350° for 1 hour.
Do not cover tightly to store.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Apple Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 c. white sugar
2 eggs
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. baking powder
2 1/2 c. flour
2 c. diced apples
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Cream the sugars and shortening together.
Add eggs and vanilla; beat.
Sift dry ingredients together and add alternately with buttermilk. Add diced apples.
Mix chocolate chips, cinnamon and white sugar. Sprinkle over above mixture.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushroom Caps
Ingredients:
12 to 14 medium to large mushroom caps
1/4 c. finely diced onion
1/4 c. finely diced celery
1/4 c. finely diced green peppers
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 oz. softened cream cheese
1 c. finely ground bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute onion, celery and green pepper in butter until slightly softened.
Add cream cheese and stir.
