Add bread crumbs, lemon juice, salt and pepper; mix well.
Stuff mushroom caps with mixture (mushrooms should be washed and laid on paper towel to dry until needed).
Place on greased baking sheet and bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.
May be put under broiler if you want them browned more.
Serve warm.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Patties
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. minced onion
1 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. fine bread crumbs
1 egg
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. oil
1 can golden mushroom soup
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Combine meat, salt, onion, mustard, 1/4 cup crumbs, egg and Worcestershire sauce.
Mix very well and shape into 6 patties.
Put the 1/2 cup crumbs on a piece of waxed paper and press patties onto it so the crumbs adhere to the outside.
Heat the oil in a frypan. Brown patties on both sides.
Turn down heat.
Drain off any fat from pan.
Open soup and add 1/4 cup water.
Pour over patties. Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes.
Serve with cooked egg noodles. Sprinkle with chopped chives.
You can substitute turkey for all or part of beef.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
frozen wings
vegetable oil (for deep frying)
1 stick butter
1/2 c. ketchup
3/4 bottle Durkee red hot sauce
1/4 Tabasco (small bottle)
pinch of salt
pinch of pepper
1 Tbsp. chili pepper
1 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Combine butter, ketchup, Durkee, Tabasco, salt, pepper, chili pepper and red pepper in pot over low heat.
Cook until butter is melted and sauce is warm.
(If too spicy, add ketchup.
If you like it hotter, add Tabasco.)

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings
2 eggs
4 Tbsp. flour
8 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sesame seed (optional)
5 tsp. shoyu
2 stalks green onion, minced
2 cloves garlic
4 Tbsp. sugar
oil (for frying)
Directions:
Mix and soak 2 hours or overnight.
Fry in oil.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chinese-Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. (about 16) chicken wings
2 eggs, slightly beaten
2/3 c. milk
1 c. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
salt
vegetable oil (for deep frying)
Directions:
Cut off wing tips at joints; discard these.
Cut other sections at joint, also.
Mix eggs, milk, flour, soy sauce and salt. Dip pieces of chicken in batter and fry in hot deep oil, 350° on frying thermometer.
Fry Daddy type until hot and crisp. Drain on paper towels; may need to sprinkle more salt.
Makes about 32 pieces.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wing Recipe
Ingredients:
24 chicken wings (about 4 lb.)
salt (optional)
freshly ground black pepper
4 c. vegetable or corn oil
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 to 5 tsp. hot sauce (Frank's Original Red Hot Sauce is the local favorite)
1 tsp. white vinegar
Directions:
Cut off tips and separate each wing at the joint.
Sprinkle wings with salt and pepper to taste.
Heat oil in deep-fat fryer or large heavy pot.
When it is quite hot, add half the wings and cook about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
When wings are golden brown and crisp, remove them and drain well.
Add remaining wings and repeat process.
Meanwhile, melt butter in saucepan, add hot sauce to taste and vinegar.
Pour hot sauce over wings and shake in bucket.
Serve with Blue Cheese dressing and celery sticks.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Soup
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. minced onion
9 Tbsp. oleo
3/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. flour
4 1/2 tsp. salt
3 c. grated carrots
9 c. milk
9 c. consomme or 4 1/2 c. and 4 1/2 c. water
30 chopped broccoli florets
Directions:
Saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour and salt; gradually add milk, stirring constantly, in double boiler.
Bring to a boil.
Add broth; cook over low heat until serving time. Approximately 30 minutes before serving, add carrots and broccoli. Stir occasionally, but do not boil.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. broccoli, diced
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
5 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1 c. whipping cream
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
Saute broccoli in butter over medium heat until tender. Sprinkle with flour and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes.
Gradually stir in stock and milk.
Heat just to simmering.
Stir in cream and cheese.
Allow cheese to melt in soup.
Season to taste and serve with croutons.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 stick butter
1/4 c. flour
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. chicken broth
2 1/2 c. milk
2 c. broccoli, cooked slightly
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until smooth.
Add broth and milk all at once.
Cook until thick.
Add broccoli; simmer and stir.
Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Soup(6 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 lb. broccoli florets
2 tsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small garlic clove, minced
1/4 c. flour
3 c. chicken stock
1/8 tsp. dried basil
1/8 tsp. dried oregano
1/8 tsp. dried tarragon
1/8 tsp. dried thyme
1 c. milk
1 to 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Drop broccoli into boiling water.
Cook until tender 7 minutes.
Drain.
In saucepan, combine oil and onion; saute until soft.
Add garlic and cook 15 seconds longer.
Sprinkle on flour and stir.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Broccoli Bake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. broccoli or 1 medium head cauliflower, separated into florets
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can mushroom soup
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar
1 c. Bisquick
Directions:
Heat salted water to a boil.
Add broccoli.
Cover and heat to boiling.
Cook 10 to 12 minutes until stems are almost tender. Drain.
Place broccoli in ungreased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Heat oven to 400°.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese(Kids In The Kitchen)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped carrot
1/2 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes or tomato puree
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 lb. ground sirloin or ground beef
1 lb. spaghetti or ziti, cooked according to pkg. directions
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion, carrots and celery. Saute over low-medium heat, stirring frequently, about 10 minutes. Stir in garlic. Saute 2 minutes more.
Add tomato sauce to skillet. Add basil and oregano. Stir.
Cook, covered, on medium-low heat for about 10 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghettini Bolognese
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 carrot, sliced
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. each chopped onion, celery and green pepper
2 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 lb. Italian sausage, casing removed
2 (15 oz.) cans Hunt's tomato sauce
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. dry red wine (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian seasoning
Directions:
Saute mushrooms, carrot, garlic, onion, celery and green pepper in Wesson oil in Dutch oven.
Add sausage; cook until sausage loses redness.
Drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients. Simmer, uncovered, 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over hot, cooked spaghettini.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
1 slice root celery or 2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned whole tomatoes or 3 Tbsp. tomato puree
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/3 c. white wine or chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
In a skillet saute ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat loses its pinkness then transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion then dice celery and carrot.
Chop ham into small pieces and saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Transfer to pan with ground meat and combine all.
Add water, tomatoes or tomato puree, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme.
Cover and cook for about 20 minutes, then add the wine or chicken broth and cook for a few more minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned tomatoes
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. thyme
1/3 c. chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
Brown ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat is done. Transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion; dice celery and carrot. Chop ham into small pieces.
Saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Add to ground meat.
Add water, tomatoes, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme; cover and cook about 20 minutes. Add chicken broth; cook a few minutes more.
Cook pasta according to package directions; drain well.
Serve immediately with sauce.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Bolog'Nase
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 lb. Italian sausage
2 medium onions, chopped
1 carrot, thinly sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 rib celery
1 green pepper
2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1/2 c. water or 1/4 c. red wine
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian herb seasoning (increase to taste)
basil, oregano, garlic and red pepper
Directions:
Saut mushrooms, carrot, onions and green pepper in oil. Add sausage and cook until sausage is done. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer 40 minutes (or longer).

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Dumb Bunny Carrots (Marinated)
Ingredients:
1 can tomato soup
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. mustard
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
5 c. cooked, sliced carrots
1 large green pepper, diced
1 large onion, diced
Directions:
Mix soup, oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, pepper, sugar and Worcestershire sauce in pan and bring to a boil.
Pour over carrots, green pepper and onion.
Mix and refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving.
Great for holidays.
Can be made in advance and last a long time in fridge.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Soup
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic
1/2 tsp. dried or 1 tsp. fresh tarragon
4 Tbsp. olive oil
8 oz. can plum tomatoes
1 lb. can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 chicken stock cube
1 1/4 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Peel and crush garlic.
If using fresh tarragon, chop it finely.
Heat the oil and saute the garlic until it begins to brown.
Add the tarragon and tomatoes, roughly chopped, and lower the heat to simmer.
When ingredients come to a boil, cook for 25 minutes or so.
When the tomatoes are cooked, add the chickpeas and cook another 5 minutes.
Stir in the stock cube and no more than 1 1/4 cups water.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Herbed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 bunch carrots
1 c. boiling water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. marjoram (dried)
1/4 tsp. savory (dried)
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
Directions:
Scrape carrots.
Cut into quarters (lengthwise), then halves (lengthwise).
Cook in hot water and salt, covered.
Cook 15 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
Add herbs and butter.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. rotini pasta
1/2 c. diced Provolone cheese
1 can pitted black olives
4 c. assorted vegetables
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Italian dressing
2 oz. Prosciutto, slivered
1/2 c. sliced red onion
1/2 c. frozen peas, thawed
2 Tbsp. fresh basil
1 avocado
Directions:
In a large bowl, gently toss pasta with dressing.
Add cheese, Prosciutto, black olives, onion, peas, broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, mushrooms, asparagus tips and sliced basil.
Toss gently. Season to taste.
Fan avocado slices on top.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and tomato.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. curly noodles
2 small avocados
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. butter or margarine
garlic salt and pepper to taste
Parmesan cheese to taste
Directions:
Cook noodles according to package directions.
Drain in colander and return to pot.
Add butter, grated cheeses, seasonings and thinly sliced avocados.
Stir.
Serves 4 to 6. Very quick and easy to make and your family will think you're a gourmet cook!

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Avocado Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. mashed avocado
1/2 c. sour cream
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. grated onion
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. chili powder
3 slices bacon, crisp cooked
Directions:
Combine avocado, sour cream, lemon juice, onion, salt and chili powder. Chill. Stir in bacon, crumbled. Garnish with bacon curl.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Vegetable Mix Salad
Ingredients:
2 (12 oz.) cans whole kernel corn, drained and chilled
2 medium avocados, peeled and diced
6 hard-cooked eggs, diced and chilled
1 c. mayo or salad dressing
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
Combine corn, avocados, eggs and onion.
Blend together remaining ingredients.
Toss mayonnaise mixture lightly with avocado mixture.
Garnish with sliced, pitted ripe olives, if desired.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, peeled and pitted
1 (8 oz.) container plain yogurt
2 Tbsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
carrot sticks
Directions:
Mash avocado in bowl.
Add yogurt, onion, salt and white pepper.
Stir until blended.
Serve with carrot sticks.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Marinade With Tangy Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. oil
1 can each: corn, peas and green beans, drained
1 green pepper, chopped
1 (4 oz.) jar pimento, drained and diced
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
Directions:
Heat together vinegar, salt, pepper, sugar and oil until sugar is dissolved.
Set aside to cool.
Place vegetables in large bowl and pour dressing over vegetable mixture.
Refrigerate overnight. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. sesame oil
4 to 6 green onions, finely chopped
1 (1-inch) piece ginger root, peeled and minced
1/2 c. sugar
2 garlic cloves, finely chopped
Directions:
Combine soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, onions and ginger in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil to dissolve sugar and stir to blend flavors. Cool and pour over chicken.
Let stand at room temperature for 2 hours or refrigerate for 4 hours.
Bring chicken back to room temperature.
Place on grill and grill each side for 10 minutes.
Brown remaining sauce on chicken while on grill.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marinade(Great For Chicken And Spareribs)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, blenderized
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Heat all to boiling.
Marinate meat and brush every 15 minutes while cooking.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Herb-Marinated Chicken(Makes 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 to 2 1/2 lb. meaty chicken pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 c. white wine
2 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. onion salt
2 cloves garlic, minced
Directions:
Place cleaned chicken in a heavy plastic bag.
For marinade, in a bowl combine wine, oil, vinegar, basil, oregano, onion salt and garlic.
Pour over chicken in bag.
Close bag and coat chicken well.
Marinate for 5 to 24 hours in refrigerator, turning bag occasionally.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 boiled eggs, peeled and halved
1/4 c. butter, softened
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 tsp. mustard
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Mix egg yolks and all other ingredients well.
Spoon into egg whites and chill.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
12 large eggs
1 tsp. plus 1 Tbsp. cider vinegar or distilled white vinegar
1/3 c. half and half
2 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place eggs in a pot with water to cover and 1 teaspoon vinegar.
Bring to boiling over medium heat.
Cover; remove from heat.
Let stand 20 minutes.
Drain eggs.
Cover with cold water. When cool, drain and peel.
Halve eggs lengthwise.
Remove yolks to small bowl.
Mash with fork.
Mix in 1 tablespoon vinegar, one third cup half and half, mustard, sugar, salt and pepper.
Spoon yolk mixture into egg white halves.
Refrigerate until serving.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. boiled eggs
3/4 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. green relish
2 to 3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Boil eggs; cool and remove shells.
Cut in half.
Remove yolks to mixing bowl.
With fork, crumble yolks for easy mixing.
Add salt, pepper, sugar, green relish and mayonnaise and mix well.
Do not use too much mayonnaise or mixture will be runny.
Put 1/2 tablespoon of the yolk mixture back in egg white.
Garnish with paprika.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
3 qt. cold water
1 doz. egg
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1/2 lb. bacon
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
paprika
Directions:
In large pot, add water and gently add eggs.
Bring water to hard rapid boil.
Reduce to simmer for 10 minutes.
Put pot into sink and fill with cold water.
Let sit for 20 minutes. Meanwhile, cut bacon into 1/2-inch pieces and fry until crisp. Drain and set aside.
In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper; set aside.
Peel eggs; cut in half lengthwise, separating the whites and yolks.
Rinse out whites.
Mash yolks into fine substance.
Add bacon and mix well.
Add to mayonnaise mixture and mix well.
Add more mayonnaise if desired.
Fill egg whites with mixture.
Sprinkle with paprika and serve.
Best served cold.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-cooked eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. mustard or vinegar
3 Tbsp. salad dressing (enough to moisten)
Directions:
Cut egg in halves.
Slip out yolks.
Mash with fork.
Mix in remaining ingredients.
Refill white with yolk mixture.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1 clove garlic, crushed
lettuce leaves
4 green onions, finely chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Arrange tomatoes in glass baking dish.
Shake oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, pepper, mustard and garlic in tightly covered jar. Pour over tomatoes.
Cover and refrigerate, spooning dressing over tomatoes occasionally, at least 2 hours.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Hot Vinaigrette Vegetable
Ingredients:
2 c. each: broccoli and cauliflower florets
1 c. thinly sliced onions
6 cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. red bell pepper strips
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 tsp. each; lemon juice and raspberry vinegar
1 tsp. Chinese sesame oil
1/2 tsp. each: granulated sugar and salt
1 small garlic clove, mashed
1/4 tsp. oregano leaves
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. chopped fresh basil
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, bring 1 quart water to a boil.
Add broccoli and cauliflower and cook, stirring once for 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Drain vegetables and transfer to serving platter.
Add onions, tomatoes and bell peppers and set aside.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Strong Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. anchovy paste
1 Tbsp. drained capers
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and whisk.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Italian Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1 1/2 c. olive oil or other oil
2 large cloves garlic, crushed
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. dried basil or oregano
Directions:
Combine ingredients in a large jar with a tight fitting lid. Shake well.
Makes 2 cups.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Feta cheese
2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach
2 eggs
1/4 c. Romano cheese
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small chopped onion
1 pkg. filo dough (1/2 for 9 x 13-inch pan)
1 1/2 sticks melted oleo
Directions:
Mix really good the first 6 ingredients.
Brush oleo in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer 1 sheet of filo; brush with oleo.
Do that about 7 or 8 layers.
Put filling on that and add about 7 more sheets of filo, brushing after each with oleo.
Put in refrigerator to chill, then cut through top layer just before you bake at 350° for 50 minutes.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach Fettucine
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. fresh spinach
1 clove minced garlic
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 stick butter
1 box fettucine
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Clean spinach, removing stems.
Cook garlic, onion and 1/2 stick butter until golden.
Add spinach.
Cover until wilted. Cook fettucine.
Drain.
Mix with 1/2 stick butter, cream and cheese.
Add spinach mixture.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach And Fettucini
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter
3 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1 lb. fettucini
1 c. heavy cream
1 clove garlic, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, drained and chopped
1 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
pepper to taste
Directions:
In skillet, melt 1/2 the butter, add garlic and onion, cook until golden.
Add spinach, cover pan, cook until spinach is heated through.
Meanwhile, cook noodles.
Drain and return to pot.
Toss with remaining butter, spinach mixture, Parmesan and cream until all are blended and heated through.
Serve immediately.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Fettucini And Spinach
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettucini noodles, cooked and drained
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 tsp. chicken flavor instant bouillon
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. basil leaves
1 c. cottage cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. grated Parmesan and Romano cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
In large skillet, cook spinach and garlic in oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Dissolve bouillon in water.
Add bouillon mixture, basil, cottage cheese and salt to spinach.
Stir over low heat until blended.
Toss spinach mixture, grated cheese and noodles.
Serve in heated dish, garnished with parsley. Refrigerate leftovers.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Vegetables
Ingredients:
6 to 8 tiny new potatoes, quartered (1 to 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
3/4 c. frozen peas
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. water
1 tsp. curry powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. each: garlic and ginger powder
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook potatoes and onion in hot oil until the edges start to brown.
Add water, curry powder, salt, garlic, ginger and red pepper.
Bring to boiling; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for about 10 to 15 minutes.
Add cauliflower; cook about 5 minutes more or until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
Add frozen peas; heat through, adding a little more water if necessary.
Makes 4 to 6 side dish servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower, cut up
6 tomatoes, cut and peeled
6 to 8 potatoes, small and cut up
1/4 lb. shelled peas
1/4 lb. green beans, sliced
1 Tbsp. turmeric
1 1/2 Tbsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter
6 small onions
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. stock
Directions:
Place vegetables on a large plate.
Sprinkle with mixed spices and salt.
Melt butter in a heavy pan.
Saute the onions and garlic.
Add the spiced veggies and stock.
Cover and bring to a boil, simmer for about 20 minutes until all vegetables are tender. Serve with hot cooked rice.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Mixed Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
2 c. broccoli (flowerets)
1 large potato (3/4-inch cubes)
2 carrots (1/3-inch slices)
1/2 c. sour cream
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin powder
1 Tbsp. coriander powder
pinch of garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. salt
oil for deep frying
Directions:
Steam broccoli until tender.
Deep fry potato on high heat until golden and tender.
Then deep fry carrots until tender. Drain and set aside vegetables.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. prepared mustard
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. water
1 clove garlic, minced
2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer chicken or one 4 to 5-lb. domestic duck or wild goose
cooking oil or melted butter
2 large potatoes, peeled and quartered or 8 new potatoes
6 medium carrots, bias-sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
2 medium apples, cored and cut into wedges
Directions:
Set oven to 375°.
In a small saucepan combine first 10 ingredients.
Bring to boiling, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat; set aside.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fish Curry(Serves 4 To 6)
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. water
1/3 c. dry white wine
1 lb. frozen fish fillets, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes
1 1/2 Tbsp. corn oil
2 medium tomatoes, cut in 1/2-inch cubes (2 c.)
1 large zucchini, cut in 1/2-inch cubes (2 c.)
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced or pressed
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. curry powder
1/8 tsp. white pepper
hot, cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Heat 1 1/2 cups water and wine in large skillet over medium heat.
Add fish; cover and simmer 3 to 4 minutes or until fish flakes easily.
Drain, reserving 1 1/2 cups liquid.
Heat corn oil over medium heat in large skillet.
Add tomatoes, zucchini, onion and garlic.
Cook 5 minutes or until crisp-tender, stirring occasionally.
Stir in reserved liquid.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
36 wings, cut in half to make two pieces
2/3 c. melted butter
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
Directions:
Combine melted butter, salt and garlic salt.
Dip chicken pieces in.
Mix together bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese.
Roll chicken dipped in butter mixture in crumb mixture.
Lay on cookie sheet and bake in a 400° oven for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Pizza Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
1 c. melted butter
1 c. Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 lb. chicken drummettes
Directions:
Combine all dry ingredients.
Dip drummettes in butter.
Then coat in dry mixture.
Place on foil-lined pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
32 chicken wings
6 to 8 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt or lemon pepper
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Discard wing tip; cut remaining wing in two pieces.
Dip chicken wing in melted butter.
Combine bread crumbs, cheese, salt and garlic powder in a plastic bag.
Shake wings in crumb mixture. Place chicken on greased 15 x 10-inch baking sheet and bake in preheated oven at 400° for 30 minutes.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
5 lb. chicken wings
1 stick melted butter
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. soy sauce
Directions:
Place wings on cookie sheet; drizzle butter over top.
Bake at 375° for 15 minutes.
Turn; bake 15 minutes more.
Pour sugar and soy sauce over top.
Bake 15 minutes; turn.
Bake 15 minutes more.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Potato Pone
Ingredients:
6 to 8 large sweet potatoes
1 tbsp ground nutmeg
1 tbsp allspice
1 tsp vanilla
1 tsp lemon peel, grated
4 oz evaporated milk
1 1/2 cups granulated sugar
1 tbsp ground cinnamon
1/2 tsp black pepper
2 large eggs, beaten
1 1/2 sticks butter
4 oz olive oil
Directions:
Wash potatoes.
Remove spots.
Do not peel.
Grate potatoes. Add all other ingredients.
Heat oil and butter;
add potato mixture. Make sure it does not stick.
The pone will be finished when it turns almost brown in color.
Transfer to two 9 inch pie pans.
Let cool.
Slice.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Trout
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. dressed trout or smaller
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. water
4 slices lemon
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. salt
1 sprig parsley
2 c. white sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
Directions:
Place fish in skillet; add milk, water, lemon slices, allspice, salt and parsley.
Cover and cook over low heat for 20 minutes, until tender.
Remove to hot platter.
Combine white sauce, lemon juice and eggs; pour over fish and serve.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Eggs
Ingredients:
4 eggs
4 slices toast
butter or magarine
1 1/2 c. milk (approximately)
salt
pepper
Directions:
Heat milk slowly in a large skillet.
Add salt, pepper and 1 tablespoon butter.
Add eggs when milk is steaming (don't break yolks).
Spoon milk over eggs.
About now, put toast in toaster. Turn eggs, if necessary.
Stir milk, it will start to look like gravy.
Butter toast in plate.
Place 1 egg on each piece of toast.
Spoon gravy over top.
Add salt and pepper to taste!

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Pocatilla Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 to 10 potatoes, boiled in jackets
1 lb. Cheddar cheese, cut into cubes
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 small jar red pimento
2 sticks margarine, melted
1 or 2 slices bread, toasted and cubed
onion salt to taste
garlic salt to taste
parsley flakes to taste
paprika to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Dice potatoes, leaving some skin on.
Sprinkle cubed cheese on top.
Set aside.
Cook onion slightly in margarine.
Add potatoes with pimento, cheese, bread cubes, onion and seasonings. Do not melt cheese completely, you want them chunky.
Toss, sprinkle with parsley and bake at 350° until cheese starts to melt.
I use a 9 x 13-inch glass pan.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Poached Fish
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water or skim milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 bay leaf
a few cloves or peppercorns
1 lb. fish fillets or steaks of your choice
Directions:
Stir together water, lemon juice, onion and seasonings in a large skillet.
Bring to a simmer.
Add fish; cover and adjust heat to maintain a simmer.
Cook 10 minutes per inch of thickness of thickest part of fish, probably 5 to 10 minutes.
Fish is done when it is opaque and flakes easily with a fork.
Don't overcook or it becomes tough and dry.
Serve hot with sauce or lemon juice or cold in chunks in salad.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettucini, uncooked (eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise or Miracle Whip
1 tsp. minced garlic (in jar)
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, rinsed and drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese (Alpine Lace or Weight Watchers)
Directions:
Prepare fettucini as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 Egg Beater, beaten
1 (8 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (1 c.)
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.
Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in a small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beater.
Toss with fettuccine until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Broccoli, Cauliflower And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 small head trimmed cauliflower, cut in florets
1 small bunch broccoli, trimmed and cut in florets
2 tsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
3 cloves garlic
2 1/2 thickly sliced mushrooms
2 1/2 c. whole noodles
1 c. low-fat small curd cottage cheese
1/2 c. low-fat milk
1/4 c. low-fat sour cream
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
In a large pot of boiling water, cook cauliflower and broccoli until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
With a slotted spoon, remove vegetables and save the liquid for cooking the pasta.
In a large skillet, heat oil.
Saute garlic for 2 minutes over medium heat. Add mushrooms for about 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Saute for 2 to 3 minutes longer; set aside. Meanwhile in reserved boiling vegetable liquid, cook pasta.
Add water if necessary tender but until firm, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain.
In a food processor combine cottage cheese, milk, sour cream and Parmesan.
Pour over broccoli mixture, add drained pasta and toss until mixed.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.
Make 8 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms (white)
1 can Carnation milk
1 stick butter
1/2 c. flour
pinch of garlic powder
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash and slice mushrooms; set aside.
Melt butter over low heat, then add mushrooms, sauteing them until they are slightly brown.
Add flour; stir as you add, then slowly pour in canned milk.
Stir until you get the consistency you like.
Add garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Makes a great sauce over veggies, pasta, chicken or fish.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. butter
3 to 4 Tbsp. ice water
1/3 c. finely chopped onion
1/8 tsp. white pepper
6 slices bacon, fried crisply and crumbled
1/4 lb. Swiss cheese, diced
4 eggs, beaten
2 c. light cream
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Combine flour and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cut in 1/3 cup butter until mixture resembles coarse meal. Gradually stir in ice water until mixture forms a ball.
Roll dough out on lightly floured board to fit 10-inch pie plate. Transfer to plate and shape edges.
Saute onion in 1 tablespoon butter until tender.
Set aside to cool.
Line crust with bacon and cheese.
Combine eggs, cream, remaining salt and spices and sauteed onion.
Pour into crust.
Bake at 375° about 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Serve hot!

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 lb. bacon
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
5 eggs
2 c. sour cream
2 Tbsp. (1/2 pkg.) dry onion soup mix
1/4 c. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper, nutmeg and cayenne
Directions:
Cut bacon into small pieces.
Fry and drain.
Sprinkle over bottom of unbaked 10-inch pie shell.
Add cheese.
Beat eggs until foamy.
Add sour cream, parsley, onion soup and spices.
Beat. Pour into pie shell.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes or until knife comes out clean.
Cool on wire rack about 10 minutes before serving.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. butter
2 Tbsp. ice water
3 eggs
1 1/4 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. mixed herbs
dash of black pepper
dash of salt
1 c. diced smoked ham
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar or Jarlsberg cheese
dash of paprika
Directions:
Measure flour into a bowl.
Cut in butter with a pastry blender until coarse crumbs form.
Add ice water, mixing with a fork until dough forms a ball.
Wrap.
Chill for 1 hour.
Roll dough out to fit bottom and sides of a 9-inch quiche pan.
Prick dough with a fork.
Bake pie shell at 425° for about 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. bacon
1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch of pepper
pinch of nutmeg
1/4 c. grated Swiss cheese
Directions:
Cut bacon in 1-inch pieces; cook until crisp.
Drain on absorbent paper.
Spread on bottom of pie shell.
Beat eggs, cream and seasonings just enough to blend.
Stir in cheese; pour into pie shell.
Bake at 375° for about 35 minutes or until pie shell is golden brown and filling is firm.
Serves 4 as an entree, 8 to 12 as an appetizer.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
2 c. shredded Swiss cheese
8 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
1 tsp. chopped chives
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell
nutmeg
Directions:
Beat eggs in bowl.
Add milk, cheese, bacon, chives, salt and pepper.
Pour into pie shell.
Sprinkle with nutmeg.
Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Yields 6 servings.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. rolled oats
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. raw sunflower seeds
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. slivered almonds
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. dark brown sugar
1/2 c. honey
1 c. raisins
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Heat oven to 300°.
Spread oats, coconut, sunflower seeds, sesame seed, wheat germ and almonds on a 9 x 12-inch baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
4 c. raw oats (Quaker)
1 c. chopped nuts (like almonds, walnuts or sunflower)
1 c. seedless raisins or 1/2 c. mini chocolate chips
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. dry milk powder
1 c. light corn syrup
2/3 c. salad oil
1 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Lightly grease 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch jelly roll pan.
In large bowl, mix all ingredients thoroughly.
Spoon mixture into prepared pan.
With oiled fingers, press out firmly and evenly into pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden.
Cool at least 2 hours before cutting or they will fall apart.
Makes 32 bars at 195 calories each.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick type)
1 c. chopped peanuts (no skins)
1/2 c. Grape-Nuts
1/2 c. bran (unprocessed, uncooked)
sugar substitute to equal 1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Spread the oatmeal on a cookie sheet and heat in a 350° oven for 10 minutes.
Combine all but the last two ingredients.
Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet or pan for 20 minutes, stirring once to brown evenly.
Allow mixture to cook in the oven.
Add wheat germ and raisins.
Refrigerate in glass jars or plastic containers.
(Granulated sugar substitute was more acceptable than liquid sugar substitute in this product.)

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. honey
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
4 1/2 c. granola type cereal
2/3 c. chopped nuts or coconut
Directions:
In a 3-quart pan, melt butter, then add brown sugar, honey, vanilla and salt; stir until well blended.
Stir in granola and desired nuts and coconut.
Turn into a well-greased 10 x 15-inch pan.
Press in firmly to form an even layer.
Bake, uncovered, in a 400° oven until browned and bubbly, about 10 to 15 minutes.
Cool slightly and cut into bars while still warm.
Yields 32 bars.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
2 c. old fashioned oats
1 1/2 c. chopped almonds
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
300°.
In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, coconut,
wheat
germ and salt.
Stir in milk and oil and mix
thoroughly.
Spread
on
a
wax-paper
lined shallow baking pan and bake, stirring occasionally for 1 hour or until golden. Stir
in
raisins.	Let
cool
and	store in airtight containers. Makes 7 1/2 cups.
(And it's delicious too!)

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Leg Of Lamb Mosaic
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied (with fell)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, minced or 1 tsp. dried, crumbled
2 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 lb. fresh spinach leaves, stemmed
4 medium carrots, cooked
4 whole pimientos, drained
1/2 medium onion, thinly sliced
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 medium celery stalks, chopped
2 medium carrots, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. dry vermouth
1 c. chicken stock
Directions:
Position rack in center of oven and preheat to 325°.
Pat meat dry.
Place on surface, fell side down with long edge toward you. Sprinkle with rosemary and garlic.
Cover with layer of spinach leaves.
Arrange 4 carrots in 2 rows across center of meat. Surround carrots with pimientos.
Scatter onion slices atop carrots.
Sprinkle with parsley, 2 teaspoons salt, 3/4 teaspoon pepper and cayenne.
Starting at short end, roll meat up tightly. Tie securely with kitchen twine at 2-inch intervals.
Place on rack in roasting pan.
Add celery, 2 chopped carrots and onion to pan.
Pour vermouth over meat.
Season with salt and pepper. Roast until thermometer inserted in thickest part of meat registers 130° (for medium rare), about 1 1/2 hours, adding up to 1/2 cup water to pan if necessary to keep vegetables from sticking.
Transfer meat to cutting board; let stand 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Moussaka
Ingredients:
2 (1 lb.) eggplants, peeled and cut into 1/4 to 1/2-inch thick slices
1/4 c. cooking oil
2 lb. ground lamb or beef
1 c. chopped onion (large)
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
3/4 c. dry red wine
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried oregano, crushed
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 beaten egg
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 c. milk
3 eggs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
ground cinnamon
snipped fresh parsley (optional)
Directions:
Brush both sides of eggplant slices with the oil. In a large skillet, brown eggplant slices over medium heat about 2 minutes per side. Drain; set aside.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Easy Moussaka
Ingredients:
3 medium size eggplants
1 c. butter or margarine
3 large onions
2 lb. ground lamb (true Moussaka) or beef
3 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. dry red wine
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
salt to taste
freshly ground pepper to taste
6 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. milk
4 eggs, beaten until frothy
nutmeg to taste
2 c. Ricotta cheese
1 c. packaged fine bread crumbs
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplants; slice 1/2-inch thick.
Brown slices quickly in large, heavy skillet in 4 tablespoons butter (more as needed). Set aside.
Heat 4 tablespoons butter in same skillet.
Cook onions until lightly browned.
Add ground meat; cook for 10 minutes.
Combine tomato paste with wine, parsley, cinnamon, salt and pepper; stir into meat.
Simmer, stirring frequently, until all liquid has been absorbed.
Remove from heat.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Spiceland Hen House Eggplant(In Honor Of Stallion, "Nat'S Luck")
Ingredients:
3 large eggplant
water (for cooking)
1/2 lb. bulk Italian mild sausage
3 green onions, chopped
1 c. red onions, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
1 (6 1/4 oz.) pkg. cornbread stuffing mix
1/2 tsp. black pepper flakes
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel and dice eggplant; cook in salted water until tender. Drain well and set aside.
(It is really best to steam, rather than to boil the eggplant.) Saute green onions, red onions and celery in a skillet with small amount of cooking oil until transparent; set aside.
Saute sausage, in skillet, until well done; remove to paper towels; set aside.
Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions; set aside.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Moussaka
Ingredients:
2 large eggplant
2 lb. extra-lean ground beef or lamb
1 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 c. low-sodium tomato sauce
3/4 c. dry red wine
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1/4 tsp. plus dash of ground cinnamon
1 Tbsp. polyunsaturated margarine
2 c. skim milk
1/2 c. low-fat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. arrowroot starch
1/4 c. egg substitute
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into 1/2-inch slices.
Brown eggplant slices in a non-stick frypan.
Set aside.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Garden Rice
Ingredients:
1 bunch green onions, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 lb. zucchini and/or yellow squash, sliced
1 (12 oz.) Mexican corn
3/4 c. butter*
1 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 tsp. cilantro (dry)
3/4 tsp. oregano (dry)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chopped parsley (dry)
1 1/2 c. raw rice (white)
Directions:
Saute green onions, green pepper and squash in 4 tablespoons butter until tender. Add corn, seasonings and parsley. Set aside. Cook rice. Place rice in large bowl. Pour 1/2-cup melted butter over cooked rice and toss lightly. Add seasoned vegetables, tossing again. Place in a buttered casserole dish (13 x 9 x 2). Cover. Heat in 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Rice Soup
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. garlic, chopped
2 medium onions, sliced
4 c. V-8 juice (low sodium)
4 c. water
8 vegetable bouillon cubes (small cubes that make 1 c. each)
2 c. each: frozen green beans, peas, corn and carrots
1 c. brown rice, cooked according to pkg. directions
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can white kidney beans
Directions:
In an 8-quart saucepan, heat oil, garlic and onions over medium high heat.
Saute 5 to 6 minutes or until onions are clear. Add V-8 juice, water, bouillon cubes and vegetables.
Heat until soup comes to a boil.
Add rice and kidney beans.
Allow to heat through.
Remove from heat and serve.
Makes 10 to 12 servings.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Wild Rice With Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/4 c. wild rice
1 c. water
1/4 c. diced onion
1/4 c. brown rice
4 oz. can sliced mushrooms
2 small garlic cloves, minced
1 tsp. beef bouillon granules
1 medium sweet yellow or green pepper, diced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a saucepan except peppers.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and cover.
Simmer 40 minutes.
Stir in pepper.
Simmer covered 10 minutes more.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Brown Rice Salad
Ingredients:
4 to 8 c. cooked brown rice
1 large green and 1 large red pepper, diced
1 yellow pepper, diced (can be added for more color)
2 to 4 c. grated carrot
1/2 to 1 c. fresh parsley, chopped
1/2 to 1 c. currants or raisins
1/2 to 1 c. sunflower seeds
1/2 to 1 c. sliced almonds or any other kind of nut (optional)
1/2 c. Bonita crystallized ginger, chopped (found on the Chinese shelf at Publix with luck or Nutrition Depot) *
Directions:
*This is important; it makes all the difference to the taste. If you don't like ginger, it doesn't matter, but add gradually and taste.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Health Nut Brown Rice
Ingredients:
1/2 c. shredded carrot
1/2 c. shredded zucchini
3 Tbsp. sunflower seeds
3 Tbsp. sliced almonds
1 tsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. parsley, snipped
3 c. cooked brown rice, cooked in chicken broth
1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes
Directions:
Cook carrot, zucchini, sunflower seeds, almonds and pepper flakes in margarine in large skillet over medium-high heat until almonds are browned.
Add rice and parsley; stir until heated.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Beef
Ingredients:
2 small boxes frozen broccoli
2 lb. ground beef
2 c. (8 oz.) tomatoes
1 medium bell pepper
1/2 medium onion
1/2 c. catsup (ketchup)
1/2 c. French salad dressing
salt and pepper as desired
grated sharp or medium sharp Cheddar cheese or low-fat cheese of choice
Directions:
Grate Cheddar cheese.
Cut up and dice onion and bell pepper. In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, pepper and thawed broccoli together until beef is brown and broccoli is cooked, yet still crisp.
Drain off any excess fat.
Put back in skillet and add the remaining ingredients.
Bring to boil; afterwards lower heat to a good simmer.
Simmer for 10 full minutes (or until thickened somewhat).
Serve over cooked rice or pasta.
(You may substitute low-fat ground turkey for a low-fat family meal, if desired.)
Top with grated cheese on individual servings. Delicious!

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Beef Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 1/4 c. milk
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 beaten egg
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, cooked and well-drained
2 crust (9-inch) pie
4 oz. Mozzarella cheese, sliced
milk
Directions:
Brown beef and onion.
Drain off fat.
Stir in flour, salt and garlic.
Add milk and softened cream cheese.
Cook and stir until bubbly.
Add moderate amount of hot mixture to beaten egg. Return to mixture in skillet.
Cook until thickened, 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir in broccoli.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef-Broccoli Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, chopped, cooked and drained
4 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
1/4 c. chopped onion
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. milk
1 egg, beaten
2 recipes plain pastry
milk
Directions:
In a skillet, brown beef and onion; drain off fat.
Stir in flour, salt and garlic salt.
Add 1 1/4 cups of milk and the softened cream cheese.
Cook and stir until smooth and bubbly. Stir about 1 cup of the hot mixture into the beaten egg; return to mixture skillet.
Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture is thickened, 1/2 minute.
Stir in cooked, chopped broccoli; set aside.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef And Broccoli
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. beef tenderloin
1/2 c. beef stock
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. broccoli florets
pinch of red pepper flakes
salt
Directions:
Cut beef into strips 1-inch long, 1/4-inch thick and 1/2-inch wide; set aside.
In a small cup, stir together stock, cornstarch, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
In a heavy skillet, heat 2 tablespoons oil until very hot.
Add broccoli, then toss and stir for 2 minutes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes more over medium heat; remove to side dish.
Return skillet to high heat and add remaining 2 tablespoons oil and heat until smoking hot.
Add beef and cook 2 minutes.
Stir in stock mixture and add along with broccoli.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef Broccoli Supper
Ingredients:
3/4 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 lb. ground beef
1 1/2 c. fresh broccoli florets
1 can (10.75 oz) condensed broccoli cheese soup, undiluted
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt-free seasoning blend
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Cook rice according to package directions.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain.
Add the rice, broccoli, soup, milk, seasoning blend, salt and pepper; stir until combined.
Transfer to a greased 2-quart baking dish.
Toss bread crumbs and butter; sprinkle over beef mixture.
Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Uncover; bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until heated through.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Grilled Steak With Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh shallots
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh chives
1 tsp. chopped fresh tarragon
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. softened butter
4 beef porterhouse or T-Bone steaks
Directions:
In 1-quart saucepan, stir all ingredients except butter and steaks.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until all liquid has evaporated (5 to 6 minutes).
Set aside and cool completely.
In small bowl, stir together butter and cooked, cooled herbs.
Place mixture on waxed paper; shape into 4-inch log.
Refrigerate until serving.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herbed Steak
Ingredients:
1 round steak
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. ketchup
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaves
1 tsp. oregano leaves
1 Tbsp. garlic chips
Directions:
Mix all ingredients and brush all over steak. Salt and pepper. Refrigerate at least 5 hours; no longer than 24 hours. Cook at 250° for 3 hours.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic-Herb Steak Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. dry red wine
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. garlic pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. Italian seasoning
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a glass measure.
Pour in a sterilized decorative bottle or jar.
Cap and refrigerate.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soft butter or margarine
1/4 c. minced parsley
1 tsp. grated onion
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
few drops of Tabasco
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
On halibut steaks, arrange on greased baking pan, which can be used for serving.
Spread on steaks.
Bake in moderate oven at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.
Baste once or twice during baking.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb-Butter Sauce For Grilled Steak
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine
2 tsp. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/3 c. chopped parsley
1 tsp. dried tarragon
dash of Tabasco sauce
Directions:
Put butter/margarine in small bowl and allow to come to room temperature until soft.
Beat with a wooden spoon until light and fluffy.
Add lemon juice, pepper, parsley, tarragon and Tabasco. Thoroughly blend.
Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 1/2 lb. fresh broccoli
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped
Directions:
Wash and trim broccoli; cut stalks into spears.
Cook broccoli, covered in a small amount of boiling unsalted water about 10 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cheddar Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices white or wheat bread
1 medium to large bunch broccoli
3 eggs
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. melted butter
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Butter an 8-inch square glass baking dish.
Cover bottom of dish generously with torn bite-size pieces of bread.
Cut broccoli into bite-size pieces and lay on top of bread pieces.
Mix together all remaining ingredients.
Pour over broccoli and bread. Cover dish with foil or glass cover and bake in a preheated 350° oven for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. broccoli (can use fresh)
1 chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese
1 c. milk
3/4 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook broccoli and onion together for 5 minutes.
In saucepan, melt butter or margarine and mix in flour, salt, pepper and milk. Cook and stir until bubbly.
Blend in cream cheese until smooth. Place broccoli and onion mix in 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
Pour cream cheese mixture on top of broccoli.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 30 to 35 minutes. (This is my favorite of all broccoli casseroles.)

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 boxes frozen chopped broccoli, cooked and drained
1/4 lb. Velveeta cheese, cut into chunks
1 stick butter, melted
1 stack Ritz crackers, crushed
Directions:
Spray 8-inch square baking dish.
Place broccoli in dish. Cook cheese and half of butter in saucepan until cheese melts, stirring constantly.
Pour over broccoli.
Toss crackers with remaining butter in bowl; sprinkle over cheese.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Yield: 4 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1 c. sour cream
1 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Bisquick
1/4 c. margarine
2 eggs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Grease lightly a square baking dish, 8 x 8 x 2-inches.
Spread broccoli in dish. Beat sour cream, cottage cheese, Bisquick, margarine and eggs well with hand beater 1 minute.
Pour over broccoli.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grilled Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. balsamic vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 shallots, finely chopped
1 tsp. dried Italian seasoning
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. molasses
1/2 lb. carrots, scraped
1 sweet red pepper
1 sweet yellow pepper
2 zucchini
2 yellow squash
1 large onion
Directions:
Combine first 7 ingredients in a large bowl.
Set aside.
Cut remaining vegetables into large pieces and add to vinegar mixture, tossing to coat.
Let stand 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain, reserving vinegar mixture.
Arrange in a grill basket. Cook, covered with grill lid, over medium-hot coals (350° to 400°) for 15 to 20 minutes, turning occasionally.
Return vegetables to reserved vinegar mixture, tossing gently.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Makes 6 cups.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grill-Side Garden Salad
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and chopped (about 2 c.)
1 medium zucchini, diced (about 1 c.)
1 c. frozen whole kernel corn, thawed *
1/3 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
1 small ripe avocado, peeled, seeded and coarsely chopped
1/3 c. Pace picante sauce
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro or parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon or lime juice
3/4 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine tomatoes, zucchini, corn, green onions and avocado in large bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients; mix well.
Pour over vegetable mixture and mix gently.
Chill 3 to 4 hours, occasionally stirring gently.
Stir gently and serve chilled or at room temperature with additional picante sauce.
Makes 4 to 6 servings, about 4 cups salad.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Potato Salad
Ingredients:
6 medium red potatoes
3 Tbsp. Crisco oil
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 tsp. freeze dried chives
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/3 c. chopped celery
1/3 c. chopped onion
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 tsp. prepared mustard
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Cool slightly.
Peel and slice potatoes.
Place in medium serving bowl.
Combine Crisco oil, vinegar, chives, sugar, salt and pepper in small bowl.
Stir until blended.
Pour over potatoes.
Cover.
Refrigerate about 2 hours.
Add celery, onion, eggs and parsley.
Mix well.
Combine mayonnaise and mustard in small bowl.
Stir into potato mixture. Cover.
Refrigerate at least 2 hours.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Salad(Marinated)
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
3/4 c. celery, chopped
3/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. wine vinegar
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (12 oz.) can white corn, drained
1 (16 oz.) can French-cut beans, drained
1 (16 oz.) can green English peas, drained
Directions:
Mix the first 8 ingredients and heat to boil.
Combine all ingredients; chill 2 hours.
Will keep for up to 6 weeks.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Potato Salad
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. celery seed
1 medium onion, diced
1 c. celery, diced
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. mustard
1 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 hard-boiled eggs (optional)
Directions:
Boil potatoes with salt until tender.
Drain and sprinkle with celery seed while hot.
Let cool.
Combine rest of ingredients except parsley and eggs; mix well.
Garnish with parsley and sliced hard-boiled eggs, if desired.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
2 pkg. sweet sausage
2 large green peppers, cut in strips
2 large onions, sliced
1 jar marinara sauce
1 can tomato paste
1 can water
1 envelope spatini
Directions:
Fry out sausage and pour off fat.
Drain. Cook onions and peppers in same pan.
Mix sauces and everything together.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Peppers Stuffed With Sausage
Ingredients:
6 bell peppers
1/2 lb. sausage meat
2 c. cooked rice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. tomatoes
1/2 c. boiling water
Directions:
Wash peppers and remove seeds.
Boil for 5 minutes in water to cover.
Remove from water and fill with the meat, rice, salt and strained tomatoes which have been mixed together.
Place in baking dish, add the boiling water and bake at 400° for 1 hour.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Summer Sausage
Ingredients:
5 lb. lean ground meat
5 tsp. Tender Quick salt
6 tsp. hickory smoke salt
2 1/2 tsp. mustard seed
2 1/2 tsp. minced garlic
2 1/2 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
whole black peppers (optional)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except whole black peppers. (Do not use metal bowl!) Refrigerate 24 hours, then mix again. Shape into 5 loaves. Add black whole peppers at this time. Bake on ungreased cookie sheet (one that has sides) at 300° for 15 minutes, then at 150° for 8 hours, turning loaves after 4 hours.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked rice
1/2 c. milk
small amount of onions
1 small bell pepper
1 lb. cooked sausage, slightly drained
dash of salt
1 can mushroom soup
1/3 c. pimiento
Directions:
Mix together and put in casserole dish. Brush cracker crumbs on top with butter and brown.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Italian Sausage With Green Peppers And Onions
Ingredients:
2 lb. Italian sausage, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 large bell peppers, cut in 2-inch squares
4 medium onions, cut in fourths
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. oregano
1/8 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. crushed basil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 small can tomato sauce
2 cans whole tomatoes
1 tsp. cornstarch
Directions:
Saute sausage in 2 tablespoons olive oil for about 15 minutes. Add onions, peppers, tomatoes, tomato sauce and all seasonings. Mix cornstarch with a little water to make paste.
Add to sauce. Cook mixture until sausage, peppers and onions are cooked.
Serve with buttered noodles.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 1/4 lb. flounder
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. grated onion
1 (3 oz.) can mushrooms (undrained)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. light cream
Directions:
In a shallow greased baking dish, arrange the fillets in one layer.
Sprinkle with lemon juice.
In a small saucepan, melt the butter over low heat; stir in flour, onion, salt and paprika.
Add cream and mushrooms, including liquid, in pan.
Cook, stirring constantly, until thick.
Pour over fillets; sprinkle with cheese. Bake in a preheated oven for 25 minutes at 350°.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Easy Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. whitefish fillets
1 Tbsp. lime juice
1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/8 tsp. onion powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°. Place fish in a greased 11 x 7-inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine lime juice, mayonnaise, onion powder and pepper. Spread over fish. Sprinkle with bread crumbs; drizzle with butter. Bake about 20 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 lb. fish fillets
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
salt and pepper
1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. buttered bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Cut
fillets
into serving pieces and place in greased, shallow baking dish.
Sprinkle with lemon juice, paprika, salt and pepper.
Melt butter in saucepan.
Blend in flour, dash of salt and
pepper
and milk.
Cook and stir until thick.
Pour over fish
and sprinkle crumbs over all.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes. Garnish with parsley.
Makes 3 or 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Sauteed Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fish fillets (cod, haddock, sole, flounder)
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. wheat germ
2 shallots, chopped
1 1/2 Tbsp. cold pressed oil
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. parsley, minced
1 lemon, cut into wedges
Directions:
Dip fish in
milk,
then in wheat germ.
Saute shallots in oil and butter in
a
skillet
for
2 minutes, then add the fish. Cook briefly, 3 minutes on one side and 2 on the other. Do	not cook
until
the
fish
is dry and comes apart.
When serving, toss
minced
parsley over.
Add lemon wedges on the side.	Serves 4.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: White Fish Fillet
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 garlic clove, crushed
1 green onion, chopped
pinch of nutmeg
white pepper to taste
1 1/2 oz. dry white wine
1/4 lemon
parsley
1 lb. loaf honey wheat bread dough (frozen)
2 large sliced Maui onions
4 cloves chopped garlic
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. cubed, cooked ham
1 c. fresh Parmesan cheese
3 to 4 Tbsp. fresh Parmesan to top
2 c. fresh basil, chopped
1/4 c. fresh parsley, chopped
2 to 3 Tbsp. Italian seasoning
1 Tbsp. Italian seasoning to top
1 c. black olives, sliced and halved
olive oil to seal ends and rub top of loaf with
pinch of salt to top
Directions:
Defrost bread dough.
Melt butter.
Add onions and garlic. Saute until transparent over medium heat.
Add ham; saute 2 to 3 minutes.
Take off stove; cool 5 minutes.
Add Parmesan, seasonings and olives.
Mix.
Let chill until ready to use.
Can be prepared 24 hours in advance.
Roll dough out on floured board to 1/8-inch, approximately 16 x 12-inch.
Place filling on dough. Spread evenly.
Roll jelly roll style.
Pinch and seal ends with olive oil.
Rub oil over top and sides of loaf.
Salt lightly. Sprinkle with reserved Parmesan and Italian seasoning.
Place in greased large baking pan.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until sounds hollow and top is brown.
Let sit 10 to 15 minutes; slice.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Sausage Scramble(Serves 10 To 12)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sausage
18 eggs
2 c. milk
2 c. croutons (garlic or onion)
3 c. grated cheese (sharp)
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Brown sausage and drain well.
Put into 9 x 13-inch pan.
Beat eggs, milk and cheese.
Pour 1/2 of mixture over sausage.
Spread with croutons.
Pour remainder of egg mixture over croutons.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes (until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Can be cut in half for smaller group.).
Can be made evening before and covered with foil.
(Do not bake.)
Refrigerate and it is ready to pop in the oven an hour before you plan to eat.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Crack eggs in a small bowl.
Mix with a fork.
Melt butter in a frying pan over low heat.
Pour in eggs.
Stir evenly until cooked.
Shake a little salt and pepper to taste.
Careful, not too much!

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Breakfast Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. eggs
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. butter
1 (8 oz.) container sour cream
12 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a medium bowl, beat eggs.
Stir in milk, salt and pepper; set aside.
In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter; pour in egg mixture.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until eggs are set but still moist.
Remove from heat to cool.
Stir in sour cream. Spread evenly into buttered 2-quart shallow baking dish (12 x 7-inch).
Top with bacon and cheese.
Cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 300°.
Uncover eggs; bake 15 to 20 minutes or until hot and cheese has melted.
Refrigerate leftovers.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Sunday Night Scramble
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. coarsely grated Cheddar cheese
1/3 c. chopped green onions
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
Beat eggs and sour cream until light and fluffy.
Stir in cheese and onions.
Melt butter in a large skillet.
Add curry powder and stir for a few seconds.
Add eggs.
Lower heat and stir gently until eggs are cooked to desired consistency.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Western Scramble(Serves 4 To 6)
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1/3 c. milk
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped green pepper
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 can chunky chili beef soup
Directions:
Beat eggs and milk with fork.
In small skillet, cook onion and green pepper in butter until tender.
Pour in egg mixture.
Cook over low heat.
Lift eggs gently now and then until eggs are set but still moist.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Quick Breads Or Bar Cookies Or Sweet Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. powdered sugar
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Mix together all ingredients and put on baked goods while it is still hot and return to the oven for two or three minutes.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Beer-Based Glaze For Ham
Ingredients:
1 (3 lb.) cooked ham
1 (12 oz.) beer
1 1/2 c. dark brown sugar
3 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
whole cloves
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Place ham fat side up in roasting pan. Pour all but 2 tablespoons of the beer on top of ham. Bake until cooked through, about 1 hour, basting occasionally with pan juices.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Glazed Chicken
Ingredients:
2/3 c. apricot or peach preserves
1/4 c. balsamic vinegar
2 tsp. grated orange peel
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 large onions, quartered
about 4 lb. chicken (legs, thighs or breasts)
Directions:
Mix first five ingredients.
Spoon over chicken and onions in roasting pan.
Bake about 45 minutes, basting occasionally.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Cakes
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 stick margarine
1 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Bring to a boil. Boil until it begins to thicken. Add coconut or flavoring.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Glazed Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 cup water
1/2 cup balsamic vinegar
1 tablespoon butter
salt and pepper to taste
baby packaged fresh carrots
brussel sprouts
broccoli
cauliflower
zucchini
yellow squash
Directions:
Place vegetables in a pan with the water and vinegar.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium, and cover.
Cook 10 minutes. Remove lid and turn heat up and allow liquid to reduce and glaze the vegetables.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 c. milk
2 c. fruit
1 c. flour
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. salt
1 stick butter
Directions:
Make batter of 1 cup sugar, flour, milk, baking powder and salt.
Melt butter in baking pan.
Pour batter in butter; add fruit.
Mix rest of sugar, water and pinch of salt together and pour over batter and fruit.
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.
