question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Cobbler(Peach, Strawberry, Apple Or Blackberry)
Ingredients:
1 qt. peaches (or other fruit)
1 1/2 c. sugar
3/4 c. milk
3/4 c. flour
1/2 stick butter
dash of salt
Directions:
Cut peaches, place in pot with 1/2 cup sugar and bring to boil.
Mix 1/2 cup sugar, 3/4 cup flour, salt and milk.
Spray Pyrex with Pam.
Dip peaches in bowl.
Spoon flour mixture over peaches.
Dot with butter, sprinkle 1/2 cup sugar over top of butter.
Bake in oven at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Fresh Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. almond or vanilla
3/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 stick melted butter
1/2 c. white sugar
2 c. sliced peaches
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix the brown sugar, flavoring, 1/2 cup white sugar and sliced peaches together; set aside.
Make batter of the flour, 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder, salt, melted butter and milk.
Pour batter into baking dish.
Cover with peach mixture.
Bake for 45 minutes at 375°.
If it browns too fast, reduce heat to 325°.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
1 c. sugar
1 c. flour, sifted
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 c. milk
1 can fruit (any kind)
3/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Melt butter in 9 x 12 x 2-inch baking pan.
Stir 1 cup sugar, flour, baking powder and milk.
Mix and pour over butter melted in pan.
Mix fruit and 3/4 cup sugar.
Spoon over batter.
Bake at 350° until brown, about 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
5 c. fresh peaches, peeled and sliced
1 c. plus 1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 c. flour, divided
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
Place peaches, 1 cup sugar and nutmeg in a saucepan.
Stir over low heat until peaches begin to exude their juices.
Sprinkle on 1/4 cup flour; cook and stir until well incorporated.
Stir in the butter.
Turn into an ovenproof 9-inch baking dish.
Place remaining flour and salt in a small bowl.
Using a pastry blender (or fingertips), work in the shortening until the mixture resembles coarse meal.
Stir in enough water to make a soft dough. Gather the dough into a ball; roll out on a floured board.
Place rolled out dough over the peaches, tucking under the edges or trimming as needed.
Sprinkle the dough with 1 teaspoon sugar; slash in several places to allow the steam to escape.
Bake in preheated 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until top is well browned.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Tomatoes Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1 clove garlic, crushed
lettuce leaves
4 green onions, finely chopped
1 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Arrange tomatoes in glass baking dish.
Shake oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, pepper, mustard and garlic in tightly covered jar. Pour over tomatoes.
Cover and refrigerate, spooning dressing over tomatoes occasionally, at least 2 hours.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Italian Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1 1/2 c. olive oil or other oil
2 large cloves garlic, crushed
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. dried basil or oregano
Directions:
Combine ingredients in a large jar with a tight fitting lid. Shake well.
Makes 2 cups.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Strong Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. anchovy paste
1 Tbsp. drained capers
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and whisk.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: French Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 c. light olive oil
4 Tbsp. wine vinegar
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1 clove garlic, finely minced
1 Tbsp. each: chopped fresh basil, tarragon and oregano
salt and fresh pepper to taste
Directions:
Whisk together all ingredients and toss with fresh salad. Serve at once.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 to 2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 tsp. five-spice powder
2 lb. sirloin, cut into thin slices
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. beef broth
1 tsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. fresh ginger, grated
2 cloves garlic, grated
1 onion, chopped
2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. snow peas
Directions:
Combine sesame oil and five-spice powder in a skillet and heat to medium-high heat; add beef and brown. Remove from pan.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. sirloin, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. oil
3 c. sliced vegetables (such as green onions, bell peppers, snow peas or mushrooms)
1 pkg. brown gravy mix
3/4 c. cold water
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
dash each of ground ginger and garlic powder
Directions:
Brown sirloin in oil.
Add vegetables.
Mix gravy mix, water and soy sauce together.
Add spices.
Pour over meat and vegetables.
Simmer 1 minute until thickened.
Serve with rice or noodles.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 c. water or chicken stock
8 oz. dried lentils
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil over medium heat until onions are tender. Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice. Simmer about 5 more minutes. Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
8 c. chicken stock or 48 oz. can stock
2 cloves chopped garlic
1 onion, chopped
3/4 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. lentils
1 bunch spinach
3 Tbsp. lemon juice or vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Wash and pick over lentils.
Place in boiling water and cook 2 minutes.
Cover; let sit 1 hour and drain.
(This removes gas.)

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 Tbsp. molasses
2/3 c. orange juice
2 c. canned or cooked mashed pumpkin
3 1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. ground cloves
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Beat butter at medium speed of mixer.
Gradually add sugar; beat well.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add molasses, orange juice and pumpkin.
Combine flour and next 5 ingredients.
Add to creamed mixture; mix until blended.
Stir in vanilla, raisins and nuts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
2/3 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 to 1 tsp. ground cloves
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In
mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the pumpkin, orange juice, molasses and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Add to the creamed mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into two greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3 loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans onto wire racks.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. melted margarine
1 c. pumpkin
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Mix by hand.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Make a well in center.
Add margarine and combine pumpkin, egg and water.
Mix until dry ingredients are moistened.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar, packed
4 eggs
1 c. salad oil
2 c. pumpkin (1 can)
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. allspice
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. salt
2/3 c. water
pinch of ginger
Directions:
Combine the first 4 ingredients, then add the pumpkin.
Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the first mixture. Bake in 2 greased and floured loaf pans for 1 hour at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
4 eggs, lightly beaten
1 can (16 oz.) solid-packed pumpkin
3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
2 t. baking soda
1 t. baking powder
1 t. salt
1 t. ground cinnamon
1 t. ground nutmeg
1/2 t. ground cloves
1/2 t. ground allspice
1/2 c. water
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine sugar, oil and eggs.
Add pumpkin and mix well.
Combine dry ingredients; add to the pumpkin mixture alternately with water.
Pour into
two greased 9-in. 5-in.x3-in. loaf pans.
Bake at 350° for 60-70 minutes or until bread tests done.
Cool in pans 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack; cool completely.
Yields 2 loaves.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1/4 c. chopped green onion
1/2 tsp. basil, crumbled
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 c. melted butter
2 tsp. chicken seasoned stock base
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 c. Chablis or other white wine
1/2 c. half and half
2 whole chicken breasts, halved and boned
1 Tbsp. margarine (for frying)
Directions:
Mix toasted wheat germ, onion, basil and garlic powder into melted butter.
Combine stock base and flour; gradually add wine and half and half.
Stir until smooth.
Add 1 tablespoon of this sauce to wheat germ mixture and set remainder aside.
Place chicken breast on a board, cover with waxed paper and flatten with a mallet.
Place equal amount of wheat germ stuffing in center of each chicken breast.
Roll breasts around stuffing.
Fasten with picks.
Brown chicken and place in a baking dish.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Bake at 400° for 45 to 50 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Swiss cheese, diced
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
pinch of nutmeg
6 large boneless chicken breasts (about 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
2 c. Ragu chunky garden style spaghetti sauce with green peppers and mushrooms
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, bread crumbs, parsley, salt, pepper and nutmeg.
Place 1/4 cup cheese mixture in the center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with toothpicks.
In a large skillet, thoroughly brown chicken on all sides in hot oil; drain fat.
Pour spaghetti sauce over chicken.
Simmer, covered, 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Serves 6.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Mozzarella, diced
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. salt
6 large boneless chicken breasts (approximately 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Place 1/4 cup of cheese mixture in center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with a toothpick.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
6 skinless and boneless chicken breasts
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 chopped medium onion
1 chopped rib celery
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1 peeled carrot, chopped
3/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
parsley, cayenne and paprika
Directions:
Pound breasts between two sheets of Saran Wrap to 1/8-inch thickness.
Saute onion, green pepper, carrot and garlic in butter until soft.
Add bread crumbs and 1/2 cup broth to mixture.
Salt and pepper to taste.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
4 skinless chicken breasts
1/4 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. chopped bell pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2/3 c. herb-seasoned stuffing mix
1/3 c. water
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 can cream of chicken soup
2 Tbsp. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. herb-stuffing mix
chopped parsley
Directions:
Flatten chicken breasts with a meat mallet.
Set aside.
Saute onion, green pepper and garlic in 2 tablespoons margarine.
Stir in 2/3 cup stuffing mix, water, salt and pepper.
Spread stuffing mixture evenly on each chicken breast.
Roll up chicken breast. Secure with wooden picks.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
4 oz. spaghetti (2 c., cooked)
1 can tuna in water, drained and flaked
1/2 c. cooked peas
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil.
Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and oregano; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer, stirring occasionally about 15 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
4 slices sweet onion (thin)
4 slices red onion (thin)
1/2 lb. tuna, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 small tomatoes, sliced
1/4 c. black olives, sliced
2 Tbsp. basil (fresh), minced
2 tsp. garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 lb. linguine
2 Tbsp. capers, drained
Italian parsley sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Add onions and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Add tuna, tomatoes, olives, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; cook until fish is opaque, stirring often, about 9 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta-Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
8 oz. (2 c.) macaroni shells, cooked and drained
2 cans (6 1/2 oz.) tuna, drained and chunked
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. milk
3 c. loosely packed parsley (1 bunch), thick stems removed
2/3 c. coarsely chopped green onions
Directions:
In greased 2-quart baking dish toss shells, tuna and celery. In blender mix mayonnaise, milk, parsley and green onions until smooth.
Pour over tuna mixture; toss to coat.
Bake in preheated 400° oven 15 minutes or until bubbly.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tuna Twist
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. vinegar
dash of pepper
4 oz. pasta twists, cooked and drained
1 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. chopped red onion
1/4 c. snipped dill or 1 Tbsp. dried dill weed
1 can tuna
Directions:
In large bowl, stir together first 3 ingredients until smooth. Add remaining ingredients; toss to coat well.
Cover.
Chill.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake(Microwave)
Ingredients:
6 strips cooked lasagna
1 small onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. flour
2 c. frozen vegetables
1 c. milk
1 1/2 c. shredded cheese
1 c. cottage cheese
1 egg
dash of black pepper
12 1/2 oz. can drained tuna
Directions:
Place lasagna in a 12 x 7-inch glass baking dish. Cover with water and set aside.
In 1-quart glass dish, combine onion, oil and flour. Cook on High power 1 minute. Stir to dissolve flour. Stir in vegetables and milk.
Cook on High for 4 minutes, stirring once. Combine cheese, cottage cheese, egg and pepper.
Drain lasagna.
In the same dish, layer half each lasagna, vegetables, cheese and tuna.
Repeat layers and top with remaining cheese. Cover and cook on High power 15 minutes or until hot.
Let stand 10 minutes or so.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cooking oil or melted butter
2 c. flour
Directions:
Take turns holding the mixer until eggs are fluffy.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth, but do not overmix. Grease hot griddle with shortening.
Pour batter to make 4 inch pancakes.
Cook until puffed, turn and cook other side until golden brown.
We like to cut them into shapes and spread butter and jelly.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Favorite Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. soda
2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 beaten egg
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. salad oil or melted shortening
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, sugar, soda and salt. Combine egg, milk and salad oil; add to dry ingredients, stirring just until flour is moistened (batter will be lumpy).
Bake on hot griddle.
Makes about 12 dollar size or eight (4-inch) pancakes.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour, sifted
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. shortening, melted
Directions:
Sift together the flour, salt, soda and sugar.
Beat egg with half the buttermilk.
Add to the dry ingredients and beat until smooth.
Slowly add the remaining buttermilk to make a thin batter, stirring constantly.
Mix in the melted shortening.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 whole egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar in 1 bowl.
In another bowl, beat egg.
Add buttermilk, Wesson oil and vanilla.
Stir and add liquid ingredients to dry.
Stir, leaving entire ingredients slightly lumpy.
Bake on hot griddle (greased) until bubbles form.
Turn once and bake other side or place on waffle iron until lightly browned.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 beaten eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. melted shortening
Directions:
Sift together the dry ingredients.
Add the remaining ingredients all at one time and mix.
Do not overbeat.
Batter should be lumpy.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried-Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen shrimp in shells
1 c. sifted all purpose flour
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 slightly beaten egg
2 Tbsp. salad oil
2/3 c. grated coconut
1-1/2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
Cook 1 pound shelled shrimp; drain.
In saucepan melt 1/4 cup butter or margarine.
Stir in 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour.
Add 1 1/2 cups milk all at once; cook and stir till thickened and bubbly.
Add shrimp, 1/4 cup dry sherry, 1/2 teaspoon salt, dash pepper, and dash paprika.
Pour into 5 coquilles (individual baking shells).
Sprinkle each serving with 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese.
Broil 3 to 4 inches from heat till cheese browns.
Makes 5 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 cube oleo
4 medium onions, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
9 garlic cloves, chopped
handful of celery leaves, chopped
10 dried chili peppers, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin seed, crushed
4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
2/3 can tomato sauce
Directions:
Fry on medium-high heat the oil, all spices and celery leaves until absorbed by oil and not powder.
Add tomato sauce and cook until thick.
Skin and cup up chicken and put in large pot. Add sauce to chicken and simmer 20 to 25 minutes.
Add water to not quite halfway to the top of chicken.
Cover and simmer until done.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry Surprises
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped, cooked chicken
2 Tbsp. chopped apple
2 Tbsp. chopped green onion
1 c. finely chopped peanuts
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. curry powder
dash of hot sauce
1 (7 oz.) bag shredded coconut
Directions:
Combine the chicken with the chopped apple, green onion, peanuts, mayonnaise, curry powder and hot sauce in large bowl, blending well.
Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 4 hours or until chilled.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Panang Curry
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Taste of Thai coconut milk
1 Tbsp. Taste of Thai Panang Curry Base
1 lb. boneless chicken, cut in strips
2 Tbsp. Taste of Thai seasoning sauce
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 medium tomato, diced
1 yellow bell pepper, diced
3 scallions, diced
2 c. mushrooms, sliced
2 tsp. Taste of Thai garlic chili pepper sauce (use this cautiously; you might prefer a little less)
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine coconut milk and curry base and cook until blended over medium heat.
Add chicken, seasoning sauce and lemon juice and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce.
Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce to taste.
Cover and simmer for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tacos
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. salt
2 cans refried beans
1 small can Pet milk
1 onion
chili powder to taste
2 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
4 c. cheese
Directions:
Fry beef, onion, salt and chili powder together.
Drain. Blend refried beans and Ro-Tel tomatoes.
Add to beef.
Then add Pet milk and cheese.
Cook until cheese is melted.
Serve over corn chips.
Then top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes, onions, sour cream and taco sauce.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Taco Salad(Quick And Easy!)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
corn chips
1 tomato, diced
1 (8 oz.) jar taco sauce
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 medium diced onion
shredded Cheddar cheese
1 head lettuce, shredded
3 Tbsp. soy sauce (light)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. rice vinegar
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. sesame oil
4 c. shredded lettuce
8 oz. flaked cooked fish
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1/2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/4 c. chopped red cabbage
1/4 c. diagonally sliced green onions
1/4 c. thinly sliced celery
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
To make dressing, whisk first 6 ingredients together in a large bowl.
Add lettuce, fish and vegetables.
Toss with dressing.
Top with bean sprouts and serve.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Authentic Tacos
Ingredients:
3 1/2 lb. lean, boneless beef, pork or chicken
flour
water
1/2 bell pepper strips
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 small can tomato sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 jalapeno pepper, chopped
Directions:
Roll meat in flour and place in stock pot filled with 1/4-inch water.
Brown meat and cook on low heat for about 30 minutes.
Then roll up and heat to high and add remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 hour longer until meat is shredding.
Serve in flour tortillas and garnish with lettuce and picante sauce.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Fish Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) pkg. fish portions
1 c. macaroni
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 1/2 Tbsp. taco mix
1 medium green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook macaroni and drain.
In saucepan, stir undrained tomatoes, onions and taco mix.
Add macaroni and green pepper strips.
Bring mixture just to boiling and pour into 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish.
Put fish on mixture and spoon some sauce over it.
Bake covered at 350° for 35 minutes.
Uncover and sprinkle cheese over fish and bake 5 more minutes.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Garden Frittata
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. broccoli
1 c. sliced carrots
4 eggs
4 Egg Beaters
1 c. nonfat cottage cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. sliced mushrooms
6 thin slices tomato
1 Tbsp. Parmesan
Directions:
Steam broccoli and carrots for 10 minutes.
Beat together eggs, Egg Beaters, cottage cheese, salt and pepper.
Stir in carrots and broccoli and mushrooms.
Spray 10-inch round pan with Pam.
Pour in egg mixture.
Bake at 350° until eggs are cooked and knife inserted in center comes out almost clean.
Top with tomatoes; sprinkle with Parmesan.
Broil 1 to 2 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Frittata
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped peeled potato
1/3 c. sliced zucchini
1/3 c. onion, sliced in rings
8 oz. frozen egg substitute, thawed
4 oz. (1/2 c.) cooked chicken or turkey, cubed
1/2 tsp. dried basil, crumbled
1/2 tsp. dried dill, crumbled
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
You will also need nonstick cooking spray.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Frittata
Ingredients:
1 large sweet red pepper, chopped
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese, divided
1/4 lb. asparagus, cut into 1-inch pieces
7 large eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. chopped basil, fresh or dried
Directions:
Layer pepper, mushrooms and half of cheese in a lightly greased deep dish pie plate.
Top with asparagus and remaining cheese.
Combine eggs and remaining ingredients; pour evenly over cheese.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Western Style Frittata
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
4 oz. Canadian bacon, sliced and cut into strips
2 medium onions, sliced
1 bell pepper, chopped (optional)
7 eggs
1 1/2 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
season with pepper to taste
Directions:
In a 10-inch nonstick skillet, heat 2 tablespoons butter over low heat; add bacon and cook.
Add onions and green pepper, stirring frequently; cook about 5 minutes.
In medium bowl, beat eggs, cheese, pepper and bacon mixture until combined.
Melt 2 more tablespoons butter; add to egg mixture.
Cook on low heat until bottom is set.
Place in a preheated 300° oven.
Cook until desired consistency is reached, about 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Frittata
Ingredients:
4 1/2 tsp. olive oil
1/4 c. chopped onion
6 eggs
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
3/4 c. (3 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
dash of red pepper
dash of nutmeg
Directions:
Heat 3 teaspoons oil in skillet.
Add onion; cook until tender.
Remove onion and set aside.
Lightly beat eggs in bowl. Add onion, spinach, cheese and seasonings.
Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons oil in same skillet; add egg mixture.
Cook 5 minutes or until browned lightly.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Delight
Ingredients:
1 c. light cream
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
3 chopped hard-boiled eggs
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
dash of cayenne pepper
1 1/4 c. canned salmon, flaked
4 slices buttered toast or patty shells
Directions:
Place top chafing pan in water jacket.
When heated, put in cream, eggs, butter, cayenne and parsley.
While it's steaming, add drained salmon.
Heat through well.
Do not let it boil. Serve on toast or patties.
A dash of sherry is optional.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Spread
Ingredients:
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/2 c. boiling water
4 oz. cream cheese, cut up
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 (8 oz.) can salmon, drained and flaked
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
12 pimento-stuffed green olives, chopped
Directions:
Blend together gelatin and water.
Add cream cheese, mayo, vinegar and salmon.
Blend all together and add green pepper and olives.
Blend together and pour into a 3-cup mold.
Refrigerate until set.
Unmold and sprinkle with paprika.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Medley
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked salmon or canned, flaked
2 boiled potatoes, diced
2 Tbsp. green, yellow and/or red sweet peppers, chopped
1/4 c. onion, chopped
pinch of cayenne pepper
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. parsley, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. heavy cream
Directions:
In a bowl, combine all ingredients, except olive oil and cream.
In a skillet, heat olive oil.
Add salmon mixture and flatten with back of a spatula.
When the mixture begins to develop a crust on the bottom, flip over with spatula.
Add cream and turn up heat to thicken sauce and brown other side quickly. Garnish with avocado slices and add salsa to taste.
Makes 2 servings.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
1 loaf French bread, sliced 1/4-inch thick
butter
garlic powder
Directions:
Spread butter evenly on bread slices, taking to edges of bread. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cut into cubes. Bake at 350° until crispy. Store in airtight bags. Will keep for several days.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Carrot Soup With Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 small onion, chopped
1 medium potato, chopped
1 lb carrots, peeled and chopped
3 c. vegetable stock
several pinches of sugar
2/3 c. half and half
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. favorite herb (basil or oregano work well)
2 slices white bread
Directions:
Melt butter in a pan and saute the onions, potatoes and carrots for ten minutes on med low heat.
Add stock and sugar and bring slowly to a boil.
Simmer for 30 minutes.
In a food processor, puree soup.
Return to pan and add half and half. Season with salt and pepper and serve.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
1 loaf day-old French, sourdough, wheat, or multi-grain bread
3/4 c. olive oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 275°.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
dry bread
butter
Directions:
Trim the crusts from day-old bread.
Cut into cubes the size you want your croutons to be.
Place the cubes on an ungreased baking sheet and toast in a 350° oven until they are golden brown. In a large skillet, melt 2 tablespoons of butter at a time.
When the butter's foam begins to subside, add a batch of the toasted bread cubes and saute lightly on all sides.
Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Easy Make Croutons
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. margarine
about 4 c. fresh bread cubes
dried herbs of your choice (basil, chives, pepper and parsley)
Directions:
Place margarine in a 7 x 11-inch pan.
Microwave on High for 1 minute.
Stir in bread cubes and dried herbs.
Microwave, uncovered, on High for 4 to 6 minutes, stirring every minute.
Let stand for 5 minutes to harden completely.
Use for garnish for soups or salads.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 eggs, separated
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
5 Tbsp. cold water
pinch of salt
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and lemon-colored.
Melt the chocolate with the water in a baking dish in a 350° oven for a few minutes.
Do not stir until chocolate is creamy.
Add egg yolks and sugar while chocolate is still warm.
Beat egg whites with pinch of salt until stiff.
Fold chocolate mixture into egg whites until there are no streaks.
Whip cream and add vanilla. Fold into chocolate mixture.
Spoon into serving bowl or individual cups.
Chill for 4 hours.
Serves 6.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
5 (1 oz. each) sq. semi-sweet chocolate
2 (1 oz. each) sq. unsweetened chocolate
3 Tbsp. strong coffee
6 eggs
3 egg yolks
1 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. light rum
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/4 c. water
2 c. heavy or whipping cream
Directions:
In small saucepan, combine chocolates and coffee.
Heat over low heat until chocolates are melted.
Cool.
In a large mixer bowl, beat eggs and yolks on high speed 10 minutes.
Add sugar and beat until shiny, 5 minutes.
Add melted chocolates, rum and vanilla.
Beat just until thoroughly blended.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 large egg yolks
3 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sugar
2 oz. semisweet chocolate
4 oz. milk chocolate
Directions:
Beat egg yolks in small bowl with electric mixer on high speed until thick and lemon colored, about 3 minutes. Gradually add sugar and beat on high speed. Heat 1 cup whipping cream in 2-qt. saucepan over medium heat just until hot (do not boil). Gradually stir half of the hot cream into egg yolk mixture; stir back into hot cream in saucepan. Cook over low heat about 5 minutes, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens (do not boil). Let cool for about 10 minutes. Add chocolate to egg yolk mixture and stir until mixture thickens and chocolate is well blended, about 5 minutes. Cover and refrigerate for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally, just until chilled. Beat 1 1/2 c. whipping cream in chilled medium bowl with electric mixer on high speed until stiff. Mix 3/4 c. of whipped cream into chocolate mixture until blended. Fold remaining whipped cream gradually into chocolate mixture until well blended. Pipe or spoon mixture into cups or small dessert bowls. Refrigerate any remaining dessert.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 pkg. semi-sweet chocolate pieces
1 Tbsp. flour
3 eggs, separated
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. vanilla or rum
1 Tbsp. grated orange rind
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour and egg yolks; stir in milk; heav over low heat, stirring with whisk until mixture reaches consistency of mustard sauce.
Add butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat.
Add chocolate; stir until melted. Stir in vanilla or rum, and orange rind.
Cool slightly.
Add stiffly beaten egg whites and 1 cup of the cream, whipped stiff. Pour into sherbert dishes.
Chill about 5 hours, until firm.
Whip remaining cream as topping.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
8 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
4 Tbsp. water
1/2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
4 egg yolks
4 egg whites
Directions:
Melt the chocolate and water together in a small pan.
Stir in the vanilla flavoring and butter, then the egg yolks, 1 at a time. Beat the egg whites until stiff.
Fold the chocolate mixture into the egg whites, using a rubber spatula or a metal spoon.
When thoroughly mixed, pour into a glass bowl.
Cover and chill overnight.
Serve with whipped cream on top.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Perfect Rolls
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. salt
2 pkg. yeast
1 egg
1 stick margarine
2 c. water
about 6 c. flour
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine sugar, salt, yeast and 2 cups flour. In pan, heat margarine and water until very warm (120° to 130°). Beat liquid into dry mixture until blended.
Increase speed to medium.
Beat 2 minutes.
Beat in egg.
Continue beating 2 minutes more.
With spoon, stir in remaining 3 to 4 cups flour to make a soft dough.
Turn on floured surface.
Knead 10 minutes.
Shape into ball.
Let rest 10 minutes.
Shape and raise 1 hour.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes in a 400° oven.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
water
salt (brings water to a boil quicker)
Directions:
Put eggs in single layer in saucepan.
Add enough tap water to cover eggs about 1 inch.
Quickly bring water to boiling.
Boil on medium to high heat 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Let eggs stand covered in the hot water 10-15 minutes for large eggs. Run cold water over eggs until cooled.
To remove shell, gently tap all over.
Roll egg between the hands to loosen shell, then peel, starting at large end.
Hold egg under running cold water or dip in bowl of water to help ease off shell.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Hard-Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
2 Tbsp. vinegar
water (to cover)
Directions:
Place eggs in saucepan just large enough to accommodate all. Cover with water right out of top.
Add the vinegar.
Bring to boil slowly over medium heat.
Boil 1 minute.
Remove from heat. Cover and let stand 10 minutes.
Cool with running water.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Perfect Day Potato Salad
Ingredients:
8 medium potatoes
3 eggs
5 stalks celery, finely chopped
4 Tbsp. sweet relish
1 tsp. grated onion
salt, pepper and paprika to taste
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Boil potatoes with eggs about 25 minutes or until fork pierces easily; do not overcook.
Drain and refrigerate.
When cold, peel potatoes and cut into uniform small cubes.
Shell and finely chop eggs.
In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except mayonnaise and sour cream with a fork.
Lastly coat lightly with mayonnaise and sour cream.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Egg Song
Ingredients:
eggs
Directions:
For perfect soft-boiled eggs, sing "Onward Christian Soldiers" once; for medium boiled eggs, sing twice.
For hard-boiled, sing three times.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. sweet potatoes, scrubbed and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 to 2 Tbsp. butter
salt and freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Place potatoes in one layer in a lightly buttered baking dish. Dot with butter and roast in preheated 375° oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until tender, tossing every 10 minutes and adding more butter, if necessary.
Serve hot with salt and pepper to taste.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes Roasted With Garlic
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
6 cloves garlic (unpeeled)
4 medium sweet potatoes, sliced
2 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In a small roasting pan, combine the oil and garlic and heat for 5 minutes.
Add potatoes and rosemary, turning the potatoes to coat well with oil.
Turning the potatoes frequently, roast them for 35 minutes or until tender and brown on all sides.
Sprinkle with salt.
Serves 4, 186 calories each.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 large sweet potatoes, peeled
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. honey
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Heat oven to 425 degrees. Grease baking pan. Cut sweet potatoes crosswise into 3/4 slices, halving larger sweet potatoes if necessary. Place in a single layer greased pan. In a small bowl combine oil, honey, rosemary and salt. Microwave on high for 20-30 seconds or until heated. Blend well. Brush mixture over sweet potatoes slices. Bake 425 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
sweet potatoes
olive oil
salt
pepper
parsley
garlic powder
Directions:
Cut sweet potatoes into 1 1/2-inch squares.
Drizzle olive oil on top.
Sprinkle all other ingredients.
Put in roasting pan. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes; turn.
Bake 45 minutes more.
Turn oven to 425° for last 10 minutes, until potatoes are nice and crisp.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Roasted Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. Honey
2 Tbsp. Grapeseed or Canola Oil
6 small Sweet Potatoes, scrubbed and halved
6 Cinnamon Sticks
Salt and freshly ground Pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
In small bowl, whisk together honey and oil.
Rub each sweet potato halve with honey and oil mixture.
Season potatoes with salt and pepper.
Press a cinnamon stick between matching halves of each sweet potato and wrap potatoes in foil.
Place on a baking sheet and roast for 30 min. Remove foil from potatoes and arrange skin side up on baking sheet.
Place cinnamon sticks next to potatoes and return to oven. Bake until potatoes and cinnamon sticks brown lightly; about 30 min.
Transfer to serving platter.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant In Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
4 c. fresh eggplant, peeled and cubed
2 medium white onions, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
3 garlic cloves, crushed
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and cubed
1 bay leaf
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 tsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. oregano
3 Tbsp. tomato paste
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute the eggplant, onions, pepper, garlic and salt in the olive oil.
Add tomatoes, bay leaf, dissolved chicken bouillon cube, vinegar and oregano.
Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add tomato paste and mix well.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove the lid, stir and discard bay leaf. Serve hot.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Dish
Ingredients:
1 small eggplant
4 medium tomatoes, sliced
2 medium size green peppers, chopped
2 medium onions, chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1 (12 oz.) pkg. sharp Cheddar cheese, cut into 1/8-inch slices
Directions:
Cut eggplant into 1/4-inch slices. Cook in a small amount of boiling water for 5 to 10 minutes or until eggplant is tender. Drain well.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Seasoned Eggplant
Ingredients:
Olive oil cooking spray
1 large eggplant, unpeeled, cubed
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped bell pepper
1 large tomato
6 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 tsp. dried thyme leaves
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray large skillet with cooking spray, heat over medium heat until hot.
Saute vegetables until crisp-tender.
Add herbs and red pepper and cook for 2 minutes.
Add broth to skillet and heat to boiling, reduce heat and simmer, covered, until vegetables are soft and most of the liquid is absorbed, for about 20 minutes.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant In Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
2 unpeeled eggplants
olive oil
1 onion, chopped
1/2 pepper, chopped (green)
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 can tomato sauce
2 diced tomatoes
3 diced and fried potatoes (optional)
Directions:
Slice eggplants.
Wash slices and sprinkle with salt.
Let sit aside.
Later, squeeze water out of eggplant and brown lightly in olive oil.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (1 1/2 lb.) eggplant
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1 finely chopped onion
1/2 tsp. oregano leaves
1/2 c. crumbled saltines
6 medium tomatoes, sliced
1/2 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Boil eggplant in water and salt (sliced); drain and mash. Blend eggs, pepper, onion, oregano and saltines.
Slice tomatoes and spread over top, then sprinkle cheese.
Bake in a buttered casserole for 25 minutes at 375°.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kalee'S Favorite Dinner(Very Quick And Easy)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
1 onion, chopped
1 can tomato soup (no water)
1 can green beans
potatoes, mashed
grated cheese (1/2 c.)
Directions:
Brown meat and onion.
Season to taste with salt, pepper and garlic.
Add soup and drained green beans.
Put in casserole dish and top with mashed potatoes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes, just to brown top of potatoes and melt cheese.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Italian Style Kale
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) pkg. fresh kale
1 medium can tomatoes, crushed
6 medium potatoes or small new potatoes
1 onion, sliced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Boil kale; drain.
Place in pan with crushed tomatoes, olive oil, chopped onion, potatoes (halved), salt and pepper.
Cook until tender.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: White Bean, Kale And Roasted Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
nonstick vegetable oil spray
3 medium carrots, peeled and quartered lengthwise
2 large tomatoes, quartered
1 large onion, cut into 8 wedges
1/2 small butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cut lengthwise into 1/2 inch thick wedges
6 garlic cloves, unpeeled
1 Tbsp olive oil
6 cups or more canned vegetable broth (I use Knorr vegetarian vegetable bouillon)
4 cups finely chopped kale
3 large fresh thyme sprigs
1 bay leaf
1 - 15 oz. can great northern beans, drained
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray rimmed baking sheet with oil spray. Arrange carrots, tomatoes, onion, squash and garlic on baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Toss to coat. Bake until vegetables are brown and tender, stirring occasionally, about 45 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kale Greens
Ingredients:
3 qt. water
3 lb. kale
1/4 lb. seasoning meat (fat back, lean salt pork, ham or smoked turkey pieces)
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place the meat in the water with the red pepper.
Cook with lid on for about 1 1/2 hours or until meat is tender.
Wash kale several times.
Trim off the root and heavier part of the leaf. Remove meat and put the kale in; cook until tender.
Replace the meat on top and heat thoroughly.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kris Kringles
Ingredients:
1 c. light Karo syrup
1 c. sugar
1 c. peanut butter
6 c. Rice Krispies
1 c. chocolate chips
1 c. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Mix together Karo syrup and sugar in a large saucepan; bring to a boil.
Add peanut butter; stir until well blended.
In a large bowl, mix the peanut butter mixture with the Rice Krispies. Stir to coat.
Press into a 9 x 13-inch pan; cool.
Melt chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in a double boiler.
Frost the Rice Krispie mixture with the melted chips.
When cool, cut into squares.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. squash, peeled and seeded
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. curry
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
3 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter
1/2 c. cream or evaporated milk
Directions:
Saute onion until wilted.
Add garlic.
Cut squash into 1-inch cubes.
Put into soup pot.
Add chicken broth, water and nutmeg; boil until squash is tender.
Remove from heat.
Add curry and pepper; stir.
Stir in Worcestershire sauce and peanut butter. Whirl mix in blender or food processor, adding cream or evaporated milk.
Reheat.
Makes 2 1/2 quarts.
Freezes well.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 butternut squash
1 small chopped onion
fresh parsley, chopped
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 pt. heavy cream
2 to 3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Saute onion.
Cut up squash; boil with 1 tablespoon sugar until soft.
Add onion to chicken soup.
Add chopped parsley and onions.
Drain and mash squash and add to soup mixture.
Put through blender briefly.
Add cream and melted butter.
Stir briefly.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 large butternut squash, halved
3 Tbsp butter
1/4 tsp cinnamon
1/4 tsp nutmeg
1/8 tsp cloves
1 Tbsp sugar
3 Tbsp olive oil
1 onion chopped
2 Idaho potatoes, peeled and chopped into large pieces
8 c chicken stock (or water + bouillon cubes)
1/4 c heavy cream (optional)
salt and white pepper to taste
Directions:
In a preheated, 400 degree oven, roast the butternut squash with the seasonings, butter and sugar, until soft and browned. Remove from oven and scoop squash from rind.
In a soup pot, heat olive oil and saute onions.
When translucent, add potatoes and squash flesh.
Cover with chicken stock and simmer until potatoes are soft.
Remove from heat and puree with stick blender or in an upright blender.
Return to soup pot and add heavy cream.
Season to taste.
Enjoy!

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
1 1/2 Tbsp. minced, peeled fresh ginger root
3 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 c. (1 1/2 lb.) peeled, seeded, thinly sliced butternut squash
2 c. canned chicken broth
2 c. water
3 cloves garlic
2 Tbsp. lime juice
salt
white pepper
Directions:
Cook onion and ginger root in butter until onion is soft.
Add squash, broth, water and garlic and bring to a boil.
Simmer 15 minutes until squash is tender.
Puree mixture.
Stir in lime juice.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve warm.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger
2 large carrots, peeled and sliced (about 1 c.)
2 medium butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cut into chunks (about 2 lb. each)
40 saltine crackers
1 c. chopped onions
3 c. apple juice
2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
In large saucepan, over medium-high heat, cook carrots, onions and garlic in margarine until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add ginger, curry, cinnamon and nutmeg; cook for 1 minute.
Add squash and apple juice.
Heat to a boil.
Cover; reduce heat.
Simmer for 15 minutes or until squash is tender. In blender or food processor container, puree soup, in batches, until smooth.
Return to saucepan; heat through.
Serve hot or chilled with crackers. Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Brisket
Ingredients:
1 trimmed beef brisket (6 or 8 lb.)
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can applesauce or equivalent
1/2 small can tomato paste
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Place brisket in crock-pot, cutting meat if necessary to fit into pot. In a bowl, stir together all other ingredients and pour over meat. Cover; cook on low heat setting about 10 hours or until meat is tender.
Remove meat, reserving juices; cover to keep warm.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Corned Beef And Cabbage
Ingredients:
2 to 3 lb. corned beef brisket
3 carrots, cut into 3-inch pieces
1 medium cabbage, cut into small wedges
1 large onion, quartered
1 c. water
Directions:
Put carrots in slow cooker first.
Then add remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours or 4 to 6 hours on high.
Push cabbage wedges down into liquid after 4 to 6 hours (if cooking on low) or after 2 to 3 hours (if cooking on high). Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Brisket Of Beef With Hunters Sauce
Ingredients:
3 1/2 to 4 lb. brisket, trimmed
1 pkg. onion soup mix
1 1/4 c. water
1/2 lb. chopped mushrooms
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. fresh minced green onion
1/2 c. dry white cooking wine
3 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
pinch of dried tarragon
pinch of dried chervil
1 1/2 c. skimmed meat juice
2 beef bouillon cubes
Directions:
Place brisket in 2 layers of heavy-duty foil.
Sprinkle 1/2 package soup mix over meat.
Add 1/2 cup water.
Seal tightly. Bake 4 hours at 300°.
Refrigerate meat and juices separately.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Beef Brisket Pot Roast
Ingredients:
4 lb. boneless fresh brisket beef
1 large onion, coarsely chopped
salt and black pepper
all-purpose flour
water
vegetables of choice
Directions:
Heat large heavy pot.
Add meat.
Brown on all sides without oil.
Pour off any fat.
Sprinkle onion around meat.
Cover tightly.
Cook over low heat for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Keep covered and let meat cool to lukewarm.
When cool, slice across grain for serving.
Return meat to pot.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer 1 to 2 hours longer or until tender, turning slices once.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Beef Soup(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 qt. tomato juice
2 carrots, sliced
3 celery stalks, sliced
2 medium onions
2 medium potatoes
1 tsp. salt
4 peppercorns
3 beef bouillon cubes
1 pkg. green beans
1 pkg. mixed vegetables
Directions:
Cover and cook on low for 12 hours.
Thick and delicious.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Quick Breads Or Bar Cookies Or Sweet Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. powdered sugar
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Mix together all ingredients and put on baked goods while it is still hot and return to the oven for two or three minutes.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Beer-Based Glaze For Ham
Ingredients:
1 (3 lb.) cooked ham
1 (12 oz.) beer
1 1/2 c. dark brown sugar
3 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
whole cloves
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Place ham fat side up in roasting pan. Pour all but 2 tablespoons of the beer on top of ham. Bake until cooked through, about 1 hour, basting occasionally with pan juices.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Glazed Chicken
Ingredients:
2/3 c. apricot or peach preserves
1/4 c. balsamic vinegar
2 tsp. grated orange peel
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 large onions, quartered
about 4 lb. chicken (legs, thighs or breasts)
Directions:
Mix first five ingredients.
Spoon over chicken and onions in roasting pan.
Bake about 45 minutes, basting occasionally.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Mint Glaze For Lamb
Ingredients:
1 c. mint jelly
1 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Heat until jelly is melted.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Pork
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dark corn syrup
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
You can add a little chickory if smoke flavor is desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey-Vegetable Chili
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive oil
15 oz. ground turkey
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped bell pepper
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
2 c. coarsely chopped tomatoes with juice
1/4 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. no-salt-added tomato paste
2 Tbsp. drained, canned, diced mild green chilies
1/4 tsp. salt
4 oz. rinsed, drained, canned kidney beans
1 c. frozen corn kernels
Directions:
Warm 2 teaspoons oil until hot, but not smoking.
Add the turkey and brown.
Put turkey aside and drain.
Add remaining 2 teaspoons oil to pan and saute onions and bell pepper until golden (3 to 5 minutes).
Stir in chili powder, garlic and cumin.
Cook, stirring, for 1/2 to 1 minute.
Add the next 5 ingredients.
Add turkey and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the kidney beans and corn.
Cook about 5 minutes until last ingredients are heated through.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
canola oil
1 lb. lean ground raw turkey
1 c. chopped celery
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can V-8 juice
1 (16 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained
1 bay leaf
2 Tbsp. dried minced onion
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. instant beef bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
1/2 to 1 c. beer (optional)
Directions:
Spray cold pan with canola oil.
Cook turkey and celery.
Use a meat fork to break turkey into pieces.
Cook until no longer pink.
Stir in remaining ingredients, tomatoes, juice, sauce, beans, spices and beef, if desired.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer at least 30 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Discard bay leaf.
Serves 4.
Can be doubled easily.
(Serving has 4 grams of fat and 380 calories.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground turkey
3 medium onions, chopped
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
2 (15 oz. each) cans tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth
1 medium green pepper, seeded and chopped
1 medium red pepper, seeded and chopped
1 medium yellow pepper, seeded and chopped
2 (4 oz. each) cans diced green chilies, drained
2 tart apples, chopped
3 Tbsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1 1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 Tbsp. bottled hot pepper sauce
2 (15 oz. each) cans kidney beans, drained
1 c. slivered almonds
shredded cheese (optional)
Directions:
Cook turkey, onions and garlic in Dutch oven over medium flame; drain.
Add remaining ingredients except kidney beans, almonds and cheese.
Bring to a boil over high flame.
Reduce flame to simmer, cover and cook 1 hour.
Add kidney beans and almonds.
Simmer an additional 30 minutes.
Garnish with shredded cheese, if desired.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
3/4 c. dried kidney beans, cooked
1 c. water
3 medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped
1 (6 oz.) can (no-salt) tomato paste
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
30 fat free saltine crackers
Directions:
In large heavy pot, brown turkey; pour off any excess fat. Add onion, green pepper and garlic; cook 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add beans, water, tomatoes, tomato paste, chili powder, oregano, cumin and red pepper; cover.
Simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot with crackers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. ground white turkey meat
2 c. chopped onion
1 green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
2 Tbsp. crushed red pepper flakes
3 Tbsp. chili powder
2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes, chopped (undrained)
1 (8 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (12 oz.) can corn
2 tsp. salt
2 (16 oz.) cans red kidney beans (undrained)
Directions:
Brown turkey with onion, green pepper, chili powder and garlic.
Drain off any grease.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie(Crust And Filling)
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. and 1 Tbsp. shortening
2 or 3 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Measure flour and salt into bowl.
Cut in shortening thoroughly.
Sprinkle with water, 1 tablespoon at a time, mixing until all flour is moistened and dough almost cleans side of bowl (1 or 2 more tablespoons of water can be added if needed.)
Gather dough into ball; shape into flattened round on lightly floured cloth-covered board.
With flour covered rolling pin, roll dough 2-inches larger than inverted pie pan.
Fold pastry into quarters; unfold and ease into pan.
Trim overhang edge of pastry 1-inch from rim of the pan.
Fold and roll pastry edges under, even with pan; flute.
Fill and bake as directed in recipe.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
6 c. peeled, sliced apples
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. plain flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
2 pie shells
2 Tbsp. butter
small amount of milk
cinnamon-sugar
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour, spices and dash of salt.
Mix with peeled, sliced apple.
Fill pie shell with apple mixture.
Dot with butter.
Cover pie with another pie shell and crimp edges together.
Cut slits in top.
Brush pie top with milk.
Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar.
Place pie on inverted iron skillet in a 400° oven and bake for 50 minutes.
(This will make a crisp bottom crust.)

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 stick cold unsalted butter, cut into bits
2 Tbsp. cold vegetable shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. ice water (plus additional, if necessary)
Directions:
In large bowl, blend flour, butter, vegetable shortening and salt until mixture resembles meal.
Add 2 tablespoons ice water; toss mixture until water is incorporated, adding the additional ice water if necessary to form a dough.
Form dough into a ball. Dust the dough with flour and chill it, wrapped in wax paper, for 1 hour.
Make 2 of these for one pie.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Apple Pie
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. tart apples, peeled and sliced (8 c.)
1 1/2 c. light brown sugar
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 stick butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. apple pie spice
1 c. apple juice
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Add apples, mix well. Line a 10 or 12-inch baking dish with pastry, add apple mixture. Pour apple juice around edge (not on apples).
Cover with top pastry, sealing edges.
Cut slits in top.
Brush with margarine, sprinkle with white sugar.
Bake at 425° for 40 minutes or until juice bubbles through slits.
This is a deep-dish pie.
Pan must be at least two inches deep.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
6 c. tart apples, thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 c. milk or cream
1 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Mix both the regular and brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, salt and nutmeg. Spread 1/3 of apples in unbaked deep-dish pie crust. Spread 1/3 of filling on top. Repeat. Pour 1/4 cup milk in center and dot with margarine. Top with an unbaked crust. Brush crust with 1 tablespoon milk. Bake at 375° for 1 hour.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 head iceberg lettuce
1/2 head romaine lettuce
1 head Boston or bibb lettuce
1 small bunch chicory
2 medium tomatoes, peeled and seeded
2 whole chicken breasts, cooked or baked
6 strips bacon, crisp
1 avocado
3 eggs, hard-boiled
2 Tbsp. chives, chopped
1/2 c. Bleu cheese, crumbled
1 c. French dressing
Directions:
Chop all greens; dice tomatoes, also finely dice chicken, avocado and eggs.
Add rest of ingredients and toss with the dressing.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts (4 to 5 oz. each)
olive oil
Emeril's Original Essence
1/2 lb. diced bacon
1/2 c. extra-virgin olive oil
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1/2 lb. Maytag Blue cheese
salt and freshly round black pepper
2 heads bibb lettuce, washed, cored, patted dry and thinly sliced
1 large, ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and diced
1 beefsteak tomato, peeled, seeded and chopped
2 large hard-boiled eggs, peeled and thinly sliced
Directions:
Preheat the grill. Drizzle the chicken breasts with olive oil, then season with the Essence. Grill the chicken until the juices run clear, about 4 minutes per side.
Remove from the grill; cool and dice. Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until just crispy, 6 to 8 minutes. Remove from the skillet and drain on paper towels. Whisk the olive oil and lemon juice in a mixing bowl. Whisk in 1/4 pound of the Blue cheese, a handful at a time. Season with salt and pepper. Toss the lettuce in a large bowl with the dressing.
Season the avocado, tomatoes and eggs with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Turkey Cobb Salad(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
4 to 6 leaves lettuce
1 1/2 c. turkey, cooked and cut in 3/4-inch pieces
2 medium chopped tomatoes
1 medium avocado, peeled and sliced
4 slices bacon, crisp cooked and crumbled
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (2 oz.)
3/4 c. sour cream
2 medium green onions, thinly sliced
12 whole pitted ripe olives
1 c. salsa
Directions:
Individually prepare 4 salad plates.
Line plates with lettuce. Distribute turkey, tomatoes and avocado on plates.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Sprinkle with bacon and cheese.
Top with sour cream, green onions and olives.
Serve with salsa.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
2 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1/8's
2 cloves garlic
2 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 carrots, peeled, cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 c. flat leaf parsley leaves
1 large egg
1 c. ketchup
3 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Place bread in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add ground beef.
Place onion, garlic, celery, carrots, and parsley in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine.
Add to meat mixture, using hands to mix well.
Add egg, 1/2 c. ketchup, 2 tsp. dry mustard, salt and pepper; use hands to combine thoroughly.
Place in an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pan.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Mexican Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil, plus 1 tsp.
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. green bell pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 pkg. beef broth seasoning
15 oz. ground round
4 oz. cheddar cheese, shredded
3/4 c. bread crumbs, plain
1/2 c. tomato sauce
1/4 c. yogurt or sour cream
2 Tbsp. parsley, fresh, chopped
2 tsp. worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
In skillet, brown onion, peppers, garlic and seasoning packet in oil.
Combine these ingredients with remaining ingredients in mixing bowl.
Shape mixture in a loaf and bake until browned, 45 minutes at 375 degrees.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Super Tasty Basic Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. ketchup
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. red pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
2 tsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ketchup, tomato juice, salt, peppers, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion and 2 teaspoons mustard.
Mix thoroughly.
Add ground beef.
Mix. Press beef into a 5 X 5 loaf pan.
Combine 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon mustard and brown sugar and spread over meatloaf.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.
Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 beaten egg
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. celery salt
2 slices bread, cut into crumbs
2 lb. ground beef
1 c. oatmeal
catsup
Directions:
Mix ingredients in order listed.
Shape into loaf.
Top with catsup.
Bake at 375° for approximately 1 hour in foil-lined pan.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 lbs. extra lean hamburger
1/4 lb. sausage
1 cup crumbled saltines
2 eggs
3/4 cup milk
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 tsp. accent (optional)
1/2 cup finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
If mixture seems too dry, add a little more milk.
Shape into a loaf and bake in a flat dish at 325° for 1 hour 30 minutes or until done.
Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. May pour 8 oz. can of tomato sauce over meat before baking.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 pt. low-fat Ricotta cheese
4 egg whites
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
5 c. spaghetti sauce
8 oz. uncooked lasagna noodles
3/4 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
1 c. water
Directions:
Mix Ricotta cheese, egg whites, spices, spinach and Parmesan cheese.
Coat bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan with thin layer of spaghetti sauce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 to 3 Tbsp. water
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 lb. tofu (optional)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed and drained
2 egg whites
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 lb. lasagna noodles
6 oz. Mozzarella, grated
6 c. tomato sauce
Directions:
Saute the onion and garlic in the olive oil, adding water as needed to keep from sticking.
Combine the Ricotta, tofu, Parmesan, spinach, egg whites (beaten), black pepper, parsley and sauteed onion and garlic, mixing well.
Cook the lasagna according to package directions.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. Ricotta or cottage cheese
1 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
2 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. oregano
2 (27 oz.) jars spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. uncooked lasagna noodles
1 c. water
Directions:
Do not need to precook the noodles.
Grease baking dish. Combine spinach, Ricotta, 1 cup of Mozzarella cheese, egg, salt, pepper and oregano; mix well.
Spread 1/2 cup spaghetti sauce in bottom of large lasagna pan.
Place 1/3 of noodles over sauce. Spread 1/2 of spinach cheese mix.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining noodles, spaghetti sauce and 1/2 cup of Mozzarella cheese.
Pour 1 cup water into sauce jars, shake and pour around edges of dish.
Cover with aluminum foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Let stand 15 minutes before serving.
Freezes well.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 1/2 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 egg
1 pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and drained
salt and pepper
3/4 tsp. oregano
1 jar Prego sauce (28 oz.)
1/2 pkg. lasagna noodles (8 oz.)
1 c. water
Directions:
Mix Ricotta, 1 cup Mozzarella, egg, spinach, salt, pepper and oregano.
