In a greased pan, layer 1/2 cup sauce, 1/3 of noodles and 1/2 cheese mixture.
Repeat.
Top with remaining noodles, then remaining sauce.
Sprinkle with rest of Mozzarella.
Pour water around the edges.
Cover tightly with foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before serving.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 (15 oz.) pkg. Ricotta cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 egg
3 c. spaghetti sauce
8 oz. lasagna noodles, cooked and drained
1 (16 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Mix together Ricotta cheese, spinach, Parmesan cheese and egg until well blended.
Layer 1 cup sauce, 3 noodles, 1 cup Ricotta cheese mixture and part of Mozzarella cheese in 12 x 8-inch baking dish.
Repeat layers twice.
Cover with foil.
Bake 20 minutes; remove foil and bake 15 minutes longer.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Avocado Corn Quiche
Ingredients:
3 ears fresh or frozen corn on the cob, scraped of kernels
3/4 c. grated Havarti cheese (or any white cheese)
4 green onions, tops only, chopped
1 1/2 ripe avocados, peeled and chopped
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/2 c. milk
3 eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of Tabasco
10-inch partially baked pie shell *
Directions:
*Using your favorite pie crust recipe fit the dough into a 10-inch false-bottom quiche pan.
Line with foil and fill with rice.
Bake 10 minutes in a preheated 400° oven.
Remove foil and rice and bake 5 minutes longer or until lightly colored.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Quinoa Tabouleh
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
2 c. water
2 medium tomatoes, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 green onions with tops, finely chopped
1 medium cucumber, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 c. finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 c. finely chopped fresh mint
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/3 c. olive oil
1 garlic clove, minced
1 tsp. fine sea salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Put the quinoa in a wire strainer and thoroughly rinse with hot water to remove any bitter flavor.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Quinoam, Leek And Tofu Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. tofu
2 tsp. sesame oil
1 clove garlic, pressed
1 leek, chopped
2 c. cooked quinoa
1 tsp. sea salt or 2 tsp. shoyu
dash of black pepper
1 c. bread crumbs
1 c. soymilk (optional)
1/2 c. cheese, grated (optional)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Working with 1/2 cup tofu at a time, squeeze out water with hands.
Set aside.
Heat a large skillet or wok; add oil.
Add garlic, then leek.
Saute until lightly browned.
Add quinoa, then tofu, sauteing for 2 minutes after each addition.
Add seasonings.
Oil casserole.
Add 1/2 cup bread crumbs; rotate casserole to coat evenly.
Gently add the quinoa mixture.
Press a well in the center of the quinoa; pour in soymilk.
Cover with remaining bread crumbs and cheese.
Cover; bake for 20 minutes.
Remove cover; continue to bake until cheese is nicely browned.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/4 small onion, finely chopped
pinch of salt
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 clove garlic, finely chopped (optional)
1/4 tsp. ground cumin (optional)
Directions:
Mash peeled avocado in bowl with fork.
Beat in sour cream until fluffy.
Mix in onion, salt, lemon juice, garlic and cumin. Serve right away as dip or on nachos.
Keep in airtight container in refrigerator to store.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
2 1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. flour
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 c. chopped celery
2 c. diced potatoes
2 c. water
3 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter in 1-quart saucepan. Add onion and cook until tender.
Add salt, pepper and flour; blend well.
Add parsley, celery, potatoes and water.
Mix thoroughly. Cover and place over high heat about 5 minutes.
Reduce to low and cook 15 minutes until potatoes are tender.
Add milk and heat thoroughly.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. potatoes, cut in 1-inch cubes
2 medium onions, sliced
3/4 c. water
1 tsp. salt
3 c. milk
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Combine potatoes, onions, water, salt, garlic salt, oregano and pepper in a large saucepan.
Cover; bring to a boil, then simmer until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
Mash potatoes slightly.
Add milk and butter.
Heat thoroughly.
Serve.
Hm good.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Soup
Ingredients:
3 large potatoes, diced
1/2 onion, chopped
3 tsp. butter
1 qt. rich milk
2 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
pepper and celery salt to taste
water
Directions:
Saute onion in 2 teaspoons butter until slightly brown. Add potatoes
and
just
enough
water	to cover.
Cook until potatoes are
tender.
Melt
remaining butter;
blend in with flour, salt, pepper and celery salt.
Add enough milk to make a thin
paste. Add potatoes and onion and add remaining milk. Reheat.
Do not boil. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 or 1/3 c. butter or oil
1/2 or 1/3 c. flour
1 c. chicken broth
2 c. low-fat milk
2 c. water
1 medium onion, diced
1 turkey ham, diced
8 medium or 6 large potatoes, diced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat and add flour gradually.
Stir until no longer lumpy.
Add next 6 ingredients gradually, stirring. Stir until no lumps are left; salt and pepper to taste.
Stir until it comes to a boil, then lower heat.
Cover and let it simmer until the potatoes are done.
Makes 12 servings; 190 calories and 2 grams fat.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 c. flour
6 c. chicken broth
3 c. milk
1 lb. frozen hash browns, slightly thawed
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a 4-quart pot, mix margarine and flour over low heat; slowly add chicken broth, stirring until smooth.
Stir in milk. Add the remaining ingredients.
Simmer for a couple of hours on low heat, stirring occasionally.
Yield:
10 servings.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Wild Mushroom Pasta(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. parsley, finely chopped
2 c. coarsely chopped tomato
4 c. assorted mushrooms
salt to taste
1 lb. penne
4 c. sliced, fresh mushrooms (shiitake, morel, oyster and/or best of all, portabella)
2 red or green peppers, cut into strips
1 medium onion, cut into thin wedges
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/4 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
hot cooked pasta
shaved or grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook mushrooms, peppers and onion in hot margarine or butter until tender.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Toss with hot pasta.
Top with cheese.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettucini, uncooked (eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise or Miracle Whip
1 tsp. minced garlic (in jar)
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, rinsed and drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese (Alpine Lace or Weight Watchers)
Directions:
Prepare fettucini as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 Egg Beater, beaten
1 (8 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (1 c.)
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.
Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in a small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beater.
Toss with fettuccine until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Business
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
8 slices white bread
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
2 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 c. grated yellow cheese
butter
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Clean and slice mushrooms.
Saute in butter until slightly cooked.
Butter 3 slices of bread.
Trim crusts and cut into 1-inch squares.
Put in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef-Vegetable Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes (undrained)
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
2 Tbsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
3 medium carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 1/2 lb. lean chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 tsp. canola oil
Directions:
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, tapioca, basil, sugar, salt and pepper; let this stand for 15 to 20 minutes. Put potatoes, carrots, onion and celery in large slow cooker.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef chuck, cubed
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 to 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1/2 garlic clove, minced
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, sliced
2 onions, chopped
1 rib celery
3 potatoes, diced
Directions:
Place meat in slow cooker. Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika. Stir into meat until coated. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low 10 to 12 hours or high 4 to 6 hours. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef cubes, cut into small pieces
4 small cans beef broth
2 envelopes Knorr classic brown gravy
as little or as much carrots as desired
as little or as much potatoes as desired
as little or as much celery as desired
2 medium onions, cut
flour
garlic salt to taste
Directions:
Put beef cubes in a bowl with flour, a little black pepper and garlic salt.
Coat beef cubes.
Brown beef cubes in hot oil on top of stove.
When brown, put beef cubes in slow cooker.
Mix in remaining ingredients; cook on medium-high for 7 hours or on high for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Enjoy with hot French bread.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. diced potatoes
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. diced celery
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
2 (15 oz.) cans tomatoes with liquid
2 to 3 c. water
Directions:
In a Dutch oven, brown ground beef and onion.
Drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients; cover and simmer for 1 hour (or cook in slow cooker on low for 3 to 4 hours).
Remove bay leaf before serving.
Yield: 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: German Sauerbraten(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. stew beef, brown and add rest of ingredients
2 Tbsp. oil
2 onions, sliced
2 tsp. salt
2 c. vinegar or little less
1 c. boiling water
12 crumbled gingersnaps
Directions:
Wrap 2 bay leaves, 2 whole cloves, 1 teaspoon mixed pickling spices in cheesecloth.
Add to sauerbraten.
Cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Last hour on high.
Add 3 tablespoons flour and 1/2 cup cold water.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef And Potato Load
Ingredients:
4 c. thinly sliced peeled raw potatoes
1 Tbsp. cut-up onion
salt and pepper
1 tsp. parsley flakes (can omit)
1 lb. ground lean beef
3/4 c. Pet evaporated milk
1/2 c. fine soda cracker crumbs or uncooked rolled oats
1/4 c. catsup or chili sauce
1/4 c. cut-up onion
Directions:
Arrange evenly in greased, 2-quart baking dish, potatoes and 1 tablespoon cut-up onion, sprinkled with 1 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper and parsley flakes.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef Roast
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. roast
1 onion, cut
potatoes
carrots
salt
garlic powder
Directions:
Wash the roast good under cool, running water.
Place in a large deep Corning dish.
Add onion for seasoning, garlic powder and other vegetables, as you prefer.
Add about an inch of water to dish.
Heat on a burner.
Have oven hot, ready to cook roast, for about 1 1/2 hours.
Put foil over the top of the roaster and place lid on.
Place in hot oven; continue cooking until done.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Corned Beef And Cabbage
Ingredients:
corned beef
cabbage
potato
carrot
Directions:
Boil all ingredients together until cooked and serve.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef And Potato Bake
Ingredients:
3 c. thinly sliced, peeled, raw potatoes
1 Tbsp. cut up onions
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. parsley flakes
1 lb. ground beef
3/4 c. evaporated milk
1/2 c. cracker crumbs
1/4 c. catsup
1/4 c. chopped onions
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Apply evenly in greased 2-quart baking dish the potatoes and 1 tablespoon of onions.
Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon of salt, 1/8 teaspoon of pepper and parsley flakes.
Mix ground beef, milk, cracker crumbs, catsup, 1/4 cup onions, 1/2 teaspoon of salt and 1/8 teaspoon of pepper.
Spread evenly over potatoes.
Bake in a 350° oven until potatoes are tender (50 to 60 minutes).
Serves 4 large helpings.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Roast Beef, Carrots, Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. beef roast
1 lb. carrots
6 large potatoes
1 c. flour
1/2 c. grease
1 medium onion
1 qt. water
Directions:
Put 1/2 cup grease in a large fryer.
Roll roast in flour; put in fryer.
Cover with lid.
Cook medium until brown.
In a big boiler, brown 1 cup flour; pour water in boiler and put roast in gravy.
Add carrots, potatoes and chopped onion.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Cook until tender.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. lightly packed basil leaves
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil
1/3 c. pine nuts
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. lemon juice (optional)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a blender and whirl smooth.
Toss well over hot cooked pasta.
Add additional cheese, if desired. Makes 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
3 c. packed fresh basil
2 to 3 cloves garlic
1/2 c. pinenuts or almonds
3/4 c. parsley
3/4 c. Parmesan
1/4 c. olive oil
1/4 c. melted butter
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in blender, starting at slow speed. Can be frozen and heated as needed.
Serve over pasta or on pizza.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. well-packed basil leaves
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. pinenuts, chopped
1/2 c. good olive oil
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
twist of freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Put basil, garlic and pinenuts in a food processor and process to chop leaves somewhat.
Add olive oil and continue to process, scraping down sides of bowl. Add Parmesan cheese, salt and pepper.
Store in refrigerator.
Makes 1 cup.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Simple Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. fresh basil
6 garlic cloves
1/3 c. toasted pine nuts
2/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a food processor.
Blend until well incorporated.
Use by tossing into hot cooked pasta.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh basil leaves, stripped from their stems, coarsely chopped and tightly packed (or substitute 2 c. fresh flat leaf Italian parsley, coarsely chopped and 2 Tbsp. dried basil leaves)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1 to 2 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. finely chopped pine nuts or walnuts
1 to 1 1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a blender, combine basil, pepper, salt, garlic, nuts and 1 cup of oil.
Blend at high speed until ingredients are smooth, stopping the blender every 5 to 6 seconds to push herbs down with a rubber spatula.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 or 5 garlic cloves, sliced
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
4 or 5 tomatoes, skinned and chopped
1/2 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil and brown garlic until light brown.
Add onion and bell
pepper;
cook
a
little and add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer
for
5
minutes.
Add
water;
bring to boil. Reduce heat;
simmer
for 20 minutes.
Cook thin spaghetti or angel
hair pasta; drain.
Pour sauce over pasta; blend well. Sprinkle with grated Italian cheese.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
3 medium cloves garlic
1/3 c. good olive oil
1 lb. shrimp
1/2 lb. scallops (optional)
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. tomato paste
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley or 1 1/2 tsp. dried
1 lb. fresh tomatoes, coarsely chopped
1/2 tsp. each: oregano, rosemary and dried thyme
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook garlic in oil; add shrimp.
Cook a few minutes and remove from shrimp with slotted spoon.
Add tomatoes, chicken broth, tomato paste and herbs; cook until it measures around 2 cups. Just before serving, add seafood and serve over the pasta of your choice, cooked al dente.
This is an excellent pasta dish to use summer tomatoes.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 small onion, chopped
2 (28 oz.) cans imported Roma tomatoes, drained or Progresso tomatoes and sauce mixed (not drained)
2 Tbsp. fresh basil (or 2 tsp. dried)
2 Tbsp. fresh oregano (or 2 tsp. dried)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oil in 3-quart saucepan; saute garlic and onion. Process tomatoes in food processor or blender.
Stir tomatoes and remaining ingredients into the saucepan.
Heat to boiling; simmer about 2 hours, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, sliced
1 to 2 stalks celery, chopped
1 green pepper, sliced
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
3 large green olives, chopped
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste, with 2 c. water*
2 Tbsp. parsley, snipped
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 bay leaf
1 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
*Or, 1 (12 ounce) tomato sauce and 1 cup water or tomato paste and whole tomatoes and little water.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Pasta Red Sauce
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes
1/4 c. red bell pepper, finely chopped
1/4 c. onion, finely chopped
1/4 c. fresh parsley, chopped
Several cloves garlic, finely chopped
Sliced fresh mushrooms, to taste
1/4 c. red wine
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/8 tsp. white pepper
Directions:
Add all to saucepan and cook slowly 1 hour to combine flavors. Pour over favorite pasta.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs Supreme
Ingredients:
6 chicken thighs, skinned
3 medium-sized onions, cut or whole
1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. celery salt
2 c. water
1 bay leaf
1 small peeled potato
pepper to taste
Directions:
Put chicken in large pot.
Add onions, vinegar, garlic, celery salt, pepper, water and bay leaf.
Cover and cook 1 hour over medium heat.
Check during cooking and add additional water, if needed.
Halfway through cooking, add potato.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Chicken
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. red wine
6 drumsticks
1 oz. ginger
1 bud garlic
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 to 3 c. water
2 potatoes, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Skin the chicken.
Remove the meat from the bones.
Cut meat into chunks (4 to 5 chunks from each leg).
Remove skin from each ginger.
Cut ginger into 4 to 5 slices.
Press 4 to 5 cloves of garlic flat.
Mix garlic, oil and ginger.
Deep fry for about 5 seconds on medium heat.
Add chicken and bones to vegetable mix. Continue frying on medium heat for 10 seconds.
Turn to high heat. Add wine.
Saute for 5 seconds.
Add water.
Heat until water boils.
Turn heat to low for 8 minutes.
Add salt, soy sauce and potatoes.
Cook for 20 minutes.
Remove bones.
Serve.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken 'N Red Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 to 8 red potatoes, diced
2 to 3 lb. cut up fryer or 4 chicken breasts
3 Tbsp. rosemary
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1/2 stick margarine
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Spray Pam on a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Mix the seasonings together. Coat chicken pieces with seasonings.
Place potatoes on bottom of pan and cut chicken pieces on top.
Put dabs of margarine on top of the chicken.
Pour water into pan and bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes or until potatoes are soft.
Baste chicken with juices in pan periodically.
Yield:
4 servings.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Spicy Chicken
Ingredients:
12 chicken thighs (any parts that you like)
1/4 c. vegetable or olive oil
1/2 c. ReaLemon lemon juice
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Soak the chicken in 2 c. cold water with 2 tsp. salt for 20 minutes. Drain, rinse off and pat dry. Place in a baking pan (the chicken should fit tightly in pan). Mix all the other ingredients together and pour over chicken; let sit for 20 minutes. Bake at 400° on the lower oven rack until tender. Remove from oven, cover the pan and let sit for 15 minutes. Serve on rice or noodles.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Fragrant Baked Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
10 all-purpose potatoes, unpeeled and sliced 1/8-inch
2 Tbsp. minced fresh rosemary or 2 tsp. crumbled dried
6 cloves garlic, peeled
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
Directions:
Layer 1/3 of potatoes in lightly greased 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with 1/3 rosemary, garlic and pepper.
Drizzle with 1 tablespoon oil.
Repeat layer twice more.
Gently pour chicken broth over all, taking care not to wash top layer of spices away.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Let rise 15 minutes.
Spread out on cookie sheet or pizza pan.
I like to prebake mine until lightly browned, then add my toppings.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. lukewarm water
1 pkg. yeast
pinch of sugar
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 tsp. salt
2 c. wheat flour
1 c. white flour
Directions:
Put together the first 3 ingredients.
In a large bowl, mix the oil, salt and wheat flour.
Knead by hand 6 to 7 minutes, adding white flour a little at a time.
Put in a greased bowl and cover. Leave in a warm place to rise 2 to 3 hours, until tripled.
Punch down and roll out some on lightly floured surface until thin.
This may be used for pizza and topped with sauce, cheese and veggies or for a calzone.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
2 c. plain flour
2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. yeast
1/2 c. warm water
1 to 2 Tbsp. sugar for yeast
1/4 c. oil
2 c. plain flour (additional)
Directions:
Mix yeast, sugar and water.
In another bowl, put 2 cups flour, salt and oil; mix well.
Add yeast mixture; mix.
Add 2 additional cups flour.
Add more warm water if needed to make a stiff dough.
Let rise until double.
Split dough in half.
Roll out to pan size on floured board.
Add toppings and sauce; bake at 425° until done.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. roasted peanuts
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Put ingredients in blender.
Grind and serve on crackers, celery or apple slices.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. roasted peanuts, with shells and skins removed
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Put peanuts into blender or food processor.
Gradually add 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil, blending until texture is thick and creamy.
Keep homemade peanut butter refrigerated.
If oil separates, stir back in with spoon.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter Candy
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1 (18 oz.) jar Jif peanut butter (creamy)
Directions:
Combine peanut butter, sugar and salt in a large saucepan (3 quart size).
Add milk gradually; mix thoroughly and bring to a bubbly boil on high heat, stirring continuously.
Reduce heat to medium and continue to boil the mixture without stirring until it reaches a temperature of 232° or until a small amount of mixture forms a soft ball when dropped into cold water.
(Be sure bulb of thermometer is not resting on bottom of saucepan.)
Remove saucepan from heat; add butter and vanilla to mixture.
Do not stir.
Allow candy to cool at room temperature until it reaches 110°.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. salted, roasted Spanish peanuts
1 tsp. sugar or honey (these are optional)
1 Tbsp. peanut oil
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place ingredients in an electric blender.
Blend until mixture becomes paste-like or speadable.
It may be necessary to add more peanut oil.
The ingredients must be blended for several minutes. Store in tightly covered container.
Homemade peanut butter will separate on standing; stir before using.
You may leave out the sugar and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
2 c. roasted peanuts
2 tsp. salad oil
Directions:
Put ingredients in blender.
Blend well.
Salt to taste. Spread on cracker.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Chewy Vegan Carrot Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. shredded raw carrots
1 c. raisins
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. water
1/3 c. margarine
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
1 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. whole wheat flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Place carrots, raisins, sugar, water and margarine in saucepan and bring to simmer over medium heat.
Continue to simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and cool.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced onions
1 small turnip, peeled and diced (optional)
4 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes, cut up
1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place raw ingredients in a 5-quart kettle and cover with salt and peppered water.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and corn (these make the soup) and heat through.
Serve with a sandwich for lunch or a first course at dinner.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegan Lentil Chili(Serves 6 To 8)
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 can whole tomatoes, sliced or garden tomatoes (if available)
1 can kidney beans
1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice
1 bell pepper, chopped
1 onion, chopped
2 stalks chopped celery (optional)
small amount of vegetable or olive oil for sauteing
brown sugar
garlic powder or garlic salt
cumin
chili powder
Directions:
Soak the lentils overnight.
Saute onion, bell pepper and celery (if used), then combine with lentils, beans, juice and tomatoes.
Add brown sugar to sweeten to taste.
Season with chili powder, some garlic powder, salt and cumin to taste.
Simmer an hour or so.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup(Stone Soup)
Ingredients:
3/4 c. onion, sliced
2 c. diced potatoes
1 1/2 c. celery, sliced
3 qt. boiling water
1 1/2 c. diced carrots
5 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 c. string beans and peas
4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
macaroni, broken in small pieces
rice (if desired)
1 can condensed tomato soup
Directions:
Wash and cut vegetables.
Heat butter in skillet.
Add onions and celery and simmer until soft.
Remove from heat; slowly add 3 quarts of boiling water.
Add seasonings and vegetables, macaroni and rice; boil until vegetables are tender (about 20 or 30 minutes).
Add tomato soup; heat.
Add more water, if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Lentil Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. dried green or brown lentils
4 Tbsp. butter or vegan margarine
2 large onions, peeled and thinly sliced
1 garlic clove, crushed
1 tsp. dried Herbs de Provence
1 (15 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
1 1/2 lb. potatoes, cooked and mashed
a little extra butter or vegan margarine
Directions:
Put the washed lentils into a large saucepan.
Cover with water and boil gently until tender, about 45 minutes.
Drain. Preheat oven to 400°.
Use 1/2 of the butter or vegan margarine to grease a shallow ovenproof dish.
Saute the onions in the remaining butter or vegan magarine in a large saucepan for 10 minutes.
Add the garlic, mixed herbs, tomatoes, soy sauce, lentils, parsley, salt and pepper.
Spoon the mixture into the dish.
Spread the mashed potatoes evenly over the top, drawing the prongs of the fork over the surface to make ridges.
Dot the whole surface with a little butter or vegan margarine.
Bake for 45 minutes until golden brown.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Felafel
Ingredients:
2 (15 oz.) cans chickpeas
4 medium cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. finely minced onion or 6 scallions
1/2 c. minced parsley
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. flour
a few dashes cayenne
oil for frying
Directions:
Rinse chickpeas and drain.
Combine all ingredients besides flour in a food processor or bowl.
Mash to a uniform batter.
Add flour, stir thoroughly.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Greek Chickpeas Salad
Ingredients:
2 tsp. prepared Dijon style mustard
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 to 3/4 c. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 c. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
2 (20 oz. each) cans chickpeas, drained
1 medium red onion, sliced and separated into rings
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
lettuce leaves (if desired)
Directions:
Combine cheese, mustard, salt, oil, lemon juice and pepper in container of electric blender; whirl until smooth.
Combine chickpeas and onion in large bowl.
Pour dressing over and toss. Refrigerate; may be prepared several days in advance.
Just before serving, add parsley; toss.
Spoon into lettuce lined salad bowl.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Spinach Pate
Ingredients:
3 lb. fresh spinach
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. wine or cider vinegar
3 eggs
1/2 c. skim milk
1/8 tsp. nutmeg, grated
4 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. Gruyere cheese
3/4 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
sea salt to taste
pepper
Directions:
Wash and stem spinach.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter a loaf pan.
Puree spinach or chop fine.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Couscous With Chickpeas And Feta Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can chicken broth or vegetable broth
1 c. packaged couscous (1 box)
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 c. sliced scallions (with tops)
4 oz. crumbled Feta
1 (2 1/4 oz.) can drained ripe olives
2/3 c. Italian vinaigrette dressing
Directions:
In medium saucepan, bring broth to boil.
Stir in couscous. Remove from heat; cover and let stand for 5 minutes.
Transfer couscous to large bowl and fluff with fork.
Let stand 5 minutes; fluff again. mix in chickpeas, scallions, cheese and olives.
Pour dressing over mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Serve on bed of lettuce.
Serves 6. Enjoy.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta
Ingredients:
sun-dried tomatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
salt and pepper
pasta (except spaghetti or linguine)
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat oil in skillet; add garlic and saute 1 minute.
Add tomatoes; heat to boiling.
Stir until thickens, about 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and sun-dried tomatoes and simmer about 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pesto Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg prepared pesto
1/2 c. miracle whip
3 c. rotini cooked and drained
1/2 c. pitted ripe olive slices
3 Tbsp. chopped sun dried tomatoes in oil drained
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix pesto and salad dressing until well blended.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Italian Pasta
Ingredients:
1 c. Hellmann's real or light mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. twist macaroni, cooked and drained
1 c. quartered cherry tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover.
Chill.
Makes 3 cups.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
4 large ripe tomatoes, cut in wedges
1/2 c. Feta cheese, crumbled
1/2 c. basil leaves, cut in strips
3 cloves minced garlic
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
8 oz. pasta
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Add remaining ingredients and stir.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 tsp. olive oil
3 tomatoes, peeled and seeded
1/2 tsp. salt
12 oz. pasta, cooked
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. leaf basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in olive oil in a large nonstick skillet until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add broth, basil and oregano, simmer to thicken sauce, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Serve over hot, cooked pasta. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. hickory salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped olives or green onion tops
Directions:
Mix altogether and serve over cooked steak.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic-Herb Steak Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. dry red wine
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. garlic pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. Italian seasoning
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a glass measure.
Pour in a sterilized decorative bottle or jar.
Cap and refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 c. dry wine
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook onion and wine in a small saucepan until the liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup.
Remove from heat and cool.
With beater, cream butter and parsley.
Gradually beat in the wine mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Makes 3/4 cup butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pepper Steak
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 lb. London broil
Directions:
Add all ingredients in medium container.
Marinate meat overnight in refrigerator, turning occasionally.
Drain.
Broil 5 minutes on each side.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1 pod garlic
virgin olive oil (the most expensive oil yields a wonderful tasting butter)
Directions:
In a mortar and pestle, crush 2 or 3 cloves of peeled garlic. (The broad side of a knife hit against the clove makes it easier to peel.)
Add a few drops of oil.
Add 1 or 2 more cloves of garlic while continuing to crush the mixture in the mortar.
Your finished consistency should by silky.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
12 oz. shrimp, peeled and deveined *
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp, if frozen.
In a large skillet, heat margarine over medium high heat.
Add shrimp and garlic.
Cook, stirring frequently for 1 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Stir in parsley and sherry.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp With Pesto
Ingredients:
1 c. washed and dried basil
1 c. washed and dried spinach leaves
4 cloves garlic
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
1/4 c. pine nuts (may roast them first)
1/4 to 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
salt and pepper
1/2 to 3/4 c. good olive oil
Directions:
Put the above into the bowl of a food processor; turn on unit and very slowly add the olive oil through the tube until the mixture is smooth and thick. Refrigerate.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread(Low-Fat, High Taste Garlic Bread)
Ingredients:
1 loaf French or Italian bread
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large garlic clove
Directions:
Pour or brush oil into bread under broiler until golden (goes quickly).
Rub toast with fresh garlic clove.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Scratch Corn Bread
Ingredients:
1/3 c. flour
3/4 c. corn meal
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
2/3 c. milk
2 Tbsp. lard or oil
Directions:
Combine flour, baking powder and salt together. Cut in shortening, milk and egg.
Add to dry ingredients.
Stir only long enough to mix.
Pour into greased pan (8 x 8-inch) and bake at 425° for 25 minutes.
Butter top when done.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Scratch Corn Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. cornmeal
1/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. milk
Directions:
Combine
dry
ingredients, then add oil, eggs and milk. Pour into greased 8 x 8-inch pan.
Bake in 400° oven for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Loaf
Ingredients:
6 c. flour
2 pkg. RapidRise yeast
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
4 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. parsley
1 c. water
1/2 c. margarine
2 eggs
cornmeal
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine first 8 ingredients and mix well. Heat milk, water and margarine together until mixture is 120° to 130°.
Blend two mixtures together with eggs and beat with a wooden spoon about 3 to 5 minutes to make a stiff batter.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Tarheel Scratch Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. butter
3 c. flour
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
6 eggs
Directions:
Cream the butter and sugar together.
Sift the baking powder and flour together.
Add the salt and mix with the butter, sugar and milk.
Beat thoroughly.
Beat the eggs until stiff and add to the rest of ingredients.
Stir well and bake in buttered layer cake pans for 20 to 25 minutes in a 375° oven.
Spread the layers with icing.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
1 can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 medium onion, chopped
3 Tbsp. ketchup
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown chops and remove from pan. Combine remaining ingredients and heat in pan in which chops were browned.
Layer chops and sauce in slow cooker or heavy Dutch oven.
Either bake, covered, in a 350° oven for 1 hour or in slow cooker on high setting until bubbly, then simmer on low until tender and sauce is consistency of gravy, 5 or 6 hours.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops And Rice For Slow Cooker
Ingredients:
pork chops
1 Tbsp. dry rice for each chop
1 can mushroom slices, drained
1 can tomato puree or tomato sauce
salt and pepper to taste
pinch of chili powder (optional)
Directions:
Brown pork chops.
Put rice and mushroom slices on each pork chop.
Mix rest of ingredients, adding a can of water in order to have enough liquid to cover chops.
Bring to a boil and then simmer until rice is cooked and pork is well done.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Swedish Meat Balls For Slow Cooker
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground chuck
1/2 lb. ground veal
1/2 lb. ground pork
2 c. fine dry bread crumbs
2 c. half and half
3 eggs
1 large onion, minced
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 cans (10 1/2 oz. each) condensed beef broth
3 Tbsp. flour
1/4 c. water
Directions:
In large mixing bowl, combine ground meats, bread crumbs, 1 cup of the half and half, eggs, onion and seasonings.
Form 1-inch meat balls.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Pork-And-Beef Barbecue
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. stew beef
1 1/2 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. chopped onions
3 green peppers, chopped
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 c. cider vinegar
1/4 c. chili powder
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
In 3 1/2 to 5-quart slow cooker, place beef, pork, onions and peppers.
Thoroughly combine remaining ingredients and pour over meat.
Cover; cook on high (300°) for 8 hours.
With a wire whisk, stir mixture until meat is shredded.
Serve on hard rolls.
Makes 12 sandwiches.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef chuck, cubed
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 to 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1/2 garlic clove, minced
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, sliced
2 onions, chopped
1 rib celery
3 potatoes, diced
Directions:
Place meat in slow cooker. Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika. Stir into meat until coated. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low 10 to 12 hours or high 4 to 6 hours. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef-Vegetable Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes (undrained)
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
2 Tbsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
3 medium carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 1/2 lb. lean chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 tsp. canola oil
Directions:
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, tapioca, basil, sugar, salt and pepper; let this stand for 15 to 20 minutes. Put potatoes, carrots, onion and celery in large slow cooker.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef cubes, cut into small pieces
4 small cans beef broth
2 envelopes Knorr classic brown gravy
as little or as much carrots as desired
as little or as much potatoes as desired
as little or as much celery as desired
2 medium onions, cut
flour
garlic salt to taste
Directions:
Put beef cubes in a bowl with flour, a little black pepper and garlic salt.
Coat beef cubes.
Brown beef cubes in hot oil on top of stove.
When brown, put beef cubes in slow cooker.
Mix in remaining ingredients; cook on medium-high for 7 hours or on high for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Enjoy with hot French bread.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: German Sauerbraten(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. stew beef, brown and add rest of ingredients
2 Tbsp. oil
2 onions, sliced
2 tsp. salt
2 c. vinegar or little less
1 c. boiling water
12 crumbled gingersnaps
Directions:
Wrap 2 bay leaves, 2 whole cloves, 1 teaspoon mixed pickling spices in cheesecloth.
Add to sauerbraten.
Cook 8 to 10 hours on low.
Last hour on high.
Add 3 tablespoons flour and 1/2 cup cold water.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: The New Beef Stew
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. lean beef stew meat
4 c. water
3 medium onions, halved
1 Tbsp. grated orange peel
1 Tbsp. instant beef bouillon granules
1 tsp. dried thyme, crushed
1/2 tsp. dried oregano, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 bay leaf
3 medium carrots, peeled
2 parsnips, peeled
1/2 medium turnip (about 1/2 lb.)
2 medium potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch chunks
1 c. frozen peas
1/4 c. fresh parsley or 1 Tbsp. dried flakes
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Trim all excess fat from beef and discard.
Cut beef into 1-inch chunks.
Spray a Dutch oven or large heavy saucepan with nonstick spray coating.
Heat pan over medium-high heat; add beef and cook, stirring until brown on all sides.
Remove from heat. Carefully add water to the pan and return to the heat.
Bring to boiling, scraping up any brown bits from bottom of the pan.
Add onions, orange peel, bouillon granules, thyme, oregano, pepper and bay leaf.
Cover, return to heat and simmer for 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 Tbsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. baking soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
1/4 c. oil
2 Tbsp. (1 oz.) water
Directions:
To beaten eggs, add buttermilk and beat again.
Add oil and water.
Beat thoroughly.
Add each dry ingredient and gently mix after each addition.
Do not overbeat.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk
2 Tbsp. Crisco oil
1 c. flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
In small mixing bowl, beat egg with fork.
Beat in buttermilk or sour milk and oil.
Set aside.
In large mixing bowl, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder, soda and salt.
Add egg mixture to flour mixture.
Stir until blended but still slightly lumpy.
Lightly grease a griddle or heavy skillet.
Heat until water sprinkled on griddle dances across surface.
Pour about 1/4 cup batter on griddle for each pancake.
When pancakes have a bubbly surface and slightly dry edges, turn to cook other side. Leftover batter may be refrigerated.
Makes 8 to 9 (4-inch) pancakes.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
4 Tbsp. salad oil
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients
together.
Add
to eggs, milk and oil. Stir only until bubbly.
"Don't stir after."

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cooking oil or melted butter
2 c. flour
Directions:
Take turns holding the mixer until eggs are fluffy.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth, but do not overmix. Grease hot griddle with shortening.
Pour batter to make 4 inch pancakes.
Cook until puffed, turn and cook other side until golden brown.
We like to cut them into shapes and spread butter and jelly.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 whole egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar in 1 bowl.
In another bowl, beat egg.
Add buttermilk, Wesson oil and vanilla.
Stir and add liquid ingredients to dry.
Stir, leaving entire ingredients slightly lumpy.
Bake on hot griddle (greased) until bubbles form.
Turn once and bake other side or place on waffle iron until lightly browned.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken With Lemon
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken (about 3 lb.)
salt and freshly ground pepper
1 garlic clove, split in half
1 lemon, quartered
1 small onion, quartered
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Rinse chicken inside and out; pat dry. Season inside and out with salt and pepper.
Rub garlic over the skin, then place inside cavity.
Stuff lemon and onion inside cavity.
Tie legs together.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken With Lemon And Garlic
Ingredients:
1 roasting chicken (about 3 to 4 lb.)
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 tsp. olive oil
2 lemons
5 bulbs garlic, divided
1 bunch fresh thyme, washed, dried and divided
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450° to 500°.
Remove chicken parts from cavity of the bird.
Wash bird inside out.
Pat dry.
Rub skin with olive oil.
With an ice pick, poke about 2 dozen holes in each lemon. Break 1 head of garlic into cloves; peel and remove ends.
Stuff the cavity of the bird with the 2 lemons, the garlic cloves and half the thyme.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) chicken
2 Tbsp. garlic powder with parsley
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic And Rosemary Roast Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (3 1/2 to 4 lb.) chicken
salt and pepper
2 medium garlic cloves, flattened
3 fresh sprigs or 1 Tbsp. dried rosemary
1/4 lemon
paprika
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
9 small shallots
2 medium garlic cloves
1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. minced fresh rosemary or 1/2 tsp. dried
1 large red bell pepper, sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Pat chicken dry.
Sprinkle inside and out with salt and pepper.
Rub inside and out with flattened garlic and rosemary and place inside with lemon quarter.
Truss and sprinkle with paprika.
Melt butter with oil in heavy ovenproof skillet over high heat.
Add chicken, breast up.
Add shallots and 2 whole garlic cloves.
Cook until bottom of chicken is brown; stir vegetables frequently, about 4 minutes.
Add lemon juice and baste chicken with pan juices.
Sprinkle vegetables with rosemary.
Put skillet in oven and roast 45 minutes, basting chicken and stirring vegetables occasionally.
Mix bell peppers into skillet and cook 35 minutes until done.
Take shallots and peppers out as they get done.
Serve chicken warm or at room temperature.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. broiler-fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoning salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake.
Top with garlic cloves.
Bake in 375° oven for 1 hour or until done.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1/4 c. sugar
1 stick margarine, softened
2/3 c. milk
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Place the sweet potatoes in a large pot. Cover with water about 4-inches over the top of the potatoes.
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook 30 minutes.
When slightly cooled, peel potatoes.
Place in a large bowl.
Mash well or use a mixer until all lumps are gone.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Place potatoes in a buttered casserole dish (2 to 3 quarts). Bake in preheated 350° oven for 25 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Baked Mashed Sweet Potatoes With Marshmallows
Ingredients:
3 c. sweet potatoes, cooked in jackets and peeled
1/2 c. half and half
1/4 c. firmly packed light brown sugar
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1/2 tsp. salt
2 eggs, separated
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. vanilla
20 regular size marshmallows
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
In small saucepan, heat half and half, sugar, butter and salt over low heat; stir until butter has melted.
Beat egg yolks in a medium size bowl.
Gradually beat in half and half mixture.
Beat yolk mixture into potatoes.
Beat egg whites and fold in.
Put in 1 1/2-quart casserole and top with marshmallows.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Dish
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked, mashed potatoes
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
4 Tbsp. soft margarine
1/2 c. milk or orange juice
1 tsp. vanilla
1/3 c. flour
1 c. brown sugar
4 Tbsp. margarine, softened
1 c. pecans or walnuts, chopped
bit of cinnamon
1 small can crushed pineapple (optional)
Directions:
Combine sweet potatoes (mashed) with first 5 ingredients. Place in buttered 2-quart casserole.
Mix remaining ingredients (except pineapple) for topping with fork until crumbled and sprinkle over potato mixture.
Bake in a 350° oven for 35 minutes or until brown.
Sprinkle with crushed pineapple.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. mashed sweet potatoes, cooked first
3 eggs
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 stick butter or oleo
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix together and put in baking dish.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. evaporated milk
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 c. peeled, cooked and mashed sweet potatoes (don't use canned)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Pour into 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Top with topping.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Granola(Kids Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 c. old-fashioned oatmeal, uncooked
1 1/2 c. wheat germ (raw or toasted)
1 c. coconut, grated
1/4 c. nonfat dry milk
2 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1 c. raisins
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix dry ingredients.
Combine oil, honey and vanilla in a saucepan and warm.
Add these to the dry ingredients and stir until all the particles are coated.
(Hand mixing works well here).
Spread this mixture in a long, low pan or rimmed baking sheet that has been sprayed with vegetable shortening. Bake at 250° for an hour, turning with spatula every 15 minutes. When finished toasting, add raisins and toss.
Cool and store in an airtight container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
5 c. quick oats
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. dry milk
1/3 c. honey
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
pinch of salt
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Place 1/4 cup of mung beans in a quart jar and cover with tepid water.
Cover with cheesecloth and tie securely.
Soak overnight.
Drain water off.
Set in a warm, dark place.
Every day, rinse with tepid water and drain.
Place in a warm dark place again.
Repeat 4 to 5 days or until sprouts are as big as you want.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
2 c. old fashioned oats
1 1/2 c. chopped almonds
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
300°.
In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, coconut,
wheat
germ and salt.
Stir in milk and oil and mix
thoroughly.
Spread
on
a
wax-paper
lined shallow baking pan and bake, stirring occasionally for 1 hour or until golden. Stir
in
raisins.	Let
cool
and	store in airtight containers. Makes 7 1/2 cups.
(And it's delicious too!)

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
4 c. uncooked oatmeal (quick type)
1 c. chopped peanuts (no skins)
1/2 c. Grape-Nuts
1/2 c. bran (unprocessed, uncooked)
sugar substitute to equal 1/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Spread the oatmeal on a cookie sheet and heat in a 350° oven for 10 minutes.
Combine all but the last two ingredients.
Bake on an ungreased cookie sheet or pan for 20 minutes, stirring once to brown evenly.
Allow mixture to cook in the oven.
Add wheat germ and raisins.
Refrigerate in glass jars or plastic containers.
(Granulated sugar substitute was more acceptable than liquid sugar substitute in this product.)

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Granola
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oats
1 c. fresh coconut
1/4 c. pumpkin seeds
1 c. sunflower seeds
1 c. pecans
1 c. walnuts
1 c. almonds
1/2 c. sweet rice syrup
1/2 c. ice water
1/4 c. olive oil
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. chopped dates
Directions:
Mix first 4 ingredients.
Add sweet rice syrup, ice water and olive oil and mix.
Spread in deep, oblong baking dish, sprayed with Pam.
Bake at 225° for 1 1/2 hours.
Add pecans, walnuts and almonds.
Mix and continue to bake 1/2 hour longer.
Add raisins and chopped dates.
Mix and cool.
Store in Ziploc bags.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: U. P. Skinny Dip
Ingredients:
2/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise
2/3 c. fat-free sour cream
3/4 Tbsp. dill weed
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and chill.
Serve with raw vegetables.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Dip(Low-Fat Recipe)
Ingredients:
1 c. fat-free mayonnaise
1 c. fat-free sour cream
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
1/4 c. chile sauce
1 Tbsp. prepared horseradish
1/4 tsp. lite salt
1/8 tsp. ground pepper
2 c. finely chopped cooked shrimp
Directions:
Stir all ingredients until well mixed.
Cover and chill. Makes 3 cups.
Twelve 1/4 cup servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Dip
Ingredients:
24 oz. low-fat cottage cheese
2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 Tbsp. dill weed
Directions:
Put all ingredients in blender and blend until smooth.
Chill overnight.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Garlic Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. low-fat yogurt
1/2 tsp. salt
1 garlic clove
Directions:
Combine ingredients in blender; blend well.
Chill overnight.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Fat Free, Cholesterol Free Country Herb Dip
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Knox unflavored gelatine
1/4 c. cold skim milk
3/4 c. skim milk, heated to boiling
1 (8 oz.) container 1% milk fat cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. Dijon-style mustard or horseradish
1 tsp. dill
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In blender, sprinkle unflavored gelatine over cold milk.
Let stand 2 minutes.
Add hot milk and process at low speed until gelatine is completely dissolved, about 2 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients and process at high speed until blended.
Before serving, stir until smooth.
Serve with assorted crackers, bread sticks, cocktail breads or your favorite veggies.
Makes 2 cups of dip.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Soy Falafel
Ingredients:
1 cake firm tofu
1/3 c. finely chopped onions
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped fresh Italian parsley
1/2 Tbsp. dark sesame oil
1 Tbsp. tamari soy sauce
ground black pepper to taste
1 or more garlic cloves to taste, minced
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Press and mash the tofu.
Mix with remaining ingredients in a medium bowl.
Form into 1-inch balls. Bake on oiled baking sheet for about 30 minutes, turning occasionally until golden and crusty on the outside.
These make a great sandwich served with sliced fresh tomato in pita pockets with a sauce made of plain yogurt and fresh dill.
(Not a children's favorite!)

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. dried chickpeas (garbanzo beans, about 12 oz.)
2 c. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
5 garlic cloves, peeled
1 onion, quartered
1 leek, trimmed and cut into 3 pieces
6 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
Yogurt-Tahini Dip
8 (6-inch) pitas, cut in half
Directions:
Sort and wash chickpeas and place in large bowl. Cover with water to 2 inches above beans. Cover and let stand for 8 hours. Drain beans. Combine chickpeas, cilantro and next 8 ingredients in a food processor until mixture resembles coarse meal. Divide chickpea mixture into 16 equal portions, shaping each into 1/2 inch thick patties. Heat 2 Tbsp. oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add 5 patties and cook 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat procedure twice with remaining oil and patties. Spread 1 Tbsp. Yogurt-Tahini Dip in each pita half. Fill with 1 patty. Serves 8 (2 pita halves each).

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Bake
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. broccoli or California Blend
3/4 lb. cubed Velveeta
3/4 c. crushed buttery crackers
2 Tbsp. margarine
Directions:
Mix broccoli and Velveeta; spoon into greased 10 x 6-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with crumbs; dot with margarine.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel And Tehina
Ingredients:
8 oz. chickpeas (I use canned)
1/4 tsp. coriander
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. ground red chili pepper
1 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. cracked wheat flour
1 lightly beaten egg
oil for deep frying
Directions:
Drain can of chickpeas.
Mash.
Add next seven ingredients. Mix thoroughly.
Taking a spoonful of the mixture at a time, roll into balls about 1-inch in diameter.
Heat oil and deep-fry falafel until browned.
Drain.
Serve hot on a gyro bread or in a pita bread pocket with tehina on top Tehina recipe follows.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Fauschnaught'S(Mom-Mom'S)
Ingredients:
2 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
9 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar
1 c. Crisco
2 eggs
10x sugar
Directions:
Dissolve yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar in 1 cup lukewarm water. Let stand 10 minutes.
Mix flour, salt, sugar and Crisco fine like pie dough.
Beat eggs.
Add 2 cups warm water.
Add to flour mix. Add yeast mix last.
Work dough lightly 10 minutes.
Add flour as needed.
Cover and let rise.
When doubled in size, roll out dough, cut donuts and let them rise until doubled.
Deep fry to golden brown.
Drain on paper towel.
Coat with 10x sugar by shaking in paper bag.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
1 large ripe avocado
8 hard-cooked eggs, cut in half
1/2 c. softened cream cheese
pinch of salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Mash yolks of eggs with fork.
Add the cheese, 3/4 avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stuff the egg whites.
Slice remaining avocado thinly.
Put thin slice of avocado on top of eggs.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Avocado
Ingredients:
3 avocados, halved lengthwise
1 large carrot, diced small
8 oz. peas
8 oz. green beans, diced
1 lb. potatoes, diced small
1/4 c. oil
2 eggs
mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 lemon, juice only
1/2 tsp. mustard
1 tooth of garlic
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the cut-up carrot, peas, green beans and potatoes.
Put the eggs in blender.
Add a continuous thread of oil a little at a time.
Add garlic, pepper, mustard and salt to taste and finally add lemon juice.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Loaf Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
3/4 c. shortening, creamed
3 eggs
2 c. flour
3 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. allspice
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. pureed avocado
3/4 c. buttermilk
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
3/4 c. raisins
Directions:
Combine sugar and shortening, beating until light and fluffy. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Fold into sugar mixture.
Add pureed avocado and buttermilk.
Stir in vanilla, walnuts and raisins. Let batter stand for 10 minutes.
Grease glass loaf pan with additional shortening.
Line greased pan with waxed paper.
Fill half full with batter.
Microwave on High for 8 minutes, turning quarter turn every 2 minutes.
Cool for a few minutes; remove to rack to complete cooling.
Repeat with remaining batter for second loaf.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Appetizer Puffs
Ingredients:
1 c. water
1/2 c. butter
1 c. flour
4 eggs
Directions:
Heat
oven
to
400°.
Heat water and butter to rolling boil in 3 quart saucepan. Stir in flour.
Stir vigorously over low heat
until mixture forms a ball, about 1 minute;
remove from heat.
Beat
in
eggs,
all
at
once,
until smooth and glossy. Drop
dough
by
slightly
rounded
teaspoonful
onto ungreased cookie
sheet.
Bake until puffed, golden brown and dry.
Cool
on wire
rack away from draft.
Cut top off puffs with
a sharp knife. Remove any filaments of soft dough.
Fill each
puff
with slightly rounded teaspoonful of your favorite meat salad mixture (chicken, ham, tuna, etc.).
Replace top.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Seven-Layer Mexican Appetizer
Ingredients:
2 cans Mexican bean dip
lemon juice
1/2 pt. sour cream
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
3 tomatoes
1 pkg. grated Cheddar cheese
2 ripe avocados
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 large bunch green onions
1 can pitted ripe olives
1 pkg. large Doritos
Directions:
In a large glass salad bowl, spread the 2 cans of bean dip. Top this with the avocados which have been dipped in lemon juice. Sprinkle this with black pepper.
Mix the sour cream, mayonnaise and taco seasoning mix.
Spread on top of avocados.
Chop the large bunch of onions, including the tops.
Layer over sour cream mixture.
Chop the tomatoes and layer over the onions.
Top them with the ripe olives which have been chopped.
Cover with the Cheddar cheese.
Chill!
Serve with the Doritos.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Chicken Almond Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. warm milk
1 Tbsp. white wine
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. finely chopped cooked chicken
1 tsp. capers
2 Tbsp. chopped almonds
4 slices toast, cut into quarters
1/4 lb. Cheddar cheese, sliced
Directions:
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add flour and milk, stirring until smooth and thickened.
Stir in wine, salt, chicken, capers and almonds.
Spread on toast; top with cheese and broil until cheese melts.
Makes 16 canapes.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Mexican Style Appetizer
Ingredients:
1 can (11 1/2 oz.) condensed bean with bacon soup
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. sour cream
1 can (4 oz.) chopped green chiles, drained
1/2 c. sliced pimiento stuffed green olives
1 c. shredded longhorn cheese
1/2 c. alfalfa sprouts
1/2 c. chopped tomatoes
Directions:
In a small bowl combine soup, taco seasoning mixed with hot pepper sauce, stir until blended.
On large serving plate, spread mixture into a 6 inch round.
Spread sides and top of bean mixture with sour cream to cover. Layer chiles, olives, cheese, sprouts and tomatoes over sour cream.
Cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours. Surround with tortilla chips to serve.
Makes 10 appetizer servings.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Southwest Appetizer
Ingredients:
8 oz. cream cheese (Philadelphia lite)
4 oz. can chopped green chilies
1 can Staggs chicken or beef chili
1 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded
Directions:
Soften cream
cheese and spread out evenly in glass pie plate. Add can
of chili on top.	Distribute green chilies on top of chili.
Sprinkle
cheese
over all.
Warm in microwave until cheese melts
or
put
in
oven
until warm.
Serve with tortilla chips, potato chips or crackers.
"MMM" good!

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. light cream
2 egg yolks, beaten
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place butter in a 4-cup glass bowl.
Microwave on High for 1 minute or until butter is melted.
Add remaining ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until smooth.
Cook on medium for 1 minute, beating every 15 seconds until thickened.
Remove from oven and beat with mixer until light and smooth.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
3 egg yolks
6 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. boiling water
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
In top of double boiler heat beaten egg yolks.
Gradually add butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly.
Cook over hot water, not boiling or it will curdle, until thickened. Gradually add water and lemon juice while stirring.
Add salt. Serve with fish.
Yields 1 cup.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
4 egg yolks
1 c. butter
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of cayenne
Directions:
Put egg yolks with 1/3 of the butter in the top of a double boiler. Keep water in bottom of pot hot, but not boiling. Stir the mixture constantly. When butter melts, add another portion and as it melts and the mixture begins to thicken, add the rest of the butter, stirring all the time. As soon as the mixture is thick, remove from heat and add seasonings. This sauce is delicious served over vegetables.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. liquid Butter Buds
1 c. boiling water
1/2 tsp. lite salt (optional)
1 Tbsp. flour
2 Egg Beaters, beaten
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Combine Butter Buds and flour in saucepan; add boiling water, stirring constantly.
Cook over low heat.
Beat Egg Beaters, salt, and lemon juice together.
Add some of the first mixture to this before slowly adding to the Butter Buds, flour, and water.
Cook until the spoon is well coated.
This is delicious, easy to make, and will keep well.
It is just as good warmed over as it is fresh off the stove.
Yields 1 1/2 cups (six 1/2-cup servings).

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. butter, at room temperature
3 Tbsp. water
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
3 egg yolks
white pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut butter into 1-inch pieces.
In a small heavy saucepan, combine lemon juice and 2 tablespoons water and reduce over high heat to about one tablespoon.
Remove from heat and add 1 tablespoon cold water.
Beat egg yolks lightly and whisk into lemon water.
Over low heat, whisk in the butter, one piece at a time, making sure that each piece of butter is melted before adding more.
Continue to whisk the sauce until it is thick.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serving size 8.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
6 eggs
