1 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice, if desired
pinch of salt
1 c. flour
Directions:
Separate whites and yolks of eggs.
Beat whites until stiff, yolks until thick and lemon colored.
Add 1 cup sugar to yolks and beat until completely mixed.
Add vanilla, lemon juice and salt. Fold yolk mixture into whites very gently.
Lastly, add flour, folding in gently.
Use large buttered and floured tube pan.
Bake in 325° oven 45 to 60 minutes.
(A smaller version may be made with 4 eggs, 7/8 cup sugar and 7/8 cup flour.)
Also can be used for cupcakes.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Easy Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
2 eggs, well beaten
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. flour with 1 tsp. baking powder, mixed
1/2 c. boiling water
1 tsp. flavoring (vanilla, lemon or orange)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Prepare tube pan.
In mixing bowl, beat eggs until lemon colored.
Add 1 cup sugar; blend.
Add 1/2 cup flour; blend.
Add 1/2 cup flour and baking powder mixture; blend. Add water gradually.
Blend.
Add flavoring.
Bake 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake(Small)
Ingredients:
3 eggs, separated
1 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. warm water
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Put yolks in a bowl.
Add warm water and beat until very light, almost filling a large bowl.
Add gradually the cup of sugar and keep beating until very creamy.
Stir in the flour and beat the egg whites to a froth.
Fold them into the sponge cake mixture.
Then add the salt, vanilla and baking powder.
Pour into ungreased tube and bake 40 or 50 minutes.
Very slowly the first 15 minutes (250°) and then increase temperature to 350°.
Turn upside down on a clean towel and cover pan with the towel so the cooling will be gradual.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cold water
3 eggs, separated
1 1/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Beat egg whites stiff.
Set aside.
Put cold water in a large bowl.
Add egg yolks.
Beat until light.
Add sugar and beat 7 minutes (do not fail here; this is the secret of a light cake). Sift flour twice. Add baking powder and salt. Add dry ingredients to egg yolk mixture. Add egg whites. Fold carefully and add vanilla.
Pour into ungreased tube pan and bake 45 minutes in a 350° oven.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: New England Sponge Cake(This Was My Mother'S Recipe)
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. boiling water
1 tsp. orange or lemon juice
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Beat eggs vigorously.
Add sugar and continue to beat rapidly. Add boiling water, beating constantly, the more the better.
Add flavoring (vanilla may be used).
Sift flour, salt and baking powder.
Add to first mixture and continue to beat rapidly.
Pour into well-greased pan and bake in 350° oven about 35 to 40 minutes. Can be baked in tube pan or 13 x 9-inch if you want to use it for shortcake.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Stuffin Muffins(These Savory Bread Puddings Are Absolutely Scrumptious!)
Ingredients:
10 oz. Italian bread (preferably day-old), cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 c. milk
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
2 scallions, chopped
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Butter 12-cup muffin pan.
Divide bread cubes among muffin cups.
In a large bowl, combine milk, eggs, scallions, thyme, salt and pepper.
Pour milk mixture over bread cubes.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Bake until golden brown, about 45 minutes.
Run knife around puddings and carefully lift out.
Cool 10 minutes.
Serve warm.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
5 slices bread, cut in small cubes
4 eggs
4 c. milk
1/2 c. raisins
1/3 c. dates, chopped
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/3 c. wine or brandy
2/3 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Soak raisins and dates in wine or brandy for at least 15 minutes.
Add milk and bread.
Bring to a boil.
Add beaten eggs, mixed with sugar and vanilla.
Let mixture come to boiling point. Pour into 8 x 12-inch pan, that has been sprayed with nonstick spray.
Put this pan into a larger pan with hot water 1 1/2-inches deep.
Pour melted butter over top and sprinkle with nutmeg.
Bake in 375° oven until knife inserted in center comes out clean.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Savory Cheese Bread(Microwave)
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1/2 c. butter
2 3/4 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 egg
1 envelope dry onion soup mix, divided
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
Directions:
Combine milk and butter in a 2-cup glass dish.
Cook on High for 2 minutes.
Mix flour, sugar, salt and yeast in large mixing bowl.
Add milk mixture and egg.
Mix 2 tablespoons of soup mix and 1/4 cup cheese in small bowl; set aside.
Add remaining soup mix and cheese to batter.
Divide batter evenly between 2 well-greased 8 x 4-inch microproof loaf pans.
Sprinkle with reserved onion-cheese mixture.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
3 c. bread cubes (6 slices)
1/4 tsp. salt
4 eggs, slightly beaten
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
4 c. scalded milk
1 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Lightly spray a 7 1/2 x 11 1/2 baking dish with Pam.
Place in a 9 x 13 filled with 1-inch of water.
Set aside.
Place bread cubes in the bottom of the smaller dish.
Put milk in a saucepan and heat to scalding.
Remove from the heat.
Add sugar, flour, salt, butter, vanilla and eggs.
Beat well.
Pour over bread cubes.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Check after 45 minutes as ovens may vary.
Pudding is done when a knife inserted near the middle comes out clean.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Savory Beer Bread
Ingredients:
3 1/4 c. self-rising flour
3 Tbsp. sugar
12 oz. can beer (room temperature)
1 Tbsp. butter, melted
sesame seed (optional)
Directions:
In large bowl, combine the flour, sugar and beer.
Stir until all ingredients are moistened and a sticky dough forms.
Cover the bowl with a damp cloth and place it in a warm place for 90 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Leek Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. coarsely chopped onions (about 1/2 lb.)
4 c. sliced leek (white part only, about 2/3 lb.)
2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
3 Tbsp. butter, margarine or oil
4 c. chicken stock (about 2 cans clear chicken broth)
salt
freshly ground white pepper or regular white pepper
1 c. half and half
Directions:
Saute onions, leek and potatoes in butter over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes.
Add stock and bring to a boil.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Puree potato-leek mixture in blender.
Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper.
Add half and half.
Return to heat and heat through.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
1 bunch leeks, sliced very fine
3 stalks celery, sliced very fine
3 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 c. diced potatoes
3 c. milk or half milk and half all-purpose cream
1 c. water
Directions:
Put leeks, celery and butter in a pan.
Cook 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add water.
Cover and cook 10 more minutes. Add potatoes and add more water to cover.
Cover and cook 10 additional minutes.
Add milk.
Simmer until potatoes are tender. Season to taste with salt, pepper and cayenne.
Serve hot.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Healthy Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 to 3 leeks, chopped
3 stalks finely chopped celery
2 to 3 potatoes, peeled and diced
3 to 4 c. water or stock
1 small bay leaf
salt
pepper
1 c. instant dry skim milk
1 to 2 Tbsp. margarine
parsley, chives, scallion or dill (optional)
Directions:
In a heavy pot, saute leeks and celery.
Add potatoes, water or stock, and bay leaf; cook until tender.
Let cool briefly. Then, while stirring with a whisk or blending, add dry milk and margarine.
Garnish with parsley, chives, scallion or dill, if desired.
Yield:
4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato Leek Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. potatoes, scrubbed and sliced
3 or 4 leeks (white part and 1 inch green), split open lengthwise and sliced
4 c. chicken stock (may use canned)
4 c. water
1 to 3 Tbsp. butter to taste
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large soup pot, combine potatoes, leeks, stock, water and butter.
Bring to a boil, turn down heat and let simmer for about 1 hour.
Stir occasionally.
Taste for seasoning and add salt and pepper if needed.
Mash some of the potatoes into the soup to thicken slightly.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Easy Leek Soup For Two
Ingredients:
1 leek (use everything except the dark green outer leaves)
2 c. water
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 medium white potato, peeled and diced
1 small onion, peeled and diced
Directions:
Cut leek into 1-inch sections and cut each section lengthwise so that you can wash away all sand.
Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan; cover and bring to a boil.
Uncover; reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes or until vegetables are soft.
Puree in blender until creamy.
Makes 2 servings.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/2 c. cocoa
1/2 tsp. soda
2 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. Crisco
1 c. boiling water
1/2 c. buttermilk
1/8 tsp. salt
2 eggs
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients (flour, sugar, cocoa, soda and salt).
Cut in shortening.
Add slightly beaten eggs, buttermilk and vanilla; beat for 2 minutes, then add the 1 cup boiling water. Don't beat.
Just mix well.
Pour into well-greased and floured pans and bake at 350° for about 30 to 35 minutes.
"Real moist cake".

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Cold Water Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
4 big Tbsp. cocoa
2 Tbsp. vinegar
6 Tbsp. oil
1 c. cold water
Directions:
Mix together and sift flour, sugar, baking soda, salt and cocoa three times.
Make 3 holes in dry ingredients.
In 1 hole, put 1 tablespoon vinegar.
In second hole, put the 6 tablespoons of oil. In third hole, put 1 tablespoon vinegar.
Put cold water over mixture.
Mix. Put in 8 x 8* pan.
Bake at 375° until done.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
2 c. plain flour, sifted
1 stick margarine
1 stick butter
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Place sugar and flour in a bowl and mix well.
Bring margarine, butter, cocoa and water to a rapid boil.
Remove from heat and pour over sugar and flour.
Mix well.
Add vanilla, soda, buttermilk and eggs.
Beat well with an electric mixer.
Pour in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Can Do Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 c. shortening
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
2/3 c. cocoa
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Grease and flour 2 round pans or 1 oblong pan.
In large bowl, combine all ingredients.
Beat on low speed 30 minutes, scraping sides and bottom of bowl.
Beat 3 minutes on medium speed, scraping bowl frequently.
Pour into prepared pans.
Bake at 350° until done.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cocoa
2 c. boiling water
1 c. margarine, softened
2 1/2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Combine cocoa and boiling water, stirring until smooth; set aside.
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well with electric mixer at medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Combine flour, soda, baking powder and salt in medium bowl; add to creamed mixture alternately with cocoa mixture, beating with electric mixer at low speed, beginning and ending with flour mixture.
Stir in vanilla.
Do not overbeat. Pour batter into greased and floured pans (use three 9-inch round pans or one 9 x 13-inch pan).
Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes; test center of cake with toothpick.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes; remove from pans and cool completely on wire racks before frosting.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 egg, beaten
1 medium green bell pepper, chopped
3 scallions, sliced
1 celery rib, sliced
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed (1 c.)
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/8 tsp. hot pepper sauce
2 c. cooked rice, cooled
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In a wok, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add egg and cook, stirring, until firm, about 2 minutes. Remove to a plate.
Cut into small pieces.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1/4 c. egg substitute
2 Tbsp. rice wine or dry white wine
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
1 Tbsp. water
1/8 tsp. pepper
nonstick cooking spray
1 c. loose-pack frozen green beans, thawed and well drained
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. bias-sliced celery (1 stalk)
1 small onion, halved and sliced (1/3 c.)
1/2 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots, drained (1/2 c.)
2 c. chilled cooked rice (cooked without margarine or salt)
2 Tbsp. unsalted dry roasted peanuts, coarsely chopped (optional)
Directions:
In a small mixing bowl, stir together the egg substitute, rice wine or white wine, soy sauce, water and pepper.
Set aside.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice #1
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. salad oil or bacon fat
1/2 c. ham or leftover meat, diced
1/2 c. vegetables (carrots, green beans, bamboo shoots, etc.), diced
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. oyster sauce
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 c. cooked rice
1/4 c. green onion, chopped
3 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add meats and vegetables.
Fry until vegetables are cooked.
Add salt, soy sauce and oyster sauce; cook 1 minute.
Add eggs.
Stir in rice.
Cook until done.
Add green onion.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen vegetables (desired)
rice
soy sauce
seasonings (desired)
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Cook rice and set aside.
Add oil to skillet.
When hot (medium), add vegetables.
Stir constantly until cooked.
Add rice, soy sauce (desired amount of soy sauce) and seasonings. Enjoy!

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 eggs, beaten
dash of salt
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 lb. mushrooms
3 c. cooked, cold rice
soy sauce to taste
Directions:
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in skillet.
Add eggs and salt.
Fry until firm.
Remove to plate.
Cut into strips and reserve.
Heat remaining 5 tablespoons of oil in skillet.
Add onion and mushrooms.
Saute just until tender and crisp.
Add rice.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until heated through.
Stir in soy sauce and eggs.
Taste.
Add more soy sauce, if desired.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Roast Beef Or Pork
Ingredients:
1 large onion
2 Tbsp. white vinegar
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. mustard
1 c. ketchup
1 c. water
3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. celery or 1 tsp. celery salt
leftover roast beef or pork, cubed
Directions:
Brown onions in skillet; then add vinegar, brown sugar, mustard, ketchup, water, Worcestershire sauce and celery.
Simmer together for about 20 minutes.
Add cooked cubes of meat to the sauce.
Simmer for another 20 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Pork Roast
Ingredients:
1 (4 to 5 lb.) pork roast
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
3 D'Anjou or Bosc pears (1 lb.), peeled and halved
2 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/4 c. margarine
1/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Sprinkle roast with salt, pepper and cinnamon; rub into meat.
Place roast on rack in baking pan, fat side up.
Bake about 3 to 3 1/2 hours (allow 25 minutes per pound).
Place pears and sweet potatoes around meat; continue baking.
Spoon off fat.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Brandied Roast Pork
Ingredients:
1 tsp. soy sauce
2 c. teriyaki sauce
1 c. pineapple juice
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. white vinegar
3 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. brandy
3 lb. pork loin
pinch of salt and pepper
Directions:
Place all ingredients, except pork loin, in a saucepan and bring to a low boil, stirring until sugar is melted and ingredients are blended. Use caution since this boils over easily. Let cool. Reserve 1/3 cup of the marinade and refrigerate. Marinate pork for no less than 4 hours; overnight works best.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Orange-Ginger Pork Roast
Ingredients:
1 pork roast (approximately 1/2 lb. per person)*
1/4 to 1/2 c. honey**
1 can frozen orange juice concentrate
1 Tbsp. ginger
1/2 Tbsp. cinnamon
brandy (optional)
Directions:
* Will leave some leftovers for sandwiches.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Glazed Pork Roast
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork roast
2 Tbsp. Karo syrup (heavy, clear)
1 tsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 can pear halves, reserving 1/2 c. juice
6 bratwurst
2 (12 oz.) cans beer or water if you prefer
2 onions, sliced thin and separated into rings
1 red pepper, cut and sliced in 1/4-inch strips
1 green pepper, cut and sliced in 1/4-inch strips
1 yellow pepper or Hungarian wax hot pepper, cut and sliced in 1/4-inch strips
1/4 c. fresh marjoram leaves, finely chopped or 2 Tbsp. dried marjoram
1 clove garlic, peeled
3 Tbsp. extra virgin olive oil
pepper to taste
6 bratwurst buns or sourdough club rolls
Directions:
Start coals in outdoor grill.
Place bratwurst in a large saucepan; cover bratwurst with beer.
Add onion rings from one onion and add just enough water to cover bratwurst and onion, if necessary.
Bring beer to a simmer and simmer for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Molten Chocolate Lava Cake(Petite Gateau)
Ingredients:
1/2 cup Butter, unsalted
4 ounce(s) Bittersweet chocolate
2 Egg(s)
2 Egg yolk(s)
1/4 cup Sugar
2 tablespoon(s) Flour, all-purpose
Directions:
Butter and flour 4 custard cups.
Preheat oven to 450F.
Melt butter and chocolate.
Do NOT let it boil.
Remove from heat and set aside.
Beat together the 2 eggs plus 2 yolks and the sugar, until it's light and thick.
Pour the now tepid chocolate mixture into the egg mixture, and beat to mix.
Quickly beat in the flour until just mixed in.
Pour into the custard cups.
(At this point you can refrigerate for up to 24 hours.
If you refrigerate, let return to room temp before you bake.)
Put custard cups on a baking sheet and bake at 450 degrees for 6-7 minutes.
The outside will be set up, but the top may still be slightly wiggly (technical French cooking term).
Invert on plate, let sit for 10 seconds or so, remove custard cup.
Sprinkle with powdered sugar, and surround with a fruit sauce of you're choice.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Homemade Lava
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. baking soda
2 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. dish soap
3 Tbsp. vinegar
3 drops food coloring
Directions:
Combine water and baking soda in a glass.
In another glass, combine soap, food coloring and vinegar.
When ready for the eruption, add baking soda solution to the soap/vinegar solution and watch it foam and flow.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/2 c. cocoa
1/2 tsp. soda
2 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. Crisco
1 c. boiling water
1/2 c. buttermilk
1/8 tsp. salt
2 eggs
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients (flour, sugar, cocoa, soda and salt).
Cut in shortening.
Add slightly beaten eggs, buttermilk and vanilla; beat for 2 minutes, then add the 1 cup boiling water. Don't beat.
Just mix well.
Pour into well-greased and floured pans and bake at 350° for about 30 to 35 minutes.
"Real moist cake".

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Lava Flow(From The Kannapali Maui Marriott)
Ingredients:
1 shot rum
1/2 shot creme de banana
1/2 ripe banana
3 oz. pineapple juice
3 oz. Coco Lopez
1 c. ice
1 c. frozen strawberries, blended separately from other ingredients
Directions:
In bottom of glass, put 2 ounces blended strawberries.
Blend remaining ingredients.
Pour mixture over strawberries to form swirled effect.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 sq. unsweetened chocolate
2 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/4 c. (1 lb.) brown sugar
3 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. buttermilk
1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Melt chocolate over hot water.
Sift flour, soda and salt on wax paper.
Cream margarine and butter.
Add sugar.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Stir in vanilla and chocolate.
Add flour mixture a third at a time alternately with buttermilk.
Stir in hot water and pour into 3 (9-inch) greased cake pans.
Bake in 375° oven for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk or soured milk
1 1/4 c. flour
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. mashed banana
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Beat egg.
Beat in remaining ingredients until smooth.
Serve with honey or currant jelly or dust with confectioners sugar.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: French Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all purpose flour
1/4 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. milk
2 eggs
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Sift flour and confectioners sugar into a mixing bowl. Add milk, eggs, butter, vanilla and salt; beat until smooth. Heat a lightly greased 6-inch skillet; add about 3 Tbsp. batter, spreading to almost cover bottom of skillet. Cook until lightly browned; turn and brown the other side. remove to a wire rack. Repeat with remaining batter (makes 10-12 pancakes), greasing skillet as needed.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
1 egg
1 c. buttermilk
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 very ripe banana, mashed
Directions:
Sift flour and combine with next 4 ingredients. Combine egg, buttermilk and margarine; add to dry mixture. Stir until smooth. Stir in banana. Use 1/4 cup batter for each pancake. Pour onto hot griddle coated with cooking spray. Turn only once when edges look done. Serve with maple syrup and strawberry preserves.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour (all-purpose)
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
1/3 c. melted butter
1 1/2 c. mashed bananas
Directions:
Sift flour with baking powder, salt, sugar and cinnamon.
Beat eggs and beat in milk, butter, bananas and vanilla.
Add dry ingredients and stir until blended.
Bake each pancake on a hot, lightly oiled griddle, pouring out 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Flip once when brown.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 c. nonfat buttermilk
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 c. mashed ripe banana
1/2 c. frozen egg substitute, thawed
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Combine first three ingredients in a large bowl.
Make a well in the center of mixture.
Combine buttermilk and soda, stirring well.
Add banana, egg substitute and oil.
Stir well.
Add buttermilk mixture to dry ingredients, stirring just enough to moisten.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
2 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1/8's
2 cloves garlic
2 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 carrots, peeled, cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 c. flat leaf parsley leaves
1 large egg
1 c. ketchup
3 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Place bread in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add ground beef.
Place onion, garlic, celery, carrots, and parsley in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine.
Add to meat mixture, using hands to mix well.
Add egg, 1/2 c. ketchup, 2 tsp. dry mustard, salt and pepper; use hands to combine thoroughly.
Place in an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pan.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
2 lbs. extra lean hamburger
1/4 lb. sausage
1 cup crumbled saltines
2 eggs
3/4 cup milk
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 tsp. accent (optional)
1/2 cup finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
If mixture seems too dry, add a little more milk.
Shape into a loaf and bake in a flat dish at 325° for 1 hour 30 minutes or until done.
Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. May pour 8 oz. can of tomato sauce over meat before baking.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Mexican Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil, plus 1 tsp.
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. green bell pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 pkg. beef broth seasoning
15 oz. ground round
4 oz. cheddar cheese, shredded
3/4 c. bread crumbs, plain
1/2 c. tomato sauce
1/4 c. yogurt or sour cream
2 Tbsp. parsley, fresh, chopped
2 tsp. worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
In skillet, brown onion, peppers, garlic and seasoning packet in oil.
Combine these ingredients with remaining ingredients in mixing bowl.
Shape mixture in a loaf and bake until browned, 45 minutes at 375 degrees.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Super Tasty Basic Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. ketchup
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. red pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
2 tsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ketchup, tomato juice, salt, peppers, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion and 2 teaspoons mustard.
Mix thoroughly.
Add ground beef.
Mix. Press beef into a 5 X 5 loaf pan.
Combine 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon mustard and brown sugar and spread over meatloaf.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.
Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 beaten egg
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. celery salt
2 slices bread, cut into crumbs
2 lb. ground beef
1 c. oatmeal
catsup
Directions:
Mix ingredients in order listed.
Shape into loaf.
Top with catsup.
Bake at 375° for approximately 1 hour in foil-lined pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. lite or fat-free sour cream
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. poppy seeds
2 Tbsp. milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
Directions:
In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside. Combine remaining ingredients; mix well. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups 2/3 full. Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes or until muffins test done. Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. plain flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. low-fat milk
1 (16 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; don't overmix.
Spray pan with Pam and fill 2/3 full.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400°.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy-Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. skim or 1% milk
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; do not overmix.
Coat a 12-muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray or line with muffin cups.
Fill each 2/3 full with muffin mixture.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400° or until golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Muffins
Ingredients:
1 c. margarine
1 3/4 c. sugar, divided
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
5 eggs, separated
3/4 c. lemon juice
2 2/3 c. flour, sifted
1 1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. poppy seed
1 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Beat margarine, 1 1/2 cups sugar and cream cheese at medium speed with mixer until light and fluffy. Blend in egg yolks and lemon juice.
Add combined flour, baking powder and baking soda and mix well.
Beat in poppy seed and peel. Set aside.
Beat egg whites until foamy.
Gradually add reserved 1/4 cup sugar, beating until soft peaks form.
Fold egg whites into batter.
Pour into greased muffin pan.
Bake 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool and remove from pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
1/4 c. melted margarine
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1/2 tsp. grated lemon rind
2 c. flour
1/3 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
Directions:
Combine egg, margarine, milk and lemon rind in bowl.
Add to dry ingredients.
Stir until combined.
Spoon batter into prepared 2 1/2-inch muffin pans.
Bake 20 to 22 minutes in 400° oven.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet-Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vinegar
1 c. pineapple juice
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3/4 c. green pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. onion, cut up
1 can pineapple chunks, drained
1 chicken, cut up
vegetable oil
Directions:
Combine water and cornstarch; add salt, brown sugar, vinegar, pineapple juice and soy sauce.
Cook until thick.
Add green pepper, onion and pineapple.
Brown the chicken in oil.
Cover with sauce.
Bake at 325° until tender.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 tsp. margarine
1 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 lb. chicken cutlets, cut into cubes
1/2 c. sliced green or red bell peppers
1/2 c. sliced onion
1/2 c. quartered mushrooms
1 small garlic clove, sliced
1/2 c. drained canned crushed pineapple (no sugar added)
1 1/2 tsp. ketchup
1 tsp. firmly packed light or dark brown sugar
1 tsp. cider vinegar
1/2 packet (about 1/2 tsp.) instant chicken broth and seasoning mix
1 large plum tomato, blanched, peeled, seeded and sliced
1/4 diagonally sliced scallions (green onions)
Directions:
In 9 or 10-inch skillet heat margarine and oil together until margarine is bubbly and mixture is hot; add chicken and saute, stirring frequently, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
Add peppers, onion, mushrooms and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes. In blender container combine pineapple, ketchup, sugar, vinegar and broth mix and process until pureed, scraping down sides of container as necessary.
Pour pureed mixture over chicken and vegetables in skillet and stir to combine; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low; add tomato and scallions, stir to combine, and cook until flavors blend, about 5 minutes.
Makes 2 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. (8 oz.) pineapple chunks
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. shortening or Pam
1 1/4 c. water
2 c. carrot sticks
3 bouillon cubes or instant broth packets
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 c. catsup and 1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 c. diced cooked chicken and/or can stir-fry
1 c. green pepper strips (you can substitute green beans)
3/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 1/4 c. Minute rice
Directions:
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add water to juice to make 2 1/4 cups.
Saute onion in shortening in large skillet until tender.
Add 1 1/4 cups water, carrots and bouillon.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Combine sugar, cornstarch and ginger.
Add catsup, vinegar and soy sauce and stir into vegetable mixture. Cook until clear and thickened.
Add chicken, green peppers and pineapple.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet-Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 large cut up frying chicken
2/3 c. flour
2/3 c. soy sauce
2/3 c. rice vinegar
2 c. water
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 clove garlic
1/4 tsp. ginger
Directions:
Mix flour, soy sauce, ginger and garlic.
Brush on chicken and leave for 2 hours.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour over chicken.
Bake at 350° for about 1 hour, basting every 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken "Sweet 'N Sour"
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. chicken cutlets
1 onion, chopped
2 carrots, sliced
1 green pepper, chunked
1 (8 oz.) can chunk pineapple with liquid
1/4 c. white vinegar
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. ketchup
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
Directions:
Cut chicken in 1/2-inch pieces.
Brown in oil.
Reduce heat to low; add onion.
Cover; cook for 10 minutes.
Add carrots and green pepper.
Combine remaining ingredients.
Stir into skillet. Cover; simmer for 10 minutes longer.
Serve with rice.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
4 medium squash
2/3 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. white sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
4 tsp. lemon juice
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cut potatoes for frying (about 6 good ones).
Coat with 1 heaping
tablespoonful of flour.
Fry in deep oil.
Salt to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 c. raw rice
1 can tomato paste
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can shrimp or 1/2 lb. cleaned shrimp, cut small
1/2 c. or more peas
Directions:
Saute onion and peppers in oil.
Add rice; cook over medium heat until tanned; stir constantly.
Add tomato paste, salt, pepper and broth.
Mix and cover tightly.
Simmer without stirring for 35 to 40 minutes.
Add shrimp and peas.
Mix well.
Cook an additional 5 minutes until shrimp is done.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Squash Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil (preferably olive)
1 small red onion, sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1 large yellow squash (about 1/2 lb.), sliced
1 large zucchini (about 1/2 lb.), sliced
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
2 Tbsp. white wine
2 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. shredded Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add onion and garlic; cook until just softened, 5 to 7 minutes.
Add yellow squash and zucchini; cook, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned, about 8 minutes.
Stir in parsley, white wine, oregano, salt and red pepper flakes.
Cook, stirring, until mixture is heated through, 2 to 3 minutes.
Serve sprinkled with Parmesan cheese.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Fried Squash
Ingredients:
3 yellow squash, cut crosswise
1 onion, cut crosswise
1 egg, beaten in a little water
1 c. meal
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
In 1-gallon Ziploc bag, place all ingredients and shake. Fry until brown on each side.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Risotto(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter (divided use)
2 c. rice
6 c. chicken broth
1 small bay leaf
1 lb. shrimp, peeled
1 tsp. minced garlic
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Stir in rice to coat.
Add broth and bay leaf.
Cook rice.
Separately melt 2 tablespoons of butter; saute shrimp and garlic.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Add shrimp mixture to cooked rice.
Add remainder of ingredients. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 egg
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. salad oil
8 oz. chocolate chips
Directions:
Mix first 7 ingredients together by hand until smooth.
Add 8 ounces chocolate chips and stir.
Cook over low heat until done.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. buttermilk baking mix
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
chocolate syrup (optional)
Directions:
In a medium bowl, whisk together baking mix, milk, egg and sugar until smooth.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Heat a heavy skillet or griddle over medium-high heat.
Grease lightly.
Using about 1/4 cup batter for each pancake, pour batter into skillet in shape of a heart and cook until bubbles appear on surface and edges are dry.
Turn and cook until bottom is golden brown.
Place cooked pancakes in a warm oven until ready to serve.
Serve with chocolate syrup or syrup of your choice.
Makes about thirteen 4-inch pancakes.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. buttermilk baking mix
1 c. milk
1 large egg
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
chocolate syrup, (optional)
Directions:
Mix in medium bowl milk, egg and sugar until smooth.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Heat in a heavy skillet or griddle over medium-high heat.
Grease lightly.
Using about 1/4 cup batter for each pancake, pour batter into skillet in shape of heart and cook until bubbles appear on surface and edges are dry.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. buttermilk baking mix
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1/2 c. Hershey mini chocolate chips
Directions:
Combine buttermilk baking mix, milk and eggs in medium bowl. Beat with wooden spoon until smooth.
Stir in chips.
Pour 2 tablespoons of batter onto hot, slightly greased griddle.
Cook until bubbles appear.
Turn.
Cook other side until lightly browned.
Serve warm with butter or sprinkle with confectioners sugar.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. cocoa
Directions:
Mix all ingredients.
Pour 1/4 cup batter on hot griddle. Cook pancakes until puffed.
Turn and cook other sides until golden brown.
Dust with powdered sugar. "Tastes just like a chocolate donut." Christine Walsh.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. melted shortening (Crisco or butter)
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. coconut
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 c. sifted flour
4 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. nuts
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Sift salt, soda and flour; mix ingredients in order given. Drop by teaspoon on greased cookie sheet.
Press flat.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.
Makes about 4 dozen 2-inch cookies.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. white sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. coconut (to mix in batter)
1 c. coconut (to roll batter in)
Directions:
Cream the butter and sugar.
Add egg.
Sift salt, baking powder and flour.
Add to creamed mixture, then add vanilla and 1 cup of coconut.
Using teaspoon, make ball and roll in coconut. Bake at 350°.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
3 c. moist shredded coconut (8 oz.)
1 tsp. vanilla or almond extract
1/8 tsp. salt
2/3 c. sweetened condensed milk
1 or 2 stiffly beaten egg whites
chocolate
confectioners sugar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Have the coconut ready in a bowl.
Add the vanilla or almond extract and salt.
Combine these with the sweetened condensed milk.
Make a thick paste.
These are much improved by folding into the batter the stiffly beaten egg whites. Roll into balls, or drop by teaspoon onto a well-greased cookie sheet.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until lightly browned around edges.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Dad'S Favorite Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 eggs
3/4 c. sugar
1/3 c. flour
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1/8 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. vanilla
2 2/3 c. coconut
Directions:
Beat eggs until foamy.
Slowly add sugar; beat 5 minutes. Fold in flour, baking powder and salt, then fold in butter, vanilla and coconut.
Drop onto greased and floured cookie sheet and bake at 325° for about 15 minutes.
Watch closely.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 large egg whites
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 (7 oz.) bag flaked coconut
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
Directions:
Preheat oven to 300°.
Grease and flour large cookie sheet. In small bowl with mixer at high speed, beat egg whites and salt until soft peaks form.
Beating at high speed, sprinkle in sugar 2 tablespoons at a time, beating well after each addition, until sugar is completely dissolved.
Beat in vanilla (whites should stand in stiff glossy peaks).
With rubber spatula fold in coconut and flour.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked, chopped chicken
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
2 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and thinly sliced
20 slices bread, crusts removed
4 eggs, slightly beaten
2 Tbsp. milk
1 (6 oz.) bag potato chips, crushed
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients, mixing well. Spread evenly on 10 slices of bread.
Top with the remaining 10 slices. Wrap individually in freezer wrap and freeze.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven-Fried Chicken(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, peeled
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese (about 1 oz.)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. crumbled sage or thyme
1/4 c. milk
2 1/2 c. chicken parts
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Line a baking sheet with foil.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken
Ingredients:
10 chicken breast halves
10 chicken legs (drum and thigh)
3/4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt-free herb-blend seasoning
2 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. pepper
2 eggs or 4 egg whites or 1/2 c. non-cholesterol egg substitute
1/4 c. milk (low-fat, if desired)
1/4 c. Dijon-type mustard
1 1/2 tsp. chopped rosemary
4 c. Panko or 2 c. plain dried bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped parsley
Directions:
Remove skin from chicken.
Wash each piece and drain well. Combine flour, herb-blend, paprika and pepper.
Place in paper or plastic bag and add 3 pieces of chicken at a time; shake to coat. Beat eggs, milk, mustard and rosemary together until smooth; set aside.
Combine bread crumbs and parsley.
Dip chicken in egg mixture, shake off excess, then dip in crumb mixture to coat evenly.
Place coated pieces on shallow, lightly greased baking pans.
Let stand 30 minutes before baking.
(Or cover and refrigerate until baking time.)
Bake 10 minutes at 425°.
Reduce heat to 375° and bake an additional 25 minutes or until browned and juices run clear when knife is inserted.
Serve chilled. Makes 10 generous servings.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Corn Crispy Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. crushed corn flakes
1 tsp. salt
2/3 c. milk
1/2 c. flour
dash of pepper
6 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Wash chicken, pat dry.
Mix corn flakes, flour, salt and pepper.
Dip chicken pieces in milk, then dip and cover well with corn flake mixture.
Melt butter in shallow pan, place skin side down in melted butter.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Turn chicken, bake 15 to 30 minutes more.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Hot Chicken Sandwich Supreme
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter or margarine
1/2 c. diced green pepper
1 c. sliced mushrooms
4 Tbsp. flour
1 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. diced pimiento
2 1/2 c. diced cooked chicken
salt and pepper
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. sherry
8 slices bread (crust trimmed off)
2 eggs (additional)
1/2 c. milk (additional)
3 c. coarsely crushed potato chips
3 Tbsp. blanched almonds
Directions:
Heat butter, add green pepper and mushrooms, cook on low heat 5 minutes.
Add flour and stir until blended.
Slowly add stock and milk.
Stir over low heat until thick and smooth.
Add pimiento and chicken.
Add salt and pepper if desired.
Heat thoroughly.
Into slightly beaten egg yolks stir a little of the hot sauce.
Slowly add the egg mixture to the remaining sauce, stirring constantly.
Add sherry.
Pour mixture into an 8-inch square pan.
Cool, then put in refrigerator several hours or overnight.
Cut chicken mixture into 4 squares.
Place each square on a slice of bread.
Cover with slice of bread.
Smooth sides with spatula.
Cut each sandwich in half.
Beat eggs with 1/4 cup milk.
Dip each sandwich half on all sides in egg mixture, then in potato chips.
Place on greased baking sheet.
Sprinkle almonds on top.
Bake 30 minutes at 350°.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Leftovers(Very Good!!!)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. long grain rice, washed in 3 changes of water and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
2 stalks celery, diced
1 medium onion, diced
1/4 green pepper, diced
2 cloves garlic, diced
1 to 2 c. or more of any leftover meat (ham, beef, pork, chicken or combination), diced
1/4 c. soy sauce (optional)
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 can pieces and stems mushrooms, drained (save juice)
2 1/2 c. water
4 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
Directions:
Fry rice in skillet over high heat, stirring all the time, until brown.
Scrape into 4-quart pan with lid.
Add all ingredients, bringing to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute. Turn to low heat and cover tightly.
Don't lift lid for 25 minutes.
Stir and serve.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Rice Twosome
Ingredients:
1 chicken breast, halved
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. margarine
1 1/3 c. hot water
2 chicken bouillon cubes
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
1/2 c. uncooked long-grain rice
1 (2 1/2 oz.) jar sliced mushrooms, drained
2 small ribs celery, chopped
2 green onions, chopped
Directions:
Coat chicken with flour, onion powder, paprika and pepper.
In skillet, brown chicken in hot margarine.
In a small saucepan, heat water and bouillon cubes until dissolved.
Stir in sherry.
In bottom of a 1 1/2-quart casserole, combine water mixture, rice, mushrooms, celery and onion.
Place chicken on top.
Cover and bake at 375° for 50 to 60 minutes or until all liquid is absorbed and chicken is tender.
Makes 2 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Leftover Turkey, Chicken Or Pork
Ingredients:
2 c. diced, cooked turkey
2 c. chopped celery
1 c. cooked rice
1 c. mayo or Miracle Whip
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. chopped onion
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix all together.
Mixture will be dry.
Top with sliced almonds or croutons.
Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until hot.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Creamy Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
1/2 c. uncooked wild rice
3 c. boiling water
1/2 c. uncooked long grain rice
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 (6 oz.) can sliced mushrooms (undrained)
chicken broth
1 1/2 c. light cream
3 c. diced cooked chicken
1/4 c. chopped pimento (optional)
1/4 c. snipped parsley
1 tsp. salt and pepper to taste
1/4 c. slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
Rinse wild rice in cold water. Add with 1/2 teaspoon salt to 2 cups boiling water.
Cook 20 minutes. Add long-grain rice, remaining 1 cup boiling water and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cook 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Dinner(Serves 5)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
10 chicken thighs (about 3 lb.)
3 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces (undrained)
2 c. boiling water
minced fresh parsley (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped onions
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 chicken bouillon cubes
4 chicken breasts, split and boned
1 (5 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts
1 can undiluted cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1 pkg. corn bread stuffing (about 3 c.)
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix soup, mayonnaise, chestnuts and celery.
Lightly grease 3-quart casserole.
Lay breasts in pan.
Pour over mixed ingredients.
Mix stuffing with melted butter and sprinkle on top of chicken.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
Delicious!

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Kalee'S Favorite Dinner(Very Quick And Easy)
Ingredients:
1 lb. hamburger
1 onion, chopped
1 can tomato soup (no water)
1 can green beans
potatoes, mashed
grated cheese (1/2 c.)
Directions:
Brown meat and onion.
Season to taste with salt, pepper and garlic.
Add soup and drained green beans.
Put in casserole dish and top with mashed potatoes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes, just to brown top of potatoes and melt cheese.
Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 c. sweet potatoes, cooked
1/2 stick margarine
1 Tbsp. cinnamon-sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. Karo syrup
Directions:
Put all the ingredients in a casserole dish with lid and bake at 400°, for about 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 c. dark corn Karo syrup
1/2 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar
2 Tbsp. margarine
12 medium sweet potatoes, cooked
Directions:
Bring first 3 ingredients to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer 5 minutes.
Pour half into a large shallow baking dish.
Add potatoes.
Top with remaining syrup.
Bake at 350°, basting often, for 20 minutes.
Do not cover.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Kale Soup(Serves 8)
Ingredients:
2 heads kale or collard greens
1/2 head cabbage
2 cans white or red cannellini beans
2 or 3 medium size potatoes
1 or 2 carrots
1 sweet potato
pork or chicken (optional)
linguica
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Chop up kale or greens, discarding the stalks.
Chop cabbage; cut potatoes into cubes.
Peel carrots and sweet potatoes.
Set all the ingredients aside.
You need a large pot filled with water. Add your meat and beans and simmer for 1 to 2 hours or until tender.
Add sweet potatoes; cook for awhile.
In a large bowl add water to the kale or greens and squeeze out the greens (water will be very green).
Discard water and add kale to pot with all other ingredients.
Make sure you still have enough water and cook until potatoes are tender, stirring frequently.
Depending on how much meat you have, this soup could take 3 to 4 hours to cook.
Cook on medium heat.
Enjoy!

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Portuguese Kale Soup
Ingredients:
1 (48 oz.) can chicken stock
1 (14 oz.) can diced tomatoes
1 (14 oz.) can red kidney beans
1 lb. linguica or turkey or regular kielbasa, skinned and sliced
4 medium potatoes, peeled or scrubbed and diced
3 Tbsp. extra virgin olive oil
4 to 6 cloves garlic, minced
3 carrots, sliced
1 lb. kale, stripped from stem, chopped and washed carefully
2 bay leaves
1 tsp. thyme
salt if necessary
fresh ground black pepper to taste
cayenne pepper to taste (optional)
Directions:
Heat a large saucepan (4-quart minimum).
Add sausage; brown over high heat.
Pour off any fat rendered.
Add olive oil, garlic and potatoes; stir to coat for 1 minute.
Add tomatoes, carrots, chicken stock, bay leaves and thyme.
Simmer, uncovered, until potatoes are tender.
Remove the bay leaves.
Add the kale, pushing it down into the soup.
Cover; simmer until the kale is just cooked.
Adjust seasonings.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings With Blue Cheese Dipping Sauce
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. hot pepper sauce
vegetable oil for frying
18 chicken wings (about 3 lb.), disjointed with the tips discarded
Directions:
Melt the butter or margarine in a small saucepan.
Add hot sauce and remove from heat.
In a large pan or deep-fat fryer, heat 1 inch of oil to 375°.
Fry wings in batch without crowding until golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes.
Drain on paper towels. Brush wings with spicy butter and serve warm, with Blue Cheese Dipping Sauce.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Chicken Dip
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked chopped chicken
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (16 oz.) container sour cream
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
2 small cans chili peppers
1 c. chopped green onion
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Mix together first 6 ingredients.
Place in casserole dish; sprinkle with Cheddar cheese.
Bake 20 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings, washed, drained, sprinkled with salt
3/4 c. catsup
1/2 c. vinegar
3/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. soy sauce
2 eggs
flour
Directions:
Wash and drain the chicken wings.
Sprinkle with salt; let stand 30 minutes.
Beat the eggs.
Dip chicken in eggs; roll in flour.
Deep fry until golden brown.
Put chicken in a baking dish; pour sauce over chicken.
Bake for 35 to 40 minutes in a 350° to 375° oven.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings
1 c. Louisiana hot sauce
2/3 c. butter
1/2 c. Burgundy wine
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
Directions:
Disjoint wings and wash.
Deep fry in oil; drain.
While wings are frying, mix all remaining ingredients and warm until butter is melted.
After draining wings, toss them in the sauce until coated. Serve with carrot and celery strips and Blue cheese dip.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Chicken Dip
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. slivered almonds
1 c. mushrooms, chopped
1 c. (or more) chopped, cooked chicken
Tabasco sauce, paprika, Worcestershire sauce to taste (any or all)
Directions:
Melt cream cheese in a double boiler.
Add soup, almonds, mushrooms and chicken.
Mix all thoroughly and add seasoning to taste.
Can be served as a dip, over toast or in pastry shells as a main dish.
Will serve about 20 if used as a dip.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: E-Z Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 c. + 2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. oil
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Stir flour and salt together; add oil and water together.
Mix and combine.
Roll between 2 sheets of waxed paper; pull off one center crust in pan and pull off other sheet.
Makes one shell in less than 5 minutes.
Prick well; bake at 350° to 375° for 15 to 17 minutes.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: A-Z Quick Bread
Ingredients:
1 tsp. baking soda
3 c. flour
1-3 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
3 eggs, beaten
2 c. sugar
1-3 tsp. vanilla
1 c. oil
2 c. (A-Z ingredients)
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Stir together flour, baking soda, cinnamon, baking powder, salt and set aside.
Beat eggs, with sugar, vanilla, and oil.
Add the A-Z ingredients.
Stir in all but 1/2 c. flour.
Add the 1/2 c. flour to nuts, stir to coat.
Stir into mixture and blend. Pour in 2 9 x 5 loaf pans and bake at 325° for 50-60 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Baking times can vary so watch carefully.
Can use apples, chopped apricots, mashed banana, finely grated carrots or finely grated zucchini.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti pasta
2 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. instant minced onion
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
3 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
2 3/4 c. water
1 (8 oz.) carton cottage cheese
1 small can sliced black olives
1 can mushrooms, drained
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare
pasta	as
directed
on
package;
cook only 7 minutes.
Drain.	Meanwhile,
brown
beef
and
drain.
Add seasonings, tomato sauce, tomato paste and water.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Mix pasta, meat sauce,
cottage cheese, black olives and mushrooms in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Top with Mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese
over
Mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Z Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. oil
3 eggs
2 c. sugar
2 c. grated zucchini
2 tsp. vanilla
3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Mix all at once until well mixed (do not beat).
Pour into pan.
Bake for 1 1/2 hours at 325°.
Use a 12-inch loaf pan or a tube cake pan.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: E Z Chicken Strips
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts (boneless and skinless)
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt and pepper
1 1/2 c. sifted flour
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cut chicken breasts into strips.
Mix flour, salt, pepper and baking powder together.
In a medium size bowl, combine milk and egg.
Beat well.
Combine the flour mixture to egg mixture, coating on all sides of chicken.
Place in large skillet with oil or shortening and deep fat until strips are all golden in color.
